# language_name_wals:	Jakaltek
# language_name_glotto:	Popti'
# iso639_3:	jac
# year_composed:	NA
# year_published:	1997
# mode:	written
# genre_broad:	non-fiction
# genre_narrow:	religion
# writing_system:	Latn
# special_characters:	NA
# short_description:	The New Testament in Eastern Jacalteco. Text of the Parallel Bible Corpus: Mayer, Thomas & Michael Cysouw. 2014. Creating a Massively Parallel Bible Corpus. Proceedings of the International Conference on Language Resources and Evaluation (LREC), Reykjavik, 3158-3163.
# source:	http://www.bible.is/JACWBT/Matt/1

# comments:	The first two digits of the identifier refer to the book, the next three digits to the chapter, and the last three digits to the verse. See Mayer & Cysouw (2014) for a list of book identifiers.

40001001	Ha' icham Abraham yeb naj rey David , ha' yichmam Comam Jesucristo . Hac ti' ye istxolal yichmam Comam haca' ti' :
40001002	Icham Abraham , ha' icham ismam naj Isaac , naj Isaac ha' naj ismam naj Jacob , naj Jacob , ha' naj ismam naj Jud'a yeb huntek'anxa yuẍtaj .
40001003	Naj Jud'a , ha' naj ismam naj Fares yeb naj Zara , ha' xin ismi' ebnaj cawan̈ tu' ha' ton ix Tamar . Naj Fares ha' naj ismam naj Esrom , naj Esrom ha' naj ismam naj Aram .
40001004	Naj Aram , ha' naj ismam naj Aminadab , naj Aminadab , ha' naj ismam naj Naas'on , naj Naas'on , ha' naj ismam naj Salm'on .
40001005	Naj Salm'on , ha' naj ismam naj Booz , wal ismi' naj Booz , ha' ton ix Rahab . Naj Booz , ha' naj ismam naj Obed , wal ismi' naj Obed tu' , ha' ton ix Rut . Naj Obed , ha' naj ismam naj Isa'i .
40001006	Naj Isa'i , ha' naj ismam naj rey David . Haxa naj David , ha' naj ismam naj Salom'on , ismi' naj Salom'on tu' xin , ha' ton ix yixaltic'a naj Ur'ias yet yalan̈tocanoj .
40001007	Wal naj Salom'on , ha' naj ismam naj Roboam , naj Roboam , ha' naj ismam naj Ab'ias , naj Ab'ias , ha' naj ismam naj Asa .
40001008	Naj Asa , ha' naj ismam naj Josafat , naj Josafat ha' naj ismam naj Joram , naj Joram , ha' naj ismam naj Uz'ias .
40001009	Naj Uz'ias , ha' naj ismam naj Jotam , naj Jotam , ha' naj ismam naj Acaz , naj Acaz ha' naj ismam naj Ezequ'ias .
40001010	Naj Ezequ'ias , ha' naj ismam naj Manas'es , naj Manas'es , ha' naj ismam naj Am'on , naj Am'on ha' naj ismam naj Jos'ias .
40001011	Naj Jos'ias , ha' naj ismam naj Jecon'ias yeb huntek'anxa yuẍtaj . Ha' yin̈ istiempohal naj Jecon'ias tu' ilaxto ebnaj Israel preso yul con̈ob Babilonia .
40001012	Hayet yelti ebnaj yalan̈ yip Babilonia tu' xin ha' naj Jecon'ias , ha' naj ismam naj Salatiel , naj Salatiel , ha' naj ismam naj Zorobabel .
40001013	Naj Zorobabel , ha' naj ismam naj Abiud , naj Abiud , ha' naj ismam naj Eliaquim , naj Eliaquim , ha' naj ismam naj Azor .
40001014	Naj Azor , ha' naj ismam naj Sadoc , naj Sadoc ha' naj ismam naj Aquim , haxa naj Aquim , ha' naj ismam naj Eliud .
40001015	Naj Eliud , ha' naj ismam naj Eleazar , naj Eleazar , ha' naj ismam naj Mat'an , haxa naj Mat'an , ha' naj ismam naj Jacob .
40001016	Naj Jacob , ha' naj ismam naj Jos'e , naj Jos'e tu' ha' naj yichamil ix Mar'ia . Ix Mar'ia tu' ha' ix ismi' Comam Jes'us , ha' ton Comam Cristo .
40001017	Wal xin ay can̈lahon̈wan̈ mame yin̈ istxolal yichmam Comam Jesucristo chiichiti yin̈ icham Abraham masanta yin̈ naj rey David . Tzujanilo yinta naj rey David tu' yichipaxti can̈lahon̈wan̈ mame istxolal yichmam Comam masanta yet yilaxto ebnaj Israel preso bey Babilonia . Tzujanxa yet yilaxto ebnaj Israel preso yul con̈ob Babilonia tu' yichipaxti can̈lahon̈wan̈xa ebnaj mame yin̈ istxolal yichmam Comam Jesucristo masanto yin̈ istiempohal yet ispitzc'a Comam .
40001018	Hac ti' ye istzoti'al yin̈ yet ispitzc'a Comam Jesucristo . Wal ix Mar'ia tak'webilxa yu ix ismohyi yeb naj Jos'e , yaja' yet maẍto chiyik' isba , ispitzc'ati' nich'an unin yin̈ ix yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
40001019	Wal naj Jos'e waxan̈ca caw yijem naj tet isley naj Mois'es , yaja' mach isje isc'ul naj isk'ana' yin̈ ix Mar'ia tu' , yoc yin̈ isnabal naj isbejnicano ix yin̈ ewantajil .
40001020	Hayet lan̈an yec' hune' tu' yin̈ isnabal naj , isyeni isba hune' y'angel Comam Dios tet naj yul iswayic ; yalni naj 'angel tu' haca' ti' : -- Jos'e , hach titnajach yin̈ yuninal naj rey David , mach chinanon hac'ul hamohyi yeb ix Mar'ia , yuto ha' nich'an unin ijbilico yu ix yet Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
40001021	Nich'an unin chipitzc'a tu' , Jes'us chawaco isbihoj , yuto ha' naj chicolnilti yet con̈ob yalan̈ ismul , ẍi naj 'angel .
40001022	Hac tu' yu yijni isba tzet yalcano Comam Dios tet hune' ischejab yet payat , yet istz'ibn̈encano haca' ti' :
40001023	Ay hune' ix k'opo maẍto hunu winaj chik'le , yaja' chipitzc'ati nich'an winaj unin yin̈ ix , nich'an unin chipitzc'a tu' Emanuel chiyij isbi , ẍiayoj . Emanuel , ha' chaliloj ayco Comam Dios coxol .
40001024	Lahwi tu' yel iswayan̈ naj Jos'e , isyijen naj yin̈ tzet yal y'angel Comam Dios , ismohyi naj yeb ix Mar'ia .
40001025	Yaja' mach ishunba isba masanto yet ispitzc'a nich'an yunin ix . Ha' nich'an unin pitzc'a tu' xin , Jes'us yaco naj isbihoj .
40002001	Bey yul con̈ob Bel'en ayco yul ismajul tx'otx' Judea , ha' tu' pitzc'a nich'an Jes'us . Yet hune' tiempohal tu' ha' naj Herodes ayco isreyalo tx'otx' Judea . Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj caw ay ishelanil chicuyni yin̈ tzettaj ye tx'umel , ispeto ebnaj yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chiahilo tz'ayic . Yet yapni ebnaj bey con̈ob Jerusal'en ,
40002002	isk'amben ebnaj : -- ¿ Baytu'wal ay hune' naj nich'an xapitzc'ahi , naj chioc isreyalo anma Israel ti' ? Jilan̈ yahilo hune' tx'umel yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chiahilo tz'ayic , ha' xin ak'ni cotxumulojan̈ tato xapitzc'a naj . Yuxin macon̈titan̈ jik'ayo cobahan̈ tet naj , ẍi ebnaj .
40002003	Yet yaben naj rey Herodes hune' tu' , caw somchacan̈ yul iswi' naj yeb sunil anma ay yul con̈ob Jerusal'en .
40002004	Yuxin yawte naj Herodes tu' ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote Israel , yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es ; isk'amben naj tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Baytaxca tu' chipitzc'a naj Cristo ? ẍi naj .
40002005	Istak'wi ebnaj tet naj : -- Yul con̈ob Bel'en yul ismajul Judea chipitzc'a naj , yuto hac tu' yu istz'ibn̈elaxcanayo yul Yum Comam Dios yu hune' ischejab yet payat , bay chal haca' ti' :
40002006	Con̈ob Bel'en , ha' caw nich'anch'an sata hunuxa con̈ob ay yul ismajul tx'otx' Judea , yaja' caw ec'balto yelapno ye sata huntek'an con̈ob tu' , yuto ha' bey tu' chipitzc'a hune' naj yahaw . Ha' naj xin chioc tan̈eno con̈ob Israel , ẍiayoj , ẍi ebnaj .
40002007	Lahwi tu' xin , yawten naj rey Herodes ebnaj mago yin̈ ewantajil , yoc naj isk'ambeno tet ebnaj yin̈ tzet tiempohal isye isba hune' tx'umel tu' tet ebnaj .
40002008	Lahwi tu' xin ischejnito naj Herodes tu' ebnaj bey con̈ob Bel'en , yalni naj tet ebnaj : -- Asiwe bey Bel'en tu' , caw xin chek'ambe yin̈ tzet caw ye nich'an unin tu' . Lahwi yilcha naj heyu cat heyul heyalno wetan cat intopaxojan winayo inbahan tet naj , ẍi naj .
40002009	Lahwi yalni naj Herodes hune' tu' isto ebnaj . Wal hune' tx'umel yil ebnaj yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chiahilo tz'ayic babel sata ebnaj , yoc lin̈no bay ay nich'an Jes'us tu' .
40002010	Hayet yilni ebnaj hune' tx'umel tu' caw tzalacan̈ ebnaj .
40002011	Hayet yapni ebnaj xin yocto ebnaj yul n̈a . Yilni ebnaj nich'an nene' tu' yeb ismi' , yay jahno ebnaj sata nich'an nene' tu' , yalni ebnaj c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ . Lahwi tu' ishajni ebnaj isc'uwanbal , yak'ni ebnaj ch'en oro , yeb te' pom , yeb huntek'an an̈ caw xuk' sam chiyij mirra sabehal tet nich'an Jes'us tu' .
40002012	Yaja' xin hallax tet ebnaj yul iswayic tato matxa ch'ec' ebnaj yala' tet naj rey Herodes yin̈ nich'an Jes'us tu' , yuxin nan behalxa bay to ebnaj yet ispaxto ebnaj bey iscon̈ob .
40002013	Haxa yet xapaxto ebnaj mago hulic'o ilno nich'an Jes'us , isyeni isba hune' y'angel Comam Dios tet naj Jos'e yul iswayic , yalni naj 'angel tu' : -- Ahan̈wano yin̈ an̈e , ito nich'an unin ti' yeb ismi' cat hato bey Egipto . Wal haweh bey tu' masanto haninan chiwalan tawet bak'in chachmeltzohi , yuto chati naj Herodes issayomal nich'an unin ti' cat ispotx'ni naj yalni , ẍi naj 'angel tet naj Jos'e .
40002014	Lahwi tu' yahwano naj Jos'e , yinito naj nich'an Jes'us tu' , isto naj yin̈ isbel yeb ix Mar'ia bey Egipto yin̈ ak'balil .
40002015	Ha' bey tu' xin ehayo naj yeb ix masanto cam naj rey Herodes . Hac tu' yu yijnicano isba tzet halbilcano yu Comam Dios tet hune' ischejab yet payat yet istz'ibn̈encano naj haca' ti' : " Bey Egipto chiwawteti Inc'aholan , " ẍiayoj .
40002016	Hayet yilni naj rey Herodes tato matxa ec' ebnaj mago yala' tet naj yin̈ naj nich'an Jes'us , caw tit ishowal naj yuto etli ebnaj yin̈ naj yabe . Ischejni naj potx'laxo sunil niẍte winaj unin , nene' masanta niẍte yin̈ cab habil ay yul con̈ob Bel'en yeb huntek'anxa con̈ob ayco yin̈ ishoyanil , yuto hac tu' chielico istiempohal yin̈ tzet yal ebnaj mago tet naj .
40002017	Hac tu' yu yijnicano isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Jerem'ias , hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat bay chala :
40002018	Abelax hune' aw yul con̈ob Ram'a , caw ay ok'il yeb nimeta bisc'ulal . Ha' ton ix Raquel chiok' yin̈ej yunin , machi xin chisje ix chiak'lax isnimanbal isc'ul ix , yuto camnaxa ej yunin ix tu' , ẍiayoj .
40002019	Haxa yet xacam naj rey Herodes , isyeni isba hune' y'angel Comam Dios tet naj Jos'e yul iswayic bey Egipto , yalni naj 'angel tu' :
40002020	-- Ahan̈wanoj cat hameltzo yeb nich'an unin ti' yeb ismi' bey hacon̈ob Israel , yuto xacam ebnaj ochen potx'no camo nich'an unin ti' , ẍi naj 'angel .
40002021	Haxa yet yaben naj Jos'e hune' tu' yahwano naj , yinito naj naj nich'an Jes'us tu' yeb ismi' , ispaxti naj sat tx'otx' Israel hunelxa .
40002022	Yaja' yabelo naj tato naj Arquelao , isc'ahol naj rey Herodes tu' oc reyalo selelo bey Judea , yuxin xiw naj yapni bey tu' . Yaja' xin hallax tet naj yul iswayic yu Comam Dios tato chito naj yul ismajul Galilea .
40002023	Yet yapni naj bey tu' yehayo naj yeb ix Mar'ia yeb naj nich'an Jes'us yul con̈ob Nazaret . Hac tu' yu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat bay chala tato nazareno chihallax yin̈ Comam Jes'us .
40003001	Yet hune' tiempohal tu' xin apni naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma bey tx'otx' desierto , yul ismajul Judea .
40003002	Yalni naj tet anma apni bey tu' : -- Bejwecano hewatx'en istx'ojal , yuto yocxa Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ yahawo teyin̈ , ẍi naj .
40003003	Ha' ton yin̈ naj Juan ti' bay yal naj Isa'ias , hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , yet istz'ibn̈encano naj haca' ti' : Ay hune' naj chiawi yin̈ caw ip bey hune' tx'otx' desierto , chalni naj : " Watx'eweco heyanma yuto chihul Comam Dios Jahawil . Haca' chu istoholban̈elax hunu beh yet chihul hunu naj jahaw , hac tu' cheyute hayanma , " ẍi naj , ẍi yul Yum Comam Dios .
40003004	Wal naj Juan tu' , xil no' camello watx'ebilayo xilo isk'ap naj , tz'um no' xin ayco istx'ambalo naj . Ha' tzet chislo naj ha' ton no' niẍte nok' haca' no' lit' yeb no' cab ay xolaj telaj .
40003005	Hantan̈e xin anma yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yeb yul ismajul Judea , yebpaxo anma ayayo istila ha' niman Jord'an apni abeno tzet yal naj .
40003006	Yet chalnati anma ismul xin , cat yahcano ha' iswi' yu naj Juan yul ha' niman Jord'an .
40003007	Hayet yilni naj Juan tato tx'i'al ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo apni isc'atan̈ yu yah ha' iswi' , yalni naj tet ebnaj : -- Hex ti' caw haca'tan̈e heyic'al heba yeb no' laba , caw helanex hecolni heba . ¿ Mac halni teyet ta yun̈e ch'ah ha' hewi' yuxin chexcolcha tet hune' isya'tajil chati Comam Dios ?
40003008	Tato caw yeli xaheyacano sunilal istx'ojal , yilal heyenilo yu isc'ulal chewatx'e .
40003009	Tajca chetxum haca' ti' : " Han̈on̈ti'an̈ jichmaman̈ ye icham Abraham , yuxin xacon̈colchahan̈ yalan̈ isya'tajil chati' Comam Dios , tajca quexchi . Wal xin chiwalan teyet , tato choche Comam Dios chu yanico Comam huntek'an ch'en ch'en ti' yuninalo icham Abraham heseleloj .
40003010	Cawilxa yeti hune' isya'tajil chati Comam Dios , lahan haca' yet yocxa ch'en eche yich xe' hunu te te' yu istz'oc'laxayo te' . Yuxin sunil te te' mach c'ulo issatni chitzoc'laxayo te' cat isk'ojlaxto te' yul k'a' .
40003011	Yin̈ caw yeli haninti'an han̈e ha ha' chiwak'an yahbalo ha' hewi' yun̈e isyenicanilo isba tato caw yeli xahebejcano istx'ojal . Yaj ay hune' naj tzujan yul wintajan , naj tu' chiyacan̈ naj ha' hewi' , yaj yu isk'ak'al yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo . Ha' naj tu' caw ec'balcano yelapno ye naj insatajan , walinan xin caw matzet welapnojan chiwabehan , nitam int'un̈nihan isxan̈ab naj .
40003012	Naj chul tu' lahan naj haca' hunu naj chixunilo isk'al ixim trigo , nan chak' naj ixim sat , nan chak'paxo naj ixim yoj , wal ixim sat tu' chisc'ubato naj ixim yul isc'un̈a , haxa ixim yoj tu' xin chisk'ojto naj ixim xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal , " ẍi naj Juan tu' .
40003013	Yet hune' tiempohal tu' el Comam Jes'us bey Galilea , isto Comam isti' ha' niman Jord'an isc'atan̈ naj Juan , yu yah ha' iswi' Comam yu naj .
40003014	Wal naj Juan tu' mach chisje naj yak'a'can̈ ha' iswi' Comam . Yalni naj tet Comam : -- Machoj , wal xin ha' hawet hach yilal hawanican̈ ha' inwi'an , maẍtajach chachhul inc'atan̈an yu wanican̈an ha' hawi' , ẍi naj .
40003015	Yaja' tak'wi Comam tet naj : -- Mach chu haman̈c'on hune' ti' , wal xin yilal coyijen tzet chal Comam Dios , ẍi Comam . Hac tu' xin yu isyijen naj Juan yanican̈ ha' iswi' Comam Jes'us .
40003016	Yet lahwi yah ha' iswi' Comam tu' , yahti Comam xol ha' , yin̈n̈ena tu' ishajni isba satcan̈ . Yilni Comam yayilo Comam Esp'iritu Santo yiban̈ haca' hunu no' cuwis .
40003017	Yabelax hune' yul nuk'e satcan̈ , halni haca' ti' : -- Ha' naj ti' Inc'aholan , caw xahan ay wuhan , caw chintzalahan yin̈ naj , ẍiaytij .
40004001	Lahwi tu' yilaxto Comam Jes'us yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo bey tx'otx' desierto yu yilwelax Comam yu naj matzwalil .
40004002	Caw xin yulbal cawina tz'ayic yeb cawina ak'bal mach wa' Comam , lahwi tu' isn̈ohchacan̈ .
40004003	Yapni naj matzwalil yilweno Comam , yalni naj tet Comam : -- Ta yeli Isc'ahol Dios hawehi , hal tet huntek'an ch'en ch'en ti' meltzojabico ch'en wahil , ẍi naj .
40004004	Istak'wi Comam tet naj : -- Wal xin tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios tato maẍn̈etaj yu tzet chicolo yuxin ay cok'inal , to yupaxo Istzoti' Comam , ẍiayoj , ẍi Comam tet naj .
40004005	Lahwi tu' yinito naj matzwalil Comam yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , iscon̈ob Comam Dios , yinato naj Comam yin̈ iswi' yatut Comam bey tu' ,
40004006	yalni naj tet Comam : -- Tato caw yeli Isc'ahol Dios hawehi k'ojayto haba bey ti' , yuto tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : Chak'ati Comam Dios y'angel chachistan̈e' yun̈e mach chaẍischayo ebnaj sat tx'otx' , haxinwal mach chilahwi hawoj yin̈ ch'en ch'en , ẍiayoj , ẍi naj .
40004007	Istak'wi Comam Jes'us tet naj : -- Tz'ibn̈ebilpaxcanayo yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Mach chinheyacojan yin̈ ilwebal yuto Heyahawil yeb heDiosal wehan , " ẍiayoj , ẍi Comam .
40004008	Lahwi tu' yinito naj Comam yin̈ iswi' hune' witz caw nahat yecanocan̈ , isyeni naj sunilej con̈ob ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb isk'alomal con̈ob tu' tet Comam .
40004009	Yalni naj tet Comam : -- Sunil huntek'an chawil ti' chiwak'an tawet , yaj tato chaẍay jahno insatajan cat hawinayo haba wetan , ẍi naj tet Comam .
40004010	Istak'wi Comam : -- Ach matzwalil hitzan̈ilo inc'atan̈an yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Iweyo heba tet Comam Dios yuto Heyahawil yeb heDiosal ye Comam , han̈e tet Comam xin cheyije tzet chala , " ẍiayoj , ẍi Comam .
40004011	Yet yalni Comam Jes'us haca' tu' isbejnicano naj Comam , yapni huntek'an ebnaj 'angel colwal yin̈ Comam .
40004012	Hayet yaben Comam Jes'us tato alaxicto naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma yul preso , isto Comam yul ismajul Galilea .
40004013	Yaja' xin mach cancano Comam yul con̈ob Nazaret , wal xin to Comam yul con̈ob Capernaum , ha' tu' xin ehayo Comam . Hune' con̈ob tu' ayayo isti' ha' mar Galilea , tx'otx' chiyij Zabul'on yeb Neftal'i .
40004014	Hac tu' yu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Isa'ias , ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , bay chala :
40004015	Tx'otx' Zabul'on yeb tx'otx' Neftal'i , tx'otx' ayic'to satac'to ha' Jord'an , tx'otx' ayayo isti' ha' mar , yul ismajul tx'otx' Galilea bay ay tx'i'al anma mach Israeloj .
40004016	Huntek'an anma tu' aytic'aco xol k'ejholo yaja' wal tinan̈ xin xaapni issajilk'inal tet . Huntek'an anma tu' iscambalxatic'a , yaja' wal tinan̈ xaapni issajilk'inal yak'lobal yanma , ẍiayoj .
40004017	Ha' bey tu' xin ichico Comam Jes'us yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios , chalni Comam : -- Bejwecano hewatx'en istx'ojal yuto yocxa Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ Yahawo teyin̈ , ẍi Comam .
40004018	Hayet lan̈an isbelwi Comam Jes'us isti' ha' lago Galilea , yapni Comam isc'atan̈ cawan̈ ebnaj ik'omati cay , lan̈an yanayto ebnaj ishac' chiinahti no' cay xol ha' . Ebnaj cawan̈ ti' yuẍta isba ebnaj , ha' ton naj Sim'on , naj chihallaxpaxo Pedro , yeb xin naj Andr'es .
40004019	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Ocan̈we tzujno wintajan , wal tinan̈ haxa anma chexoc heyik'ahtij cat yoc yul ink'aban , ẍi Comam .
40004020	Yet yaben ebnaj yalni Comam haca' tu' , isbejnicano ebnaj ishac' , yoc tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam .
40004021	Haniq'uixto chito Comam Jes'us xin yilnipaxo Comam cawan̈xa ebnaj yuẍta isba , ha' ton naj Jacobo yeb naj Juan , ebnaj isc'ahol icham Zebedeo . Ayahto ebnaj yul isbarco yeb ismam tu' , lan̈an xin isbujni ebnaj ishac' . Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj tato chioc tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam .
40004022	Yet yaben ebnaj hune' tu' yanicano ebnaj isbarco yeb ismam , yoc tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam .
40004023	Caw sunil yul ismajul Galilea ec' Comam Jes'us , iscuyni Comam anma yul hunun iscapilla ebnaj Israel , yalni Comam tzoti' c'ul yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Yak'ni cawxo Comam anma yin̈ sunilal yabil ayco yin̈ , yeb anma chiec'ya' yanma .
40004024	Caw xin pujnacan̈ isk'umal Comam yul ismajul Siria , chiniti anma macta ayco yabil yin̈ . Ay mac ch'ec'ya' yanma yu yabil , ay mac ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ , aypaxo mac chilow yaxcamic yin̈ , yeb aypaxo mac camnajilo isnimanil . Sunil huntek'an anma tu' yak' cawxo Comam .
40004025	Caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam ; ay anma ah Galilea , ay anma ah Dec'apolis , ay anma ah Jerusal'en yeb anma ah Judea , yebpaxo anma ay isk'axepic'to ha' niman Jord'an .
40005001	Hayet yilni Comam Jes'us tato caw hantan̈e anma apni isc'atan̈ , yahto Comam yin̈ istzalanil hune' won̈an , yay tz'on̈no Comam , ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈ .
40005002	Yoc Comam iscuyno ebnaj iscuywom tu' , yichico Comam yalni haca' ti' :
40005003	-- Sak'al yet mac chitxumchalo yu ta mach chu iscolni isba ischuquil , yuxin yin̈n̈e Comam chicawxi isc'ul . Hune' mac tu' yet ay yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
40005004	Sak'al yet mac chiyik' bisc'ulal yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e , yuto chiak'lax yak'lobal isc'ul yu Comam Dios .
40005005	Sak'al yet mac chewchotan̈e chute isba yuto chischah hune' tx'otx' haltebilcano yu Comam Dios .
40005006	Sak'al yet mac choche isc'ul iswatx'e' tzet chal Comam Dios yuto chij isba tzet choche .
40005007	Sak'al yet mac chitz'ay isc'ul yin̈ yet anmahil , yuto hac tu' chu istz'aypaxo isc'ul Comam Dios yin̈ .
40005008	Sak'al yet mac sajxa ye yanma yul sat Comam Dios , yuto ha' anma tu' chiapni isc'atan̈ Comam .
40005009	Sak'al yet mac chisayni ak'anc'ulal yuto chal Comam Dios yuninaloj .
40005010	Sak'al yet mac caj chiillaxi yu chiswatx'e istoholal haca' choche Comam , yuto ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ .
40005011	Sak'al heyet yet chexbahlaxi yeb yet chexetalaxi , cat ishoblaxcan̈ lek'ti'al teyin̈ yuto tzujanex wintajan .
40005012	Caw ak'we tzalaho heyanma ta hac tu' chexutelaxi yuto ch'ak'lax ispaj selel teyet bey satcan̈ . Yuto haca' heyilni isya'tajil ti' , hac tu' yu yec'ya' yanma ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payat , ẍi Comam .
40005013	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Hex ti' , haca' atz'am atz'am , hac tu' heye yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . K'inalo ta chiel isc'achi'al atz'am matxa chu yoc isc'achi'al atz'am hunelxa , hac' tu' xin matxa tzet ch'ocnico atz'am , to chitirlaxtoj cat isxan̈laxic'o yu anma , ẍi Comam .
40005014	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Hex ti' haca'paxo sajilk'inal heye yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . K'inalo ta ay hunu con̈ob yin̈ iswi' hunu witz , caw haban jilnilto nahat .
40005015	Yet chicotzujbanico k'a' yin̈ hunu cantil , mach chicon̈ohbaco hunu almuh yiban̈ , wal xin chicot'un̈bacan̈ yun̈e ismujli yin̈ anma ayicto yul n̈a tu' .
40005016	Hacojab tu' xin istzejla hune' sajilk'inal ayxaco teyin̈ yin̈ sat anma , haxinwal chil anma isc'ulal chewatx'e . Hac tu' xin c'ul istzotel anma yin̈ Comam ay yul satcan̈ , ẍi Comam .
40005017	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us haca' ti' : -- Tajca chetxumu ta yu intan̈tzenilojan isley naj Mois'es yeb cuybanile aycano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yuxin quinhulan , machoj , walxinto yun̈e wak'nihan ohtan̈elaxilo yin̈ tzet chaliloj yuxin quinhulan .
40005018	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet ta caw yilal yijni isba sunil tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios . Yulbal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb satcan̈ , machi hun tx'inano ayayo yin̈ ley mach ch'ec'to yet yijni isba .
40005019	Yuxin ha' mac mach chiyijen hunu chejbanile ayco yin̈ ley , waxan̈ca machi bin tzet chaliloj , machi xin chiscuypaxo yet anmahil isyijeni , ha' hune' mac tu' machi yelapno chuco xol mac chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Wal mac chiyijen xin cat iscuynipaxo yet anmahil isyijeni , ha' hune' mac tu' caw ay yelapno chuco xol anma ch'oc yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
40005020	Yuxin chiwalan teyet tato mach ec'balto c'ul cheyute heyijen yin̈ tzet halbilcano yu Comam Dios tu' sata ebnaj chicuywa yin̈ ley yeb ebnaj fariseo , mach chexoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40005021	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Hex ti' heyohtaj tato hallax tet ebnaj jichmam haca' ti' : " Mach chepotx'camo heyet anmahil , yuto ha' mac chipotx'ni hunu yet anmahil yilal yilaxto sata naj juez cat yoc yin̈ isya'tajil yu naj , " ẍi .
40005022	Yaja' haninan chiwalan teyet , ha' mac chichiwa isc'ul yin̈ yet anmahil chiay isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios . Ha' mac chibuchwa yin̈ yet anmahil xin , ha' ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ lahti' yul con̈ob chiilni tzet chielicoj . Haxa mac chibahni yet anmahil cat yak'ni taco isc'ul , ha' hune' mac tu' ay ismay isto xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal .
40005023	K'inalo tato yet lan̈an heyinito heyofrenda tet Comam Dios sat altar cat henanitij tato ay hemul tet hunu maca ,
40005024	awecano heyofrenda tu' yich ismeẍahil bay chiak'lax xahanbal tu' , cat heto heyanoco heba yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb hune' mac tu' , tzujan tu' xin xaisje heyak'ni heyofrenda tu' tet Comam Dios .
40005025	Tato ay hunu mac chik'anni teyin̈ yu hunu istx'ojal chewatx'e , watx'eweyo hune' tu' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb hune' mac tu' yet yalan̈to maẍto chexto sata naj alcal . Yuto ta chexapni sata naj , chexyaco naj yul isk'ab ebnaj mayor , haxa ebnaj mayor tu' xin chexanicto yul preso .
40005026	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , mach chexelti yul preso tu' ta mach tz'ajano cheyak' hemulta , ẍi Comam .
40005027	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Hex ti' heyohtaj tato hallax haca' ti' : " Mach chexixli , " ẍi .
40005028	Yaja' haninti'an chiwalan teyet , mac xan̈etic'a chiilni hunu ix ix cat isnanico istx'ojal yin̈ ix cat yochenico ix , ha' hune' mac tu' xayanaco ismul yul sat Comam Dios .
40005029	K'inalo tato isbak' hesat yin̈ hewatx'k'ab chexak'ni ayc'ayoj yin̈ hunu istx'ojal , c'ulmi tato cheyilti hune' isbak' hesat tu' cat hek'ojnito nahat . Wal xin ec'bal c'ul tato ayto hunu tzet mach tz'ajano yin̈ henimanil sata ta tz'ajan sunil henimanil cat heyalaxto xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal .
40005030	K'inalo tato hewatx'k'ab chexak'ni ayc'ayo yin̈ hunu istx'ojal , c'ulmi ta chetzoq'uilto hune' hek'ab tu' , cat hek'ojnito nahat . Wal xin ec'bal c'ul tato matxa hune' hek'ab satato tz'ajan henimanil cat heyalaxto xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal , ẍi Comam .
40005031	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Hallaxpaxo yet payat haca' ti' : " Ta ay hunu naj chispoh isba yeb yixal , yilal iswatx'icano yumal cat yak'nicano naj hune' hum tu' tet ix , " ẍiayoj .
40005032	Yaja' wal inti'an chiwalan , tato ay hunu naj chispoh isba yeb yixal , yaja' ta mach yuho issayni ix ismul yeb hunuxa winaj , hune' naj tu' lan̈an istubtento naj ix issaya' ismul yik'ni hunuxa yichamil . Ha' xin naj chiik'ni ix chispoh isba yeb yichamil tu' , ha' hun naj chahpaxico ismul , ẍi Comam .
40005033	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Hex ti' , heyohtapaxoj tato hallax tet ebnaj jichmam haca' ti' : " Ta cheyawte isbi Comam Dios yin̈ hunu tzet chetak'we teyin̈ , yilal heyijen hune' tu' , " ẍiayoj .
40005034	Yaja' wal inti'an chiwalan teyet , mach cheyak' binaho isbi Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chetak'weco teyiban̈ . Mach cheyak' binaho satcan̈ yet chetak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' teyiban̈ , yuto ha' bey tu' tz'on̈an Comam Dios Jahawil .
40005035	Mach cheyak'paxo binaho tx'o tx'otx' yet chetak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' teyiban̈ , yuto tx'o tx'otx' isbatxobal yoj Comam ye tx'otx' . Mach cheyak' binaho isbi con̈ob Jerusal'en yet chetak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' teyiban̈ , yuto iscon̈ob Comam Dios Jahawil caw ay yelapno yehi .
40005036	Mach cheyak' binaho hewi' yin̈ tzet chetak'weco teyiban̈ , yuto mach chu hesajn̈en maca hek'ejn̈en hunu xil hewi' .
40005037	Wal xin tato cheyal ho' , yelojab cheyala , taca machoj ta quexchi , machojabi ; yuto ta cheyak' binaho isbi huntek'an tu' yak'ni isba yin̈ tzet cheyala , wal xin yin̈ naj matzwalil chitit huntek'an tu' , ẍi Comam .
40005038	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us haca' ti' : -- Hex ti' heyohtaj tato hallaxpaxo haca' ti' : " Tato ay hunu mac chimak'ni poho isbak'sat hunu maca , mak'laxojabpaxo poho isbak'sat hune' mac tu' . Tato ay hunu mac chimak'nilti yeh hunu maca , mak'laxojabpaxilti yeh hune' mac tu' , " ẍiayoj .
40005039	Yaja' wal inti'an chiwalan , mach chu hepajtzen istx'ojal chiswatx'e hunu mac teyin̈ . Wal xin tato ay mac chipak'nilto hecotx' , meltzowepaxto k'axepxa tet .
40005040	Ta ay hunu mac chik'anni teyin̈ tet naj alcal , cat yinito hecamiẍ yalni , matzet cheyala ta chipaxto hechumpa .
40005041	Yeb xin ta ay hunu mac chalni teyet tato cheyijto yijatz yictajo legua , colwahan̈we yin̈ , iweto yijatz tu' hunu legua .
40005042	Ta ay mac chik'anni hunu tzet ye tu' teyet , ak'we tet . Tato ay hunu mac chik'anni hunu tzet ye tu' c'amil teyet , colwahan̈we yin̈ hune' mac tu' , ẍi Comam .
40005043	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Hex ti' heyohtaj tato hallax haca' ti' : " Xahan cheyil mac xahan chexilni . Mac ayco ishowal teyin̈ xin , ocojabpaxo hehowal yin̈ , " ẍiayoj .
40005044	Yaja' wal inti'an chiwalan teyet , xahan cheyil mac ayco ishowal teyin̈ . K'anwe isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ macta chexetani .
40005045	Ta cheyije haca' tu' , hac tu' chu heyeniloj tato quexyuninal Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ , yuto ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni aholo tz'ayic yiban̈ anma c'ul yeb yiban̈ anma tx'oj . Lahan chapaxayo Comam ha' n̈ab yiban̈ mac c'ul yeb yiban̈ mac tx'oj .
40005046	Wal xin tato han̈c'an̈e anma xahan chexilni , ha'n̈e xin xahan cheyilpaxoj , ¿ mataxca chechah ispaj hune' tu' tet Comam Dios ? Machoj , yuto hac tu' chute isbeybaln̈e ebnaj mulum , haca' ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal chito bey Roma .
40005047	Yeb xin tato han̈c'an̈e tet heyuẍtaj chextioẍli , ¿ c'ulmi hune' tu' ? Machoj . Wal xin ha' anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios hac tu' chisbeybaln̈e .
40005048	Tz'ajanojab chu hebeybaln̈e sunil isc'ulal , yuto Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ tz'ajan lahan yehi , ẍi Comam .
40006001	Yalni Comam Jes'us : -- Caw nann̈e heyu yin̈ tzet chewatx'e , machn̈ehojab yin̈ sat anma c'ul cheyute heba , yuto ta yun̈e heyillaxi yuxin chewatx'e isc'ulal , mach chechah ispaj selel tet Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ .
40006002	Yuxin yet chexcolwa yin̈ hunu meba' , mach chepujbac'o haca' chute ebnaj chal isba c'ulal . Ebnaj tu' ch'ak' ebnaj issabehal yulaj capilla yeb yulaj calle , yun̈e yallax ebnaj c'ulal . Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , yet chihallax c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ ebnaj tu' lan̈an ischahnina ebnaj ispaj selel .
40006003	Wal hex ti' xin , hayet chexcolwa yin̈ anma meba' machi mac tet cheyala , nitam tet hunu heyamigo .
40006004	Wal xin yin̈ ewantajil cheyak' tet , haxinwal Comam ay yul satcan̈ chiilni tzet chawatx'e yin̈ ewantajil , cat yak'ni Comam ispaj selel teyet , ẍi Comam .
40006005	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Hayet chextxahli tet Comam Dios , mach cheyute haca' chute ebnaj chal isba c'ulal . Ha' ebnaj tu' yun̈e yillax ebnaj yu anma , yuxin ton̈etic'a choche islin̈ba isba istxahli yulaj iscapilla ebnaj Israel , yebpaxo yin̈la istxiquin txon̈bal . Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , yet chitxahli ebnaj haca' tu' chischahnina ebnaj ispaj selel tet anma .
40006006	Walex hex ti' , mach cheyute haca' tu' . Wal xin hayet chextxahli , chexocto yul heyatut cat hepeban ispultahil te' , cat hetxahli tet Comam Dios , Comam chiaben tzet cheyala . Chil Comam sunil tzet cheyu yin̈ ewantajil cat yak'ni Comam ispaj selel teyet .
40006007	Hayet chextxahli , machojab chexoc hecayen̈e tzoti' matzet chaliloj haca' chute anma maẍto ohtan̈eho Comam Dios . Yuto chistxum ebnaj ta yu caw nimej chute ebnaj yoj istxah , caw chabe Comam Dios tzet chal ebnaj yalni .
40006008	Wal xin mach cheyute haca' tu' , yuto Comam Dios yohtaxa tzet chiocnico heyu yalan̈to yet maẍto chek'an tet Comam .
40006009	Hayet chextxahli , hac ti' cheyute heyalni haca' ti' : Hach Comam , hach coDios , ayach yul satcan̈ , nimanojab yelapno habi yul sat anma .
40006010	Hulan̈ cat hawoc jahawilojan̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yijab isba tzet chawoche sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' haca' chu yijni isba yul satcan̈ .
40006011	Mamin , chicok'anan̈ tawet , ak' tzet chicolohan̈ hunun tz'ayic .
40006012	Ak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ istx'ojal chicowatx'ehan̈ , haca' chu jak'ni nimanc'ulalan̈ yin̈ anma chiwatx'en istx'ojal jin̈an̈ .
40006013	Mach chon̈hachayojan̈ xol ilwebal , caw colon̈ilojan̈ yul isk'ab naj matzwalil , quexchi yin̈ hetxah , ẍi Comam .
40006014	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Ta cheyak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ anma chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈ , ha' Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ ch'ak'nipaxo nimanc'ulal teyin̈ .
40006015	Yaj ta mach cheyak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ heyet anmahil chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈ , mach chak'paxo nimanc'ulal Comam Dios teyin̈ , ẍi Comam .
40006016	Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Hayet mach chexwa' yu hetxahli tet Comam Dios , mach bisc'ulalo cheyute hesat haca' chute ebnaj chal isba c'ulal , yuto ebnaj tu' caw bisc'ulal chute ebnaj sat yun̈e yillax ebnaj yu anma tato ayco ebnaj yin̈ yet mach chon̈wahi yu cotxahli tet Comam Dios . Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet chischahna ebnaj ispaj selel yet chiillax ebnaj yu anma tu' .
40006017	Walex ti' xin , yet mach chexwa' yu hetxahli tet Comam Dios , chetx'ahwe hesat cat hex'inito xil hewi' ,
40006018	yun̈e mach chalilo isba tato ayexico yin̈ yet mach chexwa' yu hetxahli tet Comam Dios . Wal xin han̈c'an̈e Comam ewan yehi , ha' chiilni tzet cheyu cat yak'ni Comam ispaj selel teyet , ẍi Comam .
40006019	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us haca' ti' : -- Mach chetenba hek'alomal sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' , yuto chioc no' ih yeta'toj , cat xin yocpaxo isk'uxewal . Macato chul ebnaj elk'om yin̈ cat yinito ebnaj .
40006020	Wal xin ha' hune' cheyute , tenbawe hek'alomal yul satcan̈ bay machi no' ih chietantoj , bay mach chiocpaxo isk'uxewal , yeb bay mach chiapni ebnaj elk'om yin̈ .
40006021	Yuxin ha' bay ay hek'alomal ha' tu' cheyapaxico heyanma , ẍi Comam .
40006022	Isbak' cosat cantil yehico yin̈ conimanil , yuxin ta han̈c'an̈e isc'ulal choche yila' hesat tu' , sunil henimanil ayco yin̈ sajilk'inal .
40006023	Yaja' ta yin̈n̈e istx'ojal ayco hemujlubal ; sunil henimanil ayco yin̈ k'ejholo . Ta hune' issajilk'inal ayco teyin̈ tu' chimeltzoco yin̈ k'ejholohal , chexcancano xol k'ejholo , ẍi Comam .
40006024	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us haca' ti' : -- Machi hunu mac chu yoc chejabo tet cawan̈ patr'on , yuto ta chisyije naj tzet chal naj babel , chisman̈c'o naj tzet chal naj iscab . Yeb xin tato xahan chil naj naj babel , chisyah naj naj iscab . Hac tu' heye hex ti' , mach chu heyijen tzet chal Comam Dios tato ec'bal cheyaco heyanma yin̈ k'alomal , ẍi Comam .
40006025	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Yuxin chiwalan teyet , mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chelo , yeb yin̈ tzet chu yoc xil hek'ap yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Ta chak' Comam Dios cocawil , ¿ ha' tom xin tzet chicolo mach chak' Comam , heyalni ? Ta ha' Comam ak'n̈e conimanil , ¿ ha' tom xil cok'ap mach chak' Comam ?
40006026	Ilwec'anab no' ch'ic chiec' satcan̈ , machi yawal no' chacoj , mach chihatx'wi no' , machipaxo isc'un̈a no' , yaja' xin chiak'lax tzet chislo no' yu Comam ay yul satcan̈ . ¡ Hajxamex to caw ec'bal heyelapno sata no' !
40006027	¿ Aymi hunujex ti' yu caw cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yuxin chu heyanico hanic'oxa yak'bil hak'inal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ?
40006028	¿ Tzet yin̈ xin caw cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chu yoc xil hek'ap ? Ilwec'anab te' caj chich'ib xol k'ebtaj , mach chimunla te' , mach chichemlipaxo te' ,
40006029	yaja' chiwalan teyet , naj rey Salom'on yet payat mach apni isk'aptzen isba naj haca' isc'ulch'anil te' .
40006030	Walca caw c'ulch'an jilni isxumaquil te' tinan̈ , yaja' yet hecal cabe chin̈uslaxto te' yul horno . Ta chak' Comam isc'ulch'anil te' caj tu' , ¿ ha' tom xin xil hek'ap mach chak' Comam ? Hex ti' caw mach cheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios .
40006031	Yuxin mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul cheyalni haca' ti' : ¿ Baytaxca chitit tzet chicolo yeb xil cok'ap ?
40006032	Yuto ha' anma mach ohtan̈e Comam Dios chianico huntek'an tu' yin̈ isc'ul . Yaja' wal Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ , yohtaxa Comam tato chiocnico huntek'an tu' heyu .
40006033	Wal xin aweco yin̈ hec'ul hesaynilo Comam Dios babel cat heyijen tzet chala , walpaxo tzet chiocnico heyu yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xatic'a yak'a' Comam Dios teyet .
40006034	Mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chu yec' heyu yet hecal , yuto yet hecal tu' nanto tzet cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet cheyu , yuto masan ay isya'tajil yetbi hunun tz'ayic , ẍi Comam .
40007001	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Mach comono chexoc heyila' tzet ye hunu heyet anmahil , ha' xin wal mach chiocpaxo Comam Dios yila' tzet heyehi .
40007002	Yuto haca'tic'a chu heyilni tzet ye heyet anmahil , hac tu' chu quexyilnipaxo Comam . Wal xin haca'tic'a hemal cheyacoj yet cheyilni tzet yeco hunu heyet anmahil , ha'tic'a xin chexmalenpaxo yu Comam .
40007003	K'inalo tato ay hunu hawuẍtaj ayicto isk'al te' ch'im yul isbak'sat , wal hachpaxo xin patzab te' aypaxicto yul isbak' hasat . Ta mach chawilti te' patzab ayicto yul isbak' hasat tu' , ¿ hatoc'anab nich'an isk'alemal te' ch'im ayicto yul isbak'sat hawuẍta tu' chu hawiniltij ? ¡ Machoj !
40007004	¿ Mataxca xin chu hawalni tet heyuẍta tu' haca' ti' : " Wuẍtaj , wik'altijan hune' isk'al te' ch'im ayicto yul isbak' hasat , " ta cachi ? Wal hachpaxo xin k'atanicto hune' te' patzab yul isbak' hasat .
40007005	Tato hac tu' hawalni , ¡ lek'ti'ach ! Wal xin icanilti te' patzab ayicto yul isbak' hasat babel , lahwi tu' cat hawinilti isk'al te' ch'im ayicto yul isbak'sat hawuẍtaj .
40007006	Istzoti' Comam Dios lahan yeb huntek'an ch'en ch'en perla isbi , caw ay istohol . Yuxin mach chu jak'ni Istzoti' Comam tet hunu mac machi yelapno Comam yul sat , yuto lahan yeb metx tx'i' caw how , chitit lemna jin̈ . Aypaxo mac haca' no' txitam , ton̈e chioc isxan̈a'to tzet ch'ak'lax tet , ẍi Comam .
40007007	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- K'anwe tet Comam Dios cat yak'ni Comam teyet , saywej cat yilcha heyu , elojabico heyaw sat pulta cat ishajlax teyet .
40007008	Yuto ha' mac chik'anni chischah , ha' mac chisayni chiilcha yu . Ha' mac chielico yaw sat pulta chihajlax tet .
40007009	K'inalo tato chisk'an heyuninal tzet chislo teyet , ¿ tom cheyak' hunu ch'en ch'en tet ?
40007010	Maca tato chisk'an hunu no' cay isc'uxu' , ¿ tom cheyak' hunu no' laba tet ?
40007011	Yaja' waxan̈ca caw tx'ojex heyohta heyak'ni isc'ulal tet heyuninal , hajxam xin Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ , ¿ tom mach ch'ak' isc'ulal teyet , ta chek'ana ?
40007012	Ta cheyoche c'ul chute isc'ul anma teyin̈ , hex babel c'ul cheyute hec'ul yin̈ anma tu' , yuto hac tu' yalni yin̈ ley yeb yin̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , ẍi Comam .
40007013	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Wal ispultahil satcan̈ bay ay Comam Dios , lahan haca' hunu pulta nich'anch'an sat , ha' tu' xin chexoctoj . Yuto hune' pulta yeb hune' beh caw nimajal sat , yul cambal chitohi . Caw xin niman anma chito yul hune' pulta yeb hune' beh tu' .
40007014	Wal hune' pulta yeb hune' beh nich'anch'an sat xin chon̈yito bay ay k'inale mach istan̈bal , yaja' haywan̈n̈e mac chiocto yul hune' pulta tu' , ẍi Comam .
40007015	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Caw cheyil heba tet ebnaj lek'ti'wom chisbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios , yuto hayet chitzotel ebnaj teyet , caw c'ulch'an chute isc'ul ebnaj haca' no' me' , yaja' wal yanma ebnaj xin lahan haca' no' oj chon̈c'uxnitoj .
40007016	Ixtan̈ hetxumilo tzet nabil yu ebnaj yuto ha' tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj chihalniloj . K'inalo te' uva tinan̈ , ¿ tom chak' te' sat te' tx'ix ? Maca te' higo , ¿ tom satpaxo te' tx'ix chak' te' ? ¡ Machoj !
40007017	Wal xin te' satnom te' c'ul , c'ul sat te' chak'a . Yaja' wal te' mach c'uluj xin machiswalil sat te' chak'a .
40007018	Te' satnom te' c'ul , ¿ tom machiswalil sat te' chak'a ? ¡ Machoj ! Yeb te te' machiswalil , ¿ tom c'ul sat te' chak'a ? ¡ Machoj !
40007019	Yuxin ebnaj chal isba ischejabo Comam Dios , yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj ha' yin̈ chetxumiloj tzet nabil yu ebnaj . Haca' chu istzoc'laxcan̈ te te' mach c'ulo sat chak'a , chilahwi tu' xin cat isn̈uslaxto te' xol k'a k'a' , hac tu' chiutelax huntek'an ebnaj tu' , ẍi Comam .
40007020	
40007021	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Mach sunilo mac chihalni : " Mamin , Mamin , " win̈an , chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , wal xin han̈e mac chiyijen tzet chal Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ .
40007022	Hayet chiapni islahobal tz'ayic hantan̈e mac chihalni haca' ti' : " Mamin , Mamin , han̈on̈ti'an̈ con̈ec'an̈ jala'an̈ hatzoti' tet anma . Jinipaxilojan̈ ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma yin̈ habi , yeb xin tx'i'al c'aybalc'ule coyehan̈ tet anma , " ẍi anma yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' .
40007023	Yaja' chintak'wihan tet haca' ti' : " Mach quexwohtajojan , hitzan̈welo yin̈ insatan . Hex ti' istx'ojaln̈etic'a hewatx'e , " quinchin̈etic'ahan , ẍi Comam .
40007024	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Mac chiaben Intzoti'an cat isyijeni , lahan yeb hune' naj caw ay yitz'atil iswi' , yuto hayet yanican̈ naj yatut , yiban̈ ch'en ch'en yayto naj isxe'al te' .
40007025	Lahwi tu' xin istit hune' niman jak'ek' n̈ab , isnohcan̈ ha ha' , ismak'nico isba ha' yin̈ te' n̈a tu' , yaja' xin mach ayc'ay te' , yuto caw c'ul yehayto xe' te' yiban̈ ch'en ch'en .
40007026	Yaja' wal mac chiaben Intzoti'an , machi xin chisyije tzet chala , lahan yeb hune' naj mach isnabal , yiban̈ arena yayo xe' yatut .
40007027	Lahwi tu' , yak'ni hune' niman jak'ek' n̈ab , isch'ibcan̈ ha ha' , ismak'nico isba ha' yin̈ te' yayc'ay te' , yuchc'acanto te' , ẍi Comam .
40007028	Hayet lahwi istzotel Comam Jes'us tu' xin , caw sunil anma c'aycanocan̈ isc'ul yaben iscuywa Comam ,
40007029	yu caw ay yip Comam iscuywahi , mach haca'o chu iscuywa ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es .
40008001	Yet ispaxayti Comam Jes'us iswi' hune' won̈an tu' , caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam .
40008002	Yelilo hune' naj yul beh , ayco hune' yabil chiyij lepra yin̈ . Ishitzico naj isc'atan̈ Comam , yay jahno naj sata Comam , yalni naj : -- Mamin , ta chawoche chu hawinilo hune' yabil ti' win̈an , ẍi naj tet Comam .
40008003	Yanayo Comam isk'ab yiban̈ naj , yalni Comam : -- Ho' , chiwochehan ta chiel hune' yabil ti' tawin̈ , ẍi Comam . Yin̈n̈ena xin yel hune' yabil tu' yin̈ naj .
40008004	Lahwi tu' , yalni Comam tet naj : -- Machi mac tet chawalic'o hune' ti' , wal xin as ye haba tet naj sacerdote , cat hawak'ni haxahanbal haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es , yun̈e yohtan̈encanilo anma tato xaelcano hune' yabil ti' tawin̈ , ẍi Comam tet naj .
40008005	Hayet yoc apno Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Capernaum , yapni hune' naj capit'an romano isc'atan̈ Comam , isk'anni naj ta chak' cawxo Comam hune' ischejab naj .
40008006	Yalni naj tet Comam : -- Mamin , ay hune' inchejaban caw ya'ay , mach chibili isnimanil , caw xin ch'ec'ya' yanma naj yu hune' yabil tu' , ẍi naj tet Comam .
40008007	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- C'ultic'a , chintohan wak'a' cawxojan naj , ẍi Comam .
40008008	Istak'wi naj capit'an tu' tet Comam : -- Mamin , caw mach chu hawapni yul watutan chiwabehan yuto caw matzet welapnojan . Wal xin ton̈e chachtzotelnato yin̈ hacn̈e ti' cat iscawxican̈ inchejabtu'an .
40008009	Wohtajan hune' ti' , yuto haninti'an ayinictojan yalan̈ ischejbanil ebnaj wahawan , aypaxo xin ebnaj soldado ayico yalan̈ wipan . Ta chiwalan tet hunu naj : " Asi' bey tu' , " ta quinchiyan , cat isto naj . Taca chiwalan tet hunuxa naj : " Cata , " ta quinchiyan , cat istit naj . Yebpaxo xin ta chiwalan tet hunuxa naj inchejaban : " Watx'e hune' tilah , " ta quinchiyan , cat yoc naj iswatx'enoj , ẍi naj .
40008010	Hayet yaben Comam yalni naj haca' tu' , caw c'ayilo isc'ul Comam , yalni Comam tet anma tzujanico yinta tu' : -- Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , maẍto hunu mac chiwilan yanico yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yul con̈ob Israel haca' hune' naj ti' .
40008011	Wal xin chiwalan teyet , chitit anma bay chiahilo tz'ayic , yeb bay chito tz'ayic cat iscutxbanico isba yeb naj Abraham , naj Isaac yeb naj Jacob sat ismeẍa Comam Dios bey satcan̈ .
40008012	Ha' anma Israel yettic'a ay yoc sat hune' meẍa tu' , yaj ay ebnaj chicancano yintajilo xol k'ejholo . Ha' bey tu' xin ch'oc ok'oj cat isn̈etx'la yeh yu isya'tajil , ẍi Comam tet anma .
40008013	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni Comam tet naj capit'an : -- Paxan̈to hawatut , yubojab haca' chawoche yuto maxawayto yul hawanma win̈an , ẍi Comam tet naj . Yin̈tic'a hune' orahil tu' xin cawxican̈ ischejab naj capit'an .
40008014	Lahwi tu' xin , isto Comam Jes'us yatut naj Pedro . Yet yapni Comam yilni tato hilanto ismi' yixal naj Pedro tu' sat tx'at yu hune' niman k'a' .
40008015	Yoc tzabno Comam yin̈ isk'ab ixnam , yelna hune' k'a' tu' yin̈ ixnam , iscawxican̈ ixnam . Lahwi tu' yahwano ixnam , yoc ixnam iswatx'eno tzet chislo Comam .
40008016	Hayet lan̈anxa yay numnahi caw hantan̈e anma ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ ilaxto isc'atan̈ Comam . Caw xin hune'n̈ech'an tzoti' chal Comam cat yel ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma . Yak'nipaxo cawxo Comam anma ya'ay .
40008017	Yin̈ huntek'an iswatx'e Comam tu' yijcano isba tzet halbilcano yu naj Isa'ias , hune' ischejab Comam yet payat , yet yalni naj haca' ti' : " Yiban̈ naj chitocano yabil ayco jin̈ , cat xin yabenpaxo isya'il coseleloj , " ẍi naj Isa'ias tu' .
40008018	Hayet yilni Comam Jes'us tato caw hantan̈e anma hoyanico yin̈ , yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tato chiec'to ebnaj yeb Comam isk'axepic'to ha' lago .
40008019	Yaja' yet yalan̈to maẍto chito Comam yeb ebnaj , ishitzico hune' naj chicuywa yin̈ isley naj Mois'es isc'atan̈ Comam , yalni naj : -- Mam cuywawom , chinoc tzujnojan tawintaj bajxan̈etu'wal chachtohi , ẍi naj .
40008020	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- No' wech ay isn̈ach'en no' bay chiwayi , yebpaxo no' ch'ic ay yatut no' . Yaja' Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , machi watutan bay chinxewninojan , ẍi Comam .
40008021	Yalnipaxo hune'xa naj iscuywom Comam : -- Mamin , chinoc tzujnojan tawintaj , yaj estam chawak' inhamanilan chito inmujcano inmaman babel , ẍi naj .
40008022	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Wal xin ocan̈ tzujno wintajan yuto ha' mac camom yul sat Comam Dios , ha' chimujni yet camomal , ẍi Comam tet naj .
40008023	Lahwi tu' xin , yocto Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul hune' te' barco .
40008024	Hayet lan̈an yec'to Comam yeb ebnaj yiban̈ ha ha' tu' xin , yichico yec' hune' niman jak'ek' caw how . Toxan̈e chitiẍla yah ha ha' tu' yin̈ te' barco , wal Comam Jes'us xin wayo chu yul te' .
40008025	Hayet yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam hune' tu' , yoc ebnaj yinolo iswayan̈ Comam , yalni ebnaj : -- ¡ Mamin colon̈an̈ , yuto lan̈an coto yich ha' ! ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
40008026	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin caw chexxiwi ? ¡ Caw mach cheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios ! ẍi Comam tet ebnaj . Lahwi tu' xin yahwano Comam , iscachni Comam jak'ek' yeb ha ha' . Hac tu' yu islin̈ban isbili ha ha' tu' yeb jak'ek' , ispaxtz'in̈nahi .
40008027	Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' , caw c'aycanilo isc'ul ebnaj , yalni ebnaj tet hunun : -- ¿ Mac anmahil hune' ya' ti' yuxin chisyije jak'ek' yeb ha ha' tzet chal ya' ? ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
40008028	Hayet yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom isk'axepic'to ha' lago bey hune' tx'otx' chiyij Gadara , yapni cawan̈ ebnaj ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ isc'atan̈ Comam ; ispeto ebnaj yul camposanto . Ebnaj cawan̈ tu' caw chixiw anma tet ebnaj yuto caw aycano yip ebnaj . Caw xin machi hunu mac chiec' bay ay ebnaj tu' .
40008029	Yah yaw ebnaj tet Comam yin̈ caw ip : -- ¿ Tzet hawoc jin̈an̈ hach Jes'us Isc'ahol Dios ? ¿ Tom chachhul hawak'a' ec'oya' janmahan̈ yalan̈to maẍto chiapni istiempohal ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
40008030	Iscawilal tu' , ay huntek'an no' txitam lan̈an istan̈elaxi ,
40008031	yuxin isk'an ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil tu' tet Comam haca' ti' : -- Tato chon̈hawilojan̈ yin̈ ebnaj ti' , chicok'anan̈ tawet , chejon̈tojan̈ yin̈ no' txitam tu' lah , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
40008032	Istak'wi Comam : -- C'ultic'a , asi'wej , ẍi Comam . Hac tu' xin yu yel ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu' , istocano ebnaj yin̈ no' txitam . Lahwi tu' xin yelcan̈ no' txitam tu' , isk'ojnito isba no' sat pahaw , yay apno no' xol ha ha' , ishik'nito no' ha' .
40008033	Wal ebnaj tan̈em txitam xin elcan̈ ebnaj . Hayet yapni ebnaj yul con̈ob yalni ebnaj tet anma yin̈ tzet yu ebnaj cawan̈ bay aytic'aco ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil .
40008034	Yuxin sunil anma yul con̈ob tu' to ilno Comam . Hayet yapni anma isc'atan̈ Comam tu' xin , yoc anma isk'anno tet Comam tato chiel Comam yul ismajul istx'otx' ebnaj tu' .
40009001	Lahwi tu' xin yocto Comam Jes'us yul te' barco , ismeltzoti Comam isk'axepxac'ti ha' lago tu' , yapni Comam yul iscon̈ob .
40009002	Yilaxto hune' naj mach chibili isnimanil isc'atan̈ Comam sat batxte' . Hayet yilni Comam xin tato caw ayco yanma ebnaj initi naj tu' yin̈ Comam , yalni Comam tet naj ya'ay tu' : -- Hach wet anmahil aco yip hawanma , tinan̈ chiak'laxcano nimanc'ulal yin̈ hamul , ẍi Comam tet naj .
40009003	Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es , istxum haca' ti' : " Hune' naj ti' caw tx'oj istzotel naj yin̈ Comam Dios , yuto chaco isba naj Diosal , " ẍi ebnaj yul yet ischuquil .
40009004	Wal Comam xin , yohta tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal ebnaj , yuxin yal Comam : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin caw tx'oj chiec' yin̈ henabal ?
40009005	¿ Baytet subuta walnihan heyalni , tom " ch'ak'lax nimanc'ulal yin̈ hamul , " mato " ahan̈wanoj cat hapaxtoj ? " .
40009006	Tinan̈ xin chinyehan heyila' tato Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ay wipan wak'nihan nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ẍi Comam . Yalni Comam tet naj ya'ay tu' : -- Ahan̈wanoj , ican̈ habatxte' ti' cat hapaxto hawatut , ẍi Comam tet naj .
40009007	Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin yahwano naj , ispaxto naj yatut .
40009008	Hayet yilni anma hune' tu' caw xiwcanocan̈ , yoc anma yak'no tzalaho isc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios , yuto caw tx'i'al yip Comam isye tet anma .
40009009	Lahwi tu' isto Comam Jes'us . Hayet yec'to Comam xin , yilni Comam hune' naj ik'omilo tohlabal , Mateo isbi . Tz'on̈anayo naj bay chiel ch'en tohlabal chialaxto bey Roma . Yalni Comam Jes'us tet naj : -- Ocan̈ tzujno wintajan incuywomojan , ẍi Comam . Hayet yaben naj hune' tu' , yahwano naj , yoc tzujno naj yinta Comam .
40009010	Lahwi tu' yawtelax Comam wa'o yu naj yul yatut , yoc Comam sat meẍa yeb ebnaj iscuywom , yebpaxo xin huntek'anxa ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal , yeb huntek'an anma tx'oj isbeybal .
40009011	Hayet yilni ebnaj fariseo hune' tu' , yalni ebnaj tet ebnaj iscuywom Comam : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin chiwa' naj hecuywawom ti' xol ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal , yeb xol ebnaj tx'oj isbeybal ? ẍi ebnaj .
40009012	Hayet yaben Comam hune' tu' xin , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Ha' anma mach ya'o ay , matzet chiocnico naj an̈lom yu , to ha' anma ya'ay ha' chiocnico naj an̈lom yu .
40009013	Yuxin chiwalan teyet , saywe yul Yum Comam Dios cat hetxumni yin̈ bay chal haca' ti' : " Ha' hune' chiwochehan ta chitz'ay hec'ul yin̈ heyet anmahil , maẍn̈etaj heyak'ni hexahanbal wetan , " ẍiayoj . Mach hulnajojinan wawte'an anma chalni ta c'ul yecoj , ¡ machoj ! Walxinto yu anma chistxumu ta mulum , yuxin hulnajinan , yun̈e isbejnicano yanico ismul , ẍi Comam .
40009014	Yet hunel apni ebnaj ischejab naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us , isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam : -- Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yeb ebnaj fariseo caw chicoyijehan̈ hune' yet mach chon̈wa' cotxahli . Walpaxo ebnaj hacuywom xin , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin mach chisyije ebnaj hune' tu' ? ẍi ebnaj .
40009015	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- K'inalo tato ay hunu mohyilal tinan̈ , aypaxo xin anma awtebil yin̈ mohyilal tu' . ¿ Tom xin chioc anma tu' yijle wahil yet ayc'o naj mohyom tu' ? ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin hato yet chiapni istiempohal yilaxilo naj mohyom tu' xol anma , catto yoc anma yin̈ yijlen wahil , ẍi Comam .
40009016	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Mach chu yalaxico hunu k'ap k'ap ac'to isbujilo huno xilk'ape xilxa , yuto hayet chitx'ahlax k'ap , chimoq'ui k'ap ac' ayco isbujilo k'ap xilxa tu' , cat xin istzilmocanto hune' xilk'ape tu' .
40009017	Hacpax tu' xin , mach chu yalaxayto ac' vino yul no' tz'um xilxa yuto chilin̈mo no' cat ismalto vino tu' , cat yetaxpaxcanto no' tz'um tu' . Wal xin yul no' tz'um ac'to chialaxayto ac' vino , hac tu' xin mach chietaxto te' vino yeb no' tz'um , ẍi Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom naj Juan .
40009018	Hayet lan̈an yalni Comam Jes'us huntek'an cuybanile tu' , yapni hune' naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj Israel isc'atan̈ Comam , yalni naj tet Comam : -- Mamin , ay hune' nich'an incutz'inan lan̈anto iscamayoj , yaj ta chachto wintajan cat hawanayo hak'ab yiban̈ ix , chihulcan̈ isc'ul ix , ẍi naj tet Comam .
40009019	Lahwi tu' yah lin̈no Comam , isto yinta naj yeb ebnaj iscuywom .
40009020	Xol anma tzujan yinta Comam tu' xin , ay hune' ix ya'ay , cablahon̈ebxa habil mach chilin̈i yay istx'ahwobal ix . Yuxin hitzico ix isc'atan̈ Comam , ispitni ix isti' xil isk'ap Comam ,
40009021	yuto istxum ix haca' ti' : " Walca han̈e isti' xil isk'ap Comam chinpitan cat incawxocan̈an , " ẍi ix .
40009022	Wal Comam xin , ismeltzo isba Comam , yoc t'an̈no Comam yin̈ ix , yalni Comam haca' ti' : -- Aco yip hawanma miyay . Macachcawxican̈ tinan̈ yuto maxawaco hawanma win̈an , ẍi Comam tet ix . Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin iscawxican̈ ix .
40009023	Hayet yapni Comam Jes'us bey yatut naj yahawil ebnaj Israel tu' xin , yilni Comam tato ayxac'o ebnaj chianico te' su' yin̈ ismujubal ix nich'an iscutz'in naj Jairo tu' , yebpaxo xin wejanxan̈e anma yok'i .
40009024	Hayet yilni Comam hune' tu' , yalni Comam tet anma : -- Elan̈wetoj , ix nich'an ti' mach camnajo ix , ton̈e chiway ix , ẍi Comam . Wal anma tu' xin oc tzebo yin̈ tzet yal Comam .
40009025	Lahwi ischejni Comam eloti sunil anma yul n̈a , yocto Comam isc'atan̈ ix nich'an tu' . Yoc tzabno Comam yin̈ isk'ab ix , yahwano ix .
40009026	Sunil anma ay yul ismajul hune' con̈ob tu' , abenilo tzet yuhi .
40009027	Yet yel Comam bey tu' , ay cawan̈ ebnaj mach chu yilni oc tzujno yinta Comam . Chi-xin-awito ebnaj tet Comam haca' ti' : -- Mamin , isc'ahol jichmam David , tz'ayojab hac'ul jin̈an̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
40009028	Hayet yapni Comam yul n̈a , yocpaxto ebnaj yul n̈a yinta Comam , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Chimheyayto yul heyanma tato chu wak'ni hajlojan hesat ? ẍi Comam . Istak'wi ebnaj tet Comam : -- Ho' Mamin , chijaytojan̈ yul janmahan̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
40009029	Yanico Comam isk'ab yin̈ isbak'sat ebnaj , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yubojab haca' cheyoche yuto maxeyaco heyanma win̈an , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
40009030	Hac tu' xin yu ishajlo isbak'sat ebnaj , yalnicano Comam tet ebnaj : -- Tinan̈ xin , machi mac tet cheyalic'o hune' ti' , ẍi Comam .
40009031	Yaja' haniq'uixto chito ebnaj , yichico ebnaj yalni tet anma yin̈ tzet yu ishajlo isbak'sat ebnaj .
40009032	Hayet caw lan̈an ispaxto ebnaj hajlo isbak'sat yu Comam Jes'us tu' , yapni huntek'an ebnaj yak'nocano hune' naj isc'atan̈ Comam . Hune' naj tu' mach chu istzotel naj yuto ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj .
40009033	Hayet ischejnilo Comam ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj , yichico naj istzoteli . Wal anma ilni hune' tu' xin caw c'aycanocan̈ isc'ul . Yalni anma haca' ti' : -- Maẍto hunelo chijil yuni yul con̈ob Israel haca' hune' ti' , ẍi anma .
40009034	Wal ebnaj fariseo xin yal ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Hune' naj ti' ch'ilo naj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma yu yip naj matzwalil , ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
40009035	Caw sunil yulajla con̈ob yeb yulajla aldea bay ec' Comam Jes'us , iscuyni Comam anma yulaj iscapilla ebnaj Israel yul hunu con̈ob tu' . Yalnic'o Comam yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios , yak'ni cawxo Comam anma tzijxan̈e yabilal ayco yin̈ .
40009036	Hayet yilnico Comam yin̈ anma xin caw tz'aycan̈ isc'ul yin̈ anma tu' , yuto bejbilcanoj , mach chitxumcha yu tzet wal yuten isba . Haca' no' me' machi mac chitan̈eni , hac tu' ye anma .
40009037	Yuxin yal Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Huntek'an anma ti' lahan haca' ixim trigo lan̈an isk'anbiloj . Caw hantan̈e munil , yaja' haywan̈n̈e ebnaj munlawom .
40009038	Yuxin k'anwe tet Comam Dios yahaw munil , haxinwal chati Comam ismunlawom xol anma , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
40010001	Lahwi tu' , iscutxbanico Comam Jes'us ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom , yak'ni Comam yip ebnaj yinilo ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma , yebpaxo xin yu yak'ni cawxo ebnaj anma ya'ay , yeb yu yinilo ebnaj tzettaj ya' yu anma .
40010002	Hac ti' xin isbi ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ ischejab Comam haca' ti' : Naj Sim'on chiyijpaxo Pedro , naj Andr'es yuẍta naj Sim'on , naj Jacobo yeb naj Juan , ebnaj cawan̈ ti' isc'ahol icham Zebedeo ye ebnaj .
40010003	Naj Felipe , naj Bartolom'e , naj Tom'as , naj Mateo , naj chitic'a inilo ch'en tohlabal chito bey Roma , naj Jacobo isc'ahol icham Alfeo , naj Tadeo .
40010004	Yebpaxo xin naj Sim'on , aytic'aco yin̈ hune' partido chiyij cananista , yeb naj Judas Iscariote , naj anico Comam yul isk'ab camical .
40010005	Ha' ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ ti' ischejto Comam Jes'us , yalni Comam ischejbanil ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Mach chexec' yulaj iscon̈ob anma mach Israeloj , yebpaxo xin mach chexec' yulajla con̈ob ay yul ismajul Samaria .
40010006	Cachann̈e xol jet con̈ob Israel chextohi , yuto lahan anma haca' no' me' chic'ayic'oj .
40010007	Asi'we xin , cat heyalni tet anma tato Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ yocxa yahawo yin̈ anma .
40010008	Ak'we cawxo anma ya'ay , ta ay mac chicami cheyak' hulucan̈ isc'ul , ta ay mac ayco lepra yin̈ cheyak' cawxoj , cat heyinipaxilo ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma . Hune' heyip chiwak'ti'an matanil chechah , yuxin mach chek'an hetohol yet cheyak'ni cawxo anma .
40010009	Yin̈ hebel tu' xin matzet cheyitoj ; mach cheyito hemelyu , nitam hunu centavo ,
40010010	mach cheyipaxto hetz'ispa , yeb hehelbal , mach cheyipaxto ishelbal hexan̈ab , yebpaxo xin mach cheyik' hek'ojoch . Chiwalan huntek'an ti' teyet yuto naj munlawom chiak'lax tzet chislo naj yin̈ ismunil .
40010011	Hayet chexapni yul hunu con̈ob maca yul hunu aldea chesay mac c'ulch'an isc'ul , ha' tu' xin chexcani masanto yet chexmeltzohi .
40010012	Yet chexapni bey te' n̈a bay chexcancano tu' , cheyal tet anma tu' haca' ti' : " Ayojab ak'anc'ulal texol , " quexchi .
40010013	Ta choche mac ay yul hune' n̈a tu' ak'anc'ulal , chiak'lax ak'anc'ulal tu' tet , taca mach choche xin , mach chiak'lax tet .
40010014	Yaja' tato mach chexchahlaxi , yeb xin mach chiabelax tzet cheyala , chexel yatut anma tu' maca yul hune' con̈ob tu' , cat xin hetzicnilo pojoj yin̈ heyoj yun̈e heyeniloj tato matxa heyoc yin̈ anma tu' .
40010015	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , yet chilni Comam yin̈ tzet chielico anma tu' , caw ec'balto isya'tajil chischah sata anma ay bey con̈ob Sodoma yeb con̈ob Gomorra , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40010016	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom tu' : -- Chexinchejtojan xol anma haca' no' me' chito xol no' oj . Yuxin helan cheyute heba haca' no' laba , yaja' huncuentan̈e cheyute hec'ul haca' no' cuwis .
40010017	Caw cheyil heba , yuto chexilaxto sata ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ lahti' yul con̈ob . Chexmak'lax yulajla capilla .
40010018	Chexalaxico sata ebnaj gobernador , maca sat ebnaj nimeta yahaw , yuto ayexico yul ink'aban . Hac tu' chu quinheyak'nihan yohtan̈elo ebnaj , yeb tet anma mach Israeloj .
40010019	Hayet chexalaxico sata ebnaj yahaw tu' , mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chu hetzoteli , yuto ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni hehelanil hetzoteli .
40010020	Wal xin maẍtajex chextzoteli , to ha' Yesp'iritu Comam chitzotel teyin̈ .
40010021	Yet chihul hune' tiempohal tu' ay ebnaj chianico yuẍta yul isk'ab camical , aypaxo ebnaj mame chianico isc'ahol yul isk'ab camical , aypaxo xin ebnaj c'ahole chianico howal yin̈ ismam cat ispotx'ni camo ebnaj ismam .
40010022	Sunil anma chichiwa isc'ul teyin̈ yuto ayexxaco yul ink'aban , yaja' wal mac chitecha yu masanto yet islahobal , chicolchahi .
40010023	Hayet chextzumbelaxilo yul hunu con̈ob , chexel bey tu' cat heto yul hunuxa con̈ob , yuto yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet ; maẍtotic'a chilahwi heyec' yul sunil con̈ob Israel ti' cat wul lemnahan , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .
40010024	Machi hunu naj lan̈an iscuylaxi chipalc'onnacan̈ yiban̈ naj chicuyni tu' , yeb xin machi hunu naj chejab chipalc'onnacan̈ yiban̈ ispatr'on .
40010025	Yaja' tato ay hunu naj chicuywi tu' chiapni yitz'atil iswi' haca' naj cuywawom tu' , caw c'ul hune' tu' , yeb xin tato ay hunu naj chejab chiapni islahann̈e isba yeb ispatr'on , c'ulpaxo hune' tu' . Ta chinhallaxan Beelzeb'u , naj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil , hajexxampaxoj , ¿ tzet mach hallaxo teyin̈ ? ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40010026	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Mach chexxiw tet anma , yuto machi hunu tzet ye tu' ewan mach chiel yen̈el , yeb xin machi hunu tzet chihallax yin̈ ewantajil mach chiabchaloj .
40010027	Sunil tzet chiwalan teyet yin̈ ewantajil tinan̈ , pujbawec'o tet anma . Yeb huntek'an ton̈e chinsahan yul hetxiquin , halwec'o yin̈ caw ip yulaj calle .
40010028	Mach chexxiw tet ebnaj chipotx'ni henimanil , yuto wal heyanma mach chik'oji ebnaj ispotx'ni . Wal xin han̈e tet Comam Dios bay wal hexiwi , yuto chu yanito Comam henimanil yeb heyanma xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal .
40010029	Chisje hetxumni yin̈ no' niẍte ch'ic tinan̈ , cac'on̈ no' chitxon̈lax yin̈ centavo . Yaja' machi hunu no' chicami tato maẍtaj Comam ay yul satcan̈ chihalni .
40010030	Hajxam hex ti' to caw ec'bal heyelapno sata no' niẍte ch'ic tu' , caw bisbil xil hewi' yin̈ hununtajil yu Comam . Yuxin chiwalan teyet , mach chexxiwi , ẍi Comam .
40010031	
40010032	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Ha' mac mach chitx'ixwi yalni yin̈ sat anma tato wetxahan yehi , haquintu'an mach chintx'ixwihan walnihan tet Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ tato wetan yehi .
40010033	Yaja' wal mac chihalni yin̈ sat anma tato mach wetojan yehi , chiwalpaxojan yin̈ sat Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ tato mach wetojan yehi , ẍi Comam .
40010034	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Tajca chetxumu tato hulnajinan yu wanicojan ak'anc'ulal xol anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , machoj , walxinto yu yak'lencan̈ howal win̈an .
40010035	Quinhulan yu yak'nican̈ howal naj c'ahole yeb ismam , ix unine chioc ix howal yin̈ ismi' , ix alibe chioc ix howal yin̈ ixnam alibe ,
40010036	yuxin xoltic'a mac ayto yu isba chiah howal .
40010037	Mac ec'bal chaco yanma yin̈ ismam maca ismi' insatajan , mach istzano yoc wetojan , yeb xin ha' mac ec'bal ayco yanma yin̈ isc'ahol maca iscutz'in insatajan , mach istzano yoc yul ink'aban .
40010038	Ha' mac hinan yak'len isya'tajil win̈an , waxan̈ca chiak'lax camo yin̈ culus , ha' chu yoc wetojan .
40010039	Ha' mac ec'bal chisya'iln̈e isba insatajan , chic'aytoj , mach chik' isk'inal mach istan̈bal . Wal mac hinan iscam win̈an xin chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal , ẍi Comam .
40010040	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Ha' mac chexchahni , haninan chinischahan , ha' mac chinchahnihan chischah Mac an̈eintijan .
40010041	Ha' mac chichahni hunu ischejab Comam Dios , lahan ismatan chischah haca' ischejab Comam tu' . Mac chichahni hunu mac isc'ulaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e , lahan ispaj chischah yeb mac isc'ulaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e tu' .
40010042	Haxa mac chiak'ni hunu vaso chewala' tet hunu incuywoman , waxan̈ca caw comon jilni , yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , hune' mac tu' chischah ispaj selel tet Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .
40011001	Lahwi yalnicano Comam Jes'us ischejbanil ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom , isto Comam cuywal ; yec' Comam yalnoc'o Istzoti' Comam Dios yul hunun con̈ob ayco yin̈ ishoyanil bay ay Comam .
40011002	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' ayicto naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma yul preso . Yabe naj isk'umal yin̈ tzettaj chiswatx'e Comam Cristo . Ischejnito naj cawan̈ ebnaj iscuywom
40011003	isk'ambeno tet Comam : -- ¿ Ham hach ti' Cristo echmabil yul juhan̈ , mato chijechmahan̈ yul hunuxa naj ? ẍi ebnaj .
40011004	Istak'wi Comam : -- As halwe tet naj Juan tu' yin̈ sunil tzet maxeyabe yeb yin̈ tzet maxeyila .
40011005	Halwe tet naj tato ha' mac maẍtic'a chu yilni hajlocanocan̈ sat , haxa mac maẍtic'a chu yeq'ui , belwican̈ . Ha' mac ayco lepra yin̈ xin an̈chacanoj , ha' mac maẍtic'a chabe , hajlo istxiquin . Aypaxo camom hulcan̈ isc'ul , cat xin yallaxpaxo Tzoti' yet colbanile tet anma machi bay chicawxi isc'ul .
40011006	¡ Sak'al yet mac mach chicabcon yanma win̈an ! quexchi , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
40011007	Hayet lahwi ispaxto ebnaj xin , yichico Comam yalni tet anma yin̈ tzet yelapno ye naj Juan , yalni Comam haca' ti' : -- Nawetij tzet quexbey heyila' bey tx'otx' desierto , ¿ tom ha' hune' te' ah ch'ec' k'elah yu jak'ek' ?
40011008	¿ Mato hunu naj caw nanxa yoc xil isk'ap ayco quexbey heyila' ? ¡ Machoj ! Yuto ebnaj caw nanxa islow yehico xil isk'ap yuln̈e yatut ebnaj rey ay ebnaj .
40011009	¿ Mac quexbey heyila' ? Wal xin hune' ischejab Comam Dios quexbey heyila' . Yin̈ caw yeli hune' ischejab Comam Dios quexbey heyila' tu' caw ec'balto yelapno ye ismunil naj sata ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payat .
40011010	Yin̈ naj Juan tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti' : Haninan chinchejtojan inchejaban babel tasataj , yun̈e iswatx'en habeh yalan̈to maẍto chachapni , ẍiayoj .
40011011	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , xol sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' machi hunu mac ec'bal yelapno yiban̈ naj Juan tu' . Yaja' wal mac chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios xin waxan̈ca caw comonn̈e yeq'ui , ec'bal sak'al yet sata naj Juan .
40011012	Yet taxtic'a yichiti naj Juan tu' yanican̈ ha' iswi' anma masanta tinan̈ , yin̈ isya'tajil choc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios , yaja' han̈c'an̈e mac chihti yanma yin̈ , ha' chitzujcha apno yu yoc yul isk'ab Comam .
40011013	Sunil tzet yal ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat yeb sunil tzet yal isley naj Mois'es yalan̈to maẍto chiichico ismunil naj Juan , ton̈e bina yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
40011014	Ta cheyoche cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an , txumchaojabilo heyu tato ha' naj Juan tu' , ha' naj haca' naj El'ias echmabil yul heyu .
40011015	Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumniloj .
40011016	Anma ay yul hune' tiempohal ti' , c'ul inlahbanan yeb niẍte unin chiay tz'on̈no yul txon̈bal cat issajchi , cat yahwi tet niẍte yet uninal , chalni :
40011017	" Naban̈e jeta cobahan̈ jok'tzenan̈ te' su' , yuto mach quexcan̈alwi . Naban̈e jacojan̈ bit caw bisc'ulal yoqui , yuto mach quexok'paxoj , " ẍi niẍte unin tu' .
40011018	Chiwalan hune' ti' , yuto yet yul naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma mach wa' naj yeb anma , yuxin hallaxi tato ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj .
40011019	Haxa Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , chinwa'an yeb anma yuxin chihallax win̈an haca' ti' : " Wal naj Jes'us ti' wa'on̈etic'a chu naj yeb uc'u vinon̈etic'a chu naj , yamigo isba naj yeb ebnaj tx'oj chiswatx'e yeb ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal ch'en chito bey Roma , " ẍi anma win̈an . Yaja' wal anma ayco ishelanil Comam Dios yin̈ haban isyenilo isba yin̈ tzettaj isc'ulal chi-la-iswatx'e , ẍi Comam .
40011020	Yet hunel xin oc Comam Jes'us yala' istx'ojal huntek'an con̈ob bay caw tx'i'al c'aybalc'ule xaisye Comam , yuto anma ay yul huntek'an con̈ob tu' maẍtic'a chisna isba isbejnicano iswatx'en istx'ojal , yuxin yal Comam haca' ti' :
40011021	-- Hex ay yul con̈ob Coraz'in c'anch'anex , yeb hex ay yul con̈ob Betsaida , c'anch'anexpaxoj , yuto ta yul con̈ob Tiro yeb con̈ob Sid'on yelax huntek'an c'aybalc'ule chiyelax texol ti' , payxam isbejcano anma iswatx'en istx'ojal , yamahto anma tan̈ yin̈ iswi' , yeb yamico anma xil isk'ap chiyenilo bisc'ulal .
40011022	Yaja' chiwalan teyet , yet chiapni istz'ayical bay chil Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma , caw ec'balto isya'tajil chischah huntek'an anma ti' sata anma ay yul con̈ob Tiro yeb anma ay yul con̈ob Sid'on .
40011023	Haxa hex ay yul con̈ob Capernaum , ham heyalni ta chexilaxcan̈ satcan̈ , machoj ; wal xin chexk'ojlaxayto xol camom . Yuto ta yul con̈ob Sodoma yelax huntek'an c'aybalc'ule chiyelax texol ti' , isbejmicano anma yanico ismul , aytomic'o hune' con̈ob tu' tinan̈ .
40011024	Yuxin chiwalan teyet yet chilni Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma , caw ec'balto isya'tajil chechah sata anma ah Sodoma tu' , ẍi Comam .
40011025	Hayet hune' tiempohal tu' txahli Comam Jes'us , yalni Comam : -- Mamin , yahawil satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx' , chiwak'an yuch'andios tawet yuto haweba huntek'an ti' tet ebnaj ay ishelanil yeb tet ebnaj ay iscuyu yul sat anma , hawak'ni yohtan̈elo anma matzet yohtaj .
40011026	Mamin , hac tu' chuhi yuto hac tu' el yin̈ hac'ul , ẍi Comam .
40011027	Lahwi tu' yalni Comam tet anma : -- Sunil tzet ye tu' ayco yul ink'aban yu Inmaman . Machi hunu mac ohtan̈einan hanin C'ahole inti'an , cachann̈e Inmaman ohtan̈einan . Machi hunu mac ohtan̈e Inmaman , cachann̈e haninan quinisc'aholti'an wohtajan , cat wak'nihan Inmamtu'an yohtan̈elo tet mac bay chiwochehan .
40011028	Maquex sic'omexxa yu hemunil yeb hex xatibayo heyu yalan̈ yalil heyijatz , titan̈we inc'atan̈an , yuto haninan chexwak' xewojan .
40011029	Ijwe hune' ijatz chiwak'an heyija' . Cuywan̈we wintajan haxinwal chixew heyanma , yuto haninti'an c'ulch'an inc'ulal yeb xin ay isnimanil inc'ulan .
40011030	Hune' ijatz chiwak'an heyija' ti' mach aloj , mach ya'tajo heyijenpaxoj , ẍi Comam tet anma .
40012001	Yin̈ hune' tz'ayical xewilal ec'to Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul hune' nich'an beh xol ixim trigo . Caw xin xan̈ohcha ebnaj yuxin oc ebnaj yik'alo iswi' ixim trigo , ischilnilo ebnaj ixim isc'uxu' .
40012002	Hayet yilni ebnaj fariseo hune' tu' , yalni ebnaj tet Comam : -- Ilc'anab tzet chu ebnaj hacuywom tilah , lan̈an yinilo ebnaj iswi' ixim trigo isc'uxu' . Yaja' xin caw txahul comunla yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal , ẍi ebnaj .
40012003	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios yin̈ tzet yak'le naj rey David yet caw chin̈ohcha naj yeb ebnaj tzujan yintaj ?
40012004	Naj David tu' octo naj yul yatut Comam Dios iswahnito naj ixim pan haltebilxa tet Comam Dios , iswahnipaxo ebnaj tzujan yinta naj tu' ixim . Wal xin han̈c'an̈e ebnaj sacerdote chu iswahni ixim .
40012005	¿ Tom maẍto cheyilpaxo yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yin̈ tzet yu ebnaj sacerdote ay yul yatut Comam Dios ? Ebnaj sacerdote tu' mach chixew ebnaj yin̈ tz'ayic xewilal , yaja' mach chaco ebnaj ismul yul sat Comam Dios yin̈ hune' tu' .
40012006	Yaja' yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet : Haninti'an ec'bal welapnojan sata yatut Comam Dios .
40012007	Tzettam sak'al tato chitxumchalo heyu bay chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Ha' hune' chiwochehan tato chitz'ay hec'ul yin̈ heyet anmahil , maẍn̈etaj hen̈usni no nok' yin̈ xahanbalil wetan , " ẍiayoj . Ta chetxum hune' ti' mach chimcheyala tato ay ismul ebnaj , wal xin mach ismul ebnaj yin̈ hune' ti' .
40012008	Wal Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chu walnihan yin̈ tzet cheyu yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj fariseo tu' .
40012009	Lahwi tu' isto Comam Jes'us , yocto Comam yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel ,
40012010	ha' tu' xin ayicto hune' naj camnajilo hune' isk'ab . Yun̈e yoc ebnaj fariseo ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam , yuxin isk'ambe ebnaj tet Comam : -- ¿ Chimyu jak'ni cawxo hunu anma ya'ay yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
40012011	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- K'inalo ta ay hunujex chitohc'ay hunu heme' yul hunu c'uh yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal , ¿ mataxca mach chexto heyik'ahti no' ?
40012012	Hajxam hunu anma , to ec'balto yelapno sata no' me' tu' , yuxin chisje cowatx'en hunu tzet ye tu' c'ul yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal , ẍi Comam .
40012013	Lahwi tu' yalni Comam tet naj camnajilo hune' isk'ab tu' : -- Toholban̈elto hak'ab , ẍi Comam . Hayet istoholban̈enilto naj isk'ab tu' , iswatx'icanilo .
40012014	Hayet yilni ebnaj fariseo hune' tu' yelti ebnaj yul capilla , yoc ebnaj islahti'n̈en isba yin̈ tzet chu yak'ni camo ebnaj Comam Jes'us .
40012015	Hayet yabenilo Comam Jes'us hune' tu' , isto Comam . Caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam ; yak'ni cawxo Comam macta ya'ay .
40012016	Yalni Comam tet anma ta mach chispujbac'o yin̈ tzet iswatx'e Comam .
40012017	Hac tu' yu yijnicano isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Isa'ias , ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , bay chal haca' ti' :
40012018	Ha' naj ti' inchejaban sic'bilico wuhan , caw xahan ay wuhan , caw chintzalahan yin̈ naj . Chiwacojan Wesp'irituhan yin̈ naj cat ispujbanic'o naj tetej con̈ob mach Israelo yin̈ tzet chu isbeybaln̈en istoholal .
40012019	Machi mac yeb chiah howal yu naj , machi xin caw chiel yaw naj yin̈ caw ip , machipaxo chiel yaw naj yulaj calle .
40012020	Ay anma caw c'anch'an haca' te' ah k'ahnatoj , maca haca' te' tah ton̈e chimutz'mun xaj k'a' yin̈ hac tu' yehi . Yaja' ha' naj xin chicolwa yin̈ ; mach chislah naj yetantoj . Hac tu' chute naj masanta chioc sunil yalan̈ istoholal yu naj .
40012021	Sunilej con̈ob chicawxi isc'ul yin̈ naj , ẍiayoj .
40012022	Yilaxto hune' naj mach chu yilni yeb mach chu istzotel yu ischejab naj matzwalil tet Comam Jes'us , yak'ni cawxo Comam naj . Hac tu' xin yu ishajlo isbak'sat naj , istzotelpaxocan̈ naj .
40012023	Sunil anma ilni hune' tu' caw c'ayilo isc'ul , yalni haca' ti' : -- ¿ Ham naj ti' , titna yin̈ yuninal naj rey David echmabil yul ju ? ẍi anma .
40012024	Yaja' hayet yaben ebnaj fariseo yalni anma hune' tu' , yalni ebnaj : -- Hune' naj ti' chilo naj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma , yaj yu ayco yip naj Beelzeb'u , naj yahawil ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj , ẍi ebnaj .
40012025	Wal Comam yohtaxa tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal ebnaj , yuxin yal Comam : -- K'inalo ta chispoh isba anma yul hunu niman con̈ob , hune' con̈ob tu' yin̈ an̈emi chipax yip . Maca ta hunu con̈ob maca hunu n̈ahil anma chispoh isba cat yanico howal yin̈ hunun , caw yin̈ an̈emi chitan̈iloj .
40012026	Hac tu' ye naj matzwalil , ta chaco naj howal yin̈ yet matzwalilal , yin̈tic'a naj chaco howal . ¿ Tzet xin chu yik'ni yip naj yin̈ haca' tu' ?
40012027	Hex ti' cheyala tato yu naj yahawil ebnaj matzwalil yuxin chiwilojan ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma . Ta hac tu' , ¿ mac xin chiak'ni yip ebnaj tzujan yin̈ hecuybanil yet chinilo ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma ? Yuxin ha' ebnaj tu' chiyenilo teyet tato mach c'ulo tzet cheyal win̈an .
40012028	Yaja' ta yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios chiwilojan ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma , ha' chalniloj tato ayxac'o yip Comam Dios texol .
40012029	K'inalo hunu naj yahaw n̈a caw ay yip , machi hunu mac chu yocto yul yatut naj cat yelk'anilto tzet ay naj . Yaja' ta chic'albalax naj , wal tu' chu yilaxilo tzet ay naj .
40012030	Ha' mac mach ayoco wetbihojan ayco ishowal win̈an . Ha' mac mach chicolwa yanico anma yul ink'aban , ha' istzumbenilo anma tu' ha' chu .
40012031	Yuxin chiwalan teyet , tzijxan̈e istx'ojal yeb ismul anma chacoj , ay nimanc'ulal yin̈ yu Comam Dios . Yaja' tato ay hunu mac tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Esp'iritu Santo , hune' mac tu' matxa bak'inal ay nimanc'ulal yin̈ .
40012032	Tato ay hunu mac tx'oj istzotel win̈an , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ayto nimanc'ulal yin̈ . Wal mac tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Esp'iritu Santo matxa nimanc'ulal yin̈ , yin̈ hune' cotiempohal ti' yeb yin̈ hune' chihul cosataj , ẍi Comam .
40012033	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- K'inalo hunu te te' c'ul , c'ul sat te' chak'a , wal te' machiswalil , mach c'ulo sat te' chak'a . Yuxin yin̈ sat te te' chicotxumu tzet te'al te' .
40012034	Hex ti' lahanex yeb no' laba , caw tx'ojex . ¿ Tzet chu heyalni tzoti' c'ul tato tx'oj ayayto yul heyanma ? Wal xin ha' tzet ayayto yul heyanma ha' chal heti' .
40012035	Ha' mac isc'ulal ayayto yul yanma , c'ul tzoti' chala , haxa' mac istx'ojal ayayto yul yanma , ha' istx'ojal chala .
40012036	Yaja' chiwalan teyet , yet chilni Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma , sunil mac chiilchahoti yin̈ tzettaj tzoti'al chielti yul isti' , waxan̈ca comon tzoti' .
40012037	Hatatic'a haca' hetzoteli hac tu' chu yilni Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chexelicoj , ta ay hemul maca machi hemul yin̈ tzet cheyala , ẍi Comam .
40012038	Yet hunel tu' , ay huntek'an ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb ebnaj fariseo halni tet Comam : -- Mam cuywawom chijochehan̈ chaye hunu c'aybalc'ule jila'an̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
40012039	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Hex ayex yul hune' tiempohal ti' caw tx'ojexcanoj , caw man̈c'omex tet Comam Dios . Chek'an c'aybalc'ule heyila' , hune' chiyenilo ishelanil yip Comam Dios . Yaja' hune'n̈e c'aybalc'ule chiak'lax heyila' , ha' ton hune' haca' tzet yak'le hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat chiyij Jon'as , ha' chiak'lax heyila' .
40012040	Naj Jon'as tu' oxeb tz'ayic yeb oxeb ak'bal ayayto naj yul isc'ul hune' no' niman cay . Haca' yak'le naj tu' , hac tu' chiwak'lehan , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios . Oxeb tz'ayic yeb oxeb ak'bal chinmujihan yul tx'otx' .
40012041	Yet isbey naj Jon'as tu' yalno Istzoti' Comam Dios tet anma ay yul con̈ob N'inive isbejnicano anma iswatx'en istx'ojal . Wal tzet chiwalti'an ec'balto yelapno sata tzet yal naj Jon'as tu' , yaja' mach chebejcano hetx'ojal . Yuxin hayet islahobal tz'ayic ha' hune' con̈obal anma ah N'inive tu' ha' chihalnilo hemul .
40012042	Hacpax tu' yu ix reina ay yul ismajul tx'otx' Sab'a , waxan̈ca caw nahat ay ix yaja' masan hul ix yabe yitz'atil iswi' naj rey Salom'on . Yaja' wal haninti'an ec'bal welapnojan sata naj rey Salom'on tu' , yaja' mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chiwalan . Yuxin yet islahobal tz'ayic ha' caw ix reina tu' chihalnilo hemul , ẍi Comam .
40012043	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- K'inalo ta ay hunu ischejab naj matzwalil chiel yul yanma hunu anma . Lahwi yel naj tu' cat isto naj bey tx'otx' desierto issaya' bay chixewi , yaja' mach chiilcha bay chixew naj tu' yu .
40012044	Lahwi tu' cat yec' yin̈ isnabal naj haca' ti' : " Etzan̈em c'ul inmeltzohan baytic'a ayinan , " ẍi naj . Haxa yet chiapni naj xin cat yilni naj yanma hune' naj tu' haca' hunu n̈a machi yahaw , caw c'ul yecan̈ k'alem yul .
40012045	Hayet chilni naj hune' tu' xin cat isto naj yinoti hujwan̈xa yetbi caw ec'balto istx'ojal sataj , cat yocto ebnaj ehoyo yul yanma hune' naj tu' . Hune' naj bay chiocto ebnaj tu' , caw ec'balto tx'oj chielico naj sata yet babelal . Haca' chak'le hune' naj tu' hac tu' chak'le huntek'an anma caw tx'oj ti' tinan̈ , ẍi Comam .
40012046	Hayet lan̈an istzotel Comam tet anma tu' xin yapni ismi' Comam yeb ebnaj yuẍta Comam , iscancano isti' ispultahil te' n̈a bay ayicto Comam . Yaja' xin yoche ismi' Comam yeb ebnaj yuẍta tu' tzotelo tet .
40012047	Yuxin yal hune' naj tet Comam : -- Mamin , ayc'o hami' yeb ebnaj hawuẍta istin̈a , choche ebnaj tzotelo tawet yalni , ẍi naj .
40012048	Yaja' tak'wi Comam tet naj : -- ¿ Mac xin inmi'an yeb wuẍtatu'an hawalni ? ẍi Comam .
40012049	Lahwi tu' isyenito Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom , yalni Comam : -- Ha' huntek'an anma ti' ha' haca' inmi'an yeb haca' wuẍtajan .
40012050	Yuto ha' mac chiyijen tzet chal Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ , ha' ton wuẍtajan , wanaban yeb inmi'an , ẍi Comam .
40013001	Yin̈tic'a hune' tz'ayic tu' , elti Comam Jes'us yul n̈a , isto Comam isti' ha' lago , yay tz'on̈no Comam bey tu' .
40013002	Yaja' caw tx'i'al anma apni isc'atan̈ Comam , yuxin ahto Comam yul hune' te' barco , yay tz'on̈noj , yichico Comam iscuywahi . Wal anma xin cancano isti' ha' lago tu' .
40013003	Caw tx'i'al yechel yaco Comam yet iscuyni Comam anma tu' , yichico Comam yalni haca' ti' : -- Yet hunel ay hune' naj to txiho trigo .
40013004	Yet lan̈an istxihni naj ixim , ay ixim apni c'atna yul beh , yapni no' ch'ic issic'nocan̈ ixim .
40013005	Aypaxo ixim apni c'atna xolaj ch'en ch'en bay machi bin tx'o tx'otx' ; caw xin pet ahilo ixim yuto mach nahato yehayto yich tx'otx' .
40013006	Yaja' haxa yet yahilo tz'ayic yet yik'nican̈ yip k'a' istajilo ixim yuto machi bay yayto isxe' ixim yu ch'en ch'en tu' .
40013007	Aypaxo ixim apni c'atna xol yin̈atil te' tx'ix , hayet isch'ibcan̈ ixim isch'ibpaxocan̈ te' tx'ix tu' , hac tu' yu istz'onbayo ixim xol te' .
40013008	Walpaxo ixim hin̈at apni xol tx'o tx'otx' caw c'ul , caw sak'al yu isch'ibcan̈ ixim . Yet yak'ni ixim sat , ay ixim ak'ni cien yin̈ hunun iswi' , aypaxo ixim sesenta , aypaxo ixim yak' treinta sat yin̈ hunun iswi' .
40013009	Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumniloj , ẍi Comam tet anma .
40013010	Lahwi tu' ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jes'us isc'atan̈ , isk'amben ebnaj : -- Mamin , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxin yet chacuyni anma yecheln̈e chawak'baln̈e tet ? ẍi ebnaj .
40013011	Istak'wi Comam : -- Teyetn̈e chak' Comam Dios heyohtan̈elo huntek'an tzet ye tu' ewan yehi , yun̈e hetxumni yin̈ tzet chu heyoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Walpaxo tet huntek'anxa anma xin mach ch'ak'lax yohtan̈eloj .
40013012	Yuto ha' mac chiyoche chiyohtan̈elo huntek'an ti' caw ec'naxa chiak'lax yohtan̈eloj , wal mac mach choche yohtan̈eloj , ha' nich'an etza chitxumcha yu chiilaxilo tet .
40013013	Yuxinto yecheln̈e chiwacojan yet chincuynihan anma . Wal xin waxan̈ca chiyila , yaja' mach chinachalo yu , waxan̈ca chabe yaja' mach chitxumchalo yu .
40013014	Yuto lan̈an yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yin̈ huntek'an anma ti' yu naj Isa'ias , ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , bay chal haca' ti' : Wal huntek'an anma ti' waxan̈ca chabe , yaja' mach chitxumchalo yu . Waxan̈ca chiyila , yaj mach chin'achalo yu .
40013015	Yuto huntek'an anma ti' caw nohna yanma yu ec'najil , haca'tan̈e majan istxiquin yuxin mach chabe . Haca'tan̈e mutz'an sat yuxin mach chila , hac tu' xin mach chistxum isba cat yanico isba yul ink'aban cat yan̈chahi , ẍiayoj .
40013016	Yaja' walex ti' sak'al heyet , yuto haban istxumchalo heyu yet cheyilni , yeb xin yet cheyabeni haban henaniloj .
40013017	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , caw tx'i'al ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios , yeb tx'i'al mac c'ul isbeybal yet payat yoche' yila' huntek'an cheyil ti' , yaja' mach yil ebnaj . Yochepaxo ebnaj yabe huntek'an cheyabe ti' yaja' mach yabe ebnaj , ẍi Comam .
40013018	Yalni Comam Jes'us : -- Tinan̈ xin chiwalan teyet yin̈ tzet chal yelapno naj txihom trigo .
40013019	Ixim hin̈at ayc'ay yul beh , yechel yeco ixim yin̈ mac chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios , yaja' mach chitxumchalo yu . Lahwi tu' cat yul naj matzwalil yinolo Istzoti' Comam tu' yul yanma .
40013020	Haxa ixim hin̈at ayc'ay yiban̈ ch'en ch'en , yechel hune' tu' yin̈ anma chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios cat ischahni yul yanma yin̈ tzalahilal .
40013021	Yaja' machi caw yip yanma yin̈ yet Comam , yeb xin mach huneln̈eho chucanico yin̈ yanma , yuxin hayet chihul ilwebal yin̈ yu Istzoti' Comam , yin̈ an̈e chicabconcan̈ isc'ul cat ismeltzo yintaj .
40013022	Haxa ixim hin̈at apni c'atna xol yin̈atil te' tx'ix , yechel hune' tu' yin̈ mac chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios yaja' yu ec'balto chaco yanma yin̈ k'alomal yeb yin̈ tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yuxin chilo yanma yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios . Ha' huntek'an anma tu' lahan haca' ixim trigo tz'onbayoj , machi sat yak'a .
40013023	Wal ixim hin̈at ayc'ay bay caw c'ul tx'o tx'otx' xin , yechel hune' tu' yin̈ anma chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios , caw c'ul istxumni cat ischahni yul yanma , lahan yeb ixim trigo caw niman sat yacoj . Ay mac haca' ixim trigo yak' cien sat yin̈ hunun iswi' , aypaxo mac haca' ixim yak' sesenta , aypaxo xin mac haca' ixim yak' treinta yin̈ hunun iswi' , ẍi Comam .
40013024	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us hune' yechel haca' ti' : -- Hayet chioc Comam Dios yahawilo anma , lahan haca' chak'le hunu naj chitxihni ixim hin̈at trigo caw c'ul sat istx'otx' .
