40013025	Yaja' yet ak'balil xin yet wayo chu naj , yapni hune' naj ayco ishowal yin̈ naj , istxihnayo naj yin̈atil te' ch'im haca' ixim trigo tu' xol ixim , isto naj .
40013026	Lahwi tu' isch'ibcan̈ ixim , haxa yet yoc iswi' ixim isyenilo isba te' ch'im tu' xol ixim .
40013027	Hayet yilni ebnaj munlawom hune' tu' , isto ebnaj yalno tet naj yahaw munil haca' ti : " Mamin , caw c'ul ixim hin̈at trigo cachbey hatxihayoj , yaja' ¿ tzet yin̈ xin caw ay te' ch'im ahilo xol ixim ? " ẍi ebnaj .
40013028	Istak'wi naj : " Ham hunu mac ayco ishowal win̈an txihnayo yin̈atil te' ch'im xol ixim , " ẍi naj . Isk'ambenpaxo ebnaj ismunlawom naj tu' : " Ta chisje hac'ul chon̈tohan̈ cohoc'ocan̈an̈ te' ch'im tu' xol ixim , " ẍi ebnaj .
40013029	Yalni naj : " Machoj , yuto ta chehoc'can̈ te' ham hun ixim trigo chehoc'can̈ yinta te' .
40013030	Wal xin ch'ibojabna te' xol ixim , hatojab yet chiapni istempohal bay chic'uplaxcan̈ ixim cat yah te' , cat walnihan tet ebnaj inmunlawoman tato chisc'upcan̈ ebnaj te' xol ixim cat isc'alnayo ebnaj te' yin̈ hunun yachan , lahwi tu' cat isn̈uslaxto te' . Wal ixim trigo tu' xin chic'ubalaxto ixim yul inc'un̈ahan , " ẍi naj yahaw munil tu' , ẍi Comam .
40013031	Yanipaxico Comam Jes'us yin̈atil te' mostaza yechelo yet iscuywahi , yalni Comam haca' ti' : -- Chiwalpaxojan teyet yin̈ tzet chu isch'ib isbisil anma chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , lahan haca' nich'an yin̈atil te' mostaza chistz'un hunu naj sat istx'otx' .
40013032	Yin̈ caw yeli , te' hin̈at mostaza tu' , ha' te' caw niẍch'an xol te' hin̈at , yaj haxa yet chiahilo te' cat isch'ibcan̈ te' , ha' te' caw nimej chielico xol sunilej te' itah chitz'unlaxi . Te' mostaza tu' nimej chu te' yuxin chiapni no' ch'ic iswatx'e yatut xol isk'ab te' , ẍi Comam .
40013033	Yanipaxico Comam Jes'us yan̈al ixim pan yechelo yet iscuywa tet anma , yalni Comam tet anma tu' : -- Chiwalpaxojan teyet yin̈ tzet chu isch'ib isbisil anma chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Lahan haca' nich'an yan̈al ixim pan chaco hunu ix ix xol oxeb mal ixim harina . Haxa yet chissomni ix ixim cat issipc'a ixim yu nich'an yan̈al chioqui , ẍi Comam .
40013034	Yet yak'ni Comam Jes'us Istzoti' Comam Dios iscuyu anma naba yecheln̈e bay tzotel Comam ,
40013035	yun̈e yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , bay chal haca' ti' : Yecheln̈e chiwak'an tet anma yet chintzotelan . Chiwalan tet yin̈ huntek'an tzet ewan yehi yichitaxtic'a iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti , ẍiayoj .
40013036	Lahwi tu' istak'li Comam Jes'us tet anma chiaben tzet chal tu' , yocto Comam yul n̈a yeb ebnaj iscuywom . Ishitzico ebnaj isc'atan̈ Comam isk'amben ebnaj yin̈ tzet chal yelapno te' ch'im ahilo xol ixim trigo .
40013037	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj xin : -- Naj txihom trigo yechel yeco naj win̈an , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .
40013038	Ha' tx'o tx'otx' bay txihlaxayo ixim trigo , yechel anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ye tx'otx' . Ha' ixim hin̈at c'ul , yechel anma chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios ye ixim . Haxa te' ch'im ch'ibcan̈ xol ixim trigo tu' , yechel anma ayco yul isk'ab naj matzwalil ye te' .
40013039	Naj txihnayo te' hin̈at ch'im xol ixim trigo tu' , yechel naj matzwalil ye naj . Yet chic'uplaxcan̈ ixim trigo tu' xin , yechel yin̈ yet chilahwi yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Haxa ebnaj chic'upni ixim trigo tu' , yechel ebnaj 'angel ye ebnaj .
40013040	Haca' yet chiilaxilo te' ch'im xol ixim trigo cat isn̈uslaxto te' , hac tu' chiutelax anma mach chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios yet chitan̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
40013041	Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios ti' , chinchejtijan ebnaj 'angel iscutxbaco sunil mac ch'ak'ni ayc'ayo yet anmahil yeb mac istx'ojaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e ,
40013042	cat yalaxto huntek'an mac tu' xol k'a k'a' bay ch'ok'i , cat isn̈etx'la yeh yu isya'il .
40013043	Wal mac chiyijen tzet chal Comam Dios xin , chitzejla haca' tz'ayic yul isk'ab Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ . Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumniloj , ẍi Comam .
40013044	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Anma ch'oc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , lahan yeb hune' k'alomal caw ay istohol mujbil yul tx'o tx'otx' chiilcha yu hune' naj , lahwi tu' cat ismujnipaxo naj . Caw xin chitzala naj yin̈ hune' k'alomal tu' cat isto naj istxon̈noto sunil tzet aya yun̈e islok'ni naj hune' tx'otx' bay mujan hune' k'alomal tu' , ẍi Comam .
40013045	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Ha' anma ch'oc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , lahan haca' hunu naj txon̈wom chiec' sayno huntek'an ch'en ch'en caw ay istohol chiyij perla .
40013046	Haxa yet chiilcha hunu ch'en yu naj , chito naj istxon̈o'to sunil tzet aya cat islok'ni naj hune' ch'en perla caw c'ul tu' , ẍi Comam .
40013047	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Chiwalpaxojan teyet , ha' anma chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , lahan yeb hune' tx'an̈ hac' ik'omati cay chayto huntek'an ebnaj xol ha ha' . Yet chibejlaxayto tx'an̈ xol ha' caw tx'i'al no' cay chioc yul tx'an̈ .
40013048	Haxa yet chinohilo tx'an̈ yu no' xin cat yilaxahti tx'an̈ xol ha' , cat yay tz'on̈no ebnaj isti' ha' , cat issic'nilo ebnaj no' c'ul cat yanayto ebnaj no' yul motx . Haxa no' mach c'uluj xin , chisk'ojto ebnaj no' .
40013049	Hac tu' chak'le anma yet chilahwi hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Chul ebnaj 'angel ispoholo anma tx'oj xol anma c'ul .
40013050	Ha' huntek'an anma tx'oj chialaxto xol k'a k'a' , ha' bey tu' xin chiok' yin̈ cat isn̈etx'la yeh yu isya'il , ẍi Comam .
40013051	Lahwi tu' isk'amben Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom haca' ti' : -- ¿ Chimhetxum sunil huntek'an yechel chiwalti'an ? ẍi Comam . Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Ho' Mamin , ẍi ebnaj .
40013052	Yalni Comam xin : -- Ha' chalilo hune' ti' , ta ay hunu naj cuywawom yin̈ ley chicuywa yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios , lahan haca' hunu naj mame yohta yocnico huntek'an tzet ye tu' ac' yu yeb huntek'an tzet ye tu' xilxa c'uwan yul isc'uwanbal , ẍi Comam .
40013053	Lahwi yalnicano Comam huntek'an cuybanile tu' , isto Comam .
40013054	Yet yapni Comam yul iscon̈ob , iscuyni Comam anma yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel . Hayet yaben anma istzotel Comam , caw c'ayilo isc'ul , yuxin yal anma haca' ti' : -- ¿ Bay chitit ishelanil hune' naj ti' , yeb bay chitit iscan̈il ye naj iswatx'en huntek'an c'aybalc'ule ti' ?
40013055	Naj ti' isc'ahol naj hutx'um te' ye naj , yebpaxo yunin ix Mar'ia ye naj , yeb yuẍta isba naj yeb naj Jacobo , naj Jos'e , naj Sim'on yeb naj Judas .
40013056	Yebpaxo xin ebix yanab naj , coxol ti' ay ebix . ¿ Baytaxca xin chitit ishelanil naj ti' ? ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
40013057	Yuxin machi cam isc'ul anma yaben tzet chal Comam . Yalni Comam tet anma tu' : -- Sunil bay xahan chiillax ischejab Comam Dios yu anma , yaja' wal yul iscon̈ob yeb yul yatut chiyahlaxi , ẍi Comam .
40013058	Wal Comam xin mach tx'i'alo c'aybalc'ule isye Comam yul iscon̈ob tu' , yuto mach chayto anma yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
40014001	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' xin , yabelo naj rey Herodes , naj ayco gobernadoral bey Galilea , isbina Comam Jes'us .
40014002	Yuxin yal naj tet ebnaj chimunla yinta tu' : -- Hune' naj chibina tu' , ham naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma itzitzbican̈ , yuxin ay yip naj iswatx'en huntek'an c'aybalc'ule tu' , ẍi naj .
40014003	Yal naj hune' tu' yuto ha' naj chejni tzablaxoyo naj Juan , isc'allaxayo naj yu ch'en cadena , yalaxicto naj yul preso yuto cachwa naj yin̈ naj Herodes tu' yet yik'nican̈ naj ix Herod'ias , yixal yuẍtaj , ha' ton naj Felipe .
40014004	Caw xin tx'i'al el yal naj Juan tu' tet naj Herodes haca' ti' : -- Mach c'ulo hawik'ni yixal hawuẍtaj , ẍi naj .
40014005	Wal naj Herodes tu' xin caw yoche naj ispotx'o' naj Juan , yaj xin xiw naj yuto sunil anma chalni tato ischejab Comam Dios ye naj .
40014006	Yet hunel xin , yec'tze naj Herodes hune' k'in̈ yuto tz'ajna naj yin̈ ishabilal , caw xin tx'i'al anma yawte naj . Yin̈ k'in̈ tu' , can̈alwi ix yunin ix Herod'ias yin̈ sat naj Herodes yeb yin̈ sat sunil anma awtebil . Caw xin c'ulch'an yu iscan̈alwi ix yil naj ,
40014007	yuxin yalte naj tet ix tato chak' naj tzijxan̈e tzet chisk'an ix .
40014008	Yalni ismi' ix tet tato chisk'an ix iswi' naj Juan ; yuxin yal ix tet naj Herodes tu' : -- Ha' iswi' naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma chawak' wetan yul hunu plato , ẍi ix tet naj .
40014009	Hayet yaben naj Herodes hune' tu' yoc bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul naj . Yaja' yu xayal naj yin̈ sat sunil anma tet ix tato chak' naj tzet chisk'an ix , yuxin yal naj ta chiak'lax tzet chisk'an ix tu' .
40014010	Ischejni naj yilaxolo iswi' naj Juan yul preso .
40014011	Hac tu' xin yu yilaxti iswi' naj yul hune' plato yak'lax tet ix , yinito ix tet ismi' .
40014012	Lahwi tu' xin , yapni ebnaj iscuywom naj Juan tu' , yinito ebnaj isnimanil naj mujlaxoj . Tzujan tu' isbey ebnaj yalno tet Comam Jes'us .
40014013	Hayet yaben Comam Jes'us ta cam naj Juan yel Comam bey tu' , yahto Comam yul hune' te' barco , yec' apno Comam isk'axepic'to ha' lago bay machi anma . Hayet yaben anma ay yulaj con̈ob xin tato to Comam , istopaxo anma yu yoj isti'la ha' bay chiapni Comam tu' .
40014014	Hayet yelti Comam yul te' barco tu' xin yilnitoj ta tenanxato anma yechmani . Istz'aycan̈ isc'ul Comam yin̈ anma , yak'ni cawxo Comam anma ya'ay ilaxto bey tu' .
40014015	Haxa yet lan̈anxa isk'ejbayo xin , ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈ , yalni ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mamin , mak'ejbi lah yebpaxo xin machi te' n̈a bey ti' , yuxin c'ulmi hachejnito anma ti' yulaj wayan̈bal cocawilal ti' islok'o tzet chislo , ẍi ebnaj .
40014016	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Mach yilalo chipaxto anma ti' , ak'we tzet chislo , ẍi Comam .
40014017	Istak'wi ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mamin , caw han̈c'an̈e howeb ixim pan yeb cac'on̈ cay coxol ti' , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
40014018	Yalni Comam : -- Iweti ixim yeb no' cay tu' bey ti' , ẍi Comam .
40014019	Lahwi tu' ischejni Comam anma cutxanico tu' tato chiay tz'on̈no sat chek'an . Yinican̈ Comam ixim howeb pan yeb no' cac'on̈ cay , yah t'an̈no Comam satcan̈ , yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ ixim yeb yin̈ no' . Lahwi tu' isk'axponayo Comam ixim , yak'ni Comam ixim tet ebnaj iscuywom , yoc ebnaj yitxk'anoto ixim yin̈ anma .
40014020	Caw sunil anma wa'i hantatic'a caw yoche isc'ul , caw xin cablahon̈ebto motx nohcan̈ yin̈ ixim matxa lahwi yu anma .
40014021	Caw howeb mil ebnaj winaj wa'i , wal ebix ix yeb niẍte unin mach oc istz'ajo yin̈ hune' isbisil tu' .
40014022	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom ta ch'octo ebnaj yul hune' te' barco yu isbabito ebnaj isk'axepxac'to ha' lago tu' . Wal Comam cancano Comam tak'lo tet anma .
40014023	Hayet lahwi istak'licano Comam tet anma tu' xin , yahto Comam txahlo ischuquil istzalanil hune' witz . Ha' tu' xin ah ak'bal yin̈ Comam .
40014024	Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam nahatxa chito ebnaj yiban̈ ha' lago tu' , yaj xin ay hune' niman jak'ek' chimak'nican̈ ha ha' sata te' barco tu' .
40014025	Haxa yet lan̈anxa issajbilo xin istzujcha ebnaj yu Comam , belwito Comam yiban̈ ha ha' tu' .
40014026	Hayet yilni ebnaj isbelwi Comam yiban̈ ha' isxiwcan̈ ebnaj , yah yaw ebnaj yu xiwquilal , yalni ebnaj : -- ¡ Hune' ti' ispixan camom ! ẍi ebnaj .
40014027	Yalnican̈ Comam : -- Mach chexxiwi , haninan , ẍi Comam .
40014028	Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam : -- Mamin , ta hach hune' tu' , hala ta chinbelwihan yiban̈ ha ha' ti' cat wapnihan bay ayach tu' , ẍi naj .
40014029	Yalni Comam tet naj xin : -- C'ultic'a , titan̈ , ẍi Comam . Hayet yaben naj Pedro hune' tu' , yel naj yul te' barco , isto naj isc'atan̈ Comam , yichico naj isbel yiban̈ ha' .
40014030	Yaja' yet yilni naj isbili ha' tu' yu jak'ek' isxiwcan̈ naj , yichico naj isto xol ha' , yah yaw naj tet Comam yin̈ caw ip : -- Mamin , colinan , ẍi naj .
40014031	Yin̈ an̈e xin oc tzabno Comam yin̈ isk'ab naj , yalni Comam tet naj : -- Hach ti' caw mach ayoco hawanma win̈an . ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin macabconcan̈ hac'ul ? ẍi Comam .
40014032	Haxa yet yahto Comam yul te' barco yeb naj , islin̈i yec' jak'ek' .
40014033	Wal sunil ebnaj ayicto yul te' barco tu' xin ay jahno ebnaj sata Comam , yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- ¡ Yin̈ caw yeli hach ti' Isc'ahol Comam Dios hawehi ! ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
40014034	Hayet isk'axponic'to Comam Jes'us yiban̈ ha' lago tu' yeb ebnaj iscuywom , yapni Comam yul ismajul tx'otx' Genesaret .
40014035	Haxa yet yohtan̈enilo anma Comam xin , ispujbalaxic'o isk'umal Comam sunil yul ismajul tx'otx' Genesaret tu' . Caw xin hantan̈e anma ya'ay ilaxto tet Comam .
40014036	Isk'anni anma tet Comam ta waxan̈ca han̈ech'an isti' xil isk'ap Comam chistzab anma ya'ay , yuxin sunil anma ya'ay tzabni isti' xil isk'ap Comam tu' cawxicanocan̈ .
40015001	Yet hunel apni huntek'an ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es ilwal yin̈ Comam Jes'us , ispeto ebnaj bey Jerusal'en . Isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam :
40015002	-- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin mach chisyije hacuywom ti' huntek'an chejbanile yet ebnaj jichmam ? Yuto ebnaj hacuywom ti' mach chistx'ah ebnaj isk'ab yet chiwa' ebnaj , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
40015003	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Haquexpax tu' , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin cheman̈c'o ischejbanil Comam Dios cheyijento ischejbanil anma ?
40015004	Yuto chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti' : " Ayojab yelapno hamam , hami' yul hasat . Mac chitz'acti'n̈en ismam maca ismi' yilal iscami , " ẍiayoj .
40015005	Yaja' hex ti' cheyala tato mach yilalo iscolwa anma yin̈ ismam maca ismi' ta chiyal haca' ti' : " Mam , mach chu incolwahan tawin̈ yuto ha' tzet ayinti'an yetxa Comam Dios ye wuhan , " ta ẍi .
40015006	Ha' mac chihalni haca' tu' matxa yilalo iscolwa yin̈ ismam maca ismi' , heyalni . Yaja' yin̈ haca' tu' cheman̈c'o ischejbanil Comam Dios yu heyijento ischejbanil anma .
40015007	Wal xin nabn̈e cheyal heba c'ulal . Teyin̈ bay yalcano naj Isa'ias , ischejab Comam Dios yet payat yet yalnicano haca' ti' :
40015008	Huntek'an anma ti' , isti'n̈e chinak'ni binahojan , yaja' wal yanma nahat yehilo win̈an .
40015009	Nabn̈e chala ta chiyo isba wetan , wal xin han̈c'an̈e ischejbanil ebnaj winaj chak' ebnaj iscuyu' yet anmahil , ẍiayoj , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40015010	Lahwi tu' yawtenti Comam anma isc'atan̈ , yalni Comam tet anma tu' : -- Abewej cat hetxumni yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an .
40015011	Maẍtaj tzet chiocto yul isti' anma , ha' chietanto yul sat Comam Dios , walxinto ha' istx'ojal chiahti yul isti' , ha' chietanto yul sat Comam , ẍi Comam .
40015012	Ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈ , yalni ebnaj : -- Mamin , ¿ mamxatxumu tato yet maxawalni hune' ti' mach'iwacan̈ isc'ul ebnaj fariseo ? ẍi ebnaj .
40015013	Istak'wi Comam : -- Sunil te te' maẍtaj Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ tz'unn̈e chihoc'laxcan̈ .
40015014	Wal xin yila'xam ebnaj , lahan ebnaj haca' anma mach chu yilni cat yocpaxo ebnaj yijbanpaxic'o anma mach chu yilni . K'inalo ta ay hunu naj mach chu yilni chixecnito hunuxa naj mach chu yilni , chisxecleto isba ebnaj iscawan̈il yul xab , ẍi Comam .
40015015	Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam haca' ti' : -- Mamin , hal jetan̈ tzet chalilo hune' maxawal tet ebnaj fariseo tu' , ẍi naj .
40015016	Istak'wi Comam : -- ¿ Tom ha' hunex machi maxetxumpaxo yin̈ tzet mawaltu'an ?
40015017	¿ Tom mach heyohtajoj ta sunil tzet chiocto yul isti' anma yul isc'ul chiapni , chilahwi tu' xin cat yel yin̈ ?
40015018	Yaja' ha' tzoti' chiahti yul isti' anma , yin̈ yanma chitita , ha' xin huntek'an tu' chietanto yul sat Comam Dios .
40015019	Yuto yul yanma anma chipitzc'ati sunil istx'ojal haca' potx'wal , ixloj , winajloj , elek' , lek'ti'al , yeb buchwal .
40015020	Ha' ton huntek'an tu' chietanto anma yul sat Comam Dios , yaj wal hune' yet mach chicotx'ah cok'ab yet chon̈oc wa'oj , ischejbanil ebnaj winaj yehi , mach chetato janma yul sat Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40015021	Lahwi tu' xin isto Comam Jes'us yul ismajul tx'otx' Tiro yeb tx'otx' Sid'on .
40015022	Bey tu' ay hune' ix ix ah Cananea , mach Israeloj . Apni ix yila' Comam Jes'us , yalni ix yin̈ caw ip : -- Mamin , hach yuninal isc'ahol naj David , tz'ayojab hac'ul win̈an . Ay hune' nich'an wuninan caw chietalax yu ischejab naj matzwalil , caw xin chiec'ya' yanma ix yu naj , ẍi ix tet Comam .
40015023	Yaja' xin machi tak'wi Comam tet ix , yuxin hitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' isc'atan̈ , yalni ebnaj : -- Mamin , hal tet ix paxojabto ix haxinwal chisbej ix yel yaw jin̈ , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
40015024	Istak'wi Comam : -- Tetn̈e anma Israel chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios , yuto lahan anma tu' haca' no' me' c'aynatoj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
40015025	Yaja' hitzico ix , yay jahno ix sata Comam , yalni ix : -- Mamin , colwahan̈ nino win̈an , ẍi ix .
40015026	Yalni Comam tet ix : -- Mach c'ulo ta ch'ilaxilo tzet chislo ebnaj uninale cat yak'lax tet metx tx'i' , ẍi Comam .
40015027	Yalnipaxo ix : -- Ho' Mamin yeli , yaja' metx tx'i' tu' chi-tic'a-yican̈ metx isk'al isti' ebnaj uninale chiayc'ay yalan̈ meẍa yet chiwa' ebnaj , ẍi ix tet Comam .
40015028	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni Comam tet ix : -- Miyay , caw ayco hawanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin yubojab haca' choche hac'ul , ẍi Comam . Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin iscawxican̈ nich'an yunin ix tu' .
40015029	Yel Comam Jes'us bey tu' , isto Comam isti' ha' lago Galilea , ha' tu' xin ahto Comam yin̈ hune' won̈an , yay tz'on̈no Comam bey tu' .
40015030	Caw xin hantan̈e anma apni isc'atan̈ Comam . Ay mac ik'n̈e anma ya'ay yeb ay mac ik'n̈e anma mach chu yeq'ui , yeb anma mach chu yilni , yeb anma tx'oj ye isk'ab , yeb anma mach chu istzoteli ; yalaxayo sunil anma tu' yich yoj Comam . Sunil anma tu' xin cawxicanocan̈ yu Comam .
40015031	Hayet yilni anma hune' tu' caw c'aycanilo isc'ul yuto yak' tzotelo Comam anma maẍtic'a chu istzoteli , yebpaxo anma tx'oj ye isk'ab watx'icaniloj . Isbelwipaxocan̈ anma maẍtic'a chu yeq'ui , yeb anma maẍtic'a yu yilni hajlocanocan̈ issat yu Comam . Yu hune' tu' caw sunil anma yak' tzalaho isc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios , isDiosal Israel .
40015032	Lahwi tu' , yawtenti Comam ebnaj iscuywom isc'atan̈ , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Caw chitz'ay inc'ulan yin̈ huntek'an anma ti' yuto isyoxebxa tz'ayic yehic'o inc'atan̈an , matxa xin tzet chislo . Mach chisje inc'ulan inchejatojan yatut yuto tato mach chiwa'i , chalotaxca ispaxilo yip yulaj beh , ẍi Comam .
40015033	Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam tet : -- Mamin , caw tx'i'al anma lah , ¿ baytu'wal xin chon̈tohan̈ jik'atijan̈ tzet chislo anma ti' ? Yuto bay ayon̈ ti' machi te' n̈a , ẍi ebnaj .
40015034	Isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Hayeb ixim pan coxol ti' ? ẍi Comam . Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Hujebch'an ixim yeb hayc'on̈ no' niẍte cay , ẍi ebnaj .
40015035	Yalni Comam tet anma tato chiay tz'on̈no sat tx'otx' .
40015036	Lahwi tu' xin yinican̈ Comam ixim hujeb pan yeb hayc'on̈ no' cay tu' , yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios . Lahwi tu' isk'axponayo Comam ixim , yak'ni Comam ixim yeb no' cay tu' tet ebnaj iscuywom , yoc ebnaj yitxk'anto yin̈ anma .
40015037	Caw sunil anma wa'i hantatic'a yoche isc'ul , caw xin hujebto motx nohcan̈ yin̈ ixim matxa lahwi yu anma .
40015038	Xol sunil anma wa' tu' can̈eb mil isbisil ebnaj winaj , machi xin oc ebix ix yeb niẍte unin istz'ajo yin̈ hune' isbisil ti' .
40015039	Lahwi istak'licano Comam Jes'us tet anma , yahto Comam yul hune' te' barco , isto Comam yul ismajul tx'otx' Magdala .
40016001	Ay huntek'an ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo apni ilno Comam Jes'us yun̈e yilwen ebnaj Comam . Yalni ebnaj tet Comam ta chisye hunu c'aybalc'ule chiyeniloj tato caw yeli ha' Comam Dios chejn̈eti Comam Jes'us .
40016002	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yin̈ k'ejbiyalil yet cheyilni istz'ay moyan , cheyal haca' ti' : " Wal tinan̈ yeloxa hajan , yuto lan̈an istz'ay moyan , " quexchi .
40016003	Taca yet sac'ayal xin cheyal haca' ti' : " Wal tinan̈ yocxa ha' n̈ab yuto caw k'ej moyan , " quexchi . Hex ti' caw helanex hetxumni yin̈ tzet chute isba tiempo , ta chak' ha' n̈ab maca machoj . Yaja' wal yin̈ hune' tiempohal bay ayex ti' , mach chitxumchalo heyu .
40016004	Anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti' , caw tx'ojcanoj yeb caw mach yijemoj . Chisk'an c'aybalc'ule yila' , yaja' hune'n̈ech'an c'aybalc'ule chiak'lax yila' , haca' hune' isye Comam Dios yin̈ naj Jon'as , ẍi Comam Jes'us . Lahwi tu' yel Comam isc'atan̈ ebnaj , isto Comam .
40016005	Yet yec' apno Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom isk'axepic'to ha' lago isnaniti ebnaj tato mach yito tzet chislo .
40016006	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Cheyil heba tet yan̈al ispan ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo , ẍi Comam .
40016007	Yet yaben ebnaj hune' tu' , yichico ebnaj yalni tet hunun : -- Chal Comam hune' ti' yumi machi majiti tzet chicolo , ẍi ebnaj .
40016008	Yet yabenilo Comam hune' tu' , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin cheyala ta machi hepan ik'bil heyu ? Caw mach chicawxi hec'ul yin̈ Comam Dios .
40016009	¿ Tom mach chinachalo heyu ? yeb ¿ tom matxa chitit yul hec'ul yin̈ ixim howeb pan yabe yin̈ howeb mil ebnaj winaj ? Tijab yin̈ henabal hayeb motx ixim matxa lahwi yu anma .
40016010	Yeb xin , ¿ tom matxa chenati yin̈ ixim hujeb pan yabe yin̈ ebnaj can̈eb mil ? Yeb xin , ¿ tom matxa chenapaxtij hayeb motx ixim matxa lahwi yu anma tu' ?
40016011	¿ Tzet yin̈ xin machi matxumchalo heyu tato maẍtaj yin̈ ixim pan mantzotelan yet mawalnihan teyet ta cheyil heba tet yan̈al ispan ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo ? ẍi Comam .
40016012	Lahwi tu' istxumnilo ebnaj tato maẍtaj yin̈ yan̈al ixim pan tzotel Comam , to yin̈ cuybanile chak' ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo .
40016013	Yet yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey Cesarea yul ismajul Filipo , isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu' haca' ti' : -- Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ¿ mac anmahilinan yalni anma ? ẍi Comam .
40016014	Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Ay mac chalni ta hach ti' naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma , aypaxo mac chalni tato El'ias hach , aypaxo mac chalni tato hach ti' naj Jerem'ias , maca to hunuxa ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payat , ẍi ebnaj .
40016015	Isk'ambenpaxo Comam tet ebnaj : -- Haxaca hex ti' , ¿ mac anmahilinan heyalni ? ẍi Comam .
40016016	Istak'wi naj Sim'on Pedro : -- Hach ti' , Cristo hach , Isc'ahol Comam Dios itzitz , ẍi naj .
40016017	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Sim'on , isc'ahol naj Jon'as , caw sak'al hawet yuto hune' maxawal ti' mach anmaho chiyenilo tawet . Walxinto ha' Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ , ha' chiak'ni hatxumu' .
40016018	Haquinpaxtu'an chiwalan tato Pedro chijcano habi . Yiban̈ hune' ch'en niman ch'en ti' chiwacan̈an wiglesiahan , machi xin chik'oji camical istan̈tzeniloj .
40016019	Chiwacanicojan lawe tawet yun̈e chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Ha' tzet mach t'in̈ano yeco yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' hawalni , mach t'in̈ano chucano yul satcan̈ . Haxa tzet t'in̈an yeco sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' hawalni , hune' tu' t'in̈an chucano yul satcan̈ , ẍi Comam .
40016020	Lahwi yalni Comam huntek'an tu' xin , yalnicano Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tato machi bay chalic'o ebnaj tato ha' Comam Jes'us ha' ton Cristo .
40016021	Ha' yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' ichico Comam yalni tet ebnaj iscuywom tato yilal yul isya'tajil yiban̈ , yalni Comam haca' ti' : -- Caw yilal intohan bey Jerusal'en , cat xin yec'ya' wanmahan yu ebnaj ichamta winaj iswi'ehal con̈ob Israel , yeb yu ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es . Chinispotx'an ebnaj , yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic cat witzitzbican̈an hunelxa , ẍi Comam .
40016022	Hayet yaben naj Pedro hune' tu' , yawtenilo naj Comam Jes'us , iscachwa naj yin̈ Comam haca' ti' : -- Mamin , ¡ ha'ojab Comam Dios chachcolni yin̈ hune' isya'tajil tu' ! Machojab chachyaco yul isk'ab , ẍi naj .
40016023	Ist'an̈xico Comam yin̈ naj , yalni Comam : -- Ach matzwalil , elan̈ yin̈ insatan yuto chachoc quinhawak'a' ayc'ayojan , wal xin maẍtaj ha' tzet nabil yu Comam Dios chiec' yin̈ hanabal , walxinto haca' tzet chisna anma ha' chiec' yin̈ hanabal , ẍi Comam .
40016024	Lahwi tu' yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Tato ay hunu mac choche chioc incuywomojan , caw matxahojab yeto isba ischuquil , yeb xin caw hinanojab yaben isya'tajil win̈an . Ta hinan yetan yanma haca' tu' ec'ojab tzujtzun wintajan .
40016025	Yuto ha' mac mach hinan iscam win̈an yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , chisc'ayto isk'inal mach istan̈bal . Wal mac chishin isba iscam win̈an xin chischah isk'inal yin̈ huneln̈e .
40016026	K'inalo ta ay hunu mac chik'oji ismajnilo sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yaj ta chisc'ayto isk'inal mach istan̈bal , ¿ tzettaxca chischah hune' mac tu' selelo isk'inal chisc'ayto tu' ?
40016027	Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chinhulan yeb isk'ak'al yip Inmaman yeb ebnaj 'angel , cat wak'nihan ispaj selel tet hunun anma , hatatic'a tzet chiswatx'e .
40016028	Yin̈ caw yeli , chiwalan teyet , ay haywan̈ mac texol ti' maẍto chicami masanto chiyil wulan cat wocan Yahawoj , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40017001	Wajebxa tz'ayic xin , ishec'nilo isba Comam Jes'us xol anma yinito Comam naj Pedro , naj Jacobo yeb yuẍtaj , ha' ton naj Juan , yin̈ iswi' hune' witz caw nahat yecan̈ .
40017002	Ha' bey tu' xin ishel isba yillax yin̈ Comam , caw toxan̈e chitzejtzon sat Comam haca' tz'ayic . Wal xil isk'ap Comam xin , caw sajhopon̈e elicoj .
40017003	Lan̈antotic'a xin yilni ebnaj naj El'ias yeb naj Mois'es , lan̈an istzotel ebnaj yeb Comam .
40017004	Yalnican̈ naj Pedro tet Comam Jes'us : -- Mamin , caw c'ul ta wal je bey ti' , ta chisje hac'ul chu cowatx'enan̈ oxebo niẍte pat ; hunu hawet , hunu yet naj Mois'es , yeb hunu yet naj El'ias ti' , ẍi naj Pedro .
40017005	Hayet lan̈an yalni naj Pedro hune' tu' xin , yayilo hune' moyan caw sajhopon̈e , yoc hoyno yin̈ ebnaj yeb Comam . Yaben ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' hune' yul nuk'e xol moyan tu' yalni haca' ti' : -- Ha' naj ti' Inc'aholan caw xahan ay wuhan , caw chintzalahan yin̈ naj ; abewe tzet chal naj , ẍiayti xol moyan .
40017006	Hayet yaben ebnaj oxwan̈ iscuywom Comam hune' tu' , caw xiwcan̈ ebnaj , yaycano xulno ebnaj sat tx'otx' .
40017007	Lahwi tu' , ishitzico Comam isc'atan̈ ebnaj , yanayo Comam isk'ab yiban̈ ebnaj , yalni Comam : -- Ahan̈wewanoj , mach chexxiwi , ẍi Comam .
40017008	Hayet yilniti ebnaj xin , matxa mac lin̈ancan̈ isc'atan̈ Comam .
40017009	Haxa yet lan̈an yayti Comam yin̈ iswi' hune' witz tu' yeb ebnaj iscuywom , yalni Comam : -- Machi bay cheyal hune' maxeyil ti' masanto yet chinitzitzbican̈an xol camom , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
40017010	Lahwi tu' isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin chal ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es tato yilal babel chul naj El'ias sata naj Cristo ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
40017011	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu' : -- Yeli hac tu' , yilal yul naj El'ias tu' babel yun̈e isnani isba anma cat yoc yin̈ istoholal .
40017012	Yaja' chiwalan teyet tato xahul naj El'ias tu' yaja' mach txumchalo naj yu ebnaj , yuxin iswatx'e ebnaj baytet yal isc'ul yin̈ naj El'ias tu' . Hac tu' xin chinutelaxan Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , chiec'ya' wanmahan yu ebnaj , ẍi Comam .
40017013	Lahwi tu' xin , istxumchalo yu ebnaj tato ha' yin̈ naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma tzotel Comam .
40017014	Yet yayilo Comam yeb iscuywom xol anma xin , ishitzico hune' naj isc'atan̈ Comam , yay jahno naj sata Comam , yalni naj tet Comam :
40017015	-- Mamin , caw tz'ayojab hac'ul yin̈ inc'aholti'an yuto caw chilow hune' yaxcamic yin̈ naj , caw chiec'ya' yanma naj yu . Tx'i'alxa el chito naj yul k'a' yeb xol ha ha' .
40017016	Mawitijan naj tet ebnaj hacuywom ti' , yaja' xin machi yu yak'ni cawxo ebnaj naj , ẍi naj tet Comam .
40017017	Istak'wi Comam : -- Hex ti' , caw mach cheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , caw tx'ojexcanoj . Caw nimanxa tiempo ayinic'ojan texol . ¿ Hantatoc'anab tiempo chextecha wuhan ? Caw ya'xa wanmahan heyu . Iweti naj bey ti' , ẍi Comam .
40017018	Ischejnilo Comam ischejab naj matzwalil ayco yin̈ naj tzeh tu' . Lan̈antotic'a xin iscawxilo naj .
40017019	Haxa yet ischuquilxan̈e Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom tu' , isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mamin , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin machi mayu jinilojan̈ ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj tzeh ti' ? ẍi ebnaj .
40017020	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yuto hex ti' ayto mach chiapni heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios . Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet ta chicawxi hec'ul yin̈ Comam Dios waxan̈ca txann̈e yeco heyanma yin̈ Comam haca'n̈e hunu nich'an yin̈atil te' mostaza , chu heyalni tet hunu witz haca' ti' : " Heq'uilo haba bey ti' , asi' hunuxa bayah , " ta quexchi , chisyije hune' witz tu' tzet cheyala . Sunil chu hewatx'eni ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios .
40017021	Yuto huntek'an ischejab naj matzwalil ti' , machi el yin̈ anma ta mach chextxahli yeb heyak'len wahil hetxahli tet Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40017022	Hayet yec' Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul ismajul Galilea , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chin'alaxicojan yul isk'ab anma .
40017023	Chinak'lax camojan , yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic xin cat witzitzbican̈an hunelxa , ẍi Comam . Hayet yaben ebnaj hune' tu' caw occano bisc'ulal yin̈ yanma ebnaj .
40017024	Hayet yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey con̈ob Capernaum , yapni ebnaj chiinilo ch'en tohlabal yin̈ yatut Comam Dios isc'atan̈ naj Pedro . Isk'amben ebnaj tet naj : -- ¿ Chimyak' naj chachcuyni istohlabal yin̈ yatut Comam Dios ? ẍi ebnaj .
40017025	Istak'wi naj Pedro : -- Ho' chitohlawi ya' , ẍi naj . Hayet yocto naj Pedro tu' yul n̈a ha' Comam babel k'amben tet naj : -- Sim'on , ¿ tzet chu hatxumni yin̈ hune' ti' ? Mac tet chisk'an ebnaj yahaw con̈ob ch'en tohlabal , ¿ ham tet yet con̈ob ebnaj , mato tet anma nan con̈obal ? ẍi Comam .
40017026	Istak'wi naj Pedro : -- Ha' anma nan con̈obal , ha' ch'ak'ni ch'en , ẍi naj . Yalni Comam : -- Ta hac tu' , ha' mac yuninaltic'a con̈ob yehi mach yilalo chak' ch'en .
40017027	Yaja' yun̈e mach ch'oc ishowal ebnaj jin̈ , asi' isti' ha' lago cat hawanayto ch'en ik'omati cay xol ha' . Ha' xin yul isti' no' babel cay chiahti hawu ayicto hune' ch'en melyu c'uxan isk'oji istohlan hawet yeb wetan . Chawiti ch'en cat hato hawak'nocano ch'en tet ebnaj chichahni ch'en tohlabal tu' , ẍi Comam tet naj Pedro .
40018001	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' , isk'ambe ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jes'us tet haca' ti' : -- ¿ Mac ec'bal yelapno xol anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios ? ẍi ebnaj .
40018002	Yawtenti Comam hune' nich'an unin yanico Comam xolbal ebnaj .
40018003	Yalni Comam : -- Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , ta mach chehel hebeybal , yeb ta mach cheyiyo heba haca' nich'an unin ti' , mach chu heyoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
40018004	Yuxin mac chiyiyo isba haca' nich'an unin ti' , ha' ec'bal yelapno xol mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
40018005	Yuxin ha' mac chichahni hunu nich'an unin yuto wetan yehi , haninan chinischahan , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40018006	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Ha' mac chiak'ni lectaho hunu mac uninto yanico isba yul ink'aban , c'ul isc'allaxico hunu niman isch'enal ch'en molino yet trigo yin̈ isnuk' , cat isk'ojlaxayto xol ha' mar , sata ta chioc yak'a' ayc'ayo hunu maca .
40018007	Caw bisc'ulal yet anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yuto hantan̈e tzet bay wal yayc'ayi . Wal tu' caw yeli , yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ayn̈etic'a yin̈ bay chayc'ay anma , yaja' xin c'anch'an mac chiak'ni ayc'ayo hunu maca .
40018008	Yuxin tato hek'ab maca heyoj chexak'ni ayc'ayo yin̈ istx'ojal , c'ulmi hetzoc'niltoj cat hek'ojnito nahat . Waxan̈ca matxa tz'ajano henimanil yet chechahni hek'inal mach istan̈bal ec'balto c'ul sata ta tz'ajan henimanil yet chexalaxto xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal .
40018009	Ta isbak' hesat chexak'ni ayc'ayo xin , c'ulmi heyiniltij cat hek'ojnito nahat , wal xin waxan̈ca hunxan̈e isbak' hesat ayicto yet chechahni hek'inal mach istan̈bal sak'almi heyet sata ta chexalaxto xol k'a k'a' yeb iscabil isbak' hesat , ẍi Comam .
40018010	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Nann̈e heyu , tajca chehinc'uln̈e hunu mac uninto yanico isba yul ink'aban , chiwalan teyet , ebnaj 'angel chitan̈en ebnaj ti' ayco ebnaj yin̈ sat Inmaman yul satcan̈ ,
40018011	yuto Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , hulnajinan insaya'an mac c'aynatoj .
40018012	K'inalo ta ay hunu naj ay cien isme' cat xin isc'ayto hunu no' , ¿ mataxca xin mach chacano naj no' noventa y nueve , cat isto naj issayno no' c'aynato tu' ?
40018013	Yaja' ta chiilcha no' yu naj xin , yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet tato ec'balto chitzala naj yin̈ no' c'aynatic'ato tu' sata yin̈ no' noventa y nueve mach c'aynahotoj .
40018014	Hac tu' Comam ay yul satcan̈ , mach chisje isc'ul tato ay hunu mac uninto yul ink'aban chic'aytoj , ẍi Comam . Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us :
40018015	-- Ta ay hunu hawuẍta chiwatx'en hunu istx'ojal tawin̈ , as tzotelan̈ tet naj hachuquil , cat xin hacachni naj . Ta chabeto naj tzet chawala , yocxa ak'anc'ulal texol chal tu' .
40018016	Yaja' ta mach chabeto naj tzet chawala , awteti hunuj maca cawan̈o mac chito tawintaj , haxinwal chiwatx'icanayo tzet cheyal tu' yin̈ sat cawan̈ maca oxwan̈ testigo .
40018017	Yaja' ta mach chabeto naj yin̈ haca' tu' , hal tet ebnaj juẍtaj . Taca mach chabeto naj tzet chal ebnaj juẍta tu' xin , haca' hunu mac mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios , hac tu' chucano naj yul hesat , maca haca' hunu ebnaj chiinilo ch'en tohlabal .
40018018	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , sunil tzet chec'alba yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chic'albalaxpaxo yul satcan̈ , yebpaxo tzet chepuhilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , chipuhlaxpaxo yul satcan̈ .
40018019	Chiwalpaxojan teyet : Tato ay cawan̈ojex hun chu hek'anni hunu tzet ye tu' yin̈ hetxah tet Comam Dios yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chiak'lax teyet yu Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ .
40018020	Yuxin ha' bay chiscutxba isba cawan̈ maca oxwan̈ mac yu yinayo isba wetan , ayinicojan xolbal , ẍi Comam .
40018021	Lahwi tu' , ishitzico naj Pedro isc'atan̈ Comam , isk'amben naj : -- Mamin , ta ay hunu wuẍtajan chiyaco ismul wetan , ¿ hayelmi chiwak' nimanc'ulalan yin̈ , tom hujel mato hantaj ? ẍi naj .
40018022	Istak'wi Comam : -- Mach chiwalan tawet tato hujeln̈e , walxinto hujel el chielto setenta chawak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ hawuẍtaj , ẍi Comam .
40018023	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Chiwalpaxojan teyet yin̈ anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , lahan haca' hune' naj rey ilni hanta isc'as ebnaj ismunlawom .
40018024	Hayet lan̈an yichico naj yilni hanta isc'as ebnaj tu' , yilaxti hune' naj caw ismilalxa isc'as tet naj .
40018025	Yaja' hune' naj tu' , mach chik'oji naj istohlan sunil isc'as tu' . Yuxin ischej naj rey tu' txon̈laxoto naj yeb yixal , yeb yuninal , yeb sunil tzet aya .
40018026	Wal naj ay isc'as tu' xin ay jahno naj sata naj rey , yoc naj yalno tet naj haca' ti' : " Mamin , caw niman chawute hac'ul win̈an hayeboxa tz'ayic , chink'uyayojan ch'en cat wak'nihan sunil inc'astu'an tawet , " ẍi naj .
40018027	Wal naj rey tu' , caw tz'aycan̈ isc'ul naj yin̈ naj , yak'ni tan̈o naj isc'as naj tu' sunil , isbejtzolax naj .
40018028	Haxa yet yelti naj sata naj rey tu' , yilnayo naj hune' naj yet munlawomal , ay xin hanic' isc'as naj tet naj . Yoc yachno naj yin̈ isnuk' naj , etzaxan̈e xin majayto ishak'o naj yu naj , yalni naj tet naj : " Tinan̈ xin chawacanayo hac'as wetan , " ẍi naj .
40018029	Wal naj ay isc'as tu' ay jahno naj yin̈ sat naj , yalni naj tet naj : " Mamin , niman chawute hac'ul , hawechman hayeboxa tz'ayic , chink'uyayojan ch'en cat wak'ni inc'astu'an tawet , " ẍi naj .
40018030	Yaja' naj bay ay isc'as naj tu' , mach yabeto naj tzet yal naj , walxinto yito naj naj tet naj alcal , yalaxicto naj yul preso masanto yak'cano naj sunil isc'as tu' .
40018031	C'uxan xin ay huntek'an ebnaj yet munlawomal naj ilni hune' tu' , caw xin tac isc'ul ebnaj , yuxin to ebnaj yala' tet naj rey yin̈ tzet yu tu' .
40018032	Hayet yaben naj rey hune' tu' , yanito naj yawtemal naj . Yalni naj tet naj : " Hach ti' caw mach hawalil , wak' nimanc'ulalan yin̈ hac'as yuto hak'an nimanc'ulal wetan .
40018033	Estam xin matz'ay hac'ul yin̈ hawet munlawomal tu' haca' mayu istz'ay inc'ulan tawin̈ , " ẍi naj .
40018034	Caw xin tit ishowal naj rey tu' yin̈ naj , ischejni naj yalaxocto naj tx'oj tu' yul preso masanto istohlacano naj sunil isc'as tu' , ẍi Comam .
40018035	Yalnipaxo Comam haca' ti' : -- Hac tu' chute Inmaman ay yul satcan̈ teyin̈ tato mach cheyak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ sunil heyanma yin̈ heyuẍta chaco ismul teyet , ẍi Comam .
40019001	Lahwi yalnicano Comam Jes'us huntek'an cuybanile tu' xin , yel Comam yul ismajul Galilea , isto Comam yul ismajul tx'otx' Judea isk'axepic'to ha' Jord'an .
40019002	Caw xin hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam , hac tu' xin yu yak'ni cawxo Comam anma ya'ay .
40019003	Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj fariseo apni isc'atan̈ Comam , yoc ebnaj yilweno Comam yun̈e yayc'ay yin̈ hunu ismul , isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mamin , ¿ chimyu ispohni isba hunu naj yeb yixal waxan̈ca yu hunu comon tzet ye tu' ? ẍi ebnaj .
40019004	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala tato hayet iswatx'encano Comam Dios anma , iswatx'e Comam Dios naj winaj , iswatx'enpaxo Comam ix ix ?
40019005	Yalni Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Yuxin chacano naj winaj ismam yeb ismi' cat ishunbancano isba naj yeb yixal , hac tu' xin hunxan̈e anmahil chielcanico iscawan̈il , ẍicano Comam .
40019006	Yuxin matxa cawan̈o anmahil yehi , to hunxan̈e chielcanicoj . Yuxin ha' mac chishunba Comam Dios machi hunu mac chu ispohni , " ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40019007	Isk'ambenpaxo ebnaj fariseo tu' tet Comam : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin yalcano naj Mois'es tato chu yak'lax te' hum yet pohlebahil tet ix ixale cat yalaxcano ix yu yichamil ? ẍi ebnaj .
40019008	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yu hetx'ojal yuxin yal naj Mois'es hune' tu' ta chu hepohlencano heba yeb heyixal . Wal yet yichebanil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , mach haco tu' ye yu Comam Dios .
40019009	Yuxin chiwalan teyet , ha' mac chibejnicano yixal , yaja' ta mach taj yu issayni ix hunuxa winaj , cat ismohyipaxo naj yeb hunuxa ix , yin̈ haca' tu' chaco naj ismul yul sat Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .
40019010	Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam haca' ti' : -- Tato matxa chu copohni coba yeb jixal , c'ulmi mach chijik' jixal chal tu' , ẍi ebnaj .
40019011	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yaja' mach sunilo mac chiijcha yu yin̈ hune' cheyal ti' , wal xin han̈c'an̈e mac yettic'a yehi .
40019012	Ay ebnaj maẍtic'a tz'ajano isnimanil yettic'a chipitzc'ahi , yuxin mach chu yik'ni ebnaj yixal . Aypaxo ebnaj yet anmahil chiuteni , yuxin mach chu yik'nipaxo ebnaj yixal . Aypaxo ebnaj xin yu ismunla yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios yuxin machi yixal . Yuxin ha' mac chitecha yu , machojab chik' yixal , ẍi Comam .
40019013	Lahwi tu' xin , yilaxti haywan̈ niẍte unin isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us yu yanayo Comam isk'ab yiban̈ , yebpaxo yu istxahli Comam yin̈ . Wal ebnaj iscuywom Comam xin , oc ebnaj iscacha' anma ik'n̈e niẍte unin tu' .
40019014	Yuxin yal Comam tet ebnaj : -- Mach checach istit niẍte unin ti' inc'atan̈an , yuto ha' mac chaco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios haca' yeco yanma niẍte unin ti' yin̈ ismam ismi' , ha' chu yoc yul isk'ab Comam ay yul satcan̈ , ẍi Comam .
40019015	Yanayo Comam Jes'us isk'ab yiban̈ iswi' niẍte unin tu' , lahwi tu' xin isto Comam .
40019016	Ay hune' naj tzeh apni isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us , isk'amben naj tet Comam : -- Mam cuywawom , ¿ tzet hunu c'ul inwatx'enan yun̈e inchahnihan k'inale mach istan̈bal ? ẍi naj .
40019017	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet naj : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin chak'ambe wetan yin̈ tzet ye tu' c'ul ? Wal xin hune'n̈e mac c'ul . Yaj ta chawoche hachab hak'inal mach istan̈bal , yije chejbanile ak'bilcano yu naj Mois'es , ẍi Comam .
40019018	Isk'amben naj haca' ti' : -- ¿ Baytet xin huntek'an chejbanile chawal ti' ? ẍi naj . Yalni Comam : -- Mach chachpotx'wahi , mach chachixli yebpaxo mach chachelk'awi , yeb mach chahobcan̈ lek'ti'al yin̈ hawet anmahil .
40019019	Yije tzet chal hamam , hami' , yebpaxo xin xahan chawil hawet anmahil haca' haya'iln̈en haba , ẍi Comam tet naj .
40019020	Istak'wi naj tet Comam : -- Sunil huntek'an chawal ti' yijebiltic'a wuhan yichitaxtic'a inch'ibcan̈an . ¿ Tzet hunuxa wal inyijenan ? ẍi naj .
40019021	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Yaja' ta chawoche chachoccano c'ulal , as txon̈to sunil tzet ayach , cat hapohnican̈ istohol yin̈ anma meba' , haxinwal ay hak'alomal yul satcan̈ . Lahwi tu' cat hawoccano tzujno wintajan , ẍi Comam .
40019022	Hayet yaben naj tzeh tu' yalni Comam haca' tu' , ispaxto naj yin̈ bisc'ulal yuto caw k'alomcano naj sic'lebil .
40019023	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , caw ya'ta yoc anma k'alom yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
40019024	Chiwalpaxojan teyet , haca' hunu no' camello tinan̈ , ¿ tom subutaj yec'to no' yul isholanil hunu ch'en acuẍa ? Hac tu' ye anma k'alom , caw ya'ta yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .
40019025	Hayet yaben ebnaj iscuywom Comam hune' tu' caw c'ayilo isc'ul ebnaj , yalni ebnaj tet hunun : " Ta hac tu' , ¿ mactaxca chicolchahi ? " ẍi ebnaj .
40019026	Yoc t'an̈no Comam yin̈ ebnaj , yalni Comam : -- Hune' ti' mach chik'oji anma iswatx'eni , wal Comam Dios sunil tzet chu iswatx'en Comam , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40019027	Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam : -- Mamin , han̈on̈ti'an̈ bejbilcano sunil tzet ayon̈an̈ yu joc tzujnojan̈ tawintaj , ¿ yuxin tzet chicochahan̈ ispajoj ? ẍi naj .
40019028	Yalni Comam : -- Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , yet chiapni istiempohal yet chiac'bilo sunil tzet ye tu' , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios chinoc tz'on̈nojan yul incapilan caw c'ulch'ancanoj . Haxa hex chexec' tzujtzun wintati'an , chexoc tz'on̈no yul hunun hecapil , cat heyoc heyilni yin̈ tzet chielico cablahon̈eb majan ebnaj Israel .
40019029	Yuxin mac chisbejcano yatut wuhan maca yuẍtaj , yanab , maca ismam , maca ismi' , maca yuninal , maca istx'otx' ; huntek'an mac tu' caw ec'balto tx'i'al ispaj selel chiak'lax tet , yeb chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal .
40019030	Ha' mac caw ay yelapno ye tinan̈ , yet chiapni hune' tiempohal tu' , caw matxa yelapno chielicoj . Haxa mac machi yelapno ye tinan̈ chijute jilni , yet chiapni hune' tiempohal tu' caw aycano yelapno chielcanicoj , ẍi Comam .
40020001	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Anma chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios lahan haca' hunu naj yahaw munil to yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayal issaya' isc'amte' chimunla xol te' uva .
40020002	Hayet yilcha huntek'an ebnaj yu naj , yalni naj tato hune' denario chak' naj yin̈ tz'ayic tet hunun ebnaj , lahwi tu' isto ebnaj munlaho xol yuva naj .
40020003	Yin̈mi ch'en balon̈eb yin̈ yet yalan̈ chuman isto naj yul txon̈bal , yilni naj huntek'anxa ebnaj mach ismunil .
40020004	Yalni naj tet ebnaj : " Ay munil inc'atan̈an , chexintohlahan haca'tic'a caw yehi , " ẍi naj . Istopaxo ebnaj munil xol yuva naj .
40020005	Naj yahaw munil tu' elpaxto naj yin̈ chumanil , yeb yin̈ ch'en oxeb , hactic'apax tu' yute yalni naj tet huntek'anxa ebnaj ilcha yu .
40020006	Yin̈xa ch'en howeb xin , istopaxo naj txon̈bal hunelxa , yilni naj huntek'an ebnaj chiec' bey tu' mach ismunil . Isk'amben naj tet ebnaj : " ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin ton̈e chiec' tz'ayic teyiban̈ bey ti' ? " ẍi naj .
40020007	Istak'wi ebnaj : " Mamin , to machi mac chiak'ni yet comunilan̈ , " ẍi ebnaj . Yalni naj tet ebnaj : " Ta chisje hec'ul asi'we munil wintajan , chexintohlahan haca' caw yehi , " ẍi naj . Isto ebnaj munil yinta naj .
40020008	Haxa yin̈ k'ejbiyal xin , yalni naj yahaw munil tu' tet naj chiilni ismunil haca' ti' : " Awte sunil ebnaj munlawom cat hatohlan ebnaj . Ebnaj maoc munil yin̈ islahobal , ha' ebnaj chatohla babel . Wal ebnaj caw sahab maichico ismunla xin , islahobal chatohla ebnaj , " ẍi naj yahaw munil tu' .
40020009	Lahwi tu' xin yawtelax ebnaj oc munil yin̈ ch'en howeb , ha' ebnaj babel tohlalaxi , hune' denario ak'lax tet hunun ebnaj .
40020010	Haxa yet yawtelax ebnaj ichico munil yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayal , ham yalni ebnaj tato ec'bal istohol ebnaj chiak'laxi , yaja' machoj , hune'n̈e denario ak'laxpaxo tet hunun ebnaj .
40020011	Hayet ischahni ebnaj istohol tu' yichico ebnaj isbuchwa yin̈ naj yahaw munil tu' ,
40020012	yalni ebnaj : " Ebnaj mahul yet islahobalxa ti' hunxan̈e hora mamunla ebnaj , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin lahan cotoholan̈ maxawak' yeb ebnaj ? Han̈on̈ti'an̈ ec'bal macon̈munlahan̈ , yeb xin caw majak' janmahan̈ xol k'a' , " ẍi ebnaj .
40020013	Istak'wi naj yahaw munil tu' tet hune' naj haca' ti' : " Hach wet anmahil , mach chinetlihan tawin̈ yuto majala tato hune' denario chintohlahan hatz'ayic .
40020014	Wal xin mawak'an hatohol , paxan̈toj . Ta chiwochehan ta lahan chik' ebnaj lan̈oxa maoc munil yebex , mach hawoc yin̈ hune' tu' .
40020015	Haninti'an chu wak'nihan inmelyuhan tet mac bay chiwochehan , ¿ mato chichiwa hac'ul yu c'ul inc'ulan ? " ẍi naj yahaw munil tu' .
40020016	Yuxin ha' mac babel tinan̈ , ha' chicancano yin̈ islahobal , wal mac islahobal ye tinan̈ , ha' chioc yin̈ babel . Hantan̈e mac awtebil yu Comam Dios , yaja' haywan̈n̈e mac sic'bililoj , ẍi Comam .
40020017	Yet ayxaco Comam Jes'us yeb anma yin̈ isbel bey Jerusal'en , yawtenilo Comam ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom , yalni Comam tet ebnaj :
40020018	-- Tinan̈ xin lan̈an coto bey Jerusal'en , yaja' Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , chin'alaxicojan yul isk'ab ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es cat isk'anni ebnaj camical wiban̈an .
40020019	Chilahwi tu' cat quinyanicojan ebnaj yul isk'ab ebnaj mach Israeloj , cat isbuchwa ebnaj win̈an , cat quinismak'nihan ebnaj . Chilahwi tu' cat quinyanican̈an ebnaj yin̈ te' culus , yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic cat witzitzbican̈an hunelxa , ẍi Comam .
40020020	Yet hune' tiempohal tu' apni ismi' ebnaj isc'ahol icham Zebedeo ilwal yin̈ Comam Jes'us . Tzujan xin ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yinta ismi' , yay jahno ixnam sata Comam yuto ay hune' tzet choche ixnam isk'ana' .
40020021	Isk'amben Comam tet ixnam : -- Miyay , ¿ tzet chawoche hak'ana' wetan ? ẍi Comam . Istak'wi ixnam : -- Mamin , yet chachoc Yahawoj chink'anan tawet tato cawan̈ wuninti'an chioc tac'atan̈ . Hunu naj chioc tz'on̈no yin̈ hawatx'k'ab , hunuxa naj chioc tz'on̈no yin̈ hameck'ab , ẍi ixnam .
40020022	Istak'wi Comam : -- Hex ti' mach heyohtajo tzet chek'ana . ¿ Chimyu heyuc'ni hune' vaso ha ha' caw c'ah haca' hune' chiwuc'an ? ẍi Comam . Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Ho' , chu juc'nihan̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
40020023	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj xin : -- Yeltoni chu heyuc'ni hune' vaso ha ha' caw c'ah chiwalti'an , yaja' wal haninti'an mach wetojan walnihan mac chiay tz'on̈no yin̈ inwatx'k'aban yeb yin̈ inmeck'aban , to han̈e Inmaman ohtan̈e mac tet chak'a , ẍi Comam .
40020024	Hayet yaben ebnaj lahon̈wan̈xa iscuywom Comam , caw tit ishowal ebnaj yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu' .
40020025	Yet yilni Comam hune' tu' , yawtenico Comam ebnaj isc'atan̈ , yalni Comam : -- Hex ti' caw heyohtaj tato ebnaj ayco yahawo con̈ob , ay yip ebnaj yiban̈ con̈ob tu' . Haxa ebnaj nime winaj yul con̈ob yahawxa chute isba ebnaj yin̈ anma .
40020026	Wal texol xin mach c'uluj tato hac tu' cheyute , wal xin ta ay hunu mac ec'bal yelapno ye chabe , ahojab chioc chejaboj .
40020027	Haxa mac choche ec'bal yelapno chuco texol xin , yak'abico isba chejaboj .
40020028	Hac tu' wehan Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , mach hulnajojinan yu inchejnihan anma , walxinto haca' chejab wecojan xol anma , cat wak'ni camo inbahan hac tu' xin chu intohlanan ismul tx'i'al anma , ẍi Comam .
40020029	Hayet yel Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom yul con̈ob Jeric'o , caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam .
40020030	Ay xin cawan̈ ebnaj mach chu yilni , tz'on̈anayo isti' beh . Hayet yaben ebnaj tato ha' Comam Jes'us lan̈an yec'toj , yahwi ebnaj tet Comam yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' : -- Mamin , yuninal isc'ahol naj rey David , caw tz'ayojab hac'ul jin̈an̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
40020031	Yaja' xin oc anma iscacha' ebnaj yun̈e isbejni ebnaj yel yaw , yaj caw islahico ebnaj yahwi , yalnipaxo ebnaj : -- Mamin , isc'ahol jichmam David , caw tz'ayojab hac'ul jin̈an̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
40020032	Yet yaben Comam Jes'us hune' tu' yoc lin̈noj , yawtenti Comam ebnaj isc'atan̈ , isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Tzet cheyoche chinwatx'ehan ? ẍi Comam .
40020033	Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Mamin , chijochehan̈ chawak' hajlo cosatan̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
40020034	Istz'aycan̈ isc'ul Comam yin̈ ebnaj ; yanico Comam isk'ab yin̈ isbak'sat ebnaj , yin̈n̈ena tu' xin ishajlo issat ebnaj , yoc tzujno ebnaj yinta Comam .
40021001	Hayet ayto yapni Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj iscuywom bey Jerusal'en yapni Comam bey Betfag'e , iscawilal won̈an Olivo . Ischejnito Comam cawan̈ ebnaj iscuywom ,
40021002	yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Asi'we bey aldea cosatac'to ti' , yet chexapno bey tu' cheyila' hune' no' mi'e burro xecan , ayco yunin no' isc'atan̈ ; chepuholo no' cat heyinoti no' wetan .
40021003	Yaja' ta ay tzet chihallax teyin̈ xin , cheyala' haca' ti' : " Ay chiocnico no' yu Comam Jes'us , yaja' chon̈hulan̈ jak'a'paxojan̈ no' , " quexchi , ẍi Comam .
40021004	Hac tu' yu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat haca' ti' :
40021005	Halwe tet anma ay yul con̈ob Si'on haca' ti' : Ilwec'anabi , lan̈an yul hereyal texol , hune' heyahaw ti' caw c'ul isc'ul , ayahto yiban̈ hune' no' tzeh burro , yunin hune' no' mi'e burro ijtzom , ẍiayoj .
40021006	Isto ebnaj cawan̈ tu' , isyijen ebnaj haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam .
40021007	Yet yapni ebnaj bey tu' ispuhnilo ebnaj no' mi'e burro tu' , yiniti ebnaj no' yeb no' yunin tet Comam . Islitx'banahto ebnaj xil isk'ap isk'an̈o yichin̈ no' tzeh burro tu' , lahwi tu' yahto Comam yiban̈ no' .
40021008	Caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam , ay mac islebayo xil isk'ap yul beh . Aypaxo mac inilo xaj te te' yanayo yul beh bay chiec'to Comam tu' .
40021009	Sunil anma babelico sata Comam yeb tzujanico yintaj , ichico yawi yin̈ caw ip , chalni haca' ti' : -- ¡ Caw niman yelapno naj ti' , ha' naj ti' titna yin̈ yuninal jichmam rey David ! ¡ Jala'we tzoti' c'ul yin̈ mac chihul coxol yu Comam Dios ! ¡ Jak'a'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios ay satcan̈ ! ẍi anma .
40021010	Hayet yapni Comam bey Jerusal'en , iswejchacan̈ anma sunil , isk'ambeni : -- ¿ Mac anmahil hune' naj ti' ? ẍi anma .
40021011	Istak'wi huntek'anxa ebnaj : -- Ha' naj ti' Jes'us , ischejab Comam Dios ay bey Nazaret yul ismajul Galilea , ẍi ebnaj .
40021012	Lahwi tu' xin yocto Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios , istzumbenilti sunil anma chitxon̈wi yeb chilok'wi bey tu' . Iswacchancan̈ Comam ismeẍa ebnaj helom melyu , ispac'chanpaxocan̈ Comam isẍila ebnaj txon̈om palamuch .
40021013	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Ha' watutan yet txah yehi , " ẍiayoj . Yaja' hex ti' haca' hunu isn̈ach'en elk'om , hac tu' ye heyu , ẍi Comam .
40021014	Hayet ayicto Comam yul yatut Comam Dios tu' yapni huntek'an ebnaj mach chu yilni yeb ebnaj tx'oj ye yoj ; yak'ni cawxo Comam ebnaj .
40021015	Hayet yilni ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ ley huntek'an c'aybalc'ule iswatx'e Comam tu' caw tit ishowal ebnaj ; yeb yet yaben ebnaj yalni niẍte unin : " Jak'aweco ismay isc'ahol jichmam rey David , " ẍi ,
40021016	yalni ebnaj tet Comam : -- ¿ Chimhawabe tzet chal niẍte unin ti' ? ẍi ebnaj . Istak'wi Comam : -- Ho' chiwabehan , yaja' ¿ tom maẍto bay cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti' ? : Ha' niẍte unin yeb niẍte chi-to-txutxwi ha' chak'an bitn̈eno habi , ẍiayoj , ẍi Comam .
40021017	Lahwi tu' yel Comam yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , isto yul con̈ob Betania , bey tu' xin cancano Comam hune' ak'bal .
40021018	Haxa hunxa tz'ayic yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayalil , ismeltzo Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Jerusal'en . Yet ayco Comam yin̈ isbel tu' isn̈ohchacan̈ .
40021019	Yilnito Comam hune' te' higuera isti' beh , isto Comam yich te' , yilni Comam ta machi sat te' , xajn̈e te' aycoj . Yalni Comam yin̈ te' haca' ti' : -- ¡ Matxa bak'inal chachsatni ! ẍi Comam . Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin istajilo te' .
40021020	Hayet yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam hune' tu' , caw c'aycan̈ isc'ul ebnaj , isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam : -- ¿ Tzet mayu istajnalo te' yin̈ an̈e ? ẍi ebnaj .
40021021	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , ta caw cheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , machi xin chicabcon hec'ul , maẍn̈etaj hune' mayu yin̈ te' higuera ti' chisje hewatx'eni . Wal xin tato cheyal tet hune' witz ti' : " Heq'uilo haba bey ti' cat hato hawanoyto haba xol ha' mar , " ta quexchi , chiyij isba tzet cheyala .
40021022	Yuxin ta yin̈ sunil heyanma chextxahli tet Comam Dios yet chek'anni hunu tzet ye tu' , chiak'lax teyet , ẍi Comam .
40021023	Lahwi tu' xin , yapni Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , yocto Comam yul yatut Comam Dios . Hayet lan̈an iscuywa Comam xin ishitzico ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj ichamta winaj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj Israel , isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam : -- ¿ Mac cachchejni hawatx'en huntek'an hawatx'e yet ewi ? ¿ Mac ak'ni hawip ? ẍi ebnaj .
40021024	Istak'wi Comam : -- Haquintu'an ay hune' ink'ambebalan teyet , ta chepajtze wetan chiwalan mac ak'n̈e wipan inwatx'enan huntek'an tu' .
40021025	¿ Mac chejniti naj Juan yanocan̈ ha' iswi' anma ? ¿ Tom Comam Dios mato ha' anma ? ẍi Comam . Yichico ebnaj yallen tet hunun haca' ti' : -- Tato chijala' ta Comam Dios chejniti naj Juan tu' , chimyala' naj jet : " ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin mach heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet yal naj ? " ẍim naj .
40021026	" Yaja' ta chijalpaxoj ta ha' anma chejn̈e naj , chon̈xiw jalni yuto sunil anma chianayto yul yanma tato naj Juan tu' ischejab Comam Dios ye naj , " ẍi ebnaj .
40021027	Yuxin tak'wi ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mach johtajojan̈ , ẍi ebnaj . Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Haquintu'an mach chiwalan mac ak'n̈e wipan inwatx'enan huntek'an tu' , ẍi Comam .
40021028	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj hunelxa : -- ¿ Tzet cheyute heyalni yin̈ hune' chiwalti'an ? Ay hune' naj mame ay cawan̈ isc'ahol ; yalni naj tet naj babel haca' ti' : " C'ahol , as munlahan̈ xol te' uva , " ẍi naj .
40021029	Istak'wi naj : " ¡ Mach chintohan ! " ẍi naj . Yaja' tzujanxa xin yoc yin̈ isnabal naj istohi .
40021030	Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo naj mame tu' tet naj iscab tato chitopaxo naj munil ; istak'wi naj : " C'ultic'a mam chintohan , " ẍi naj . Yaja' xin mach to naj .
40021031	¿ Mac xin najil yijen tzet yal ismam yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu' ? ẍi Comam . Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Naj babel , ẍi ebnaj . Yalni Comam : -- Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal yeb ebix ix tx'oj ye iswi' ha' chioc babel yul isk'ab Comam Dios tesataj .
40021032	Yuto hulic'o naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma quexiscuyu' yin̈ isc'ulal , yaja' mach heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet yal naj . Wal ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal yeb ebix tx'oj ye iswi' yayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal naj . Wal hex ti' xin , waxan̈ca caw heyil huntek'an tu' yaja' mach hehel hebeybal , yeb xin mach heyayto yul heyanma , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40021033	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj : -- Abewe hune'xa yechel chiwalti'an : " Ay hune' naj yahaw munil tz'unni te' uva sat istx'otx' , ispenayo naj istz'unub tu' . Iswatx'en naj bay chiyatz'lax yal te' , iswatx'enpaxocan̈ naj hune' n̈a nimajal yucan̈ istel yun̈e istan̈elax hune' peyab tu' . Lahwi tu' xin , yanito naj istz'unub tu' comonal tet huntek'an ebnaj . Isto naj yul hune'xa con̈ob caw nahat .
40021034	Haxa yet yapni istiempohal yuxlax te' uva tu' xin , yanito naj huntek'an ischejab ischahno ismajul tet ebnaj munlawom tu' .
40021035	Hayet yapni ebnaj chejab tu' xin , yoc ebnaj istzabnoyo ebnaj , ismak'ni ebnaj hune' naj , hunxa naj mak'bil ispotx'ni ebnaj , haxa hunxa naj xin k'ojlaxcan̈ naj .
40021036	Haxa yin̈ iscayel ec'balxa ebnaj chejab yato naj yahaw munil , yaja' xin hactic'apax tu' utelax ebnaj yu ebnaj munlawom tu' .
40021037	Yin̈xa istzujanil xin , ha' caw isc'ahol naj yahaw munil tu' yatoj , istxumni naj haca' ti' : ` Wal tet naj inc'aholti'an chimisyije ebnaj , ' ẍi naj .
40021038	Yaja' hayet yilni ebnaj yapni naj c'ahole tu' , yalni ebnaj tet hunun : ` Ha' tet naj ti' chicancano hune' tx'o tx'otx' ti' , wal tinan̈ copotx'owe camo naj haxinwal jetxa chuco hune' istx'otx' naj ti' , ' ẍi ebnaj .
40021039	Yoc ebnaj istzabnoyo naj , yilaxilto naj yintalto peyab tu' yu ebnaj , ispotx'ni ebnaj naj , " ẍi Comam .
40021040	Isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yet chihul naj yahaw munil tu' , ¿ tzettaxca chute naj ebnaj munlawom tu' cheyute heyalni ? ẍi Comam .
40021041	Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Matxa chitz'ay isc'ul naj ispotx'ni ebnaj munlawom tx'oj tu' , cat yanito naj istz'unub tu' comonal tet huntek'anxa ebnaj munlawom tz'ajan chu yak'ni ismajul yet chiuxlax sat te' uva tu' , ẍi ebnaj .
40021042	Yalni Comam Jes'us : -- ¿ Tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti' ? : Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en mach isje ebnaj watx'emcan̈ n̈a yak'aco yin̈ ismunil , ha' ch'en caw ec'balto c'ul yoc xe'o n̈a . Ha' Comam watx'en̈e hune' tu' , caw xin chic'ay coc'ul jilni , ẍiayoj .
40021043	Yuxin chiwalan teyet ta nanxa con̈obal chioc yul isk'ab Comam Dios heseleloj , yuto yijem anma tu' yak'ni ismajul yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e tet Comam .
40021044	Wal hune' ch'en ch'en tu' , ta ay mac chiayc'ay yiban̈ ch'en hayebtam isk'ahilal chioqui . Yaja' ta ha' ch'en chiayc'ay yiban̈ , chiquechmoto yalan̈ ch'en , ẍi Comam .
40021045	Hayet yaben ebnaj iswi'ehal ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj fariseo yalni Comam haca' tu' , istxumni ebnaj tato yin̈ ebnaj yal Comam huntek'an yechel tu' .
40021046	Yuxin yoche ebnaj istzabayo Comam , yaja' xiw ebnaj tet anma yuto sunil anma chalni tato ischejab Comam Dios ye Comam Jes'us .
40022001	Yichipaxico Comam Jes'us yalni tet ebnaj , yanico Comam huntek'an yechel yin̈ cuybanile tu' , yalni Comam haca' ti' :
40022002	-- Ha' anma awtebil yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , lahan haca' yak'le anma yin̈ hune' k'in̈ yec'tze hune' naj rey yet ismohyi isc'ahol .
40022003	Hayet c'ulxa ye sunil , yanito naj ischejab yik'ati ebnaj awtebil yin̈ hune' mohyilal tu' . Yaja' machi hunu ebnaj isjetij .
40022004	Lahwi tu' yanipaxto naj huntek'anxa ischejab , yalni naj tet ebnaj haca' ti' : " Halwe tet anma awtebil tu' tato watx'ebilxa itah . Manchejan potx'laxo hayc'on̈ inwacaxan , yeb hunmajanxa no nok' caw bak'ich , watx'ebilxa sunil . ` Asi'we yin̈ k'in̈ tu' , ' quexchi , " ẍi naj rey .
40022005	Yaja' ebnaj awtebil tu' , maẍtic'a cam isc'ul ebnaj istita . Hune' naj to ilno ismunil , hunxa naj xin to ilno istxon̈ .
40022006	Haxa huntek'anxa ebnaj xin , oc ebnaj howal yin̈ ebnaj chejab tu' , ispotx'lax ebnaj yu ebnaj .
40022007	Hayet yaben naj rey hune' tu' caw tit ishowal naj . Ischejni naj issoldado ispotx'no ebnaj potx'wawom tu' , isn̈uslaxpaxilo iscon̈ob ebnaj .
40022008	Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo naj rey tu' tet huntek'anxa ebnaj ischejab : " Sunil tzet chiocnico yin̈ hune' k'in̈ ti' watx'ebilxa sunil , yaja' ebnaj awtebil wuhan mach chisjeti ebnaj , yuxin mach istzano ebnaj yul yin̈ hune' k'in̈ ti' .
40022009	Wal tinan̈ asi'we yulaj calle cat hechejniti sunil mac chiilcha heyu yin̈ hune' k'in̈ ti' , " ẍi naj .
40022010	Yet yaben ebnaj chejab hune' tu' , isto ebnaj yulaj calle , yiniti ebnaj sunil anma chiec' bey tu' . Ay anma c'ul isbeybal , ay anma tx'oj isbeybal . Caw xin nohilo te' n̈a yu anma yin̈ hune' k'in̈ tu' .
40022011	Hayet yocto naj rey yilno anma cutxanxaco tu' , yilni naj hune' naj mach ayoco xil isk'ap yet mohyilal .
40022012	Yalni naj rey tet naj : " ¿ Tzet mayu hawocti bey ti' , machi xin xil hak'ap yet mohyilal aycoj ? " ẍi naj . Yaja' xin maẍtic'a tak'wi naj .
40022013	Yalni naj rey tu' tet ebnaj ischejab : " C'albawe yoj hune' naj ti' yeb isk'ab naj cat heyanilto naj xol k'ejholo , ha' bey tu' xin chiok'o naj yin̈ , cat isn̈etx'laho yeh naj , " ẍi naj .
40022014	Wal xin chiwalan teyet , caw tx'i'al mac awtebil yu Comam Dios yaja' haywan̈n̈e mac chissiq'uilo Comam , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40022015	Lahwi tu' ishec'nilo isba ebnaj fariseo , islahti'n̈en isba ebnaj yin̈ tzet chu yak'ni ayc'ayo ebnaj Comam yin̈ hunu tzoti' , cat yoc ebnaj ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam yalni .
40022016	Yuxin yato ebnaj haywan̈ ebnaj ayco yin̈ ispartido , yeb haywan̈ ebnaj ayco yin̈ ispartido naj Herodes isc'atan̈ Comam , yun̈e yilwen ebnaj Comam . Yalni ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mam cuywawom , caw johtajan̈ tato hach ti' isyelaln̈etic'a chawala , chacuynipaxo anma iswatx'en haca' choche isc'ul Comam Dios . Machi xin comono chawabeto yin̈ tzet chal anma , yuto lahan yelapno anma yul hasat .
40022017	Yuxin , ¿ tzet chawute hawalni yin̈ hune' ti' : Ch'en tohlabal chiel jin̈ yu naj jahaw ay Roma , c'ulmi jak'ni ch'en mato machoj ? ẍi ebnaj .
40022018	Yaja' wal Comam Jes'us pet istxumnalo Comam tzet nabil yu ebnaj . Yuxin yal Comam : -- Hex cheyal heba c'ulal ti' , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin chesay yin̈ tzet chu wayc'ayan yul hek'ab ?
40022019	Yewe hunu ch'en melyu cheyak' yin̈ hetohlabal tu' wila'an nan̈ , ẍi Comam . Yak'ni ebnaj hune' ch'en denario tet Comam .
40022020	Isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Mac najil ayco yechel sat yeb isbi yin̈ ch'en ? ẍi Comam .
40022021	Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Yechel sat naj jahaw ay bey Roma , yeb xin isbi naj ayco yin̈ ch'en , ẍi ebnaj . Yalni Comam xin : -- Ak'we tet naj yahaw Roma , baytet yet naj yehi , cat heyak'ni tet Comam Dios baytet yet Comam yehi , ẍi Comam .
40022022	Yet yaben ebnaj yalni Comam hune' tu' , caw c'ayilo isc'ul ebnaj , isbejnicano ebnaj Comam .
40022023	Yin̈tic'a hune' tz'ayic tu' , ay huntek'an ebnaj saduceo bey ilno Comam Jes'us . Ebnaj saduceo tu' mach chayto ebnaj yul yanma tato itzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa , yuxin isk'ambe ebnaj tet Comam :
40022024	-- Mam cuywawom , halbilcano yin̈ isley naj Mois'es haca' ti' : " Ta chicam yichamil hunu ix ix , machi xin yuninal naj yeb ix , yilal yik'ni ix yuẍta naj camna tu' , yun̈e ay yuninal naj yeb ix cat yoc yuninalo naj camna tu' , " ẍiayoj .
40022025	Yaja' yet hunel , coxolti'an̈ ay hujwan̈ ebnaj yuẍtan̈e isba . Naj babel mohyi yeb hune' ix yaja' cam naj , machi xin yuninal naj yeb yixal tu' , yuxin mohyi naj iscab yeb ix .
40022026	Yaja' campaxo naj , hactic'apax tu' yu naj isyox , masanta apni yin̈ naj ishuj , sunil ebnaj ik'len ix .
40022027	Lahwi tu' iscampaxo ix .
40022028	Yuxin hayet chiitzitzbican̈ camom , ¿ mac ebnaj hujwan̈ tu' chioc yichamilo ix yuto ishujwan̈il ebnaj mohyi yeb ix ? ẍi ebnaj .
40022029	Istak'wi Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj saduceo tu' : -- Hex ti' , maẍtaj ha' ye heyu , yuto mach heyohtajo tzet chal yul Yum Comam Dios , yeb mach heyohtajo yip Comam .
40022030	Wal xin hayet chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom matxa chimohyi , yuto lahanxa chielico haca' ebnaj 'angel ay satcan̈ .
40022031	Yin̈ yet chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom tu' , ¿ tom maẍto cheyil yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti' ? :
40022032	" Haninti'an isDiosal naj Abraham , naj Isaac yeb naj Jacob , " ẍiayoj . Yuxin waxan̈ca cam ebnaj yaja' mach cam ebnaj yin̈ huneln̈e . Yuto mach isDiosalo camom ye Comam Dios to isDiosal anma itzitz , ẍi Comam .
40022033	Yet yaben anma huntek'an cuybanile yal Comam tu' caw c'ayilo isc'ul .
40022034	Yet yaben ebnaj fariseo tato matxa yu istak'wi ebnaj saduceo tet Comam Jes'us , iscutxbanico isba ebnaj .
40022035	Xol ebnaj tu' xin ayco hune' naj cuywawom yin̈ ley , ha' naj oc ilweno Comam , yalni naj :
40022036	-- Mam cuywawom , ¿ baytet chejbanile caw ec'bal yelapno xol chejbanile aycano yu naj Mois'es ? ẍi naj .
40022037	Istak'wi Comam tet naj : -- Ochewe Comam Dios yin̈ sunil hec'ul , heyanma yeb henabal .
40022038	Ha' xin hune' chejbanile tu' ha' babel yeb ec'bal yelapno xol huntek'anxa .
40022039	Ha' hune'xa iscab xin , lahan haca' hune' babel , chal haca' ti' : " Xahan cheyil heyet anmahil haca' hexahann̈en heba , " ẍiayoj .
40022040	Hayet chicoyijen cabeb chejbanile ti' , lan̈an coyijen huntek'anxa cuybanile ak'bilcano yu naj Mois'es , yeb tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios , ẍi Comam tet naj .
40022041	Hayet cutxantoco ebnaj fariseo tu' ,
40022042	isk'amben Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Tzet cheyute hetxumni yin̈ naj Cristo ? ¿ Mac yin̈ chitit naj heyalni ? ẍi Comam . Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Yin̈ naj rey David chitit naj , ẍi ebnaj .
40022043	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Yaja' naj David tu' , yal naj naj Cristo Yahawoj yet yak'lax yala' naj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo yet yalni naj haca' ti' :
40022044	Yal Comam Dios tet Wahawilan : " Ayan̈ tz'on̈no yin̈ inwatx'k'aban masanto chiwacojan mac ayco ishowal tawin̈ yalan̈ hawoj , " ẍi Comam , ẍi naj David .
40022045	¿ Tzet yin̈ xin yal naj David tu' naj Cristo Yahawiloj tato yin̈ naj titna naj ? ẍi Comam .
40022046	Machi hunu ebnaj yu istak'wi yin̈ tzet yal Comam . Ha'tic'a yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' xin matxatic'a hunu ebnaj hitzico isk'amben hunu tzet ye tu' tet Comam .
40023001	Lahwi tu' yalni Comam Jes'us tet anma yeb tet ebnaj iscuywom :
40023002	-- Ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ ley , ha' ismunil ebnaj tu' ha' ton quexiscuyni yin̈ isley Mois'es .
40023003	Yuxin sunil tzet chal ebnaj teyet yijewej , yaja' mach chebeybaln̈eto tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj , yuto ha' tzet chal ebnaj mach chisbeybaln̈e ebnaj .
40023004	Ha' cuybanil chak' ebnaj tet anma , lahan haca' hunu ijatz caw al , machi mac chik'oji yinican̈ . Wal ebnaj xin nitam hunu yiximal isk'ab ebnaj chishitzico yin̈ .
40023005	C'ul yub ebnaj , caw yijem chute isba ebnaj , yaja' yun̈e yillax ebnaj yu anma . Caw nimej chute ebnaj sat no' tz'um bay tz'ibn̈ebilico Istzoti' Comam Dios cat yanico ebnaj no' yin̈ isk'ab , maca yin̈ ispalan̈ . Chanipaxico ebnaj huntek'an xil isk'ap nimej ishojo isti' .
40023006	Yet chiawtelax ebnaj wa'o yin̈ k'in̈ , ha' huntek'an tz'on̈obal caw ay yelapnoj ha' chismajilo ebnaj , hac tu' chutepaxo ebnaj yulaj capilla .
40023007	Hayet chiec'paxo ebnaj yulaj calle yochebal ebnaj caw c'ul chu istioẍli anma tet ebnaj , yeb xin caw choche ebnaj yabe' tato chihallax cuywawomal yin̈ ebnaj .
40023008	Wal hex ti' xin , machojab cheyoche chihallax cuywawomal teyin̈ , yuto hune'n̈e mac hecuywawom , wal xin heyuẍtan̈e heba .
40023009	Machi hunu mac cheyal hemamo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yuto hune'n̈ech'an Hemam , ha' ton Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ .
40023010	Machojab cheyoche chihallax iswi'ehal teyin̈ , yuto hune'n̈e mac iswi'ehal yeco teyin̈ , ha' ton Comam Cristo .
40023011	Wal xin ha' mac ec'bal yelapno yehi , yak'abico isba chejabo texol .
40023012	Yuto ha' mac chican̈ isba , chiilaxayoj , wal mac chiyiyo isba xin , chiilaxcan̈ .
40023013	Hex cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb hex fariseo hex ti' , cheyal heba c'ulal , ¡ caw c'anch'anex ! yuto checach yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Mach cheyaco heba , machi xin chej'epaxo chioc mac choche yak'aco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
40023014	Hex cuywawom hex ti' yeb hex fariseo hex ti' , cheyal heba c'ulal , ¡ caw c'anch'anex ! yuto cheyilo yatut ebix hun ix , chilahwi tu' caw nimej cheyute yoj hetxah , haca'tan̈e mach istx'ojal chewatx'e . Wal xin caw ec'balto isya'tajil chiay teyiban̈ .
40023015	Hex cuywawom yin̈ ley yeb xin hex fariseo hex ti' cheyal heba c'ulal . ¡ Caw c'anch'anex ! yuto sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb yiban̈ ha' mar chelahwilo heyeq'ui yun̈e hemontenico anma teyintaj . Ha' mac chimoncha heyu tu' xin chisomchacanto yul iswi' heyu , cayel ec'balto chischah isya'tajil xol k'a k'a' tesataj .
40023016	Hex ti' lahanex haca' hunu mac mach chu yilni , yaja' cheyaco heba ijbalomal . ¡ Caw c'anch'anex ! Cheyalnipax haca' ti' : " Ta ay mac chiak'ni binaho yatut Comam Dios yet chistak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' yin̈ , mach yilalo chisyije . Yaj ta isbi ch'en oro ayicto yul yatut Comam chak' binaho yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' , caw yilal isyijeni , " quexchi .
40023017	¡ Caw suc hex ! Lahanex haca' anma mach chu yilni . ¿ Baytet ec'bal yelapno yehi ? ¿ Tom ch'en oro mato yatut Comam Dios ? Wal xin , yu yatut Comam Dios yuxin ay yelapno ye ch'en oro ayicto yul yatut tu' .
40023018	Cheyalnipaxoj : " Ta ay hunu mac chiak'ni binaho altar yet chistak'wenico hunu tzet ye tu' yiban̈ , mach yilalo chisyije . Yaja' ta isbi xahanbal ayahto yiban̈ altar tu' chak' binahoj , caw yilal chisyije , " quexchi .
40023019	¡ Caw lahanex yeb anma mutz'an sat ! ¿ Baytet caw ec'bal yelapno yehi ? ¿ Tom ha' xahanbal ayahto yiban̈ altar tu' , mato ha' altar hune' chianico ismay xahanbal tu' ?
40023020	Wal xin ha' mac chiak'ni binaho altar yin̈ tzet chala , ha' hun tzet ayahto yiban̈ altar tu' chak' binahoj .
40023021	Hacpax tu' mac chiak'ni binaho yatut Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chala , ha' hun Comam Dios ay bey tu' chak' binahoj .
40023022	Hacpax tu' mac chiak'ni binaho satcan̈ yin̈ tzet chala , ha' hun istz'on̈obal Comam Dios chiyak' binahoj , cat yak'nipaxo binaho Comam tz'on̈an yul yehobal tu' .
40023023	Hex cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb hex fariseo hex ti' , cheyal heba c'ulal . ¡ C'anch'anex ! cheyak' isdiezmohal te' alawena , te' aniẍ , yeb te' comino , yaja' machi cam hec'ul heyijen chejbanile caw ay yelapno aycano yu Comam Dios ; ha' ton hewatx'en istoholal , yeb istz'ay hec'ul yin̈ heyet anmahil , yeb xin heyijen tzet chal Comam Dios , yeb heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam , ha' ton huntek'an ti' yilal heyijeni , machi xin chebejpaxo heyijen huntek'anxa tu' .
40023024	¡ Hex ti' lahanex yeb anma mutz'an sat , yaja' cheyaco heba ijbalomal yin̈ hunuxa maca . Hex ti' caw cheyila tato machi hunu no' nich'an us chito xol heyitah , yaja' mach cheyabe hebik'nito no' camello !
40023025	Hex cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb hex fariseo hex ti' , cheyal heba c'ulal , ¡ caw c'anch'anex ! yuto caw c'ul cheyute hetx'ahni yinta hevaso yeb hesec' , yaja' wal yul xin , nohnayto yu istz'ilal heyelek' yeb yu heyec'najil .
40023026	Hex fariseo hex ti' , lahanex haca' hunu mac mutz'an issat . Wal xin tx'ahwe babel yul hevaso yeb hesec' , haxinwal saj chielpaxico yintaj .
40023027	Hex cuywawom hex yin̈ isley naj Mois'es , yeb hex fariseo hex ti' , cheyal heba c'ulal . ¡ Caw c'anch'anex ! yuto lahanex haca' hunu pante'on caw c'ul yehico istxohal ; caw c'ulch'an jilni , yaja' wal yul xin , nohna yu isbajil camom yeb tz'il .
40023028	Haca' huntek'an pante'on tu' haquex tu' . Han̈e yin̈ sat anma caw c'ul cheyute heba , wal heyanma xin nohna yu lek'ti'al yeb yu istx'ojal .
40023029	Hex cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yeb hex fariseo hex ti' , cheyal heba c'ulal . ¡ Caw c'anch'anex ! yuto checayen̈e hetzantencan̈ bay mujan ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios . Chetzantenpaxo bay mujan ebnaj c'ul iswatx'e ,
40023030	cheyalni haca' ti' : " Tato ayon̈ic'o yin̈ hune' tiempohal yet ispotx'lax ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yu ebnaj jichmam , mach chimjaco coba copotx'ni ebnaj , " quexchi .
40023031	Hayet cheyalni haca' tu' , hex caw ex cheyaliloj tato yin̈ yuninal ebnaj potx'ni camo ebnaj ischejab Comam tu' quextita .
40023032	¡ Wal xin ha' tzet ichebilxa yu ebnaj heyichmam tu' , lahwecanoj !
40023033	Hex ti' , lahanex yeb no' laba yuto caw helanex yin̈ istx'ojal . ¿ Tzettaxca chu hecolni heba tet isya'tajil xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal ?
40023034	Chinchejtojan ischejab Comam Dios texol yeb mac itz'at iswi' yin̈ yet Comam , yeb ebnaj cuywawom . Yaja' xin ay ebnaj chepotx' yul hecapilla , ay ebnaj cheyacan̈ yin̈ culus , aypaxo ebnaj chemak' yul hecapilla , yeb xin ay ebnaj chetzumbec'o yul hunun con̈ob .
40023035	Teyiban̈ xin chititcano isya'tajil yu iscamical sunil ebnaj potx'bil ; ebnaj c'ul tzet iswatx'e chiichiti yin̈ iscamical naj Abel masanta yin̈ iscamical naj Zacar'ias , isc'ahol icham Berequ'ias , potx'bil xolbal yatut Comam Dios yeb bay chiak'lax xahanbal .
40023036	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , chititcano isya'tajil yiban̈ anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti' yu iscamical ebnaj tu' , ẍi Comam .
40023037	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- ¡ Hex ah Jerusal'en ti' chepotx' camo ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios , cat hek'ojni camo ebnaj ischejti Comam texol ! ¡ Tx'i'al el quexwawtecojan yul ink'aban , haca' chu yawtenico no' mi'e chiyo niẍte yunin yalan̈ isxic' , yaja' machi heje !
40023038	Abewecano tzet chiwalti'an , hune' hecon̈ob ti' chebeja'canoj , chicancano man̈ anmahil .
40023039	Tinan̈ xin chiwalcanojan teyet tato matxa chinheyilan masanto yet cheyalni haca' ti' : " ¡ Jak'awe tzalaho coc'ul yin̈ mac chul coxol yu Comam Dios ! " quexchi , ẍi Comam .
40024001	Lahwi tu' , yelti Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios . Hayet lan̈an yelti Comam tu' xin ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈ , yichico ebnaj isyeni huntek'an te' n̈a yetbi isba yeb yatut Comam tu' .
40024002	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , huntek'an cheyil ti' chiapni istz'ayical bay chiuchc'alaxtoj . Machi hunu ch'en ch'en latz'bil ti' chican yiban̈ yet ch'enal , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
40024003	Lahwi tu' isto Comam Jes'us yin̈ istzalanil won̈an Olivo , yay tz'on̈no Comam bey tu' , ishitzico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isc'atan̈ . Hayet ischuquil ebnaj yeb Comam tu' isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mamin , hal jetan̈ , ¿ bak'in chu huntek'an maxawal tu' , yeb baytet huntek'an yechel chisye isba yet toxa chaẍhuli yeb yin̈ yet chilahwi yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ? ẍi ebnaj .
40024004	Yichico Comam yalni tet ebnaj : -- Caw cheyil heba , machojab mac chexak'ni subchahoj .
40024005	Yuto tx'i'al ebnaj chuli cat isbalnico ebnaj inbihan yin̈ , cat yalni : " Haninti'an Cristo inan , " ẍi ebnaj . Caw xin tx'i'al mac chisubcha yu ebnaj .
40024006	Cheyaben yichican̈ howal bey ti' , yeb yul huntek'anxa con̈ob . Yaja' mach chexxiwi yuto yilal yul huntek'an tu' , yaj maẍto istan̈balo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
40024007	Chak'lecan̈ howal ej tx'otx' nimeta con̈ob yeb huntek'anxa tx'otx' nimeta con̈ob , cat yanipaxico howal hune' con̈ob yin̈ hune'xa con̈ob . Caw tx'i'al howal yeb yabil chuli , chulpaxo wahil yeb chixcab yul hunun con̈ob .
40024008	Yaja' yichebaniln̈e isya'ilal ye huntek'an tu' .
40024009	Hex ti' , chexilaxto sata ebnaj yahaw con̈ob yu yak'lax ec'oya' heyanma , cat xin quexispotx'ni camo ebnaj . Sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chexcajni yuto tzujanex wintajan .
40024010	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' , tx'i'al mac chiyilo yanma yin̈ Comam Dios . Chioc ishowal anma yin̈ hunun , cat ishobnican̈ anma lek'ti'al yin̈ hunun .
40024011	Tx'i'al ebnaj chalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios , caw xin tx'i'al mac chisubcha yu ebnaj .
40024012	Caw chiahcan̈ anma iswatx'en istx'ojal , yuxin matxa xahano chil anma yet anmahil .
40024013	Ha' mac chitecha yu masanto yin̈ islahobal , ha' chicolchahi .
40024014	Yaja' wal Tzoti' c'ul yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios , yilal ispujbalaxic'o yul hunun con̈ob yun̈e yohtan̈encanilo anma , lahwi tu' cat yul islahobal tz'ayic .
40024015	Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu hune' ischejab Comam Dios chiyij Daniel yin̈ hune' naj chihul etanoto yatut Comam Dios yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e naj . Mac chiilni hune' ti' istxumabiloj .
40024016	Yuxin maquex ayexic'o yul con̈ob Judea ti' yet chiyuni hune' tu' yilal heyelcan̈ cat heto iswi'la witz .
40024017	Ha' mac ayahto yiban̈ yac'alil yatut , matxa chiayti yik'alti hunu tzet ye tu' yul yatut , to beh yelcan̈ .
40024018	Wal mac ayto xol ismunil xin , matxa chimeltzo yik'alti xil isk'ap yul yatut .
40024019	¡ C'anch'an ebix ix ayxa tzet yehi , yeb ebix chi-to-txutxwi niẍte yunin yet chiyuni hune' tu' !
40024020	Yuxin k'anwe tet Comam Dios , haxinwal machojab yin̈ n̈abil chu hune' tu' , machojabpaxo yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal chiyuhi .
40024021	Yuto hune' isya'tajil chul yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' , caw nanxa islowi , maẍto hunelo chu yichitax iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , matxa bak'inal chupaxoj yet chilahwi yec'canoj .
40024022	Yaja' tato mach chisc'otzba Comam Dios yoj hune' tiempo tu' , machim hunu mac chicolchahi . Wal xin chisc'otzba Comam yu iscolni macta sic'bilxa yu .
40024023	Yuxin ta ay mac chihalni teyet : " Ay naj Cristo bey ti' , lah , " maca " ay naj Cristo bey tu' , lah , " ta ẍi , mach cheyayto yul heyanma .
40024024	Yuto ay ebnaj chisbalico isba Cristohal , yeb ay ebnaj chalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios . Chisye ebnaj huntek'an yechel yeb c'aybalc'ule yun̈e issubcha anma yu ebnaj . Etza xin chisubchapaxo mac sic'bilxa yu Comam Dios yu ebnaj .
40024025	Wal xin , ayto chiwalnicanojan huntek'an ti' teyet .
40024026	Yuxin ta ay mac chihalni teyet : " As ilwej , ay naj Cristo bey tx'otx' desierto , " ta ẍi , mach chextohi . Maca ta chihallax teyet : " Ewan ye naj bey ti' , lah , " ta ẍi , mach cheyayto yul heyanma .
40024027	Yuto haca' jilni isjebla c'uh bay chiahilo tz'ayic , cat isjeplapaxo bay chito tz'ayic , hac tu' chu wulan Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .
40024028	Ha'tic'a bay ayayo isnimanil hunu camom , ha' tu' chiscutxba isba no' usmij , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom .
40024029	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Chin̈elahwi yec'to huntek'an nimeta isya'tajil tu' , cat isk'ejholilo yoj tz'ayic , wal ixahaw matxa chimujli , cat istitc'ay tx'umel ay satcan̈ , cat xin istzicobtan̈elax sunil tzet ay yip yul satcan̈ .
40024030	Lahwi tu' cat isyenican̈ isba yechel wulbalan yul satcan̈ , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios . Wal anma ay yul hunun con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , chixiwcan̈ cat yoc ok'oj yet chiyilni wulan xol moyan . Chinhulan yeb isk'ak'al wipan .
40024031	Hayet chiok' ch'en trompeta yin̈ caw ip , chinchejnicojan ebnaj 'angel iscutxbaco sunil macta sic'bilxa wuhan yul yiban̈k'inal . Caw xin sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal chiec' ebnaj iscutxbacan̈ anma sic'bilxa tu' .
40024032	Txumwec'anab yin̈ te' higuera , hayet chiyaxbilo ischon isk'ab te' cat yelilo niẍte xaj te' , cheyohtan̈eloj ta toxa chioc ha' n̈ab .
40024033	Hacpax tu' xin yet cheyilni yijni isba sunil tzet chiwalti'an , cheyohtan̈eloj tato cawilxa wetijan , haca' hunu mac lin̈anxaco sat pulta .
40024034	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , sunil huntek'an ti' chij isba yalan̈to maẍto chicam huntek'an anma ayic'o yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti' .
40024035	Ha' satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx' chitan̈iloj , yaja' wal intzoti'an xin machi ec'to yet yijni isba tzet chala .
40024036	Yaja' wal yin̈ tzet tz'ayical yeb tzet orahil chinhultu'an , machi mac ohtan̈e , nitam ebnaj 'angel ay satcan̈ . Mach wohtapaxojan hanin Isc'ahol Comam Dios inti'an , walxinto han̈c'an̈e Inmaman ohtan̈e .
40024037	Haca' yu anma yin̈ istiempohal naj No'e , hac tu' chu anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal yet chinhulan , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .
40024038	Yuto yet yalan̈to maẍto chihul ha' niman yaxn̈ab , caw matzet chal isc'ul anma yin̈ tzet yal naj No'e , caw xin han̈e wa'oj yeb ismohyi ayco yin̈ isc'ul masanto yet yocto naj No'e yul te' barco .
40024039	Hayet tona nahul ay anma tu' , yul hune' niman yaxn̈ab yiban̈ , istan̈ilo anma sunil . Haca' yu anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' , hac tu' chu anma yet chinhul lemnahan , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .
40024040	K'inalo ta ay cawan̈o ebnaj winaj hune'n̈e chimunlahi yet chiyuni hune' tu' , hune' naj chiilaxtoj , hune'xa naj xin chicancanoj .
40024041	Yeb xin ta ay cawan̈ ebix hune'n̈e lan̈an iscawni , hune' ix chiilaxtoj hune'xa ix chicancanoj .
40024042	Caw majwahan̈wej , yuto mach heyohtajo tzet tz'ayical chinhulan , hanin Heyahaw inti'an .
40024043	K'inalo ta yohta hunu naj yahaw n̈a tzet orahil chul hunu naj elk'om yin̈ ak'balil , chimyilo naj iswayan̈ . Hac tu' xin mach chiocto naj elk'om tu' yelk'alti tzet ay naj .
40024044	Ha' quexpax tu' hex ti' , helan cheyute heba , yuto yet matxa nano heyu cat wul lemnahan , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
40024045	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- K'inalo ta ay hunu naj yahaw munil ay haywan̈o ischejab , ham naj yijem yeb caw helan chacano naj seleloj yu yak'ni tzet chislo ebnaj ismunlawom yet chic'ayayoj .
40024046	Sak'al yet naj chejab ta lan̈an isyijen naj tzet halbilcano tet yet chiapni naj yahaw tu' .
40024047	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , naj yahaw munil tu' chaco naj naj yijem tu' yahawo yin̈ sunil tzet aya .
40024048	Yaja' ta mach c'uluj chute isba naj , cat yoc naj yalni haca' ti' : " Ya' wahawtu'an , ¿ bak'intam chul ya' ? " ta ẍi naj .
40024049	Cat yoc naj ismak'ni ebnaj chejab tu' , cat yoc naj wa'oj yeb xin uc'u xol ebnaj uc'um te' .
40024050	Haxa yet istz'ayical mach echmabilo yahaw naj tu' yu , hayet tohna nahul ay naj cat yul lemna yahaw naj tu' .
40024051	Hac tu' xin chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma naj yu naj yahaw tu' , haca' yak'lax ec'oya' yanma huntek'an ebnaj chal isba c'ulal . Ha' tu' xin chiok' naj cat isn̈etx'la yeh naj yu isya'tajil , ẍi Comam .
40025001	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Yet chioc Comam Dios Yahawo bey ti' , lahan chak'le anma haca' yu lahon̈wan̈ ebix k'opo to yin̈ hune' mohyilal yin̈ ak'balil . Yito ebix iscantil , isto ebix chahwal yin̈ naj mohyom tu' .
40025002	Yaja' xin ay howan̈ ebix mach helanoj , wal howan̈xa ebix xin caw helan ebix .
40025003	Ebix mach helano tu' , han̈e te' aceite ayayto yul iscantil ebix , han̈e te' yito ebix .
40025004	Wal ebix helan xin isnohtze ebix iscantil , yinipaxto ebix yak'bilxa yaceite yul islimeta .
40025005	Yaja' xin ec'to yorahil yulbal naj chimohyi tu' , caw xin k'ahan yechman ebix , matxa chitecha wayan̈ yu ebix yuxin waycan̈ ebix sunil .
40025006	Haxa yin̈ chuman ak'bal , yaben ebix yallax haca' ti' : " ¡ Ahan̈wewanoj ! ¡ Lan̈an yul naj chimohyi lah ! Elan̈weti hechaba naj , " ẍi .
40025007	Yet yaben ebix hune' tu' yahwano ebix , yanico ebix k'a' yin̈ iscantil .
