42010015	Haxa hex ah Capernaum , ¿ ham heyalni ta chexilaxcan̈ satcan̈ ? ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin chexk'ojlaxto xol camom , ẍi Comam .
42010016	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj ischejab tu' : -- Ha' mac ch'aben tzet cheyala , chabepaxo tzet chiwalan . Yaja' ha' mac chiyahni tzet cheyala chinisyahpaxojan . Ha' mac chinyahnitu'an , ha' yin̈ Comam Dios chiyahwahi yuto Comam an̈eintijan , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
42010017	Caw yin̈ tzalahilal meltzo ebnaj setenta ischejab Comam Jes'us , yalni ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mamin , sunil ischejab naj matzwalil yijen tzet jalan̈ yet jak'ni binahojan̈ habi , ẍi ebnaj .
42010018	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Caw yel cheyala , wilan istitc'ay naj matzwalil satcan̈ haca' isjebla hunu c'uh .
42010019	Yaja' Haninan wak'an heyip hebelwic'o yiban̈ no' laba yeb xin yiban̈ no' c'olotx . Wak'nipaxojan heyip hek'oji yin̈ naj matzwalil , naj chichiwaco isc'ul jin̈ . Hac tu' xin mach chu quexyetan naj .
42010020	Chiwalan teyet mach chextzalahi yuto chi'el ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma heyu , tzalahan̈wej yuto tz'ibn̈ebilxa hebi yul satcan̈ , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
42010021	Caw tzala yanma Comam Jes'us yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo , yalni Comam : -- Mam , Yahaw hach satcan̈ , Yahaw hachpaxo yin̈ hune' sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , chiwalan c'ulla tzoti' tawin̈ yuto chayelo tet ebnaj mach iscuyu huntek'an ewan ye hawu tet ebnaj caw ay iscuyu yeb caw ay tzet yohtaj . Hawute hac tu' Mamin , yuto hac tu' el yin̈ hac'ul , ẍi Comam .
42010022	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni Comam tet anma : -- Sunil ak'bilxa yul ink'aban yu Inmaman . Machi mac ohtan̈e hanin C'ahole inti'an , cachann̈e Comam ohtan̈e hinan . Machi mac ohtan̈e Inmaman , haninn̈ehan Isc'ahol inti'an wohtajan . Chiwak'paxojan ohtan̈elaxo Inmaman tet mac chiwochehan .
42010023	Lahwi tu' xin yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom ischuquil : -- Sak'al yet mac ch'ilni huntek'an cheyil ti' ,
42010024	yuto caw tx'i'al ebnaj ischejab Comam yet payat yeb ebnaj rey ec'lena payxa tu' , yoche yila' huntek'an cheyil ti' , yaj mach yil ebnaj . Yoche yabe'paxo ebnaj haca' hex ti' , yaj machi yabe ebnaj , ẍi Comam .
42010025	Ay hune' naj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es apni tzotelo tet Comam Jes'us , yaj yun̈e yilwen naj Comam , yuxin yal naj haca' ti' : -- Mam cuywawom , ¿ tzet wal wuten inbahan yun̈e inchahnihan hune' k'inal mach istan̈bal ? ẍi naj .
42010026	Istak'wican̈ Comam tet naj : -- ¿ Hawohtami tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yin̈ isley naj Mois'es ? ¿ Tzet cuybanilehal chawik'a yet chawilni ? ẍi Comam .
42010027	Istak'wi naj : -- Oche Comam Dios Jahawil yeb sunil hawanma yeb sunil hac'ul yeb sunil hanabal , yebpaxo sunil hawip . Xahan chawil hawet anmahil haca' chu haya'iln̈en haba , ẍiayoj , ẍi naj .
42010028	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Caw c'ul mayu hawalni . Ta chayije tzet chala , ay hak'inal mach istan̈bal , ẍi Comam tet naj .
42010029	Yaja' hune' naj cuywawom tu' , yoche naj challax naj c'ulal yin̈ sat anma , yuxin yal naj tet Comam Jes'us : -- ¿ Mac xin wet anmahilan hawalni ? ẍi naj .
42010030	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Yet hunel ay hune' naj winaj lan̈an isto yul isbelal Jerusal'en chi'apni bey con̈ob Jeric'o , ay huntek'an ebnaj elk'om elilo yin̈ naj yul beh tu' . Yinilo ebnaj sunil tzet ik'bil yu naj , yinipaxilo ebnaj xil isk'ap naj . Ismak'ni taho ebnaj naj , etza cam naj yu ebnaj , lahwi tu' yelcan̈ ebnaj .
42010031	C'uxan xin yec'to hune' naj sacerdote Israel yul hune' beh tu' , hayet yilnico naj naj , ishec'nilo isba naj tet naj , isto naj yin̈ isbel .
42010032	Yec'paxto hune' naj levita yul hune' beh tu' , ton̈e yilpaxico naj yin̈ naj , ishec'nipaxo isba naj , isto naj xin .
42010033	Yaj ay hune' naj ah Samaria ec'paxo yul hune' beh tu' . Hayet yilnico naj yin̈ naj etza cam tu' , caw tz'aycan̈ isc'ul naj yin̈ naj .
42010034	Ishitzico naj isc'atan̈ naj , yan̈ten naj islahwilal naj tu' yu aceite yeb vino . Ispichnico naj k'ap yin̈ islahwilal naj tu' . Yanahto naj naj yiban̈ ischeh . Yinito naj naj bey hune' waybal , yoc naj yilno naj .
42010035	Haxa yin̈ hunxa tz'ayic yet ispaxto naj , yak'ni naj cabeb ch'en melyu denario tet naj yahaw waybal tu' , yalni naj xin : -- Chawilcano hune' naj ti' ink'ana'an . Ta ayto tzet chac'ay yin̈ naj , chintohlahan yet chinhulan hunelxa , ẍi naj .
42010036	Isk'amben Comam Jes'us tet naj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es haca' ti' : -- Xol ebnaj oxwan̈ tu' , ¿ mac caw yet anmahil naj etza cam yu ebnaj elk'om tu' chute hawalni ? ẍi Comam tet naj .
42010037	Istak'wican̈ naj cuywawom tu' : -- Ha' naj tz'ay isc'ul yoc colwal yin̈ naj , ẍi naj . Yalni Comam Jes'us : -- Wal tinan̈ xin , ha' tzet iswatx'e naj tu' , hacojab tu' chawute , ẍi Comam tet naj .
42010038	Isto Comam Jes'us yin̈ isbel , yapni Comam bey hune' aldea . Ha' bey tu' xin ay hune' ix , Marta isbi . Ischahni ix Comam yul yatut .
42010039	Aypaxo hune' isnoh ix , Mar'ia isbi . Ix Mar'ia tu' , ay tz'on̈no ix yich yoj Comam Jes'us yu yaben ix tzet chal Comam .
42010040	Walpaxo ix Marta , caw ha' iswatx'en ix ismunil ayco yin̈ isc'ul . Yuxin hitzico ix isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us , yalni ix : -- Mamin , ¿ tzet yin̈ ton̈e chawila chinisbejnicanojan ix innohti'an munil inchuquilan ? Hal tet ix colwaojab nino ix win̈an , ẍi ix Marta tet Comam .
42010041	Istak'wican̈ Comam xin : -- Marta , Marta , caw yin̈n̈e hamunil ayco hanabal . Caw machi ak'anc'ulal yul hawanma .
42010042	Yaj hune'n̈e tzet caw yilal yehi , ha' ton bay ayco yanma ix Mar'ia ti' , yuxin machi mac chu yinilo tet ix , ẍi Comam .
42011001	Ay hunel xin txahli Comam Jes'us bey hune' tx'otx' , yet lahwi istxahli Comam tu' , yalni hune' iscuywom Comam tet : -- Mamin , cuyon̈an̈ cotxahlihan̈ haca' yu iscuyni naj Juan ebnaj iscuywom istxahli tet Comam Dios , ẍi naj .
42011002	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Hayet chextxahli , hac ti' cheyute heyalni : Hach Comam , hach coDios , ayach yul satcan̈ , nimanojab yelapno habi yul sat anma . Hulan̈ cat hawoc Yahawilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yijab isba tzet chawoche sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' , haca' yijni isba tzet chawoche yul satcan̈ .
42011003	Mamin , chicok'anan̈ tawet , ak' tzet chicolohan̈ hunun tz'ayic .
42011004	Ak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ sunil cotx'ojalan̈ , haca' chiyu jak'nihan̈ nimanc'ulal yin̈ anma chiwatx'en istx'ojal jin̈an̈ . Mach chon̈hachayojan̈ xol ilwebal , caw c'olon̈ilojan̈ yul isk'ab naj matzwalil , quexchi , ẍi Comam .
42011005	Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu' : -- K'inalo ta ay hunujex hex ti' chexto yet chuman ak'bal bey yatut hunu heyamigo cat heyalni : " Hach wamigo , ak' hanic'o tzet chalo inhela'an .
42011006	To ay hune' wamigohan lan̈anto yapni yin̈ isbel bey watutan , yaj matzet wal wak'nihan tet naj , " ta quexchi .
42011007	Yaj ta chiyal naj yulicto yatut tu' haca' ti' : " Ayxaco istel inpultahan , mach chaẍhul hawik'alo inwayan̈an tinan̈ . Lan̈an inwayan yeb niẍte wuninalan sat tx'at , yuxin mach chu wahwanojan wak'nojan tzet chak'ana' , " ẍi naj .
42011008	Wal xin chiwalan teyet , chiahwano naj yak'a' tzet chek'ana , yaj maẍtaj yu caw heyamigo ye naj , wal xin chiahwano naj yuto caw hune'n̈e ha' yelic'to heyaw , cat yak'ni naj tzet chek'ana' .
42011009	Yuxin chiwalan teyet : K'anwe tet Comam Dios , cat yak'ni Comam teyet . Saywej , cat yilchaho heyu , elojabico heyaw yin̈ sat pulta cat ishajlax teyet .
42011010	Yuto ha' mac chik'anni chischah , ha' mac chisayni chi'ilcha yu . Ha' mac chi'elico yaw sat pulta , chihajlax tet .
42011011	Haca' hex mame hex ti' , ta chisk'an heyuninal hunu no' cay teyet , ¿ tom cheyak' huno no' laba tet ?
42011012	Maca , ta chisk'an huno no' hos teyet , ¿ tom cheyak' huno no' c'olotx tet ?
42011013	Waxan̈ca tx'ojex , yaj heyohta heyak'ni isc'ulal tet heyuninal , hajxam Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ , to chak' Comam Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet mac chik'anni , ẍi Comam .
42011014	Ay hune' naj ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ , yuxin mach chu istzotel naj . Haxa yet yapni Comam Jes'us , yinilo Comam ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj , istzotelcan̈ naj . Yuxin caw c'aycanocan̈ isc'ul anma yilni .
42011015	Yaja' ay mac halni : -- Ha' naj Beelzeb'u , naj yahawil yeco yin̈ ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil , ha' chi'ak'ni yip naj ti' yinilo ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma , ẍi anma tu' .
42011016	Ay huntek'anxa ebnaj ton̈e yoche yilwe' ta yip Comam Dios ayco yin̈ Comam Jes'us , yuxin isk'an ebnaj yila' hunu c'aybalc'ule tet Comam .
42011017	Yaj yohtan̈elo Comam tzet ch'ec' yin̈ isnabal ebnaj , yuxin yal Comam haca' ti' : -- K'inaloj ta ay hunu niman con̈ob ay ebnaj yahawil howal chispohle isba , cat ispaq'uico ebnaj yin̈ hunun , yin̈ hamataj chitan̈ilo hune' niman con̈ob tu' . Hac-tic'a-pax tu' ta ay hunu n̈ahil anma chispohle isba yu howal , chitan̈paxilo hune' n̈ahil anma tu' .
42011018	Hacmi tu' ch'elico naj matzwalil , ta chispoh isba naj yeb ischejab , cat ispaq'uico ebnaj yin̈ hunun . ¿ Tzic'anab chu yoc yip naj chiyute heyalni ? Chiwalan hune' ti' teyet yuto hex ti' cheyala ta haninti'an chiwilojan ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma yu yip naj Beelzeb'u .
42011019	Wal xin ¡ machoj ! Ta hac tu' , ¿ mac xin ch'ak'ni yip ebnaj chicuywi teyintaj yinilo ischejab naj matzwalil heyalni ? Yuxin ha' hun ebnaj tu' chiyenilo ta hex ti' caw c'aynajexto yin̈ tzet cheyal win̈an .
42011020	Wal haninti'an chiwilojan ischejab naj matzwalil yu yip Comam Dios , ha' hun ti' chihalniloj ta xa'apni istiempohal heyoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
42011021	K'inalo ta ay hunu naj winaj caw ay yip ayco ch'en yet howal yul isk'ab , cat istan̈en naj yatut , machi mac chu yelk'anoti tzet ay naj .
42011022	Yaj ta ay hunuxa mac chuli , ec'naxapaxo yip sata naj , chi'ayc'ay naj yu naj , cat yilaxilo ch'en yet howal tet naj bay ayco yanma naj tu' ; yeb sunil tzet ayco yul isk'ab naj ch'occano yu naj chik'oji yin̈ naj tu' .
42011023	Ha' mac mach ayoco yin̈ tzet chiwalan , chichiwa isc'ul win̈an . Yeb xin , ha' mac mach chicolwa win̈an iscutxbanti anma wetan , ha' ton chitzumbenilo anma yul ink'aban , ẍi Comam .
42011024	K'inalo ta ay hunu ischejab naj matzwalil ch'el yin̈ hunu naj winaj , lahwi tu' cat isto ischejab naj matzwalil tu' bey tx'otx' desierto issayno bay chixewi . Yaj ta mach chi'ilcha yu naj bay chixew tu' , cat yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Caw c'ulmi inmeltzohan baytic'a titnajinan , ẍi naj .
42011025	Haxa yet ismeltzo ischejab naj matzwalil tu' xin , yilni naj ta haca' hunu n̈a caw tz'isbilxalto k'alem yul yeb watx'ebil , hac tu' ye yul yanma naj tu' .
42011026	Yuxin yin̈ an̈e chito naj ischejab naj matzwalil tu' yawteti hujwan̈oxa yetbi caw ec'naxa istx'ojal sata naj , cat yocto ebnaj yul yanma hune' naj winaj tu' . Caw xin ec'balxa istx'ojal chielico naj sata yet yalan̈tocanoj , ẍi Comam .
42011027	Hayet lan̈an yalni Comam Jes'us huntek'an tu' , yah yaw hune' ix xol anma , yalni ix tet Comam : -- Caw sak'al yet ix ix cachuninn̈eni , yeb cachak'ni ch'iboj , ẍi ix .
42011028	Istak'wi Comam : -- Ec'balto sak'al yet anma chi'aben Istzoti' Comam Dios cat isyijeni , ẍi Comam .
42011029	Yet isc'utxban isba anma isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us , yalni Comam xin : -- Ha' anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti' machiswalil isnabal yuto chisk'an yila' c'aybalc'ule chiyeni yip Comam Dios , yaja' hune'ch'an ch'ak'lax yila' ; hune' haca' isye Comam Dios yin̈ naj Jon'as , naj ischejab Comam yet payat .
42011030	Hune' isye Comam Dios yin̈ naj Jon'as tu' , yechel yip Comam isye tet anma yul con̈ob N'inive yet payat . Hac tu' wehan , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios . yechel yip Comam Dios wehan xol anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti' .
42011031	Hayet ch'apni istz'ayical yilni Comam Dios yin̈ tzet ch'elico sunil anma , chitak'wican̈ ix reina ay bey Sab'a , cat yalni ix istx'ojal anma yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti' yuto caw nahat tx'otx' bay tit ix yabeno hanta yitz'atil iswi' naj rey Salom'on . Yaj xin haninti'an , ec'bal welapnojan sata naj rey Salom'on tu' , yaja' mach chabeto anma ti' tzet chiwalan .
42011032	Yin̈ hune' tz'ayical tu' , chitak'wipaxocan̈ anma ah N'inive , cat yalnipaxo istx'ojal anma yin̈ hune' tiempo ti' , yuto hayet yec' naj Jon'as yalno Istzoti' Comam Dios tet anma tu' , isbejnicano anma istx'ojal , iswatx'enico isba sata Comam . Yaj wal haninti'an ec'bal welapnojan sata naj Jon'as tu' , yaj machi mac ti' ch'aben tzet chiwalan , ẍi Comam .
42011033	Machi huno mac chaco k'a' yin̈ iscantil cat yebanto yalan̈ hunu te' almuh maca yalan̈ hunuxa tzet ye tu' , machoj , to nahat ch'ahi haxinwal c'ul yilni anma ch'oc apno yul n̈a .
42011034	Isbak' cosat , cantil yeco yin̈ conimanil . Yuxin ta han̈c'an̈e isc'ulal choche yila' cosat ti' , sunil conimanil ayco yin̈ issajilk'inal . Yaja' ta yin̈n̈e istx'ojal bay ayco cosat xin , sunil conimanil ayco yin̈ k'ejholo .
42011035	Yuxin nann̈eojab heyu , haxinwal ha' hune' issajilk'inal ayco teyin̈ , machojab ch'oc k'ejholohal .
42011036	Yuxin tato ayco issajilk'inal yul heyanma , yebpaxo machi nich'ano k'ejholo ayco teyin̈ , haca' xol issajilk'inal ayexxacoj . Yuxin lahanex haca' hunu cantil nahat chiapni ismujli isk'ak'al , ẍi Comam .
42011037	Hayet lahwi istzotel Comam Jes'us yeb anma tu' , yawtento hune' naj fariseo Comam wa'o bey yatut . Yapni Comam yul yatut naj , yoc tz'on̈no Comam yin̈ meẍa .
42011038	Yet lan̈an yoc Comam wa'oj , c'ayilo isc'ul naj fariseo yet yilni naj ta mach istx'ah isk'ab Comam haca' iscuybanil ebnaj fariseo yet ch'oc ebnaj wa'oj .
42011039	Yuxin yal Comam tet naj : -- Hex fariseo hex ti' , caw c'ul chu hetx'ahni yinta hevaso yeb hesec' haca' yalni hecuybanil , wal yul henabal han̈c'an̈e elek' nabil yu , haxapaxo yul heyanma xin , nohna yu sunil istx'ojal chewatx'e .
42011040	¡ Caw wi'e excanoj ! ¿ Tom mach heyohtajoj tato ha' Comam watx'en̈e sunil tzettaj chijilico yin̈ , yebpaxo sunil mach chijilico yin̈ ?
42011041	Yuxin ha' wal heyuten heba , aweco heyanma yul isk'ab Comam , ta hac tu' chisajbicano heyanma yu Comam , haxinwal cheyak' tet mac matzet aya yin̈ tzalahilal .
42011042	¡ C'anch'anex fariseo hex ti' ! cheyak' isdiezmohal te' alawena yeb te' ruda yeb sunil te' niẍte itah tet Comam Dios , yaja' mach chewatx'e istoholal yin̈ heyet anmahil , yebpaxo xin machi isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yul heyanma . Ha' huntek'an tu' caw yilal heyijeni , machi xin chebej heyak'ni hediezmo tet Comam Dios .
42011043	¡ C'anch'anex hex fariseo , hex ti' ! Hexn̈e cheyoche hemajalo huntek'an ch'em caw ay yelapno yul capilla . Ay heyala' ta nanxa yoc chute istioẍli anma teyet yet chexec' yulaj beh .
42011044	¡ C'anch'anex hex fariseo , hex ti' ! Caw tx'oj heyanma , lahanex haca' bay mujan camom matxa ixtan̈o jilni yec'lenal ; ch'ec' xan̈xon anma yiban̈ , mach xin yohtajo tzet ayayto yalan̈ tx'otx' , ẍi Comam .
42011045	Yalni hune' naj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es tet Comam : -- Mamin , hayet chawalni huntek'an ti' , han̈-hun-on̈an̈ chawak'paxo taco coc'ulan̈ , ẍi naj .
42011046	Istak'wi Comam tet naj : -- ¡ C'anch'anexpaxo , hex cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es ! Yuto caw ay huntek'an chejbanile caw ya'ta cheyak' tet anma haca' hunu ijatz caw al , machi mac chik'oji yinican̈ . Walexpaxo xin , maẍtic'a nich'ano yiximal hek'ab chehitzico yin̈ .
42011047	C'anch'anex yuto checayen̈e hewatx'encan̈ bay mujan ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios potx'bil yu heyichmam yet payat .
42011048	Hac tu' xin chu heyenilo yin̈ tzet chewatx'e ti' tato chextzala yin̈ tzet iswatx'e heyichmam tu' . Ha' ebnaj potx'ni ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios , walexpaxo xin , chewatx'ecan̈ bay mujan ebnaj .
42011049	Yuxin halbilcano yu Comam Dios yu ishelanil : " Chiwak'atojan ebnaj inchejaban yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj chihalnoc'o Intzoti'an texol . Ay ebnaj chemak' camoj , ay ebnaj chetzumbelo yul con̈ob , " ẍi Comam .
42011050	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Huntek'an anma ti' chitohlano sunil isya'tajil iswatx'ecano yichmam yin̈ ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios mak'bil camo yettax yichico yul yiban̈k'inal ti' .
42011051	Caw tzetc'a ebnaj ischejab Comam mak'bil camoj , chi'ichicanti yin̈ iscamical naj Abel masanta yin̈ iscamical naj Zacar'ias , yet ismak'lax camo naj xolbal bay chin̈uslax xahanbal yeb yatut Comam Dios . Yaj haninan chiwalan teyet ta Comam Dios chi'aniti isya'tajil yiban̈ anma ti' yu iscamical ebnaj tu' , ẍi Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj .
42011052	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- ¡ C'anch'anex hex checuy isley naj Mois'es ! Caw yahaw hex heyak'ni isnabal anma yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios , yaja' mach cheyaco henabal yin̈ , yebpaxo ta ay mac choche chaco isnabal yin̈ , mach chechacto anma yul ispultahil , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
42011053	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' xin caw oc ishowal ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es yin̈ Comam Jes'us . Yichico ebnaj buchwal yin̈ Comam , caw tx'i'al tzet isk'ambelo ebnaj tet Comam ,
42011054	yun̈e yayc'ay Comam yin̈ hunu lek'ti'al , cat yoc ebnaj ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam yalni .
42012001	Wal xin caw ismilalxa anma iscutxba isba yaben tzet chal Comam Jes'us , toxan̈e chistenle isba anma . Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Cheyil heba tet ebnaj fariseo , yuto chal isba ebnaj c'ulal . Wal xin ha' iscuybanil ebnaj lahan haca' nich'an yan̈al ixim pan ch'oc xol ixim harina , sunil ixim chisipc'a yu .
42012002	Yuto sunil tzet ebabil ch'elo yen̈el , yebpaxo sunil tzet ewan yehi ch'ixtan̈wilo sata anma .
42012003	Yuxin yin̈ caw yel chiwalan teyet , sunil tzet cheyal xol k'ejholo chi'abelaxo yu anma yet tz'ayical , yebpaxo sunil tzoti' chihallax yin̈ nanc'ulal yul hunu n̈a , chihallaxo yin̈ caw ip istin̈a .
42012004	Walex wamigo hexti'an , chiwalan teyet mach chexxiw tet ebnaj chu ispotx'ni camo henimanil , yuto matxa hunuxa tzet wal quexyuten ebnaj .
42012005	Yaj chiwalan teyet , mac tet bay wal hexiwi , ha' ton tet Comam Dios , Comam chu quexyak'ni camoj , chilahwi tu' aypaxo yip quexyanito xol k'a k'a' mach istan̈bal . Ha' ton tet Comam tu' chexiwi .
42012006	Chisje hetxumnilo yin̈ no' niẍte ch'ic , hoc'on̈ no' yin̈ cab centavo , yaj machi hunu no' chito nahul yu Comam .
42012007	Hajxamex hex ti' , caw niman hayelapno sata no' . ¿ Tom mach cheyohtajoj ta sunil xil hewi' bisbil yin̈ hununtajil yu Comam ? Yuxin chiwalan teyet , mach chexxiwi .
42012008	Chiwalan teyet , macn̈etic'a mach chitx'ixwi yalnilo isba sata anma ta wetan yehi , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , chiwalan ta wetan anma tu' sata ebnaj y'angel Comam ay bey satcan̈ .
42012009	Yaja' mac chitx'ixwi yalni sata anma ta wetan yehi , chiwalpaxojan sata ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios tato mach wetojan ye anma tu' .
42012010	Macta chibuchwahi cat yalni hunu tzoti' tx'oj win̈an , Haninan Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ayto nimanc'ulal yin̈ , yaj mac chihalni tx'oj tzoti' yin̈ Comam Esp'iritu Santo , matxa nimanc'ulal yin̈ .
42012011	Hayet chexilaxto sata ebnaj yahawil yeco yin̈ iscapilla ebnaj Israel , maca sata ebnaj juez , maca satapaxo ebnaj alcal , mach ch'oc yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chu hecolni heba , yeb tzet chu hepajtzen istzoti' ebnaj .
42012012	Yuto hayet chi'apni istiempohal heyilaxto sata ebnaj , ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chak'ni hehelanil hetzoteli , ẍi Comam tet anma .
42012013	Xol anma tu' , ay hune' naj halni tet Comam Jes'us haca' ti' : -- Mam cuywawom , hal tet wuẍtati'an ink'ana'an yak'a'ab naj inmajulan yin̈ tzet ak'bilcano jetan̈ yu comaman̈ , ẍi naj .
42012014	Yaj yal Comam tet naj : -- Hach wet anmahil , haninti'an mach alcalo wecojan texol , cat inpohnitojan tzet ye tu' teyin̈ , ẍi Comam .
42012015	Yalni Comam tet anma xin : -- Nann̈e heyu , caw cheyil heba , mach chetz'unico heyanma yin̈ k'alomal , yuto isk'inal anma mach chipitzc'ati yin̈ tzettaj ay yul isk'ab , ẍi Comam .
42012016	Yalni Comam hune' yechel ti' tet anma : -- Ay hune' naj winaj caw k'alom , caw niman sat istz'unub yak'a .
42012017	Yuxinto yal naj k'alom tu' ischuquil haca' ti' : " ¿ Tzet wal wuten inbahan ? Caw matxa chabe bay chinc'ubahan sat intz'unubti'an , " ẍi naj .
42012018	Istit yin̈ isnabal naj , yalni naj haca' ti' : " Wohtaxahan tzet chinwatx'e'an . Chiwuchc'ayojan huntek'an inc'un̈ati'an , cat inwatx'enojan huntek'anxa caw nimej chu , haxinwal c'uxan yocto sunil sat intz'unubti'an yul yeb sunil tzet ayinan .
42012019	Chilahwi tu' xin cat inxewan yuto ay tzet ayinan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Chinxewan yeb chinwa'an , cat wak'nihan tzet choche wanmahan , cat wak'ni tzalaho inc'ulan , " ẍi naj tet yanma .
42012020	Tzujan tu' xin , yalni Comam Dios tet naj : " ¡ Caw machi hawi' ! Yin̈ hune' ak'bal ti' chaẍcamoj . ¿ Mac tet xin chicanocano huntek'an c'ubabil hawu ti' hawalni ? " ẍi Comam Dios tet naj .
42012021	Haca' ton hune' naj winaj ti' , hac tu' ye anma yin̈n̈etic'a k'alomal chaco yanma , yuxin yul sat Comam Dios caw meba' huntek'an anma tu' , ẍi Comam .
42012022	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Chiwalan teyet , mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chelo yebpaxo yin̈ bay chitit istohol xil hek'ap cheyacoj .
42012023	Heyohtaj tato ha' Comam Dios ch'ak'ni cocawil , ¿ hatoc'anab tzet chicolo mach chak' Comam heyalni ? Ha' Comam ak'nipaxo hune' conimanil ti' ¿ tom mach chak'apaxo Comam xil cok'ap heyalni ?
42012024	Chisje hetxumni yin̈ no' hoh , machi yawal no' chacoj , mach chihatx'wipaxo no' , machipaxo isc'un̈a no' , yaja' Comam Dios chi'ak'ni tzet chislo no' . Hajexxam hex ti' , to caw ec'bal heyelapno sata no' .
42012025	¿ Aymi hunujex ti' yu caw cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul chihitzto nich'anoxa hecawil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ? ¡ Machoj !
42012026	Yuxin ta mach chexk'oji hewatx'en tzet ye tu' niẍch'an , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul ?
42012027	Ilwec'anab te' caj , mach chimunla te' , mach chichemlipaxo te' , yaj chiwalan teyet naj rey Salom'on yet payat , waxan̈ca caw k'alom naj , yaja' machi apni isk'aptzen isba naj haca' isc'ulch'anil te' caj tu' .
42012028	Walca caw c'ulch'an jilni isxumaquil te' caj tu' tinan̈ , yaj wal yet hecal cabe chin̈uslaxto te' yul horno . Ta chak' Comam isc'ulch'anil te' caj , ¿ hatoc'anab xil hek'ab mach chak' Comam ? hex ti' machi caw chicawxi hec'ul yin̈ Comam .
42012029	Wal xin mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul bay chi-caw-istit tzet chelo .
42012030	Wal anma mach ohtan̈e Comam Dios , caw chaco huntek'an tzet ye tu' ti' yin̈ isc'ul , yaja' walex hex ti' , ay hune' Hemam yohtaxa tzet ch'ocnico heyu .
42012031	Yuxin aweco heyanma heyijen yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios babel , haxa huntek'anxa ch'ocnico heyu , chi'ak'laxo teyet , ẍi Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom .
42012032	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Mach chexxiw hex xahan ay wuti'an . Caw haywan̈exch'an , yaja' xa'el yin̈ isc'ul Comam ay bey satcan̈ quexyanico yuninaloj .
42012033	Txon̈weto tzet ayex , cat heyak'ni istohol tet anma matzet aya , hac tu' chu hewatx'en hune' istx'uyal hek'alomal mach chik'ato bey satcan̈ . Huntek'an k'alomal tu' machi bak'inal chitan̈iloj yuto ha' bey tu' machi elk'om , machipaxo no' ih chi'etanotoj .
42012034	Wal xin ha' bay ay hek'alomal ha' tu' ayco heyanma , ẍi Comam .
42012035	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Caw helanojab cheyute heba haca' hunu naj soldado caw watx'ebilico xil isk'ap , yeb aypaxico k'a' yin̈ iscantil .
42012036	Lahanojab cheyute heba haca' ebnaj chejab chismaj yul ispatr'on chibey yin̈ hunu mohyilal . Hayet ch'apni naj bey yatut cat yahwi naj . Caw yin̈ an̈e xin chishaj ebnaj pulta tet naj patr'on tu' .
42012037	Caw sak'al yet ebnaj chejab elna iswayan̈ yet ch'apni ispatr'on tu' . Chiwalan teyet , caw yin̈ an̈e chishelilo xil isk'ap naj patr'on , cat yawten naj ebnaj wa'o sat meẍa ; ha' caw naj chibatxnic'o tzet chislo ebnaj tu' .
42012038	Yuxin waxan̈ca yin̈ chuman ak'bal , maca yet lan̈anxa issajbiloj , cat yapni naj patr'on tu' , caw sak'al yet ebnaj chejab ta elna iswayan̈ ebnaj .
42012039	Nachaojabilo heyu huntek'an tzet chiwalti'an teyet : Haca' hunu naj yahaw n̈a , k'inalo ta yohta naj tzet orahil ch'apni naj elk'om yin̈ yatut , caw chimmajwa naj , machim chischacto naj naj yul yatut .
42012040	Ha' quexpax tu' hex ti' , helan cheyute heba . Ha' taxca yet mach nano heyu , cat wulan , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom tu' .
42012041	Isk'amben naj Pedro tet Comam : -- Mamin , ¿ han̈em jetan̈ chawal hune' yechel ti' , mato tet sunil anma ? ẍi naj .
42012042	Yalni Comam : -- Hune' ti' chiwalan yin̈ hune' naj ilom munil caw yijem yeb caw ay isnabal , ak'bilico yu naj yahaw munil yul yatut yu yak'ni tzet chislo ebnaj munlawom haca' yalni naj yahaw tu' .
42012043	Caw sak'al yet naj ta lan̈an isyijen naj haca' tzet halbilcano tet yet ch'apni naj yahaw munil .
42012044	Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet : Naj yahaw munil tu' chaco naj naj yijem tu' yahawo yin̈ sunil tzet aya .
42012045	Yaj ta chal naj ischuquil : " Wal ya' wahawan , ¿ bak'in tam chul ya' ? " ta ẍi naj , cat yoc naj ismak'ni ebnaj chejab yeb ebix chejab , yeb xin han̈c'an̈e yin̈ wa'o chaco yanma naj , yeb xin yin̈ tzet chuc' naj , cat yoccano naj uc'u te' .
42012046	Haxa yet istz'ayical mach echmabilo yahaw naj yu caw tona nahul ay naj , cat yul lemna naj yahaw tu' , hac tu' xin caw ch'ak'lax ec'oya' yanma naj xol isya'tajil cat yalaxto naj xol ebnaj mach yijemo chute isba .
42012047	K'inalo ta ay hunu naj chejab yohta tzet choche yahaw , yaja' mach chaco naj yin̈ isc'ul iswatx'eni , yeb xin mach chisyijepaxo naj tzet chal naj yahaw tu' , ha' hune' naj chejab tu' niman isya'tajil chischah naj .
42012048	Walpaxo naj chejab , mach yohtajo ta tx'oj tzet chiswatx'e , ha' naj tu' hanic'n̈ech'an tz'um ch'ak'lax yija' . Ha' mac niman tzet ak'bilcano tet , nimanpaxo chik'anlax tet , yebpaxo mac niman tzet ak'bilico yul isk'ab , ec'balxa niman chu isk'anlaxayo tet , ẍi Comam .
42012049	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Haninti'an hulnajinan wak'acojan hune' haca' k'a' yul yiban̈k'inal ti' . Ay wala'an ta chiah xaj hune' k'a' tu' tinan̈ .
42012050	Ay hune' niman isya'tajil chihul wiban̈an , ha' ton hune' tu' ayco yin̈ wanmahan , caw xin ch'ec'ya' wanmahan masanto chija' isba hune' tu' .
42012051	¿ Ham heyalni ta yu wanicojan ak'anc'ulal xol anma yuxin quinhulan ? Machoj , to yu ispohlen isba .
42012052	Wal tinan̈ istzabloxaco hune' ti' xol anma . K'inalo ta ay howan̈o yul hunu n̈a , oxwan̈ ch'oc howal yin̈ cawan̈ , haxa cawan̈ tu' ch'oc howal yin̈ oxwan̈ .
42012053	Naj mame , ch'oc naj howal yin̈ isc'ahol , naj c'ahole ch'oc howal yin̈ ismam , ix mi'e ch'oc ix howal yin̈ yunin , ix unine ch'oc ix howal yin̈ ismi' . Wal ixnam alibe ch'oc ixnam howal yin̈ yalib , cat yocpaxo ix alibe howal yin̈ ixnam alibe tu' , ẍi Comam .
42012054	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet anma : -- Hayet cheyilni moyan bay chito tz'ayic , caw an̈e chenaloj cat heyalni : " Chak'a' n̈ab tinan̈ , " quexchi . Caw xin chij isba tzet cheyala .
42012055	Hayet cheyaben istit jak'ek' yin̈ sur , cheyalpaxoj : " Caw chixobxonoj , " quexchi . Hac tu' xin chu yijni isba .
42012056	Hex cheyal heba c'ulal ti' , caw helanex hetxumni yin̈ tzet chute isba tx'o tx'otx' ti' , yeb tzet ye tu' cheyil satcan̈ yet chishelni isba tiempo , yaj mach chinacha heyu tzet yelapno ye hune' tiempo bay ayexico ti' , ẍi Comam .
42012057	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxin caw mach chewatx'elo hunu tzet ye tu' texol hechuquil yin̈ caw istoholal ?
42012058	K'inalo ta ay hunu mac chachawten sata naj alcal , ha'ojab yet lan̈an isto naj yul beh , cat hak'anni nimanc'ulal tawin̈ tet naj yin̈ ak'anc'ulal . Ta mach xin , yet chaẍapni sata naj alcal , chaẍalaxico yul isk'ab naj mayor , cat cachyanicto naj yul te' preso .
42012059	Chiwalan tawet mach chaẍelti yul preso tu' tato mach tz'ajano chawak' hamulta , ẍi Comam .
42013001	Ha' yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' ay huntek'an ebnaj apni halno tet Comam Jes'us yin̈ tzet yu ispotx'lax huntek'an ebnaj ah Galilea yu ischejbanil naj Pilato . Ismalto ischiq'uil ebnaj xol ischiq'uil no nok' lan̈an yak'lax xahanbalil tet Comam Dios .
42013002	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Ham heyalni ta ec'bal ismul ebnaj cam tu' sata huntek'anxa ebnaj ay bey Galilea tu' ? ¡ Machoj !
42013003	Wal xin , chiwalan teyet , ta mach chebejcano hetx'ojal , chexcam haca' ebnaj tu' .
42013004	Haca'paxo ebnaj waxajlahon̈wan̈ cam bey Silo'e yet yayc'ay hune' torre yiban̈ ebnaj , ¿ tom caw ec'bal ismul ebnaj tu' sata huntek'anxa anma bey con̈ob Jerusal'en , heyalni ?
42013005	¡ Machoj ! Haquexpax tu' hex ti' , ta mach chexmeltzoco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , chexcampaxoj , ẍi Comam .
42013006	Yalni Comam Jes'us hunxa yechel ti' tet anma : -- Ay hune' naj , ay hune' te' higuera sat istx'otx' . Isto naj yilno ta ay sat te' , yaja' haxa yet yapni naj yilno te' , machi huno sat te' ilcha yu naj . Isto naj yalno tet naj chitan̈en istx'otx' tu' .
42013007	Yalni naj tet naj : " Oxebxa habil chilan wulic'ojan wilnojan ta ay sat hune' te' higuera ti' , yaja' caw machi huno sat te' chak'a . Wal tinan̈ xin , tzoc'can̈ te' , naban̈e majbililo tx'otx' yu te' , " ẍi naj .
42013008	Istak'wican̈ naj chitan̈en istx'otx' naj tu' : " Mamin , acano te' hune'xa habil ti' . Chint'oco'an tx'otx' yich te' , cat wanicojan yabonohal te' .
42013009	Ta chiyak'a sat te' , c'ul chal tu' , ta mach xin , cat hatzoc'nican̈ te' , " ẍi naj .
42013010	Yin̈ hune' tz'ayical xewilal yet iscuywa Comam yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel ,
42013011	ayicto hune' ix ix waxajlan̈ebxa habil yoc hune' yabil yin̈ yu hune' ischejab naj matzwalil , caw c'on̈anxa ye ix yu , maẍtic'a xin chu istoholban̈en isba ix .
42013012	Hayet yilnito Comam Jes'us ix , yawtenti Comam ix isc'atan̈ , yalni Comam tet ix : -- Hach ti' miyay , macachcolchalo yul isk'ab hune' yabil ti' , ẍi Comam .
42013013	Lahwi tu' xin yanayo Comam isk'ab yiban̈ ix . Hac tu' yu istoholban̈en isba ix . Yichico ix yalni c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios .
42013014	Yaja' caw tit ishowal naj yahawil yin̈ capilla , yuto cawxican̈ hune' ix tu' yu Comam yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal . Yalni naj tet anma : -- Caw wajeb tz'ayic chon̈munla yul semana , yuxin yulbal wajeb tz'ayic tu' hulan̈we heyak'a' an̈te heba , yaj maẍtaj yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal , ẍi naj .
42013015	Istak'wican̈ Comam : -- Hex cheyal heba c'ulal ti' , ta ay hunu hewacax maca to hunu hecheh xecan yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal , ¿ tom mach chepuhilo no' , cat heto heyak'no uc'u ha' no' ?
42013016	Wal hune' ix ix ti' , yichmam ix ye icham Abraham , waxajlan̈ebxa habil istzabloti ix yu hune' yabil ak'bilico yu ischejab naj matzwalil ti' . ¿ Tom xin yu istz'ayical xewilal yuxin mach chu iscolcha ix yin̈ hune' isya'tajil ayco yin̈ ti' , heyalni ? ẍi Comam .
42013017	Hayet yalni Comam haca' tu' , sunil ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam tx'ixwican̈ ebnaj yet yaben hune' tu' . Wal sunil anma xin , caw chitzala isc'ul yilni sunil nimeta c'aybalc'ule iswatx'e Comam .
42013018	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- ¿ Tzet chu isch'ib isbisil anma ch'oc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , heyalni ? ¿ Baytet yeb c'ul inlahbanan ?
42013019	Anma chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios , lahan yeb hunu nich'an yin̈atil te' mostaza chistz'un hunu naj sat istx'otx' . Chich'ibcan̈ te' , cat yoc te' nime te'al , hac tu' xin chu yapni no' ch'ic iswatx'enoco yatut xol isk'ab te' , ẍi Comam .
42013020	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Chiwalan hune'xa yechel ti' teyet yin̈ tzet chu isch'ib isbisil anma chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
42013021	Lahan haca' nich'ano yan̈al ixim pan chaco hunu ix ix xol oxeb mal ixim harina . Caw xin chisipc'acan̈ sunil ixim yu , ẍi Comam .
42013022	Hayet isto Comam Jes'us yul beh chi'apni bey Jerusal'en , ay huntek'an con̈ob yeb huntek'an aldea bay ec' Comam cuywal .
42013023	Ay xin hune' naj k'amben tet Comam : -- Mamin , ¿ tom haywan̈ch'ann̈e mac chicolchahi ? ẍi naj . Istak'wi Comam :
42013024	-- Ak'we heyanma heyocto yul hune' pulta nich'an ch'an sat . Wal xin chiwalan teyet , caw tx'i'al mac choche chi'octoj , yaj mach chu yu .
42013025	Wal xin haninti'an lahaninan haca' hunu yahaw n̈a . Yet ak'balil xin chinpebaltijan ispultahil te' . Lahwi tu' , hex chexcancano istin̈a ch'elicto heyaw sat pulta , cheyalni : " Mamin , hajon̈ic'tojan̈ , " quexchi . Yaj chintak'wihan teyet : " Mach quexwohtajojan , " quinchiyan .
42013026	Yet ayex istin̈a tu' , cheyalnictoj : " Caw hune'n̈e con̈wa'i , con̈hacuynipaxojan̈ yulajla beh , " quexchi .
42013027	Cat xin intak'wipaxojan teyet : " Mawalan teyet ta mach quexwohtajojan . ¡ Elan̈we inc'atan̈an hex istx'ojaln̈e chewatx'e ! " quinchiyan teyet yin̈ hune' tz'ayical tu' .
42013028	Hac tu' xin chu heyoc ok'oj , cat isn̈etx'la heyeh yu isya'tajil yet cheyilni icham Abraham yeb naj Isaac yeb naj Jacobo yeb sunil ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ayco isc'atan̈ Comam . Walex hex ti' , mach chexchahlaxictoj .
42013029	Wal xin chitit anma yulajla con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , cat iscutxico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios , cat iswa' sat meẍa isc'atan̈ Comam Dios Yahawil .
42013030	Ay mac machi yelapno yul sat anma tinan̈ , yaj caw ay yelapno ye yul sat Comam Dios , ha' caw c'ul ch'elcanico yet bak'in . Aypaxo anma , caw ay yelapno ye tinan̈ yul sat anma , yaj mach c'ulu ch'eloco yet bak'in , ẍi Comam .
42013031	Ha'tic'a yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' , apni huntek'an ebnaj fariseo isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us , yalni ebnaj : -- Mamin , elan̈ yul cocon̈obti'an̈ yuto choche naj Herodes cachispotx'o' , ẍi ebnaj .
42013032	Istak'wi Comam : -- As halwe tet hune' naj lek'ti' tu' haca' no' wech ta hune' tz'ayic ti' yebpaxo hecal chiwak' cawxojan anma ya'ay , yebpaxo xin chiwilojan ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma , ha' to yet cabe chilahwi inmunilti'an .
42013033	Yuto yilal inlahnihan hune' inbelti'an tinan̈ yeb hecal , yet cabe xin chinapnihan bey Jerusal'en , yuto sunil ischejab Comam Dios yilal iscam bey Jerusal'en tu' , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
42013034	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Hex ah Jerusal'en hex ti' , chepotx' camo ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios , chek'ojni camo ebnaj chejbilti texol yu Comam . Caw tx'i'al el quexwawtecojan yul ink'aban , haca' chu yawtenico no' mi'e chiyo niẍte yunin yalan̈ xic' , yaja' machi heje .
42013035	Wal tinan̈ chiwalcanojan teyet , hune' bay ayex ti' chibejlaxcanoj . Chiwalnipaxcanojan teyet tato matxa chinheyilan masanto ch'apni yorahil bay cheyala' : " Jalawe tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Mac chul coxol yin̈ isbi Comam Dios , " quexchi , ẍi Comam .
42014001	Ha' yin̈ hune' tz'ayical xewilal , to Comam Jes'us wa'o bey yatut hune' naj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj fariseo . Aypaxic'o xin huntek'anxa ebnaj yet fariseohal naj tu' , yaben tzet chu yayc'ay Comam yin̈ huno tzoti' .
42014002	Yapni hune' naj sata Comam , chimal yoj yeb isnimanil .
42014003	Isk'amben Comam tet ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es , yeb tet ebnaj fariseo : -- ¿ Chimisje jan̈ten hunu anma ya'ay yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal , mato mach chuhi ? ẍi Comam .
42014004	Yaja' maẍtic'a tak'wi ebnaj . Yoc tzabno Comam yin̈ isk'ab naj ya'ay tu' , iscawxican̈ naj xin . Lahwi tu' ischejlaxtopaxo naj yu Comam .
42014005	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- K'inalo ta chitohc'ay hunu heyuninal maca hunu hewacax yul hunu c'uh , ¿ tom mach cheyihti yin̈ an̈e , walca istz'ayical xewilal ? ẍi Comam .
42014006	Yaj xin maẍtic'a yu istak'wi ebnaj yin̈ tzet yal Comam .
42014007	Hayet yilni Comam Jes'us anma awtebil tu' issaynilo anma huntek'an tz'on̈obal ayco yin̈ meẍa caw ay yelapno yehi , yalni Comam hune' cuybanil ti' tet anma :
42014008	-- Hayet chexawtelax yin̈ hunu mohyilal , mach chexay tz'on̈no yul ch'em caw ay yelapno yehi . Yuto ta ch'apni hunu naj ec'bal yelapno ye tesataj ,
42014009	cat yapni naj awten̈e hex tu' , cat yalni naj teyet : " Acano hune' tz'on̈obal tet naj ti' , " ta ẍi naj , cat heto yin̈ tx'ixwilal bey hune' comon ch'em .
42014010	Wal xin hayet chexawtelaxi , saywe huntek'an comon tz'on̈obal bay chextz'on̈i , haxinwal yet ch'apni naj quexawten tu' , cat yalni naj teyet : " Hex wamigo ec'anweti yul tz'on̈obal bay caw ay yelapno ye tilah , " ẍi naj . Haxinwal ch'oc hewinajil sata ebnaj ayco tec'atan̈ sat meẍa tu' .
42014011	Yuto ha' mac chiyican̈ isba , chi'ilaxayoj , wal mac chiyiyo isba , chi'ilaxcan̈ , ẍi Comam .
42014012	Yalnipaxo Comam tet naj awten tu' : -- Hayet chawawten anma wa'o tac'atan̈ , mach han̈c'an̈eho hawamigo chawawte yeb hawuẍtaj yeb hawic'al yeb anma k'alom ay hacawilal , yuto ha' ebnaj tu' , chak' ebnaj selel tawet yet chaẍyawtenpaxo ebnaj wa'o isc'atan̈ .
42014013	Wal xin ta ay hunu hak'in̈ chawec'tze , cat hawawten anma wa'oj , awte anma meba' , anma mach tz'ajano ye isnimanil , anma mach chu yeq'ui , yebpaxo anma mach chu yilni .
42014014	Ta hac tu' chawute , sak'al hawet chal tu' , yuto chachah ispaj selel yin̈ hune' tz'ayical bay chiitzitzbican̈ anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam .
42014015	Hayet yabelax hune' tu' yu anma ayco sat meẍa tu' , yalni hune' naj tet Comam : -- ¡ Sak'al yet anma chiwa' isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yet hune' tz'ayical tu' ! ẍi naj .
42014016	Yuxin yal Comam Jes'us haca' ti' : -- Yet hunel ay hune' naj winaj ec'tzen hune' niman k'in̈ . Caw xin tx'i'al anma yawte naj wa'o isc'atan̈ .
42014017	Hayet lan̈anxa yapni yorahil yoc wah tu' , ischejnito naj isc'amte' yalno tet ebnaj awtebil tu' haca' ti' : " Ton̈wej yuto c'ulxa ye tzet chelo , " ẍi naj .
42014018	Hayet yaben ebnaj tzet yal naj c'amte' tu' , yalni naj babel : " Lan̈anto inlok'nihan hune' intx'otx'an , ha' tx'otx' chintohan wila'an tinan̈ , yuxinto ak' nimanc'ulal win̈an , mach chu wapnojan , " ẍi naj .
42014019	Ha' hunxa naj xin halni haca' ti' : " Lan̈anto inlok'nihan lahon̈c'on̈ inwacaxan yet munil , yuxin ha' no' chinto wilwehan ismunla tinan̈ . Caw ak' nimanc'ulal win̈an , mach chu intohan , " ẍi naj .
42014020	Yalnipaxo hunxa naj : " Caw tolto quinmohyihan , caw mach chu intohan , " ẍi naj .
42014021	Hayet ismeltzo naj c'amte' tu' , yalni naj sunil tzet yal ebnaj awtebil tu' tet naj yahaw tu' . Caw xin tit ishowal naj , yalni naj tet isc'amte' hunelxa : " Wal tinan̈ , asi' yulaj nime beh , yeb yulaj niẍte beh , cat hawiniti sunil anma meba' , anma caw yan̈yon̈e , anma mach chu yilni yeb xin anma tx'oj ye yoj , " ẍi naj .
42014022	Hunepixto xin ismeltzo naj c'amte' tu' , yalni naj : " Mamin , manyijehan inbeyc'ojan wawte'an anma maxawal wetan , yaj caw aytopaxo hamanil lah , " ẍi naj .
42014023	Yalnipaxo naj yahaw tu' : " Asi'paxo yulaj niẍte beh yebpaxo yulaj nimeta beh , cat hachejniti anma bey watutti'an , haxinwal nohnaxa yul watutti'an , cat istzabloco hune' k'in̈ ti' .
42014024	Yuxinto chiwalan teyet : Sunil ebnaj awtebil babel tu' , machi hunu ebnaj chiwa'o sat inmeẍati'an , " ẍi naj yahaw tu' , ẍi Comam .
42014025	Caw hantan̈e anma oc tzujno yinta Comam Jes'us . Hayet hunel tu' , ismeltzo isba Comam , yalni tet anma :
42014026	-- Ta ay mac choche chi'oc inchejabojan yaj ta ec'bal chaco yanma yin̈ ismam yeb ismi' insatajan , maca yin̈ yixal , yuninal , yuẍtaj , yanab maca chisya'iln̈e isba insatajan , ta hac tu' mach chu yoc inchejabojan .
42014027	Ha' mac hinan yaben isya'tajil walca ch'ak'lax camo yin̈ culus , ha' chu yoc inchejabojan .
42014028	K'inaloj ta ay hunujex cheyoche heyak'acan̈ hunu heyatut caw nimajal chu , ¿ tom mach babelo chexoc tz'on̈noj , cat hetxumni hanta chec'ay yin̈ , yu heyilni ta chexk'oji , mato machoj ?
42014029	Yaja' ta ton̈e niman cheyayo xe' matxa chexk'oji helahni te' , ch'oc anma tzebo teyin̈ yet chilni hune' tu' ,
42014030	cat yalni : " Hune' naj ti' , ton̈e yicheco naj hune' yatut ti' , yaj machi mak'oji naj islahni , " ẍim anma tu' .
42014031	Macato ta ay hunu naj rey lan̈an isto ak'o howal yin̈ hunxa naj rey , yaja' lahon̈ebn̈e mil issoldado naj . ¿ Mataxca mach babelo ch'oc tz'on̈no naj , cat yilni naj ta chu isk'oji naj yin̈ hunxa naj rey ay hunc'al mil issoldado ?
42014032	Yaja' ta chistxum naj ta mach chik'oji naj chabe , yet nahatto ayto hunxa naj rey tu' , cat yanito naj ischejab isk'anno tzet chu yoc yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb naj .
42014033	Yuxin , haquexpax tu' hex ti' , ta cheyoche oco tzujnu wintajan , caw yilal quinheyanicojan babel sata sunil tzet ayex , ẍi Comam .
42014034	Hac tu' xin , caw c'ul atz'am atz'am yocnico ju , yaja' ta chic'ayto isc'achi'al atz'am , ¿ tzet chu yoc isc'achi'al hunelxa ?
42014035	Matxa tzet ch'ocnico atz'am tu' , nitam cosomnito xol tx'o tx'otx' , maca xol k'alem yu yoc abonohal . Wal xin toxan̈e chitirlaxtoj . Txumwelo tzet chalilo hune' chiwalti'an , ẍi Comam tet anma tu' .
42015001	Ha' ebnaj chiinilo ch'en tohlabal chito bey Roma , yeb ebnaj mach c'ulo tzet chiswatx'e , ha' ebnaj hitzico yaben tzet chal Comam Jes'us .
42015002	Yu hune' tu' xin oc ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es buchwal yin̈ Comam , yalni ebnaj : -- Wal naj Jes'us ti' , caw chischah naj ebnaj mulum , cat iswa'paxo naj yeb ebnaj , ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
42015003	Yuxin yal Comam hune' yechel ti' tet ebnaj :
42015004	-- K'inaloj ta ay hunu naj ay cien isme' , yaja' ta chic'ayico hunu no' , ¿ mataxca mach chacano naj no' noventa y nueve bay chilowi , cat isto naj issayno no' c'aynato tu' masanto chi'ilcha no' yu naj ?
42015005	Hayet chi'ilcha no' yu naj , caw chitzalacan̈ isc'ul naj , cat yanahto naj no' yiban̈ iswixic' , cat istit naj .
42015006	Haxa yet ch'apni naj yatut , cat iscutxbanico naj yamigo yeb anma ayayo iscawilal naj , cat yalni naj : " Tzalahan̈we wintajan yuto ma'ilcha hune' inme'an c'aynatoj , " ẍi naj .
42015007	Yuxin chiwalpaxojan teyet , hayet ch'oc hune' anma mulum yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ay tzalahilal yul satcan̈ satapaxo yin̈ noventa y nueve anma chisna ta machi ismul , ẍi Comam .
42015008	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- K'inaloj ta ay hunu ix ix ay lahon̈eb ismelyu , yaja' ta chisc'ayto ix hunu ch'en , ¿ mataxca mach chistzujba ix k'a' yin̈ iscantil , cat istz'isni ix yul yatut , cat issayni ix yin̈ nan̈c'ulal masanto chi'ilcha ch'en yu ix ?
42015009	Lahwi yilcha ch'en yu ix xin , cat iscutxbanayo ix iswalix yeb anma ayayo iscawilal , cat yalni ix : " Tzalahan̈we wintajan , yuto ma'ilcha inmelyuhan c'aynatoj , " ẍi ix .
42015010	Yuxin chiwalan teyet , hac tu' yul satcan̈ , caw ay tzalahilal xol ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios yu hune' naj mulum chisna isba cat yoc yul iskab Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .
42015011	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Ay hune' naj mame cawan̈ isc'ahol .
42015012	Yaja' naj tzujan winaj tu' yal naj tet ismam : " Mam , ak'cano inmajulan tinan̈ , " ẍi naj . Yuxin ispohto naj mame tu' tzet ay yin̈ ebnaj iscawan̈il .
42015013	Hayebixto tz'ayic xin iscutxbanayo naj istohol ismajul ak'lax tet , isto naj bey hune' con̈ob nahat , yoc naj isc'aytzenolo ismelyu yin̈ istx'ojal .
42015014	Hayet xaistan̈tzelo naj sunil ismelyu tu' , yichico hune' niman wahilal bey hune' con̈ob tu' . Niẍtejal xin yoc naj yijlen wahil yu man̈tzetal .
42015015	Yuxin to naj isk'ana' yet munil tet hune' naj ay yul con̈ob tu' . Ischejlaxto naj tan̈e txitam sat istx'otx' naj yahaw no' .
42015016	Yu n̈ohchahilal xin yoche naj islob sat te' tx'alib chi'ak'lax islob no' txitam , yuto machi mac ch'ak'ni tzet chislo naj .
42015017	Lahwi tu' xin , istit yin̈ isnabal naj , yalni naj ischuquil : " Sunil isc'amte' inmaman caw ay tzet chislo , wal inpaxojan xin , lan̈an incaman yu wahil bey ti' .
42015018	Wal tinan̈ meltzohoj intohan bey yatut inmamtu'an , cat walnihan tet ya' : ` Mam , caw mawaco inmulan yul sat Comam Dios yebpaxo yul hasat .
42015019	Matxa chu wocan hac'aholoj , to hac'amte'xa chiwucojan , ' quinchin̈etic'ahan , " ẍi naj ischuquil .
42015020	Lahwi tu' xin , ispaxto naj bey yatut ismam . Ayto yapni naj xin , yillaxto naj yu ismam ; caw tz'aycan̈ isc'ul ismam naj yilni . Isto lemna naj mame tu' ischahno naj . Yoc lak'no naj yin̈ isc'ahol tu' , istz'ohnipaxo naj isk'otx naj yu tzalahilal .
42015021	Yalni naj tet ismam : " Mam , caw mawaco inmulan yul sat Comam Dios , yebpaxo tawet . Matxa chu wocan hac'aholoj , " ẍi naj .
42015022	Yalni naj mame tu' tet ebnaj ischejab : " As iwelti yin̈ an̈e hunu xilk'ape caw c'ul , cat yoc yin̈ inc'aholti'an , cat heyanico isjolk'ab naj yeb isxan̈ab naj ,
42015023	cat hetopaxo heyinoti hunu no' wacax caw bak'ich , cat hepotx'ni camo no' , yuto chijec'tze hunu k'in̈ , cat cowa'wej .
42015024	Yuto ha' hune' inc'aholti'an haca'tan̈e camnaxa , yaja' haca'tan̈e mahulcan̈ isc'ul naj . Haca' ta c'aynaxato naj , yaj tinan̈ ma'ilcha naj , " ẍi naj mame tu' . Lahwi tu' xin yec'tzelax hune' k'in̈ tu' .
42015025	Yet ayco ebnaj yin̈ hune' k'in̈ tu' , yul naj babel c'ahole yin̈ ismunil . Yaja' ayto yapni naj bey yatut yaben naj hune' k'in̈ tu' .
42015026	Yawten naj hune' ischejab ismam , isk'amben naj : " ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxin ayco hune' k'in̈ tu' ? " ẍi naj .
42015027	Yalni naj chejab tu' tet naj : " To hawuẍta mahuli , yuxin mayal hamam ta chipotx'lax camo hunu no' wacax caw bak'ich yuto cawn̈e mayu yul naj , " ẍi naj .
42015028	Yaja' caw tit ishowal naj , yuxin mach isjecto naj yul yatut ismam . Haxa yet yaben naj mame tu' , yelti naj , yay sat naj tet isc'ahol tu' ta ch'octo naj yul n̈a .
42015029	Yalni naj tet ismam tu' : " Mam , caw hawohtaj hantaxa tiempo wichicojan inmunlahan tawintaj . Machi hunelo chinman̈c'ohan tzet chawala , yaj nitam hunu no' nich'an chiw chawak' wetan cat wec'tzenan hunu k'in̈ yeb ej wamigohan , " ẍi naj .
42015030	" ¿ Tom yu mahul hune' hac'ahol ti' yuxin maxapotx' camo no' wacax caw bak'ich ? Naj ton̈e etanto hamelyu yin̈ ebix ix tx'oj ye iswi' , " ẍi naj tet ismam tu' .
42015031	Istak'wi naj mame tu' : " C'ahol , hach ti' , ayachtic'aco inc'atan̈an sunilbal tiempo , yeb sunil tzet ayinan hawetpaxo yehi .
42015032	Yaja' tinan̈ caw yilal yoc hune' k'in̈ ti' cat jak'ni tzala coc'ul , yuto hune' hawuẍta ti' haca'tan̈e camnaxa , yaj mahulcan̈ isc'ul hunelxa . Haca' ta c'aynaxato naj , yaj tinan̈ xin ma'ilcha naj , " ẍi naj mame tu' , ẍi Comam .
42016001	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us hune'xa yechel ti' tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Ay hune' naj k'alom , ay xin hune' naj ayco yahawo ismunil naj . Yaja' yabelo naj patr'on tu' ta lan̈an isc'aynilo naj ilom munil tu' tzet ay naj .
42016002	Yuxinto yawte naj patr'on naj ilom munil tu' , yalni naj tet naj : " Mahul hallaxo wetan tato ach ti' lan̈an hac'aynilo tzet ayinan . Wal tinan̈ xin , caw yilal tz'ajan chawak'cano sunil tzet ayco yul hak'ab wuhan , yuto chaẍwilojan yin̈ inmunilti'an , " ẍi naj .
42016003	Yalni naj ilom munil tu' yin̈ isnabal : " ¿ Tzet chiwute inbahan , yuto chiyik'alo inpatronan inmunilti'an ? Yaj matxa k'aynajo innimanilti'an yin̈ munil caw ya'taj . Chintx'ixwipaxojan wec'an k'ano tzet ye tu' matanil tet anma .
42016004	Wal tinan̈ wohtaxahan tzet chiwute inbahan , waxan̈ca machi inmunilan ay mac chinchahnihan bey yatut , " ẍi naj .
42016005	Lahwi tu' xin , yichico naj yawten ebnaj ay isc'as tet ispatr'on tu' yin̈ hununtajil . Isk'amben naj tet naj babel : " ¿ Hanta hac'as tet inpatronan ? " ẍi naj .
42016006	Yalni naj xin : " Hune' cien barril te' aceite inc'asan , " ẍi naj . Yalni naj ilom munil tu' : " Tinan̈ xin , ay yumal hac'as lah . Ayan̈ tz'on̈noj , cincuenta xan̈e chawuteco hac'as yin̈ hune' hum ti' yin̈ an̈e , " ẍi naj .
42016007	Lahwi tu' xin , isk'amben naj tet hunxa naj : " ¿ Hanta hac'as tet inpatronan ? " ẍi naj . Istak'wi naj : " Hune' cien mal ixim trigo , " ẍi naj . Yalni naj ilom munil tu' : " Ay yumal hac'as lah , ochenta xan̈e chawuteco hac'as yin̈ te' , " ẍi naj .
42016008	C'ayilo isc'ul naj patr'on tu' yin̈ naj ilom munil tu' , waxan̈ca tx'oj isnabal naj , yaj caw helan naj iscolni isba . Yuxin chiwalan teyet , caw bisc'ulal , yuto ha' anma mach ohtan̈e Comam Dios , caw helan iswatx'en istx'ojal . Wal ebnaj yet Comam yehi , caw mach helano ebnaj iswatx'en tzet choche Comam Dios .
42016009	Chiwalan teyet , ha' ch'en melyu chu iswatx'en ch'en istx'ojal ; walex hex ti' xin , yin̈n̈eojab isc'ulal cheyaco hemelyu , haxinwal ay mac chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Ta hac tu' , hayet matxa tzet ch'ocnico ch'en melyu heyu , Comam Dios chexchahni bey hune' heyatut satcan̈ yin̈ huneln̈e .
42016010	Ha' mac c'ul chute isba yin̈ nich'an ch'ak'lax yul isk'ab , caw c'ulpaxo chute isba yin̈ niman ch'ak'lax tet . Hac tu' xin , ha' mac machiswalil chute isba yin̈ nich'an ch'ak'lax tet , caw machiswalil chutepaxo isba yin̈ niman ch'ak'lax yul isk'ab .
42016011	Yuxin ta mach c'ulo cheyute heba yin̈ hek'alomal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ¿ ha' tom xin hune' isk'alomal satcan̈ chi'ak'lax teyet ? ¡ Machoj !
42016012	Hac tu' xin ta mach c'ulo cheyute heba yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach heyeto yehi , ¿ hato c'anab hune' heyettic'a yehi chiak'lax teyet ? ¡ Machoj !
42016013	Machi hunu naj munlawom chu ismunla yinta cawan̈ patr'on , yuto ta choche naj naj babel , chisyah naj naj iscab . Yebpaxo ta yijem chute isba naj tet naj babel , chisman̈c'o naj tzet chal naj iscab . Hac tu' xin mach chu coyijen tzet chal Comam Dios ta ayco janma yin̈ k'alomal , ẍi Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom tu' .
42016014	Haxa yet yaben ebnaj fariseo tzet yal Comam Jes'us , yoc ebnaj buchwal yin̈ Comam , yuto caw ayco yanma ebnaj yin̈ ismelyu .
42016015	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Hex ti' , satan̈e anma caw c'ul cheyute heba , yaj Comam Dios yohta tzet ayayto yul heyanma . Ha' tzet ye tu' caw niman yelapno ye yul sat anma , machi yelapno yul sat Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
42016016	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Yalan̈to maẍto chul naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma , cuylax isley naj Mois'es yeb tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat . Yin̈xa istiempohal naj Juan tu' xin , ichico ispujbalaxic'o tzoti' c'ul yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ha' anma tu' chak' yip yanma yoc yul isk'ab Comam .
42016017	Hune' satcan̈ ti' yeb tx'o tx'otx' chitan̈iloj , wal isley Comam Dios , machi hunu cuybanil ch'ec'to yet yijni isba sunil , ẍi Comam .
42016018	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Ta ay hunu naj winaj chispole isba yeb yixal , cat ismohyi yeb hunuxa ix , chaco naj ismul yul sat Comam Dios . Yebpaxo naj chi'ik'ni ix pohlebil isba yeb yichamil tu' , chapaxico ismul naj yul sat Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .
42016019	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us hune'xa cuybanile haca' ti' : -- Yet hunel ay hune' naj winaj caw k'alom , han̈c'an̈e k'ap xilk'ape caw c'ul , caw ay istohol chaco naj yin̈ . Chec'tzen naj nimeta k'in̈ yul yatut hunun tz'ayic .
42016020	Aypaxo hune' naj caw meba' , L'azaro isbi ; chiay tz'on̈no isti' ispultahil yatut naj k'alom tu' , caw choche naj yak'a' noho isc'ul yu isk'al isti' naj k'alom chi'ayc'ayti sat meẍa . Caw xin ya'ay naj yu tx'ac , ch'apni xin metx tx'i' islek'a' istx'ac naj tu' .
42016021	
42016022	Yaj hul hune' tz'ayic bay cam naj L'azaro tu' , yilaxto yanma naj yu ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios bey hune' ehobal ch'ij para'iso isc'atan̈ icham Abraham . Iscampaxo naj k'alom tu' , ismujlax naj .
42016023	Haxa yet ayxa naj k'alom yul cambal , lan̈an xin yec'ya' yanma naj bey tu' , ist'an̈xito naj yilnito naj naj L'azaro isc'atan̈ icham Abraham .
42016024	Yah yaw naj k'alom tu' , yalni naj haca' ti' : " Mam Abraham , tz'ayojab hac'ul win̈an . Chejti naj L'azaro inc'atan̈an ink'ana'an , islaba'ab naj iswi' yiximal isk'ab xol ha ha' , cat yul yak'no chewbo naj wak'an , yuto caw ch'ec'ya' wanmahan xol hune' k'a k'a' ti' , " ẍi naj k'alom tu' .
42016025	Istak'wi icham Abraham tu' : " Hach wet anmahil tijab yul hac'ul yet ayach yul sat yiban̈k'inal , caw c'ulch'ann̈e ec' hawila' , wal naj L'azaro ti' , caw isya'tajiln̈e bey naj yila' . Yaja' tinan̈ , lan̈an yak'ni tzalaho isc'ul naj , walach xin , lan̈an hawaben isya'tajil .
42016026	Yebpaxoj , ay hune' niman xab coxol , walca ta ay mac choche ch'ec'to bay ayex tu' , mach chuhi , yebpaxo ta ay mac bay ayex tu' choche ch'ec'ti bey ti' , mach chupaxoj , " ẍi icham Abraham tu' tet naj .
42016027	Yalnipaxo naj k'alom tu' : " Ta hac tu' xin , Mam Abraham , caw chink'anan tawet ta chachejto naj L'azaro tu' bey yatut inmaman ,
42016028	cat yalni naj yabe' howan̈ wuẍtajan ay bey tu' , haxinwal mach chul ebnaj yeta' yanma bay ay inti'an , " ẍi naj .
42016029	Yalnipaxo icham Abraham tu' : " Wal ebnaj hawuẍta tu' , ayco tzet tz'ibn̈ebil yu naj Mois'es yeb tzet tz'ibn̈ebil yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios tet ebnaj . ¡ Isyijeojab ebnaj tzet chala ! " ẍi icham .
42016030	Istak'wican̈ naj k'alom tu' : " Ho' , yeli Mam Abraham , yaja' ta ay hunu naj camnaxa chiitzitzibican̈ , cat isto yalno tet ebnaj wuẍtatu'an chimisbeja'cano ebnaj istx'ojal , " ẍi naj .
42016031	Yalnipaxo icham Abraham : " Tato mach choche ebnaj yabe tzet yalcano naj Mois'es yeb tzet halbilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios , waxan̈ca ay hunu naj camnaxa chiitzitzbican̈ xol camom , cat isto yalno tet ebnaj , maẍtic'am chahpaxico ebnaj yin̈ isc'ul , " ẍi icham Abraham tet naj , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
42017001	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Ayn̈etic'a istx'ojal bay ch'ayc'ay anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ¡ yaja' c'anch'an mac ch'ak'ni ayc'ayo hunu maca !
42017002	Ha' hune' mac tu' , c'ulojab isc'allaxico hunu niman ch'en yin̈ isnuk' , cat istirlaxto xol ha' mar sata ta chak' ayc'ayo yin̈ istx'ojal hunu mac uninto win̈an , ẍi Comam .
42017003	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- ¡ Nann̈eojab heyu hex ti' ! Ta ay hunu heyuẍta maca hunu heyanab chaco ismul teyet , cachwan̈we yin̈ . Yaj ta chishel isbeybal , ak'we nimanc'ulal yin̈ ,
42017004	waxan̈ca hujel chaco ismul teyet yin̈ hune' tz'ayic , yaj ta hujel ch'apni isk'ana' nimanc'ulal teyet , yilal heyak'ni nimanc'ulal yin̈ , ẍi Comam .
42017005	Isk'anni ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us tet haca' ti' : -- Ak' yip janmahan̈ yin̈ Comam Dios , ẍi ebnaj .
42017006	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Ta caw cheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , waxan̈ca chiichico haca' hunu te' nich'an hin̈at mostaza , wal tu' chu heyalni tet hunu te' k'ebtaj morera haca' ti' : " Hoc'ati haba bey ti' , cat hato hatz'unnayto haba xol ha' mar , " ta quexchi , chisyije te' tzet cheyala , ẍi Comam .
42017007	Yalni Comam : -- Ta ay hunu hemunlawom ispeto t'oco tx'otx' , maca ilo wacax , mataxca cheyal tet naj : " Ocan̈ , ayan̈ tz'onoj cat hawa'i , " ¿ Tom quexchi xin ?
42017008	¡ Machoj ! To ha' cheyal tet naj : " Watx'e tzet chinlohan , chilahwi tu' , cat hawoc habatx'nic'o tzet chiwochehan , chilahwo inwa'canojan xin , cat hawa'o hach ti' , " quexchi .
42017009	¿ Tom xin cheyak' yuch'andiosal tet naj yu chisyijen naj tzet cheyala ? ¡ Machoj !
42017010	Haca' hune' naj munlawom tu' , haquex tu' hex ti' . Lahwi hewatx'en sunil baytet chejbil hewatx'e yu Comam Dios , cat heyalni haca' ti' : " Wal xin caw ismunlawom Comam Dios jecanojan̈ yuxin caw yilal coyijenan̈ tzet chal Comam Dios , " quexchiojabi , ẍi Comam .
42017011	Yet lan̈an isto Comam Jes'us yul isbelal Jerusal'en , yec'to Comam xolbal ismajul Samaria yeb ismajul Galilea .
42017012	Hayet yapni Comam bey hune' aldea , yelilo lahon̈wan̈ ebnaj winaj ischahno Comam . Ayco yabil lepra yin̈ ebnaj , yuxin nahat cancano lin̈no ebnaj .
42017013	Istzabnico ebnaj yahwi tet Comam : -- Mam Jes'us , Mam cuywawom , caw tz'ayojab hac'ul jin̈an̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
42017014	Hayet yilni Comam Jes'us ebnaj , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- As yewe heba sata ebnaj sacerdote Israel , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj . Hayet lan̈an isbelwi ebnaj tu' , yelcano hune' yabil tu' yin̈ ebnaj .
42017015	Hune' naj xol ebnaj tu' , hayet yilni naj ta caw c'ulxa ye isnimanil , ismeltzoti naj yin̈ caw tzalahilal yalni c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios yin̈ caw ip .
42017016	Hayet yapni naj isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us , yay jahno naj sata Comam yu yak'ni naj yuch'andiosal tet Comam . Hune' naj tu' , ah Samaria naj .
42017017	Lahwi tu' , yalni Comam Jes'us : -- Yaj lahon̈wan̈ ebnaj mael hune' yabil ti' yin̈ , ¿ baytu'wal ayco balon̈wan̈xa ebnaj ?
42017018	¿ Tom han̈c'an̈e hune' naj nan con̈obal ti' mahul ak'no yuch'andios tet Comam Dios ? ẍi Comam .
42017019	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Ahan̈lin̈noj , cat hapaxtoj . Yu maxawaco hawanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin macachan̈chahi , ẍi Comam tet naj .
42017020	Ay huntek'an ebnaj fariseo k'amben tet Comam Jes'us bak'in chihul istiempohal yet ch'oc Comam Dios Jahawiloj . Istak'wi Comam : -- Hayet ch'oc Comam Dios heyahawiloj , mach chu jilni yu cosat .
42017021	Yuxin machi mac chu yalni : " Ha' bey ti' aya , " maca to " Ha' bey tu' aya , " mach ẍioj . Yuto haxa yul yanma anma ch'oc Comam Dios Yahawoj , ẍi Comam .
42017022	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Chi'ayilo hune' tiempohal bay cheyala : Ayxic'a chul Comam Ak'bilti coxol yu Comam Dios hunelxa , waxan̈ca hune'n̈e tz'ayic quexchi , yaj maẍtic'a chinheyila'an .
42017023	Yuxin , waxan̈ca ay anma chihalni teyet : " Ay Comam bey ti' lah , " maca to aypaxo anma chihalni : " Ha' tu' ay Comam bey tu' lah , " waxan̈ca ẍi , caw mach chexoc tzujnu yinta ebnaj .
42017024	Yuxin chiwalcanojan teyet , haca' chu yah jepla c'uh yin̈ sunil satcan̈ , hac tu' chu wulan , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .
42017025	Yaja' yin̈ babel caw chiak'lax ec'oya' wanmahan yu anma cat quinyintan̈encaniltojan yin̈ hune' tiempohal ti' .
42017026	Haca' yu anma yin̈ istiempohal naj No'e , hac tu' chiyupaxo anma yet chinhulan yin̈ iscayelal , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .
42017027	Yin̈ istiempohal naj No'e tu' , ay ebnaj wa'o chu , aypaxo ebnaj uc'u te' , ay mac lan̈an ismohyi . Ha' huntek'an tu' lan̈an iswatx'en anma yet yocto naj No'e yul te' niman barco . Lahwi yocto naj No'e tu' , istit hune' niman yaxn̈ab , iscamilo sunil anma yu ha' .
42017028	Hac tu' yupaxo anma yin̈ istiempohal naj Lot . Caw matzet chal isc'ul anma , sak'al iswa'i yeb chi'uq'uipaxoj . Chilok'wi cat istxon̈wi . Chistz'unni istz'unub , chahnipaxocan̈ yatut .
42017029	Yaja' yet yelti naj Lot yul con̈ob Sodoma tu' , haca' xan̈e yay n̈ab , hac xan̈e tu' yayilo k'a' yeb asufre satcan̈ . Iscamilo anma sunil yu hune' k'a' tu' .
42017030	Haca' yu anma yet hune' tiempohal tu' , hac tu' chu anma yin̈ hune' tz'ayical bay chinhulan , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Inmaman .
42017031	Yet hune' tz'ayical tu' , ha' mac ayahto yiban̈ yac'alil yatut mach chu yayti yinolti isk'uybe yul yatut , yeb mac ayto xol ismunil , matxa chu ispaxti yatut .
42017032	Tijab yul hec'ul yin̈ yixal naj Lot .
42017033	Ha' mac ch'ok' yanma yin̈ tzet aya , mach chischah isk'inal yin̈ huneln̈e . Haxa mac hinan isc'ul isbejnicano tzet ye tu' win̈an , chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal .
42017034	Chiwalan teyet , ta ay cawan̈ anma chiway sat istx'at yet hune' ak'bal tu' , hune' chi'ilaxtoj , hune' chicancanoj .
42017035	Cawan̈ ebix ix hune'n̈e lan̈an iscawni , hune' ix chi'ilaxtoj , hune'xa ix chicani .
42017036	Cawan̈ ebnaj hune'n̈e chimunlahi , hune' naj chi'ilaxcan̈ , hune'xa naj chicani , ẍi Comam .
42017037	Isk'amben ebnaj iscuywom Comam : -- Mamin ¿ baytu'wal chub hune' tu' ? ẍi ebnaj . Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Caw haban hune' tu' , ha' baytic'a pac'anayo hunu camom , ha' tu' chiscutxba isba no' usmij , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
42018001	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us hune' yechel ti' tet ebnaj iscuywom yu istxumni ebnaj ta caw yilal istxahli yin̈ sunil yanma tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
42018002	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yet hunel ay hune' naj alcal yul hune' con̈ob . Caw mach chixiw naj tet Comam Dios , yebpaxo machi yelapno ye anma yul sat naj .
42018003	Yultic'a hune' con̈ob tu' ay hune' ix hunix . Hunun tz'ayic isbeyc'o ix isk'anno tet naj alcal tu' , chalni ix haca' ti' : " Ay hune' mac ay ismul wetan , yuxin chink'anan tawet ta chawatx'eayo yin̈ caw istoholal , " ẍi ix tet naj .
42018004	Tx'i'al el beyc'o ix , yaj mach chisje naj iswatx'e hune' howal tu' . Lahwi tu' xin yalni naj yul yet ischuquil : " Mach chinxiwan tet Dios , machipaxo hunu anma ay yelapno yul insatan ,
42018005	yaj wal tinan̈ xin caw yilal inwatx'enan tzet chal hune' ix ti' yun̈e isbejni ix yuli , ta machoj chitibayo wuhan yulic'o ix inc'atan̈an , " ẍi naj , ẍi Comam .
42018006	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Abewe tzet yute yalni naj alcal mach chixiw tet Comam Dios .
42018007	Hajxam Comam Dios , ¿ tom mach iscol Comam macta sic'bililo yu ta ayn̈etic'aco isk'anni tz'ayic ak'bal tet Comam ? ¿ Mataxca k'ahan yechman anma tu' tzet chisk'an tet Comam ? ¡ Machoj !
42018008	Chiwalan teyet machi nahatli iscollax huntek'an anma tu' yu Comam . Yaj yet chinhulan hunelxa , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , ¿ ay tom anma chicawxo isc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios ? Matxam caw maca , ẍi Comam Jes'us .
42018009	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us hune'xa yechel ti' tet anma chal isba c'ulal , yeb chiyahnipaxo yet anmahil .
42018010	Yalni Comam haca' ti' : -- Ay cawan̈ ebnaj beyc'o txahlo yul yatut Comam Dios , hune' naj fariseo , hune'xa naj ik'omilo tohlabal chito bey Roma .
42018011	Ha' naj fariseo , lin̈an naj chitxahli naj haca' ti' : " Mamin , chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tawet yuto haninti'an manlahanojan yeb anma elk'om , yeb anma tx'oj isbeybal , yeb ebnaj ixlom ; yebpaxo manlahanojan yeb hune' naj ik'omilo tohlabal ti' .
42018012	Walinan , cayel mach chinwa'an yul semana yu intxahlihan tawet , cat wak'nihan isdiezmohal yin̈ tzet chiwik'an , " ẍi naj tet Comam .
42018013	Wal naj ik'omilo tohlabal tu' , nahat lin̈anti naj , xulanayo naj chitxahli yu yinayo isba tet Comam . Chistin̈nico naj istxam isc'ul yu bisc'ulal yu ismul , chalni naj tet Comam : " Mamin , ak' nimanc'ulal win̈an , caw muluminan , " ẍi naj , ẍi Comam .
42018014	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Chiwalan teyet , hune' naj ik'omilo toholabal tu' , meltzo naj yatut yin̈ caw tzalahilal yuto ak'laxcano nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul naj yu Comam . Wal naj fariseo tu' , mach chischah naj isc'ulal sata Comam , yuto ha' mac chiyican̈ isba , chi'ilaxayoj , haxa mac chiyiyo isba sata Comam chi'ilaxcan̈ , ẍi Comam .
42018015	Yet hunel ay mac initi niẍte yuninal tet Comam Jes'us yu yanayo isk'ab Comam yiban̈ iswi' . Yaja' yet yilni ebnaj iscuywom Comam hune' tu' , iscachni ebnaj anma .
42018016	Yawten xin Comam ebnaj , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Mach checach istit niẍte unin inc'atan̈an , yuto ha' mac chute isnabal haca' niẍte unin ti' ha' chu yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
42018017	Yuxin chiwalan yin̈ isyelal teyet , ha' mac mach chichahni Comam Dios Yahawoj haca' yeco yanma nich'an unin yin̈ ismam ismi' , mach chu yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .
42018018	Ay hune' naj iswi'ehal con̈ob k'amben tet Comam Jes'us : -- Mam cuywawom , caw c'ulach . ¿ Tzet wal wuten inbahan cat inchahnihan hune' k'inale mach istan̈bal ? ẍi naj .
42018019	Istak'wi Comam tet naj : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin chinhawalan c'ulal ? Machi huno mac c'ul , cachann̈e Comam Dios .
42018020	Hach ti' hawohta huntek'an cuybanile chalni haca' ti' : " Mach chaẍixli , mach chaẍpotx'wahi , mach chaẍelk'awi , mach chahobcan̈ lek'ti'al yin̈ hunuxa anma , ayojab yelapno ye hamam hami' yul hasat , " ẍi Comam tet naj .
42018021	Istak'wi naj tet Comam : -- Sunilal huntek'an chawal ti' chinyijehan yichitax inch'ibtijan , ẍi naj .
42018022	Hayet yaben Comam hune' tu' , yalni Comam tet naj : -- Ayto hune'xa caw yilal hawatx'eni . Txon̈to sunil tzet ayach , cat hawitxk'anto istohol yin̈ anma meba' , haxinwal caw ay hak'alomal satcan̈ . Lahwi tu' , cat hawoc tzujno wintajan , ẍi Comam .
42018023	Hayet yaben naj hune' tu' , caw occano bisc'ulal yin̈ yanma naj yuto caw k'alom naj sic'lebil .
42018024	Hayet yilni Comam ta caw oc bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul naj , yalni Comam : -- Tzet isya'tajil yoc anma k'alom yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
42018025	K'inaloj hunu no' camello , ¿ tom subuta yec'to no' yul isholanil hunu ch'en acuẍa ? Hac tu' ye anma k'alom , caw ya'ta yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .
42018026	Ha' anma aben tzet yal Comam tu' , isk'amben haca' ti' : -- Ta hac tu' , ¿ mac taxca hunu chu iscolchahi ? ẍi anma .
42018027	Istak'wi Comam : -- Ha' tzet caw ya'ta yul sat anma , mach ya'tajo yul sat Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .
42018028	Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam : -- Mamin , wal on̈ti'an̈ sunil tzet ayon̈an̈ bejbilcano juan̈ yu joc tzujnojan̈ tawintaj , ẍi naj .
42018029	Yalni Comam Jes'us : -- Ha' mac chaco yanma yin̈ yet Comam Dios babel , tzujanxa tu' cat yanico yanma yin̈ yatut , yixal , ismam , ismi' , yuẍtaj , yanab , yuninal ,
42018030	ha' ton huntek'an anma tu' , caw niman ispaj chischah tet Comam Dios yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , cat ischahnipaxo isk'inal mach istan̈bal yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic , ẍi Comam .
42018031	Yawtelo Comam Jes'us ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom ischuquil , yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Wal tinan̈ jahweto bey Jerusal'en . Ha' bey tu' chija'cano isba sunil tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat win̈an , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios .
42018032	Chinalaxicojan yul isk'ab ebnaj mach Israeloj . Chitzebo ebnaj win̈an , cat isbahwaho ebnaj win̈an , cat istzubloco ebnaj win̈an .
42018033	Chinmak'laxojan yu ebnaj , chilahwo tu' cat quinyak'nicamojan ebnaj , yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic cat witzitzbican̈an xol camom hunelxa , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom .
42018034	Yaj maẍtic'a tzet nachalo yu ebnaj , yebpaxo maẍtic'a yohtan̈elo ebnaj baytet yin̈ tzotel Comam , yuto ewanto ye yul sat ebnaj .
42018035	Yet lan̈anxa yapni Comam Jes'us bey con̈ob Jeric'o , ay hune' naj mach chu yilni , tz'on̈anayo isti' beh k'anno melyu .
42018036	Hayet yaben naj ta caw hantan̈e anma ch'ec'to sata naj , isk'amben naj tzet chu anma tu' .
42018037	Yallax tet naj tato ha' Comam Jes'us ah Nazaret lan̈an yec'toj .
42018038	Hayet yaben naj hune' tu' , yah yaw naj yin̈ caw ip , yalni naj : -- Mam Jes'us , hach titnajach yin̈ jichmam David , tz'ayojab hac'ul win̈an , ẍi naj .
42018039	Yaja' anma babelic'o sata Comam cachwa yin̈ naj yun̈e isbejni naj yel yaw . Yaj caw ec'balto islahico naj yel yaw , yalni naj : -- Mamin hach titnajach yin̈ jichmam David , caw tz'ayojab hac'ul win̈an , ẍi naj .
42018040	Hayet yaben Comam Jes'us yel yaw naj yoc lin̈no Comam , yalni Comam ta chi'ilaxti naj isc'atan̈ . Hayet yapni naj , isk'amben Comam tet naj :
42018041	-- ¿ Tzet chawoche chinwatx'ehan ? ẍi Comam . Istak'wi naj : -- ¡ Mamin ! chiwochehan chawak' hajlo insatan , ẍi naj tet Comam .
42018042	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Hajlojab hasat yuto maxawaco hawanma win̈an , ẍi Comam .
42018043	Yaln̈ena Comam hune' tu' , ishajlo sat naj . Yoc tzujno naj yinta Comam , yak'ni naj yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios . Sunil anma ilni hune' tu' yalpaxo c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios .
42019001	Hayet yapni Comam Jes'us bey Jeric'o , yec' Comam yul con̈ob tu' .
42019002	Ha' bey tu' , ay hune' naj winaj caw k'alom , Zaqueo isbi . Yahaw yeco naj yin̈ ebnaj ik'omilo tohlabal chito bey con̈ob Roma .
42019003	Naj Zaqueo tu' , yoche naj yila Comam Jes'us , yaj mach chiyu yilni naj yuto hantan̈e anma tzujanico yinta Comam , yebpaxo yu caw nich'an ch'an istel naj .
42019004	Yuxin babic'o naj sata anma , yahto naj yin̈ isk'ab hune' te' sic'omoro aycan̈ isti' beh , yu yilni naj Comam yet ch'ec'to bey tu' .
42019005	Hayet yec'to Comam yich te' , ist'an̈xahto Comam yin̈ naj , yalni Comam tet naj : -- Zaqueo , ayan̈ti yin̈ an̈e , yuto ha' bey hawatut chincanojan hune' ak'bal ti' , ẍi Comam tet naj .
42019006	Hayet yaben naj Zaqueo hune' tu' , yin̈ an̈e ayti naj , isto naj . Caw xin chitzala isc'ul naj yet ischahni naj Comam yul yatut .
42019007	Hayet yilni anma hune' tu' , yichico anma buchwal yin̈ Comam yuto cancano Comam bey yatut hune' naj mulum .
42019008	Ha' naj Zaqueo tu' , ah lin̈no naj , yalni naj tet Comam : -- Mamin , wal tinan̈ chiwak'an yicta tzet ayinan tet anma meba' , yeb xin ta ay mac ec'bal wutelojan ismelyu , can̈elto ec'bal selel chiwak'an tet , ẍi naj .
42019009	Yalni Comam : -- Mahul hune' colbanile bey hune' n̈a ti' tinan̈ ; naj Zaqueo ti' caw yuninalpaxo icham Abraham ye naj .
42019010	Wal xin Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , hulnajinan insaya'an yeb incolnihan anma c'aynato yu ismul , ẍi Comam .
42019011	Yet lan̈an yaben anma yin̈ tzet chal Comam Jes'us tu' , lan̈anxa xin yapni Comam bey Jerusal'en yoc yin̈ isnabal anma ta lan̈anxa yapni istiempohal bay ch'oc Comam Dios Yahawilo anma , yuxin yicheco Comam yalni hune' yechel ti' .
42019012	Yalni Comam : -- Yet hunel ay hune' naj caw c'ultic'a yin̈bal . Awtelax naj yul hune' niman con̈ob yu ischahni naj yoc yahawilo yul iscon̈ob yet chimeltzohi .
42019013	Yet maẍto chito naj , yawte naj lahon̈wan̈ ebnaj chimunla yintaj , yak'nicano naj niman melyu tet hunun ebnaj yu ismunla ebnaj yeb ch'en . Lahan yutecano naj isbisil ch'en yin̈ ebnaj . Yalnicano naj tet ebnaj : " Munlahan̈we yeb ch'en inmelyuti'an masanto yet chinhulan , cat heyak'ni ch'en yeb yal wetan , " ẍi naj , isto naj xin .
42019014	Yaja' wal ebnaj yet con̈ob naj xin , caw chichiwa isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ naj , yuxin yet isto naj , tzujantic'a yu isto huntek'an ebnaj ak'oc'ule yin̈ naj tet naj awten naj tu' , yalni ebnaj tet naj caw yahaw tu' haca' ti : " Ha' hune' naj ti' caw mach chijochehan̈ ch'oc naj yahawilo yul cocon̈oban̈ , " ẍi ebnaj .
42019015	Yaj caw ak'laxtic'a hune' ismunil naj yoc yahawo iscon̈ob tu' . Haxa yet ayxa naj yul iscon̈ob hunelxa , yawten naj ebnaj lahon̈wan̈ bay yak' naj ismelyu tu' yu isk'amben naj hantaxa yal ch'en yik' hunun ebnaj .
42019016	Yapni hune' naj babel , yalni naj : " Mamin , ha' ch'en hamelyu hawacano yul ink'aban , lahon̈ebto ch'en wik'an yu ch'en , " ẍi naj .
42019017	Istak'wi naj yahaw tu' tet naj : " Hach ti' , caw c'ul yu hamunla yin̈ hanic'ch'an wacanojan tawet , yuxinto chaẍwacanicojan yahawo lahon̈eb con̈ob , " ẍi naj .
42019018	Lahwi tu' xin , yapni hunxa naj munlawom , yalni naj haca' ti' : " Mamin , ha' ch'en hamelyu hawak'cano yul ink'aban , howeb to ch'en wik'an yin̈ ch'en , " ẍi naj .
42019019	Yalni naj yahaw tu' tet naj : " Hach ti' , chaẍwacanicojan yahawilo howeb con̈ob , " ẍi naj .
42019020	Lahwi tu' xin yapni hunxa naj , yalni naj tet naj yahaw tu' haca' ti' : " Mamin , ay hamelyu lah . C'ubabil ch'en yul hune' payu'e ti' wuhan .
42019021	Caw quinxiwan intzabnihan hamelyu ti' , yuto wohtajan ta caw how ach , yebpaxo toxan̈e chachah tzet ye tu' maẍtajach watx'en̈e , yeb ton̈e chahatx' tzet ye tu' maẍtajach tz'unn̈e , " ẍi naj tet naj yahaw .
42019022	Yalni naj yahaw tu' tet naj : " Walach hach ti' , caw machiswalil yu hamunlahi , yu tzet maxawal wetti'an yuxin chaẍwacanicojan yin̈ isya'tajil .
42019023	¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxin mach hawak' inmelyuti'an c'amil tet anma , haxinwal yet manhulti'an ayxa yal ch'en chik'a ? " ẍi naj .
42019024	Yalni xin naj yahaw tu' tet ebnaj ayco isc'atan̈ haca' ti' : " Iwelo ch'en melyu tet naj ti' , cat heyak'ni ch'en tet naj ik'ni ch'en lahon̈eb to , " ẍi naj yahaw tu' .
42019025	Yalni ebnaj : " Mamin , yaj hune' naj chawal tu' , caw lahon̈ebxa ch'en ec'bal ik'bil yu naj , " ẍi ebnaj .
42019026	Istak'wi naj yahaw tu' xin : " Ha' mac ay yet , ch'ak'lax yak'bil tet , ha' mac machi yet , ha' nich'an ay yul isk'ab tu' , chi'ilaxolo tet .
42019027	Yebpaxo xin , ebnaj ayco ishowal win̈an mach choche chinocan yahawilo yul con̈ob ti' , iweti ebnaj bey ti' , cat hepotx'ni camo ebnaj yin̈ insatan , " ẍi naj yahaw tu' , ẍi Comam .
42019028	Lahwi yalni Comam Jes'us huntek'an tu' xin , isto Comam bey Jerusal'en yeb ebnaj iscuywom .
42019029	Hayet ayco Comam yin̈ istzalanil won̈an Olivo , xolbal con̈ob Betfag'e yeb con̈ob Betania , ischejnito Comam cawan̈ ebnaj iscuywom , yalni Comam tet ebnaj :
42019030	-- Asiwe bey hune' aldea cosatac'to ti' . Yet chexapno bey tu' , cheyila' hune' no' burro xecan , maẍto hunu mac chi'ahto yiban̈ no' . Chepuholo no' , cat heyinoti no' wetan , ẍi Comam .
42019031	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Ta ay mac chik'amben teyet , " ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin chepuhilo no' ? " ta ẍi , cheyala'we haca' ti' : " Ay ch'ocnico no' yu Comam Jes'us , " quexchi , ẍi Comam .
42019032	Isto ebnaj iscuywom tu' , yilcha no' yu ebnaj haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam .
42019033	Yet lan̈an ispuhnilo ebnaj no' yapni ebnaj ay yet no' tu' , yalni ebnaj : -- ¿ Tzet yuxin chepuhilo no' ? ẍi ebnaj .
42019034	Istak'wi ebnaj : -- To ay ch'ocnico no' yu Comam Jes'us , ẍi ebnaj .
42019035	Lahwi tu' xin yinito ebnaj no' tet Comam , yanahto ebnaj huntek'an xil isk'ap yiban̈ no' , tzujan tu' xin iscolwa ebnaj yanahto Comam yiban̈ no' .
42019036	Hayet lan̈an yec'to Comam xin , islitx'banayo anma xil isk'ap yul beh sata Comam yu chitzala isc'ul anma yin̈ Comam .
42019037	Hayet lan̈anxa yapni Comam yin̈ isxulanil won̈an Olivo tu' , yah yaw sunil anma tzujan yinta Comam yu tzalahilal . Yalni anma c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios yu sunil c'aybalc'ule xayil anma .
42019038	Chalni anma haca' ti' : -- Jala'we c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Jahawil chul coxol yu Comam Dios . Ayojab ak'anc'ulal yul satcan̈ , caw jak'aweco ismay Comam Dios .
42019039	Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj fariseo ayco xol anma tu' , halni tet Comam : -- Mam cuywawom , cach huntek'an anma ch'el yaw ti' , ẍi ebnaj .
42019040	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj : -- Chiwalan teyet , ta chisbeja' anma yelo yaw , haxam ch'en ch'en chi'aho yaw selelo anma ti' , ẍi Comam .
42019041	Haxa yet lan̈anxa yapni Comam iscawilal con̈ob Jerusal'en , yok'can̈ Comam yilni con̈ob tu' .
42019042	Yalni Comam haca' ti' : -- Tinan̈ xin , hex ah Jerusal'en , majaltam yet hune' tz'ayic ti' chinachalo heyu yin̈ hune' mac chu yak'ni ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma , yaj wal xin mach chinachalo hune' ti' heyu yuto caw ewan ye yul hesat .
42019043	C'anch'anex , ay hune' tiempo bay chihulo isya'tajil teyiban̈ yu anma ayco ishowal teyin̈ . Chihoylaxayo hecon̈ob ti' , haca' xan̈e peyab chuco ebnaj soldado , cat yanico ebnaj howal teyin̈ .
42019044	Chitan̈tzelaxilo hune' con̈ob ti' . Matxa hunu ch'en ch'en chicancano yiban̈ yet ch'enal , cat ispotx'lax camo sunil anma yuto mach hechah hune' Mac Ak'bilti texol Hecolomalo yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam .
42019045	Lahwi tu' xin , yocto Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios , istzumbenilti Comam anma chitxon̈wi bey tu' .
42019046	Yalni Comam tet anma : -- Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Ha' watutan yet txah yehi , " ẍicanoj . Yaj hex ti' haca' hunu isn̈ach'en elk'om ye heyu , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
42019047	Hunun tz'ayic isbey Comam Jes'us cuywal yul yatut Comam Dios . Yaja' ebnaj yahawil yeco yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es , yebpaxo ebnaj yahaw yeco yin̈ con̈ob , caw issay ebnaj tzet chute yak'ni camo Comam .
42019048	Yaja' mach chitxumcha yu ebnaj tzet chu ispotx'lax Comam , yuto caw ayco yanma sunil anma yaben tzet chal Comam .
42020001	Ay hune' tz'ayical ti' yet lan̈an iscuywa Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios , yet chalni Comam cuybanile yet colbanile , yapni ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yebpaxo ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es , yeb ebnaj ichamta iswi'ehal yin̈ con̈ob tu' .
42020002	Isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam : -- ¿ Mac cachchejni hawatx'en huntek'an ti' ? yebpaxo ¿ mac ak'ni hawip ? ẍi ebnaj .
42020003	Istak'wi Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj : -- Haquinpaxtu'an , ay hune' ink'ambebalan chiwak'an teyet . Pajtzewe wetan ,
42020004	¿ mac chejniti naj Juan anican̈ ha' iswi' anma , Comam Dios mato ha' anma ? ẍi Comam .
42020005	Yichico ebnaj isk'amben tet hunun : -- ¿ Tzet xin chijute jalni tet naj ti' ? Ta chijala' ta Comam Dios chejn̈eti naj Juan tu' , chala' naj jet : " ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxin machi heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet yal naj ? " ẍim naj jet .
42020006	Macato ta chijala'paxo ta maẍtaj Comam Dios an̈eti naj , chitij ishowal anma jin̈ , cat con̈isk'ojno camoj , yuto ha' naj Juan tu' caw ischejab Comam Dios ye naj yul sat anma , ẍi ebnaj .
42020007	Yuxin yal ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mach johtajojan̈ mac ak'ni ismunil naj Juan tu' , ẍi ebnaj .
42020008	Yuxinto yal Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj : -- Hac intu'an , mach chiwalpaxilojan teyet mac ak'n̈e hune' wipti'an inwatx'enan huntek'an ti' , ẍi Comam .
42020009	Lahwi tu' xin , yichico Comam Jes'us yalni hune'xa yechel ti' tet anma : -- Ay hune' naj winaj tz'unni te' uva sat istx'otx' . Lahwi tu' xin yanito naj istz'unub comonal tet huntek'an ebnaj munlawom . Isto naj niman tiempo bey hune' tx'otx' caw nahat .
42020010	Yet yapni istiempohal yuxlax te' uva , ischejnito naj yahaw tx'otx' hune' ischejab ischaba' ismajul tet ebnaj munlawom tu' . Hayet yilni ebnaj yapni naj , yoc ebnaj ismak'no naj . Maẍtic'a xin tzet ak'lax tet naj , ischejlaxtopaxo naj .
42020011	Lahwi tu' xin , ischejnipaxto naj yahaw tu' hune'xa ischejab . Hayet yapni naj , yoc ebnaj munlawom tu' iscajno naj , ismak'nipaxo ebnaj naj . Maẍtic'a tzet ak'laxpaxo tet naj , istzumbelaxto naj .
42020012	Lahwi tu' xin , yanipaxto naj yahaw tx'otx' tu' hune'xa ischejab yet yoxel . Hayet yapni naj tu' , yocpaxo ebnaj munlawom tu' ismak'no taho naj , istzumbelaxpaxti naj .
42020013	Yuxinto yal naj yahaw tx'otx' haca' ti' : " ¿ Tzet wal wutenan tinan̈ ? Wal xin chinchejtojan hune' inc'aholti'an caw ochebil wuhan , etzan̈em chixiw ebnaj tet naj , " ẍi naj .
42020014	Hayet yilni ebnaj yapni naj c'ahole tu' , yalni ebnaj tet hunun : " ¡ Ilwec'anabtoj ! Lan̈an yul naj c'ahole lah . Ha' tet naj chicancano istx'otx' ismam ti' . Wal tinan̈ xin comak'a'we camo naj haxinwal jetxa chuboco hune' tx'otx' ti' , " ẍi ebnaj munlawom tu' .
42020015	Lahwi tu' xin yilaxilto naj yintalto peyab tu' , ha' bey tu' ak'lax camo naj , ẍi Comam . Isk'amben Comam tet anma : -- ¿ Tzet xin chiutelax ebnaj munlawom yu naj yahaw tz'unub tu' , heyalni ?
42020016	Wal xin ha' naj caw yahaw tu' , chitij cat istan̈tzencanilo naj ebnaj munlawom tu' , cat yanito naj istz'unub comonal tet hunuxa majan ebnaj munlawom , ẍi Comam . Hayet yaben anma hune' tu' yalni : -- Machojab bak'inal chu haca' chawal ti' , ẍi anma .
42020017	Yuxinto oc t'an̈no Comam Jes'us yin̈ anma , yalni Comam : -- ¿ Yaj tzettaxca chalilo hune' tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios heyalni bay chal haca' ti' ? : Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en istirilo ebnaj watx'em n̈a , ha' ch'en caw ec'bal c'ul yoc xe'o n̈a , ẍicanoj .
42020018	Yaj macn̈etic'a chi'ayc'ay yiban̈ hune' ch'en tu' chik'ahtoj , yaj ta ha' ch'en ch'ayc'ay yiban̈ hune' mac tu' , chiquechmoto yalan̈ ch'en , ẍi Comam .
42020019	Yuxin ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ isley naj Mois'es , yet hunep tu' yoche ebnaj istzabayo Comam Jes'us , yuto nachalo yu ebnaj ta ha' ebnaj chal hune' cuybanile yal Comam , yaj chixiw ebnaj istzabnayo Comam yu anma ayicto bey tu' .
42020020	Yuxin ha' ebnaj yahaw yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj chicuyni anma yin̈ isley naj Mois'es istohla ebnaj huntek'an ebnaj to ilno ta ch'ayc'ay Comam yin̈ hunu lek'ti'al . C'ul yub ebnaj c'ulch'an istzotel ebnaj tet Comam yun̈e yayc'ay Comam yin̈ hunu tzoti' , cat yanico ebnaj Comam yul isk'ab naj gobernador .
42020021	Yalni ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mam cuywawom , caw johtajan̈ ta tzet chawala yeb tzet chacuyu caw toholcanoj , yebpaxo lahan yelapno ye anma yul hasat . Chacuypaxo yin̈ caw isyelal tzet chu cowatx'en yin̈ tzet choche Comam Dios .
42020022	Yuxin chicok'ambehan̈ tawet : ¿ C'ulmi jak'ni cotohlabal tet naj jahaw ay bey Roma , naj C'esar , mato machoj ? ẍi ebnaj .
42020023	Yaja' yohtaxa Comam ta tx'oj nabil yu ebnaj , yuxin yal Comam tet ebnaj :
42020024	-- Yewe hunu ch'en melyu wila'an nan̈ . ¿ Mac najil ayco yechel sat yeb isbi yin̈ ch'en ? ẍi Comam . Istak'wi ebnaj : -- Yechel sat naj jahaw ay bey Roma yeb isbi naj ayco yin̈ ch'en , ẍi ebnaj .
42020025	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj xin : -- Ak'we tet naj C'esar tu' baytet yet naj yehi , cat heyak'ni tet Comam Dios baytet yet Comam yehi , ẍi Comam .
42020026	Yaja' maẍtic'a hunu tzoti' tx'oj ilchalo yin̈ Comam yu ebnaj yin̈ tzet yal Comam sata anma . Ton̈e c'aycanocan̈ isc'ul ebnaj yu ispaj istzoti' ebnaj yak' Comam . Yuxin matxa tzet yal ebnaj .
42020027	Lahwi tu' xin yapni huntek'an ebnaj saduceo ilwal yin̈ Comam Jes'us . Ebnaj saduceo tu' , chal ebnaj tato matxa chiitzitzbi anma chicami . Isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam :
42020028	-- Mam cuywawom , tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Mois'es tato chicam yichamil hunu ix ix , mach xin yuninal naj yeb ix , yilal yik'ni ix yuẍta naj camna tu' , haxinwal ay yuninal naj yeb ix , cat yoc yuninalo naj camna tu' .
42020029	Yaj ay hunel ay hujwan̈ ebnaj yuẍtan̈e isba . Naj babel mohyi naj yeb hune' ix , yaj cam naj , machi xin hunu yuninal naj yeb ix .
42020030	Hacpax tu' naj iscab , mohyi naj yeb ix , iscampaxo naj , machipaxo yuninal naj yeb ix .
42020031	Ismohyipaxo naj yox yeb ix . Hac tu' xin yu ismohyilo ebnaj hujwan̈ tu' yeb ix , yaj ton̈e la-cam ebnaj sunil . Maẍtic'a xin hunu yuninal ebnaj yeb ix .
42020032	Islahobal xin , iscampaxo ix .
42020033	Yuxin hayet chiapni istz'ayical yet chiitzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa , ¿ mac xin ebnaj hujwan̈ tu' ch'oc yichamilo ix yuto mohyina ebnaj hujwan̈ tu' yeb ix ? ẍi ebnaj .
42020034	Istak'wican̈ Comam Jes'us : -- Bey yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ebnaj winaj chiyik' ebnaj yixal , yeb ebix ix chik' ebix yichamil .
42020035	Yaja' anma yettic'a satcan̈ yehi , yet chiitzitzbocan̈ xol camom , matxa yixal naj winaj , matxapaxo yichamil ix ix .
42020036	Matxa chicam anma tu' yuto lahanxa ch'elico yeb ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios . Chi'oc yuninalo Comam Dios bey satcan̈ yet chiitzitzbican̈ .
42020037	Naj Mois'es , yak'cano naj johtan̈eloj tato chiitzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa , bay tz'ibn̈ebilcano yin̈ yet yilni naj yoc k'a' yin̈ hun hoban te' tx'ix yet istzotelilti Comam Dios xol k'a k'a' tet naj . Yalni Comam : -- Haninan isDiosal icham Abraham , isDiosal naj Isaac yebpaxo isDiosal naj Jacob , ẍi Comam .
42020038	Waxan̈ca camnaxa ebnaj , yaj itzitz ebnaj yul sat Comam Dios , yuto mach isDiosalo camom ye Comam . Yuxin yul sat Comam Dios sunil anma itzitz , ẍi Comam .
