43006044	Caw machi hunu mac chihul yul ink'aban tato maẍtaj Inmaman chichejniti wetan , Comam an̈eintijan . Haninan xin chiwak' itzitzbocan̈an yet islahobal tz'ayic .
43006045	Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat haca' ti' : " Sunil mac chicuylax yu Comam Dios , " ẍiayoj . Yuxin sunil mac chiaben tzet chal Comam Dios tu' , chitxumchalo yu yin̈ tzet chala , ha' xin chihul yul ink'aban .
43006046	Caw maẍto hunu mac iln̈e yin̈ Comam Dios Mame hachcachann̈e inan , yuto yul satcan̈ titnajinan , yuxinto caw wohtajan Comam .
43006047	Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan yul yanma , caw chischah hune' isk'inal mach istan̈bal .
43006048	Haninti'an ha' ton hune' wah chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal .
43006049	Ha' ebnaj heyichmam yet payat tu' , iswah ebnaj huntek'an man'a bey tx'otx' desierto , yaj xin sunil ebnaj xa-le-camtoj .
43006050	Yaja' mac chiwahni hune' wah titna yul satcan̈ , chiwalti'an xin , machi bak'inal chicami .
43006051	Hanintonan hune' wah itzitz titna yul satcan̈ , yuxin macn̈etic'a chiwahni hune' wah ti' , caw itzitzn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Ha' hune' wah chiwak'ti'an , ha' ton innimanilan chiwak'an yun̈e ischahni anma isk'inal , ẍi Comam Jes'us tet anma .
43006052	Hayet yaben anma Israel huntek'an ti' , istzabnico anma isteyelen isba yin̈ tzet yal Comam . Le-yalni anma haca' ti' : -- ¿ Tzet chu yak'ni naj ti' isnimanil coc'uxu' ? ẍi anma tet hunun .
43006053	Yalni Comam xin : -- Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , haca' tato mach chec'ux innimanilti'an , Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , yeb xin haca' ta mach cheyuc' inchiq'uilan , mach chechah hek'inal mach istan̈bal .
43006054	Yuxin macn̈etic'a chic'uxni innimanilti'an , cat yuc'ni inchiq'uilti'an , caw chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal . Hayet islahobal tz'ayic xin chiwak' itzitzbocan̈an xol anma camom .
43006055	Yuto innimanilti'an lahan haca' wah , ha' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal , hacpax tu' xin inchiq'uilan haca' tzet chiuc'laxi .
43006056	Macn̈etic'a chic'uxni innimanilan cat xin yuc'ni inchiq'uilan , caw hunxan̈e chiwucanojan yebi .
43006057	Comam Dios caw itzitz yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , ha' Comam tu' quinchejnitijan , yuxin itzitz inn̈etic'apaxojan . Hac ton tu' xin , mac chic'uxni innimanilti'an , caw itzitzn̈etic'apaxo wuhan .
43006058	Hanintonan , hune' wah titna yul satcan̈ , yaj mach haca'o man'a islo ebnaj jichmam , yuto waxan̈ca islo ebnaj huntek'an man'a tu' , yaj cam ebnaj . Wal mac chiwahni hune' wah chiwalti'an xin , caw ay isk'inal mach istan̈bal , ẍi Comam .
43006059	Sunil huntek'an ti' yak' Comam Jes'us iscuyu' anma yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel bey yul con̈ob Capernaum .
43006060	Yet yaben anma chicuywi yinta Comam Jes'us huntek'an cuybanile yak' Comam tu' , tx'i'al ebnaj halni tet hunun : -- Caw ya'ta cochahni huntek'an chal naj ti' . ¿ Mactaxca chik'oji isyijeni ? ẍi ebnaj .
43006061	Wal Comam xin , caw yohtaxa tzettaj chal ebnaj tu' , yuxin yal Comam haca' ti' : -- ¿ Tom caw chicabconcan̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an ?
43006062	Wal Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios ti' , tato cheyil inmeltzohan yul satcan̈ bay titnajinan , ¿ tzixam chi-la-heyala' ?
43006063	Ha' Yesp'iritu Comam Dios ha' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal , wal conimanil matzet chak'a . Huntek'an cuybanile xawalan teyet tu' , yin̈ caw yeli yet Esp'iritu yehi , ha' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal .
43006064	Yaja' ayexto hex ti' , maẍto cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an , ẍi Comam . Yal Comam haca' tu' yuto caw yohtaxa Comam yet caw yalan̈tocanoj macta mach chianayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chal Comam . Caw xin yohtaxapaxo Comam mac chianico yul isk'ab ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈ .
43006065	Yuxinto yalpaxo Comam haca' ti' : -- Caw chiwalan teyet tato caw machi hunu mac chaco isba yul ink'aban tato maẍtaj Inmaman chichejniti wetan , ẍi Comam .
43006066	Yet yaben anma tzet yal Comam tu' xin , tx'i'al anma bejnicano yec' yinta Comam .
43006067	Yuxinto isk'ambe Comam tet ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ iscuywom : -- Haxa hex ti' , ¿ chimheyoche chextopaxoj ? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43006068	Istak'wi naj Sim'on Pedro , tet Comam : -- Mamin , macc'anab yinta chon̈oc tzujnojan̈ , yuto han̈c'an̈e hatzoti' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal .
43006069	Wal han̈on̈ti'an̈ , caw xajaytojan̈ yul janmahan̈ tawin̈ . Caw xin johtajan̈ tato ach ti' Cristo hach , Isc'ahol Comam Dios caw itzitz , ẍi naj Pedro tet Comam .
43006070	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Wal xin quexinsayilojan hecablahon̈wan̈il , yaj ay hune' hex ti' ayayto naj matzwalil yul yanma , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43006071	Yet yalni Comam haca' tu' , yin̈ naj Judas , isc'ahol naj Sim'on Iscariote yal Comam . Yuto waxan̈ca ayco naj yetbiho ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ , yaj xin ha' naj anico Comam yul isk'ab camical .
43007001	Lahwi tu' xin , istzabnico Comam Jes'us yec' yul ismajul Galilea . Matxa isje isc'ul Comam ehoyo yul ismajul Judea yuto caw chiyoche ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj Israel yak'a' camo Comam .
43007002	Toxa xin chiichico hune' k'in̈ Poy telaj isbi , hune' isk'in̈ anma Israel ,
43007003	yalni ebnaj yuẍta Comam tu' tet : -- Mach chaẍcan bey ti' , wal xin asi' bey Judea bay caw ay anma chicuywi tawintaj , haxinwal chil anma c'aybalc'ule chi-la-hawatx'e ti' .
43007004	Yuto ta ay hunu mac choche chiohtan̈elaxi mach chiswatx'e hunu tzet ye tu' bay ewan , yuxin yilal hayeni sunil c'aybalc'ule chi-la-hawatx'e ti' yin̈ sat anma , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43007005	Hac tu' yute yalni ebnaj yuto mach chayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
43007006	Yuxinto yal Comam tet ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Maẍto chiapni istz'ayical inyenilo inbahan tet anma , wal hex ti' , tzijxan̈e tz'ayical c'ul heyenilo heba .
43007007	Anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' mach chexisyaha , walinan xin caw caj chinillaxan , yuto chiwalan tato caw machiswalil sunil tzet chiswatx'e anma .
43007008	Asi'we hex ti' yin̈ k'in̈ tu' , walinan mach chintohan , yuto maẍto chiapni istiempohal inyenilo inbahan tet anma , ẍi Comam .
43007009	Yet lahwi yalni Comam huntek'an ti' tet ebnaj xin , iscancano Comam bey Galilea .
43007010	Yet xato ebnaj yuẍta Comam Jes'us tu' yin̈ k'in̈ istopaxo Comam , yaj yin̈ ewantajil .
43007011	Caw xin chissayic'o ebnaj iswi'ehal ebnaj Israel tu' Comam Jes'us yin̈ k'in̈ tu' , chalni ebnaj : -- ¿ Baytaxca tu' ay hune' naj winaj tu' ? ẍi ebnaj .
43007012	Caw xin nanantaxan̈e chal anma yin̈ Comam , ay anma chalni : " Caw c'ulcano hune' naj tu' , " ẍi . Aypaxo anma chihalni : " Caw machiswalil hune' naj tu' , caw ton̈e chiyak' subchaho naj anma , " ẍipaxoj .
43007013	Yaja' xin caw ewanta chitzotel anma tu' yuto caw chixiw anma tet ebnaj yahawil yin̈ anma Israel .
43007014	Hayet caw niman k'in̈ tu' , yocto Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios , istzabnico Comam iscuyni anma .
43007015	Caw xin chic'ay isc'ul ebnaj Israel tu' yaben tzet chal Comam . Chi-la-yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- ¿ Tzet chute hune' naj ti' yohtan̈enilo sunil huntek'an ti' ? Yaj mach cuywina naj , ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
43007016	Istak'wican̈ Comam tet ebnaj : -- Ha' cuybanile chiwalan teyet ti' mach wetojan inchuquilan , yet Comam chejn̈eintijan .
43007017	Tato ay mac chiyoche chisyije tzet chal Comam Dios , caw yilal istxumniloj tato yet Comam ye cuybanile ti' . Yohtapaxoj ta maẍtaj yul inwi'an inchuquilan chiwitijan cat xin walnihan teyet .
43007018	Macn̈etic'a yul iswi' chiyiti tzet chiyak' iscuyu' anma , chiyute hune' tu' yun̈e yoc iswinajil sata anma . Wal hanin chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios , ha' yalaxico ismay Comam yu anma ha' chinsayan , yuxin caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwalti'an , caw machi lek'ti'al yin̈ .
43007019	Caw ak'bil isley Comam Dios teyet yu naj Mois'es , yaja' machi hunujex cheyije tzet chal hune' ley tu' . ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxinto chinhepotx'an heyalni ? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43007020	Istak'wi ebnaj xin , yalni ebnaj tet Comam : -- Etzan̈em ay hunu ischejab naj matzwalil ayco tawin̈ . ¿ Mac chachak'ni camo hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43007021	Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yu hune' c'aybalc'ule inwatx'ehan yin̈ hune' tz'ayical xewilal caw hesunil chic'ayilo hec'ul yin̈ .
43007022	Hatax ebnaj heyichmam ichencanocan̈ hune' circuncisi'on , ha' xin naj Mois'es chihalni tato caw yilal isyijelaxi . Yuxinto waxan̈ca yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal , cheyak' circuncidar niẍte unin winaj semanahil ixto ispitzc'ahi .
43007023	Walex hex ti' , istz'ayicalojab xewilal masan cheyak' circuncidar niẍte unin yun̈e mach cheman̈c'o isley naj Mois'es heyalni . Tato caw hac tu' cheyute , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxinto caw chichiwa hec'ul win̈an yuto yet istz'ayical xewilal wak'ni cawxojan hune' naj ?
43007024	Mach ton̈eho chexoc heyila' yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e anma . Tato cheyoche chexoc heyila' tzet yehi , ilwe yin̈ caw istoholal , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43007025	Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj ah Jerusal'en halni haca' ti' : -- ¿ Machmi taj naj ti' chal ebnaj ispotx'o' ?
43007026	Caw yin̈ sat anma lan̈an istzotel naj lah , yaj machi hunu mac chicachni naj istzoteli . ¿ Mato xayayto ebnaj jahawil ti' yul yanma tato ha' naj ti' Cristo ?
43007027	Yet chul Comam Cristo tu' , machi hunu mac ohtan̈e baytu'wal chi-caw-istiticoj . Wal naj ti' xin caw johtaj baytu'wal titnaco naj , ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
43007028	Yet yaben Comam yalni ebnaj haca' tu' , ha' ton yet lan̈an iscuywa Comam yul yatut Comam Dios , yalni Comam yin̈ caw ip : -- Caw quinheyohtajan heyalni , yeb xin heyohtaj baytu'wal titnaj inpaxojan . Yaja' caw maẍtajinan witi inbahan inchuquilan , wal xin chejbilintijan yu Comam Dios , Comam caw isyelaln̈etic'a chala , yaj mach heyohtajo Comam .
43007029	Wal inti'an caw wohtajan Comam tu' , yuto yin̈ Comam titnajinan , ha' quinanitijan , ẍi Comam .
43007030	Yet lan̈an yalni Comam hune' tu' xin , ay huntek'an ebnaj yoche inoto Comam yul te' , yaj xin machi hunu mac tzabnayo Comam , yuto maẍto chiapni istiempohal bay chicami .
43007031	Caw xin hantan̈e mac chanayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam , chi-la-yalni haca' ti' : -- Yet chihul Comam Cristo tu' , ¿ tom caw ec'balto c'aybalc'ule chisye sata sunil tzet chisye naj ti' jet ? ẍi anma yin̈ Comam .
43007032	Yet yaben ebnaj fariseo tzet yal anma yin̈ Comam Jes'us tu' , iscutxbanayo isba ebnaj yeb xin ebnaj yahawil sacerdote , ischejnito ebnaj ebnaj mayor chitan̈en yatut Comam Dios yu istzabnayo ebnaj Comam , cat yanicto Comam yul preso .
43007033	Yalni Comam haca' ti' : -- Hanic'xan̈ech'an tiempohal ayinic'ojan texol , cat xin inpaxtojan isc'atan̈ Comam chejn̈eintijan .
43007034	Hex ti' chexoc saywal win̈an , yaj matxa chinilchahan heyu , yuto mach chu heyapni bay chinapnitu'an , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43007035	Yichico ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel tu' isk'amben tet hunun haca' ti' : -- ¿ Baytaxca tu' chito naj ti' , yuxin chal naj tato matxa chiilcha naj ju ? Ay ebnaj jet con̈ob pujanto xol ebnaj griego , ¿ ham tu' chito naj cuywal xol ebnaj , cat yoc naj iscuyno ebnaj griego tu' yalni ?
43007036	¿ Tzet caw chalilo hune' chal naj ti' : " Chinhesaya'an , yaj matxa chinilchahojan heyu , yuxinto mach chiyu heyapni bay chinapnitu'an ? " ẍi naj , ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
43007037	Ha' islahobal tz'ayic k'in̈ tu' , ha' caw ay yelapno ye yul sat anma Israel . Yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' xin , ah lin̈no Comam Jes'us , yalni Comam yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' : -- Maquex chitaj heti' titan̈we inc'atan̈an , cat heyuc'ni hune' ha ha' chiwak'an .
43007038	Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : " Ha' mac chianayto yul yanma win̈an , haca' chiyu ispitzc'a isnuk' ha ha' chiel yojomal , hac tu' chiyu ispitzc'a isnuk' ha' yet k'inale yul yanma , " ẍiayoj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43007039	Yal Comam Jes'us hune' ti' yin̈ Comam Esp'iritu Santo chischah macta chianayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam . Yet hune' tiempohal tu' xin , maẍto chiayilo Comam Esp'iritu Santo isyayil maẍto chiilaxto Comam yul satcan̈ .
43007040	Yet yaben anma cutxanico tu' yin̈ tzet yal Comam Jes'us , ay anma halni haca' ti' : -- Yin̈ caw yeli , ha' naj ti' ischejab Comam Dios halbilcanoj ta chuli , ẍi .
43007041	Aypaxo mac halni haca' ti' : -- Ha' ton naj ti' Cristo , echmabil yul ju , ẍi . Aypaxo hune'xa majan anma halni : -- Naj Cristo tu' , ¿ tom Galilea chitit naj heyalni ?
43007042	Chal yul Yum Comam Dios tato ha' bey yul con̈ob Bel'en , yul iscon̈ob naj rey David chipitzc'a naj Cristo tu' , yuto yuninal yuninal naj rey David ye naj , ẍi hunmajanxa anma .
43007043	Hac tu' yu ispohnito isba anma yu Comam .
43007044	Aypaxo ebnaj xin etza inito Comam yul preso , yaj machi hunu mac yaco isk'ab yin̈ Comam .
43007045	Haxa yet ismeltzo ebnaj chitan̈en yatut Comam Dios isc'atan̈ ebnaj fariseo , isk'amben ebnaj tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxinto machi maxeyiti naj Jes'us tu' ? ẍi ebnaj .
43007046	Yalni ebnaj chitan̈en yatut Comam Dios tu' haca' ti' : -- Caw machi hunu mac caw helan istzotel haca' istzotel naj , ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
43007047	Yalni xin ebnaj fariseo tu' tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Tom ha' hunex cheyak' subchaho heba tet hune' naj tu' ?
43007048	¿ Tom ay hunu ebnaj yahawil chianayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chal naj , maca hunujon̈an̈ han̈on̈ fariseo on̈ti'an̈ ?
43007049	Han̈c'an̈e huntek'an anma caw mach yohtajo isley naj Mois'es , ha' chisubcha yu naj , yaja' xin chiay isya'tajil yiban̈ huntek'an anma tu' yu Comam Dios , ẍi ebnaj .
43007050	Ay xin hune' naj fariseo Nicodemo isbi , naj beyc'o tzotelo tet Comam yin̈ hune' ak'balil , ha' naj xin halni tet ebnaj yetbi tu' :
43007051	-- Ha' chiyute yalni coley tato mach chu iscawxico ismul hunu naj yiban̈ yalan̈to maẍto chijabe tzet chal naj , yun̈e johtan̈eniloj tzet iswatx'e naj , ẍi naj Nicodemo tu' .
43007052	Yuxinto yal ebnaj yetbi naj tu' tet : -- ¿ Tom ah Galilea hachpaxoj ? Wal xin say yul Istzoti' Comam Dios cat hawilni tato ay hunu ischejab Comam Dios chitit bey Galilea tu' , ẍi ebnaj .
43007053	Lahwi tu' xin , ispaxto ebnaj yatut .
43008001	Wal Comam Jes'us xin to Comam bey hune' won̈an , Olivo isbi .
43008002	Yin̈ hune'xa tz'ayical xin , yapni Comam hunelxa yul yatut Comam Dios yin̈ caw sahab sac'ayal . Caw xin hantan̈e anma apni isc'atan̈ Comam . Lahwi tu' xin , yay tz'on̈no Comam istzabnico iscuyni anma tu' .
43008003	Hunepixto xin yiniti ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj chicuyni anma yin̈ isley naj Mois'es hune' ix ix tet Comam . Caw c'uxan ischahlo ix yin̈ ismul yu ebnaj . Yalaxico ix xol anma cutxanico isc'atan̈ Comam tu' .
43008004	Yalni ebnaj tet Comam : -- Mam cuywawom , machahlo hune' ix ti' juhan̈ isc'atan̈ iswinaj .
43008005	Wal xin , chal isley naj Mois'es tato ebix ix tx'oj ye iswi' haca' hune' ix ti' , yilal isk'ojlax camo ebix , yaja' ¿ tzimi chawute hawalnipaxo hach ti' ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43008006	Yal ebnaj haca' tu' yun̈e yilwen ebnaj Comam , yeb yun̈e yayc'ay Comam yin̈ hunu istx'ojal , cat xin yoc ebnaj ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam , chute yalni .
43008007	Yaj xin ton̈e ay c'on̈no Comam , istzabnico istz'ibli sat tx'otx' yu yiximal isk'ab . Ayn̈etic'aco xin ebnaj isk'amben tet Comam tzet caw chielcanico ix , yuxinto ah t'an̈no Comam , yalni haca' ti' : -- Macn̈etic'a caw machi nich'ano ismul texol , ha'ojab babel ch'ak'ni ch'en k'ojbal yin̈ ix , ẍi Comam .
43008008	Lahwi tu' yaypaxo c'on̈no Comam , istzabnico istz'ibli sat tx'otx' hunelxa .
43008009	Yet yaben ebnaj tzet yal Comam tu' , istxumni isba yanma ebnaj ta machi hunu ebnaj c'ul , yuxin hununtajil yu yel ebnaj isc'atan̈ Comam . Babel el ebnaj ec'na ichamtaxa , lahwi tu' istopaxo ebnaj tzehtaj . Hac tu' yu iscancano Comam ischuquil yeb ix tu' .
43008010	Lahwi tu' xin , yah lin̈no Comam , isk'amben Comam tet ix : -- Ix , ¿ baytu'wal ay ebnaj chiak'wi c'ule tawin̈ ? ¿ Tom caw machi hunu ebnaj macachk'ojnican̈ yu ch'en ch'en ? ẍi Comam tet ix .
43008011	-- Macho Mamin , machi hunu maca , ẍi ix tet Comam . -- Haquinpaxtu'an , mach chiwalan ta chaẍk'ojlax camo yu hamul . Asi' xin , matxa chawaco hamul hunelxa , ẍi Comam tet ix .
43008012	Yalnipaxo Comam tet anma hunelxa : -- Wal haninti'an , caw haca' issajilk'inal wehayojan xol anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Macn̈etic'a ch'oc tzujno wintajan chiwak'an issajilk'inal yul yanma . Yu hune' issajilk'inal ti' xin , chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal . Matxa xin chiec' xol k'ejholo , ẍi Comam .
43008013	Yalni ebnaj fariseo xin : -- Caw matzet chalilo tzet chawal ti' , yuto hach ti' , hach caw chachtzotel tawin̈ , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43008014	Istak'wi Comam : -- Waxan̈ca caw han-caw-inan chiwalan yin̈ tzet wehan , yaj caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwalan . Yuto haninti'an wohtajan baytu'wal titnajinan , caw wohtapaxojan baytu'wal chi-caw-intocojan . Walex hex ti' , caw mach heyohtajo baytu'wal titnajinan , yeb baytu'wal chintopaxojan .
43008015	Walex hex ti' , caw comonn̈etic'a chexoc heyila' tzet ye anma , yaj walinan mach ton̈etic'aho chinocan wila'an tzet chielico anma .
43008016	Yaja' yet chiwilnihan yin̈ tzet chielico anma , chiwilan yin̈ caw istoholal , yuto mach inchuquilojan chiwilan tzet chielico anma , to ha' hun Inmaman an̈eintijan , ha' chiilni tzet chielico anma wintajan .
43008017	Chal hecuybanil tato ay cawan̈o testigo lahan yalni yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' , caw yel hune' tu' chal tu' .
43008018	Ilwec'anab xin , ay cawan̈ mac chak' testigohal . Caw testigo wehicojan win̈an , yeb xin Inmaman an̈eintijan ha' chitzotel win̈an , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43008019	Lahwi tu' xin isk'amben ebnaj tet Comam : -- ¿ Baytu'wal ay hamam tu' xin ? ẍi ebnaj . Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Hex ti' , mach quinheyohtajojan , caw xin mach heyohtajo Inmamtu'an . K'inalo tato quinheyohtajan , heyohtapaxo Inmaman , ẍi Comam .
43008020	Hayet iscuywa Comam Jes'us yul yatut Comam Dios yalnicano Comam huntek'an ti' , iscawilal bay chibey anma yak'a'cano yofrenda . Yaj xin machi hunu mac tzabnayo Comam , yuto maẍto chiapni istz'ayical bay chicami .
43008021	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us hunelxa : -- Haninti'an chintohan , wal xin chinhesaya'cojan yaja' mach chinilchahan heyu , yuto mach chu heto bay chintotu'an . Walex hex ti' yin̈ hemul chexcamcantoj , ẍi Comam .
43008022	Yuxin yal ebnaj yahawil yin̈ con̈ob Israel : -- ¿ Tom xin chispotx' isba naj , yuxinto chal naj tato caw mach chu japni bay chiapni naj tu' ? ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
43008023	Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj : -- Walex hex ti' , caw yet sat tx'otx'al heyehi , wal inti'an yet satcan̈ wehan , caw yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' heyehi , wal inpaxojan mach yeto sat yiban̈k'inal ti' wehan .
43008024	Yuxinto caw chiwalan teyet tato yin̈ hemul chexcami , yuto mach chechayto yul heyanma tato haninan hune' haca' chiwute walnihan teyet , yuxinto caw yin̈ hemul chexcamtoj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43008025	Isk'ambenpaxo ebnaj tet Comam : -- ¿ Mac hach anmahil chal tu' ? ẍi ebnaj . Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Halbilxatic'a teyet wuhan yet yalan̈tocanoj mac anmahilinan .
43008026	Caw hantan̈e tzet chiwalan teyin̈ yet chiwilnihan yin̈ tzet chexelicoj . Yaj Comam an̈eintijan texol ti' , caw yin̈ isyelal chitzoteli . Yuxinto ha' tzet halbil wetan yu , ha' chiwalpaxojan tet anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ẍi Comam .
43008027	Yaj xin caw maẍtic'a txumchalo yu ebnaj tato ha' Comam Dios chal Comam .
43008028	Yuxinto yal Comam tet ebnaj : -- Hayet chinheyanican̈an yin̈ te' culus , ha' to tu' chitxumchalo heyu tato Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , cat xin heyohtan̈eniloj tato mach wetojan inchuquilan sunil tzet chiwalti'an . Wal xin ha' tzet chal Inmaman wetan , ha' chiwalan .
43008029	Ha' Comam an̈eintijan , ha' ayco wetbihojan . Caw mach chinisbejcanojan inchuquilan , yuto han̈c'an̈e tzet choche isc'ul chinwatx'ehan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43008030	Yet yalni Comam huntek'an tu' , caw hantan̈e anma chahni Comam yul yanma .
43008031	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet anma Israel chahni Comam yul yanma : -- Tato caw huneln̈e cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chiwalan , yin̈ caw yeli incuywoman heyehi .
43008032	Hac tu' xin chu heyohtan̈enilo isyelal ; ha' isyelal tu' xin , ha' chexcolnicanoj , ẍi Comam .
43008033	Yalni ebnaj tet Comam : -- Han̈on̈ti'an̈ jichmaman̈ ye icham Abraham , caw machi hunelo con̈txon̈laxan̈ tet anma . ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxinto chawala " chexcolchacanoj ? " cachi , ẍi ebnaj .
43008034	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , mac caw mach chisbejcano yanico ismul , caw txon̈bil isba tet mule .
43008035	K'inalo hunu naj txon̈bil chejabo tet huno yahaw tinan̈ , mach chiyu yoc naj yetbiho yuninal naj yahawil tu' yin̈ huneln̈e . Wal haca' naj c'ahole xin , caw yetbitic'a isba naj yeb ismam yeb ismi' yeb ej yuẍtaj .
43008036	Yuxin tato haninan chexincolilojan yin̈ hemul , yin̈ caw yeli chexcolchacanoj yuto caw Isc'ahol Dios wehan .
43008037	Caw wohtajan tato heyichmam icham Abraham , yaj caw cheyoche quinhepotx'o'an , yuto mach cheyoche heyabe' cuybanile chiwak'ti'an .
43008038	Ha' tzet wilan bey Inmamtu'an , ha' chiwalan teyet , walex hex ti' caw nan hemam , yuxinto ha' tzet chal hemam tu' ha' chewatx'e , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43008039	Istak'wipaxo ebnaj : -- Wal han̈on̈ti'an̈ , comaman̈ jichmam Abraham , ẍi ebnaj . Istak'wi Comam : -- Tato caw yel cheyala hemam ye icham Abraham tu' , ham tzet iswatx'e icham , ha' chewatx'e .
43008040	Wal xin waxan̈ca ha' caw isyelal halbil wetan yu Comam Dios ha' chiwalan teyet , yaj caw cheyoche quinheyak'a' camojan . Wal icham Abraham cheyal ti' , machi hunelo yute isba icham haca' hex ti' .
43008041	Ha'tic'a tzet chiswatx'e hemam , ha' cheyupaxoj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj . Yuxinto yal ebnaj : -- Wal han̈on̈ti'an̈ , mach matn̈ebilon̈an̈ , wal xin hune'ch'an comaman̈ , ha' ton Comam Dios , ẍi ebnaj .
43008042	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Tato yeli hemam Comam Dios tu' , xahanmi chinheyilan , yuto ha' bay ay Comam Dios titnajinan yet wulan bey ti' , Maẍtajinan witi inbahan inchuquilan , ha' Comam Dios chejn̈eintijan .
43008043	¿ Tzet yin̈ xin mach chitxumchalo tzet chiwalti'an heyu ?
43008044	Walex hex ti' , ha' naj matzwalil , ha' naj caw hemam , yuto hatzet choche isc'ul naj , ha' caw choche hec'ul hewatx'e' . Naj matzwalil tu' , caw potx'om anma naj yichtaxtic'a yul naj sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Caw maẍtic'a isyelal yin̈ naj , yuxin sunil tzet chiahti yul isti' naj mach yeloj . Hayet chanico naj lek'ti'al , ha' tzet ye naj ha' chal naj , yuto caw lek'ti' naj ; caw ismam lek'ti'wom naj .
43008045	Wal haninti'an , ha' caw isyelal chiwalan , yuxinto caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma tzet chiwalti'an .
43008046	¿ Mac hunujex ti' tinan̈ chiyu heyalnico yin̈ insatan tato ay inmulan ? Wal xin , caw isyelal sunil tzet chiwalti'an , yaj ¿ tzet yin̈ xin mach cheyayto yul heyanma ?
43008047	Ha' mac yet Comam Dios yehi , caw choche yabe' Istzoti' Comam . Walex hex ti' xin , mach yeto Comam Dios heyehi , yuxinto mach chiyoche hec'ul heyabe' Istzoti' Comam , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43008048	Yalni ebnaj yahawil yehico yin̈ anma Israel tu' tet Comam Jes'us : -- Ha' ye juhan̈ chijalnihan̈ ta ah Samaria hach , yeb ta ayco hune' ischejab naj matzwalil tawin̈ , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43008049	Istak'wi Comam Jes'us xin : -- Machoj , machi huno ischejab naj matzwalil ayco win̈an , walxinto ha' wanicojan ismay Inmaman ha' chiwuhan , walex hex ti' chinhehincaniltojan .
43008050	Wal haninti'an , maẍtaj yalaxico inmayan chinsayan ; waxan̈ca ay hune' Mac chianico inmayan , ha' hune' tu' xin chihalnoj Mac caw yel chala .
43008051	Yin̈ caw isyela chiwalan teyet , macn̈etic'a chiyijen tzet chiwalti'an , machi bak'inal chicami , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43008052	Yalni ebnaj : -- Wal xin caw yel chijalan̈ tato ayco hunu ischejab naj matzwalil tawin̈ . Icham Abraham yebpaxo xin ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payxa , sunil ebnaj camnatoj . Wal chawute hawalnipaxo xin : " Macn̈etic'a chiyijen tzet chiwalan maẍtic'a chicamtoj , " cachi . ¿ Tom caw ec'bal hach to sata jichmam Abraham tu'an̈ yeb sunil ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payat tiempo tu' ? ¿ Tzet yelapno hawe hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43008053	
43008054	Yuxinto yalpaxo Comam tet ebnaj : -- Tato han-caw-inan chiwican̈ inbahan , caw matzet chalilo hune' tu' , yaj wal xin ha' caw Inmaman chianico inmayan . Ha' Inmamtu'an xin , ha' cheyal heDiosaloj .
43008055	Yaj hex ti' , mach heyohtajo Inmamtu'an , walinan , caw wohtajan . Yaj tato chiwalan ta mach wohtajojan Inmamtu'an , lahanmi inlek'ti'alan yeb hex chal tu' . Wal xin caw chiwalan caw wohtajan Inmaman , yuxinto sunil tzet chal Inmaman wetan chinyijehan .
43008056	Icham heyichmam Abraham tu' , caw tzala isc'ul icham yet yabeni ta chinhulan . Hayet isyelax tet icham xin , caw tzalacanocan̈ isc'ul icham sic'lebil , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj tu' .
43008057	Yalnipaxo ebnaj tet Comam : -- Hach ti' , maẍto hach yin̈ cincuenta habil , cat xin hawalni ta hawil icham Abraham tu' :
43008058	Yalni Comam : -- Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , yettax yalan̈to maẍto chipitzc'a icham Abraham tu' , ay inxatic'ahan , ẍi Comam .
43008059	Hac tu' xin , yu yinican̈ ebnaj ch'en ch'en yun̈e isk'ojni camo ebnaj Comam yalni . Yaj yebato isba Comam tet ebnaj , yelti Comam yul yatut Comam Dios tu' .
43009001	Yet yec' Comam Jes'us yin̈ isbel hunel , yilni Comam hune' naj caw maẍtic'a chu yilni yettaxtic'a ispitzc'ahi .
43009002	Isk'amben ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tu' : -- Mam cuywawom , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxin mutz'an sat hune' naj ti' yet ispitzc'a naj ? ¿ Tom yu ismul ismam naj mato yu ismul naj ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43009003	Yalni Comam xin : -- Maẍtaj yu ismul ismam naj yeb ismi' naj , maẍtajpaxo yu ismul naj yuxinto hac tu' ye naj . Wal xin Comam Dios caw choche isc'ul chisyelo yip yin̈ naj , yuxinto hac tu' ye naj .
43009004	Caw yilal inwatx'enan ismunil Comam an̈eintijan yak' isba tz'ayical to yuc'a' chiah ak'bal yet matxa chu comunlahi .
43009005	Yak' isba ay intoc'ojan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw haca' issajilk'inal wehayojan xol sunil anma , ẍi Comam .
43009006	Yet lahwi istzotel Comam xin , istzublayo Comam sat tx'otx' , issomni Comam nich'an tz'otz'ew yu isk'ab , lahwi tu' xin ismasnico Comam yin̈ isbak'sat naj mutz'an sat tu' .
43009007	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Asi' bey ha' Silo'e , hune' ha' etxan , cat xin hatx'ahnilo hasat , ẍi Comam tet naj . ( Silo'e chiyal yelapnoj Ak'biltij . ) Hac tu' xin yu isto naj bey ha' Silo'e tu' , istx'ahni naj sat xol ha' . Haxa yet ispaxti naj xin , xayu yilni naj .
43009008	Yuxin ha' anma ayayo yatut iscawilal naj yeb huntek'anxa anma ohtan̈e naj , yal haca' ti' : -- ¿ Cochan ha' naj ti' chiec' tz'on̈la k'ano melyu ? ẍi anma tu' yin̈ naj .
43009009	Ay mac xin halni : -- Ho' , ha' naj ti' , ẍi anma . Aypaxo mac halni : -- Machoj , maẍtaj naj , yaj etza hac ti' jilni naj , ẍipaxoj . Wal naj xin yal naj : -- Ho' , hanin-ton-an , ẍi naj .
43009010	Yoc anma isk'ambeno tet naj : -- ¿ Tzet xin mayu ishajlo hasat ? ẍi anma .
43009011	Yalni naj xin : -- Hune' ya' , Jes'us isbi , ha' ya' somni nich'an tz'otz'ew , ismasnico ya' yin̈ insatan . Lahwi tu' xin , yalni ya' wetan : " Asi' bey ha' Silo'e , cat hatx'ahnilo hasat xol ha' , " ẍi ya' wetan . Hac tu' yu intohan intx'ahnolojan insatti'an ; lahwi tu' xin ishajlo insatan , ẍi naj .
43009012	Isk'amben ebnaj tet naj : -- ¿ Baytu'wal xin ay naj tinan̈ ? ẍi ebnaj . -- Caw mach wohtajojan , ẍi naj .
43009013	Lahwi tu' xin , yilaxto naj mutz'antic'a sat tu' tet ebnaj fariseo .
43009014	Yet iswatx'en Comam nich'an tz'otz'ew yun̈e ishajlo sat naj tu' , caw c'uxan istz'ayical xewilal .
43009015	Yuxinto ocpaxo ebnaj fariseo tu' isk'ambe' tet naj hunelxa : -- ¿ Tzet yu ishajlo hasat ti' ? ẍi ebnaj tet naj . Istak'wi naj : -- Ya' Jes'us masnico nich'an tz'otz'ew yin̈ insatan , lahwi tu' xin intohan intx'ahnolojan ; hac tu' xin yu ishajlo insatan , ẍi naj .
43009016	Ay xin ebnaj fariseo halni : -- Hune' naj tu' , caw mach yeto Comam Dios ye naj yuto mach chisyije naj istz'ayical xewilal , ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam . Yaj ay ebnaj halnipaxoj : -- Ya' Jes'us tu' , mach mulumo ya' . Wal xin tato mulum ya' , ¿ tom chiyu isyeni ya' hunu c'aybalc'ule haca' chisye ti' ? ẍi ebnaj .
43009017	Yocpaxo ebnaj fariseo isk'ambeno tet naj maẍtic'a chiyu yilni tu' : -- Haxa hach ti' , ¿ tzet chawute hawalni yin̈ naj ak'ni hajlo hasat ti' ? ẍi ebnaj . Yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Ha' hune' chiwute walnihan , to caw ischejab Comam Dios ye ya' , ẍipaxo naj tet ebnaj .
43009018	Yaj caw maẍtic'a yaco ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel tu' yin̈ isc'ul tato hajlo sat hune' naj tu' yu Comam . Ha' yute isnani ebnaj to caw c'ultic'a ye sat naj , yuxinto awtelax ismam naj yeb ismi' naj yu ebnaj .
43009019	Isk'amben ebnaj tet ismam naj yeb ismi' naj haca' ti' : -- ¿ Ham naj ti' , heyuninal cheyala tato caw maẍtic'a chu yilni yet ispitzc'ahi ? ¿ Tzet yu ishajlo sat naj ? ẍi ebnaj .
43009020	Istak'wi ismam naj yeb ismi' naj : -- Caw yeli juninalan̈ naj , caw yelpaxoj maẍtic'a chiyu yilni naj yet ispitzc'a naj .
43009021	Yaj caw mach johtajojan̈ tzet yu ishajlo sat naj , yeb xin mach johtapaxojan̈ mac ak'ni hajloho sat naj . ¡ K'ambewe tet naj yuto ichamxa naj , chiyu yalni naj teyet ! ẍi ismam naj yeb ismi' naj tet ebnaj tu' .
43009022	Wal xin , hac tu' yute yalni ismam naj yeb ismi' naj yuto caw chixiw tet ebnaj yahawil yehico yin̈ con̈ob Israel , yuto halbil yu ebnaj haca' ti' : " Macn̈etic'a chihalni tato ha' naj Jes'us ti' Cristo , matxa chicochacti yul capilla ti' , " ẍi ebnaj .
43009023	Yuxinto hac tu' yute yalni ismam naj yeb ismi' naj : " K'ambewe tet naj , ichamxa naj , xayu yalni naj teyet , " ẍi .
43009024	Lahwi tu' xin , yawtenpaxti ebnaj naj hajlo sat tu' hunelxa , isk'amben ebnaj tet naj : -- Caw chabe Comam Dios caw halilo isyelal jetan̈ , wal xin caw johtajan̈ ta caw mulum hune' naj chawal ti' , ẍi ebnaj tet naj .
43009025	Yalni naj xin : -- Haninti'an , caw mach wohtajojan tato mulum ya' maca machoj , yuxin mach chiyu walnihan teyet ; hachcachann̈e wohtajan to maẍtic'a chiyu wilnihan yet yalan̈tocanoj , wal tinan̈ xin xayu wilnihan , ẍi naj tet ebnaj .
43009026	Isk'amben ebnaj hunelxa : -- ¿ Tzet caw caẍyute naj ? ¿ Tzet caw yu ishajlo hasat ti' yu naj ? ẍi ebnaj .
43009027	Yalni naj xin : -- Caw mawalan teyet , yaj to caw mach cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul . ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin cheyoche chiwalan teyet hunelxa ? ¿ Mato cheyoche chexocpaxo cuywo yinta ya' ? ẍi naj tet ebnaj .
43009028	Yet yalni naj haca' tu' , istzabnico ebnaj isbahni naj , yalni ebnaj tet naj : -- Hach ti' , ayachxaco yinta naj , wal han̈on̈ti'an̈ yinta iscuybanil naj Mois'es tzujanon̈an̈ .
43009029	Walon̈ti'an̈ caw johtajan̈ tato ha' caw Comam Dios anicano cuybanile tet naj Mois'es tu' . Wal naj chawal ti' , caw mach johtajojan̈ baytu'wal titnaco naj , ẍi ebnaj .
43009030	Istak'wican̈ naj tet ebnaj xin : -- Caw chic'ay inc'ulan yuto cheyala tato mach heyohtajo bay titnaco ya' , yaja' caw cheyila hajlo insatan yu ya' .
43009031	Caw johtaj tato mach chabe Comam Dios tzet chisk'an anma mulum , hachcachann̈e anma caw ayco yanma yin̈ Comam , cat yinayo isba tet , hachcachann̈e huntek'an anma tu' chak' Comam ispaj tzet chisk'ana' .
43009032	Wal xin , caw maẍto bay chijabe isk'umal tato ay huno mac chiyu yak'ni hajloho sat hunu anma maẍtic'a chiyu yilni yettaxtic'a ispitzc'ahi .
43009033	Tato maẍtaj Comam Dios an̈eti ya' ti' , caw machim nino tzet chiyu iswatx'en ya' , ẍi naj tet ebnaj .
43009034	Istak'wi ebnaj tet naj : -- Walach hach ti' , caw mulumach yettaxtic'a hapitzc'ahi . ¿ Tom chaẍoc con̈hacuyu'an̈ hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj tet naj , hac tu' yu istennilti ebnaj naj tu' yul capilla .
43009035	Yabe Comam Jes'us tato tenlaxilti naj hajlo sat tu' yul capilla , haxa yet ischahloyo naj yu Comam , yalni Comam tet naj haca' ti' : -- ¿ Chimhawayto yul hawanma yin̈ Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios ? ẍi Comam tet naj .
43009036	Isk'amben naj tet Comam : -- Mamin , ¿ mac hune' chawal tu' ? Hal wetan cat xin wanico wanmahan yin̈ , ẍi naj .
43009037	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Caw xahawil yin̈ ; Hanintonan hune' mac bay lan̈an hatzotel ti' , ẍi Comam tet naj .
43009038	Yet yaben naj haca' tu' , yay jahno naj yin̈ sat Comam , yalni naj : -- Caw chiwaco wanmahan tawin̈ Mam , ẍi naj .
43009039	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Wal haninti'an , hulnajinan bey yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e wilnihan tzettaj chi'elico anma , yuto ay anma ti' caw mach chiyu yilni , yaj xin haninan chiwak' hajlohojan sat . Aypaxo anma caw c'ul yilni , yaj chimutz'icano sat wuhan yun̈e matxa chiyu yilni , ẍi Comam .
43009040	Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj fariseo ayco isc'atan̈ Comam , yet yaben ebnaj yin̈ tzet yal Comam tu' , yalni ebnaj : -- ¿ Tom xin ha' hunon̈an̈ mach chiyu jilnihan̈ hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj .
43009041	Istak'wi Comam tet ebnaj : -- K'inalo tato mach chiyu heyilni tzettaj ye tu' yet Comam Dios yehi , caw machim hemul . Yaj cheyala tato caw chiyu heyilni tzettaj ye tu' yet Comam Dios , yaj mach cheyijepaxoj , yuxinto caw ay hemul , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43010001	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- K'inaloj ta ay hunu ispeyabil no' me' , cat yocto hunu naj yul , nan bay xin chisholicto isba naj ; yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , caw elk'om hune' naj tu' .
43010002	Wal naj chi'octo yul ispultahil ispeyab no' tu' , ha' ton naj tu' chitan̈en no' .
43010003	Ha' naj chiwayn̈en no' xin chishaj naj ispultahil ispeyabil no' tet naj , cat yocto naj isc'atan̈ no' . Caw sunil no' k'ayna yaben yul isnuk' naj . Caw hununtajil yawtenilti naj no' , yuto ay isbi hunun no' yu naj , hac tu' xin chiyu ishajnilti naj no' .
43010004	Yet chilahwi yinilti naj isme' tu' , cat xin isbabi naj sata no' , cat yoc tzujno no' yinta naj , yuto caw yohta no' yul isnuk' naj .
43010005	Yaja' wal ta hunu naj comon , mach ch'oc tzujno no' yinta naj ; chixiwilo no' tet naj yuto mach k'aynajo no' yaben yul isnuk' naj , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43010006	Yal Comam hune' yechel ti' tet ebnaj , yaj maẍtic'a txumchalo yu ebnaj tzet caw yelapno yehi .
43010007	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet , haninti'an haca' ispultahil ispeyab no' me' , caw hac tu' wehan .
43010008	Yet yalan̈to yet maẍto chinhulan , ay ebnaj hulic'o yanico isba ebnaj hecolomaloj . Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' xin , caw lahan ebnaj haca' hunu naj elk'om chiocto yul ispeyabil no' me' tu' , yaj wal anma caw yettic'a Comam Dios ye xin , caw maẍtic'a ishajba istxiquin yin̈ tzet yal ebnaj .
43010009	Haninti'an , lahaninan haca' ispultahil ispeyabil no' me' , macn̈etic'a chiocto yul hune' peyab ti' chicolchahi . Haca'tic'a hunu no' me' chielti lowoj cat yapnipaxo yul ispeyab , hac tu' xin ye huntek'an mac tu' .
43010010	Ay ebnaj haca' elk'om chiyu yuli , ton̈e chihul elek' yeb xin yak'ni camo anma . Yaj walinan , hulnajinan wak'a'an k'inale mach istan̈bal tet anma chiyaco isba yul ink'aban . Huntek'an anma tu' , caw niman chiyu ischahni isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios .
43010011	Wal haninti'an , caw lahaninan haca' hunu naj tan̈em me' caw c'ul . Hune' naj tan̈em me' caw c'ul tu' , caw hinan yanma naj yak'ni camo isba yin̈ isme' .
43010012	Wal tato ton̈e chitohlalax hunu naj chitan̈en no' me' tu' , maẍtaj xin naj yahaw no' tu' chitan̈eni . Hayet chiyilni naj yapni no' oj , chisbejcano naj no' cat yelcan̈ naj , yuto mach yeto naj no' , cat yoc no' oj tu' istzabnayo no' , cat xin ispujnacan̈ no' sunil .
43010013	Chielcan̈ naj chitan̈en no' , yuto yin̈n̈e istohol naj ayco yanma . Caw mach chicam isc'ul naj yin̈ no' yuto mach yeto naj no' .
43010014	Wal haninti'an , caw lahaninan yeb naj tan̈em me' caw c'ul , haxa mac chaco isba yul ink'aban lahan haca' no' me' . Caw ohtabilinan yu Inmaman , wohtapaxojan Inmamtu'an , hac tu' xin wepaxojan yeb macta chaco isba yul ink'aban , caw johta cobahan̈ yebi . Yin̈ ton huntek'an mac tu' chiwak' camo inbahan .
43010015	
43010016	Aypaxo huntek'an anma chinchahnihan yul yanma , ton̈e xin caw mach jet con̈oboj . Caw yilal winitijan cat xin yoc isyijeno cuybanile chiwalti'an , caw xin hunxan̈e chucanoj yeb hunxan̈e mac chitan̈eni .
43010017	Caw xahan ayinan yu Inmaman yu caw chiwak' camo inbahan yin̈ anma , yaj chinchahpaxojan ink'inalan hunelxa .
43010018	Chiwak' camo inbahan yuto hac tu' chiel yin̈ inc'ulal . Wal xin , caw machi hunu mac chiyu quinispotx'ni camojan tato mach chisje inc'ulan . Caw machi hunu mac chincachnihan wak'ni inbahan yin̈ camical , aypaxo wipan inchahnihan ink'inalan hunelxa , yuto hac tu' inchejbanilan yu Inmaman , ẍi Comam .
43010019	Yet yaben anma Israel yin̈ tzet yal Comam tu' , ispohnipaxto isba hunelxa .
43010020	Ay hun majan anma halni : -- ¿ Tzet yuxin cheyabeto tzet chal naj ti' ? Wal hune' naj ti' , caw chabil locohal yu naj , ayco hune' ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj , ẍi ebnaj .
43010021	Ay hunxa majan anma halnipaxoj haca' ti' : -- Tato ayco hunu ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ naj , ¿ tom hac tu' istzotelo naj ? Yalnipaxo ebnaj : -- ¿ Tom chu yu hunu ischejab naj matzwalil ishajni sat hunu naj caw maẍtic'a chiyu yilni ? ẍi ebnaj .
43010022	Yin̈ istiempohal n̈abil chiec'tzelax isk'in̈ Yatut Comam Dios bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en .
43010023	Yet lan̈an yec' Comam Jes'us isti' yatut Comam Dios tu' , hune' chiyij Yamak'il naj rey Salom'on ,
43010024	yoc hoyno ebnaj Israel yin̈ Comam , yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- ¿ Caw bak'in chon̈hawilojan̈ yin̈ hune' cabc'ulal ti' ? ¿ Mac caw anmahilach ? Yin̈ caw yeli , tato hach ti' Cristo hach , caw mak'bil hawalnilo jetan̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
43010025	Istak'wican̈ Comam tet ebnaj : -- Caw xawalan teyet , yaj caw mach cheyayto yul heyanma . Sunil c'aybalc'ule chinwatx'ehan yu yip Inmaman , ha' caw chiyeniloj mac anmahilinan .
43010026	Walex hex ti' , caw mach chinhechaytojan yul heyanma , yuto caw maẍtic'a wetojan heyehi haca' walnihan yalan̈tocanoj .
43010027	Macta caw wetan yehi , caw chishajba istxiquin yin̈ tzet chiwalan ; caw xin wohtapaxojan hune' mac tu' . Haca'tic'a chiyu yoc tzujno no' me' yinta istan̈emal , hacpax tu' chiyu yoc tzujno wintajan .
43010028	Wal xin , hanan chiwak'an isk'inal mach istan̈bal , machi bak'inal chicami , machi hunu mac xin chiyu yinilo yul ink'aban .
43010029	Wal xin ha' Inmaman , caw ec'balcano sata sunil maca , ha' ak'n̈e anma ti' wetan . Caw machi hunu mac chiyu yinilo huntek'an ti' yul isk'ab Inmamtu'an .
43010030	Haninti'an yeb Inmaman , caw hune'n̈e jehan̈ , ẍi Comam .
43010031	Hac tu' yu istzabnipaxico ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel tu' issic'nican̈ isch'en yun̈e isk'ojni camo ebnaj Comam yalni .
43010032	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj : -- Yu ishelanil Inmaman , yuxin caw hantan̈e tzet caw c'ul chinwatx'ehan texol . ¿ Baytet yin̈ yuxin chinhek'oj camojan heyalni ? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43010033	Istak'wi ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj Israel tu' : -- Mach chaẍcok'ojcan̈an̈ yu hunu isc'ulal chawatx'e , wal xin yu chachbuchwa yin̈ Comam Dios , yuto hach ti' caw comon anma hach , yaj chawalico haba Diosal , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43010034	Yalni Comam Jes'us : -- Istzoti' Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcano yet payat ak'bilcano teyet , chal haca' ti' : " Haninan chiwalan tato dios hex , " ẍicanoj .
43010035	Caw xin mach chiyu coman̈c'on tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj , yuto caw Comam Dios tu' haln̈ecanoj diosal yin̈ mac bay ak'bilcano Istzoti' .
43010036	Ha' Comam Dios an̈eintijan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yaja' ¿ tzet yin̈ xin cheyalpaxoj tato buchwal chiwuhan yin̈ Comam Dios yet chiwalnihan tato caw Isc'ahol Dios wehan ?
43010037	Tato mach chinyijehan chejbanile ak'bil wetan yu Inmaman , mach cheyayto yul heyanma win̈an .
43010038	Wal xin hatzet chal Inmaman , ha' chinwatx'ehan . Waxan̈ca caw mach chinhechaytojan yul heyanma , chahwe yul heyanma tzet chinwatx'eti'an . Hac tu' xin chiyu heyohtan̈eniloj tato caw ayco Comam Dios wetbihojan , ayinpaxicojan yin̈ Comam , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43010039	Caw xin yoche ebnaj istzabayo Comam , yaj iscolilo isba Comam yul isk'ab ebnaj .
43010040	Lahwi tu' xin , istopaxo Comam k'axepxac'to ha' niman Jord'an , bay ah ha' iswi' anma yu naj Juan yet yalan̈tocanoj , ha' bey tu' xin cancano Comam .
43010041	Caw hantan̈e anma apni ilno Comam bey tu' , yalni haca' ti' : -- Yin̈ caw yeli waxan̈ca machi hunu c'aybalc'ule isye ya' Juan jet , yaj sunil tzet yalcano ya' yin̈ ya' Jes'us ti' caw yeli , ẍi anma tu' .
43010042	Caw xin hantan̈e anma anayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Jes'us bey tu' .
43011001	Bey con̈ob Betania ay hune' naj chiyij L'azaro ya'bi ay , ha' bey tu' xin aypaxo cawan̈ yanab naj , Mar'ia isbi hune' ix , hune'xa ix xin Marta isbi . Ix Mar'ia tu' , ha' ix anico aceite caw xuk' sam yin̈ yoj Comam Jes'us , lahwi tu' , issuni tajo ix yoj Comam yu xil iswi' .
43011002	
43011003	Ebix cawan̈ yanab naj L'azaro tu' xin , yato ebix tzoti' tet Comam Jes'us haca' ti' : -- Mamin , caw tx'oj ye isc'ul conohan̈ , naj caw xahan ay hawu , ẍito ebix tet Comam .
43011004	Yet yaben Comam hune' chejbanil tu' , yalni Comam : -- Hune' yabil tu' , mach chitan̈cano yin̈ camical . Wal xin ha' chiyenilo yip Comam Dios , ha' xin bay chiixtan̈wipaxilo wipan , hanin Isc'ahol Comam Dios inti'an , ẍi Comam .
43011005	Waxan̈ca caw xahan ay ix Marta yeb ix Mar'ia yeb naj L'azaro yu Comam Jes'us , yaj yet yallaxi tato caw ya'ay naj L'azaro tu' , caw cabto tz'ayic ec' Comam bey tu' .
43011006	
43011007	Lahwi tu' xin yalni Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Ton̈wepaxo ismajul Judea hunelxa , ẍi Comam .
43011008	Yalni xin ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' tet : -- Mamin , caw tolto yoche ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel cachisk'ojo' camoj . ¿ Tom xin chaẍtopaxo hunelxa hawalni ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43011009	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Caw johtaj tato caw cablahon̈eb hora ik'bil yu hune' tz'ayic , yuxin tato tz'ayical chon̈belwi , mach comono chon̈txak'mohi , yuto sajk'inal .
43011010	Yaj tato xol k'ejholo chon̈ec' xin , wal tu' chon̈txak'mohi yuto mach sajk'inal , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43011011	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni Comam : -- Caw mawaycan̈ jamigo L'azaro , wal tinan̈ xin chintohan wik'alojan iswayan̈ naj , ẍi Comam .
43011012	Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jes'us tu' : -- Mamin , yaj tato wayan̈ chu naj , chicawxocan̈ naj chal tu' , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43011013	Yaja' xin yin̈ iscamical naj L'azaro yal Comam , wal ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam tu' xin , ton̈e chiway naj , yalni Comam , chute yalni ebnaj .
43011014	Yuxinto caw yal Comam yin̈ caw haban tet ebnaj : -- Naj L'azaro macam naj ,
43011015	yaj caw chintzalahan yuto machijinan yet iscam naj , yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ yun̈e caw heyanico heyanma win̈an . Ton̈we jila' naj , ẍi Comam .
43011016	Yalni naj Tom'as , naj chihallax tioẍ uninal , tet huntek'anxa ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam : -- Ton̈we yinta Comam haxinwal hun cocam yebi , ẍi naj .
43011017	Yet yapni Comam Jes'us bey tu' xin , yaben Comam tato can̈ebxa tz'ayic ismuji naj L'azaro tu' .
43011018	Ha' con̈ob Betania tu' , ayn̈em yictajo legua yehilo yin̈ con̈ob Jerusal'en .
43011019	Yuxinto caw tx'i'al anma ah Jerusal'en beyc'o yak'a isnimanbal isc'ul ix Marta yeb ix Mar'ia yu iscamical isnoh tu' .
43011020	Hayet yaben ix Marta tato lan̈an yapni Comam Jes'us bey tu' , istit ix ischahno Comam , wal ix Mar'ia xin cancano ix yul n̈a .
43011021	Yalni ix Marta tu' tet Comam yet ischahni isba ix yebi : -- Mamin , tato ayachic'o bey ti' , caw machim cam innohan .
43011022	Yaj xin caw wohtajan tato sunil tzet chak'an tet Comam Dios chiyak' Comam tawet , ẍi ix .
43011023	Istak'wi Comam tet ix : -- Wal hanoh tu' , chiitzitzbocan̈ , ẍi Comam .
43011024	Yalni ix : -- Ho' Mamin , caw wohtajan tato chiitzitzbican̈ innohtu'an yet chiitzitzbican̈ sunil anma yet islahobal tz'ayic , ẍi ix tet Comam .
43011025	Yalni Comam xin : -- Haninti'an chiwak' itzitzbocan̈an anma camnaxa , yeb xin haninan chiwak'an isk'inal mach istan̈bal . Yuxinto macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan yul yanma , waxan̈ca chicami chiitzitzbican̈ .
43011026	Yebpaxo xin sunil anma itzitzto chinchahnihan yul yanma , mach chicam yin̈ huneln̈e . ¿ Chimhawayto yul hawanma yin̈ tzet chiwalan ? ẍi Comam tet ix .
43011027	Ho' Mamin , caw chiwaytojan yul wanmahan tato hach ti' Cristo hach . Caw Isc'ahol Comam Dios hawehi , halbilcanoj ta chachhul yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ẍi ix Marta tu' tet Comam .
43011028	Lahwi yalni ix Marta haca' tu' , isto ix yawtenoti isnoh , yalni ix tet ix yin̈ ewantajil : -- Ayc'o Comam cuywawom bey ti' , chachyawte Comam , ẍi ix tet ix Mar'ia .
43011029	Yaben̈e ix Mar'ia tzet yal isnoh tu' xin , yah lemna ix , isto ix yilno Comam .
43011030	Maẍto xin chiapni Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob , ha' bay ischah isba ix Marta yeb Comam , ha' to tu' xin ay Comam yet yapni ix Mar'ia .
43011031	Wal anma ah Judea ayco yak'ni isnimanbal isc'ul ebix yet yilni anma yah lemna ix Mar'ia tu' isto ix , yoc tzujno anma yinta ix yuto istxum anma tato chito ix ok'o bay mujan isnoh tu' .
43011032	Yet yapni ix Mar'ia isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us xin , yay jahno ix yich yoj Comam , yalni ix haca' ti' : -- Mamin , tato ayachic'o bey ti' , machim cam conohti'an̈ , ẍi ix tet Comam .
43011033	Yet yilni Comam Jes'us yok'can̈ ix Mar'ia yeb anma ah Judea tzujan yinta ix tu' , yoc bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul Comam , istz'aycan̈ isc'ul Comam .
43011034	Isk'amben Comam xin : -- ¿ Baytu'wal mujan naj heyu ? ẍi Comam . -- Mamin , ton̈ jila' , ẍi ix Mar'ia yeb anma tu' .
43011035	Yok'can̈ Comam xin .
43011036	Yet yilni anma ah Judea yok'can̈ Comam , yalni haca' ti' : -- Caw yeli xahan ay naj yu ya' , ẍi anma .
43011037	Aypaxo hunmajanxa anma halni : -- Ha' ya' ti' ak'ni hajloho sat naj mutz'an sat , ¿ tom xin mach an̈cha naj L'azaro ti' yu ya' ? Hac tu' xin machim cam naj , ẍi anma .
43011038	Caw ec'na oc bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul Comam yet yapni bay ayicto naj L'azaro tu' . Ha' hune' bay mujan naj tu' , n̈ach'en yehi , ayco hune' ch'en niman ch'en ismajiloj .
43011039	Yalni Comam Jes'us xin : -- Iwelo ismajil ch'en , ẍi Comam . Yalni ix Marta , yanab naj L'azaro tu' : -- Mamin , con̈itax cam naj tinan̈ , caw ayxam sam naj , ẍi ix .
43011040	Istak'wi Comam Jes'us : -- ¿ Tom machi mawalan tawet xin tato chawayto yul hawanma yin̈ tzet chiwalan , caw chawila' ishelanil yip Comam Dios ? ẍi Comam tet ix .
43011041	Lahwi tu' xin , yilaxilo ismajil ch'en bay mujan naj tu' , ist'an̈xican̈ Comam Jes'us satcan̈ , yalni haca' ti' : -- Mamin , caw chiwak'an yuch'andios tawet yu maxawabe tzet mawalan .
43011042	Wohtajan Mam ta sunilbal tiempo chawabe tzet chiwalan , yaj xin chiwalan hunel ti' tawet yu sunil anma cutxanico ti' , yun̈e yanayto yul yanma ta hach ti' an̈eintijan , ẍi Comam tu' .
43011043	Yet lahwi yalni Comam hune' ti' xin , yah yaw Comam yin̈ caw ip : -- L'azaro , elan̈tij , ẍi Comam .
43011044	Hac tu' xin yu yelti naj L'azaro tu' , bec'bilico k'ap yin̈ isnimanil naj , pichbilpaxto sat naj yu hune' k'ap . Yalni Comam xin : -- Holwelo k'ap yin̈ naj , cat isto naj , ẍi Comam .
43011045	Anma ah Judea apni ilwal yin̈ ix Mar'ia , caw yilpaxo tzet iswatx'e Comam Jes'us bey tu' , yuxinto caw hantan̈e anma anayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
43011046	Aypaxo huntek'an ebnaj to halno tet ebnaj fariseo yin̈ tzet iswatx'e Comam .
43011047	Hac tu' xin yu yoc ebnaj fariseo islahti'n̈en isba yeb ebnaj yahawil yehico yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yeb xin ebnaj yahaw con̈ob . Yalni ebnaj : -- ¿ Tzet wal juten tinan̈ , hune' naj tu' caw tx'i'al c'aybalc'ule chisyecano naj ?
43011048	Tato ton̈e chijila chislahnico naj , caw sunil jet con̈ob ti' chak'ayto yul yanma yin̈ naj . Hac tu' xin chiyu yulo ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Roma , cat xin yuchc'anayo ebnaj yatut Comam Dios , cat xin yetanto ebnaj cocon̈ob ti' , ẍi ebnaj tet hunun .
43011049	Ay xin hune' naj , Caif'as isbi , iswi'ehal yehico naj yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote yin̈ hune' habil tu' . Ha' naj halni : -- Hex ti' caw matzet heyohtaj .
43011050	Caw mach chitxumchalo heyu tato ec'bal c'ul iscam naj ti' selelo sunil anma , hac tu' xin matxa chitan̈ilo cocon̈ob ti' chal tu' , ẍi naj .
43011051	Wal xin mach yal naj Caif'as hune' tu' yul yet ischuquil , yuto ha' naj yahawil yehico yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote hune' habil tu' , yuxinto ha' Comam Dios ak'ni yala' naj tato chicam Comam Jes'us selelo sunil anma ah Israel .
43011052	Yaj maẍn̈etaj yin̈ con̈ob Israel chicam Comam Jes'us , wal xin chicampaxo Comam yun̈e iscutxbanico sunil yuninal Comam Dios pujanto yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yun̈e hunxan̈e chiyute isba .
43011053	Yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' , islahti'n̈e isba ebnaj yahawil con̈ob Israel tato chak' camo ebnaj Comam Jes'us .
43011054	Yuxin matxa ec' Comam Jes'us xol anma bey ismajul Judea , wal xin to Comam bey yul hune'xa con̈ob chiyij Efra'in , hune' con̈ob ayco iscawilal tx'otx' desierto . Ha' tu' xin ehayo Comam yeb ebnaj chicuywi yintaj .
43011055	Wal yul con̈ob Jerusal'en xin , toxa chiichico k'in̈ Pascua , hune' k'in̈ tu' isk'in̈ anma Israel . Caw xin tx'i'al anma yul hunun con̈ob apni bey Jerusal'en tu' , yu isyijen yak'ni sajbo isba yet yalan̈to maẍto chiichico k'in̈ tu' .
43011056	Chi-xin-ec' anma tu' saywal yin̈ Comam Jes'us . Yet cutxanico anma yul yatut Comam Dios , chisk'amben anma tet hunun haca' ti' : ¿ Tzet quexchi ? ¿ Chimhulu ya' Jes'us yin̈ k'in̈ ti' mato machoj ? ẍi anma .
43011057	Ebnaj fariseo yeb xin ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yalilto ebnaj xol anma tato macn̈etic'a yohta baytu'wal ay Comam Jes'us , chihallax tet ebnaj yun̈e istzabnayo ebnaj Comam .
43012001	Wajebto tz'ayic yichico k'in̈ Pascua , yapni Comam Jes'us bey Betania , bay ay yatut naj L'azaro , naj itzitzbican̈ xol camom yu Comam .
43012002	Yet yapni Comam bey tu' , yoc hune' niman wah yu tzalahilal yin̈ Comam . Ha' hun naj L'azaro oc sat meẍa isc'atan̈ Comam , ha' xin ix Marta chianayo itah sat meẍa .
43012003	Wal ix Mar'ia xin , aymi hunu libra an̈ caw xuk' sam ik'bil yu ix , naba nardo caw xin aycan̈ istohol . Yanico ix yin̈ yoj Comam , lahwi tu' xin issuni tajo ix yoj Comam yu xil iswi' . Hac tu' xin , caw sunil yul n̈a tu' pujnacan̈ sunil isxuk'al sam .
43012004	Wal naj Judas Iscariote , isc'ahol icham Sim'on , naj ayco yetbiho ebnaj chicuywi yinta Comam , naj chianico Comam yul isk'ab camical , ha' naj halni haca' ti' :
43012005	-- Hune' an̈ caw xuk'cano sam ti' , caw oxebmi ciento denario istohol . Estam matxon̈laxtoj , cat ispohlaxto istohol yin̈ anma caw meba' , ẍi naj .
43012006	Matolo yu chitz'ay isc'ul naj yin̈ anma meba' yuxinto yal naj haca' ti' , machoj . Walxinto ha' naj ik'n̈e istx'uyal ch'en melyu , caw xin k'ayna naj yelk'anilo ch'en melyu chisc'uba tu' , yuto caw elk'om naj .
43012007	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet naj : -- ¡ Mach chacach ix ! Wal xin caw yan̈ebil hune' an̈ ti' yu ix , yun̈e yanico ix yin̈ innimanilan yet yalan̈to maẍto chinmujlaxan .
43012008	Wal anma meba' chawal ti' , caw ayn̈etic'aco texol , yaj walinan xin , mach ton̈etic'a ay inicojan texol , ẍi Comam .
43012009	Caw tx'i'al anma Israel abeniloj tato ayc'o Comam Jes'us bey Betania ; isto anma yilno Comam , yeb chiyoche anma yila'paxo naj L'azaro itzitzbican̈ xol anma camom yu Comam .
43012010	Yu naj L'azaro tu' , caw niman anma Israel yayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Jes'us ; matxa xin chisje isc'ul anma tu' isyije' tzettaj chal ebnaj sacerdote . Yu hune' tu' , yuxinto islahti'n̈e isba ebnaj yahawil yehico yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote tato chak' camo ebnaj naj L'azaro .
43012011	
43012012	Caw hantan̈e anma apni yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en . Yet hune'xa tz'ayic xin , yaben anma tato lan̈an yapni Comam Jes'us bey yul con̈ob tu' .
43012013	Yuxin yilo anma xaj te' ch'ib , yinito anma te' yun̈e isto anma ischahno Comam . Chi-la-el yaw anma yin̈ caw ip , chalni : -- ¡ Caw niman yelapno Comam Dios ! ¡ Jala'we tzoti' caw c'ul yin̈ Mac ak'bilti coxol yu Comam Dios Jahawil . Jak'a'we tzalaho coc'ul yin̈ Jahawil , han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti' ! ẍi anma tu' .
43012014	Ay xin hune' no' nich'an burro ilcha yu Comam . Yahto Comam yiban̈ no' haca'tic'a yalni Comam Dios bay tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj :
43012015	Hex ah con̈ob Si'on , mach chexxiwi . Ilwec'anabi lah , chihul Heyahawil , ayahto yiban̈ hune' no' burro , ẍiayoj .
43012016	Yet hune' tz'ayical tu' xin caw maẍtic'a txumchalo yu ebnaj iscuywom Comam Jes'us yin̈ tzet chalilo hune' tu' . Hato yet istocano Comam yul satcan̈ , hato tu' xin isnaniti ebnaj tato tz'ibn̈ebilcano hune' tu' yin̈ Comam , yuxinto hac tu' yuhi .
43012017	Wal anma ayc'o isc'atan̈ Comam Jes'us yet yawtenilti Comam naj L'azaro yul pante'on , yet yitzitzbican̈ naj yu Comam , ha' anma tu' halnic'o yin̈ tzet yuhi .
43012018	Caw tx'i'al anma to chawal yin̈ Comam , yuto yabe anma isk'umal yin̈ hune' c'aybalc'ule iswatx'e Comam tu' .
43012019	Wal ebnaj fariseo xin , yal ebnaj tet hunun : -- Ilwec'anabi lah , caw matzet wal juteni yuto caw sunil anma tzujan yinta naj , ẍi ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
43012020	Xol sunil anma apni yik'ayo isba tet Comam Dios yin̈ k'in̈ tu' , ayco huntek'an ebnaj griego .
43012021	Apni ebnaj ti' isc'atan̈ naj Felipe ay bey con̈ob Betsaida ayco yul ismajul Galilea , yalni ebnaj tet naj : -- Mamin , caw chijochehan̈ chijilan̈ yin̈ Comam Jes'us , ẍi ebnaj .
43012022	Hac tu' xin yu isto naj Felipe tu' yalno tet naj Andr'es , iscawan̈ilxa xin ebnaj to halno tet Comam .
43012023	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- Wal Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , lan̈an yapni yorahil isyelaxilo inhelanilan .
43012024	Caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , k'inalo tato mach chitz'unlax hunu hin̈at trigo sat tx'otx' cat isk'ato ixim , machom chul isc'ul ixim . Yaj tato chik'ato ixim , wal tu' chihul isc'ul ixim , caw xin niman sat ixim chak'a .
43012025	Mac mach hinano yaben isya'tajil win̈an , chisc'ayto isk'inal mach istan̈bal . Wal mac hinan yanma yaben isya'tajil win̈an , caw chischah isk'inal mach istan̈bal .
43012026	Tato ay mac chiyijen tzet chiwalan , ocojab tzujno wintajan . Yuxinto ha' bay ayinan , ha' tu' chiehpaxo mac caw yijem chute isba wetti'an ; ha' xin Inmaman chihalni isc'ulal yin̈ , ẍi Comam .
43012027	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni Comam Jes'us : -- Wal tinan̈ , caw bisc'ulal ye wanmahan , yaja' ¿ tzet chiwute walnihan ? ¿ Tom chiwalan tet Comam Dios haca' ti' ? " Mam , colinilojan yul isk'ab hune' isya'tajil lan̈an yul wiban̈ti'an , " ¿ Tom quinchiyan ? ¡ Machoj ! Yu ton hune' ti' , yuxinto hulnajinan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
43012028	Mam , yeloj tato caw aycano yelapno hawehi , ẍi Comam . Lahwi tu' xin yabelax hune' yul nuk'e satcan̈ , yalni haca' ti' : -- Caw xainyelojan tato caw aycano yelapno wehan , yaj chinyelojan hunelxa , ẍiayti yul satcan̈ .
43012029	Sunil anma cutxanico bey tu' , aben hune' yul nuk'e tu' , yalni anma haca' ti' : -- C'uh man̈irlahi , ẍi anma . Aypaxo mac halni : -- Hune' naj 'angel matzotel tet naj , ẍipaxoj .
43012030	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj : -- Mach wuhojan xin to mahallaxayti huntek'an tzoti' ti' , machoj , to heyu .
43012031	Wal tinan̈ xin , yilchaxati anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chi-la-iswatx'e , cat yinilo Comam naj yahawil yehico yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
43012032	Wal inti'an , yet chinilaxcan̈an sat tx'otx' ti' yin̈ te' culus , sunil anma chiwitijan inc'atan̈an , ẍi Comam .
43012033	Yal Comam hune' tu' yu isyeniloj tzet camical chiik'ni camoj .
43012034	Istak'wi anma tet Comam : -- Chal Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ ley aycano jet , tato ya' Cristo chiehoc'o ya' yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxinto chawal haca' ti' ? : " Wal Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , caw yilal chinilaxcan̈an , " cachi . ¿ Mac xin hune' Ak'bilti coxolan̈ yu Comam Dios tu' ? ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43012035	Yalni Comam tu' xin : -- Yin̈xan̈e hanic' tiempohal ayinic'ojan texol ti' , caw chiwacanicojan issajilk'inal yin̈ heyanma , yuxinto watx'eweco heba yin̈ caw istoholal yak' isba ay intoc'ojan texol . Ta machoj , chissomchahocan̈ cheyila , cat xin heyoco haca' anma chiec' xol k'ejholo , caw mach chiyu yilni bay caw chitocoj .
43012036	Wal haninti'an , caw lahaninan haca' issajilk'inal , yuxinto chahweinan yul heyanma yak' isba ay intoc'ojan texol , cat xin wanicojan issajilk'inal ti' yul heyanma yin̈ caw huneln̈e , ẍi Comam . Lahwi yalni Comam tu' xin , isto Comam yebanto isba tet anma .
43012037	Caw hantan̈e c'aybalc'ule isye Comam Jes'us tet anma tu' , yaj caw maẍtic'a ischah anma Comam yul yanma .
43012038	Hac tu' xin yu yijnicano isba yin̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Isa'ias , ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , bay chala : Mamin , ¿ mac chahnayto yul yanma yin̈ tzettaj jalan̈ ? Waxan̈ca caw xahaye hawip tet anma , yaja' caw maẍtic'a mac chahn̈e hach yul yanma , ẍiayoj .
43012039	Caw maẍtic'a ischayto anma Comam yul yanma , hac tu' yu istz'ibn̈encano naj Isa'ias :
43012040	Comam Dios majchencano sat anma , yak'nipaxo cawbolo Comam yanma anma yun̈e matxa chiyu yilni , yeb xin mach chitxumchalo yu . Caw mach chisbejcano anma ismachiswalilal , yuxin mach chian̈cha anma yin̈ ismul yu Comam , ẍicano naj Isa'ias tu' .
43012041	Yalcano naj Isa'ias huntek'an ti' , yuto ilbilxa ishelanil Comam Jes'us yu naj .
43012042	Waxan̈ca hac tu' yute yalnicano naj Isa'ias , yaja' caw hantan̈e ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj Israel chahnicano Comam yul yanma . Yaj to caw mach chisyelo ebnaj , machi bay chalpaxic'o ebnaj yuto caw chixiw ebnaj tet ebnaj fariseo . Tato chiyabecan̈ ebnaj fariseo tu' , caw matxa chichahlaxicto ebnaj yul capilla .
43012043	Hac tu' yute ebnaj yun̈e iscan ebnaj c'ulal yul sat anma , sata iscanpaxo ebnaj c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios .
43012044	Yalni Comam Jes'us yin̈ ip tet anma : -- Ha' mac chinchahnaytojan yul yanma , maẍn̈etajinan chinischahan , to ha' hun Inmaman chischahpaxoj , yuto ha' quinanitijan .
43012045	Yeb mac chinilnihan , caw lan̈an yilnipaxico yin̈ Inmaman quinanitijan .
43012046	Wal inti'an , hulnajinan wak'a'an sajilk'inal yul yanma anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yuxin macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan yul yanma mach chican xol k'ejholo .
43012047	Yaja' ha' mac chiaben tzet chiwalti'an , mach xin chisyijepaxoj , maẍtajinan chincawxecojan ismul yiban̈ . Walinan maẍtaj yu incawxenicojan ismul anma yiban̈ yuxinto hulnajinan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ; to yu incolnihan anma yuxin quinhulan .
43012048	Macta chinyahnihan , yeb xin mach chisyije tzet chiwalan , ay hune' chicawxenico ismul tu' yiban̈ , ha' ton tzoti' xawalan xol anma . Ha' tzoti' tu' xin , chicawxenico ismul tu' yiban̈ yet islahobal tz'ayic .
43012049	Wal xin , sunil tzet chiwalan , caw mach wetojan inchuquilan , ha' Inmaman an̈eintijan , ha' chejn̈einan yin̈ tzettaj chiwalan yeb tzettaj chiwak'an iscuyu' anma .
43012050	Caw xin wohtajan tato ha' ischejbanil Inmamtu'an , ha' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal tet anma ; yuxin haca' yu yalni wetan , hac tu' chiwute walnicanojan teyet , ẍi Comam tet anma .
43013001	Yet hecalxan̈e chiichico k'in̈ Pascua , caw yohtaxa Comam Jes'us tato apni istiempohal bay chiyacano Comam hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , cat isto Comam isc'atan̈ Comam Dios . Caw xahan yil Comam macta yaco isba yul isk'ab yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Wal tinan̈ xin caw chisyecanilo Comam tato caw xahan ay sunil anma tu' yu .
43013002	Wal naj matzwalil xin , xa'aynato naj yul yanma naj Judas Iscariote , isc'ahol icham Sim'on , yin̈ yanico naj Comam yul isk'ab camical . Wal Comam Jes'us caw yohtaj tato isc'atan̈ Comam Dios titna Comam , yuxinto isc'atan̈ Comam Dios tu' chitopaxo hunelxa . Caw yohtapaxo Comam tato yul isk'ab yacanico Comam Dios sunil tzettaj ye tu' . Yet lan̈an iswa' Comam yeb ebnaj chicuywi yinta tu' , yahwano Comam yinilo Comam hune' xil isk'ap hucanico yiban̈ iscamiẍ , isc'alnico Comam hune' pixe yin̈ yictaj .
43013003	
43013004	
43013005	Yanayto Comam ha ha' yul pech'an , istzabnico Comam istx'ahni yoj ebnaj chicuywi yinta tu' , issuni tajo Comam yu hune' pixe ayco yin̈ yicta tu' .
43013006	Yet lan̈an istzabnico Comam istx'ahni yoj naj Sim'on Pedro , yalni naj tet Comam : -- Mamin , ¿ tom chachoc hatx'aha' wojti'an hawalni ? ẍi naj tet Comam .
43013007	Istak'wi Comam tet naj : -- Tinan̈ caw mach chitxumchalo hawu tzet chinwatx'eti'an , yaj yet tzujanxa cat istxumchalo hawu , ẍi Comam .
43013008	Yalni naj tet Comam : -- ¡ Machoj Mamin ! Caw maẍtic'a chu hatx'ahnilo wojti'an , ẍi naj . Yalni Comam : -- Wal xin tato mach chisje hac'ul chintx'ahan hawoj ti' , caw mach ayachoco yetbiho ebnaj ayxaco yul ink'aban , ẍi Comam tet naj .
43013009	Yalni naj Pedro tet Comam : -- Ta hac tu' chal tu' Mamin , maẍn̈eojabtaj wojti'an chatx'aha , wal xin yilal hatx'ahnipaxo ink'aban yebpaxo xin inwi'an , ẍi naj tet Comam .
43013010	Istak'wi Comam tet naj : -- K'inalo tato ay hunu mac lan̈anto yaẍniloj , matxa yilalo istx'ahlax sunil isnimanil , han̈c'an̈e yoj , yuto caw sajto ye isnimanil tu' . Yuxinto caw lahan hex ti' yeb anma lan̈anto yaẍniloj ; caw saj ye heyanma , yaj mach hesuniloj , ẍi Comam .
43013011	Wal xin , caw yohtaxa Comam mac chianico yul isk'ab camical , yuxinto yal haca' ti' : " Yaj mach hesunilo saj ye heyanma , " ẍi Comam .
43013012	Yet lahwi istx'ahni Comam yoj ebnaj xin , yanipaxico Comam hune' xil isk'ap hucan ye tu' . Yaypaxo tz'on̈no Comam isc'atan̈ ebnaj , yalni haca' ti' : -- ¿ Chimtxumchalo heyu tzet manwatx'eti'an ? ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43013013	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Walex hex ti' , chinheyalan hecuywawomal yeb xin heyahawiloj . Wal xin caw yel cheyala , ist'in̈anil ton hune' tu' .
43013014	Haninti'an hecuywawom wehan , Heyahawil wepaxojan , yaj mantx'ahan heyoj , yuxin hex ti' hac tu' wal heyuni teyin̈ hununex .
43013015	Wal xin manwatx'ehan hune' ti' yun̈e inyenicanojan tato hac tu' wal heyuteni .
43013016	Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , haca' hunu naj c'amte' , mach ec'balo naj sata naj bay chimunla tu' , hactic'apax tu' naj chejab , mach ec'balo naj sat naj chichejni .
43013017	Tato chitxumchalo huntek'an ti' heyu , cat xin heyijeni , caw sak'al heyet .
43013018	Maẍtaj teyin̈ hesunil chiwalan hune' ti' , wal xin wohtajan macta sic'bililo wuhan , yaja' xin yilal yijni isba yin̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcanayo yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios bay chala : " Ha' hune' mac caw hun chinwa'an yebi , ha' chipaq'uico win̈an , " ẍiayoj .
43013019	Yalan̈to chiwalnicanojan hune' ti' teyet haxinwal yet chiyijno isba , caw cheyayto yul heyanma tato haninan Cristo hinan .
43013020	Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , macn̈etic'a chichahni hunu inchejaban , haninan chinischahpaxojan . Hacpax tu' xin macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan , chischahpaxo Mac chejn̈eintijan , ẍi Comam .
43013021	Yet lahwi yalnicano Comam huntek'an ti' xin , yoc hune' niman bisc'ulal yin̈ isc'ul Comam , yalni Comam yin̈ caw haban : -- Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , texol ti' ayco hune' mac chinanocojan yul isk'ab camical , ẍi Comam .
43013022	Yet yaben ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' xin , toxan̈e chi-la-t'an̈xico ebnaj yin̈ sat hunun , yuto mach yohtajo ebnaj mac yin̈ yal Comam .
43013023	Ay xin hune' naj iscuywom Comam caw xahan ay yu , iscawilal xin Comam ayco naj yet chiwa'i .
43013024	Yak'ni naj Sim'on Pedro yechel tet naj , yun̈e isk'ambenilo naj mac hune' chal Comam tu' .
43013025	K'ehan xin naj iscawilal istxam isc'ul Comam Jes'us , isk'amben naj tet Comam : -- Mamin , ¿ mac najil hune' chawal ti' ? ẍi naj .
43013026	Istak'wi Comam tet naj : -- Ha' mac bay chiwak'atojan ixim pan chinlabahan , ha' hune' tu' , ẍi Comam tet naj . Lahwi tu' xin islaban Comam ixim pan tu' , yak'ni Comam ixim tet naj Judas Iscariote , isc'ahol icham Sim'on .
43013027	Yet ischahni naj ixim pan tu' , yaynato naj matzwalil yul yanma naj , yalni Comam tet naj : -- Ha' tzet nabil hawu hawatx'eni , watx'e yin̈ an̈e , ẍi Comam tet naj .
43013028	Wal ebnaj chiwa' sat meẍa yeb Comam tu' xin , caw machi hunu ebnaj txumchalo yu tzet yin̈ yuxinto yal Comam haca' tu' .
43013029	Naj Judas tu' xin ha' naj ik'n̈e istx'uyal ch'en melyu , yuxin ay ebnaj txumni ta chischejto Comam naj islok'o tzet chiocnico yin̈ k'in̈ tu' , maca yu ispohnito naj hanic'o ch'en melyu tu' yin̈ anma meba' .
43013030	Yet lahwi iswahni naj Judas ixim pan tu' , yelti naj bey tu' , caw xin xa'ay numnahi .
43013031	Lahwi istocano naj Judas tu' , yalni Comam Jes'us haca' ti' : -- Wal tinan̈ chisyelo isba wipan Hanin Ak'bilintijan texol yu Comam Dios , cat xin isyenipaxilo isba yip Comam Dios win̈an .
43013032	Tato chinyelojan yip Comam Dios , chisyepaxilo Comam wipan , caw xin lan̈anxa isyeniloj .
43013033	Hex caw xahan ayex wuti'an , caw hanic'xan̈e tiempo ayinic'ojan texol . Chinhesaya'c'ojan , yaj caw mach chiyu heto bay chintotu'an . Haca'tic'a wute walnihan tet anma Israel , hac tu' chiwute walnipaxojan teyet .
43013034	Chiwak'canojan hune' ac' chejbanile ti' teyet , xahan cheyil heba hununex . Haca' isxahanil ayex wuhan , hac tu' cheyutepaxo heba .
43013035	Tato caw xahancano cheyil heba hununex , hac tu' chiyu yohtan̈enilo anma tato quexincuywoman , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43013036	Isk'amben naj Sim'on Pedro tet Comam : -- Mamin , ¿ baytu'wal xin chaẍtohi ? ẍi naj . Istak'wi Comam : -- Bay chintotu'an mach chu hato wintajan . Chaẍoco tzujno wintajan , yaj maẍto tinan̈ , ẍi Comam .
43013037	Yalnipaxo naj Pedro tu' tet Comam : -- Mamin , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxin mach chu woc tzujnojan tawintaj ? Caw hinaninan wak'ni camo inbahan tawin̈ , ẍi naj tet Comam .
43013038	Istak'wi Comam : -- ¿ Caw yelmi chawala ? ¿ Caw hinan hachmi hawak'ni camo haba win̈an ? Wal xin yin̈ isyelal chiwalan tawet , caw oxelxa chawala tato mach quinhawohtajojan yalan̈to maẍto chiok'can̈ no' icham chiyo , ẍi Comam tet naj .
43014001	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Caw mach chicabcon hec'ul , aweco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios cat xin heyanipaxico heyanma win̈an .
43014002	Bey yatut Inmaman caw ay hamanil bay wal jehi ; k'inalo ta machi hamanil tu' xamwalan teyet . Wal xin caw aya , yuxinto chintohan inwatx'e'an hune' bay chexapni tu' .
43014003	Yetxa lahwi inwatx'enan bay chexapni , cat xin wulan hunelxa quexwinotojan , haxinwal bay chinehan , ha' tu' chexehpaxoj .
43014004	Ha' bay chintotu'an , caw heyohtaxa , yeb xin heyohtapaxo isbelal , ẍi Comam tet ebnaj .
43014005	Yalni naj Tom'as tet Comam : -- Mamin , caw mach johtajojan̈ baytu'wal chaẍtohi . ¿ Tzet xin chiyu johtan̈enilojan̈ isbehal ? ẍi naj tet Comam .
43014006	Istak'wi Comam : -- Hanintonan hune' beh chiwalan teyet ti' , yuto haninn̈ehan chiyu quexwinitojan isc'atan̈ Inmaman . Haninan isyelal , yeb xin haninn̈ehan chiwak'an k'inale mach istan̈bal .
43014007	Tato quinheyohtaj inxahan , caw heyohtaxa Inmaman . Wal tinan̈ xin , caw heyohtaxa Inmaman , yuto xaheyilico yin̈ , ẍi Comam .
43014008	Yalni xin naj Felipe tet Comam : -- Mamin , ye Hamam tu' jila'an̈ , c'uxanojtamna tu' , ẍi naj tet Comam .
43014009	Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Felipe , ayxa istiempohal wehic'ojan texol . ¿ Tom caw maẍto quinhawohtajan ? Macn̈etic'a chinilnihan , lan̈an yilnipaxo yin̈ Inmaman . ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxinto chawalpaxoj ? : " Ye Hamam tu' jila'an̈ , " cachi .
43014010	¿ Tom caw maẍto chawayto yul hawanma tato wetbi inbahan yeb Inmaman , yetbipaxo Inmaman wehan ? Yuxinto sunil tzet chiwalan teyet mach wetojan inchuquilan , ha' Inmaman ayico wetbihojan , ha' chiwatx'en ismunil .
43014011	Aweyto yul heyanma ta wetbi inbahan yeb Inmaman , aypaxico Inmamtu'an win̈an . Tato mach cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an , aweyto yul heyanma yu ej c'aybalc'ule chinyehan teyet .
43014012	Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalan teyet , macn̈etic'a chinchahnihan yul yanma , chiswatx'epaxo haca' tzet chinwatx'eti'an . Aypaxo tzet ec'balto chiswatx'e' , yuto isc'atan̈ Inmaman chintohan .
43014013	Tzijxan̈e tzet chek'ana yu ayexxaco yul ink'aban chiwak'an . Hanin Isc'ahol Comam Dios inti'an , chinyelojan yip Inmamtu'an .
43014014	Yuxin chiwalan teyet , tzijxan̈e ye tu' chek'an yin̈ inbihan chiwak'an teyet , yuto caw wetxahan heyehi .
43014015	Tato xahan ayinan heyu , yijewe tzet chiwalti'an .
43014016	Haninan chink'anan tet Inmaman cat yaniti Comam Esp'iritu Santo colwal teyin̈ , ha' Comam tu' isyelaln̈etic'a chala . Ha' xin chihul texol yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Wal anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xin , caw mach chiyu ischahni hune' Esp'iritu tu' yuto mach ohtabilo yu anma , machi xin chitxumchalo yu . Walex hex ti' xin , caw heyohtaxa , caw xin chi'ehayo texol cat yehpaxico teyin̈ .
43014017	
43014018	Wal inti'an mach chexinbejcanojan hechuquil , chinhulpaxojan tec'atan̈ hunelxa .
43014019	Caw hanic'xan̈e tiempohal ayinic'ojan , lahwi tu' xin matxa chinillaxojan yu anma . Walex hex ti' , chi-tic'a-heyila'paxo win̈an , yuto caw itzitz inn̈etic'ahan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Haquexpax tu' , itzitz hexn̈etic'apaxoj .
43014020	Yet ayxaco Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyin̈ , cat istxumchaholo heyu ta wetbi inbahan yeb Inmaman . Haquexpax tu' , ayexpaxico win̈an , ay inpaxicojan teyin̈ .
43014021	Macta chiaben tzet chiwalan , cat xin isyijeni , ha' huntek'an tu' caw chon̈ochenan̈ . Yuxin macn̈etic'a chinochenan , caw xahan ay yu Inmaman , xahan aypaxo wuhan , cat xin inyenilo inbahan tet , ẍi Comam .
43014022	Yalni naj Judas , yaj maẍtaj naj Judas Iscariote : -- Mamin , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxinto jetn̈ehan̈ chayelo haba ? Wal tet anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' mach chayelo haba tet , ẍi naj .
43014023	Yalni Comam xin : -- Ha' mac chinochenan , chisyije tzet chiwalan , caw xin xahan ch'illaxo yu Inmaman . Hac tu' xin chu julan̈ cat joccanojan̈ yetbihoj .
43014024	Ha' mac mach chinochenan , mach chisyije tzet chiwalan . Wal hune' cuybanil lan̈an heyaben ti' caw mach wetojan , yet Inmaman an̈eintijan texol .
43014025	Caw chiwalcanojan huntek'an ti' teyet yak' isba ayintoc'ojan texol .
43014026	Chati Inmamtu'an Comam Esp'iritu Santo texol ; ha' chihul inselelojan cat iscolwa teyin̈ , cat xin quexiscuyni yin̈ sunil tzettaj ye tu' . Ha' xin chiak'ni henabati sunil tzet xa-le-hecuycano wuhan .
43014027	Wal tinan̈ xin , chiwacanojan ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma . Hune' ak'anc'ulal chiwak'ti'an caw c'ul , mach haca' ak'anc'ulal chak' anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Wal xin mach chicabcon hec'ul , mach chexxiwpaxoj .
43014028	Caw xawalan teyet ta chintohan , yaj xin chinhulpaxojan hunelxa tec'atan̈ . Ta caw yeli chinheyochehan , caw chimquextzala heyabeni tato chintohan isc'atan̈ Inmaman , yuto caw ec'balto Inmamtu'an insatajan .
43014029	Yalan̈tocanoj chiwalnicanojan teyet yin̈ huntek'an ti' , haxinwal yet chijni isba , cat heyanayto yul heyanma yin̈ .
43014030	Matxa caw tzet chiwalan teyet , yuto caw lan̈an yul naj matzwalil , naj yahawil yeco yin̈ hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Waxan̈ca ay yip naj , yaj mach chik'oji naj wiban̈an .
43014031	Yaj to caw yilal yec'ya' wanmati'an yun̈e yohtan̈enilo sunil anma tato caw chiwochehan Inmaman , cat inyenilojan tato caw chinyijehan chejbanil ak'bil wetan yu . Wal tinan̈ xin , ahan̈wewanoj , elojon̈we bey ti' , ẍi Comam .
43015001	Yalni Comam Jes'us tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Wal haninti'an , caw lahaninan yeb xin hunu yoj te' uva caw c'ul , wal Inmaman xin , caw lahan yeb hunu mac chiilni te' .
43015002	K'inaloj tato ayej te' isk'ab mach chisatni , chitzoc'laxilto te' yu naj chitan̈en te' . Wal te' isk'ab caw c'ul issatni xin , chiyilo naj istajinal isk'ab te' , hac tu' xin caw chisatni te' sic'lebil . Haca' iswatx'encan̈ naj te' uva tu' , caw hac tu' chiyute istan̈en Inmaman macta ayxaco yul ink'aban .
43015003	Walex hex ti' , caw sajxa ye heyanma yu cuybanile ak'bilxa teyet wuhan .
43015004	Ayojab exn̈etic'aco win̈an , cat wehic'ojan yul heyanma . Caw haca' hunu isk'ab te' uva tzoc'bililto yin̈ yoj , matxa chisatni , caw hac tu' heyehi tato machijex win̈an .
43015005	Wal haninti'an , caw lahaninan yeb xin yoj te' uva . Wal hexpaxo xin , caw lahanex haca' te' isk'ab . Yuxin ta ayexn̈etic'aco win̈an , ay inpaxic'ojan teyin̈ , lahanex haca' hunu isk'ab te' uva caw c'ul issatni . Wal tato machijinan teyin̈ , caw machi hunu ti' chiyu hewatx'en hechuquil .
43015006	Wal mac mach chiehic'o win̈an xin , caw lahan chiutelax haca' te' isk'ab mach chiyak' sat , chitzoc'laxiloj cat istajiloj . Chilahwi istajilo te' xin , cat iscutxbalaxcan̈ te' , cat yalaxto te' yul k'a' .
43015007	Tato hacn̈etic'a tu' heyehico win̈an , machi xin chec'ayto heyijen cuybanile chiwalcanoti'an , k'anwe tzet choche hec'ul chiak'laxo teyet .
43015008	Ta haca' te' isk'ab caw satnom tu' haquex tu' , wal tu' cheyeloj tato caw yeli incuywoman heyehi . Hac tu' xin chiyu heyinican̈ isbi Inmaman .
43015009	Haca' isxahanil ayinan yu Inmamtu'an , hac tu' isxahanil chexwilpaxojan . Yuxin xahann̈ehojabn̈etic'a cheyil heba , haca' isxahanil ayex wuhan .
43015010	Tato cheyije chejbanile chiwak'canojan teyet ti' , chexahann̈e heba , haca' isxahanil ayex wuhan . Yuto hac tu' wehan yeb xin Inmaman , caw xahan chexwilan , haca' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Inmaman .
43015011	Caw chiwalan huntek'an ti' teyet yun̈e haca' istzala inc'ulti'an , hac tu' heyabenpaxo tzalahilal wintajan ; haxinwal caw chitz'ajnacano hune' tzalahilal tu' yul heyanma .
43015012	Ha' hune' chejbanile ti' chiwalcanojan teyet , caw xahanojab cheyil heba hununex haca' isxahanil chexwilan .
43015013	Hac ti' chiyu coyeniloj tato caw xahan aycano hunu jamigo ju , tato hinanon̈ jak'ni camo coba yin̈ .
43015014	Tato cheyije tzet chiwalti'an , caw wamigohan heyehi .
43015015	Walex hex ti' , caw matxa chexwalan inchejabojan , yuto hunu naj chejab caw mach yohtajo naj tzet chiswatx'e yahaw , wal xin chexwalan wamigohojan , yuto xawalan teyet sunil tzet halbil wetan yu Inmaman .
43015016	Maẍtajex quinhesayilojan , haninan quexinsayilojan , quexwanicojan yin̈ hemunil yun̈e lahan chexelico haca' hunu te' satnom te' caw niman sat chak'a , ha' xin sunil huntek'an chewatx'e tu' ayn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Hac tu' xin tzijxan̈e ye tu' chek'an tet Inmaman yin̈ inbihan , chiak'lax teyet .
43015017	Yuxinto caw chiwalcanojan teyet , caw xahan cheyille heba hununex .
43015018	Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Tato chexcajlax yu anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , nawetij tato caj quinyilpaxojan anma .
43015019	K'inalo tato ayextoco xol tzet chiswatx'e anma ti' , caw xahanmi chexyila , haca' isxahanil chil isba . Wal xin caw haninan quexinsiqu'ilojan xol anma , yuxintic'a chexiscaj anma , yuto matxa ayexoco xol tzet chiswatx'e .
43015020	Tijab yul hec'ul yet walnihan teyet haca' ti' : " Naj c'amte' caw mach ec'balo naj sata ispatr'on , " yuxin tato caw quincajlaxan yu anma , ha' quexpax tu' chal tu' , chexcajlaxpaxo yu anma . Wal tato isyije anma intzoti'an walan tet xin , haquex pax tu' , chisyije anma cuybanile cheyala .
43015021	Caw chexec'oya' yu anma isyayil ayexico yul ink'aban . Chiyute anma hune' tu' yuto caw mach yohtajo anma tu' Mac an̈eintijan .
43015022	K'inalo tato caw mach quinhulan wala'an cuybanile tet anma , caw machmi ismul anma yin̈ . Wal tinan̈ xin , caw matxa tzet tz'aj yala' yu iscolni isba yin̈ ismul tu' .
43015023	Macn̈etic'a chincajnihan , chiscajpaxo Inmaman .
43015024	Sunil tzet inyehan xol anma , caw maẍto hunu mac chiyeni yila' anma haca' tu' . K'inalo tato machi c'aybalc'ule inyehan xol anma , caw machim ismul anma , chal tu' . Wal xin , waxan̈ca caw yil anma huntek'an tu' , yaj to caw chiniscajan , chiscajpaxo Inmaman .
43015025	Yaja' caw chu huntek'an ti' , yun̈e yijnicano isba sunil tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios bay chala : Caw machi inmulan tet anma , yaj to caw yaco ishowal win̈an , ẍiayoj .
43015026	Yaj ay hune' Comam chicolwa teyin̈ chitit bey Inmaman , ha' ton xin Comam Esp'iritu Santo , Comam han̈e isyelal chala . Haninan chintohan incheja'tijan Comam tu' . Yet ay Comam texol chitzotelo win̈an .
43015027	Haquexpax tu' hex ti' , caw chextzotelo win̈an yuto caw hune'n̈etic'a hetzujico wintajan yettaxtic'a wichicojan walnihan istzoti' Inmaman .
43016001	Caw chiwalcanojan huntek'an ti' teyet , yun̈e mach chebej iscawxi hec'ul win̈an .
43016002	Wal xin , caw matxa chexchahlaxicto yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel ; chiapni hune' tiempohal bay chexyak'a camo ebnaj , cat xin isnano ebnaj tato lan̈an isyijen ebnaj tzet chal Comam Dios .
43016003	Chiswatx'e ebnaj huntek'an ti' , yuto caw mach yohtajo ebnaj Inmaman , yeb xin mach quinyohtajojan ebnaj .
43016004	Caw chiwalcanojan huntek'an ti' teyet , haxinwal yet chiapni istz'ayical chitit yul hec'ul tato halbilxatic'a teyet wuhan . Yalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Caw machi walan huntek'an ti' teyet yet yalan̈tocanoj yuto ayinic'ojan texol .
43016005	Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin , caw chinpaxtojan isc'atan̈ Inmaman an̈eintijan , yaj xin machi hunujex chek'ambe : " ¿ Baytu'wal chaẍtohi ? " quexchi .
43016006	Wal xin , caw chioc bisc'ulal yin̈ hec'ul yu chiwalan huntek'an ti' teyet .
43016007	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalcanojan teyet , caw ec'na c'ul tato chintohan , yuto ta mach chintohan caw mach chihul Comam chicolwa teyin̈ . Wal xin caw chintohan cat inchejnitijan Comam .
43016008	Yet chihul Comam tu' , ha' chiak'ni yohtan̈elo anma tato mulum . Ha' Comam tu' chiak'ni yohtan̈elo anma tu' ta caw istoholal quinhulic'ojan inwatx'e'an , yeb ta chil Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma .
43016009	Ha' Comam Esp'iritu tu' , chiak'ni yohtan̈elo anma tato caw mulum , yuto maẍtic'a isje isc'ul quinischaba'an yul yanma .
43016010	Ha' Comam chiak'nipaxo yohtan̈elo anma tato caw istoholal quinhulic'ojan inwatx'e'an , yuxin chinpaxtojan isc'atan̈ Comam Dios , matxa xin bay chiillax win̈an .
43016011	Chak'nipaxo Comam yohtan̈elo anma tato ha' Comam Dios chiilni yin̈ tzet chielico anma , yuto xacawxico ismul naj yahawil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yiban̈ yu Comam .
43016012	Caw hantan̈e tzet chiwochehan chiwalan teyet , yaj tinan̈ maẍto chexk'oji hetxumniloj .
43016013	Yaja' yet chihul Comam Esp'iritu Santo isyelal chala , ha' Comam xin chexcuyni yin̈ sunil isyelal . Yaj xin mach yeto tzet chak' hecuyu' tu' to tzet abebil yu , ha' chal teyet , cat yak'ni heyohtan̈elo tzettaj ye tu' chito yub .
43016014	Ha' xin chianico inmayan , yuto chohtan̈e baytet wetan yehi cat xin yalnolo teyet .
43016015	Sunil tzettaj ye tu' yet Inmaman caw wetpaxojan , yuxinto chiwalcanojan teyet ; sunil tzettaj ye tu' wetan yehi caw challaxo teyet yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo , ẍi Comam .
43016016	Yalnipaxo Comam tet ebnaj iscuywom : -- Hanic'xan̈e bay matxa cheyila' win̈an , hanic'xan̈e cat heyilnipaxo win̈an hunelxa yuto chintohan bey Inmaman , ẍi Comam .
43016017	Lahwi yalni Comam haca' tu' xin , istzabnico ebnaj iscuywom Comam isk'amben tet hunun : -- ¿ Tzet chal yelapno hune' chiyal Comam ti' ? " Caw hanic'xan̈e bay matxa cheyila' win̈an , hanic'xan̈e xin cat heyilni win̈an hunelxa yuto chintohan isc'atan̈ Inmaman , " ẍi Comam , ẍi ebnaj tet hunun .
43016018	Yalnipaxo ebnaj : -- ¿ Tzet caw yelapno ye hune' chiyal Comam ti' , " caw hanic'xan̈e " ? ẍi Comam . Caw mach chitxumchalo ju tzet chal yelapnoj , ẍi ebnaj .
43016019	Isnanilo Comam Jes'us tato caw choche ebnaj isk'ambe' tet Comam , yuxinto yal Comam tet ebnaj : -- Caw xawalan teyet : " Caw hanic'xan̈e bay matxa cheyila' win̈an , hanic'xan̈e xin cat heyilnipaxo win̈an hunelxa , " quinchiyan . ¿ Tom ha' hune' mawalti'an , ha' caw chek'ambe teyet hunujex ?
43016020	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalan teyet ; chioc bisc'ulal yin̈ heyanma cat heyok'i . Wal anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xin , caw chitzalahocan̈ . Chiayo bisc'ulal teyiban̈ , yaj hune' hebisc'ulal tu' xin caw chipaq'uico yin̈ tzalahilal .
43016021	K'inalo haca' hunu ix ix , yet chiapni yorahil iswatx'i isc'ul caw bisc'ulal chulo yanma ix yu isya'il chul yiban̈ ix . Yaja' yet xapitzc'a nich'an istz'ul ix tu' xin matxa chisnati ix isya'tajil tu' yu tzalahilal yin̈ nich'an unin xapitzc'a yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
43016022	Hac tu' cheyak'le hex ti' , caw chioc bisc'ulal yin̈ hec'ul tinan̈ , yaj xin yet cheyilnopaxo win̈an hunelxa , caw choco hune' icham tzalahilal yin̈ hec'ul . Machi hunu mac chiyu yinilo hune' tzalahilal tu' teyet .
43016023	Yet hune' tiempohal tu' xin , matxa yilalo ay tzet chek'ambe wetan . Yin̈ caw isyelal chiwalcanojan teyet , tzijxan̈e ye tu' chek'an tet Inmaman yin̈ inbihan , chiyak' Comam teyet .
43016024	Wal tinan̈ xin , caw maẍto hunu tzet chek'an yin̈ inbihan tet Inmaman . K'anwej cat yak'lax teyet , haxinwal caw tz'ajan chucanico tzalahilal yul heyanma , ẍi Comam .
43016025	Yalni xin Comam Jes'us : -- Huntek'an cuybanile xawalan teyet ti' , yecheln̈e yu walnihan . Yaj xin chiapni yorahil yet matxa chiwalan teyet yin̈ yecheln̈e , walxinto caw yin̈xa haban chiwalan teyet tzet caw ye Inmaman .
43016026	Yet hune' tiempohal tu' xin , chek'an tzet choche hec'ul tet Inmaman yin̈ inbihan . Matxa yilalo chintzotelan teyin̈ tet Inmamtu'an ,
43016027	yuto caw xahan ayex yu Inmaman . Caw xahan ayex yu Comam tu' yuto caw xahan ayinan heyu yeb xin yu xaheyayto yul heyanma tato isc'atan̈ Comam titnajinan .
43016028	Isc'atan̈ Inmaman quintitan yet wulan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Wal tinan̈ xin chinelan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , cat intohan isc'atan̈ Inmaman hunelxa , ẍi Comam .
43016029	Yalni ebnaj iscuywom Comam tu' tet : -- Wal tinan̈ , caw habanxa hatzoteli , yu matxa chaẍtzotel yin̈ yecheln̈e .
43016030	Tinan̈ xin , caw chinachalo juhan̈ tato sunil caw hawohtaj ; yuxin chijaytojan̈ yul janmahan̈ tato isc'atan̈ Comam Dios titnajach ; matxa yilalo chicok'ambehan̈ tawet , ẍi ebnaj tet Comam .
43016031	Yalni Comam tet ebnaj : -- ¿ Mataxca caw yeli chechayto yul heyanma win̈an ?
43016032	Wal xin , caw lan̈an yul istiempohal bay chexpujnahocantoj , nananta bay xin chextocanicoj . Hac tu' xin chu quinhebejnicanojan inchuquilan , yaj xin mach chincanan inchuquilan yuto caw ayco Inmaman wetbihojan .
