44007034	Ebnaj incon̈oban ay bey Egipto , chiwilan tato caw ayco ebnaj yin̈ isya'tajil , yuxin manayilojan wala'an tawet tato chincolilojan ebnaj xol isya'tajil tu' . Wal xin asi' , haninan chaẍinchejtojan bey Egipto , ẍi Comam Dios tet naj Mois'es tu' .
44007035	Waxan̈ca isyah ebnaj naj Mois'es yet yalni ebnaj tet naj haca' ti' : -- ¿ Mac macachanico jahawilojan̈ ? ẍi ebnaj . Yaj xin Comam Dios anico naj yahawilo ebnaj Israel tu' , yeb xin yu iscolwa naj Mois'es tu' yin̈ ebnaj yu yip naj 'angel isyecan̈ isba tet naj xol k'a' k'a' yin̈ te' tx'ix tu' .
44007036	Ha' naj Mois'es inilti jichmam sat tx'otx' Egipto , yak'nipaxo c'aybalc'ule yila' ebnaj bey Egipto , yeb bey ha' mar Rojo , yebpaxo sat tx'otx' desierto yin̈ cuarenta habil .
44007037	Yal naj Mois'es tu' tet ebnaj jet con̈ob Israel haca' ti' : -- Chissiq'uilo Comam Dios hune' ischejab xol ebnaj jet con̈ob ti' , haca' yu quinissic'nilojan Comam ti' . Caw xin chehajba hetxiquin yin̈ tzet chal naj , ẍicano naj tet ebnaj .
44007038	Yet yec'le naj Mois'es tu' xol ebnaj jet con̈ob Israel tu' bey tx'otx' desierto , ay hune' naj 'angel isye isba tet naj , bey iswi' witz Sina'i . Ha' tet naj Mois'es tu' yak' naj 'angel cuybanile yet cok'inal mach istan̈bal yu Comam Dios , haxa naj Mois'es an̈ecano jet han̈on̈ ti' .
44007039	Yaj machi yoche isc'ul ebnaj jichmam tu' isyije tzet yal naj Mois'es , yuxin yilo ebnaj naj yul yanma , yu hune' tu' xin yoche paxo'to isba ebnaj hunelxa bey tx'otx' Egipto .
44007040	Yalni ebnaj tet naj Aar'on : -- Watx'e ej cotioẍalan̈ cat yoc cosatajan̈ , yuto ha' naj Mois'es con̈iniltijan̈ sat tx'otx' Egipto , mach johtajojan̈ tzet yucanto naj , ẍi ebnaj tet naj Aar'on tu' .
44007041	Yoc ebnaj iswatx'eno yechel hune' yunin wacax ; ha' hune' yechel yunin wacax tu' yalico ebnaj isDiosaloj . Ispotx'ni camo ebnaj huntek'an no nok' yanico ebnaj xahanbalil tet ch'en wacax tu' , yec'tzen ebnaj hune' k'in̈ tet istioẍ tu' .
44007042	Yu hune' tu' , yuxinto yilo isba Comam Dios xol ebnaj . Isbejlaxcano ebnaj ischuquil yu Comam yun̈e yinayo isba ebnaj tet ej tx'umel . Haca' yu istz'ibn̈encano hune' naj ischejab Comam Dios bay chala : Hex ah Israel , cuarenta habil hepotx' no nok' yin̈ xahanbalil bey tx'otx' desierto , yaja' ¿ tom wetan heyak' no' xahanbalil ? ¡ Machoj !
44007043	Walxinto ha' tet hune' hetioẍ cheyijic'oj , hune' chiyij Moloc , yeb hune' yechel tx'umel yeb hediosal chiyij Renf'an . Tet huntek'an yechel hewatx'e tu' , ha' tet caw heyiyo heba ; yu hune' tu' yuxinto chexwilojan sat hune' tx'o tx'otx' ti' , cat quexwanitojan yintato tx'otx' Babilonia , ẍicano Comam Dios yul Hum tz'ibn̈ebilcano tu' .
44007044	Yaj yet yec' ebnaj jichmam sat tx'otx' desierto tu' , yetbic'o ebnaj hune' k'ap mantiado , watx'ebilayo n̈ahil , chiyeniloj ta ayco Comam Dios yetbiho ebnaj . Watx'ebil hune' mantiado tu' yu naj Mois'es haca'tic'a yu isyeni Comam yechel tet naj .
44007045	Ha' hune' mantiado tu' , ak'laxcano yul isk'ab huntek'anxa ebnaj jichmam , ik'bil xin hune' mantiado tu' yu ebnaj yet isk'oji ebnaj yin̈ huntek'an con̈ob yu naj Josu'e . Ha' anma ay yul huntek'an con̈ob tu' , istzumbelo Comam Dios yun̈e yanicano ebnaj huntek'an con̈ob tu' tet ebnaj jichmam ; hune' mantiado tu' ik'bilto yu ebnaj masanto oc naj David reyal .
44007046	Naj rey David tu' xin , tzalacano Comam Dios yin̈ naj . Isk'anni naj tet Comam Dios ta chiswatx'e naj hune' yatut Comam bay chiyiyo isba anma titna yin̈ jichmam Jacob .
44007047	Yaj xin haxa naj Salom'on watx'en hune' yatut Comam tu' .
44007048	Comam Dios , Comam caw aycano yip , machi ehayo yul huno n̈a chiwatx'elax yu anma . Hac tu' yute yalni Comam tet hune' ischejab yet payxa yet yalnicano Comam haca' ti' :
44007049	Yul satcan̈ , ha' tu' ay incapilan yeb intz'on̈obalan , haxa yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , isbatxobal wojan yehi yuto ayco yalan̈ wipan . Yuxin ¿ tzet n̈ahil cheyacan̈ wetan heyalni ? ¿ Aymi hunu bay c'ul inxewan ? Machoj .
44007050	¿ Tom maẍtajinan watx'en̈e sunil tzettaj ye tu' xin ? ẍicano Comam Dios , tet naj Isa'ias .
44007051	Yalnipaxo naj Esteban tet ebnaj tu' : -- Walex hex ti' , caw hip yecanilo heyanma haca' yanma anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios . Caw ay hetxiquin yaj mach cheyabe tzet chal Comam . Ton̈etic'a cheman̈c'o tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu Santo , yuxin caw lahanex yeb heyichmam tu' .
44007052	Ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payxa , caw etalax ebnaj yu ebnaj heyichmam tu' , ispotx'laxpaxo ebnaj yu ebnaj . Ha' ebnaj ischejab Comam halnicano tato chihul hune' naj caw toholcano yanma , haxa yet yul hune' naj tu' xin , hesaynican̈ lek'ti'al yin̈ naj yu heyak'nipaxo camoj .
44007053	Waxan̈ca yak'cano naj 'angel hune' ischejbanil Comam Dios teyet , yaj caw mach heyije tzet chala , ẍi naj Esteban tu' tet ebnaj .
44007054	Yet yaben ebnaj sunil tzet yalcano naj Esteban tu' , caw chin̈etx'la yeh ebnaj yu ishowal .
44007055	Yaj naj Esteban tu' , caw occano naj yalan̈ yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo , yah t'an̈no naj satcan̈ , yilni naj isk'ak'al yip Comam Dios , yilni naj tato lin̈anico Comam Jes'us yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios .
44007056	Yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Ilwec'anabi lah , hajan yul satcan̈ . Caw chiwilan yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , Comam Ak'bilti coxol yu Comam Dios , lin̈anico Comam yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios , ẍi naj Esteban tu' .
44007057	Hayet yaben ebnaj hune' tu' yah wejna ebnaj yel yaw yin̈ caw ip , ismajchen ebnaj istxiquin , isto bulna ebnaj yin̈ naj Esteban tu' .
44007058	Yinito ebnaj naj istxam con̈ob , wal ebnaj balnican̈ tzoti' yin̈ naj Esteban yet yalan̈tocanoj , ha' ebnaj k'ojnico ch'en ch'en yin̈ naj . Yet maẍto chisk'oj camo ebnaj naj Esteban tu' , yacano ebnaj huntek'an xilk'ape chishucbaco yiban̈ xil isk'ap istan̈e' hune' naj tzeh chiyij Saulo .
44007059	Hayet lan̈an isk'ojni camo ebnaj naj Esteban tu' , istxahli naj tet Comam Dios haca' ti' : -- Mam Jes'us , chachaba' wanmati'an , ẍi naj tet Comam .
44007060	Yaypaxo jahno naj , istxahlipaxo naj yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' : -- Mamin , mach chawaco hune' ti' ismulo ebnaj , ẍi naj . Yet lahwi yalnicano naj hune' ti' , iscamilo naj .
44008001	Caw tzalacano isc'ul naj Saulo yin̈ iscamical naj Esteban . Yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' xin ichico hune' niman isya'tajil yin̈ macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , hac tu' xin yu ispujnato ebnaj . Ay ebnaj tocano yulaj ismajul tx'otx' Judea , aypaxo ebnaj tocano yulaj ismajul tx'otx' Samaria , cachanxan̈e ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us cancano bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en tu' .
44008002	Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj ayco yanma yin̈ Comam caw c'ul isc'ul , ha' ebnaj tu' inito isnimanil naj Esteban mujuj . Caw ch'ok'canico ebnaj yin̈ isnimanil naj Esteban tu' .
44008003	Wal naj Saulo , caw islahcanico naj istan̈tzenilo ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Caw beh yoc naj yulaj n̈a , cat istarnilti naj ebnaj winaj yeb ebix ix yul yatut , cat yilaxto preso yu naj Saulo tu' .
44008004	Ha' ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam xiwilo bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en tu' , nanantaxan̈e bay tocanico ebnaj . Ha' bay chi-la-ec' ebnaj tu' xin chiyalic'o ebnaj Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile . Xol ebnaj tu' , ay hune' naj Felipe isbi . Ha' naj tu' apni yul hune' niman con̈ob ay yul ismajul Samaria . Istzabnico naj yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Cristo xol anma bey tu' .
44008005	
44008006	Caw yabe anma sunil tzettaj chal naj Felipe tu' . Yilnipaxo anma huntek'an c'aybalc'ule isye naj xol anma .
44008007	Caw hantan̈e anma ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ cawxicaniloj . Hayet chielcano ebnaj yin̈ anma tu' caw chiel yaw . Caw ay anma camnajilo isnimanil , yeb anma mach chu isbelwi , caw watx'ican̈ yu naj Felipe tu' .
44008008	Yu tzet iswatx'e naj Felipe , caw tzalacan̈ isc'ul sunil anma yul hune' niman con̈ob tu' yul ismajul Samaria .
44008009	Ay hune' naj yul con̈ob tu' chiyij Sim'on , nawal naj ; payxa ichiti yak'ni subchaho naj anma , caw ay yelapno ye naj yalni .
44008010	Caw xin chiyaco yanma anma yin̈ naj , cat yabelax tzet chal naj . Sunil anma machi yelapno yehi yeb anma caw ay yelapno yehi , chalni yin̈ naj haca' ti' : -- Ha' naj Sim'on ti' , ha' naj hune' niman yip Comam Dios , ẍi anma yin̈ naj .
44008011	Caw chahcanico anma yanma yin̈ naj Sim'on tu' , caw xin payxa ichico naj yetan anma , chalni anma tato caw tz'ajan isc'ul naj .
44008012	Yalni naj Felipe Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo xol anma . Haxa yet yalni naj yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios caw tx'i'al ebnaj winaj yeb ebix ix yayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chal naj . Lahwi tu' xin , yahcano ha' iswi' .
44008013	Yaj xin yapaxayto naj Sim'on tu' yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal naj Felipe tu' , yahcano ha' iswi' naj . Lahwi yahcano ha' iswi' naj , yoc tzujno naj yinta naj Felipe . Ay xin huntek'an nimeta c'aybalc'ule isye naj Felipe , caw c'aycan̈ isc'ul naj Sim'on tu' yet yilni naj .
44008014	Yet yaben ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us bey Jerusal'en tato ay anma bey yul con̈ob Samaria chahni Istzoti' Comam Dios yul yanma , ischejnito ebnaj naj Pedro yeb naj Juan istucleno ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey yul ismajul Samaria tu' .
44008015	Yet yapni ebnaj cawan̈ tu' , yoc ebnaj txahlo yeb anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yun̈e ischahnicano Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul yanma ,
44008016	yuto maẍto huno ebnaj chichahni Comam Esp'iritu Santo , cachann̈e yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo ahcano ha' iswi' ebnaj .
44008017	Yanayo naj Pedro yeb naj Juan tu' isk'ab yiban̈ iswi' ebnaj yet istxahli ebnaj . Hac tu' yu ischahnicano ebnaj Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul yanma .
44008018	Yet yilni naj Sim'on tato yet chiyanayo ebnaj isk'ab yiban̈ iswi' ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam tu' , cat ischahnicano ebnaj Comam Esp'iritu Santo , yalten naj Sim'on melyu tet ebnaj ischejab Comam tu' .
44008019	Yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Ak'wecano hune' heyip ti' wetan haxinwal macxan̈etic'a hunu mac chiwahto ink'aban yin̈ iswi' , cat ischahnicano Comam Esp'iritu Santo , ẍi naj tet ebnaj cawan̈ tu' .
44008020	Yalni naj Pedro : -- Hunn̈ehojab chu hatan̈ilo yeb hamelyu ti' yuto chatxumu tato hunu tzet chiyak' Comam Dios jet chiyu colok'ni .
44008021	Caw mach chu hawoc yin̈ hune' tzet chijuti'an̈ , yuto ha' ismachiswalil chi'ec' yul hawanma yul sat Comam Dios .
44008022	Wal tinan̈ na haba , bejcano hune' hamachiswalilal ti' . K'an nimanc'ulal tawin̈ tet Comam Dios , yuto aytotaxca nimanc'ulal yu Comam tawin̈ yin̈ tzet ch'ec' yul hawanma ti' .
44008023	Yuto chiwilan tato caw chichiwaco hac'ul hawilni yin̈ tzet chicowatx'eti'an̈ , ha' ton xin hune' istx'ojal ti' c'aln̈e hachayoj , ẍi naj Pedro tu' tet naj Sim'on .
44008024	Istak'wi naj Sim'on tu' : -- Caw chink'anan teyet , k'anwe nimanc'ulal win̈an tet Comam Dios , haxinwal machi huno isya'tajil chihul wiban̈an yu Comam , ẍi naj tet ebnaj .
44008025	Lahwi yalnic'o naj Pedro yeb naj Juan yin̈ej tzettaj ye tu' ilbilcano yu ebnaj yin̈ tzet iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo , yeb cuybanil yin̈ Comam , ispaxto ebnaj Jerusal'en ; caw hantan̈e yaldeahil Samaria bay ec' ebnaj yala'c'o Istzoti' Comam Jes'us .
44008026	Ay hune' y'angel Comam Dios halni tet naj Felipe haca' ti' : -- Asi' bey sur , cat hato yul beh chitit bey Jerusal'en , hune' chiapni yul con̈ob Gaza , ẍi naj 'angel tet naj . Hune' beh tu' xin chiec' sat tx'otx' desierto .
44008027	Yoc naj Felipe yin̈ isbel isto naj . Istzujcha hune' naj ah Etiop'ia yul beh yu naj . Ha' hune' naj tu' eunuco naj , yahawil yeco naj yu hune' ix reina chiyij Candace , yin̈ isc'uban ismelyu ix . Ispeto naj yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yu yinayo isba tet Comam Dios .
44008028	Ayahto naj yul iscaret , lan̈an xin yilni naj cuybanile tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Isa'ias , hune' naj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat .
44008029	Yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet naj Felipe haca' ti' : -- Hitzan̈ico isc'atan̈ hune' te' caret tu' , ẍi tet naj .
44008030	Isto naj yin̈ an̈e . Yet yapni naj isc'atan̈ te' caret tu' yaben naj tato lan̈an yilni naj huntek'an cuybanile tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Isa'ias . Yalni naj Felipe tu' tet naj : -- ¿ Chimtxumchalo hawu tzet lan̈an hawilni ti' ? ẍi naj .
44008031	Yalni naj ah Etiop'ia tu' xin : -- ¿ Tzet chu intxumnilojan tato machi hunu mac chihalni wetan tzet chaliloj ? Ahan̈ti yul caret inc'atan̈ti'an , cat xin hawalni wetan tzet chaliloj , ẍi naj eunuco tet naj Felipe .
44008032	Hac ti' chute yalni te' Hum bay lan̈an yilni naj : Haca' hunu no' me' chiilaxto camoj , hac tu' chiyu yilaxotoj . Haca' chu hunu no' nich'an me' matzet chala yet chiilaxilo xil , hac tu' chiyute' isba , machi huno tzoti' chiahti yul isti' .
44008033	Caw tx'ixobal ch'utelaxi , machi hunu mac chiwatx'en istoholal yin̈ . Machi hunu mac chu yalni hanta istx'ojal anma yet ayc'o naj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ẍi Yum Comam Dios .
44008034	Lahwi tu' xin isk'ambenilo naj ah Etiop'ia tet naj Felipe : -- Hal wetan , ¿ mac yin̈ chitzotel hune' naj ischejab Comam Dios ti' ? ¿ Tom yin̈ naj Isa'ias ti' chitzoteli , mato nan mac bay chitzotel ti' ? ẍi naj tet naj Felipe .
44008035	Yichico naj Felipe yalnilo mac yin̈ chitzotel hune' Hum tu' . Yalni naj ta yin̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet Comam Jesucristo chitzoteli .
44008036	Hayet ayco ebnaj yin̈ isbel tu' xin , yapni ebnaj bey hune' ha ha' , yuxin yal naj ah Etiop'ia tu' tet naj Felipe haca' ti' : -- Ay hune' ha' bey ti' lah , ¿ c'ulmi yahcano ha' inwi'an tinan̈ ? ẍi naj tet naj Felipe tu' .
44008037	Yalni naj Felipe tu' : -- Chuhi tato caw yeli chawayto yul hawanma , ẍi naj . Istak'wican̈ naj : -- Caw chiwayto yul wanmahan tato caw yeli Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo tu' , ẍi naj .
44008038	Lahwi tu' xin , ischejni naj ah Etiop'ia islin̈balax iscaret . Yayto ebnaj iscawan̈il xol ha' , yah ha' iswi' naj .
44008039	Yet lahwi yahcanti ebnaj xol ha' tu' , yin̈ hamataj yilaxto naj Felipe yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo , maẍtic'a yil naj ah Etiop'ia tu' baytu'wal caw istoco naj Felipe . Toxan̈e caw chitzala naj yet yoc naj yin̈ isbel hunelxa .
44008040	Hayet yilniti naj Felipe tu' , haxa yul hune' con̈ob chiyij Azoto ay naj . Istzabnico naj ispujbanic'o Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yulajla con̈ob masan apni naj yul con̈ob Cesarea .
44009001	Yet hune' tiempohal tu' , maẍtic'a isbej naj Saulo issayni ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jes'us , chal naj ispotx'o' camo ebnaj . Isto naj islahti'n̈eno isba yeb ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote ah Israel .
44009002	Isk'anni naj hune' carta yun̈e yoc naj yulaj iscapilla ebnaj Israel bey con̈ob Damasco yun̈e istzabniti naj sunil ebnaj ayxaco yin̈ hune' ac' cuybanile . Sunil ebnaj winaj yeb ebix ix xayaco yanma yin̈ Comam Jes'us , beh yinito naj yul preso bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yalni .
44009003	Hac tu' yu isto naj bey Damasco tu' . Yet ayco naj yin̈ isbel tu' xin , yet lan̈anxa yapni naj yayilo jopla hune' issajilk'inal yin̈ naj .
44009004	Caw yin̈ an̈e xin ayc'ay naj sat tx'otx' , yaben naj hune' yul nuk'e halni haca' ti' : -- Saulo , Saulo , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxin chinhatzumbec'ojan ? ẍi .
44009005	Isk'amben naj : -- Mamin , ¿ mac anmahil hach ? ẍi naj Saulo tu' . Istak'wi hune' yul nuk'e tu' tet naj : -- Haninti'an Jes'us inan , caw ayachico quinhatzumbenic'ojan , yaj ton̈e chawak' lahwo haba haca' chu islahwi hunu no' wacax chixan̈wa yin̈ hunu te te' k'ak'i' iswi' , ẍi hune' tu' .
44009006	Caw xin chiluylun naj Saulo tu' yu xiwquilal , yalni naj xin : -- Mamin , ¿ tzet chawoche chinwatx'ehan ? ẍi naj . Yalni Comam tet naj : -- Ahan̈wanoj cat hato yul con̈ob tu' , ha' tu' chihallaxo tawet tzet wal hawuni , ẍi Comam Jes'us tu' tet naj .
44009007	Wal ebnaj yetbi naj Saulo tu' , caw sucbicanilo isc'ul ebnaj yuto caw yabe ebnaj istzotel hune' yul nuk'e tu' , yaj mach hunu mac yilico ebnaj yin̈ .
44009008	Lahwi tu' xin , yahwano naj Saulo tu' . Yet ishajni sat naj matxa yu yilni naj , yuxin haxa ebnaj yetbi naj tu' oc xecnoto naj yul con̈ob Damasco .
44009009	Yet yapni naj bey tu' , oxeb tz'ayic mach chu yilni naj , mach wa' naj , matzet yuc'paxo naj .
44009010	Yul con̈ob Damasco tu' xin , ay hune' naj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , chiyij Anan'ias . Yalni Comam Dios yul iswayic naj yin̈ sajsatil haca' ti' : -- Anan'ias , ẍi Comam . -- ¿ Tzet chawal Mamin ? ẍi naj .
44009011	Yalni Comam : -- Ahan̈wanoj cat hato yul hune' beh , Tohol isbi . Hayet chaẍapno bey yatut naj Judas , cat hak'amben naj Saulo ah con̈ob Tarso , lan̈an istxahli naj bey tu' .
44009012	Ay hune' tzet manyehan yila' naj tato chaẍapno isc'atan̈ naj , cat hawanayo hak'ab yiban̈ iswi' naj . Hacn̈e tu' chiyu ishajchaho sat naj , ẍi Comam tet naj Anan'ias .
44009013	Yalni naj Anan'ias hac ti' : -- Mamin , yaj tx'i'al tzet xawabehan yin̈ naj Saulo tu' . Caw hanta anma ayco yul hak'ab bey Jerusal'en , caw ch'ec'ya' yanma yu naj .
44009014	Tinan̈ xin , xahul naj bey ti' , xaak'lax hum yul isk'ab naj yu naj yahawil ebnaj sacerdote yin̈ ebnaj Israel . Chul naj istzaba'to anma ayxaco yul hak'ab , ẍi naj tet Comam .
44009015	Yalnipaxo Comam tet naj : -- Asi' isc'atan̈ naj Saulo tu' yuto sic'bilxalo naj wuhan . Ha' naj chihalnoc'o intzoti'an xol anma mach Israeloj , yeb tet ebnaj yahawil ebnaj , yeb tet ebnaj Israel hawet con̈ob .
44009016	Yeb chinyehan yila' naj hanta isya'tajil chak'le naj yu yalni Intzoti'an , ẍi Comam tet naj .
44009017	Hac tu' yu isto naj Anan'ias bey hune' n̈a tu' . Yet yapni naj yocto naj yul n̈a , yanayo isk'ab naj yiban̈ iswi' naj Saulo , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Wal tinan̈ wuẍta Saulo , Comam Jesucristo isyecan̈ isba yul habeh bay macachtita , ha' maquinchejnitijan tac'atan̈ yun̈e ishajlo hasat ti' hunelxa , cat xin hachahnicano Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ hawanma , ẍi naj tet naj Saulo tu' .
44009018	Hunepixto xin yayc'ay huntek'an haca' ismelyaẍil istz'umal no' cay ayco yen̈elo sat naj Saulo tu' , hac tu' yu yilnipaxocan̈ naj hunelxa . Lahwi tu' xin , yahcano ha' iswi' naj .
44009019	Iswa'paxocan̈ naj , yik'ni yip naj hunelxa . Tx'i'alto tz'ayic cancano naj isc'atan̈ ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey yul con̈ob Damasco tu' .
44009020	Lahwi tu' xin , yec' naj Saulo yalnoc'o yulajla iscapilla ebnaj Israel , chalni naj tato caw yeli Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo .
44009021	Ha' anma aben tzet chal naj , caw c'aycanocan̈ isc'ul yabeni . Yalni haca' ti' : -- ¿ Tom maẍtaj naj ti' chitan̈tzenilo anma chichahni Comam Jesucristo yul yanma , bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ? ¿ Tom maẍtaj naj ti' chihul c'alnoto ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , cat yinito naj tet ebnaj yahawil sacerdote ? ẍi anma tu' yin̈ naj .
44009022	Caw ahcanocan̈ naj Saulo tu' yalni Istzoti' Comam yun̈e yohtan̈enilo anma tato caw yeli ha' Comam Jes'us ha' ton Cristo echmabil yuli . Yuxin ebnaj Israel ay yul con̈ob Damasco tu' , mach chitxumcha yu ebnaj yin̈ tzet chiyu ispajtzen ebnaj tet naj Saulo .
44009023	Lahwi yec'to hayeb tz'ayic xin iscutxban isba ebnaj yahawil ebnaj Israel , islahti'n̈en isba ebnaj tato chipotx'lax camo naj Saulo tu' .
44009024	Caw hunun tz'ayic yeb hunun ak'bal ismajni ebnaj naj Saulo yul ispultahil ch'en c'ub hoyanico yin̈ con̈ob tu' yun̈e ispotx'lax camo naj , yaj xin yabelo naj Saulo hune' tu' .
44009025	Yuxin ha' ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam inilti naj yet ak'balil , alaxayto naj yul hune' niman motx , lahwi tu' xin yalaxilto naj yul isventanahil hune' niman c'ub tu' . Hac tu' xin yu iscolcha naj Saulo .
44009026	Haxa yet yapni naj Saulo yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , yoche naj ishunba isba yeb ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul con̈ob tu' , yaj caw xiwcan̈ ebnaj tet naj . Yuto maẍtic'a yayto ebnaj yul yanma tato yeli ayxaco naj Saulo tu' yul isk'ab Comam .
44009027	Haxa naj Bernab'e , inito naj Saulo isc'atan̈ ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us , yalni naj tet ebnaj : -- Caw yeli naj Saulo ti' yil naj Comam Jes'us yul beh , istzotel Comam tet naj . Yuxin caw machi xiw naj yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Jes'us yul con̈ob Damasco , ẍi naj Bernab'e tu' tet ebnaj .
44009028	Hac tu' yu iscancano naj Saulo yeb ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ay bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en . Chi-xin-ec' naj yinta ebnaj , chalnic'o naj Istzoti' Comam Jes'us yin̈ sunil yanma yul con̈ob .
44009029	Caw cuywacanto naj yin̈ ebnaj Israel chihalni tzoti' chiyij griego , cat xin isteyelen isba naj yeb ebnaj . Yaj caw ay yala' ebnaj ti' tzet chu iscam naj .
44009030	Yet yaben ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam hune' tu' , yinito ebnaj naj Saulo bey yul hune' con̈ob chiyij Cesarea . Tzujan tu' xin , ischejlaxcanto naj yu ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Tarso .
44009031	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' xin ak'anc'ulalxan̈e ye macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jes'us ay yul ismajul Judea yeb xin bey Galilea yebpaxo bey Samaria . Caw yik'canocan̈ yip ebnaj yu colwa Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ ebnaj , yeb xin caw ay yelapno ye Comam yul sat ebnaj . Caw ahcanocan̈ isch'ib isbisil macta chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam .
44009032	Yet hune' tiempohal tu' ec' naj Pedro yul huntek'an con̈ob , hac tu' yu istuclen naj ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey yul hune' con̈ob chiyij Lida .
44009033	Yul hune' con̈ob tu' xin apni naj Pedro isc'atan̈ hune' naj chiyij Eneas . Caw waxajebxa habil isto naj Eneas tu' sat tx'at yuto caw yan̈yon̈e isnimanil naj yu hune' yabil .
44009034	Yalni naj Pedro tu' tet naj : -- Eneas , Comam Jesucristo chaẍak'ni cawxoj , yuxin ahan̈wano tinan̈ , ican̈ hawaybal ti' , ẍi naj Pedro tu' tet naj . Hac tu' xin yu yahwano naj .
44009035	Sunil anma ay yul con̈ob Lida , yeb sunil anma ay yul hune'xa con̈ob chiyij Sar'on ilni hune' tu' yet iscawxican̈ naj , hac tu' yu yanicanico isba anma yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo .
44009036	Yul con̈ob Jope , ha' tu' ay hune' ix ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam chiyij Tabita , ha' yin̈ abxubal griego , Dorcas isbi ix . Tx'i'al tzettaj ye tu' c'ul iswatx'e ix , caw xin colwa ix yin̈ anma meba' .
44009037	Yaj ay hune' yabil caw how oc yin̈ ix , iscam ix . Yet camomxa ix tu' , yaẍn̈elaxcano ix , yilaxahto ix yul hune' cuarto yin̈ iscab piso .
44009038	Hune' con̈ob chiyij Jope tu' , iscawilal Lida aycoj . Yet yaben ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam tato ha' bey Lida ay naj Pedro ischejnito ebnaj cawan̈ ebnaj yalno tet naj : -- Ton̈ jintajan̈ bey yul con̈ob Jope tinan̈ yaj yin̈ an̈e , ẍi ebnaj tet naj Pedro tu' .
44009039	Isto naj Pedro yinta ebnaj . Yet yapni naj xin , yilaxahto naj yul hune' cuarto tu' bay ay isnimanil ix Dorcas . Ay huntek'an ebix hunix ayc'o isc'atan̈ ix camom tu' , caw ch'ok'canico ebix yin̈ ix . Ay xil isk'ap ebix sabil yu ix Dorcas tu' , chi-la-isye ebix tet naj .
44009040	Lahwi tu' xin , ischejlaxayti sunil anma yul hune' cuarto yu naj Pedro . Yay jahno naj istxahli naj tet Comam Dios . Lahwi istxahli naj tu' xin , yalni naj tet ix Dorcas haca' ti' : -- Tabita , ahan̈wanoj , ẍi naj tet ix . Yet lahwi yalni naj tu' xin , ishajni sat ix , hayet yilni ix naj Pedro tu' , yah tz'on̈no ix .
44009041	Yoc tzabno naj yin̈ isk'ab ix , yah lin̈no ix . Yawtenahto naj Pedro sunil ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ay bey tu' yebpaxo ebix hunix . Isyeni naj tet sunil anma ta hulcan̈ isc'ul ix Dorcas tu' .
44009042	Caw sunil anma ay bey Jope tu' aben isk'umal hune' tu' , yuxin tx'i'al anma chahni Comam Jesucristo yul yanma .
44009043	Wal naj Pedro cantocano naj hayebxa tz'ayical yul con̈ob Jope tu' bey yatut hune' naj watx'emilo tz'um , Sim'on isbi .
44010001	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' , ay hune' naj chiyij Cornelio bey yul con̈ob Cesarea . Caw yahawil yeco naj yin̈ hune' majan ebnaj soldado chiyij Italiano .
44010002	Hune' naj tu' mach Israelo naj , yaj ayco yanma naj yin̈ Comam Dios yeb sunil mac ay bey yatut , caw chiyo isba tet Comam Dios . Caw niman tzettaj ye tu' chissah naj tet anma meba' Israel . Chi-tic'a-txahli naj tet Comam Dios .
44010003	Yet hune' tz'ayical yin̈ ch'en oxeb yin̈ k'ejbiyalil yilni naj yoc apno hune' naj y'angel Comam Dios isc'atan̈ haca'tan̈e yul wayique . Yalni naj 'angel tu' : -- ¡ Cornelio ! ẍi naj .
44010004	Hayet yoc t'an̈no naj yin̈ naj 'angel , isxiwcan̈ naj , istak'wi naj : -- ¿ Tzet chawal Mamin ? ẍi naj . Yalni naj 'angel tu' xin : -- Caw chabe Comam Dios hatxah , caw chilpaxo Comam hacolwal chawak' tet anma meba' . Mach chic'ayto huntek'an ti' yu Comam .
44010005	Wal tinan̈ chejto haywan̈o ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Jope , ik'wal yin̈ naj Sim'on , naj chiyij Pedro .
44010006	Ay naj bey yatut hune'xa naj chiyij Sim'on , naj watx'emilo tz'um , ay bey isti' ha' mar . Ha' naj Pedro tu' chihulo halno tawet tzet wal hawuten haba , ẍi naj 'angel tet naj Cornelio tu' .
44010007	Yet istocano naj 'angel tu' xin , yawtenti naj cawan̈ isc'amte' yeb hune' naj issoldado chicolwa yin̈ . Hune' naj ti' aypaxo yanma naj yin̈ Comam Dios .
44010008	Sunil tzet hallax tet naj yu naj 'angel , yal naj tet ebnaj . Ischejlaxto ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Jope tu' xin .
44010009	Yet hune'xa tz'ayic yin̈mi chuman , yet lan̈anxa yapni ebnaj iscawilal con̈ob Jope tu' , yahto naj Pedro txahlo yiban̈ yac'alil iswi' te' n̈a bay aya .
44010010	Yet ayahto naj txahlo bey tu' , isn̈ohchacan̈ naj . Lan̈an xin iswatx'elax tzet chislo naj , yin̈n̈ena tu' xin , isyelax yin̈ sajsatil tet naj .
44010011	Ishajni isba satcan̈ , yilni naj hune' niman s'abana leyanayti yin̈ sat naj , ximbilayo can̈eb istxiquin k'ap .
44010012	Yul hune' s'abana tu' , ayayto sunil no nok' ; no' can̈eb yoj , no' chishatxic'o isc'ul , yeb no' ch'ic .
44010013	Yet yayilo hune' s'abana tu' , yaben naj Pedro yul hune' nuk'e , halni tet haca' ti' : -- Pedro , ahan̈wanoj , potx'camo huntek'an no nok' ti' cat hac'uxni no' , ẍi hune' yul nuk'e tu' .
44010014	Yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Mamin , machoj , yuto caw maẍto hunelo chinc'uxan huno no' comon nok' ti' , maca hunuxa tzet ye tu' mach sajoj haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es , ẍi naj .
44010015	Yuxin yal hune' yul nuk'e tu' hunelxa tet naj : -- Sunil tzet sajxa ye yu Dios , mach chawal tz'ilal , ẍi .
44010016	Caw xin oxel yu haca' tu' . Lahwi tu' yilaxto hune' s'abana tu' yul satcan̈ hunelxa .
44010017	Haxa yet yapni ebnaj ischejab naj Cornelio yul con̈ob Jope , isk'ambelo ebnaj tet anma baytu'wal ay yatut naj Sim'on . Caw aytoco naj Pedro istxumni yin̈ tzet chal yelapno hune' yil tu' , yet yapni ebnaj isti' ispultahil te' n̈a bay ay naj .
44010018	Yet ayxa ebnaj bey tu' , isk'amben ebnaj : -- ¿ Ham ti' ayc'o naj Sim'on , naj chiyij Pedro ? ẍi ebnaj .
44010019	Caw aytoco yin̈ isc'ul naj tzet caw chalilo hune' yil naj tu' , yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet naj haca' ti' : -- Pedro , ay oxwan̈ ebnaj chaẍsaynic'oj .
44010020	Ahan̈wanoj , ayan̈toj cat hato yinta ebnaj tinan̈ yuto haninan chejn̈eti ebnaj tac'atan̈ ti' , ẍi Comam Esp'iritu Santo tu' tet naj .
44010021	Yayti naj xin , yapni naj isc'atan̈ ebnaj ischejab naj Cornelio tu' , yalni naj : -- Haninan chinhesayic'ojan . ¿ Tzet hechejbanil wetan ? ẍi naj tet ebnaj .
44010022	Yalni ebnaj haca' ti' xin : -- Ay hune' naj chiyij Cornelio , yahawil yeco yin̈ huntek'an ebnaj soldado , ha' naj macon̈chejnitijan̈ . Caw toholcano isbeybal naj , caw chiyo isba naj tet Comam Dios , yeb xin caw c'ulcano naj yul sat anma Israel . Yaj xin ay hune' y'angel Comam Dios apni halno tet naj tato yilal hato yatut naj yu yabencano naj tzet chawala , ẍi ebnaj chejab tu' tet naj Pedro .
44010023	Yilaxicto ebnaj yul n̈a yu naj Pedro tu' , ha' tu' way ebnaj . Haxa yet sahab sac'ayalil yin̈ hune'xa tz'ayic isto naj Pedro yinta ebnaj ; aypaxo haywan̈ ebnaj juẍtaj ah Jope tu' to yinta ebnaj .
44010024	Haxa yet hune'xa tz'ayic xin , yapni ebnaj yul con̈ob Cesarea . Caw echmabil yapni ebnaj yu naj Cornelio tu' , cutxanxaco yic'al naj yu , yeb mac ay yul yatut naj tu' , yeb yamigo naj awtebil yu .
44010025	Yet yapni naj Pedro bey tu' , yelti naj Cornelio ischahno naj , yay jahno naj sata naj Pedro .
44010026	Yaj ilaxcan̈ naj yu naj Pedro , yalni naj xin : -- Ahan̈wanoj yuto caw lahan anma hon̈ , ẍi naj tet naj .
44010027	Caw xin tzotelo chu naj Pedro yeb naj yet yocto ebnaj yul n̈a . Hac tu' xin yu yilni naj Pedro ta caw hantan̈e anma cutxanicoj .
44010028	Yalni naj tet anma haca' ti' : -- Caw heyohtaj tato han̈on̈ Israel on̈ti'an̈ cachbilon̈an̈ yu isley naj Mois'es cohunban cobahan̈ yeb hunuxa anma nan con̈obal , yeb xin joctojan̈ yul yatut . Yaj isyelo Comam Dios wetan tato mach chu inyahnihan hunu anma .
44010029	Yu hune' tu' yuxinto manyijehan intitan yinta ebnaj ma-bey-quinino'tijan . Wal tinan̈ , halwe wetan ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxinto maquinheyawtehan ? ẍi naj Pedro tu' .
44010030	Yalni naj Cornelio tet naj haca' ti' : -- Can̈ebxa tz'ayic tinan̈ haca'mi hora ti' yin̈ ch'en oxeb , yet lan̈an intxahlihan tet Comam Dios , yin̈ hamataj isyenican̈ isba hune' naj wetan , caw saj jilnicano xil isk'ap naj , toxan̈e chitzejtzoni .
44010031	Yalni naj wetan : -- Cornelio , caw mayabe Comam Dios hatxah yeb isnaniti sunil hacolwal chawak' tet anma meba' .
44010032	Wal tinan̈ chejto hun cawan̈o ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Jope , cat isto yinoti naj Sim'on , chiyijpaxo Pedro . Ay naj bey yatut naj Sim'on , naj watx'emilo tz'um . Ayco yatut naj tu' isti' ha' mar . Yet chihul naj Pedro tu' cat yalni naj tzet wal hawuten haba , ẍi naj wetan .
44010033	Yuxin inchejtojan ebnaj ti' saywal tawin̈ . Caw yuch'andios tawet macaẍtit yinta ebnaj . Wal tinan̈ ayon̈ic'ojan̈ cosunilan̈ sata Comam Dios yu chijoche jabehan̈ sunil tzet halbilcano tawet yu Comam Dios , ẍi naj Cornelio .
44010034	Yichenico naj Pedro istzotel xol ebnaj sunil , yalni naj : -- Wal tinan̈ caw chiwohtan̈elojan tato caw lahann̈e sunil anma yul sat Comam Dios .
44010035	Macxan̈etic'a ay yelapno ye Comam Dios yul sat yeb xin c'ul isbeybal yul sat Comam , waxan̈ca mach Israeloj , caw chitzalacano Comam yin̈ .
44010036	Comam Dios an̈ecano tzoti' yet ak'anc'ulal jetan̈ , han̈on̈ Israel on̈ti'an̈ , hune' haltebilcano coxol yu Comam Jesucristo , Comam Yahawil sunil anma .
44010037	Walex hex ti' , caw heyohtaj tzet yu coxolan̈ , han̈on̈ Israel on̈ti'an̈ . Bey Galilea ichiti hune' tu' yet lahwi ismunil naj Juan yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios , yeb yanicanocan̈ naj ha' iswi' anma .
44010038	Caw heyohtaj hex ti' tato Comam Dios , ha' ak'ni yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet Comam Jesucristo ah Nazaret . Yak'nicano Comam Dios yip Comam yu iscolwa yin̈ anma . Sunil huntek'an anma bay ayco ischejab naj matzwalil cawxicanocan̈ yu Comam . Sunil huntek'an ti' iswatx'e Comam yuto ayco Comam Dios yetbihoj .
44010039	Walon̈ti'an̈ , caw chijak' cobahan̈ jalnihan̈ yin̈ sunil tzet iswatx'e Comam Jes'us yul ismajul Judea , yeb yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , yuto jilicojan̈ yu cosatan̈ . Lahwi iswatx'en Comam huntek'an tu' xin , yalaxcan̈ yin̈ culus yu ebnaj Israel , hac tu' yute yak'ni camo ebnaj Comam .
44010040	Haxa yin̈ yox tz'ayic yulcan̈ isc'ul Comam yu yip Comam Dios , isyeni isba Comam Jes'us tu' jetan̈ .
44010041	Yaja' mach tet sunilo jet con̈oban̈ bay isye isba Comam , cachann̈e jetan̈ han̈on̈ saybilon̈xahan̈ yet yalan̈tocanoj , yu jak'ni cobahan̈ jalnic'ojan̈ . Con̈wa'an̈ yeb Comam yet lahwi ispitzc'acan̈ xol camom .
44010042	Yalcano Comam jetan̈ tato caw yilal jec'an̈ jalnoc'ojan̈ tet anma tato ha' Comam Dios anico Comam Jes'us Yahawilo yilni tzet ch'elico sunil anma itzitzto yebpaxo mac camnaxa .
44010043	Yet payat yalcano ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios cuybanil yin̈ Comam Jes'us . Halbilcano yu ebnaj tato ha' mac chichahni Comam yul yanma , chitan̈cano ismul yiban̈ yu yip Comam , ẍi naj Pedro tu' tet ebnaj .
44010044	Yet aytoco naj Pedro tu' istzoteli , yayilo Comam Esp'iritu Santo yiban̈ anma chiaben tzet chal naj .
44010045	Caw c'aycan̈ isc'ul ebnaj Israel ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam tit yinta naj bey Jope , yuto ak'laxpaxo Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet anma mach Israeloj .
44010046	Yaben ebnaj tato nanantaxan̈e tzoti'al chal hunun ebnaj , yabenpaxo ebnaj yalni c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios .
44010047	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni naj Pedro tu' : -- ¿ Chimyu cocachni yahcano ha' iswi' ebnaj machahni Comam Esp'iritu Santo haca' yu cochahni han̈on̈ ti' ? ẍi naj Pedro tu' .
44010048	Yalni naj Pedro tu' xin tato chiahcano ha' iswi' ebnaj yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo . Yet yahcano ha' iswi' ebnaj , yalni ebnaj tet naj Pedro tato chican naj hayebo tz'ayical isc'atan̈ ebnaj .
44011001	Yapni isk'umal tet ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us yeb tet ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ay yul ismajul Judea tato ay ebnaj mach Israelo yaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
44011002	Hayet yapni naj Pedro yul con̈ob Jerusal'en hunelxa , yoc ebnaj juẍta Israel buchwal yin̈ naj , yuto isnati ebnaj isley naj Mois'es tet naj .
44011003	Isk'amben ebnaj tet naj : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxinto cachoc xol ebnaj mach Israeloj , hawa'paxo yeb ebnaj ? ẍi ebnaj .
44011004	Yichico naj Pedro tu' yalnilo sunil tzet yuhi , yalni naj haca' ti' :
44011005	-- Yet ayinic'ojan bey yul con̈ob Jope , yet lan̈an intxahlihan tet Comam Dios , isyeni Comam wetan yin̈ caw sajsatil hune' niman s'abana leyantoj ximbil can̈eb istxiquin , yayilo k'ap insatajan .
44011006	Woc t'an̈nojan yin̈ yun̈e wilnihan tzet ayayto yul . Wilnihan huntek'an no nok' ayayto yul ; ay no' xol telajil nok' , no' can̈eb yoj , aypaxo no' chishatxic'o isc'ul yebej no' ch'ic .
44011007	Lahwi tu' xin , wabenan hune' yul nuk'e halni wetan : -- Hach ti' Pedro , ahan̈wanoj , potx'camo huntek'an no nok' ti' cat hac'uxni no' , ẍi wetan .
44011008	Intak'wican̈an : -- Mamin , machoj , yuto maẍto hunelo chinc'uxan hunu tz'illa tzet ye tu' yuto cachbilon̈an̈ yu isley naj Mois'es , quinchiyan .
44011009	Yalnipaxo wetan hunelxa : -- Sunil tzet sajxa ye yu Comam Dios , mach chawala tato tz'il , ẍi wetan .
44011010	Oxel yalayti wetan , lahwi tu' xin yilaxpaxahto hune' niman s'abana tu' yul satcan̈ hunelxa .
44011011	Hayet lan̈an intxumnihan tzet chala , yapni oxwan̈ ebnaj quinissaynilojan bay ayinan . Ha' ebnaj tu' xin ispeto bey Cesarea .
44011012	Yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo wetan haca' ti' : -- Asi' yinta ebnaj , ẍi . Hac tu' xin yu intohan yinta ebnaj , yeb wajwan̈xa ebnaj juẍta ah Jope tu' . Hayet japnihan̈ bey tu' xin cotohan̈ yatut hune' naj chiyij Cornelio .
44011013	Yalni naj jetan̈ ta ay hune' naj 'angel apni lin̈no sata naj yul yatut ; yalni naj 'angel tet naj : -- Chejto cawan̈ oxwan̈o ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Jope , cat yiniti ebnaj naj Sim'on , naj chiyijpaxo Pedro .
44011014	Ha' naj tu' chihalno tawet yin̈ tzet chu hachahni hacolbanil , yeb sunil mac ay bey hawatut , ẍi naj 'angel tet naj .
44011015	Haxa yet intzabnicojan intzotelan xol ebnaj tu' , yayilo Comam Esp'iritu Santo yiban̈ ebnaj haca' yu yul coxol yet babelal .
44011016	Hac tu' yu innanitijan yin̈ tzet yalcano Comam Jes'us yet yalan̈tocanoj : -- Yin̈ caw yeli , ha' naj Juan , ha' naj an̈ecan̈ ha' iswi' anma , walexpaxo xin , ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chi'ak'laxo teyet , ẍicano Comam .
44011017	Caw yak' Comam Dios Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet ebnaj haca' yu yak'ni Comam , Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet han̈on̈ ti' yet janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Yuxin ¿ tzet wehan xin chinman̈c'ohan tzet choche Comam Dios ? ẍi naj Pedro tet ebnaj juẍta tu' .
44011018	Yet yaben ebnaj juẍta ay bey Jerusal'en yin̈ sunil tzet yal naj Pedro tu' , caw matxa tzet yal ebnaj , yoc ebnaj yak'no tzalaho yanma yin̈ Comam Dios . Yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Caw yeli yak'paxo Comam Dios hune' isc'ulal ti' tet anma mach Israeloj yun̈e ishelni isbeybal cat ischahnicano hune' isk'inal mach istan̈bal , ẍi ebnaj .
44011019	Yet lahwi iscamcano naj Esteban , yichico ebnaj Israel issaywa yin̈ ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , yu hune' tu' xin ispujnacan̈ ebnaj . Ay ebnaj apni bey yul ismajul Fenicia yeb xin bey ismajul Chipre , yeb yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia . Istzabnico ebnaj yalnic'o hune' cuybanil yet colbanile tet anma bay apni ebnaj . Yaj matzet yal ebnaj tet anma mach Israeloj , caw han̈c'an̈e tet anma Israel yal ebnaj .
44011020	Yaj xin ay haywan̈ ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey Chipre yeb bey Cirene apni bey Antioqu'ia , yalnic'o ebnaj cuybanil yet colbanile xol anma mach Israeloj .
44011021	Yuto ayxaco yip Comam yin̈ ebnaj , yuxin tzetc'a mac isbejcano sunil comon beybale cuybil yu yet yalan̈tocanoj , yanico isba ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam .
44011022	Hayet yaben ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ay bey con̈ob Jerusal'en hune' ti' , ischejnito ebnaj naj Bernab'e bey Antioqu'ia tu' .
44011023	Hayet yapni naj yilni naj hanta isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey tu' . Caw tzala yanma naj Bernab'e yet yak'nicano naj cuybanile chiiptzen ebnaj yun̈e islahnico ebnaj yanico yanma yin̈ Comam sunilbal tiempo .
44011024	Hac tu' yu iscuywacano naj Bernab'e tu' yin̈ ebnaj yuto caw c'ul isnabal naj , yeb xin yu caw nohna naj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo . Caw ayco yanma naj yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , yu hune' tu' yuxin caw ay anma chahnicano Comam yul yanma .
44011025	Lahwi tu' xin , isto naj Bernab'e yul con̈ob Tarso saywal yin̈ naj Saulo .
44011026	Haxa yet yilcha naj Saulo tu' yu naj , yinito naj naj yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia . Caw hune' habil ec' ebnaj cawan̈ tu' xol anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jes'us bey tu' . Caw tx'i'al anma iscuy ebnaj yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios . Yul hune' con̈ob Antioqu'ia tu' , ha' tu' hallax babel Cristianohal yin̈ anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam .
44011027	Yet hune' tiempohal tu' , el haywan̈ ebnaj juẍta bey Jerusal'en yapni bey Antioqu'ia . Ebnaj tu' xin chischah ebnaj tzoti' tet Comam Dios cat yalni ebnaj tet anma .
44011028	Ay hune' naj xol ebnaj apni tu' chiyij Agabo . Yah lin̈no naj xol ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , yalni naj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo haca' ti' : -- Ay hune' niman wahil chihul yul sunil sat tx'otx' ti' , ẍi naj Agabo tu' . Caw haca' yu yalni naj hac tu' yu yijni isba yet ayco naj Claudio yahawil Roma .
44011029	Yuxin ha' ebnaj juẍta ay bey Antioqu'ia el yul yanma iscolwa yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey yul ismajul Judea . Hatatic'a hanta el yin̈ yanma ebnaj , hac tu' yak' ebnaj .
44011030	Hac tu' yu yinito naj Saulo yeb naj Bernab'e huntek'an colwal tu' , yak'ni ebnaj tet ebnaj anciano ay bey Judea .
44012001	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' , yichenico naj rey Herodes yak'ni ec'oya' yanma haywan̈ ebnaj juẍta xol ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jes'us .
44012002	Ischejni naj potx'laxo camo naj Jacobo yu ch'en espada . Naj Jacobo tu' yuẍta isba naj yeb naj Juan .
44012003	Hayet yilni naj rey tato caw chitzala ebnaj Israel yin̈ hune' tu' , yalni naj ta chitzablaxayo naj Pedro yin̈ isk'in̈ ebnaj Israel tu' , hune' yet chiswahni ebnaj ixim pan machi yan̈al .
44012004	Lahwi yalaxicto naj yul te' , yoc can̈eb majan ebnaj soldado istan̈eno naj , yaj can̈tawan̈ ebnaj yin̈ hunun majan . Ha' chute isnani naj Herodes ta chi-n̈e-lahwi k'in̈ Pascua cat yilaxilti naj Pedro tu' yin̈ sat sunil anma Israel .
44012005	Yuxin caw tan̈ebil naj yul te' . Wal ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam xin , caw ayco ebnaj isk'anni yin̈ istxah tet Comam yun̈e iscolcha naj Pedro yul preso .
44012006	Yin̈ hune' ak'bal yet yalan̈to maẍto chi'illaxilti naj Pedro sata anma Israel yu naj rey Herodes , ayco naj xolbal cawan̈ ebnaj soldado , caw xin wayo chu naj . Caw c'albil naj yu cabeb ch'en cadena , aypaxico huntek'an ebnaj soldado istan̈en isti' te' preso tu' .
44012007	Yapni lemla hune' naj y'angel Comam Dios , caw sajbilo yul preso tu' yu naj . Ispitni naj 'angel tu' ismotx naj Pedro , yel iswayan̈ naj . Yalni naj 'angel tet naj : -- Ahan̈wano yin̈ an̈e , ẍi naj 'angel . Lahwi yalni naj 'angel tu' , ispuhmulo ch'en cadena yin̈ isk'ab naj Pedro .
44012008	Yalni naj 'angel tet naj : -- Tinan̈ xin , cawxeco isc'alil hawictaj , cat hawanico haxan̈ab , ẍi naj , hac tu' yute naj . Yalnipaxo naj 'angel tu' : -- Hucbaco hak'uxil cat hato wintajan , ẍi naj .
44012009	Yoc tzujno naj Pedro yinta naj 'angel , yelti naj yul preso tu' . Ha' chute isnani naj ta ton̈e chiyelaxico yin̈ sat naj yalni . Mach istxum naj tato caw yeli lan̈an yelti naj yul preso .
44012010	Lahwi tu' xin yec' ebnaj bay ay ebnaj babel soldado , yec'paxo ebnaj bay ay ebnaj isc'ab majan soldado , yelilo ebnaj bay ayco hune' pulta naba ch'en ayco isti' beh . Hayet yapni ebnaj bey pulta tu' , ishajni isba ischuquil , yel apno ebnaj yul beh . Hanic'xan̈e belwito naj 'angel yeb naj Pedro tu' , iscancano naj ischuquil .
44012011	Hac tu' yu isnanilo naj yin̈ tzet yehi , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Wal tinan̈ chintxumilojan tato caw yeli mayati Comam Jes'us Jahawil hune' y'angel quiniscololojan yul isk'ab naj rey Herodes , yeb sunil tzet chisnaco ebnaj wet con̈ob Israelan win̈an , ẍi naj ischuquil .
44012012	Hayet caw istxumchalo yu naj Pedro yin̈ huntek'an tzet yu tu' , isto naj bey yatut ix Mar'ia , ismi' naj Juan , naj chiyijpaxo Marcos . Caw tx'i'al ebnaj yeb ebix ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam cutxanico bey tu' yu istxahli yin̈ naj Pedro .
44012013	Hayet isc'on̈q'uen naj ispultahil yamak'il hune' n̈a tu' , yelicto yaw naj . Yelilo hune' ix k'opo chimunla yinta ix Mar'ia , chiyij Rode , ishajno te' yalni .
44012014	Yaja' haxa yet yaben ix yul isnuk' naj Pedro , caw matxa ishaj ix te' , istopaxo ix yin̈ an̈e yalno yin̈ tzalahilal tato lin̈anxaco naj Pedro isti' hune' pulta tu' .
44012015	Yalni ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab tet ix Rode tu' : -- ¿ Tzimi chawal hach ti' ? Matxam iswalil ye yul hawi' , ẍi ebnaj . Istak'wipaxo ix : -- Machoj , to caw yeli mawabehan yul isnuk' ya' , ẍi ix . Yuxin hallaxpaxo tet ix : -- ¿ Machmi taj naj , ham naj 'angel chitan̈e naj , ha' mahuli ? ẍi ebnaj tet ix .
44012016	Hayet lan̈an istzotel ebnaj yeb ix islahnico naj Pedro isc'on̈q'uen te' pulta tu' . Lahwi tu' xin ishajni ebnaj te' , isc'ayilo isc'ul ebnaj yet yoc apno naj Pedro tu' .
44012017	Isyeni naj yu isk'ab yun̈e isbejni ebnaj istzoteli . Lahwi tu' xin , yoc naj yalnolo tzet yu iscollax naj yul preso tu' yu Comam . Yalni naj tet ebnaj tu' haca' ti' : -- Halwe hune' ti' tet naj Jacobo yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍtaj , ẍi naj . Lahwi tu' yelti naj xol ebnaj , isto naj yul hune'xa con̈ob .
44012018	Hayet issajbilo xin , caw matxa chitxumcha yu ebnaj soldado tzet chute isba yuto mach yohtajo ebnaj yin̈ tzet yu yelti naj Pedro tu' .
44012019	Haxa yet yaben naj rey Herodes hune' tu' , yanilto naj issayomal naj Pedro , yaja' matxa ilcha naj yu ebnaj . Isk'amben naj tet ebnaj soldado tu' tzet yu yelti naj yul te' ; ischejni naj potx'laxo camo ebnaj soldado tu' . Lahwi tu' xin , yel naj Herodes yul ismajul Judea , isto naj ismajul Cesarea . Ha' tu' xin ehayo naj .
44012020	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' , caw tit ishowal naj rey Herodes yin̈ anma ay bey con̈ob Tiro yeb anma ay bey con̈ob Sid'on . Yuxin islahti'n̈e isba anma ay bey tu' yin̈ tzet chu istzotel tet naj rey Herodes tu' . Yaja' babel oc anma ismonte' hune' naj chiyij Blasto , hune' naj iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj ischejab naj rey tu' . Yoc naj tzotelo tet naj rey tu' yun̈e isk'anni ak'anc'ulal , yuto ha' yul ismajul bay ay naj chitit tzet chislo ebnaj .
44012021	Yalni naj rey Herodes tzet tz'ayical ch'apni ebnaj yin̈ sat naj . Haxa yet yapni istz'ayical tu' xin , yanico naj rey hune' xil isk'ap caw ay yelapno yehi . Lahwi tu' xin yocto tz'on̈no naj yul iscapiltu , istzabnico naj istzotel tet anma .
44012022	Lan̈antotic'a xin , yah yaw anma sunil , yalni haca' ti' : -- Ha' hune' chitzotel ti' , mach anmahoj , c'uxan tato ha' hunu dios , ẍi ebnaj .
44012023	Hunepixto xin , yapni hune' y'angel Comam Dios yanoco yabil yin̈ naj rey Herodes tu' , yuto machi yal naj tato han̈ech'an Comam Dios caw niman yelapnoj . Hac tu' xin yu yoc no' ha ha' islonoto isnimanil naj , iscam naj .
44012024	Wal Istzoti' Comam Dios xin , caw pujnacanocan̈ xol anma yulaj hunun con̈ob .
44012025	Lahwi yijnicano isba ischejbanil naj Bernab'e yeb naj Saulo yin̈ yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , ismeltzoto ebnaj bey con̈ob Antioqu'ia , yinito ebnaj naj Juan , naj chiyijpaxo isbi Marcos .
44013001	Xol ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia , ay ebnaj yak' Comam Dios ismunil yalni Tzoti' chitit tet Comam , aypaxo ebnaj oc cuywawomal yin̈ ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Huntek'an ebnaj tu' , ha' ton naj Bernab'e , yeb naj Sim'on , naj chihallax k'ejsatil , yeb hune'xa naj chiyij Lucio , naj tit bey ismajul Cirene . Yeb naj Saulo , yeb hune' naj Mana'en isbi , hune' naj tu' yet ch'ibom isba naj yeb naj Herodes , naj oc yahawilo tx'otx' Galilea .
44013002	Yet hunel xin , cutxanico ebnaj juẍta tu' yu yak'ni tzalaho isc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios , chiyec'tzen ebnaj hune' txah yet mach chon̈wa'i , yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet ebnaj : -- Iwelo naj Bernab'e yeb naj Saulo texol , yuto chioc ebnaj yin̈ hune' munil bay awtebil ebnaj wuhan , ẍi Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet ebnaj .
44013003	Lahwi yec'tzen ebnaj hune' txah yet mach chon̈wa'i , yanayo isk'ab ebnaj yiban̈ iswi' ebnaj cawan̈ tu' . Tzujan tu' xin ischejlaxto ebnaj yu ebnaj .
44013004	Yet ischejlaxto naj Bernab'e yeb naj Saulo yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo , isto ebnaj yul hune' con̈ob chiyij Seleucia . Yul hune' con̈ob tu' oc ebnaj yul te' barco , lahwi tu' xin , yapni ebnaj bey yul ismajul Chipre , hune' tx'otx' hoyanico ha' mar yin̈la isc'ul .
44013005	Yapni ebnaj bey hune' tx'otx' chiyij Salamina , yec' ebnaj yalnoc'o Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo yulaj iscapilla ebnaj Israel . Ha' hun naj Juan Marcos , colwa yinta ebnaj .
44013006	Lahwi tu' xin yec'to ebnaj sunil yin̈ isk'atanil sat tx'otx' Chipre tu' , yapni ebnaj bey con̈ob Pafos . Ha' tu' xin ischahleyo isba ebnaj yeb hune' naj Israel , chiyij Barjes'us . Hune' naj tu' nawal naj , ton̈e chiyal naj tato ischejab Comam Dios ye naj .
44013007	Ha' hune' naj tu' , yamigo isba naj yeb naj Sergio Paulo , naj yahawil yeco yin̈ ismajul Chipre . Caw xin itz'at iswi' naj Sergio tu' . Yawtento naj naj Bernab'e yeb naj Saulo isc'atan̈ , yuto choche naj yabe' Istzoti' Comam Dios .
44013008	Hune' naj nawal tu' , Elimas isbi naj yin̈ abxubal griego , caw oc naj cajwal yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu' , yuto mach choche isc'ul naj tato chaco naj Sergio tu' Istzoti' Comam Dios yul yanma .
44013009	Yuxin ha' naj Saulo , naj chiyijpaxo Pablo , nohna naj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo , yoccano t'an̈no naj yin̈ hune' naj nawal tu' ,
44013010	yalni naj : -- Hach ti' , isc'ahol naj matzwalil hawehi , ayco hahowal yin̈ sunil tzet caw c'ul yeb xin caw chawak' subchaho anma yu lek'ti'al , caw ayachico hawetanto cuybanile chiyak' Comam Dios .
44013011	Wal tinan̈ xin , ha' Comam Dios chianayo isya'tajil tawiban̈ , chitan̈olo hamujlobal , nahatil mach chub hawilno yoj tz'ayic , ẍi naj Pablo tu' tet naj . Hayet yalni naj Pablo haca' tu' , istan̈canilo ismujlubal naj , matxatic'a chiyu yilni naj . Istzabnico naj yec' matxmoni , issayni naj huno mac chixecnitoj , yuto matxatic'a chiyu yilni naj .
44013012	Hayet yilni naj yahawil con̈ob Chipre hune' tu' , yanico naj yanma yin̈ Comam Dios . Caw c'aycan̈ isc'ul naj yet yaben naj sunil cuybanile yet Comam Jes'us .
44013013	Yoc naj Pablo yul barco yeb ebnaj tzujan yinta tu' . Hac tu' xin yu yel ebnaj yul con̈ob Pafos , yapni ebnaj bey con̈ob Perge yul ismajul Panfilia . Wal naj Juan Marcos xin , yicanilo isba naj , ismeltzoto naj bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en .
44013014	Lahwi tu' xin yel ebnaj yul con̈ob Perge , yapni ebnaj yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia ay yul ismajul Pisidia . Yin̈ istz'ayical xewilal octo ebnaj yul iscapilla anma Israel , yay tz'on̈no ebnaj .
44013015	Hayet yillax isley Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Mois'es yeb huntek'anxa cuybanile tz'ibn̈ebilpaxcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , yanito ebnaj yahaw capilla tzoti' tet naj Pablo yeb tet naj Bernab'e bay tz'on̈an tu' , yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Hex wet con̈ob , ta ay hunu tzoti' cheyoche cheyak' yocbalo yip janmahan̈ , halwe tinan̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
44013016	Lahwi tu' xin , yah lin̈no naj Pablo , isyeni naj yu isk'ab yun̈e islin̈ban anma istzoteli , yalni naj tet anma haca' ti' : -- Hex wet con̈ob Israel , yeb hex mach Israelo cheyiyo heba tet Comam Dios , abewe tzet chiwalan .
44013017	Ha' coDiosal han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti' , ha' sic'lenilo ebnaj jichmam yet payat . Yet ayco ebnaj xol ebnaj nan con̈obal bey Egipto , ha' Comam ak'ni ch'ibo isbisil ebnaj yun̈e iswatx'en Comam hune' iscon̈ob caw nimajal yin̈ ebnaj . Lahwi tu' xin , yilaxilti ebnaj yul con̈ob Egipto yu yip Comam .
44013018	Hayet ay ebnaj bey tx'otx' desierto yin̈ cawina habil , caw yak' techaho Comam isbeybal ebnaj jichmam tu' .
44013019	Lahwi tu' xin , istan̈tzenilo Comam hujeb nimeta con̈ob bey tx'otx' Cana'an , yak'ni Comam istx'otx' ebnaj tet ebnaj jichmam tu' .
44013020	Lahwi tu' xin issaylaxilo ebnaj ch'oc juezal yu Comam Dios yun̈e istan̈elax ebnaj jichmam yin̈ yicta isho' ciento habil , masanta yin̈ istiempohal naj Samuel , hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat .
44013021	Tzujan tu' xin , isk'anni ebnaj jichmam hune' isreyal tet Comam Dios yun̈e istan̈elax ebnaj . Hac tu' xin yu yoc naj Sa'ul isreyalo ebnaj yin̈ cawina habil . Isc'ahol hune' naj chiyij Cis ye naj , isc'ahol yuninal icham Benjam'in .
44013022	Lahwi yilaxilo naj rey Saulo yin̈ ismunil yu Comam Dios , yanico Comam naj David selelo naj , yalnipaxo Comam Dios haca' ti' : -- Saybilxa naj David wuhan , naj isc'ahol naj Isa'i . Yin̈ caw yeli chintzalahan yin̈ naj , yuto chisyije naj sunilal tzet chiwalan , ẍi Comam .
44013023	Yaj xin ay hune' naj , titna yin̈ yuninal naj rey David tu' , Jes'us isbi . Ha' Comam Jes'us ti' yati Comam Dios yun̈e iscolcha sunil jet Israel ti' , haca' yu yalnicano Comam yet yalan̈tocanoj .
44013024	Yet yalan̈to maẍto chiichico ismunil Comam , yoc naj Juan iscuyni anma Israel ta yilal isbejnicano ebnaj yanico ismul cat xin yahcano ha' iswi' ebnaj .
44013025	Yaj hayet toxa chitan̈ ismunil naj Juan , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- ¿ Hex ti' ham hetxumni ta haninti'an chiwijan Cristo , Hecolomal ? ¡ Wal xin machoj ! Comam Cristo Cocolomal , tzujanto chul wintajan , yaja' caw ay yelapno Comam . Walinan , matzet welapnojan nitam wocan inpuhnolojan istx'an̈al isxan̈ab Comam yin̈ yoj , ẍi naj Juan , ẍi naj Pablo tet anma yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel tu' .
44013026	Yalnipaxo naj Pablo haca' ti' : -- Hex wet con̈ob Israel hex titna yin̈ jichmam Abraham , yeb xin sunil hex mach Israeloj , hex cheyiyo heba tet Comam Dios , wal xin jet cosunil hune' cuybanile yet colbanile ti' .
44013027	Yaj anma Israel ay yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , yebpaxo ebnaj yahaw xol ebnaj tu' , mach chitxumchalo yu ebnaj tato caw ha' Comam Jes'us Iscolomal ebnaj . Wal xin hunun tz'ayic xewilal chaben ebnaj tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , yaj machi nachalo yu ebnaj tzet yehi . Yuxin hayet iscawxenico ebnaj camical yiban̈ Comam Jes'us yijnicano isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebil yu ebnaj ischejab Comam yet payat .
44013028	Caw machi nich'ano istx'ojal ilchalo yin̈ Comam yu ebnaj yun̈e yak'ni camo ebnaj Comam , yaj xin oc ebnaj yala' tet naj Pilato ta chak' camo naj Comam .
44013029	Caw sunil haca' tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , yijcano isba yin̈ Comam . Yet lahwi yinayo ebnaj isnimanil Comam yin̈ te' culus isbey ebnaj ismujno'cano isnimanil Comam yul hune' ch'en pante'on .
44013030	Yaj xin itzitzbican̈ Comam Jes'us xol camom yu Comam Dios .
44013031	Caw tx'i'alto tz'ayic xin ec' Comam xol ebnaj ec' tzujtzun yinta Comam yin̈ isbel bey Galilea chiapni bey Jerusal'en yet maẍto chicam Comam . Haxa tinan̈ xin , ha' ebnaj tu' chihalnic'o Istzoti' Comam coxol han̈on̈ Israel on̈an̈ ti' .
44013032	Hacon̈paxtu'an̈ , lan̈an jalnihan̈ tzoti' c'ul teyet , hune' tzet halbilcano yu Comam Dios tet jichmam yet payat .
44013033	Yij isba hune' ti' jet han̈on̈ titnajon̈ yin̈ ebnaj jichmam tu' yet yitzitzbican̈ Comam xol camom , haca' yu istz'ibn̈elaxcano yin̈ Salmos yin̈ iscab capitulo bay chala : " Hach ti' , hach Inc'aholan , yin̈ hune' tz'ayic ti' chiwak'canojan hak'inal , " ẍi Comam yul Yum .
44013034	Yalnipaxcano Comam Dios yul Yum tato chiitzitzbican̈ Comam Jes'us xol anma camom yun̈e mach chik'ato isnimanil Comam . Chalni haca' ti' : " Machi yec'banil wak'nihan isc'ulal inc'ulan waltecanojan tet naj David , " ẍiayoj .
44013035	Chalnipaxo yin̈ hunxa Salmo : " Mamin , mach chawak' k'ajoto innimanilan hanin sic'bilinan hawu ti' , " ẍiayoj yul Yum Comam Dios .
44013036	Wal naj David tu' xin , xamunla naj haca' chal isc'ul Comam Dios yulbal tiempo yet ayic'o naj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ; yaja' yet iscam naj xin , ismujlax naj bay mujbil jichmam , isk'ato isnimanil .
44013037	Yaj wal Comam Cristo ilaxcan̈ Comam yu Comam Dios xol anma camom , machi k'ato isnimanil Comam .
44013038	Yuxin chiwalan heyabe' hex wet con̈ob , tato cachan Comam Jes'us chu yak'ni tan̈o comul ; yuxin ch'ak'lax hune' tzoti' ti' teyet yuto isley naj Mois'es mach chik'oji yinilo comul jiban̈ . Yaja' mac chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jes'us , sunil ismul tu' chitan̈cano yu Comam .
44013039	
44013040	Yuxin ilwe tzet wal heyuten heba , ta machoj chihul sunil tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat bay chal haca' ti' :
44013041	Haca' hex buchwawom hex ti' , ilwec'anabi , c'ayojab hec'ul heyilni cat hec'ayiloj , yuto hanin Dios inti'an , ay tzet chinwatx'ehan yin̈ hune' tiempo bay ayex ti' . Waxan̈ca ay mac chihalni teyet yin̈ tzet chinwatx'eti'an , yaj mach cheyayto yul heyanma , ẍi Comam Dios yul Yum . Hac tu' yu yalni naj Pablo tet anma cutxanico yul hune' capilla tu' .
44013042	Hayet lan̈an yelti naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel tu' , isk'anni ebnaj mach Israelo tet ebnaj ta chitzotel ebnaj hunelxa yin̈ hune' cuybanile tu' yin̈ hune'xa istz'ayical xewilal .
44013043	Lahwi culto tu' xin , tx'i'al anma Israel yeb anma mach Israelo ayco yin̈ bay ayico ebnaj Israel tu' oc tzujno yinta naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e . Yuxin oc ebnaj cawan̈ tu' iptze ebnaj yun̈eto mach chisbejcano ebnaj isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios chabilxa yu .
44013044	Haxa yet yayilo hune'xa tz'ayical xewilal xin , etza sunil anma ay yul con̈ob tu' apni abeno Istzoti' Comam Dios .
44013045	Haxa yet yilni ebnaj yahawil ebnaj Israel tato caw hantan̈e anma cutxanico yaben tzet chal ebnaj cawan̈ tu' , caw chiwa isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu' . Yalni ebnaj tato lek'ti'al tzet chal naj Pablo , yocpaxo ebnaj buchwal yin̈ naj .
44013046	Yaja' caw yiti yip yanma naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Hex wet con̈ob Israel , yilal ha'tic'a teyet babel chon̈hulan̈ jala'an̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios , yaja' mach cheyoche hechab yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chal Comam . Yuxin etza mach chechah hune' k'inal mach istan̈bal . Wal tinan̈ xin chon̈tohan̈ tet anma mach Israeloj , cat jalnihan̈ hune' cuybanil ti' tet .
44013047	Yuto hac tu' yute yalni Comam Dios Jahawil jetan̈ haca' ti' : -- Xaquexwacojan heyenilo hune' issajilk'inal tet anma mach Israeloj , yun̈e iscolcha anma ay yulajla con̈ob masanta bay chicachnacan apno yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ẍicano Comam , ẍi ebnaj .
44013048	Yaja' wal anma mach Israeloj , caw tzalacanocan̈ yet yaben hune' tu' , yuxin yal ebnaj tu' tato caw c'ul Istzoti' Comam Dios Jahawil . Wal anma sic'bilxalo yu Comam Dios yun̈e ischahni isk'inal mach istan̈bal , caw yaco yanma yin̈ Comam .
44013049	Hacn̈e tu' xin yu ispujnalto Istzoti' Comam Jes'us yul sunil huntek'an con̈ob yul ismajul Antioqu'ia .
44013050	Haxa ebnaj yahawil xol ebnaj Israel oc ak'oc'ule yin̈ naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e tet ebnaj iswi'ehal con̈ob Antioqu'ia , yebpaxo tet huntek'an ebix mach Israelo ayco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , caw aypaxo yelapno ye ebix yul sat anma yul con̈ob tu' . Yu tzet yal ebnaj yahawil xol ebnaj Israel tu' , yuxin ichico hune' isya'tajil yu anma ah con̈ob tu' yin̈ naj Pablo yeb yin̈ naj Bernab'e ; istzumbelaxilti ebnaj yul ismajul Antioqu'ia tu' .
44013051	Yuxin istziccanilo ebnaj cawan̈ tu' pojoj yin̈ yoj yet yel ebnaj yul con̈ob tu' yun̈e isyenilo isba tato matxa yoc ebnaj yin̈ huntek'an anma tu' . Lahwi tu' xin , isto ebnaj yul con̈ob Iconio .
44013052	Wal anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios bey Antioqu'ia tu' , caw ayco hune' tzalahilal yul yanma yin̈ Comam , yebpaxo nohna ebnaj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
44014001	Haca'tic'a yak'le naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e bey yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia , hac tu' yak'lepaxo ebnaj yul con̈ob Iconio . Hayet yapni ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Iconio tu' , yocto ebnaj yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel . Caw c'ul yute yalnilo ebnaj Istzoti' Comam Dios , yuxin caw hantan̈e ebnaj Israel yeb huntek'anxa anma mach Israelo anayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal ebnaj .
44014002	Yaj wal ebnaj Israel mach chahnayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam , oc ebnaj ak'oc'ule tet ebnaj mach Israelo bey tu' yun̈e tx'oj isnani ebnaj yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj .
44014003	Yaja' nahatil ec' naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e yul hune' con̈ob tu' . Caw yin̈ sunil yanma ebnaj istzotel yin̈ isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios . Yun̈e yillaxi tato yel chal ebnaj , yak' Comam ishelanil ebnaj iswatx'en tzettaj ye tu' caw c'ulcanoj yeb xin ej c'aybalc'ule .
44014004	Ha' anma ay yul hune' con̈ob tu' , ispoh isba . Hune' majan ebnaj oc tzujno yinta ebnaj Israel , mach yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam , hunxa majan ebnaj xin occano tzujno yinta naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e .
44014005	Lahwi tu' xin , islahti'n̈en isba ebnaj Israel yeb anma mach Israeloj , yebpaxo ebnaj yahawil yeco yin̈ con̈ob tu' , yoc ebnaj yichenico hune' howal yin̈ naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e yun̈e isk'ojlax camo ebnaj .
44014006	Yaja' yet yaben ebnaj cawan̈ hune' tu' , yelcan̈ ebnaj , isto ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Listra , yeb bey con̈ob Derbe ; cabeb con̈ob tu' ayco yul ismajul Licaonia , istopaxo ebnaj yul huntek'anxa con̈ob hoyanico bey tu' .
44014007	Yul huntek'an con̈ob tu' ocpaxo ebnaj yala' tetej anma Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile .
44014008	Yul con̈ob Listra ay hune' naj tx'oj ye yoj yettaxtic'a ispitzc'ahi , maẍtic'a xin chibelwi naj .
44014009	Tz'on̈anayo naj yaben tzet chal naj Pablo . Yilni naj Pablo tu' tato caw ayco yanma naj yin̈ Comam Dios , yeb ta chu iswatx'i naj yu Comam , yuxin oc t'an̈no naj Pablo yin̈ naj ,
44014010	yalni naj tet naj yin̈ ip : -- Ahan̈wanoj , cat hatoholban̈en haba yiban̈ hawoj , ẍi naj Pablo . Yin̈ hamataj ah lin̈no naj , yichico naj isbelwi .
44014011	Haxa yet yilni anma tzet iswatx'e naj Pablo tu' , yah yaw anma yin̈ caw ip , yalni anma yin̈ abxubal chihallax bey tx'otx' Licaonia tu' haca' ti' : -- Ilwec'anabi lah , ay cawan̈ codiosal mahul coxol mayuteco isba anmahil .
44014012	Ha' naj Bernab'e ti' , ha' codiosal J'upiter , wal naj Pablo ti' xin , ha' codiosal Mercurio , yuto ha' naj matzotelilto coxol , ẍi anma yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu' .
44014013	Ay hune' naj sacerdote yet isdiosal J'upiter tu' , caw yahawil yeco naj yin̈ hune' yatut tioẍ J'upiter ayco yin̈ istxam con̈ob . Bey naj yik'a'ti huntek'an no' tzehla wacax yeb huntek'an te' xaj te' , yu choche naj yeb anma tu' yak'aco xahanbalil tet ebnaj cawan̈ ischejab Comam tu' bey ispultahil istxam con̈ob .
44014014	Hayet yaben naj Bernab'e yeb naj Pablo hune' tu' , istzilnito ebnaj xil isk'ap yun̈e isyenilo ebnaj tato chitac isc'ul . Yoc ebnaj xol anma , yalni yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' :
44014015	-- Wal tinan̈ hex wet anmahil , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxinto cheyute hune' ti' ? Walon̈ti'an̈ caw anma on̈an̈ haca' hex ti' , yuxinto chon̈hulan̈ jala'an̈ teyet ta chebejcano huntek'an machiswalil chewatx'e caw matzet chaliloj , cat heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam Dios itzitzn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Ha' hune' Comam ti' , watx'en̈e satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx' yeb sunil tzet ay sat tx'otx' , iswatx'enpaxo Comam ha' mar yeb sunil tzet ay xol ha' .
44014016	Wal yet yalan̈tocanoj ton̈e yil Comam Dios tzet chu anma yin̈ baytetejn̈etic'a chal isc'ul chiswatx'e .
44014017	Yaja' matolo yu chon̈isnahuln̈eto Comam , ¡ machoj ! Walxinto chisyelo isba Comam jet yin̈ej isc'ulal chiswatx'e , haca' yaniti Comam ha' n̈ab jiban̈ cat isch'ib sunil tzet chicotz'unu . Ch'ak'nipaxo Comam sunil tzet chicolo , cat yak'nipaxo tzalaho coc'ul , ẍi ebnaj tet anma tu' .
44014018	Waxan̈ca yal naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e haca' tu' , yaja' caw lan̈o islin̈ba anma yalni tato chicam no' wacax yin̈ xahanbalil tet ebnaj .
44014019	Yaj wal xin ay huntek'an ebnaj Israel ay yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia yeb con̈ob Iconio apni yul con̈ob Listra tu' . Yoc ebnaj ak'oc'ule tet anma , hac tu' xin yu ishelni anma tu' isnabal , yoc anma isk'ojnocan̈ naj Pablo . Ham yalni anma tato cam naj , yuxin oc anma ishatxacanilto naj yintalto con̈ob .
44014020	Yapni ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam isc'atan̈ naj Pablo tu' , yoc hoyno ebnaj yin̈ naj . Lahwi tu' xin yah lin̈no naj , yocpaxto naj yul con̈ob tu' . Haxa yin̈ hune'xa tz'ayic xin , isto naj yeb naj Bernab'e bey hune'xa con̈ob chiyij Derbe .
44014021	Hayet yapni ebnaj bey tu' , yalnic'o ebnaj Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile . Tzetc'a anma chahni Comam Dios yul yanma yu tzet yal ebnaj . Lahwi tu' xin ismeltzopaxo ebnaj yul con̈ob Listra hunelxa , yeb bey Iconio , yebpaxo bey con̈ob Antioqu'ia ay yul ismajul Pisidia .
44014022	Hayet yec' ebnaj yul hunun con̈ob tu' , yiptzencano ebnaj ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Yalnicano ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Lahweco heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam yuto han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios caw tx'i'al isya'tajil ch'ec' jiban̈ , ẍi ebnaj cawan̈ tu' .
44014023	Yul hunun con̈ob xol ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam tu' xin , issaycano ebnaj mac chioc ancianohal xol ebnaj juẍta tu' . Lahwi tu' yoc ebnaj sunil yin̈ hune' yet mach chon̈wa'i yu cotxahli tet Comam Dios , hac tu' yu yabenn̈elaxcanto ebnaj tu' yul isk'ab Comam Dios , Comam chahbilxa yu ebnaj .
44014024	Lahwi isk'axponic'to naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e yul ismajul tx'otx' Pisidia , yapni ebnaj yul ismajul tx'otx' Panfilia .
44014025	Yalnic'o ebnaj Istzoti' Comam Dios yul con̈ob Perge , tzujan tu' xin yay apno ebnaj yul con̈ob Atalia .
44014026	Ha' bey tu' xin , oc ebnaj yul hune' te' barco , ismeltzo ebnaj yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia hunelxa , bay tak'elaxto ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Dios yu ebnaj juẍtaj yet yichico ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios yulajla con̈ob ; wal xin yijcano isba hune' ismunil ebnaj tu' .
44014027	Yet yapni ebnaj yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia tu' xin , iscutxbanayo isba ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , yoc ebnaj yalno yin̈ hanta isc'ulal iswatx'e Comam Dios yin̈ ebnaj . Yalnipaxo ebnaj yin̈ tzet yu yak'nipaxo Comam isc'ulal yiban̈ anma mach Israeloj , yun̈e ischahni anma tu' Comam Iscolomaloj .
44014028	Naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e nahatilto ec' ebnaj isc'atan̈ ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey tu' .
44015001	Yet hune' tiempohal tu' xin , ay huntek'an ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jes'us tit bey Judea , yapni ebnaj yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia . Istzabnico ebnaj yalni tet ebnaj juẍta tu' haca' ti' : -- Tato mach chioc hune' yechel circuncisi'on teyin̈ haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es , caw mach chexcolchahi , ẍi ebnaj tet ebnaj juẍta tu' .
44015002	Ha' xin naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e oc ebnaj iscaja' huntek'an tzoti' yin̈ hune' circuncisi'on tu' . Yoccano ebnaj tzotelo yiban̈ilo huntek'an tzoti' tu' yeb ebnaj chalni hun tu' . Yu maẍtic'a watx'ayo yu ebnaj , yuxin yal ebnaj juẍta tu' tato chito naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e bey Jerusal'en ; istopaxo haywan̈xa ebnaj juẍta yinta ebnaj , cat isk'ambelax tet ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us yeb tet ebnaj anciano ay bey tu' ta caw yeli chak' circuncidar isba ebnaj juẍta mach Israeloj , mato machoj .
44015003	Hac tu' yu ischejlaxto ebnaj yu ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ay yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia . Hayet yec' ebnaj yul ismajul Fenicia yeb Samaria , yalni ebnaj tet ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey huntek'anxa con̈ob tu' tato ay ebnaj mach Israelo yacano hune' icham beybale ik'biltic'a yu , yanico isba ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Jes'us . Hayet yaben ebnaj juẍta isk'umal hune' tu' , caw tzalacanocan̈ yanma ebnaj yabeni .
44015004	Hayet yapni ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en caw tzalahilal yu ischahlax ebnaj yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us , yeb ebnaj anciano , yeb sunil anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey tu' . Lahwi tu' xin , yoc naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e yalni hanta tzettaj isc'ulal iswatx'e Comam Dios yu ebnaj .
44015005	Yaja' xin ay haywan̈ ebnaj fariseo xayaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo yet yalan̈tocanoj , ha' ebnaj tu' xin ah lin̈noj , yalni ebnaj : -- Ha' ebnaj mach Israelo chichahni Comam Jes'us yul yanma , caw yilal ch'ak'lax circuncidar ebnaj , cat jalni tet ebnaj tato caw chisyije ebnaj tzet chal isley naj Mois'es , ẍi ebnaj fariseo tu' .
44015006	Hac tu' xin yu iscutxbanico isba ebnaj ischejab Comam yeb ebnaj anciano , yoc ebnaj iscuyni yin̈ tzet ch'elico hune' tu' .
44015007	Lahwi islahti'n̈en isba ebnaj yin̈ tzet chucano hune' tu' , yah lin̈no naj Pedro , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Hex wuẍtaj , caw heyohtaj ta yet caw yalan̈tocanoj ha' Comam quinsaynilojan texol yu walnic'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile xol anma mach Israeloj , yu yabeni cat ischahni anma tu' Comam Jesucristo yul yanma .
44015008	Wal xin Comam Dios ohtan̈e tzet ay yul yanma hunun anma , yuxin yak' Comam Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet anma mach Israelo haca' yu yak'ni Comam jet . Hac tu' yute Comam yun̈e isyeniloj tato c'ulpaxo ebnaj jet anmahil tu' yul sat Comam .
44015009	Wal yul sat Comam Dios xin , caw lahanon̈ yeb anma mach Israeloj , yuto ha' Comam sajn̈encano yanma anma tu' yet ischahni anma Comam Jesucristo Iscolomaloj .
44015010	Wal tinan̈ xin , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxinto mach cheyoche hechahba' tzet iswatx'e Comam Dios ti' ? Haca' huno ijatz caw alcanoj , matxa chon̈ah yalan̈ yu yalil , hac tu' xin ye isley naj Mois'es . Caw maẍtic'a k'oji ebnaj jichmam iswatx'en tzet chal hune' ley tu' , hacon̈pax tu' caw mach ch'ijcha ju . Yuxin ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxinto cheyaco hune' tu' yiban̈ ebnaj mach Israelo xayaco isba yul isk'ab Comam ?
44015011	Wal xin caw johtaxa tato han̈c'an̈e yu isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Jesucristo yuxinto chon̈colchahi . Hacpax tu' xin chu iscolcha anma mach Israeloj , ẍi naj Pedro tu' .
44015012	Hayet yaben ebnaj hune' tu' , caw matxa tzet yal ebnaj . Yabenpaxo ebnaj yet yalni naj Bernab'e yeb naj Pablo ta caw hantan̈e c'aybalc'ule yak'cano Comam Dios iswatx'e' ebnaj yet yec' ebnaj xol anma mach Israeloj .
44015013	Lahwi istzotel ebnaj , yalni naj Jacobo haca' ti' : -- Hex wuẍtaj , abewe tzet chiwalan teyet .
44015014	Lan̈anto yalni naj Sim'on Pedro jet tato isye Comam Dios isc'ulal isc'ul tet anma mach Israeloj , yuto lan̈an issic'nican̈ Comam anma tu' yoc yuninaloj .
44015015	Ha' hune' lan̈an iswatx'en Comam ti' , lan̈an yijni isba tzet yalcano Comam Dios bay tz'ibn̈ebil yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , bay chala :
44015016	Chiapni hune' tiempo bay chiwatojan hune' yuninal isc'ahol icham rey David selelo naj yin̈ ismunil . Yuto haca' hunu n̈a etaxnato sic'lebil , hac tu' yecano ismunil naj rey David , yaja' chinwatx'ecan̈an hunelxa .
44015017	Hac tu' xin , tx'i'al anma mach Israeloj chaco isnabal win̈an , hanin Yahaw inti'an . Ha' ton sunil anma tu' chaco isba yul ink'aban , ha' chiwawtecojan yoc incon̈obojan , ẍi Comam .
44015018	Hac tu' yute yalnicano Comam Dios Jahawil , yet yak'ni huntek'an ti' yohtan̈elo anma yettax caw payxa , ẍiayo yul Yum Comam , ẍi naj Jacobo tu' .
44015019	Yalnipaxo naj Jacobo hunelxa : -- Chintxumilojan ta matxa chu janico hune' ijatz yet ley yiban̈ ebnaj mach Israeloj , yuto ebnaj tu' isbejcano ebnaj huntek'an beybale ik'biltic'a yu , yu yanico isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
44015020	Yuxin ha' hune' yilal cotak'ento yul hunu carta ta matxa chisc'ux ebnaj no' chibe haltebilxa tetej tioẍ , yeb xin ta mach chiec' ebnaj yin̈ ixloj , yeb mach chisc'uxpaxo ebnaj ischibehal no nok' ton̈e chihojlax camoj , mach chislopaxo ebnaj no' chic' .
44015021	Chiwalan hune' ti' , yuto yettax payxa ichicanti yilni ebnaj isley naj Mois'es yulaj iscapilla ebnaj jet Israelal yin̈ hunun tz'ayic xewilal . Hacpax tu' tinan̈ , caw hune'n̈etic'a ha' yalnilto ebnaj yul hunun con̈ob , ẍicano naj Jacobo tu' tet ebnaj .
44015022	Ha' tzet yal naj Jacobo tu' , caw ischah yabe' ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us yeb ebnaj anciano , yebpaxo sunil ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam tu' . Hac tu' xin issaylax haywan̈ ebnaj xol ebnaj chito yetbiho naj Bernab'e yeb naj Pablo yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia tu' hunelxa . Yuxin hac tu' yu issaylax naj Judas , naj chihallaxpaxo Barsab'as , yebpaxo naj Silas . Ha' ebnaj cawan̈ ti' caw aycano yelapno ye xol ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam .
44015023	Lahwi tu' xin , ischejlaxto ebnaj , yak'a' te' carta bay chal haca' ti' : -- Han̈on̈ti'an̈ ischejab Comam Jes'us jehan̈ , yeb han̈on̈ anciano on̈ti'an̈ , heyuẍta jehan̈ yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , chicok'ambehan̈ teyet hanic' heye yin̈ hecawil hex wuẍta mach Israelo ay yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia , yeb yul tx'otx' Siria yeb yul tx'otx' Cilicia .
44015024	Jabehan̈ tato ay haywan̈ ebnaj el coxolan̈ bey ti' ton̈e xin yaco yet ebnaj isto bey tu' . Jabenpaxojan̈ tato chiyak' taco ebnaj hec'ul yu tzet chala , cat yak'ni somchahoto henabal , chalni ebnaj ta yilal ch'oc hune' circuncisi'on teyin̈ , cat heyijen tzet chal isley naj Mois'es .
44015025	Yuxinto colahti'n̈e cobahan̈ , cosaynilojan̈ haywan̈ ebnaj chito texol tu' . Hune'n̈e chiyu isto ebnaj yeb juẍta Bernab'e yeb juẍta Pablo , ebnaj caw xahan ay juti'an̈ .
44015026	Ebnaj cawan̈ ti' , caw hinan ebnaj yaben isya'tajil yin̈ yet Comam Jesucristo , ayxapaxo bay caw etzaxa cam ebnaj yu anma .
44015027	Yuxin chijatojan̈ juẍta Judas yeb juẍta Silas tec'atan̈ , ha' ebnaj xin chihalni teyet tzet chalilo huntek'an tzoti' ayayo yul carta .
44015028	Comam Esp'iritu Santo halni jetan̈ ta matxa ijatz chijacojan̈ teyiban̈ , han̈c'an̈e huntek'an caw yilal ye ti' :
44015029	Mach chec'ux ischibehal no nok' xaak'lax xahanbalil tet tioẍ . Machi xin chelopaxo ischiq'uil hunu no nok' yebpaxo xin mach chec'ux ischibehal no nok' chishoj camo isba , mach xin chexec' ixloj . Ta cheyije huntek'an ti' , toholxa heyeco chal tu' . Caw cheya'iln̈e heba , ẍiayo yul te' carta .
44015030	Hac tu' yu ischejlaxto ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia . Hayet yapni ebnaj , iscutxbanayo isba sunil anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey tu' , yak'ni ebnaj te' carta tet ebnaj .
44015031	Lahwi yilni ebnaj tzet chal te' carta tu' , caw tzalacanocan̈ yanma ebnaj yuto yak' te' yak'lobal yanma ebnaj .
44015032	Naj Judas yeb naj Silas tu' , yalpaxo ebnaj Tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , hac tu' yu yak'ni ebnaj yak'lobal yanma ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , yiptzelaxpaxcano ebnaj yin̈ yet Comam yu ebnaj .
44015033	Lahwi yec' hayeb tz'ayic yiban̈ ebnaj , istak'licano ebnaj tet ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey tu' , yet ismeltzoxato ebnaj isc'atan̈ ebnaj juẍta an̈eti ebnaj bey con̈ob Jerusal'en .
44015034	Yaj wal naj Silas , oc yin̈ isnabal naj iscancano bey Antioqu'ia tu' .
44015035	Canpaxcano naj Pablo yeb naj Bernab'e bey Antioqu'ia tu' . Hune'n̈e ec' ebnaj yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey tu' iscuyu' anma , ispujbanic'o ebnaj Istzoti' Comam Dios .
44015036	Lahwi yec' hayeb tz'ayic xin , yalni naj Pablo tet naj Bernab'e : -- Ton̈ jila' ebnaj juẍta bey yul hunun con̈ob bayxatic'a con̈ec' jala' Istzoti' Comam , cat jilni hanic' ye ebnaj , ẍi naj Pablo tu' .
44015037	Ha' naj Bernab'e tu' xin , ay yala' naj tato chito juẍta Juan Marcos yetbiho ebnaj .
44015038	Yaja' yal naj Pablo tato mach chiyu isto naj yintaj ebnaj , yuto yet hunel elcano naj yinta ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Panfilia ; hacn̈e tu' xin , matxa islah naj hune' ismunil tu' .
44015039	Yuxin iscajlecan̈ isba ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yin̈ naj Juan Marcos , ispolen isba ebnaj , nananxa behal tocano hunun ebnaj . Hac tu' yu yoc tzujnu naj Juan Marcos yinta naj Bernab'e , yoc ebnaj yul hune' te' barco , isto ebnaj bey tx'otx' Chipre .
44015040	Wal naj Pablo xin , haxa naj Silas yito naj . Caw tak'elaxcano ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Dios yu ebnaj juẍta ay bey tu' , tzujan tu' xin isto ebnaj .
44015041	Yec' ebnaj yul ismajul tx'otx' Siria yeb yul ismajul tx'otx' Cilicia yiptzencano ebnaj juẍtaj yebpaxo ebix janab yin̈ isc'ulal Comam yulajla hunun con̈ob bay la-ec' ebnaj tu' .
44016001	Lahwi tu' xin , yapni naj Pablo yeb naj Silas bey yul con̈ob Derbe . Tzujan tu' yel ebnaj bey tu' , isto ebnaj yul con̈ob Listra . Ha' bey tu' xin yilayo isba ebnaj yeb hune' naj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , Timoteo isbi ; yunin hune' ix israelita ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jes'us , walpaxo ismam naj griego naj .
44016002	Ha' ebnaj juẍta yul con̈ob Listra yeb con̈ob Iconio , chal ebnaj ta caw c'ul isbeybal naj Timoteo tu' .
44016003	Yu choche naj Pablo yik'ato naj Timoteo yetbiho yin̈ isbel , yuxinto ak'lax circuncidar naj yun̈e matzet chal ebnaj israelita yin̈ naj bay chi-la-ec' naj yinta ebnaj , yuto ohtabil ta griego ismam naj .
44016004	Yul hunun con̈ob bay chi-la-ec' ebnaj xol ebnaj juẍta tu' chak'ni ebnaj chejbanile abebilti yinta ebnaj yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us yeb yu ebnaj anciano ay bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en . Yalnicano ebnaj tet macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam tato caw yilal isyijen huntek'an cuybanile tu' .
44016005	Yuxin ha' anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul hunun con̈ob , caw iptzelaxcano yanico yanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Hac tu' xin yu isch'ib isbisil ebnaj hunun tz'ayic .
44016006	Comam Esp'iritu Santo , ha' mach chanito naj Pablo yeb ebnaj yetbi yalnoc'o Istzoti' Comam bey yul ismajul Asia , yuxin beh isto ebnaj bey ismajul Frigia yeb bey yul ismajul Galacia .
44016007	Yet yapni ebnaj yin̈ ismohonal tx'otx' chiyij Misia , yocpaxo yin̈ isnabal ebnaj isto bey hune'xa tx'otx' chiyij Bitinia , yaj maẍtic'a chalaxto ebnaj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
44016008	Yuxin palan̈ isk'axponic'to ebnaj yul ismajul Misia , yay apno ebnaj yul con̈ob Troas ayco isti' ha' mar .
44016009	Haxa yin̈ ak'balil xin , isyeni isba hune' naj ay bey ismajul tx'otx' Macedonia tet naj Pablo yul iswayic , isk'an naj tet naj , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Ec'an̈ti bey tx'otx' Macedonia ti' cat hacolwa jin̈an̈ , ẍi naj tet naj Pablo yul iswayic .
44016010	Lahwi yilni naj Pablo hune' tu' xin , jocan̈ cok'uynu jetan̈ cotohan̈ bey tx'otx' Macedonia , yuto cotxuman̈ tato ha' Comam chon̈initojan̈ jala'c'ojan̈ Tzoti' yet colbanile tet anma ay bey tu' .
44016011	Lahwi tu' xin , jocan̈ yul te' barco bey Troas tu' , caw rin̈an cotohan̈ bey con̈ob chiyij Samotracia . Haxa yet hunxa tz'ayic xin japnihan̈ bey yul con̈ob Ne'apolis .
44016012	Cobelwitojan̈ , japnihan̈ yul con̈ob Filipos ayco yalan̈ yip ebnaj romano . Ha' hune' con̈ob tu' , caw aycano yelapno ye xol sunil con̈ob ay yul ismajul tx'otx' Macedonia . Caw xin tx'i'al tz'ayic con̈ec'an̈ yul hune' con̈ob tu' .
44016013	Yin̈ tz'ayic xewilal xin cotohan̈ isti' hune' ha ha' ch'ayto istxam con̈ob tu' yuto cotxuman̈ tato ha' bey tu' chiscutxba isba anma Israel istxahli . Hayet japnihan̈ jay tz'on̈nojan̈ , jichicojan̈ jalnihan̈ Istzoti' Comam tet huntek'an ebix ix iscutxba isba bey tu' .
44016014	Ay xin hune' ix ah con̈ob Tiatira chiyij Lidia , ayco xol ebix cutxanico tu' , txon̈om k'ape ix , k'ap caw ay istohol , cajmutz'mun̈e jilni k'ap . Hune' ix ti' xin , caw chiyo isba ix tet Comam Dios . Yet yaben ix cuybanile yal naj Pablo tu' , yanico isba ix yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo .
44016015	Tzujan tu' xin yahcano ha' iswi' ix yeb sunil mac ay bey yatut ix . Yalni ix jetan̈ haca' ti' : -- Ta caw yeli ayco wanmahan yin̈ Comam cheyila , ton̈we bey watutan , ẍi ix jetan̈ . Hac tu' yu cocancanojan̈ bey yatut ix .
44016016	Ha' hunel xin , yet lan̈an cotohan̈ bay chiscutxba isba anma istxahli , cochahnayojan̈ hune' ix k'opo ayco ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ . Hune' ix tu' , ahbelom ix , ischejab huntek'an ebnaj ye ix . Caw xin chischah ebnaj melyu yin̈ ismunil ix .
44016017	Yoc tzujno ix jintajan̈ yeb naj Pablo , istzabnico ix yel yaw , yalni ix : -- Ha' huntek'an ebnaj ti' , ischejab Comam Dios ye ebnaj , hune' Dios caw aycano yip . Ha' ebnaj chihalnic'o teyet tzet chiyu hecolchahi , ẍi ix .
44016018	Caw tx'i'al tz'ayic yal ix haca' tu' , caw xin tibayo yu naj Pablo yaben tzet chal ix , yuxin meltzo naj , yoc t'an̈no naj yin̈ ix , yalni naj tet ischejab naj matzwalil ayco yin̈ ix haca' ti' : -- Yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo chiwalan tawet , elan̈ yin̈ ix ti' , ẍi naj Pablo . Yet yaben ischejab naj matzwalil yalni naj Pablo hune' tu' , yelcano naj yin̈ ix .
44016019	Haxa yet yilni ebnaj yahaw ix tu' tato matxa melyu chischah ebnaj yin̈ ismunil ix , istzabnayo ebnaj naj Pablo yeb naj Silas , yilaxto ebnaj cawan̈ tu' sata ebnaj yahaw con̈ob bey capil .
44016020	Haxa yet yilaxto ebnaj yin̈ sat ebnaj yahaw yeco yin̈ con̈ob tu' , yalni ebnaj tzabnayo naj Pablo yeb naj Silas tu' : -- Ha' ebnaj Israel ti' , caw ton̈e chihul ebnaj yak'a' somchaho'can̈ isnabal sunil jet con̈ob ti' .
44016021	Yuto lan̈an iscuynicano ebnaj anma yin̈ huntek'an cuybanile mach ischah isba yeb coley . Caw xin mach chu cochahni ija tzet chal ebnaj isyayil han̈on̈ ti' romano hon̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
44016022	Lahwi tu' xin yah bulna anma yin̈ naj Pablo yeb naj Silas . Ischejni ebnaj yahaw con̈ob tu' istzillaxilo xil isk'ap ebnaj yun̈e ishatelax ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yu te' hitx'om c'ax .
44016023	Lahwi ishatelax ebnaj tx'i'al el , yalaxicto ebnaj yul te' preso . Yalni ebnaj yahaw tu' tet naj tan̈em preso : -- Caw caw chawutecto ebnaj yul preso tu' , ẍi ebnaj .
44016024	Haxa yet yaben naj tan̈em preso hune' tu' , yanicanicto naj ebnaj cawan̈ bay caw nahat yecanicto yul te' preso . Yanicanicto naj yoj ebnaj yul islot'il te' cepo .
44016025	Haxa yet chuman ak'bal xin , chibitni naj Pablo yeb naj Silas tet Comam Dios , chitxahlipaxo ebnaj . Caw xin chabe huntek'anxapaxo ebnaj presowom tzet chal ebnaj .
44016026	Yin̈ ha'mataj xin yec' hune' niman chixcab , caw toxan̈e chiyucyun isxe'al te' preso yu . Ishajlo sunil ispultahil te' preso tu' , yayc'aypaxo ch'en cadena ayco yin̈ ebnaj presowom .
44016027	Haxa yet yel iswayan̈ naj tan̈em preso , yilni naj tato hajan sunil ispultahil te' preso , yuxin yihti naj yespada yul yatut yu ispotx'ni isba naj yalni , yuto ha' yute istxumni naj ta xaelcan̈ sunil ebnaj ayicto yul preso tu' .
44016028	Yaja' ah yaw naj Pablo tet naj haca' ti : -- Mach chapotx' haba , cosunilan̈ ayon̈ictijan̈ yul preso ti' , ẍi naj .
44016029	Isk'anni naj chitan̈en preso tu' isk'a' yu ismujli , isto naj bay ay ebnaj tu' ; caw toxan̈e chiluylun naj yu xiwquilal . Isjahbanayo isba naj sata naj Pablo yeb sata naj Silas .
44016030	Lahwi tu' xin , yinilti naj ebnaj cawan̈ tu' , isk'amben naj tet ebnaj : -- Wal tinan̈ , ¿ tzet wal wuten inbahan yun̈e inchahnicanojan incolbanilan ? ẍi naj .
44016031	Yalni ebnaj tet naj tan̈em preso : -- Aco hawanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo cat hacolchahi yeb sunilal mac ay bey hawatut , ẍi ebnaj tet naj .
44016032	Lahwi tu' xin , yoc ebnaj yalno Istzoti' Comam Dios tet naj , yeb tet sunil mac ay bey yatut naj .
44016033	Yin̈tic'a hune' ak'balil tu' xin , oc naj istx'ahalo islahwilal ebnaj cawan̈ tu' . Lahwi tu' xin , yahcano ha' iswi' naj yeb sunilal mac ay bey yatut naj .
44016034	Yinito naj ebnaj cawan̈ tu' bey yatut , iswa' ebnaj . Caw xin chitzala yanma naj yeb sunilal mac ay bey yatut naj yuto yaco yanma naj yin̈ Comam Dios .
44016035	Haxa yet hune'xa sac'ayalil xin , ischejnito ebnaj yahawil con̈ob tu' huntek'an ebnaj mayor , yalni ebnaj tet naj tan̈em preso tu' haca' ti' : -- Wal tinan̈ hajilti naj Pablo yeb naj Silas , ẍi ebnaj .
44016036	Yuxin yal naj tan̈em preso tet naj Pablo : -- Wal tinan̈ , chexinbejtzohan yalni ebnaj wahawan , yuxinto asi'wej , paxan̈weto yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , ẍi naj .
44016037	Yaja' xin yal naj Pablo tet ebnaj : -- Wal han̈on̈ti'an̈ , romano on̈an̈ , yaj jijan̈ yu ebnaj yin̈ sat sunil anma , machi nino isk'ambe ebnaj tato ay comulan̈ . ¿ Tom xin haxa tinan̈ ewantajil chon̈bejtzolaxan̈ , yalni ebnaj ? ¡ Wal xin , machoj ! Hulojab ebnaj yahaw tu' , ha' caw ebnaj chul con̈inoltojan̈ , ẍi naj Pablo .
44016038	Hac tu' xin yu isto ebnaj yalno tet ebnaj yahaw tu' . Yuxin hayet yaben ebnaj tato romano naj Pablo yeb naj Silas , isxiwcan̈ ebnaj .
44016039	Isto ebnaj isk'anno nimanc'ulal yin̈ tet naj Pablo yeb tet naj Silas . Lahwi tu' xin , yilaxilti ebnaj yul preso , yallaxcano tet ebnaj tato ch'el ebnaj yul con̈ob tu' .
44016040	Lahwi yelti ebnaj yul preso tu' , isto ebnaj bey yatut ix Lidia , ha' tu' xin yilayo isba ebnaj yeb macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Lahwi yiptzelax ebnaj juẍta yeb ebix janab bey tu' , yel ebnaj cawan̈ yul con̈ob tu' .
44017001	Yin̈ isbel naj Pablo yeb naj Silas tu' ec' ebnaj bey con̈ob Anf'ipolis , yeb bey con̈ob Apolonia . Lahwi tu' xin yapni ebnaj yul con̈ob Tesal'onica bay ay hune' iscapilla ebnaj Israel .
44017002	Yocto naj Pablo yul capilla tu' haca'tic'a chu naj yul hunun con̈ob . Yulbal oxeb semana yin̈ hunun tz'ayic xewilal cuywa naj yin̈ ebnaj tu' .
44017003	Yalnicano naj Pablo yin̈ caw haban ta aycanayo yul Yum Comam Dios ta caw yilal yec'ya' yanma Cocolomal , yeb yilal iscami cat yitzitzbican̈ . Yalnipaxo naj haca' ti' : -- Hune' mac lan̈an walnihan teyet ti' , ha' Comam Jes'us , ha' ton Comam Cristo Cocolomal , ẍi naj Pablo tet anma ayicto bey tu' .
44017004	Ay huntek'an ebnaj Israel yayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal naj Pablo , yoccano ebnaj yetbiho naj Pablo yeb naj Silas . Caw tx'i'alpaxo ebnaj griego ayxaco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo yu tzet yal naj Pablo , yebpaxo xin huntek'an ebix ix caw ay yelapno ye yul issat anma yul con̈ob tu' yaco isba yul isk'ab Comam .
44017005	Yaj wal hunmajanxa ebnaj Israel mach yayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chal naj Pablo , caw tit ishowal ebnaj yuto caw tx'i'al anma yaco isba yin̈ tzet yal naj Pablo tu' .
