Iscutxbanico ebnaj huntek'an ebnaj caw isa , ton̈e chi'ec' yul calle , caw mach-tic'a-iswalil . Ha' ebnaj tu' xin oc ak'oc'ule tet ebnaj yul con̈ob tu' yun̈e yah wejna ebnaj sunil . Yipicto ebnaj yul yatut hune' naj chiyij Jas'on yu chisna ebnaj tato ha' tu' ay naj Pablo yeb naj Silas , yuto caw choche ebnaj istzabayo ebnaj cawan̈ tu' cat yalaxico ebnaj yul isk'ab con̈ob .
44017006	Yu mach ilcha ebnaj yul hune' n̈a tu' , yuxin haxa juẍta Jas'on yeb haywan̈xa ebnaj juẍtaj ishatxto ebnaj tet ebnaj yahaw con̈ob . Yalni ebnaj yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' : -- Naj Pablo yeb naj Silas tu' , caw sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chisomchacan̈ isnabal yu ebnaj , wal tinan̈ xin xahulpaxo ebnaj coxol .
44017007	Ha' xin naj Jas'on ti' , chichahni ebnaj yul yatut , ebnaj tu' caw mach chisyije ebnaj isley naj jahaw ay Roma . Chalpaxo ebnaj ta ay hune'xa naj rey , chiyij Jes'us , ẍi ebnaj Israel tet ebnaj yahaw con̈ob tu' .
44017008	Yet yaben sunil anma yeb ebnaj yahaw con̈ob tzet yal ebnaj tu' , caw tit ishowal ebnaj , issomchacan̈ isnabal ebnaj .
44017009	Wal ebnaj yahaw con̈ob tu' , isk'an ebnaj melyu oc selelo ebnaj isbejtzolaxilo ebnaj .
44017010	Haxa yet ak'balil xin , ischejlaxto naj Pablo yeb naj Silas yul con̈ob Berea yin̈ an̈e yu ebnaj juẍtaj . Yet yapni ebnaj bey tu' , yoc ebnaj yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel .
44017011	Ec'na caw c'ulto isnabal anma Israel ay bey con̈ob Berea tu' sata anma Israel ay bey con̈ob Tesal'onica . Caw yaco ebnaj yin̈ isc'ul yaben Istzoti' Comam Dios yal ebnaj cawan̈ tu' . Caw xin hunun tz'ayic iscuyni ebnaj Istzoti' Comam yun̈e yilni ebnaj ta caw yel tzet chal naj Pablo tu' .
44017012	Yuxin , caw tx'i'al anma Israel yaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , yeb tx'i'alpaxo ebnaj griego yeb ebix griego caw nime ix yul sat con̈ob tu' yaco isba yul isk'ab Comam .
44017013	Yet yaben ebnaj Israel ay bey Tesal'onica tato lan̈an yalni naj Pablo Istzoti' Comam Dios bey con̈ob Berea , yapni ebnaj ak'oc'ule tet anma yun̈e issomchacan̈ isnabal anma yin̈ tzet chal naj Pablo .
44017014	Yuxin ebnaj juẍta tu' yin̈ an̈e ischejto ebnaj naj Pablo bey isti' ha' mar . Wal naj Silas yeb naj Timoteo cancano ebnaj yul con̈ob Berea tu' .
44017015	Ha' ebnaj juẍta inito naj Pablo , hata bey yul con̈ob Atenas bey ebnaj yak'a'cano naj . Haxa yet lan̈an ismeltzo ebnaj bey Berea , yalni naj Pablo tet ebnaj : -- Cheyal apno tet naj Silas yeb tet naj Timoteo ta chitit ebnaj yin̈ an̈e inc'atan̈an bey ti' , ẍi naj Pablo tu' .
44017016	Hayet ayc'o naj Pablo yechman yapni naj Silas yeb naj Timoteo bey yul con̈ob Atenas , caw tac isc'ul naj yilni tato caw tzetc'a istioẍ anma yul hune' con̈ob tu' .
44017017	Yuxin chibeyc'o naj yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel , cat iscuywa naj yin̈ ebnaj Israel tu' yeb yin̈ ebnaj mach Israelo chiyiyo isba tet Comam Dios . Hunun tz'ayic xin , istzotelpaxo naj tet anma ch'ec' bey yul yamak' capil .
44017018	Ay huntek'an ebnaj cuywawom chiyij epic'urio yebpaxo huntek'an ebnaj chiyij estoico tzotel yeb naj Pablo . Ay ebnaj halni haca' ti' : -- ¿ Tzettaxca chalilo huntek'an tzet chal hune' naj caw tzetc'a istzotel ti' ? ẍi ebnaj . Wal hunmajanxa ebnaj xin , halni haca'ti' : -- Chitzotel naj yin̈ huntek'anxa nan tioẍal , ẍi ebnaj . Yal ebnaj haca' tu' yu istzoti'al Comam Jesucristo chal naj Pablo , chalnipaxo naj tato chiitzitzbican̈ anma camomxa .
44017019	Yuxin ilaxto naj bey hune' tzalan chiyij Are'opago , bay chak' ebnaj lahti' , isk'amben ebnaj tet naj : -- ¿ Chimyu hawalni jetan̈ tzet ye hune' cuybanile chawalic'oj ?
44017020	Yuto maẍto bay chijabehan̈ huntek'an ti' , yuxin chijochehan̈ chijohtan̈elojan̈ tzet caw chiyal yelapnoj , ẍi ebnaj .
44017021	Hac tu' yute yalni ebnaj yuto sunil anma ay yul con̈ob Atenas yeb anma nan con̈obal ay yul con̈ob tu' , caw nantic'a isbeybal anma . Yuto yet ay huno ac' cuybanil ch'apni hallaxo xol ebnaj caw chiec' tx'i'al tiempo yiban̈ , yuto caw chiyoche ebnaj ispich'alo yin̈ caw c'ul , cat iscaye'n̈e ebnaj .
44017022	Yahwano naj Pablo xol ebnaj bey hune' Are'opago tu' , istzabnico naj yalni : -- Wal tinan̈ , hex ah con̈ob Atenas , caw chiwilan tato caw ayco henabal yin̈ ej tioẍ .
44017023	Yet chinec'an yul con̈ob ti' , chiwilnihan baytaj tet hediosal bay caw cheyiyo heba . Chiwilnipaxojan hune' ch'en yet hexahanbal bay tz'ibn̈ebilico hayeb tz'ib chalni haca' ti' : -- Ha' ti' chijiyo coba tet Dios mach ohtabiloj , ẍi yin̈ hune' ch'en tu' . Wal xin ha' hune' Dios mach cheyohtajo bay cheyiyo heba tu' , ha' ton hune' Dios tu' chinhulan wala'an istzoti'al texol .
44017024	Ha' hune' Dios tu' , watx'en̈e yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb sunil tzet ayayo sat ; caw yahawil yeco yin̈ satcan̈ yeb yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Ha' hune' Dios tu' , mach yulo n̈a watx'ebil yu anma aya .
44017025	Mach yilalo ay tzet ch'ak'lax tet hune' Dios tu' yu anma . Wal xin ha' Comam ch'ak'ni cocawil cosunil , ha' Comam ch'ak'nipaxo jak'ek' cohik'a' , yeb sunil tzet ayon̈ .
44017026	Ha' Comam Dios watx'en naj babel winaj ; yin̈ naj tu' xin titna sunil anma ay yulaj con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yet yalan̈tocanoj yalcano Comam bak'in chiwatx'i hunun nimeta con̈ob , yeb baytu'wal ch'ec' ismohonal hunun con̈ob tu' .
44017027	Iswatx'e Comam Dios haca' tu' yun̈e issayni anma Comam , c'uxanta chiohtan̈elaxilo Comam yu anma . Yaj chiwalcanojan teyet tato mach nahato yelo Comam Dios jin̈ , wal xin cawil yeco Comam jin̈ .
44017028	Yu Comam Dios yuxinto itzitzon̈ , chon̈bili yu Comam , yu Comam yuxin ayon̈ic'o bey yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Ay huntek'an ebnaj heyet con̈ob caw helan istzoteli , chalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Caw yuninal Dios jehan̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
44017029	Caw yel chal ebnaj tu' ta caw yuninal Comam Dios jehi , yuxin caw mach chu jalni tato lahan Comam haca' huntek'an ch'en tioẍ watx'ebil yu anma yin̈ ch'en oro maca yin̈ ch'en plata , maca hunoxa nan ch'enal watx'ebilayo yu anma yu ishelanil isnabal .
44017030	Yet payxa , mach ohtan̈ebilo Comam Dios yu anma , yuxin yak' nimanc'ulal Comam yin̈ issucal anma . Wal tinan̈ xin chal Comam Dios tato caw yilal chisna isba sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , cat ismeltzoco yul isk'ab Comam .
44017031	Halbilcano yu Comam tato ch'apni hune' tz'ayical bay chil Comam tzet chielico anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , hatatic'a tzet chiswatx'e hunun anma . Wal xin ay hune' Isc'ahol Comam Dios sic'bililoj , ha' chiilni tzet chi'elico hunun anma . Isyelo Comam Dios tet sunil anma tato caw yel hune' ti' yet yak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Dios Isc'ahol xol anma camom , ẍi naj Pablo tet ebnaj tu' .
44017032	Yet yaben ebnaj yalni naj Pablo tato chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom , ay ebnaj buchwa yin̈ naj , aypaxo ebnaj halni : -- Xacok'ambe'an̈ hune' ti' tawet yet hunoxa tiempohal , ẍi ebnaj .
44017033	Yet lahwi yaben naj Pablo tzet yal ebnaj tu' , yel naj xol ebnaj .
44017034	Yaja' ay haywan̈ ebnaj tu' yayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal naj Pablo , yoc ebnaj yetbiho naj . Xol ebnaj tu' xin , ay hune' naj chiyij Dionisio , yetbi isba naj yeb ebnaj chiscutxba isba bey Are'opago tu' . Aypaxo huntek'anxa anma yayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam yeb xin hune' ix ix chiyij D'amaris .
44018001	Lahwi tu' xin , yel naj Pablo bey yul con̈ob Atenas , yapni naj bey con̈ob Corinto .
44018002	Ha' bey tu' yilayo isba naj yeb hune' naj chiyij Aquila . Hune' naj tu' israelita naj , pitzc'ana naj bey yul ismajul Ponto . Wal yixal naj xin , Priscila isbi ix . Tolto apni naj yeb yixal bey Corinto tu' , ispeto naj bey ismajul Italia yuto elto isbi yu naj Claudio , yahawil yeco yin̈ tx'otx' Roma , ta ch'el sunil anma Israel yul ismajul Roma . Yapni naj Pablo istuc'le' naj yeb yixal bey yatut .
44018003	Iscancano naj Pablo munil isc'atan̈ naj yuto lahan ismunil ebnaj , watx'em mantiado ebnaj .
44018004	Yin̈ hunun tz'ayical xewilal chibeyc'o naj Pablo yalno Istzoti' Comam Dios yul iscapilla anma Israel , yu iscuynicano naj anma Israel yeb anma mach Israeloj .
44018005	Yet yapni naj Silas yeb naj Timoteo bey yul con̈ob Corinto , ispeto ebnaj bey yul ismajul Macedonia , naj Pablo tu' xin , caw yin̈xan̈e Istzoti' Comam Dios oc naj munlahoj . Chalni naj yin̈ caw haban tato ha' Comam Jes'us ha' ton Cristo Cocolomal , Comam echmabil yuli .
44018006	Caw xin tit ishowal ebnaj israelita yet yaben ebnaj haca' tu' , istzabnico ebnaj isbuchwa yin̈ naj Pablo . Hac tu' xin yu istzicobtan̈encano naj Pablo tu' xil isk'ap yun̈e isyenicanilo naj tet anma tato caw matxa yoc naj yin̈ anma tu' . Yalni naj : -- Hex cawex cheyiti isya'tajil teyiban̈ , walinan caw matxa wocan teyin̈ , yuxin tinan̈ intoxahan walnolojan hune' cuybanil ti' tet anma mach Israeloj , ẍi naj .
44018007	Lahwi yalnicano naj Pablo haca' tu' , yelti naj yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel , isto naj bey yatut hune' naj chiyij Ticio Justo , hune' naj mach Israeloj , naj chiyiyo isba tet Comam Dios . Ayayo yatut naj iscawilal capilla tu' .
44018008	Ay xin hunxa naj caw yahawil yeco yin̈ iscapilla ebnaj Israel , Crispo isbi , yayto naj yul yanma yin̈ Comam yeb sunil mac ay yul yatut naj . Tx'i'alpaxo anma ay bey Corinto tu' hayet yaben Istzoti' Comam Dios , yanico isba yul isk'ab Comam , yahcano ha' iswi' .
44018009	Yin̈ hune' ak'balil xin yal Comam Dios tet naj Pablo yul iswayic haca' ti' : -- Mach chaẍxiwi lahico hawalni Intzoti'an xol anma ti' , ẍi Comam tet naj .
44018010	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Wal xin , ayinic'ojan hawetbihoj , yuxin machi huno mac chu yoc caẍistzabnoyoj . Caw ayxa anma sic'bilcan̈ wuhan bey yul hune' con̈ob ti' , ẍi Comam tet naj .
44018011	Yuxin caw yicta iscab habil ec' naj Pablo yul con̈ob Corinto iscuyni anma yin̈ Istzoti' Comam .
44018012	Yet ayco hune' naj romano , Gali'on isbi , yahawil yin̈ tx'otx' Acaya , islahti'n̈en isba ebnaj israelita yin̈ tzet wal yuten ebnaj naj Pablo . Hac tu' yu yinito ebnaj naj Pablo yul capil .
44018013	Yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Hune' naj ti' chiec' naj ak'oc'ule tet anma yun̈e yinayo isba anma tet Comam Dios , yaj mach haca'o yalni ley , ẍi ebnaj yin̈ naj Pablo tu' .
44018014	Hayet lan̈anxa istzotelcan̈ naj Pablo , yalni naj Gali'on haca' ti' : -- Hex israelita hex ti' , caw mach ch'elicti heyaw wetan bey ti' , tato ay huno ismachiswalilal iswatx'e hune' naj ti' , maca tato ay huno ismul naj caw nanxa islowi , wal tu' caw chimwabetojan tzet cheyala .
44018015	Yaja' ta yun̈e tzoti' chal naj , yeb xin yu hune' bihe chiyak' binaho naj , yeb yun̈e heley yuxin cheyaco hehowal yin̈ naj , wal xin watx'ewe hune' ti' hechuquil . Walinan mach chiwaco inbahan inwatx'ehan hune' ti' , ẍi naj Gali'on tet ebnaj .
44018016	Lahwi yalni naj haca' ti' , istzumbelaxilti ebnaj tu' yul capil .
44018017	Wal ebnaj griego ay bey tu' , istzabayo ebnaj naj S'ostenes , naj ayco yahawilo iscapilla ebnaj Israel . Yoc ebnaj ishateno naj bey isti' capil , yaj ton̈e yil naj Gali'on hune' tu' , machi nich'ano tzet yal naj .
44018018	Caw tx'i'alto tz'ayic ec' naj Pablo bey Corinto . Lahwi tu' xin istak'licano naj tet ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey tu' yuto istzabico naj isto yin̈ isbel bey yul ismajul Siria . Istopaxo ix Priscila yeb naj Aquila . Yet yapni ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Cencrea , yinilo naj Pablo xil iswi' yun̈e yijni isba hune' tzet halbil yu naj tet Comam Dios . Lahwi tu' xin yocto ebnaj yul barco .
44018019	Yet yapni ebnaj yul con̈ob Efeso xin , iscancano ix Priscila yeb naj Aquila bey tu' . Octo naj Pablo yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel , istzabnico naj istzotel yeb ebnaj cutxanicoj .
44018020	Caw oc ebnaj yala' tet naj Pablo tato chicancano naj hayebo tz'ayicalil xol ebnaj , yaj xin mach chisje naj .
44018021	Yet lan̈an istak'licano naj Pablo tu' tet ebnaj , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Caw yilal chintohan bey Jerusal'en yin̈ k'in̈ . Yaj ta ch'el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios chinec'an tec'atan̈ hunelxa , ẍicano naj . Hac tu' xin yu yel naj yul con̈ob Efeso , yocpaxo naj yul barco .
44018022	Lahwi tu' yapni naj yul con̈ob Cesarea , istopaxahto naj yul con̈ob Jerusal'en tzotelo yeb ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jes'us bey tu' . Lahwi yec' naj bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en tu' , isto naj yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia .
44018023	Ha' bey tu' xin ec' naj Pablo hune' tiempohal . Lahwi tu' isto naj hunelxa yin̈ isbel . Yec' naj sunil yulaj con̈ob bey yul ismajul Galacia yeb yul ismajul Frigia , yiptzencano naj ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo .
44018024	Ay hune' naj Israel , Apolos isbi , ah con̈ob Alejandr'ia . Naj Apolos ti' , apni naj yul con̈ob Efeso bay cancano ix Priscila yeb naj Aquila . Caw helan naj istzoteli , yeb caw yohta naj tzet ayayo yul Yum Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcano yet payat .
44018025	Cuybilpaxo naj yin̈ cuybanile yin̈ yet Comam Jesucristo , yuxin yin̈ caw sunil yanma naj iscuy naj anma yin̈ yet Comam . Waxan̈ca han̈ech'an cuybanile yal naj Juan yin̈ yahbal ha' iswi' anma yohta naj .
44018026	Yet hunel oc naj yala' Istzoti' Comam Dios xol anma yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel , yin̈ caw sunil isc'ul naj yalni naj cuybanile tu' . Yet lahwi yaben ix Priscila yeb naj Aquila cuybanile yak' naj , yinito naj yeb ix naj Apolos tu' yatut . Yoc naj yeb ix yalnolo yin̈ caw haban yin̈ sunil cuybanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
44018027	Lahwi tu' xin , yoc yin̈ isnabal naj Apolos isto bey ismajul Acaya . Yuxin yato ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey Efeso tu' hune' carta bay tak'elaxto naj tet ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , yun̈e c'ul chu ischahlax naj bey tu' . Yet yapni naj bey yul ismajul Acaya tu' , yoc naj yiptzeno sunil anma xayaco isba yul isk'ab Comam , yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios .
44018028	Caw wiyom yoc naj yalno isyelal tet ebnaj Israel yin̈ sat anma . Chisyenilo naj baytet yin̈ maẍtaj yeco ebnaj tu' , chalni naj ta ha' yul Yum Comam Dios chala ta ha' Comam Jes'us , ha' Cristo Cocolomal echmabil yuli .
44019001	Yet ayic'o naj Apolos yul con̈ob Corinto , ay yul ismajul Acaya , lan̈an yec'paxo naj Pablo yul ismajul tx'otx' Asia . Hayet yapni naj Pablo yul con̈ob Efeso yillenayo isba naj yeb huntek'an ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey tu' .
44019002	Isk'amben naj Pablo tu' tet ebnaj : ¿ Hechahmi Comam Esp'iritu Santo yet heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo ? ẍi naj tet ebnaj . Istak'wican̈ ebnaj : -- Machoj , maẍtic'a bay chijabehan̈ ta ay hune' Comam Esp'iritu Santo , ẍi ebnaj .
44019003	Isk'ambenpaxo naj : -- ¿ Tzet cuybanile ilchalo heyu yet yah ha' hewi' ? ẍi naj Pablo tu' . Istak'wican̈ ebnaj : -- Wal xin , ah ha' cowi'an̈ haca' cuybanile yal naj Juan , ẍi ebnaj .
44019004	Yalnipaxo naj Pablo tet ebnaj : -- Wal naj Juan yacan̈ naj ha' iswi' anma yun̈e isyenilo anma tato chisna isba yin̈ ismul . Yaj xin yalpaxcano naj Juan tu' tet anma tato ay hune'xa mac tzujan yul yinta naj , yuxin caw yilal yin̈ hune'xa naj tu' chaco yanma anma , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo , ha' chal naj Juan tu' , ẍi naj Pablo .
44019005	Hayet yaben ebnaj hune' tzet yal naj Pablo tu' , yahcano ha' iswi' ebnaj yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo .
44019006	Lahwi tu' yanahto naj Pablo isk'ab yiban̈ iswi' ebnaj , hac tu' yu ischahnicano ebnaj Comam Esp'iritu Santo . Istzabnico ebnaj istzotel yin̈ nan abxubal , chalni ebnaj Tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios .
44019007	Aymi ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ yin̈ sunil .
44019008	Caw oxeb ixahaw yalilto naj Pablo Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo yul iscapilla ebnaj Israel bey tu' . Caw xin machi xiw naj yalni Istzoti' Comam . Chiscuyni naj anma yu yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
44019009	Yaja' ay huntek'an ebnaj mach ischah yabe' tzet yal naj Pablo tu' . Yalni ebnaj sata sunil anma ta mach c'ulu hune' cuybanil yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Yuxin el naj Pablo xol ebnaj , yinito naj ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam tu' bey yescuela hune' naj chiyij Tirano . Ha' tu' xin iscuy naj Pablo ebnaj tu' yin̈ hunun tz'ayic
44019010	Caw cab habil cuywa naj yuxin sunil anma bey yul ismajul Asia aben hune' cuybanil yin̈ Comam Jesucristo ; anma Israel , yebpaxo anma mach Israeloj , caw sunil anma tu' abencanoj .
44019011	Caw isye naj Pablo huntek'an nimeta c'aybalc'ule yu yip Comam Dios yin̈ sat anma .
44019012	Wal xin waxan̈ca payu'e maca hunuxa xilk'ape ec'lenaxa yin̈ isnimanil naj Pablo tu' , chito anma cat yanico yin̈ isyawub cat iscawxican̈ anma tu' . Aypaxo anma ch'elcano ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ .
44019013	Aypaxo xin huntek'an ebnaj Israel chiec' bey tu' chiel ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma yu ebnaj . Yak'len ebnaj yawten isbi Comam Jes'us yu yinilo ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ anma . Yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Yin̈ isbi naj Jes'us , naj chiec' naj Pablo yalac'o istzoti' , chijalan̈ elan̈wej , ẍi ebnaj .
44019014	Hac tu' yute hujwan̈ isc'ahol hune' naj Israel chiyij Esceva , yahawil yeco yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote Israel .
44019015	Yaja' yet hunel yak'le ebnaj yinilo ischejab naj matzwalil yin̈ hune' naj , istak'wican̈ ischejab naj matzwalil tu' tet ebnaj : -- Naj Jes'us cheyal ti' , caw wohtajan naj , caw wohtapaxojan naj Pablo . Walex hex ti' xin , ¿ mac anmahilex ? ẍi ischejab naj matzwalil tu' tet ebnaj .
44019016	Ha' naj bay ayco ischejab naj matzwalil tu' xin , tit lemna naj yiban̈ ebnaj , isyuk'laxayo ebnaj yu naj yin̈ sunil yip , caw xin oc islahwilal isnimanil ebnaj . T'ilanxa ebnaj yet yelcan̈ tet naj ischejab naj matzwalil tu' .
44019017	Yet yaben anma ah Efeso isk'umal yin̈ tzet yu tu' , anma Israel yebpaxoj anma mach Israeloj caw xiwcan̈ anma . Hac tu' xin yu yahcan̈ isbina isbi Comam Jesucristo xol anma .
44019018	Caw ay anma chabilxa Comam Jesucristo yu apni bey tu' , yichico yalnahti anma sunilal istx'ojal xa-le-iswatx'e yet yalan̈tocanoj .
44019019	Yebpaxo xin ay huntek'an ebnaj ahbelomtic'a , initi islibro chiyak'baln̈e yet chitxumli tu' , isn̈usnicanto ebnaj te' yul k'a' yin̈ sat sunil anma . Hayet yillaxi hanta istohol te' libro tz'ato tu' , aymi cincuenta mil melyu naba platan̈e .
44019020	Hac tu' xin yu ispujnacan̈ Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , isyenicanilo yip Comam xol anma .
44019021	Yet lahwi yuni huntek'an tu' xin , yoc yin̈ isnabal naj Pablo isto yul ismajul Macedonia yeb yul ismajul Acaya , yebpaxo yul con̈ob Jerusal'en . Yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Chilahwi intoc'ojan bey Jerusal'en tu' , caw yilal intohan yul con̈ob Roma , ẍi naj .
44019022	Yuxin ischejto naj cawan̈ ebnaj yet munlawomal bey ismajul Macedonia ; ha' ton naj Timoteo yeb naj Erasto . Wal naj Pablo tu' xin , cancano naj hayebxa ixahaw bey ismajul Asia tu' .
44019023	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' , ah wejla anma howal yin̈ cuybanil yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Jes'us bey Efeso .
44019024	Yuto ay hune' naj chiyij Demetrio , chac'om plata naj , chiswatx'e naj yechel yatut hune' istioẍ anma chiyij Diana . Caw hantan̈e melyu chik' naj yeb ebnaj chimunla yin̈ hune' munil tu' .
44019025	Wal xin iscutxbayo naj sunil ebnaj ismunlawom yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj chichac'ni ch'en plata , yalni naj tet ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Wal tinan̈ hex wet munlawomal , caw heyohtaj ta caw ay melyu chijik' yin̈ hune' comunil ti' .
44019026	Yaj caw cheyila cat heyabenpaxo tzet lan̈an yalni naj Pablo . Tolab huntek'an tioẍ watx'ebil yu anma , caw mach diosoj . Caw xin hantaxa anma lan̈an yanico yanma yin̈ tzet chal naj . Maẍn̈etaj bey Efeso ti' , wal xin caw hantaxa anma ayco yinta naj bey sunil ismajul Asia ti' .
44019027	Caw xin ay ismay istan̈ilo hune' cotxon̈ ti' , yeb ay ismay matxa yelapno ch'eloco hune' yatut cotioẍ Diana yul sat anma , yebpaxo ch'elo ispixan cotioẍ Diana ti' , hune' caw ay yelapno yul sat anma ay yul ismajul Asia ti' yeb sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal , ẍi naj tet ebnaj tu' .
44019028	Hayet yaben ebnaj huntek'an ti' , caw titcano ishowal ebnaj sic'lebil . Yah yaw ebnaj yin̈ caw ip , yalni ebnaj : -- Caw aycano yelapno ix cotioẍ Diana han̈on̈ ayon̈ yul con̈ob Efeso ti' , ẍi ebnaj .
44019029	Hac tu' xin caw tit ishowal ebnaj , yah wejna anma sunil yul con̈ob tu' . Istzabnayo ebnaj hune' naj juẍta chiyij Gayo yeb hune'xa naj juẍta chiyij Aristarco . Ha' cawan̈ ebnaj ti' yul ismajul Macedonia tit ebnaj yinta juẍta Pablo . Yet istzablaxayo ebnaj tu' , ishatxlaxto ebnaj yul hune' niman sal'on .
44019030	Yoche naj Pablo ocoto tzotelo sata anma tu' , yaj mach chisje ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ta ch'octo naj .
44019031	Aypaxo haywan̈ ebnaj ayco yahawil yul ismajul Asia tu' , yamigo isba ebnaj yeb naj Pablo , ha' ebnaj anito ischejab tet naj Pablo ta mach ch'octo naj isyeb isba bey hune' sal'on tu' .
44019032	Ha' anma cutxanico tu' toxan̈e chiwejchahi , nanantaxan̈e chal anma yet chiawi yin̈ caw ip . Ec'bal yicta ebnaj xol anma tu' mach yohtajo tzet yin̈ yuxin iscutxbaco isba .
44019033	Yaja' xol anma tu' ayco hune' naj chiyij Alejandro , tenlaxicto naj sata sunil anma yu ebnaj yet Israelal . Lahwi tu' xin , isyeni naj yu isk'ab tet anma tato chislin̈ba yel yaw yu yoche naj yala' tet ebnaj ta mach yuho ebnaj Israel yuxin ay hune' howal tu' .
44019034	Yet yilni anma tato israelita naj , yah wejla anma yel yaw . Aymi cab orahil el yaw anma , chalni haca' ti' : -- Caw aycano yelapno ye ix Diana , cotioẍ han̈on̈ Efeso hon̈ ti' , ẍi ebnaj .
44019035	Haxa naj tz'iblom yul con̈ob tu' , lin̈ban yel yaw anma , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Hex wet con̈ob , sunil anma ohtan̈e tato han̈on̈ ayon̈ yul con̈ob Efeso ti' , han̈on̈ ay jip jalni tzet wal yuni yatut ix cotioẍ Diana , yeb hune' yechel ix titna yul satcan̈ .
44019036	Machi hunu mac chiyu yalni tato lek'ti'al ye hune' chiwalti'an , yuxin bejwe yel heyaw . Nawe heba yin̈ tzet chewatx'e haxinwal machi huno istx'ojal cheyiti teyiban̈ .
44019037	Yuto ha' ebnaj maxeyiti ti' , machi huno tzet xayelk'a ebnaj yul yatut ix codiosal ti' , machipaxo huno ebnaj ti' buchwa yin̈ ix .
44019038	Tato chiyoche naj Demetrio ti' yeb xin huntek'anxa ebnaj chac'om plata ti' yichecan̈ howal yin̈ hunu maca , chu isto ebnaj isk'ana' tet naj juez , cat iswatx'enayo ebnaj haca' chal yanma ebnaj .
44019039	Ta ayto tzet cheyoche hewatx'e' , halwe tet ebnaj yahaw con̈ob , cat islahti'n̈elaxi , cat iswatx'encano ebnaj sata sunil anma .
44019040	Yuto haca' mayu ti' , aytaxca tzet chisnacan̈ ebnaj ah Roma jin̈ , lan̈antaxca copaq'uico yin̈ ebnaj , yalni . ¿ Tzet ye huntek'an anma lan̈an iswejcha ti' ? ta ẍi ebnaj . ¿ Tzet chijute cotak'wi heyalni ? Haca' tu' matxa chu cocolni coba , ẍi naj tz'iblom tu' tet anma .
44019041	Yet lahwi yalni naj huntek'an ti' xin , istak'li naj tet anma tu' , ispaxto anma sunil .
44020001	Lahwi islin̈i hune' howal tu' , yawten naj Pablo ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yu yiptzencano naj ebnaj . Istak'licano naj tet ebnaj , islak'lenpaxo isba ebnaj , isto naj Pablo tu' yul ismajul Macedonia .
44020002	Caw sunil yulajla huntek'an con̈ob tu' ec' naj , yak'aco yip yanma ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yu tzoti' chal naj . Lahwi tu' xin , yapni naj yul ismajul Grecia .
44020003	Ha' bey tu' ec' naj oxeb ixahaw . Lan̈anxa xin yoc naj yul hune' te' barco chito bey ismajul Siria , yet yabenilo naj tato tx'oj chisna ebnaj Israel yin̈ naj . Yu hune' tu' , oc yin̈ isnabal naj ismeltzohi , yec'paxo naj yul ismajul Macedonia hunelxa .
44020004	Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj juẍta to yinta naj Pablo ; ha' ton naj S'opater ah Berea , yeb naj Aristarco , yeb naj Segundo ah Tesal'onica , yeb naj Gayo ah Derbe , yeb naj Timoteo , yebpaxo cawan̈ ebnaj ay bey Asia , naj T'iquico yeb naj Tr'ofimo .
44020005	Ha' ton ebnaj juẍta ti' babito cosatajan̈ , con̈yechmanan̈ ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Troas .
44020006	Walon̈an̈ xin , yet islahwicano k'in̈ yet chiwahlax ixim pan machi yan̈al , jocan̈ yul hune' te' barco yul con̈ob Filipos , yin̈xa ishoweb tz'ayic japnihan̈ isc'atan̈ ebnaj yul con̈ob Troas , cocancanojan̈ hujeb tz'ayic bey tu' .
44020007	Hayet babel tz'ayic yin̈ semana , cocutxban cobahan̈ yeb ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam cowahnihan̈ ixim pan yu conanitijan̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo . Yoc naj Pablo iscuywa yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios ; yaj yu caw yilal isto naj yin̈ isbel yin̈ hunxa tz'ayic , yuxin caw nimajal yute naj yoj cuybanile tu' , yapnicano yin̈ chuman ak'bal .
44020008	Cutxanon̈icojan̈ yul hune' cuarto nahat yecan̈ bay caw tzetc'a ch'en lampara caj k'a' yin̈ .
44020009	Ay xin hune' naj tzeh , Eutico isbi , tz'on̈an yul wentana ; yaj yu caw nimajal yute naj Pablo yoj cuybanile , yuxin tit iswayan̈ naj . Haxa yet caw chiway naj tu' xin , istitc'ay naj yin̈ yox piso tu' . Camomxa naj xin yet yilaxcan̈ naj .
44020010	Yuxin ayti naj Pablo tu' yay pajno naj yiban̈ naj tzeh tu' , yoc lak'no naj yin̈ naj , yalni naj tet ebnaj juẍta tu' haca' ti' : -- Mach chexxiwi , itzitz naj , ẍi naj .
44020011	Lahwi tu' xin yahpaxto naj Pablo yul cuarto hunelxa . Isk'axponayo naj ixim pan yu conanitijan̈ iscamical Comam , cowahnihan̈ ixim cosunilan̈ . Istzabnipaxico naj Pablo yalni cuybanile tu' hunelxa masanto yet issajbiloj . Lahwi tu' xin , isto naj .
44020012	Wal naj tzeh titc'ay tu' xin ; hulcan̈ isc'ul naj , yilaxto naj yatut . Caw occano tzalahilal yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj tu' .
44020013	Walon̈an̈ con̈babitojan̈ , jocan̈ yul hune' te' barco ch'apni bey con̈ob As'on , ha' tu' xin jechmahan̈ naj Pablo yuto hactic'a tu' jute jalnihan̈ , wal naj Pablo tu' belwito naj yu yoj .
44020014	Hayet yapni naj Pablo bey As'on , yoc naj yul barco jintajan̈ cotohan̈ yul con̈ob Mitilene .
44020015	Lahwi tu' xin jelpaxojan̈ bey tu' , yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' xin con̈ec'an̈ iscawil con̈ob Qu'io . Haxa yet hunxa tz'ayic japnihan̈ bey con̈ob Samos , haxapaxo yin̈ hunxa tz'ayic xin , japnicanojan̈ bey con̈ob Mileto .
44020016	Yaja' yal naj Pablo ta beh jec'an̈ bey Efeso yun̈e mach caw ch'ec' tiempo jiban̈an̈ yul ismajul Asia tu' , haxinwal ha' bey con̈ob Jerusal'en ayon̈an̈ yet ch'ayilo k'in̈ Pentecost'es , tato caw chiyuhi .
44020017	Hayet ayon̈an̈ yul con̈ob Mileto tu' , yanito naj Pablo yawtemal ebnaj anciano xol ebnaj juẍta ay yul con̈ob Efeso .
44020018	Hayet yapni ebnaj xin , yalni naj tet ebnaj : -- Hex ti' caw heyohta tzet yu wec'an texol , yeb tzet yu inmunlahan yettaxtic'a wulic'ojan bey Asia ti' .
44020019	Sunilbal tiempo yet wec'an texol , caw chewchotan̈e wute inbahan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios . Caw quinok'an yu isya'tajil hul wiban̈an , yu tzet iswatx'e ebnaj Israel win̈an .
44020020	Yaj maẍtic'a inbejan walnic'ojan cuybanile caw colwa teyin̈ , incuywapaxojan xol anma , yeb xin yulajla heyatut .
44020021	Waxan̈ca Israel maca mach Israeloj , lahan yu intzotelan tet . Walnihan tato yilal isbejnicano istx'ojal chiswatx'e , cat yanico isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
44020022	Wal tinan̈ xin , chintohan bey con̈ob Jerusal'en yuto hac tu' yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo wetan ; yaj caw mach wohtajojan tzet chihul wiban̈an bey tu' .
44020023	Caw cachann̈e wohtajan tato hayet chinapnihan yul hunun con̈ob , chiyalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo wetan tato chihul isya'tajil wiban̈an , cat walaxictojan yul preso .
44020024	Yaja' machi hunu ti' caw chi'ak'ni cabconocan̈ wanmahan ; waxan̈ca chincaman caw matzet chal inc'ulan . Tan̈e c'uxan ay inicojan yin̈ tzalahilal yet chilahwicano inmunilti'an , hune' ak'bil wetan yu Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , hune' inmunilan walnicojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam .
44020025	Caw quinec'an wala'cojan texol yin̈ tzet chu heyoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Tinan̈ xin , wohtajan tato matxa bak'inal chinheyilan hunelxa .
44020026	Yuxin chiwalan teyet tato maẍtajinan ay inmulan ta ay hunujex cheyetato heba .
44020027	Caw sunil wanmahan walicojan Istzoti' Comam Dios teyet . Machi xin hunu tzet ye tu' webahan yin̈ hesat .
44020028	Wal xin caw cheyil heba , cat xin heya'iln̈en ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , yuto ha' teyet yak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo hune' munil yin̈ heya'iln̈en ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , huntek'an mac islok' Comam Jesucristo yu ischiq'uil yet iscami .
44020029	Wal xin caw wohtajan tato hayet chintocanoti'an chihul huntek'anxa ebnaj chi'anico pohlebahil texol , haca' chiyute no' oj yet ch'octo no' yulaj ispeyabil no' me' cat ispujnacanto no' .
44020030	Texoltic'a ti' xin chi'aho huntek'anxa ebnaj , chihalnic'o lekti'al yun̈e yoc tzujnu mac chabilxa Comam yul yanma yinta ebnaj yalni .
44020031	Caw cheyil heba xin ; nawetij tato yin̈ oxeb habil , hunun tz'ayic yeb hunun ak'bal , caw quexwiptzenan hununex , ay tiempo caw quinok'an yet walnihan teyet .
44020032	Wal tinan̈ xin hex wuẍtaj , caw chexwaben̈ecantojan yul isk'ab Comam Dios , yeb xin yin̈ isc'ulch'anil Istzoti' Comam , yuto ay yip Comam quexyak'ni ch'ibo yin̈ Istzoti' , cat yak'nipaxo Comam hune' tzet halbilcano tet sunil mac sic'bilxalo yu Comam .
44020033	Wal inti'an , maẍtic'a wochehan wik'alojan hunu tzet ye tu' teyet , machi melyu , machipaxo xilk'ape ink'anan tet hunu maca .
44020034	Wal xin , caw heyohtaj tato caw quinmunlahan yun̈e wik'nihan tzet ch'ocnico wuhan yeb xin yin̈ tzet ch'ocnico yu ebnaj tzujan wintajan .
44020035	Yebilxa wuhan teyet ta hac tu' chu comunlahi , cat cocolwa yin̈ anma matzet aya . Caw xin yilal conaniti tzet yalcano Comam Jes'us , yet yalni Comam haca' ti' : " Ec'na caw c'ul yet anma chi'ak'ni sata anma chichahni , " ẍi Comam , ẍi naj Pablo .
44020036	Yet yalnicano naj Pablo hune' tu' , yay jahno naj yeb ebnaj anciano tu' , istxahli ebnaj tet Comam .
44020037	Sunil ebnaj juẍta tu' ok'i , islak'lencano isba ebnaj yeb naj Pablo tu' , istz'ohnipaxo ebnaj isk'otx naj .
44020038	Caw occano bisc'ulal yin̈ yanma ebnaj yuto yal naj Pablo tato matxa bak'in chiyil ebnaj yin̈ naj hunelxa . Lahwi tu' xin , isto ebnaj yak'nocano naj Pablo bay ch'oc naj yul te' barco .
44021001	Hayet janicanojan̈ ebnaj juẍta tu' xin , jocan̈ yul hune' te' barco , wiyom cotohan̈ bey yul ismajul hune' isla , Cos isbi . Haxa yet hunxa tz'ayic xin japnihan̈ bey yul ismajul Rodas . Lahwi tu' xin japnipaxojan̈ bey con̈ob P'atara .
44021002	Ha' bey P'atara tu' xin chaloyo hune' barco juhan̈ chito bey yul ismajul Fenicia , hac tu' xin yu jocan̈ yul te' cotohan̈ xin .
44021003	Hayet ayon̈icojan̈ yul te' barco tu' , jilnihan̈ iscancano tx'otx' Chipre ayayo xol ha' mar yin̈ comecan̈ . Wal te' barco tu' xin , ec' te' bey ismajul Siria yak'a'cano huntek'an ijatz bey yul hune' con̈ob chiyij Tiro , yuxin ha' tu' con̈canan̈ .
44021004	Ha' bey tu' xin jilayo cobahan̈ yeb huntek'an ebnaj juẍtaj . Caw xin hujeb tz'ayic con̈ec'an̈ isc'atan̈ ebnaj . Yalni ebnaj tet naj Pablo ta mach chito naj bey Jerusal'en , yuto hac tu' yu yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet ebnaj .
44021005	Yaja' yet yec'to hujeb tz'ayic tu' xin , jelan̈ bey tu' . Sunil ebnaj juẍtaj yeb yixal yeb yuninal hul con̈anocanojan̈ istxam con̈ob bey isti' ha' mar , ha' tu' xin con̈ay jahnojan̈ cotxahlihan̈ tet Comam Dios .
44021006	Colak'lenayo cobahan̈ cotak'licanojan̈ jetan̈ hununon̈an̈ , lahwi tu' xin jahcantojan̈ yul te' barco , ispaxcanto ebnaj juẍta tu' yatut .
44021007	Jelan̈ yul con̈ob Tiro , japnihan̈ yul con̈ob Tolemaida . Ha' bey tu' xin con̈elcanojan̈ yul te' barco , cok'ambehan̈ hanic' ye ebnaj juẍta sunil . Cocancanojan̈ isc'atan̈ ebnaj hune' tz'ayic .
44021008	Haxa yet hunxa tz'ayic xin jelan̈ yeb naj Pablo bey tu' , japnihan̈ yul con̈ob Cesarea , cotohan̈ yatut naj Felipe , naj chihalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo , naj oclena di'aconohal xol ebnaj hujwan̈ yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , ha' bey tu' xin con̈cancanojan̈ isc'atan̈ naj .
44021009	Wal naj Felipe tu' xin , ay can̈wan̈ iscutz'in naj maẍto yichamil , ha' ebix ti' xin chihalni cuybanile chischah tet Comam Dios .
44021010	Hayet ayxana japnihan̈ bey tu' , yapni hune' naj chiyij Agabo coc'atan̈an̈ , tit naj yul ismajul Judea . Naj ti' , chiyalpaxo naj tzoti' chischah tet Comam Dios .
44021011	Hayet yapni naj con̈istucle'an̈ tu' , yinilo naj istx'ambal naj Pablo yin̈ yictaj , isc'alnayo naj yoj yeb isk'ab yu hune' tx'ambale tu' , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Comam Esp'iritu Santo chihalni tato yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , hac ti' chiyub isc'allaxayo naj yahaw hune' tx'ambale ti' yu ebnaj Israel , cat yalaxico naj yul isk'ab ebnaj mach Israeloj , ẍi Comam wetan , ẍi naj .
44021012	Hayet jabenan̈ yeb ebnaj ay bey Cesarea yin̈ tzet yal naj tu' , jocan̈ jalnojan̈ tet naj Pablo tato mach chito naj bey Jerusal'en .
44021013	Yaj xin tak'wi naj Pablo : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxin chexok'i , cat heyanico bisc'ulal yin̈ wanmahan ? Wal inti'an caw hinaninan , waxan̈ca chinisc'albahan ebnaj , walca xin chinmak'laxpaxo camojan yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , yaj yu walnic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , ẍi naj Pablo jetan̈ .
44021014	Yaj yu mach chi'ay isc'ul naj juhan̈ , yuxin jalan̈ tet naj haca' ti' : -- Yubojab haca' tzet choche isc'ul Comam Dios tawin̈ , con̈chihan̈ .
44021015	Lahwi yec'ayo hayeb tz'ayic cowatx'enayo jetan̈ , cotohan̈ yul con̈ob Jerusal'en .
44021016	Ay xin huntek'an ebnaj juẍta ay bey con̈ob Cesarea topaxo jintajan̈ . Japnihan̈ bey yatut naj Mnas'on , hune' naj ti' ah Chipre naj . Payxa xin oc naj yul isk'ab Comam . Ha' isc'atan̈ naj tu' xin con̈cancanojan̈ wayoj .
44021017	Hayet japnihan̈ yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , caw tzalahilal yu con̈ischahnihan̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yin̈ Comam .
44021018	Haxa hunxa tz'ayic xin cotohan̈ yeb naj Pablo , cotuclenojan̈ naj Jacobo . Caw xin cutxanico ebnaj juẍta anciano yet japnihan̈ bey tu' .
44021019	Isk'amben naj Pablo tu' hanic' ye isc'ul ebnaj . Lahwi tu' xin yoc naj yalno yin̈ hununtajil yin̈ tzettaj isc'ulal iswatx'e Comam Dios xol ebnaj mach Israeloj yu ismunil naj Pablo tu' .
44021020	Hayet yaben ebnaj tu' xin , yak'ni tzalaho yanma yin̈ Comam Dios . Lahwi tu' xin yalni ebnaj tet naj Pablo haca' ti' : -- Caw c'ul wuẍtaj , yaja' hawohtaj tato caw yin̈xa ismilal ebnaj jet Israel ti' xayaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , yaja' sunil ebnaj chihalni ta caw yilal coyijen isley naj Mois'es .
44021021	Yabe ebnaj isk'umal tato yet chaẍec' hacuyno anma Israel pujanto xol anma mach Israeloj , tolab chawala tato matxa yechtoho chisyije ebnaj tzet chal isley naj Mois'es , yeb xin ta matxa yilalo ch'ak'lax circuncidar niẍte isc'ahol ebnaj , mach yilalopaxo isyijelax cobeybal , han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti' , hawalni .
44021022	¿ Tzet xin wal juten hune' ti' ? Wal tinan̈ caw chiabelaxiloj tato ayachxac'o bey ti' .
44021023	Tinan̈ xin yije huntek'an chijalti'an̈ , coxol ti' ayxac'o can̈wan̈ ebnaj caw yilal isyijen hune' tzet halbilxa yu .
44021024	Ito ebnaj tawintaj , cat heto hesajn̈eno heba haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es , cat xin hatohlan sunil tzet chocnico yu ebnaj , lahwi tu' xin , cat yak'ni elo ebnaj xil iswi' . Hac tu' xin chu istxumnilo sunil anma tato lek'ti'al sunil chihallax tawin̈ tu' , walxinto chayepaxo yila' anma tato chayije isley naj Mois'es .
44021025	Wal ebnaj mach Israeloj , ebnaj xachahni Comam yul yanma , xajaltojan̈ yin̈ hune' te' carta tet ebnaj ta mach yechto chisyije ebnaj hune' ti' , cachann̈e huntek'an cuybanile chihalni haca'ti' . Mach chisc'ux ebnaj chibe haltebilxa yin̈ xahanbalil tet tioẍ , yeb xin mach chislo ebnaj no' chic' , yebpaxo mach chub isc'uxu' ebnaj ischibehal no nok' chishojtx'an̈e isba , maca ton̈e chiwok'laxilo isnuk' . Mach chiixli ebnaj winaj , mach chiwinajlipaxo ebix ix . Hac tu' jute jalnitojan̈ yin̈ cocartatu'an̈ .
44021026	Hac tu' xin yu yilaxto ebnaj can̈wan̈ tu' yu naj Pablo . Haxa yet hunxa tz'ayic xin , issajn̈en isba naj yeb ebnaj , haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es . Lahwi tu' xin , yocto naj yul yatut Comam Dios yu yalni naj bak'in chilahwi isyijen ebnaj hune' haltebilcano yu tet Comam Dios , yeb xin tzet tz'ayical chiyak' hunun ebnaj isxahanbal tet Comam .
44021027	Yaja' yet lan̈anxa islahwi hujeb tz'ayic xin , ay huntek'an ebnaj Israel ay yul ismajul Asia , ilni naj Pablo yul yatut Comam tu' , yoc ebnaj ak'oc'ule tet sunil anma , hac tu' xin yu yah wejla anma yin̈ naj Pablo , isto lemna ebnaj istzabnoyo naj .
44021028	Yah yaw ebnaj yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' : -- ¡ Hex wet con̈ob Israel , colwahan̈we jin̈an̈ ! Ha' hune' naj ti' ch'ec' cuywal yin̈ anma yulajla con̈ob . Chalni naj ta matzet ch'ocnico cocon̈ob Israel ti' , yeb xin chal naj ta matzet ch'ocnico isley naj Mois'es , yeb xin caw tx'oj istzotelpaxo naj yin̈ yatut Comam Dios ti' . Wal tinan̈ xin , mayicto naj huntek'an ebnaj griego yul yatut Comam ti' , yuxin lan̈an yetaxto yatut Comam caw sajcano ti' , ẍi ebnaj .
44021029	Hac tu' yute yalni ebnaj yuto yil ebnaj yec' naj Pablo yet yalan̈tocano yeb naj Tr'ofimo yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ; naj ti' ah con̈ob Efeso naj . Ha' yute isnani ebnaj to yicto naj Pablo hune' naj mach Israelo yul yatut Comam Dios , yaj machoj .
44021030	Caw sunil anma ay yul con̈ob tu' ah wejnahi . Istit ebnaj yin̈ an̈e , istzabnoyo ebnaj naj Pablo tu' , ishatxnilti ebnaj naj yul yatut Comam Dios . Caw yin̈ an̈e xin pebalaxcano ispultahil yatut Comam tu' .
44021031	Caw lan̈anxa iscam naj yu ebnaj , yet yapni hune' tzoti' tet naj comandante , yahawil yeco yin̈ ebnaj soldado ah Roma tato caw sunil anma ay yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ah wejnahi .
44021032	Hac tu' xin yu iscutxbanico naj comandante tu' ebnaj soldado yeb huntek'an ebnaj oficiales , isto ebnaj yin̈ an̈e yilno bay chiwejcha anma tu' . Hayet yilni anma naj comandante yeb issoldado , isbejni ebnaj ismak'ni naj Pablo tu' .
44021033	Ishitzico naj comandante isc'atan̈ naj Pablo , istzabnayo naj naj Pablo tu' . Yalni naj tato chic'allaxayo naj yu cabeb ch'en cadena . Lahwi tu' xin yoc naj comandante isk'amben tet anma : -- ¿ Mac najil hune' ti' ? ¿ Tzet masmuln̈e naj ? ẍi naj tet anma tu' .
44021034	Wal anma tu' xin , nanantaxan̈e chiyala . Matxatic'a chiyu yaben naj comandante tzet chiyal anma tu' isyayil toxan̈e chiwejchahi . Lahwi tu' , yalni naj tet ebnaj soldado ta chi'ilaxto naj Pablo yul cuartel .
44021035	Hayet yapni ebnaj yeb naj Pablo tu' yin̈ isk'ochal cuartel , isbatxnahto ebnaj soldado naj Pablo , yuto caw aytoco ishowal anma yin̈ naj .
44021036	Sunil anma tzujan yinta ebnaj , toxan̈e chiwejchahi , chiyalnipaxo anma yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' : -- Mak'bil iscam naj tinan̈ , ẍixan̈e anma tu' .
44021037	Yet lan̈anxa yanicto ebnaj naj Pablo tu' yul cuartel , yalni naj tet naj comandante , yahawil ebnaj soldado tu' : -- ¿ Chimyu intzotelninojan tawet ? ẍi naj . Yalni naj comandante tu' : -- ¿ Chimyu hawalni abxubal griego ? ẍi naj .
44021038	Yalnipaxo naj : -- ¿ Machmi taj ach ti' naj ay bey Egipto , naj anico howal yin̈ naj jahaw yet tolto ti' , naj cutxbanayo can̈eb mil ebnaj potx'om anma yinito naj ebnaj bey tx'otx' desierto ? ẍi naj .
44021039	Istak'wican̈ naj Pablo tu' : -- Haninti'an Israel inan . Yul con̈ob Tarso quinpitzc'ahan , hune' con̈ob caw niman yelapno yul ismajul Cilicia . Wal tinan̈ xin ta chaje chintzotelninojan tet anma ti' , ẍi naj tet naj comandante tu' .
44021040	Yalni naj comandante haca' ti' : -- C'ultic'a , chisje hatzoteli , ẍi naj . Yah lin̈no naj yiban̈ isk'ochal cuartel tu' , isyenican̈ naj isk'ab yun̈e matxa chitzotel anma . Haxa yet matxa hunu mac chitzoteli yoc naj tzotelo yul abxubal hebreo , yalni naj haca' ti' :
44022001	-- Hex wet con̈ob , yeb hex iswi'ehal yin̈ cocon̈ob ti' , abewe nino tzet chiwalan incolbanilojan .
44022002	Hayet yaben anma tato yin̈ yabxubal ebnaj Israel chitzotel naj , isbejni ebnaj yel yaw , matxa hunu mac tzoteli . Yalni naj Pablo tu' haca' ti' :
44022003	-- Haninti'an Israel inan , quinpitzc'ahan yul con̈ob Tarso ay yul ismajul Cilicia , yaja' quinch'ibcan̈an yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ti' . Ha' xin naj Gamaliel quincuynihan haca'tic'a isley ebnaj ichamta jichmam . Yuxin yin̈ sunil wanmahan inyijenan isley Comam Dios haca'tic'a cheyute hex ti' tinan̈ .
44022004	Yet yalan̈tocanoj caw ec'ya' yanma anma chihalnic'o hune' ac' cuybanile ti' wuhan . Ay bay inpotx'camojan anma tu' , ay bay intzabayojan ebnaj winaj yeb ebix ix winitojan yul te' preso .
44022005	Yaja' naj yahawil ebnaj sacerdote , yeb xin sunil ebnaj iswi'ehal con̈ob yin̈ lahti' xol ebnaj Israel , caw testigo ebnaj yin̈ hune' tu' yuto ha' ebnaj ak'ni huntek'an carta wetan yu winitojan tet ebnaj jet con̈ob ay yul con̈ob Damasco . Intohan bey tu' xin , yun̈e insaynayojan ebnaj xachahnayto Comam Jesucristo yul yanma , winitijan ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ti' yu yak'lax ec'oya' yanma ebnaj .
44022006	Yaja' hayet ayinicojan yin̈ bel xin , yet lan̈anxa wapnihan yul con̈ob Damasco , yin̈mi chuman , yin̈ ha'mataj istit jopla hune' issajilk'inal win̈an yul satcan̈ caw aycano yip .
44022007	Wayc'ayan sat tx'otx' . Lahwi tu' xin wabenan hune' yul nuk'e halni huntek'an tzoti' haca' ti' : " Saulo , Saulo , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxin chawak' ec'oya' wanmahan ? " ẍi wetan .
44022008	Ink'ambenan haca' ti' : " ¿ Mac hach anmahil Mamin ? " quinchiyan . Yalni wetan xin : " Haninti'an Jes'us inan ah Nazaret , hune' ayachico hawak'ni ec'oya' yanma ti' , " ẍi wetan .
44022009	Huntek'an ebnaj tzujan wintajan caw yil ebnaj hune' issajilk'inal tu' , isxiwcan̈ ebnaj , yaj machi yabe ebnaj huntek'an tzoti' hallax wettu'an .
44022010	Lahwi tu' xin ink'ambenan haca' ti' : " ¿ Tzet wal wuten inbahan Mamin ? " quinchiyan . Yalni Comam wetan haca' ti' : " Ahan̈wanoj , cat xin hato yul con̈ob Damasco , ha' tu' xin chihallaxo tawet tzet wal hawuten haba , " ẍi Comam wetan .
44022011	Yaj caw tan̈ilo inmujlubalan yu yip hune' issajilk'inal tu' , yuxin haxa ebnaj wetbihan octo yalan̈ ink'aban , quinyinitojan ebnaj yul con̈ob Damasco .
44022012	Ha' tu' xin ay hune' naj Anan'ias isbi , caw yijemcano naj yin̈ isley naj Mois'es . Caw xin sunil ebnaj ah Israel ay yul con̈ob Damasco , caw c'ul istzotel yin̈ naj .
44022013	Ha' xin naj Anan'ias tu' apni quinistucle'an . Hayet yoc lin̈no naj inc'atan̈an yalni naj wetan : " Wuẍta Saulo , hajlohojab hasat hunelxa , " ẍi naj wetan . Yin̈n̈ena tu' xin ishajlo insatan , inhacxicojan yin̈ naj .
44022014	Yalni naj wetan : " Ha' isDiosal ebnaj jichmam , macachsaynicoj yun̈e hawohtan̈enilo tzet chiyoche yanma Comam , yeb yu hawilni Isc'ahol Comam Dios caw tohol isnabal , yeb xin hawabenpaxo yul isnuk' .
44022015	Hach xin chawak'aco haba hawalnoc'o Comam tet sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , cat xin hawalnopaxo tzettaj hawilah yeb xin tzet hawabepaxoj .
44022016	Wal tinan̈ xin , ¿ tzet chawechma ? Ahan̈wanoj , ahojab ha' hawi' . Aco hawanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo haxinwal chitx'ahlaxcanilo sunil hamul , " ẍi naj Anan'ias tu' wetan , ẍi naj Pablo .
44022017	Yalnipaxo naj Pablo : -- Hayet inmeltzotijan yul con̈ob Jerusal'en xin , intohan yul yatut Comam Dios txahloj , isyenico isba Comam yin̈ insatan yin̈ sajsatil .
44022018	Wilnihan yin̈ Comam , yalni Comam wetan haca'ti' : " Chalahico hawel yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ti' , yuto mach chiyabeto ebnaj bey ti' tzettaj chawal win̈an , " ẍi Comam .
44022019	Lahwi tu' xin walnihan : " Mamin , caw yohta ebnaj tato caw quinec'an yulaj capilla intzabayojan anma chabil hachxa yu , cat winitojan yul te' preso , inmak'nipaxojan .
44022020	Yeb xin yet isk'ojlax camo naj Esteban hachejab , naj caw cachhalnic'o tet anma ; han-hun-inan lin̈anintojan xol ebnaj , walnipaxojan tato chipotx'lax hachejab tu' . Wocpaxojan intan̈enojan xil isk'ap ebnaj k'ojni camo naj Esteban tu' , " quinchiyan tet Comam .
44022021	Yaj xin yal Comam wetan haca' ti' : " Asi' xin , yuto nahat chaẍwatojan . Hata xol ebnaj mach Israelo chaẍto quinhawalac'ojan , " ẍi Comam wetan , ẍi naj Pablo tu' .
44022022	Ha' yin̈ tu' xin , cachna yaben ebnaj tzet yal naj Pablo , istzabnico ebnaj yalni yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' : -- ¡ Camojab naj ! ¡ Matxa yeto ay ischahni isk'inal naj ti' tinan̈ ! ẍi ebnaj .
44022023	Yaj caw islahico ebnaj yel yaw , chistzilnilo ebnaj xil isk'ap , chispulnipaxocan̈ ebnaj pojoj cat istiẍnican̈ ebnaj satcan̈ yu ishowal .
44022024	Yuxin yal naj comandante romano tu' tato chi'alaxicto naj yul cuartel , yalnipaxo naj tato chihatelax naj Pablo tu' yun̈e yalnahti naj tzet yin̈ yuxin hac tu' yel yaw anma Israel tu' yin̈ naj .
44022025	Yaja' yet c'albilxayo naj Pablo tu' yun̈e ishatelax naj , yalni naj tet hune' naj capit'an ayayo iscawilal tu' : -- ¿ Tom caw ay heyip quinhehatenan ? Haninti'an romano inan , yebpaxo xin maẍto chek'ambe tzet inmulan , ẍi naj Pablo tet hune' naj capit'an tu' .
44022026	Hayet yaben naj capit'an hune' tu' , isto naj yalno tet naj comandante haca' ti' : -- Caw nann̈e hawu yin̈ tzet chawatx'e yuto hune' naj ti' caw romano naj , ẍi naj .
44022027	Lahwi tu' xin istit naj comandante isc'atan̈ naj Pablo , isk'amben naj haca' ti' : -- ¿ Tom yeli romano hach ? ẍi naj . Istak'wi naj Pablo : -- Ho' , caw romano inan , ẍi naj .
44022028	Yalni naj comandante tu' xin : -- Haninti'an , caw hanta melyu inc'aytzehan yet wocan romanohal , ẍi naj . Yalnipaxo naj Pablo tu' tet naj : -- Walinan to caw romanotic'a yu inpitzc'atijan , ẍi naj .
44022029	Yu hune' tu' xin isheq'uilo isba ebnaj soldado etza mak'ni naj Pablo tu' . Hacpax tu' xin naj comandante , yet yaben naj tato caw romano naj Pablo , isxiwcan̈ naj yuto ha' naj chejni alaxoco ch'en cadena yin̈ naj Pablo tu' .
44022030	Haxa yet hune'xa tz'ayic xin , yoche naj comandante tu' yabe tzet caw ismul naj Pablo tet ebnaj Israel , yuxin yilo naj ch'en cadena yin̈ naj Pablo tu' , yawten naj ebnaj yahawil ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj iswi'ehal yin̈ lahti' xol ebnaj Israel tu' . Lahwi tu' xin yilaxilti naj Pablo yu naj , yalaxico naj sata ebnaj yu naj comandante tu' .
44023001	Yoc t'an̈no naj Pablo yin̈ ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ lahti' , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Hex wet con̈ob , sunilxa tiempo xa'elto wiban̈an caw toholn̈etic'a innabalan , hacpax tu' tinan̈ , caw c'ul inbeybalan sata Comam Dios , ẍi naj tet ebnaj .
44023002	Yalni xin naj Anan'ias , naj yahawil ebnaj sacerdote , tet ebnaj ayayo iscawilal naj Pablo , tato chisch'atico ebnaj isti' naj .
44023003	Yaj xin tak'wican̈ naj Pablo tu' haca' ti' : -- ¡ Ha' Comam Dios chaẍmak'noj , yuto caw lek'ti' hach ! Lahanach haca' hunu bitz'ab ayco istxohal , tz'on̈anach bey tu' yu hawilni tzet chinelicojan haca' yalni ley hawalni , yaja' xin mach chayije tzet chal coley yuto chachejti ebnaj ti' quinismak'a'an , ẍi naj .
44023004	Yalni ebnaj ayayo iscawilal naj tu' : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin hac tu' chawute hawalni yin̈ ya' yahawil issacerdote Comam Dios ti' ? ẍi ebnaj .
44023005	Yalnipaxo naj Pablo tu' xin : -- Hex wet con̈ob , caw mach wohtajojan tato ha' naj ti' yahawil yehico yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote . Wal xin chiyal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Mach chawal tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ hunu naj yahawil con̈ob , " ẍiayoj , ẍi naj .
44023006	Haxa yet yilni naj Pablo tato ay ebnaj saduceo , aypaxo ebnaj fariseo cutxanico bey tu' , yalni naj yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' : -- Hex wet con̈ob , haninti'an fariseo inan , fariseopaxo Inmaman . Tinan̈ xin , caw cheyila tzet chinelicojan heyalni , yuto chiwalan tato chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom , ẍi naj tet ebnaj .
44023007	Hayet yalni naj Pablo hune' tu' xin , yoc ebnaj fariseo yeb ebnaj saduceo isbuchlen isba , hac tu' xin yu ispohni isba ebnaj .
44023008	Yuto ebnaj saduceo tu' , chiyal ebnaj tato mach chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom , chiyalnipaxo ebnaj tato machi ebnaj 'angel , yeb ta machi esp'iritu . Wal ebnaj fariseo , caw chayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ sunil huntek'an cuybanile ti' .
44023009	Caw xin wejchacan̈ ebnaj istzoteli . Yahwano huntek'an ebnaj chicuywa yin̈ isley naj Mois'es ayco yin̈ ispartido ebnaj fariseo , yalni ebnaj : -- Hune' naj ti' , machi hunu istx'ojal chiswatx'e naj . Chalotaxca hunu esp'iritu maca hunu 'angel chi'ak'ni yala' naj , wal xin caw mach chiyu janico cohowal yin̈ Comam Dios , ẍi ebnaj .
44023010	Caw nimajal elcanico yoj hune' howal tu' , yuxin xiwcan̈ naj comandante , yu chalo isxitnito ebnaj naj Pablo tu' . Hac tu' xin yu yanito naj yik'omal ebnaj soldado yun̈e yilaxilo naj Pablo xol anma , yilaxto naj hunelxa yul cuartel .
44023011	Haxa yet hunxa ak'bal xin , isyeni isba Comam tet naj Pablo , yalni haca' ti' : -- Pablo , mach chaẍxiwi , yuto haca' chiyu quinhawalnic'ojan yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ti' , hac tu' chiyu quinhawalnipaxic'ojan bey yul con̈ob Roma , ẍi Comam .
44023012	Haxa yet hunxa tz'ayic , ay huntek'an ebnaj Israel islahti'n̈e isba ispotx'ni camo naj Pablo tu' . Yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Machon̈ wa'an̈ masanto chicam naj Pablo juhan̈ . Ta mach chij isba xin , yak'abti Comam Dios istz'acti' jiban̈an̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
44023013	Ec'bal cuarenta ebnaj istak'weco hune' tu' yin̈ .
44023014	Isto ebnaj tet ebnaj yahawil sacerdote yeb xin tet ebnaj ichamta winaj iswi'ehal yeco xol ebnaj Israel , yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Walon̈ti'an̈ xajalan̈ yabe' Comam Dios tato machi nich'ano tzet chicolohan̈ masanto chiyij isba iscam naj Pablo juhan̈ , ta mach xin chiyati Comam istz'acti' jiban̈an̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
44023015	Yalnipaxo ebnaj : -- Wal tinan̈ xin , hex ti' yeb ebya' iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ lahti' , halwe tet naj comandante romano tato chiyati naj naj Pablo tu' yin̈ hesat hecal , yuto caw ayto nich'anxa tzet chicok'ambehan̈ tet naj yin̈ caw nan̈c'ulal , quexchi . Walon̈an̈ xin , ayon̈xayojan̈ isti' beh , cat copotx'nihan̈ naj yet maẍto chihul naj tec'atan̈ bey ti' , ẍi ebnaj .
44023016	Yaj xin c'uxan yabenilo yunin ix yanab naj Pablo hune' yal ebnaj tu' , isto naj yalno tet naj Pablo yul cuartel .
44023017	Yawten naj Pablo tu' hune' naj capit'an , yalni naj tet naj haca' ti' : -- Ito hune' naj tzeh ti' isc'atan̈ naj comandante , yuto ay hune' caw yilal yalni naj tet naj , ẍi naj .
44023018	Hac tu' xin yu yinito naj capit'an tu' naj tzeh isc'atan̈ naj comandante , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Naj Pablo ayco preso , maquinawtenan , mayalni naj wetan tato chiwitijan hune' naj tzeh ti' tac'atan̈ , yuto ay hune' tzet caw yilal yalni naj tawet , ẍi naj capit'an tu' .
44023019	Hac tu' xin yu isxecnito naj comandante tu' naj nich'an tzeh bay machi mac ch'abeni , isk'amben naj tet naj : -- ¿ Tzet chawoche hawala' wetan ? ẍi naj .
44023020	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni naj tzeh tu' : -- Maslahti'n̈e isba ebnaj Israel tato chiyal ebnaj tawet ta chawito naj Pablo yet hecal yin̈ sat ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ lahti' , yuto ayto tzet chisk'ambe ebnaj tet naj yin̈ caw nanc'ulal yalni .
44023021	Yaj mach chawayto yul hawanma yin̈ tzet chiyal ebnaj , yuto ec'bal cuarenta yetbi ebnaj ebabil isba isti' beh yechman yec'to naj , yuto xayawte ebnaj isbi Comam Dios yin̈ ta mach chiwa' ebnaj masanto chispotx' camo ebnaj naj Pablo tu' . Ta mach xin chiyati Comam Dios istz'acti' yiban̈ ebnaj yalni . Wal tinan̈ xin , caw toxan̈e chiyechma ebnaj tzet chawute hawalni , ẍi naj tzeh tu' .
44023022	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni naj comandante tet naj tato machi mac tet chiyal naj hune' tzet bey naj yala' tu' ; ischejlaxtopaxo naj nich'an tzeh tu' .
44023023	Hac tu' xin yu yawten naj comandante tu' cawan̈ ebnaj capit'an , yalni naj tet ebnaj tato chiswatx'e isba cab ciento ebnaj soldado chito yu yoj , setenta ebnaj chito yiban̈ cheh , cab cientopaxo ebnaj chiyik' islanza , yuto yin̈ ch'en balon̈eb yahbal ak'bal chito sunil ebnaj tu' yul con̈ob Cesarea .
44023024	Yalnipaxo naj tato chiak'lax listohal hayc'on̈o no' cheh bay chi'ahto naj Pablo tu' , yebpaxo tato caw chisya'iln̈e ebnaj naj yul beh , haxinwal caw naj Pablo tu' yet chialaxico naj yul isk'ab naj gobernador F'elix yu ebnaj .
44023025	Yanito naj hune' carta tet naj gobernador F'elix yinta ebnaj , chalni haca' ti' :
44023026	" Hanin Claudio Lisias inti'an , chiwatojan hune' carta ti' tawet mam gobernador F'elix , chiwalnitojan tawet ta chawil haba yin̈ hacawil .
44023027	Hune' naj chiyij Pablo ti' , ha' ebnaj Israel tzabn̈eayo naj , caw xin lan̈anxa iscam naj yu ebnaj , yaja' hayet wabenan tato romano naj intohan yeb insoldadohan incolnolojan naj .
44023028	Yaj yu wochen wabe'an tzet ismul naj , yuxin witojan naj sata ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ lahti' xol ebnaj Israel .
44023029	Hac tu' xin yu wabenan tato yu isley ebnaj yuxin istzabayo ebnaj naj , yaj mach chu ispotx'ni ebnaj naj yu hune' tu' , maca ismajipaxo naj .
44023030	Yaj yu mawabehan tato saybilxa yu ebnaj Israel ti' tzet chiyu ispotx'ni camo ebnaj naj , yuxin chiwatojan naj tawet . Xa-xin-walan tet ebnaj k'ann̈e yin̈ naj tu' tato ha' tu' chito ebnaj yala' tawet tzet ismul naj tet ebnaj . Han̈e ti' xin inchejbanilan tawet , mam gobernador , " ẍi naj yul iscarta tu' .
44023031	Hac tu' xin yu isyijen ebnaj soldado ischejbanil ak'lax tet , yinito ebnaj naj Pablo yet ak'balil , yapni ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Ant'ipatris .
44023032	Haxa yet hunxa tz'ayic xin ismeltzocanti ebnaj soldado belwito yu yoj yul cuartel , wal ebnaj yiban̈ cheh aycan̈ xin , ocpaxo ebnaj yin̈ bel yeb naj Pablo tu' .
44023033	Hayet yapni ebnaj bey yul con̈ob Cesarea xin , yak'ni ebnaj te' carta yeb naj Pablo tu' tet naj gobernador .
44023034	Lahwi yilni naj gobernador tzet chiyal te' carta tu' , isk'amben naj tzet con̈obal naj Pablo . Hayet yaben naj tato ah Cilicia naj xin ,
44023035	yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Chiwabehan tzet chawala , yaj hulujabto ebnaj k'ann̈e tawin̈ , ẍi naj tet naj . Lahwi tu' xin yalni naj tato chitan̈elax naj Pablo tu' yu ebnaj soldado yul hune' palacio watx'ebil yu naj Herodes yet payat .
44024001	Howebxa tz'ayic yapni naj Pablo yul con̈ob Cesarea , yapnipaxo naj Anan'ias , yahawil yeco yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote , yeb huntek'an ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ ebnaj Israel , yeb xin hune' naj licenciado , T'ertulo isbi . Ha' ebnaj ti' xin apni yin̈ sat naj gobernador ak'oc'ule yin̈ naj Pablo .
44024002	Hayet yilaxti naj , istzabnico naj T'ertulo tu' yoc ak'oc'ule yin̈ naj Pablo tet naj gobernador F'elix haca' ti' : -- Yuch'andios tawet mam gobernador , hawu yuxin ay ak'anc'ulal coxolan̈ . Caw xin sunil tzet chawatx'e caw c'ul yu caw ay hanabal .
44024003	Caw yeli sunil bay chijabehan̈ hac'ulal yeb xin sunil isc'ulal tzettaj chawatx'e mam F'elix , caw yuch'andios tawet yin̈ sunil .
44024004	Yaj yu machi caw chiwilojan hatiempo , caw chink'anan tawet ta chawabe tzet chiwalan hunepoj .
44024005	Hune' naj ti' , caw yeli caw ch'etlicano naj jin̈an̈ yuto caw sunil bay ch'ec' naj ak'oc'ule tet anma , ayco naj ispohnito ebnaj Israel . Caw xin iswi'ehal yeco naj yin̈ hune' majan ebnaj ayco yinta hune' naj ah Nazaret .
44024006	Yebpaxo yetato naj yatut Comam Dios ; yuto yicto naj huntek'an ebnaj mach Israelo yul yatut Comam , yuxin cotzabayojan̈ naj yun̈e yay nino isya'tajil yiban̈ naj haca' yalni coleyan̈ .
44024007	Yaj xin yaco isba naj comandante Lisias xol , istzicnilo naj naj Pablo ti' jetan̈ .
44024008	Yalni naj tato ebnaj k'ann̈e yin̈ naj ti' , tawet chihul ebnaj yala' . Hach caw ach xin chisje hak'amben tet naj , cat xin hawohtan̈enilo tato caw yel chijalan̈ , ẍi naj T'ertulo tu' .
44024009	Ha' hun ebnaj Israel tzujan yinta naj T'ertulo chihalni tato caw yel sunil huntek'an tu' .
44024010	Lahwi tu' xin , yak'ni naj gobernador tu' yechel tet naj Pablo yun̈e istzotel naj , yalni naj Pablo tu' haca' ti' : -- Mam gobernador , caw chintzalahan chincolni inbahan yin̈ hasat , yuto caw wohtajan tato hach ti' caw payxa cachoc yahawil yin̈ tx'otx' Israel ti' .
44024011	Yaj caw chisje hak'ambeniloj ta caw yel tzet chiwalti'an ; caw cablahon̈ebixto tz'ayic wapnihan yul con̈ob Jerusal'en winoyo inbahan tet Comam Dios .
44024012	Yaj machi hunu mac chiyu yalni ta inteyele inbahan yeb hunu maca nitam wijbanan hunu mac yin̈ howal yul yatut Comam Dios , maca yulajla capilla maca yul con̈ob .
44024013	Huntek'an ebnaj ti' matzet tz'aj yak'baln̈e ebnaj tato caw yeli inmulan huntek'an chisbalcan ebnaj win̈ti'an .
44024014	Yaj chiwalan , to ayinicojan inyijenan tzet chiyal isDiosal jichmaman̈ , haca'tic'a yalni hune' ac' cuybanile , ha' xin chiyal ebnaj ti' tato nan yehi . Chiwapaxaytojan yul wanmahan sunil ley ak'bilcano tet jichmaman̈ naj Mois'es , yeb sunil tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcanayo yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat .
44024015	Caw xin chicawxi wanmahan yin̈ Comam Dios haca'tic'a ebnaj ti' , yin̈ tato chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom , anma c'ul yeb xin anma tx'ojpaxoj .
44024016	Yu ton hune' tu' , yuxin caw ayn̈etic'aco yin̈ innabalan inwatx'enan isc'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yeb yul sat anma .
44024017	Lahwi hayeb habil wec'an yulaj con̈ob xin , inmeltzotojan yul incon̈oban yun̈e incolwahan yin̈ anma meba' yeb xin wak'nipaxojan wofrendahan tet Comam Dios .
44024018	Ha' huntek'an ti' lan̈an inwatx'enan yet yapni huntek'an ebnaj Israel ay yul ismajul Asia yul yatut Comam tu' yet lahwi insajn̈encano inbahan tet Comam haca' yalni coleyan̈ . Haywan̈n̈e ebnaj ayicto yul yatut Comam tu' , caw xin machi nich'ano howal jak'an̈ .
44024019	Ha' xin ebnaj ah Asia tu' , yilal yul bey ti' yalno tzet inmulan , tato yeli aytic'a tzet chiyaco ebnaj inmulojan .
44024020	Taca mach xin , yalab ebnaj ayc'o ti' tzet hunu inmulan wacojan yet wocan yin̈ sat ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ lahti' xol ebnaj Israel .
44024021	Macato yu walan yin̈ caw ip xol ebnaj haca' ti' : " Tinan̈ chexoc heyila' tzet chinelicojan yuto chiwaytojan yul wanmahan tato chiitzitzbican̈ anma camomxa , " ẍi naj Pablo tu' .
44024022	Wal naj F'elix tu' xin , caw xatic'a yabe naj cuybanile yet Comam Jesucristo , yuxin hayet yaben naj tzet yal naj Pablo tu' , yalni naj : -- Hato yet chihul naj comandante Lisias , catto wabenojan tzet caw ye hune' hehowal ti' , ẍi naj .
44024023	Yalni naj F'elix tu' tet naj capit'an haca' ti' : -- Wal istan̈elax naj Pablo ti' , yaj tato ay yamigo naj chul tuclenoj cat yak'ni hunu tzet ye tu' tet naj , caw machojab tzet chawala , ẍi naj .
44024024	Lahwi hayeb tz'ayic xin , yapni naj F'elix yeb yixal , ha' ton ix Drusila , ix tu' xin ah Israel ix . Yawtenpaxo naj naj Pablo , yoc naj yabeno tzet chute yalni naj Pablo tu' yin̈ tzet chiyu janico janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
44024025	Yaj hayet yalni naj Pablo tato caw tohol chijute cobeybal , yeb xin cocachni coba cowatx'en istx'ojal , yeb yet yalnipaxo naj yin̈ isya'tajil chiyati Comam Dios yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic , isxiwcan̈ naj F'elix tu' , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Asi' tinan̈ , haxa yet caw matzet chiwuhan cat cachwawtenojan , ẍi naj .
44024026	Wal naj F'elix tu' xin , yechma naj yalten naj Pablo hanic'o melyu tet naj yin̈ ewantaj , cat isbejtzon naj naj Pablo tu' yalni . Yu ton hune' tu' yuxin caw nawn̈e chiyawten naj naj Pablo tu' , cat istzotel naj tet naj .
44024027	Elto cab habil hacn̈etic'a tu' chiyute naj , lahwi tu' xin yel naj F'elix tu' yin̈ gobernadoral , yoccano naj Porcio Festo selelo naj , yaj yun̈e iscan naj F'elix tu' c'ulal yul sat anma Israel , yuxin cancano naj naj Pablo yul preso yu naj .
44025001	Lahwi tu' xin , yapni naj Festo tu' ischahnocano gobernadoral . Oxebxa tz'ayic ischahni naj gobernadoral yul con̈ob Cesarea tu' isto naj yul con̈ob Jerusal'en .
44025002	Hayet ay naj bey tu' , yapni ebnaj yahawil ebnaj sacerdote yeb ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ con̈ob Israel ak'oc'ule yin̈ naj Pablo tu' .
44025003	Caw xin oc ebnaj isk'ana' tet naj tato chito ilaxoti naj Pablo tu' , cat yapni naj yul con̈ob Jerusal'en . Wal xin caw c'ulxa ye yu ebnaj tato chito ebnaj ismaja' naj yul beh , cat ispotx'ni ebnaj naj Pablo tu' chiyute yalni .
44025004	Yaj xin yal naj Festo tu' tato majan naj Pablo bey yul con̈ob Cesarea , yalnipaxo naj tato yin̈xan̈e howeb tz'ayic , cat ismeltzo naj bey tu' .
44025005	Yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Yuxin maquex caw iswi'ehal heyecoj , caw yilal heto wintajan bey yul con̈ob Cesarea , tato ay ismul hune' naj tu' yacoj , ha' tu' chisje heyalni wetan tzet ismul naj , ẍi naj .
44025006	Wal naj Festo tu' xin , waxajeb xan̈e tz'ayic ec' naj yul con̈ob Jerusal'en tu' , ismeltzopaxto naj yul con̈ob Cesarea . Haxa yet hune'xa tz'ayic xin , yapni tz'on̈no naj yul iscapil yanito naj yik'omal naj Pablo tu' .
44025007	Hayet yapni naj Pablo yin̈ sat naj , yoc hoyno ebnaj Israel ispeto yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yin̈ naj . Hantan̈e tzet istx'ojal yaco ebnaj ismulo naj , yaj machi hunu tzet chiyeniloj tato caw yeli .
44025008	Hac tu' xin yu yichico naj Pablo iscolni isba , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Walinan , machi hunu inmulan wacojan yin̈ isley ebnaj Israel yeb yin̈ yatut Comam Dios , yebpaxo yin̈ naj jahaw ay yul con̈ob Roma .
44025009	Yaj yu iscan naj Festo tu' c'ulal yul sat ebnaj Israel , yuxin isk'ambe naj tet naj Pablo tu' haca' ti' : -- ¿ Chimhawoche chaẍto yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , ha' tu' xin chiwilan tzet chaẍelicoj ? ẍi naj .
44025010	Istak'wi naj Pablo : -- ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin ay inxactijan yul capil ayco yalan̈ yip naj jahaw ay bey Roma , ha' tu' xin caw yilal yillax tzet chinelicojan , cat yillaxi tato ay inmulan haca' yalni ebnaj Israel ti' .
44025011	Tato ay inmulan caw chinak'ni camojan , caw mach chiwilojan win̈an , camojinan ; yaj tato machi nich'ano isyelal xol sunil inmulan chiyal ebnaj ti' , machi mac ay yip quinyanicojan yul isk'ab ebnaj , wal xin caw chink'anan tato ha' naj jahaw ay Roma , chi'ilni tzet chinelicojan , ẍi naj tet naj Festo .
44025012	Hac tu' xin yu yoc naj Festo islahti'n̈en isba yeb ebnaj yetbi , lahwi islahti'n̈en isba ebnaj tu' xin , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Hach chawoche tato ha' naj jahaw Roma chi'ilni tzet chaẍelicoj , wal tinan̈ xin , chaẍwatojan yin̈ sat naj , ẍi naj .
44025013	Lahwi hayeb tz'ayic xin , isto naj rey Agripa yeb yixal , ha' ton ix Berenice , yul con̈ob Cesarea yila' naj Festo , yu xaischah naj ismunil yoc gobernadoral .
44025014	Yaj yu tx'i'al tz'ayic ehayo naj yeb yixal bey tu' , yuxin oc naj Festo tu' yala' tet naj rey yin̈ tzet ye naj Pablo , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Ay hune' naj bey ti' , aycanico preso yu naj F'elix .
44025015	Yet inbeyc'ojan yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , isbeyc'o ebnaj yahawil sacerdote yeb ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ ebnaj Israel isk'ana' yin̈ naj wetan tato chinchejan potx'laxo naj .
44025016	Yaj walan tet ebnaj ta coley , han̈on̈ romano hon̈ ti' , chiyala tato mach chiyu ispotx'lax hunu anma yalan̈to maẍto chiyilico naj sat ebnaj chik'anni yin̈ , cat xin iscolni isba naj , quinchiyan .
44025017	Yu ton hune' tu' , yuxin hayet yulic'o ebnaj bey ti' machi tiempo inc'ayan , wal xin yin̈ hunxa tz'ayic quintohan yul incapilan wanitojan yik'omal naj Pablo tu' .
44025018	Ha' ebnaj k'ann̈e yin̈ naj tu' xin , caw machi ismul naj caw xiwquilta yal ebnaj wetan , haca' innanihan .
44025019	Cachann̈e hune' caw chal ebnaj ismulo naj tato tx'oj istzotel naj yin̈ isreligi'on ebnaj yalni . Yalnipaxo ebnaj tato ay hune' naj , Jes'us isbi , camnaxa , yaj xin chal naj Pablo tu' tato itzitz naj .
44025020	Yaj yu machi nawi wuhan tzet chiyu inwatx'enan hune' tu' , yuxin ink'ambenan tet naj Pablo tu' tato chiyoche naj chito naj yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , yun̈e ha' tu' chi'illaxi tzet chi'elico naj yin̈ huntek'an tu' .
44025021	Yaja' yu yal naj tato ha' naj jahaw Augusto ay yul con̈ob Roma chi'ilni tzet chi'elico naj yalni , yuxin walan tato wal ismaji naj hayeboxa tz'ayic , bak'inxan̈etic'a xin chiyu wuhan , cat wanitojan naj tet naj jahaw tu' , ẍi naj Festo .
44025022	Yalni xin naj rey Agripa tu' tet naj Festo haca' ti' : -- Ha' quintu'an chiwochehan wabeninojan tzet chiyal naj , ẍi naj . Yalni naj Festo tu' xin : -- C'ultic'a , yet hecal chawabe tzet chal naj , ẍi naj Festo .
44025023	Haxa yet hunxa tz'ayic xin , yapni naj rey Agripa yeb yixal , ha' ton ix Berenice yul capiltu , caw nanxa islow yu yapni naj yeb ix . Yapnipaxo ebnaj yahawil soldado yeb xin ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco yin̈ con̈ob tu' . Lahwi tu' xin , yanito naj Festo yik'omal naj Pablo .
44025024	Yet ayxaco naj yin̈ sat ebnaj xin , yalni naj Festo : -- Hach ti' mam rey Agripa , yeb xin hex cutxanexico ti' , ay naj Pablo ti' lah . Ha' naj ti' chiyal sunil ebnaj Israel tato ay ismul ; ebnaj Israel yul con̈ob Jerusal'en , yebpaxo ebnaj yul con̈ob Cesarea ti' . Caw xin maẍtic'a chisbej ebnaj yelico yaw win̈an tato masan chicam naj .
44025025	Yaj wal yul insatan , caw machi ismul naj caw xiwquilta chik'anni camical yin̈ , yaj yu ha' naj halni tato ha' naj jahaw Augusto ay Roma chi'ilni tzet ch'elico naj , yuxin ma'el yin̈ inc'ulan wanitojan naj tet naj .
44025026	Yu matzet tz'aj wak'acojan ismulo naj yul te' carta chito tet naj jahaw tu' , yuxin mawitijan naj yin̈ hesat , yeb yin̈ hasat mam rey Agripa . Wal tinan̈ xin , k'ambewelo tet naj , aytaxca ismul naj chi'ilchalo heyu , hexxa xin cheyal wetan , cat intz'ibn̈enayojan yul carta cat wanitojan tet naj jahaw tu' .
44025027	Yuto caw maẍtaj ye chiwabehan ta ton̈e chiwatojan naj , machi xin nich'ano ismul naj chiwaltojan , ẍi naj .
44026001	Lahwi tu' xin , yalni naj rey Agripa tet naj Pablo haca' ti' : -- Wal tinan̈ chisje hatzoteli yu hacolni haba , ẍi naj . Yanican̈ isk'ab naj Pablo tu' , yoc naj tzotelo haca' ti' :
44026002	-- Caw chitzala inc'ulal yuto chawak' hamanil wetan wocan tzotelo tawet , mam rey Agripa , cat incolni inbahan yin̈ sunil tzet chiyal ebnaj jet con̈ob Israel win̈an .
44026003	Yuto hach ti' caw hawohta coley han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti' , yeb xin sunil tzettaj chicowatx'e . Yuxin caw chink'anan tawet tato caw niman chawute hac'ul hawaben nino tzet chiwalan , ẍi naj Pablo .
44026004	Yalnipaxo naj Pablo : -- Caw sunil ebnaj Israel ohtan̈e tzet inbeybalan yet inch'ibcan̈an yul incon̈oban yeb xin yet ayinan yul con̈ob Jerusal'en .
44026005	Caw xin yohtapaxo ebnaj , yeb xin ta chisje isc'ul ebnaj chisje yalni ebnaj ta yettaxtic'a tzehinan , caw fariseo inan . Ebnaj fariseo tu' xin , ec'na caw yijem ebnaj yin̈ tzet chal coreligi'on .
44026006	Tinan̈ xin maquinyitijan ebnaj sata ley ti' , yuto chicawxi wanmahan yin̈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam tet ebnaj jichmam tato chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom yu Comam .
44026007	Ha' ebnaj cablahon̈eb majan Israel , ha' ebnaj xin chi'echman yijni isba tzet halbilcano yu Comam ; yuxin chiyiyo isba ebnaj tet Comam hunun tz'ayic yeb hunun ak'bal cat isyijen ebnaj tzet chiyal Comam . Yaj yin̈ hune' halbil yu Comam , ha' bay chicawxi wanmati'an , mam rey Agripa , ha' xin chiyaco ebnaj Israel ti' inmulojan tinan̈ .
44026008	Wal xin hex Israel hex ti' , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin mach cheyayto yul heyanma tato chiitzitzbican̈ anma camom ? ẍi naj Pablo tu' .
44026009	Yalnipaxo naj Pablo : -- Yet yalan̈tocano tu' , oc yin̈ innabalan wocan incachnojan anma yun̈e mach chischayto Comam Jes'us ah Nazaret yul yanma .
44026010	Hac tu' xin wutehan yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yu hune' wipan ak'bil yu ebnaj yahawil sacerdote , yuxin hantan̈e anma chahn̈e Comam Jesucristo yul yanma , wactojan yul preso ; caw xin ha' huninan walan ta chipotx'lax ebnaj .
44026011	Caw tx'i'al el wacojan ebnaj yin̈ isya'tajil yun̈e yinilo isba ebnaj yin̈ Comam . Huntek'an ti' inwatx'ehan yul sunil iscapilla ebnaj Israel . Caw xin waco inhowalan yin̈ ebnaj yuxin quinbeypaxojan yulaj nan con̈obal wak'acojan ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yin̈ isya'tajil , ẍi naj Pablo .
44026012	Yalnipaxo naj Pablo : -- Ha' ton hune' tu' caw nabil wuhan yuxin quintohan yul con̈ob Damasco ik'bil te' carta yak' ebnaj yahawil sacerdote Israel wetan , yun̈e caw ay wipan wec'an .
44026013	Yaj haxa yul beh xin mam rey , yin̈mi chuman tz'ayic , yayilo jopna hune' issajilk'inal wiban̈an yeb ebnaj tzujan win̈tajan . Caw ec'na caw ay yip isk'ak'al hune' sajilk'inal tu' yiban̈ yoj tz'ayic .
44026014	Hac tu' xin caw cosunilan̈ con̈ayc'ayan̈ sat tx'otx' . Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e halni wetan yul abxubal hebreo haca' ti' : " Saulo , Saulo , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxin chinhatzumbec'ojan ? Hach caw ach , chawak' lahwo haba haca' hunu no' wacax chixan̈wa yin̈ hunu te te' k'ak'i' iswi' , " ẍi wetan .
44026015	Lahwi tu' xin walnihan : " ¿ Mac anmahilhach , Mamin ? " quinchiyan . Yalni Comam wetan xin : " Haninti'an , Jes'us inan , hune' ayachico hasaynic'oj .
44026016	Wal xin ahan̈lin̈noj . Manyecan̈ inbahan tawet yun̈e hayijen tzet chiwalan cat xin hawalnic'o hune' maxawil ti' tinan̈ , yebpaxo xin tzettaj chi-to-inyeban tawet .
44026017	Chaẍincolan tet ebnaj Israel , yeb xin tet ebnaj nan con̈obal bay chaẍinchejtojan tinan̈ .
44026018	Chaẍwatojan xol anma tu' yun̈e hato hawak'no hajloho sat , yeb xin yun̈e matxa chislahico isbelwi xol k'ejholo , to haxa xol issajilk'inal ch'eq'ui . Yebpaxo xin yun̈e matxa chislahico isyijen tzet chiyal naj matzwalil , haxa tzet chal Comam Dios ha' chiswatx'e , cat xin quinischahnaytojan yul yanma cat yak'lax nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul , cat ischahnipaxo ismajul xol anma saybilxa yu Comam Dios , ẍi Comam Jes'us wetan , " ẍi naj Pablo tu' .
44026019	Yalnipaxo naj Pablo : -- Yuxin mam rey Agripa , maẍtic'a inman̈c'ohan hune' tzoti' tit wetan yul satcan̈ tu' , yet isyenico isba yin̈ insatan yin̈ sajsatil .
44026020	To caw babel walic'ojan Istzoti' Comam xol anma ay yul con̈ob Damasco , lahwi tu' intohan walnoc'ojan xol anma ay yul con̈ob Jerusal'en yeb yul ismajul Judea , yebpaxo xol anma mach Israeloj , yun̈e isbejnicano isbeybal tx'oj ik'biltic'a yu , cat ismeltzoco iswatx'en tzet chiyoche isc'ul Comam Dios , cat yocpaxo anma tu' iswatx'en isc'ulal , ha' xin chiyeniloj tato helbilxa isbeybal anma tu' .
44026021	Yu ton hune' tu' , yuxin quinistzabayojan ebnaj Israel yul yatut Comam Dios , quinyanicojan ebnaj preso , caw xin yoche ebnaj quinispotx'o'an .
44026022	Yaj yu iscolwal Comam Dios , yuxinto lin̈anintohan tinan̈ yin̈ walnic'ojan Istzoti' Comam tet sunil anma ; tet anma comon yeb xin tet anma caw ay yelapno yehi . Caw maẍtic'a hunelo inhelan tzet walan , to han̈ech'an tzet yal ischejab Comam Dios yet payat yeb xin jichmam Mois'es ; huntek'an yilal yijni isba , ha' walic'ojan ,
44026023	tato caw yilal yaben Comam Jesucristo Cocolomal isya'tajil , yeb xin ta chicampaxoj . Ha' xin babel chiitzitzbican̈ xol anma camom , yun̈e yalnic'oj tato ay iscolbanil anma Israel yeb xin anma mach Israeloj . Ha' hune' yal tu' , ha' ton issajilk'inal , ẍi naj Pablo .
44026024	Yet yalni naj Pablo huntek'an tzoti' tu' iscolbaniloj , yah yaw naj Festo haca' ti' : -- ¡ Caw loco hachxa ach Pablo ! Yu tzetc'axa chacuycanoj yuxin chaẍpaq'ui locohal , ẍi naj .
44026025	Istak'wican̈ naj Pablo : -- Mach locohojinan mam Festo , wal xin ha' tzet chiwalti'an caw c'ul , caw yelpaxoj .
44026026	Ya' rey Agripa ti' caw yohta ya' sunil huntek'an ti' , yuxin caw sunil wanmahan chintzotelan yin̈ sat ya' , yuto caw wohtajan tato caw yohta ya' sunil tu' yuto mach ewantajo yehi .
44026027	¿ Chimhawayto yul hawanma mam rey Agripa huntek'an yal ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios payat tu' ? Wal xin , caw wohtajan tato chawayto yul hawanma , ẍi naj Pablo tu' .
44026028	Yalni naj rey Agripa tu' xin : -- ¿ Ham hawalni ta yu nich'an tzet chawal ti' chinocan Cristianohal hawu ? ẍi naj .
44026029	Istak'wipaxo naj Pablo : -- Wal xin walca yu nich'an tzoti' maca yu niman tzoti' chiwalan teyet , tzettam sak'al tato ch'el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios , ta maẍn̈etajach , to sunilojab anma lan̈an yaben ti' chichahnayto yul yanma , cat yoc haca' inti'an , yaja' tan̈e mach chic'allaxayo yu ch'en cadena haca' weti'an , ẍi naj Pablo .
44026030	Lahwi yalnicano naj Pablo huntek'an tu' xin , yah lemna naj rey Agripa , yeb naj gobernador , yeb ix Berenice , yeb xin sunil anma tz'on̈an bey tu' .
44026031	Ishec'nilo isba ebnaj tzotelo ischuquil yin̈ hune' tu' , leyalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Hune' naj ti' caw maẍtic'a nich'ano ismul naj chik'anni camical yin̈ , yeb caw mach yeto ay naj yocto yul te' preso , ẍi ebnaj .
44026032	Yalni naj rey Agripa tu' tet naj Festo : -- Chisje cobejtzon naj tato maẍto chisk'anto isba naj yin̈ sat ya' jahaw ay bey Roma , yaja' ha' tu' choche naj ch'illaxi tzet ch'elico naj yalni , ẍi naj .
44027001	Yet yoc yin̈ isnabal ebnaj yanito naj Pablo bey yul niman con̈ob Italia , yalaxico naj yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj presowom yul isk'ab hune' naj capit'an , Julio isbi , naj ayco yahawil yin̈ hune' majan ebnaj soldado chiyij Batall'on Emperador Augusto .
44027002	Joctojan̈ yul hune' te' barco tit bey Adramitio , ha' te' xin lan̈an istohi , cat yec' te' sunil yulaj puerto ay yul ismajul Asia . Ha' hun xin juẍta Aristarco , ay bey con̈ob Tesal'onica ay yul ismajul Macedonia , to jin̈tajan̈ .
44027003	Haxa yet hunxa tz'ayic xin , japnihan̈ bey puerto Sid'on , bay caw c'ul yute isc'ul naj Julio yin̈ naj Pablo , yuto chahlaxic'o naj Pablo tu' yila' yamigo yu naj , ischahnipaxo naj Pablo tu' tzet chi'ak'lax tet .
44027004	Yet jelan̈ bey Sid'on tu' con̈ec'an̈ yin̈ ismotx tx'otx' Chipre ayayo xol ha' mar bay chu cocolni cobahan̈ tet jak'ek' , yuto mach toholo isbelwi te' barco yu jak'ek' tu' .
44027005	Lahwi tu' xin coculusn̈enan̈ ha' mar yin̈ ismotxico ej tx'otx' ay yul ismajul Cilicia yeb Panfilia , japnipaxojan̈ yul con̈ob Mira ay yul ismajul Licia .
44027006	Ha' tu' ilchayo hune' te' barco ah Alejandr'ia yu naj capit'an yin̈ ebnaj soldado , istoxa te' bey Italia , con̈ocan̈ yul te' , cotopaxojan̈ .
44027007	Caw xin tx'i'al tz'ayic con̈belwihan̈ yin̈ caw nan̈c'ulal yuto caw ay jak'ek' , caw xin ya'ta yu japnicanojan̈ iscawilal con̈ob Gnido . Yaj yu caw ayto yip islow jak'ek' yin̈ te' barco tu' , yuxin con̈ec'an̈ iscawilal Salm'on , caw xin con̈ec'tohan̈ cohoyo'an̈ bey ismotx tx'otx' Creta ayayo xol ha' mar tu' .
44027008	Caw ya'tan̈etic'a jak'lehan̈ yet jec'an̈ yin̈ ismotx tx'otx' Creta yin̈ hune' bel tu' , yuxin caw lan̈o con̈apnihan̈ bey Buenos Puertos , ayco iscawilal con̈ob Lasea .
44027009	Caw nimanxa tiempo chicoc'aytojan̈ , yebpaxo xin caw txahulxa cobelwihan̈ yiban̈ ha' mar yuto cawilxa yeti yocbal ha' n̈ab . Yu ton hune' tu' , yuxin yal naj Pablo tet ebnaj yahawil yeco yin̈ te' barco tu' ,
44027010	haca' ti' : -- Hex wetbi yin̈ hune' cobel ti' , caw txahulxa jeco chiwilan , yuto ay ismay yetaxto te' barco ti' , cat isc'ayto jijatz , aypaxo ismay han̈hunon̈ chon̈cami , ẍi naj .
44027011	Wal naj capit'an yin̈ ebnaj soldado xin , caw ec'na yabeto naj tzet yal naj yahawil yeco yin̈ te' barco , yeb tzet yal naj chi'inic'o te' barco tu' sata tzet yal naj Pablo .
44027012	Bey hune' Buenos Puertos tu' xin , caw machi bay chiyu iscolni isba ebnaj yin̈ hune' n̈abil tu' , yuxin etza sunil ebnaj halni tato chon̈elan̈ bey tu' , etzami chu japnicanojan̈ bey Fenice , ay yul ismajul Creta . Hune' tx'otx' tu' xin caw chismaj tx'otx' jak'ek' chitit bay chi'ahilo tz'ayic , yuxin ha' tu' ch'elto hune' n̈abil jiban̈an̈ , chiyute yalni ebnaj .
44027013	Lahwi tu' xin yichico yec' jak'ek' yin̈ caw nanc'ulal chitit yin̈ sur , yuxin oc yin̈ isnabal ebnaj isto yin̈ isbel tu' hunelxa , yinican̈ ebnaj ch'en ancla , cotohan̈ xin . Caw isti'lan̈etic'a tx'otx' Creta ec' te' barco tu' .
44027014	Yaj haniq'uixto chon̈tohan̈ , yul hune' niman jak'ek' tit yin̈ nordeste , ismak'nico isba yin̈ te' barco .
44027015	Hac tu' xin yu yichico istenlaxto te' yu jak'ek' , yaj yu matxa con̈k'ojihan̈ jinitojan̈ te' bay chiyal janmahan̈ , yuxin toxan̈e chijilan̈ con̈yinitojan̈ te' bay caw chito jak'ek' tu' .
44027016	Con̈ec'an̈ yin̈ ismotx hune' nich'an con̈ob ay xol ha' mar , Clauda isbi , bay matxa caw yip yec' jak'ek' . Wal te' nich'an lancha tzujan yinta te' barco tu' caw lan̈o yij isba yahcanto te' yul te' niman barco tu' yu ebnaj .
44027017	Lahwi tu' xin isc'alnayo ebnaj te' barco tu' yu huntek'an nimeta lasu yun̈e yik'ni yip te' . Yaj yu chixiw ebnaj ta chalo iscawxicanayto te' xol huntek'an arena ayco yin̈ ismotx tx'otx' Libia , chiyij Sirte , yuxin isholayo ebnaj k'ap vela chismak'ico jak'ek' yun̈e nanc'ulalxa chito te' .
44027018	Haxa yet hune'xa tz'ayic xin , yu caw ayto yip yec' jak'ek' , yuxin ichico ebnaj yanayto ijatz ayco yul te' barco tu' yul ha' mar .
44027019	Haxa yet iscabwihalxa xin , haxa ismunlabal te' barco tu' , istirayto ebnaj xol ha' .
44027020	Caw tx'i'al tz'ayic matxatic'a chijilan̈ yin̈ tz'ayic yeb tx'umel , yu hune' niman jak'ek' chon̈mak'obtan̈entu'an̈ , yuxin caw c'aycanilo coc'ulan̈ , caw matxa chiconahan̈ tato chito con̈colchahan̈ .
44027021	Yaj yu caw payxa matxa chon̈wa'an̈ , yuxin ah lin̈no naj Pablo , yalni naj tet ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Hex wetbi , majaltam heyije tzet walan . Caw c'ulmi tato machi con̈el bey Creta tu' , machim cayto huntek'an ijatz yeb huntek'an munlabal ti' yeb jaben isya'tajil ti' .
44027022	Wal tinan̈ xin , machi cabconcan̈ hec'ul yuto machi hunujex chexcamoj , han̈c'an̈e te' barco ti' ch'etaxtoj ,
44027023	yuto mayati Comam Dios hune' 'angel tzotelo wetan may ak'bal , Comam Dios bay ayinicojan , ha' ayinyetan .
44027024	Ha' hune' 'angel tu' xin , mahalni wetan haca' ti' : " Mach chaẍxiw ach Pablo , yuto caw yilal hawapni yin̈ sat naj yahawil Roma , hawupaxoj yuxin chicolcha sunil anma ayicto yul te' barco ti' , machi hunu mac chicamoj , " ẍi naj wetan .
44027025	Yuxin tinan̈ hex wetbi , aweco yip heyanma , yuto chicawxi inc'ulal yin̈ Comam Dios ta caw yilal yijni isba tzet mahulic'o naj 'angel tu' yala' wetan .
44027026	Yaj chon̈tirlaxolo isti' ha' mar bey hune' tx'otx' ay xol ha' mar , ẍi naj Pablo tu' .
44027027	Yet hune' ak'bal xin , yin̈xa iscan̈lan̈eb tz'ayic jec'an̈ yiban̈ ha' mar , japnihan̈ yiban̈ ha' mar Adri'atico , bay nanantaxan̈e chito te' barco yu jak'ek' . Caw yin̈mi chuman ak'bal xin , isnani ebnaj chimunlacto yul te' barco tato japnixahan̈ yin̈ tx'o tx'otx' .
44027028	Yoc ebnaj ismaleno hanta isnahatil yehayto yich ha' , caw treinta y seis metro yehayto yich ha' tu' . Cotohan̈ hanic'xa , yocpaxo ebnaj ismalenoj , veinticinco metroxan̈e yehayto yich ha' .
44027029	Yaj yu chixiw ebnaj ta ch'alo ay bay chismak'ico isba te' yin̈ ch'en nime ch'en , yuxin isbejtzoto ebnaj can̈eb ch'en ancla yinta te' barco tu' . Caw xin ayco ebnaj isk'anni tet Comam Dios ta chisajbinaloj .
44027030	Wal ebnaj chimunla yul te' barco tu' , isna ebnaj yelcan̈ yul te' , yuxin oc ebnaj yak'ayto te' lancha yul ha' , yanico ebnaj lek'ti'al tato chiyayto ebnaj yak'bil ch'en ancla sata te' barco tu' .
44027031	Wal naj Pablo xin , caw yin̈ an̈e yal naj tet naj capit'an yeb tet ebnaj soldado haca' ti' : -- Tato chi'el ebnaj yul te' barco ti' , caw mach chexcolcha hex ti' , ẍi naj .
44027032	Hac tu' xin caw yin̈ an̈exan̈e isc'upilo ebnaj soldado tu' tx'an̈ lasu bay t'un̈an te' lancha tu' , isbejtzonto ebnaj te' yul ha' .
44027033	Yet lan̈anxa issajbilo xin , yalni naj Pablo tet ebnaj sunil tato yilal iswa' ebnaj , yalni naj tet ebnaj : -- Caw cabxa semana mach chexwa'i yu heyilni tzet chextan̈i .
44027034	Yaj chiwalan teyet tato yilal hewa'i yun̈e yoc heyip . Caw machi hunujex chexc'aytoj , maẍtic'apaxo hunq'uitano xil hewi' chic'aytoj .
44027035	Lahwi yalni naj Pablo hune' tu' xin , yinican̈ naj hune' ixim pan , yak'ni naj yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ sat ebnaj sunil . Lahwi tu' isk'axpon naj ixim , yoc naj iswahno ixim .
44027036	Hayet yilni ebnaj tu' xin , yak'locan̈ isc'ul ebnaj , yocpaxo ebnaj wa'o sunil .
44027037	Caw cab ciento setenta y seis on̈an̈ ayon̈icojan̈ yul te' barco tu' .
44027038	Yet islahwi iswa'cano sunil ebnaj xin , isbejtzonayto ebnaj ixim trigo xol ha ha' yun̈e ishan̈k'o yijatz te' barco tu' .
44027039	Hayet issajbilo xin , yilnito ebnaj chimunla yul te' barco tu' tx'o tx'otx' , yaj mach istxum ebnaj baytu'wal ayon̈tu'an̈ , yaj xin yil ebnaj hune' isk'ab ha' mar tu' , caw naba arena-la-n̈e isti' , isnani ebnaj yinito te' barco bey tu' .
44027040	Hac tu' xin yu isc'upnito ebnaj tx'an̈ lasu ayco yin̈ ancla tu' iscancano xol ha' mar . Istoyban ebnaj istx'an̈al remo ch'ocnico yin̈ yijban te' barco tu' . Lahwi tu' xin yanican̈ ebnaj k'ap vela yin̈ sat te' yul isbeh jak'ek' yun̈e c'ul isbelwi te' , hac tu' xin yu ishitznico ebnaj te' isti' ha' .
44027041	Yaj c'uxan yapni te' yin̈ cabeb niẍte isk'ab ha' , iscan tx'apno te' xol arena . Ha' sata te' cancano tx'apno xol arena tu' , matxatic'a chiyu isbili , wal yinta te' xin caw uchc'acantoj yuto caw ec'naxa yip ha' chismak'ico isba yin̈ te' .
44027042	Ha' ebnaj soldado tu' xin yoche ebnaj ispotx'o ebnaj presowom , yun̈e machi hunu ebnaj chimak'ni ha' cat yelcan̈ .
44027043	Wal naj iscapit'an ebnaj soldado tu' , caw yoche naj iscolo' naj Pablo , yuxin mach chisje naj ispotx'lax ebnaj presowom . Ha' yute naj , to yal naj tet ebnaj ta mac yohta ismak'ni ha' , caw yilal babel chiayto xol ha' yun̈e yapni isti' ha' .
44027044	Wal mac mach chu ismak'ni ha' xin , yiban̈ yak'inte'al te' barco uchc'ato tu' oc ebnaj . Hac tu' jutehan̈ , yuxin cosunilan̈ con̈colchahan̈ , japnihan̈ isti' ha' .
44028001	Yet xacon̈colchahan̈ cosunilan̈ tet huntek'an isya'tajil tu' xin , jabenilojan̈ tato Malta isbi hune' isla bay con̈apnitu'an̈ .
44028002	Ebnaj ay bey isla Malta tu' caw xahan con̈yilan̈ ebnaj , caw xin yin̈ an̈e yaco ebnaj hune' niman k'a' yun̈e cok'aẍnihan̈ yuto caw chew , caw chiyak'paxo n̈ab .
44028003	Hac tu' xin yu yoc naj Pablo iscutx'bano cabxa yak'bil te' si' caw tajin , hayet yanicto naj te' yul k'a' xin , isxiwilti hune' no' laba xol k'a' , yul no' ischino isk'ab naj , yoccano t'un̈no no' yin̈ isk'ab naj Pablo tu' .
44028004	Hayet yilni ebnaj ah con̈ob tu' ta t'un̈anico no' laba tu' yin̈ isk'ab naj , yalni ebnaj tet hunun haca' ti' : -- Hune' naj ti' caw potx'om anmami naj , wal xin walca caw ya'ta mayu iscolcha naj yiban̈ ha' mar , yaj caw yilal istohlan naj ismul yuxin caw chicamo naj , ẍi ebnaj .
44028005	Wal naj Pablo tu' xin , istzicayo naj isk'ab yiban̈ k'a' , yayc'ay no' laba tu' , maẍtic'a xin nich'ano tzet yu naj yu no' .
44028006	Caw sunil ebnaj ch'echman ismalcan̈ isk'ab naj Pablo tu' , maca iscamayo naj . Caw xin hunep ismaj ebnaj tato ay chu naj Pablo tu' , yaja' yet yilni ebnaj tato maẍtic'a tzet yu naj , ishelni ebnaj isnabal , yichico ebnaj yalni haca' ti' : -- Hune' naj ti' c'uxan tato dios naj , ẍi ebnaj .
