44028007	Iscawilal tu' xin ay istx'otx' naj iswi'ehal yeco xol anma tu' , Publio isbi . Ha' naj xin con̈chahnihan̈ yatut , caw c'ul con̈yilan̈ naj yin̈ oxeb tz'ayic .
44028008	C'uxan ayto ismam naj Publio tu' sat tx'at yu hune' niman k'a' yeb xin yu chic'ul . Hac tu' xin yu yocto naj Pablo istucleno naj bay hilan tu' , yoc naj txahlo xin . Lahwi istxahlicano naj Pablo tu' , yanayo naj isk'ab yiban̈ naj ya'ay tu' , iscawxican̈ naj .
44028009	Yu hune' tzet yu tu' xin sunil anma ya'ay apni isc'atan̈ naj Pablo , iscawxican̈ anma sunil .
44028010	Caw tzetc'a tzettaj ye tu' salax jetan̈ yu anma tu' . Haxa yet cotohan̈ yul barco xin yak'nipaxo ebnaj tzettaj ye tu' chiocnico juhan̈ yin̈ cobelan̈ .
44028011	Oxeb ixahaw xin ayon̈an̈ bey hune' isla Malta tu' , lahwi tu' xin jocan̈ yul hune' te' barco ton̈e txajan yechman yec' n̈abil , ah Alejandr'ia te' . Yin̈ sat te' barco tu' xin ayco yechel cabeb tioẍ , C'astor isbi hune' , wal hunxa xin P'olux isbi .
44028012	Hac tu' xin yu japnihan̈ bey yul con̈ob Siracusa , jehayojan̈ bey tu' yin̈ oxeb tz'ayic .
44028013	Lahwi tu' xin cotopaxojan̈ , japnihan̈ yul con̈ob Regio . Haxa hunxa tz'ayic xin , yichico hune' jak'ek' chitit yin̈ sur , haxa yin̈ iscab tz'ayic japnihan̈ bey con̈ob Puteoli .
44028014	Ha' tu' chahloyo huntek'an ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam juhan̈ , yalni ebnaj jetan̈ tato chon̈cancanojan̈ hune' semanahil isc'atan̈ ebnaj . Lahwi tu' xin cotopaxojan̈ yin̈ cobelan̈ bey con̈ob Roma .
44028015	Ebnaj xachahni Comam yul yanma ay yul con̈ob Roma tu' , caw yohtaxa ebnaj tato chon̈apnihan̈ yuxin tit ebnaj con̈ischahban̈ yul beh ; ay ebnaj hata bey hune' niman txon̈bal , Apio isbi , con̈yechmahan̈ . Aypaxo ebnaj juẍta bey bay chihallax Oxeb Waybalil . Hayet yilni naj Pablo ebnaj tu' , yak'ni naj yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios , caw yik'ni yip yanma naj .
44028016	Hayet japnihan̈ yul con̈ob Roma tu' , yanico naj capit'an ebnaj presowom yul isk'ab naj yahawil ebnaj soldado , wal naj Pablo xin nan alaxicto naj yul hune' n̈a yeb hune' naj soldado chitan̈eni .
44028017	Iscabwihalxa japnihan̈ xin , yawten naj Pablo ebnaj iswi'ehal yeco xol ebnaj Israel ay yul con̈ob Roma tu' , yet iscutxico ebnaj xin , yalni naj Pablo tu' haca' ti' : -- Hex wuẍtaj , walca caw machi inmulan insayicojan yin̈ ebnaj Israel yeb yin̈ iscuywabal ebnaj ichamta jichmam , yaj xin quinyacojan ebnaj yahawil Israel ti' preso yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ; lahwi tu' quinyanipaxicojan ebnaj yul isk'ab ebnaj romano ti' .
44028018	Yaja' yet isk'amben ebnaj ah Roma tu' wetan tzet inmulan , caw yoche ebnaj quinisbejtzo'an yuto caw machi hunu inmulan caw tx'oj wacojan chik'anni camical win̈an .
44028019	Wal ebnaj Israel xin caw mach isje ebnaj quinisbejtzo'an , yuxin ink'anti inbahan tet naj emperador , jahaw ay Roma ti' , yun̈e ha' naj ch'ilni tzet chinelicojan . Walinan xin caw matzet chiwacojan ismulo ebnaj jet con̈ob tu' .
44028020	Yu ton hune' ti' yuxin maquexwawtehan , yun̈e quexwilnihan cat walnihan teyet ; yuto ay hune' mac echmabil yul ju han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti' , yu ton hune' tu' yuxin c'albilinan yu ch'en cadena ti' , ẍi naj .
44028021	Yalni ebnaj tet naj Pablo tu' : -- Walon̈ti'an̈ maẍto hunu carta chihul jetan̈ yu ebnaj ay yul ismajul Judea tu' yin̈ tzet hawe hach ti' , machipaxo hunu ebnaj juẍta israelita ay bey tu' chul halno jetan̈ yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' tx'oj tawin̈ .
44028022	Wal tinan̈ chijochehan̈ jabehan̈ tzet ch'ec' yin̈ hanabal , yuto caw johtajan̈ tato caw sunil bay tx'oj istzotel anma yin̈ hune' cuybanile ti' , ẍi ebnaj tet naj Pablo tu' .
44028023	Hac tu' yu yalnicano ebnaj tzet tz'ayical chi'apni ebnaj isc'atan̈ naj Pablo tu' . Hayet yapni istz'ayical tu' xin , caw tzetc'a yu yapni ebnaj isc'atan̈ naj . Yichico naj yalni Istzoti' Comam Dios tet ebnaj yin̈ sac'ayalil masanta yin̈ k'ejbiyal . Yal naj Pablo tu' yin̈ tzet chu yoc ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Tzotelpaxo naj tet ebnaj yin̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Mois'es yeb tzet tz'ibn̈ebilpaxcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payat , yun̈e yanayto ebnaj yul yanma , cat yanico isba ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo .
44028024	Ay xin ebnaj anayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal naj Pablo tu' , aypaxo xin ebnaj mach anayto yul yanma .
44028025	Yaj yu mach lahano istxumni ebnaj yin̈ tzet yal naj Pablo tu' , istzabnico ebnaj istohi . Yuxin yal naj Pablo tet ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Caw yeltic'a chiyal Comam Esp'iritu Santo yet yak'ni Comam yala' naj Isa'ias , ischejab Comam Dios , tet ebnaj jichmam yet payat , yet yalni Comam tet naj haca' ti' :
44028026	As hal tet huntek'an anma ti' haca' ti' : " Hex ti' caw yeli cheyabe , yaj mach chitxumchalo heyu ; caw cheyila , yaj mach chinachalo heyu , " cachi .
44028027	Yuto ha' yanma sunil huntek'an anma ti' xacawbiloj , yuxin caw mach chabe isc'ulal . Caw mutz'anpaxo sat ; yuxin caw mach chiyu yilni istoholal , maẍtic'a chiyabe yu istxiquin . Maẍtic'a chistxumpaxo ninoj , maẍtic'a xin chisje ishela' isbeybal yu wak'ni tan̈ojan ismul , ẍi Comam Esp'iritu Santo tu' .
44028028	Tinan̈ xin caw cam cheyabecanoj tato yin̈ hune' tiempo chijicheco ti' , chihallaxic'o hune' colbanile chiyak' Comam Dios ti' tet anma mach Israeloj , yaja' ec'na chiyak'ayto anma yul yanma , ẍi naj Pablo .
44028029	Yet yalni naj Pablo hune' tu' , isto ebnaj Israel , yoc ebnaj iscajlen isba yin̈ tzet yal naj .
44028030	Wal naj Pablo xin , caw cab habil cancano naj yul hune' n̈a c'amn̈ebil yu tu' . Caw xin chitzala isc'ul naj chischahni naj anma ch'apni tuclenoj .
44028031	Yin̈ sunil yanma naj Pablo yalic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam , chiscuynipaxo naj anma yin̈ tzet yelapno ye Comam Jesucristo . Machi xin mac chihalni hunu tzet ye tu' yin̈ tzet chal naj Pablo .
45001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an ismunlawom Comam Jesucristo wehan , awtebilinan yu Comam Dios yu wocan ischejabo Comam Jesucristo , yeb xin saybilinan yu walnic'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile .
45001002	Hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile tu' , halbilcano yu Comam Dios yet payat , tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam yu ebnaj ischejab .
45001003	Ha' huntek'an cuybanile tz'ibn̈ebilcano tu' , yin̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chitzoteli , Comam Isc'ahol Comam Dios . Comam Jesucristo tu' yin̈ yuninal yuninal naj rey David titna Comam yet yulic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
45001004	Yaja' yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios ayco yin̈ , yeb yu itzitzbican̈ Comam xol camom , hac tu' xin yu isyeni isba tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi yeb xin caw ay yip .
45001005	Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin xainchahan isc'ulal . Quinyanicojan Comam Dios ischejabo Comam Jesucristo yu walnic'ojan Istzoti' , haxinwal ay mac chichahnayto Comam yul yanma yul hunun con̈ob , cat isyijen yin̈ tzet chala .
45001006	Xol huntek'an mac tu' ayexico hex ti' , awtebilex yu heyoc yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo .
45001007	Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet hex ayex bey yul con̈ob Roma . Caw xahan ayex yu Comam Dios , awtebilexpaxo yu heyoc iscon̈obo Comam . Yak'ab Comam Dios Mame yeb Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet .
45001008	Tinan̈ xin , yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo chiwak'an yuch'andiosal teyin̈ tet Comam Dios yuto sunil yulaj con̈ob chihallaxi tato caw ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios .
45001009	Caw yohta Comam tato hunta el chintxahlihan chexinnatijan yin̈ intxahan . Yin̈ sunil wanmahan chinyijehan walnic'ojan Istzoti' Isc'ahol Comam .
45001010	Chink'annihan tet Comam Dios tato chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam chinapnihan quexwila'an .
45001011	Yuto caw chiwochehan quexwila'an yu incolwahan hanic'o teyin̈ yin̈ yet Comam , haxinwal chiyik' yip heyanma yin̈ Comam .
45001012	Hac tu' xin chu jiptzelen coba hununon̈ , yuto hun lahanxa yeco janma yin̈ Comam .
45001013	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwochehan cheyohtan̈eloj tato tx'i'alxa el chiwochehan chintohan quexwila'an , yaja' maẍtotic'a chij isba intohan . Chiwochehan ta hayet chinapnihan texol , tx'i'al mac chioc yul isk'ab Comam wuhan , haca'tic'a chiwuhan yulaj hunun con̈ob bay chinec'an xol anma mach Israeloj .
45001014	Yuto inc'asan ye walnilojan Istzoti' Comam Dios tet macxan̈etic'a anmahil , tet anma ay iscuyu maca tet anma mach iscuyu , tet anma ay yitz'atil iswi' maca tet anma machi yitz'atil iswi' .
45001015	Yuxin ayco yin̈ inc'ulan intohan walnoc'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile texol bey Roma tu' .
45001016	Wal haninti'an , mach chintx'ixwilojan yin̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile , yuto yip Comam Dios yehi ; ha' ch'ak'ni colbanile tet sunil mac chianayto yul yanma . Yin̈ babelal hallax jet han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti' , tzujan tu' xin yallax tet anma mach Israeloj .
45001017	Hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile ti' , ha' chiak'ni johtan̈elo yin̈ tzet chu joc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , cachann̈e yu cochahni Comam Jesucristo yul janma , haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios : " Ha' mac caw c'ul yul sat Comam Dios yin̈xan̈e Comam ayco yanma , yuxin ay isk'inal mach istan̈bal , " ẍiayoj .
45001018	Wal xin chati Comam Dios isya'tajil yul satcan̈ yiban̈ anma tx'oj , anma maẍtic'a chiwatx'en istoholal . Yu istx'ojal anma tu' yuxin mach chiohtan̈elaxilo isyelal .
45001019	Yin̈ tzet chu johtan̈enilo Comam Dios caw yohtaxa anma ; mach ewano ye yul sat yuto ha'tic'a Comam yenilo tet .
45001020	Waxan̈ca mach chijilico yin̈ Comam Dios , yaja' chu johtan̈enilo Comam yu tzet ye tu' watx'ebilxa yu . Yuto yettaxtic'a iswatx'encano Comam hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' isyenilo isba yin̈ caw haban tato caw Dios Comam , yeb ta caw machi bak'in chitan̈ yip . Yuxin huntek'an anma tu' matxa tzet tz'aj yala' yun̈e iscolni isba .
45001021	Waxan̈ca caw yohta anma tato ay Comam Dios , yaja' maẍtic'a yiyo isba anma tet Comam haca' caw yehi . Maẍtic'a xin yak'paxo anma yuch'andiosal tet Comam , wal xin han̈c'an̈etic'a issucal chiec' yin̈ isnabal yu k'ejholo ayco yin̈ isnabal .
45001022	Caw tz'ajan isc'ul anma tu' yalni , yaja' caw suc ,
45001023	yuto xaisbejcano anma Comam Dios caw aycano ismay isk'ak'al yip , Comam maẍtic'a chicami . Haxa yechel anma cambehal yehi , yeb no' ch'ic , yeb no' laba yeb yechel no nok' can̈eb yoj , ha' yaco anma isdiosaloj .
45001024	Yuxin alaxcanico huntek'an anma tu' xol istx'ojal yu Comam Dios , chiswatx'en anma tzet chal isc'ul , caw xin tx'ixobal tzet chiswatx'e anma yin̈ hunun .
45001025	Maẍtaj isyelal Comam Dios yayto anma yul yanma , walxinto ha' lek'ti'al yayto anma yul yanma . Ha' xin tet huntek'an tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios ha' bay chiyo isba anma yeb ha' chaco anma ismay ; maẍtaj tet Comam watx'en̈e sunil tzet ye tu' , Comam yet ay yanico anma ismay yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , ¡ hacojab tu' !
45001026	Yu hune' tu' yuxin bejbilcano anma yu Comam Dios , chiswatx'en tzet choche isc'ul , huntek'an caw tx'ixobal . Ebix ix xaisbejcano ebix huntek'an ik'biltic'a yu yin̈ yochen isba yeb yichamil , chiswatx'en ebix huntek'an tzet ye tu' yeb yet ixal mach yeto ay iswatx'eni .
45001027	Hacpax tu' ebnaj winaj xaisbejcano ebnaj huntek'an tzet ik'biltic'a yu yin̈ yochen isba yeb yixal , caw chipalc'on ebnaj iswatx'en istx'ojal yin̈ hunun haca' tzet chal yanma , caw xin tx'ixobal tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj yin̈ yet winajil . Ha'tic'a xin isnimanil ebnaj chichahni isya'tajil ispajo istx'ojal chiswatx'e tu' .
45001028	Yaja' yu machi yelapno Comam Dios yul sat anma , yuxin bejbilcano anma yu Comam yin̈ sunil istx'ojal chiec' yin̈ isnabal . Chiswatx'en anma tzet ye tu' mach yeto ay iswatx'eni .
45001029	Caw nohnaco sunil tzet ye tu' mach c'ulo yin̈ huntek'an anma tu' , han̈c'an̈etic'a istx'ojal nabil yu iswatx'eni , han̈etic'a k'alomal ayco yin̈ isc'ul issayni , caw chitzala isc'ul iswatx'en istx'ojal . Ton̈etic'a chichiwa isc'ul yin̈ yet anmahil cat ispotxwahi , ak'om howal , cat yak'ni subchaho anma , tx'ojn̈etic'a nabil yu yin̈ yet anmahil , yeb halom k'umal .
45001030	Chishobcan̈ lek'ti'al yin̈ yet anmahil , ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam Dios , chisyah yet anmahil , caw chican̈ isba , caw lolo' , chisnacan̈ istx'ojal , mach chisyije yin̈ tzet chal ismam ismi' .
45001031	Caw lut' chute isba , tzet haltebil yu mach chisyije , matxa isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yin̈ yet anmahil , mach chak' nimanc'ulal , yeb mach chitz'ay isc'ul yin̈ yet anmahil .
45001032	Caw yohta huntek'an anma tu' ta halbilcano yu Comam Dios tato ha' mac chiwatx'en huntek'an istx'ojal tu' chitocano yin̈ camical mach istan̈bal , yaja' wal anma tu' caw chislahico iswatx'en istx'ojal , chitzalapaxoj tato ay mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal .
45002001	Yuxin matxa tzet tz'aj hawala' hach chachoc hawila' yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e hawet anmahil , mach chiyoc yin̈ mac anmahil hach , yet chachoc hawilno tzet chiswatx'e hawet anmahil tu' , hach hunach chawiti' isya'tajil tawiban̈ yuto lahan tzet chawatx'epaxo yebi .
45002002	Yaja' wal xin caw johtaj tato ha' Comam Dios chiilni yin̈ caw isyelal yin̈ tzet chielico mac chiwatx'en haca' tu' , cat iscawxico ismul yiban̈ yu Comam .
45002003	Walex chexoc heyila' istx'ojal chiswatx'e heyet anmahil , lahan xin chewatx'epaxo yebi . ¿ Ham heyalni tato chexcolcha tet isya'tajil chati Comam Dios ?
45002004	¿ Mato cheyah isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam caw ay yelapnoj ? Ta hac tu' machi xin chenaloj tato ha' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam yeb isnimanc'ulal Comam , ha' lan̈an quexyinito yin̈ heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam .
45002005	Yaja' yu iscawil heyanma yeb yu mach cheje heyak'aco heba yul isk'ab Comam Dios , cat hebejnicano istx'ojal , yu hune' tu' xin lan̈an hecutxbanico ishowal Comam Dios teyiban̈ yin̈ hune' istz'ayical isya'tajil , yet chilni Comam yin̈ caw isyelal yin̈ tzet chielico anma .
45002006	Yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' chak' Comam ispaj selel tet hunun anma hatatic'a tzet iswatx'e .
45002007	Chak'nipaxo Comam k'inale mach istan̈bal tet mac maẍtic'a isbej iswatx'en isc'ulal yuto choche ta c'ulch'ann̈etic'a yul sat Comam Dios , yeb ta ay yelapno yul sat Comam yeb yu issayni tzet ye tu' mach istan̈bal .
45002008	Yaja' xin chitit ishowal Comam cat yanayo isya'tajil yiban̈ mac han̈etic'a tzet choche isc'ul chissayic'oj , mach choche isyije cuybanile caw yeli ; han̈c'an̈etic'a yin̈ istx'ojal ayco yanma .
45002009	Chitit isya'tajil yiban̈ , cat yec'ya' yanma sunil anma chiwatx'en istx'ojal ; yin̈ babelal yiban̈ anma Israel , lahwi tu' xin yiban̈ anma mach Israeloj .
45002010	Wal xin chak' Comam issak'alil , yeb ismay yeb ak'anc'ulal tet mac chiwatx'en isc'ulal ; yin̈ babelal tet anma Israel , tzujan tu' xin tet anma mach Israeloj .
45002011	Yuto yul sat Comam Dios lahan anma sunil .
45002012	Sunil mac mach ayoco yalan̈ isley naj Mois'es yet yanico ismul , maẍtaj yin̈ ley tu' chiillaxi yin̈ tzet chielicoj . Wal mac ayco yalan̈ ley tu' xin yanico ismul , ha'tic'a yin̈ ley tu' chiillaxi yin̈ tzet chielicoj .
45002013	Ha' anma chiaben ley machi xin chisyijepaxo tzet chala , ha' anma tu' mach c'ulo yul sat Comam Dios , walxinto ha' anma chiyijen yin̈ tzet chala , ha' anma tu' c'ul yul sat Comam Dios .
45002014	Waxan̈ca mach ayocto anma mach Israelo yalan̈ isley naj Mois'es , yaja' ta chiswatx'e yul yet ischuquil haca' chal ley tu' , chalilo chal tu' tato aytic'aco hune' ley tu' yin̈ isnabal ebnaj .
45002015	Yu isbeybal xin chisyeloj tato ayxaco hune' ley tu' yin̈ yanma , chisyenipaxilo yin̈ tzet chu istxumni . Ha'tic'a isnabal ebnaj chalni tet tato c'ul maca tx'oj tzet chiswatx'e .
45002016	Haca' yalni hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile chiwalic'oti'an chihul istz'ayical yet chilni Comam Dios yu Comam Jesucristo ismul anma ewan yehi .
45002017	Ayex cheyican̈ heba yuto Israel hex , yin̈ isley naj Mois'es tzujanex , caw xin lolo' cheyute heba yuto iscon̈ob Comam Dios heyehi .
45002018	Heyohtaj baytet choche Comam Dios chewatx'e , ha' xin ley tu' cheẍyeni hesayni isc'ulal .
45002019	Caw chicawxi hec'ul teyin̈ tato chu heyijbanic'o mac maẍto ohtan̈e Comam Dios haca' mac mach chu yilni , yeb haca' issajilk'inal heyehico yin̈ anma ayco xol k'ejholo heyalni .
45002020	Caw xin chicawxipaxo hec'ul teyin̈ ta chu hecuyni anma suc isc'ul , yeb ta ijbalomex yin̈ anma matzet yohtaj , yuto yu isley naj Mois'es ayco yul hek'ab yuxin caw ay yitz'atil hewi' yeb heyohta isyelal , heyalni .
45002021	Yuxin tato checuy hunuxa heyet anmahil , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin maẍtajex checuy heba babel ? Cheyala tato mach chu jelk'awi , yaja' xin chexelk'awipaxoj .
45002022	Ayex cheyala ta mach chexixli , yaja' xin chexixlipaxoj . Cheyah ej tioẍ , yaja' xin cheyelk'apaxilti tzet ayicto yul yatut tioẍ tu' .
45002023	Caw lolo' cheyute heba yin̈ isley naj Mois'es ak'bil teyet , yaja' xin cheyilo ispixan Comam Dios yuto mach cheyije yin̈ tzet chala .
45002024	Haca' tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti' : " Anma mach Israeloj caw tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Dios , yaja' heyu hex ti' , " ẍiayoj .
45002025	Caw yeli , hune' circuncisi'on ayco yin̈ henimanil , ha' chaliloj ta cheyije isley naj Mois'es , yaja' ta mach cheyije xin , lahan chaliloj haca'tic'a mach hune' circuncisi'on tu' yin̈ henimanil .
45002026	Wal ebnaj machi circuncisi'on yin̈ xin yaja' chiswatx'e ebnaj haca' chal ley tu' , ebnaj tu' haca'tic'a ayxaco circuncisi'on yin̈ .
45002027	Ebnaj mach ayoco circuncisi'on yin̈ isnimanil , yaj chisyije tzet chal ley tu' , ha' chihalnilo ismul ebnaj mach chiyijen ley tu' waxan̈ca ayco circuncisi'on yin̈ , yeb waxan̈ca yohta hune' ley tz'ibn̈ebil tu' .
45002028	Maẍtaj ha' mac chihallax Israel yu anma , maca yu ayxaco circuncisi'on yin̈ isnimanil , ha' caw yeli israelita yul sat Comam Dios .
45002029	Wal xin ha' mac caw yeli Israel yul sat Comam Dios , ha' ton mac ayco yanma yin̈ Comam . Hune' yechel circuncisi'on tu' Yesp'iritu Comam chianico yin̈ janma , maẍtaj yu ley tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj . Mac haca' tu' , maẍtaj yul sat anma caw c'ul , to ha' yul sat Comam Dios .
45003001	Yuxin , ¿ tzet cheyute heyalni yin̈ hune' chiwalti'an ? ¿ Tom mach yelapno anma Israel yeb hune' circuncisi'on ayco yin̈ tu' cheyute hetxumni ?
45003002	Wal xin caw ay chaliloj yuto cawxi isc'ul Comam Dios yak'ni Istzoti' tet anma Israel .
45003003	Yaja' , ¿ tzet xin chielicoj tato ay anma Israel mach chiswatx'e yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios ? ¿ Tom yu hune' tu' yuxin mach chisyijepaxo Comam Istzoti' halbilcano yu ?
45003004	¡ Machoj ! Walxinto ha'n̈e isyelal chal Comam chij isba yin̈ tzet chala waxan̈ca sunil anma caw lek'ti' , haca' yalni yul Yum Comam bay chala : Yuxin chaẍhallax c'ulal yu anma yu tzet chawala , hayet chaẍyilwen anma machi nino istx'ojal chiilchalo tawin̈ , ẍiayoj .
45003005	Wal xin ay mac chihalni haca' ti' : " Ta yu istx'ojal chicowatx'e chiixtan̈wiloj tato han̈e istoholal chiswatx'e Comam , " ẍi anma . Yuxin ¿ tzet cheyute heyalni hex ti' ? ¿ Tom istx'ojal chiswatx'e Comam yet chiyanayo isya'tajil jiban̈ yu istx'ojal chicowatx'e ? ¡ Machoj !
45003006	Caw istoholal chiswatx'e Comam . K'inaloj , ta maẍtaj istoholal chiswatx'e Comam , machim chu yoc Comam yilni yin̈ tzet chielico anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
45003007	Ay mac chitxumni haca' ti' : " Yet chiwanicojan lek'ti'al caw ec'balto chisyelo isba isyelal yip Comam Dios , yaja' ¿ tzet yin̈ xin chiillaxi yin̈ tzet chinwatx'ehan cat wallaxan mulumal ? " ẍi anma tu' .
45003008	Ay mac chalni tato hac tu' walnihan . Tato hac tu' , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin maẍtaj istx'ojal chicowatx'e yun̈e caw yixtan̈wilo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios ? Ay anma tx'oj isnabal chalni ta hac tu' incuynihan anma . Ha' mac chihalni haca' tu' , ha' ay yet yay isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios .
45003009	Wal xin , ¿ tom ec'bal c'ulon̈ han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti' sata anma mach Israeloj ? ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin lahanon̈ cosunil . Xawalan teyet tato sunil anma Israel yeb anma mach Israeloj ayicto yalan̈ yip mule .
45003010	Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios , bay chala : Machi hunu mac c'ul , nitam hunuj .
45003011	Machi hunu mac chitxumchalo yu , machi hunu mac chisaynilo Comam Dios .
45003012	Sunil mac chic'ayic'oj , sunil mac xayetato isba . Machi hunu mac chiwatx'en isc'ulal nitam hunuj .
45003013	Caw han̈etic'a istx'ojal chielti yul isti' anma , lahan haca' hunu bay mujan camom elna ismajil . Caw xin chak' subchaho yet anmahil yin̈ lek'ti'al chala . Haca' veneno ayicto yul isti' no' laba , hac tu' ismachiswalilal tzet chielti yul isti' anma .
45003014	Han̈etic'a tz'acti' chielti yul isti' anma , yeb tzoti' caw tx'oj .
45003015	Caw xin yin̈ an̈e chito potx'wal yin̈ yet anmahil .
45003016	Bajxan̈etu'wal cheq'ui chietaxto tzet ye tu' yu , bisc'ulaln̈etic'a chiec' yak'a'canoj .
45003017	Mach yohtajo isbelal yet ak'anc'ulal .
45003018	Maẍtic'a yelapno Comam Dios yul sat , ẍiayo yul Yum Comam .
45003019	Caw johtaj tato sunil tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yin̈ ley yet payat tu' , ha' tet mac ayicto yalan̈ ley tu' ha' tet chitzoteli , yun̈e sunil mac chiscach isti' , cat istak'wenico ismul yiban̈ tet Comam Dios .
45003020	Yuto machi huno mac chioc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isyijen yin̈ tzet chal ley , wal xin cachann̈e ismunil hune' ley tu' ha' isyeniloj tato caw mulumon̈ .
45003021	Tinan̈ xin , xaisyelo Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chu joc c'ulal yul sat Comam , maẍtaj yu coyijen ley . Wal xin halbilcano yu naj Mois'es yeb yu ebnaj ischejab Comam yet payat yin̈ tzet chu joc c'ulal yul sat Comam .
45003022	Yu janico janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yuxin chon̈oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , hacpax tu' xin sunil mac chianayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam chioccano c'ulal yuto lahan anma sunil .
45003023	Mulumon̈ cosunil yul sat Comam , yuxin maẍto hunu mac xatzujcha apno isc'ulch'anil Comam yu . Sunil mac yacanico ismul , yuxin nahat yehilo yin̈ iscolbanil chak' Comam Dios .
45003024	Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam yuxin chon̈oc c'ulal yul sat , yaj yu colbilon̈xa yu Comam Jesucristo , sunil ti' ak'bil matanil jet yu Comam Dios .
45003025	Comam Jesucristo oc xahanbalil yu Comam Dios . Ismalto ischiq'uil yu yak'ni nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul anma . Chischah anma hune' nimanc'ulal yu yanico yanma yin̈ Comam . Hac tu' chu isyeni Comam tato ha' istoholal chiswatx'e yet yak'ni nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul anma yet payat tiempo tu' .
45003026	Hacpax tu' tinan̈ , chisyelo Comam Dios tato ha' istoholal chiswatx'e , yeb ta yexn̈eto iswatx'en istoholal yet chon̈yalni Comam c'ulal yu chijayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
45003027	Ta hac tu' chal tu' , ¿ tzettaxca xin chielico hune' helolo'al ? Chitan̈canoj yuto maẍtaj yu coyijen isley naj Mois'es yuxin chon̈colchahi , walxinto yu janico janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
45003028	Hacpax tu' xin chu johtan̈encaniloj ta yu janico janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yuxin chon̈oc c'ulal yul sat Comam , maẍtaj yu coyijen ley .
45003029	¿ Tom han̈c'an̈e han̈on̈ Israel hon̈ ti' coDiosal ye Comam Dios ? ¿ Tom mach isDiosalopaxo anma mach Israelo ye Comam ? Wal xin caw yeli isDiosalpaxo anma mach Israelo ye Comam .
45003030	Yuto hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios , yuxin macta ayco circuncisi'on yin̈ , yeb macta machi circuncisi'on yin̈ , chioc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yaj yu yanico yanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
45003031	Yet chijanico janma yin̈ Comam , ¿ tom lan̈an jalni tato matxa tzet chal yelapno ley ? ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin chicoyelo yin̈ tzet chal yelapno ley tu' .
45004001	Haca' jichmam Abraham , ¿ tzet yu yoc icham c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios heyalni ?
45004002	Tato yu tzet iswatx'e icham yuxin oc icham c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yimican̈ isba icham , wal xin machoj .
45004003	Chal yul Yum Comam Dios : " Yayto icham Abraham yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yu hune' tu' yuxin oc icham c'ulal yul sat Comam , " ẍiayoj .
45004004	K'inalo tato ay hunu naj chimunla yinta hunu naj yahaw munil , chak'lax istohol naj . Ha' istohol naj tu' xin , mach matanilo yehi , to c'asxa ye tet naj .
45004005	Yaja' mac mach yin̈o tzet chiswatx'e chicawxi isc'ul , to chayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam , Comam chiak'ni nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul anma . Yu ayco yanma hune' mac tu' yin̈ Comam Dios , ha' chianico c'ulal yul sat Comam .
45004006	Ha' caw naj rey David halni tato caw sak'al yet mac chal Comam Dios c'ulal , maẍtaj yu tzet chiswatx'e ,
45004007	yet yalni naj haca' ti' : Sak'al yet mac ch'ak'lax nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul yu Comam Dios , cat isnahuln̈encanto Comam ismul tu' .
45004008	Sak'al yet mac matxa bak'inal chisnati Comam ismul , ẍi naj David tu' .
45004009	¿ Mac xin caw sak'al yet ? ¿ Tom han̈e mac ayco circuncisi'on yin̈ , mato hapaxo mac machi circuncisi'on yin̈ ? Wal xin xajalan̈ tato occano icham Abraham c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu yaco yanma icham yin̈ Comam .
45004010	¿ Bak'in xin oc icham c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios ? ¿ Tom yet ayxaco circuncisi'on yin̈ icham ? ¡ Machoj ! To yet maẍto chioc circuncisi'on yin̈ icham .
45004011	Wal xin tzujanilxa yoc hune' circuncisi'on tu' yin̈ icham , ha' xin oc yecheloj tato oc icham c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yuto yayto icham yul yanma yin̈ Comam . Yuxin occano icham mamehal yin̈ huntek'an mac maẍto circuncisi'on yin̈ , yaj chayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam ; hac tu' xin chu yoccano c'ulal yul sat Comam , haca' icham Abraham tu' .
45004012	Mamepaxo icham yin̈ sunil mac ayxaco circuncisi'on yin̈ , yaja' maẍtaj yin̈ hune' yechel tu' chicawxi isc'ul , to chayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam , haca' yu yanayto icham Abraham yul yanma yin̈ Comam yet yalan̈to maẍto chioc hune' yechel circuncisi'on yin̈ icham .
45004013	Yaltecano Comam Dios tet icham Abraham yeb tetej yuninal icham , tato chischah icham ismajul yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yaja' maẍtaj yu yijem icham yin̈ ley , walxinto yu yayto icham yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
45004014	K'inalo tato han̈e tet mac chiyijen ley chak' Comam Dios tzet haltebilcanoj , ta hac tu' machim tzet chal yelapno janico janma yin̈ Comam Dios chal tu' , machimpaxo tzet haltebilcano yu Comam .
45004015	Yuto ha' ismunil ley ha' yanico isya'tajil yiban̈ anma . K'inalo ta machi ley , machim mac chaco ismul yin̈ ley tu' .
45004016	Yuxin yaltecano Comam Dios hune' tu' tet icham Abraham yu yaco yanma icham yin̈ Comam . Yuxin matanil chak' Comam tzet haltebilcano yu , mach xin chishel isba to hactic'apax tu' tet yuninal icham yin̈ tzujanilxa . Ha' chal yelapno tu' to maẍn̈etaj tet mac chiyijen ley bay chak' Comam tzet yalte tu' , to jetpaxo han̈on̈ chijayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios haca' yu yanayto icham Abraham yul yanma yin̈ Comam ; yuxin occano icham mamehal jin̈ han̈on̈ ti' .
45004017	Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : " Caw tzetc'a anma chipohchacan̈ yin̈ej hawuninal , " ẍi Comam tet icham . Yaja' icham Abraham tu' yaco yanma icham yin̈ Comam , Comam chiak'ni itzitzbocan̈ camom yeb chiwatx'en tzet ye tu' maẍto watx'ebiloj .
45004018	Icham Abraham caw yayto icham yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yoc icham yechmano yin̈ tzet yalte Comam , waxan̈ca xin maẍto ixtan̈o yijni isba . Hac tu' xin yu yoc icham mamehal yin̈ tx'i'al ej con̈ob , haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam tet icham yet yalni haca' ti' : " Haca' isbisil tx'umel , hac tu' isbisil anma chipohchacan̈ yin̈ ej hawuninal , " ẍi Comam .
45004019	Maẍtic'a xin cabconcan̈ yanma icham Abraham yin̈ Comam , waxan̈ca caw ichamxa icham , caw etza cien habilxa icham , hacpax tu' ix Sara , caw ixnamxa ix , matxa istiempohalo yuninwi ix .
45004020	Yaja' xin maẍtic'a cabconcan̈ isc'ul icham yin̈ tzet yalcano Comam , caw machi yilo yanma icham yin̈ Comam . Walxinto ip yanayto icham yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal Comam , yak'ni tzalaho isc'ul icham yin̈ Comam .
45004021	Caw yohta icham tato ay yip Comam iswatx'en tzet yalte tet icham .
45004022	Yu hune' tu' yuxin oc icham c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yuto yayto icham yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
45004023	Yaj maẍn̈etaj yin̈ icham Abraham tu' tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj ta oc icham c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yet yanico yanma icham yin̈ Comam ,
45004024	walxinto tz'ibn̈ebilpaxcano jin̈ han̈on̈ xacon̈oc c'ulal yu xajaco janma yin̈ Comam , Comam ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
45004025	Comam alaxico yul isk'ab camical yu comul , lahwi tu' ispitzc'alaxcan̈ xol camom , yun̈e joccano c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios .
45005001	Tinan̈ xin xacon̈oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu jaco janma yin̈ Comam , yuxin ayon̈xaco yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios yu Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
45005002	Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin xacochah isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios , yu jaco janma yin̈ Comam . Caw xin lin̈anon̈ yin̈ isc'ulal Comam tu' , yeb caw chon̈tzalahi yuto ayco yipo janma tato chak' Comam Dios isc'ulal jet , haca' isc'ulch'anil Comam .
45005003	Maẍn̈etaj yin̈ tu' chon̈tzalahi , to caw chon̈tzalapaxo yin̈ ej isya'tajil chihul jiban̈ , yuto caw johtaj tato hayet chul isya'tajil tu' caw ec'balto chicolin̈ba coba yin̈ Comam .
45005004	Yet chicolin̈ban coba yin̈ Comam tu' xin , caw ec'balto chitzala Comam jin̈ , ha' hune' tu' chioc yipo janma .
45005005	Hune' ayco yipo janma tu' mach chon̈yaco yin̈ tx'ixwilal , yuto xayak' Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul jet yet yak'ni Comam Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul janma .
45005006	Yet yalan̈to , machi hunujon̈ con̈k'oji cocolni coba , yaja' apni istiempohal bay halbilcano yu Comam Dios , yul Comam Jesucristo , yak'ni camo isba Comam yin̈ ismul anma .
45005007	Caw mach subuta yak'ni camo isba hunu anma yin̈ hunuxa maca , waxan̈ca caw c'ul hune' mac tu' , cachann̈e tato chipalc'on isc'ulch'anil isc'ul hunu maca , wal tu' aymi hunu mac chishin isba iscam seleloj .
45005008	Yaja' wal Comam Dios , caw isyelo Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul jet , waxan̈ca caw mulumon̈ , yaja' yak' camo isba Comam Jesucristo jin̈ .
45005009	Tinan̈ xin c'ulon̈xa yul sat Comam Dios yu iscamical Comam Jesucristo , yuxin yin̈ sunil janma chijala tato ha' Comam chon̈colni yin̈ isya'tajil chul yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic .
45005010	Yet yalan̈to ayco cohowal yin̈ Comam Dios yu comul , yaja' xin con̈alaxico c'ulal yu iscamical Comam Jesucristo , Isc'ahol Comam Dios . Tinan̈ xin caw johtaj tato t'in̈anxa cocolcha yu isk'inal Comam Jesucristo , yuto ayon̈xaco yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios .
45005011	Maẍn̈etaj tu' , walxinto caw chon̈tzala yin̈ Comam Dios yu Comam Jesucristo , yuto yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin ayon̈xaco yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios .
45005012	Wal xin yu hune' naj winaj , ha' ton naj Ad'an , yuxin hul mule yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ; yu mule tu' yuxin hul camical . Ha' camical tu' xin , yiban̈ sunil anma titcanoj yuto sunil anma yaco ismul .
45005013	Yet yalan̈tocanoj yet maẍto chiak'lax isley naj Mois'es ayxatic'a mule yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yaja' bay machi ley mach ixtan̈o mule .
45005014	Anma yin̈ istiempohal naj Ad'an masanta yin̈ istiempohal yet yak'lax ley tet naj Mois'es , hul camical yiban̈ anma yuto yaco ismul , waxan̈ca xin mach lahano ismul anma tu' haca' ismul naj Ad'an , yuto isman̈c'o naj hune' chejbanile yak' Comam Dios . Naj Ad'an tu' yechel hune' mac hul yin̈ tzujanilxa ye naj , yaja' xin mach lahano tzet yak'cano hunun ebnaj jet .
45005015	Ismul naj Ad'an mach lahano yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam xayak' jet , yuto yu ismul naj yuxin hul camical jiban̈ cosunil ; yaja' xin yu hune'xa mac , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo , yuxin xacochah isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios matanil . Hune' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam tu' caw niman yelapnoj , yeb chak' isc'ulal tet tx'i'al anma .
45005016	Yu ismul naj Ad'an tu' yuxin titcano isya'tajil yiban̈ anma sunil , yaja' wal isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios mach haco tu' , walxinto chak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul anma , waxan̈ca caw tx'i'al .
45005017	Hac tu' xin johtaj ta yu ismul hune' naj winaj yuxin occano anma yul isk'ab camical , yaja' xin yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chon̈oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam chak' comatanoj . Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chicochah hune' ac' k'inale yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
45005018	Yuto yu ismul naj Ad'an , yuxin cancano sunil anma yalan̈ isya'tajil , yaja' yu istoholal iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo , yuxin chon̈colcha yalan̈ isya'tajil cat cochahni cok'inal .
45005019	Yu isman̈c'omal hune' naj yuxin mulum jucanico yul sat Comam Dios cosunil , yaja' xin yu isyijemal Comam Jesucristo yuxin con̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios .
45005020	Hayet yak'lax isley naj Mois'es caw isyecanocan̈ isba ismul anma , hayet yahcan̈ mule tu' caw ec'balto isyecanilo Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul .
45005021	Haca'tic'a yu isyenilo isba yip mule yiniti camical jiban̈ cosunil , hacpax tu' yu isyenilo isba isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios . Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin con̈oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yak'nicano Comam cok'inal mach istan̈bal .
45006001	¿ Tzet con̈chi yin̈ hune' ti' ? ¿ Tom chicolahico janico comul yun̈e cam chisyelo Comam Dios isc'ulch'anil isc'ul ?
45006002	Wal xin machoj , han̈on̈ ti' camnajon̈xalo yin̈ mule , matxa jeto ay janico comul .
45006003	¿ Tom mach heyohtajo xin tato yet yah ha' cowi' hununon̈ , hunxan̈e jucano yeb Comam Jesucristo ? Hac tu' xin yu isyenilo isba tato hayet iscam Comam , cocampaxo yintaj .
45006004	Yet yah ha' cowi' isyenilo isba tato con̈muji yinta Comam Jesucristo , hac tu' yu cocamleloj . Yuxin haca'tic'a yu yitzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom yu isc'ulch'anil yip Comam Dios , hacxa tu' chu jec' yin̈ hune' ac' k'inale .
45006005	Yuto yet iscam Comam Jesucristo cocampaxo yintaj , yuxin haca'tic'a yu yitzitzbican̈ Comam tu' , hac tu' chu jitzitzbican̈ .
45006006	Caw johtaj tato hune' coicham beybal ahcano yin̈ culus yinta Comam yun̈e yelcano yip hune' cobeybal caw mulum tu' , hac tu' xin yu jelcanti yalan̈ yip mule matxa chicowatx'e .
45006007	Yuto ha' mac xacami , matxa ayocto yalan̈ yip mule .
45006008	Han̈on̈ ti' xacon̈cam yinta Comam Jesucristo , yuxin chicawxi coc'ul tato chon̈eh isc'atan̈ Comam yin̈ huneln̈e .
45006009	Caw johtaj tato itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo , matxa xin bak'inal chicami . Hune' camical tu' matxa yip yiban̈ Comam .
45006010	Yet iscam Comam Jesucristo , cam Comam huneln̈e yin̈ mule , matxa bak'inal chicami . Tinan̈ xin itzitz Comam yin̈ huneln̈e yu iswatx'en tzet chal isc'ul Comam Dios .
45006011	Hacon̈ojab tu' conabawetij tato camnajon̈xa yin̈ mule , yaja' itzitzon̈xa yu coyijen tet Comam Dios , yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
45006012	Yuxin matxa chijak' hamanil tet mule islahnico yik'ni yip yin̈ conimanil yet camical ye ti' , hac tu' xin matxa chon̈oc cowatx'e' tzettaj istx'ojal choche coc'ul cowatx'e' .
45006013	Matxa chijak' hune' conimanil ti' yin̈ mule , haca' hunu tzet ye tu' chiocnico yin̈ istx'ojal . Wal xin jak'aweco coba cowatx'en yin̈ tzet choche Comam Dios , yuto camnajon̈ yaja' pitzc'abilon̈xacan̈ . Yuxin tinan̈ jak'aweco sunil conimanil yul isk'ab Comam Dios , haca' tzet ye tu' chiocnico yin̈ isc'ulal .
45006014	Yuxin matxa yoc mule jin̈ yuto matxa ayon̈ico yalan̈ isley naj Mois'es , walxinto yalan̈xa isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios ayon̈icoj .
45006015	¿ Tzet xin cheyute heyalni ? ¿ Tom chon̈oc jak'a'paxico comul yu matxataj yalan̈ ley ayon̈icoj , to yalan̈xa isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios ? ¡ Wal xin machoj !
45006016	Caw heyohtaj tato hayet chijanico coba yalan̈ yip hunu maca , caw chon̈occano ischejabo hune' mac tu' , cat coyijen tzet chala . Hac ton tu' xin tato ha' tet mule chijak' cheja' coba , chon̈occano ischejabo mule tu' , hune' chon̈inito yin̈ camical . Yaja' ta ha' tet Comam Dios chicoyije chon̈occano ischejabo Comam , cat joccano c'ulal yul sat .
45006017	Yet yalan̈tocanoj caw chejab heyehico yin̈ mule , yaja' yuch'andios tet Comam Dios yuto tinan̈ yin̈ caw sunil heyanma cheyijen cuybanile ak'bilcano teyet .
45006018	Yet heyelcanti yalan̈ yip mule tu' heyoccano yijemal yin̈ istoholal .
45006019	Ha' huntek'an tzet chiwaltojan teyet ti' caw comonn̈e chu walnitojan yun̈e mach ya'tajo istxumchalo heyu . Haca'tic'a yu janico conimanil yijemal yin̈ sunil istx'ojal , cowatx'en isyahbetajil yeb ismachiswalilal yet yalan̈tocanoj , hacojab tu' xin chu janico conimanil yijemal yin̈ isc'ulal , hac tu' xin han̈c'an̈e tet Comam Dios chicoyije .
45006020	Hayet ayon̈toco yalan̈ yip mule mach yijemojon̈ yin̈ istoholal .
45006021	Yaja' , ¿ tzet isc'ulal jik' yin̈ huntek'an istx'ojal cowatx'e tu' , huntek'an bay chon̈tx'ixwi tinan̈ ? Wal xin han̈c'an̈e yin̈ camical mach istan̈bal chon̈yitoj .
45006022	Yaja' tinan̈ xin colbilon̈xa yalan̈ ischejbanil mule , ischejabxa Comam Dios jehi . Ha' hune' isc'ulal chak' jet xin , ha' ton joc cowatx'en sunil tzet choche Comam Dios , cat yak'nipaxo Comam cok'inal mach istan̈bal .
45006023	Yuto ha' ispaj selel mule , ha' ton camical mach istan̈bal , wal issabehal Comam Dios xayak' jet xin , ha' ton k'inale mach istan̈bal , yuto hunxan̈e je yeb Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
45007001	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex ti' heyohtaxa ley . Hune' ley tu' ay yip yiban̈ anma , yaja' han̈c'an̈e yet ayc'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
45007002	K'inalo hunu ix ix mohyinaxa tinan̈ , hunbabilxa ix yeb yichamil yu ley , yaja' han̈c'an̈e yet ayic'o naj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yaja' ta chicam naj xin , chielcanti ix yalan̈ hune' ley hunban̈ecano tu' .
45007003	Yuxin tato itzitzto yichamil ix cat ishunban isba ix yeb hunuxa naj winaj , chaco ismul ix yin̈ haca' tu' . Wal ta xacam naj xin waxan̈ca chik' ix hunxa yichamil , matxa chaco ix ismul yuto xaelti ix yalan̈ hune' ley mohban̈e ix yeb yichamil tu' .
45007004	Hacon̈ tu' hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , yet iscam Comam Jesucristo cocampaxo yebi , yuxin yul sat Comam Dios camomon̈xa tet isley naj Mois'es . Wal tinan̈ yeton̈xa Comam Jesucristo , Comam pitzc'acan̈ xol camom . Hac tu' xin haxa tzet choche Comam Dios ha' chicowatx'e .
45007005	Yet yalan̈tocanoj yet ayon̈toco cowatx'en tzet choche isc'ul hune' conimanil ti' , ha' hune' ley tu' ak'ni yochecan̈ janma istx'ojal choche conimanil ti' , ha' xin con̈inito yin̈ camical .
45007006	Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin camnajon̈xa yin̈ hune' ley bay ayon̈icto yet yalan̈tocano tu' , hac tu' xin yu joccano yalan̈ yip hune' ac' beybale yet Comam Esp'iritu Santo , matxataj yalan̈ ischejbanil ley tz'ibn̈ebilcano yet payat ayon̈icoj .
45007007	¿ Tzet cheyute hetxumni ? ¿ Tom tx'oj isley naj Mois'es tu' , chal tu' ? ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin ta machi ley machim wohtajojan tzet challax mulehal . Caw machim wohtajojan ta tx'oj jochenico hunu tzet ye tu' ta mach chal ley haca' ti' : " Mach chu hawochenico hunu tzet ye tu' mach hawetoj , " ẍi .
45007008	Yu hune' chejbanile ti' , yuxin pitzc'a sunil istx'ojal win̈an , wilnilojan wochenicojan tzet ye tu' mach c'uloj . Yuto ta machi ley , machim tzet chal yelapno mule .
45007009	Yet maẍto wohtajojan ley tu' caw itzitzinan , yaja' yet wohtan̈enilojan ley tu' intxumnilojan ta camominan yul sat Comam Dios .
45007010	Hune' ley tu' ak'laxi yu yak'ni k'inale , yaja' xin ha' camical yiti wiban̈an .
45007011	Yu hune' ley tu' yuxin yik' yip mule win̈an , quinyak'ni subchahojan , ha' xin initi camical wiban̈an yu inmulan .
45007012	Wal xin yin̈ caw isyelal , hune' ley tu' yet Comam Dios yehi , hacpax tu' xin chejbanile ayco yin̈ yet Comam , caw toholcanoj yeb caw c'ul .
45007013	¿ Tzet xin chu hetxumni ? ¿ Tom ha' hune' ley c'ul tu' initi camical wiban̈an ? ¡ Machoj ! Walxinto yu isyenilo isba tato caw tx'ojcano mule , yuxin yiti camical wiban̈an yu hune' mule . Ha' hune' ley c'ul tu' , ha' yeniloj tato caw machiswalilcano mule .
45007014	Caw johtaj tato ha' Yesp'iritu Comam Dios an̈eti hune' ley tu' , yaja' walinan ayinicojan yin̈ hune' nimanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yuxin haca'tan̈e txon̈bilinan ischejabo mule .
45007015	Ha' tzet chinwatx'ehan mach c'ulo chiwilan , yuto ha' isc'ulal chiwochehan inwatx'ehan mach chinwatx'epaxojan . Wal xin ha' huntek'an tzet yahbil wuhan ha' chinwatx'epaxojan .
45007016	Yuxin tato ha' istx'ojal machi wochehan inwatx'ehan ha' chinwatx'epaxojan , hac tu' chu wohtan̈enilojan tato maẍtaj ley tu' tx'oj , to caw c'ul .
45007017	Yuto maẍtaj-caw-inan chinwatx'ehan huntek'an istx'ojal tu' , to ha' mule ik'biltic'a yu hune' innimanilti'an , ha' chiwatx'eni .
45007018	Caw wohtajan tato hune' innimanilan caw mulum ti' , machi nino isc'ulal ayco yin̈ , yuto hayet chiwochehan inwatx'enan isc'ulal , mach chu inwatx'enan .
45007019	Ha' isc'ulal chiwochehan inwatx'e'an , mach chinwatx'epaxojan . Wal xin ha' istx'ojal mach chiwochehan inwatx'ehan , ha' chinwatx'epaxojan .
45007020	Yuxin tato ha' tzet mach chiwochehan inwatx'ehan , ha' chinwatx'epaxojan , maẍtajinan chinwatx'ehan huntek'an tu' , to haxa mule ayco win̈an ha' chiak'ni wuban .
45007021	Caw chiwilan tato hayet chinwatx'enan isc'ulal walnihan , to ha' istx'ojal chati isba yin̈ insatan .
45007022	Wal wanmahan , caw chitzala yin̈ isley Comam Dios ,
45007023	yaja' xin ay hune' tzet chicachni inyijenan , hune' ley bay chintzalatu'an , ha' ton isley mule ayco win̈an , yuxin haca' preso wehan yu hune' mule chichejni wuban istx'ojal .
45007024	Caw c'anch'aninan , ¿ mactaxca chu quiniscolnihan yul isk'ab hune' camical ayco win̈ti'an ?
45007025	Wal xin han̈c'an̈e Comam Dios chu quiniscolnihan , yaja' yu Comam Jesucristo Jahawil ; yuxin caw chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam . Yuxin chiwohtan̈elojan tato wanmahan choche isyije' yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios , yaj wal mule ayco win̈an xin ha' chinijbanan yin̈ istx'ojal .
45008001	Wal tinan̈ xin hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo , yuxin matxa isya'tajil chayo Comam Dios jiban̈ yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic yuto matxa chicowatx'e tzet choche conimanil , to ha' tzet choche Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
45008002	Ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo tu' chiak'ni cok'inal mach istan̈bal yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo . Yu yip Comam Esp'iritu yuxin colbilon̈xa yul isk'ab mule yeb tet camical .
45008003	Yu mule ayco yin̈ conimanil machi yu coyijen isley naj Mois'es , yuxin mach k'oji ley tu' con̈iscolni yalan̈ mule . Yaja' wal Comam Dios yati Comam Isc'ahol yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ha' xin isnimanil Comam Jes'us lahan haca' hune' conimanil yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Iscam Comam yin̈ comul , hac tu' xin yu yak'nicano tan̈o Comam comul yin̈ isnimanil .
45008004	Iswatx'e Comam haca' tu' yun̈e cowatx'en istoholal haca' yalni ley . Yuto matxataj tzet chal hune' conimanil yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chicowatx'e , to haxa tzet choche Comam Esp'iritu Santo , ha'xa chicowatx'e .
45008005	Yuto ha' mac chibeybaln̈en yin̈ tzet choche isnimanil , han̈ech'an yin̈ tu' bay chiyaco isnabal . Wal mac chibeybaln̈en yin̈ tzet choche Comam Esp'iritu Santo , ha' yin̈ tzet choche Comam tu' bay ayco isnabal .
45008006	Wal xin ta han̈e tzet choche conimanil ayco yin̈ conabal cowatx'eni , hune' tu' chon̈yito yin̈ camical mach istan̈bal , wal ta ha' tzet choche Comam Esp'iritu Santo ayco yin̈ conabal cowatx'eni , chicochah cok'inal mach istan̈bal , cat con̈yanico yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios .
45008007	Mac han̈c'an̈e tzet choche isnimanil ayco yin̈ yanma iswatx'eni , caw ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam Dios , yuto mach chisje isc'ul isyije ischejbanil Comam , yeb xin mach chik'oji isyijeni .
45008008	Yuxin ha' mac han̈e tzet choche isnimanil chisbeybaln̈e , mach chu iswatx'en tzet choche Comam Dios .
45008009	Yaja' wal hex ti' , matxa chebeybaln̈e haca' tzet choche henimanil , to haxa hune' ac' nabale chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyet ha' chebeybaln̈e . Tato ay mac mach ayayto Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul yanma mach yeto Comam Jesucristo yehi .
45008010	Ta ayxayto Comam Cristo yul heyanma , waxan̈ca cambehal ye henimanil yu mule , wal heyanma xin ay isk'inal mach istan̈bal , yuto xaquexcan c'ulal yul sat Comam .
45008011	Tato ayco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios teyin̈ , Comam pitzc'ancan̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom , ha' Comam chiak'ni hune' ac' nimanile tet henimanil cambehal yehi yu Yesp'iritu ayco teyin̈ .
45008012	Wal tinan̈ xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , yilal cobeybaln̈en tzet choche Comam Esp'iritu , machojabtaj istx'ojal tzet chal conimanil .
45008013	Yuto ta ha' tzet choche henimanil ha' chewatx'e , chexcam yul sat Comam Dios , yaja' tato yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo chebej hewatx'en tzettaj choche henimanil , ay hek'inal mach istan̈bal .
45008014	Sunil mac ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiijbani , ha' huntek'an mac tu' yuninal Comam Dios yehi .
45008015	Yuto Comam Esp'iritu Santo chabilxa ju mach chon̈yaco yalan̈ ischejbanil ley hunelxa cat coxiwpaxoj haca' yet yalan̈tocanoj . Wal xin ha' Comam Esp'iritu tu' chon̈anico yuninalo Comam Dios , yuxin yin̈ sunil janma chijal tet Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Hach Inmaman , " con̈chi .
45008016	Ha'tic'a Comam Esp'iritu Santo chalni tet janma tato yuninalxa Comam Dios jehi .
45008017	Yu yuninalon̈xa Comam Dios yuxin chicochah comajul tet Comam . Hune' comajul tu' hun chu cochahni yeb Comam Jesucristo tato ha' hunon̈ chijak'le isya'tajil yinta Comam ; ta hac tu' hun chu cochahni isc'ulal yeb Comam .
45008018	Yin̈ caw yeli sunil isya'tajil lan̈an jilni tinan̈ caw matzet chaliloj yuto mach chu colahban yeb isc'ulch'anil chak' Comam jet yin̈ hune' tiempohal chul cosataj .
45008019	Sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios mach chitecha yu yilni bak'in chak' Comam Dios ohtan̈elaxoj tato yuninalxa Comam Dios jehi .
45008020	Yuto sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios etaxcantoj , yaja' maẍtaj yu hac tu' yoche , wal xin ha' Comam Dios chahni etaxotoj . Yaja' ayco yipo janma ,
45008021	ta chicolcha tzet watx'ebil yu Comam yalan̈ yip isya'tajil bay aycoj , haca' chu cocolcha han̈on̈ yuninalon̈xa Comam Dios ti' , cat cochahni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam .
45008022	Johtaj tato sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios ayco yin̈ isya'tajil . Caw xin chiel yaw haca' hunu ix ix chiaben isya'il yet chiwatx'i isc'ul , hac tu' ye sunil tzet iswatx'e Comam tu' tinan̈ .
45008023	Maẍn̈etaj huntek'an tu' lan̈an yaben isya'tajil , walxinto ha' hunon̈ han̈on̈ chabilxa Comam Esp'iritu Santo ju lan̈an jabenpaxoj isya'tajil . Ak'bilxa Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet haca' babel sabehal xol sunil tzet ch'ak'lax jet , yaj waxan̈ca hac tu' ayto isya'tajil chijak'le masanto yet chiapni istiempohal bay chon̈ohtan̈elaxi tato con̈yuninalxa Comam Dios . Ha' to tu' xin chicolcha hune' conimanil ti' tet mule .
45008024	Yettax cochahni cocolbanil yichico iscawxi coc'ul ta chon̈collax yin̈ sunil . K'inalo tato xacochah tzet ayco yipo janma tu' , ¿ tom chito jechma yuli ? ¡ Machoj ! Yuto baytet chijilico yin̈ matxa chijechma .
45008025	Wal xin caw niman chijute coc'ul jechman tzet ayco yipo janma tu' , yuto maẍto chijilico yin̈ .
45008026	Ha'tic'apaxo xin Comam Esp'iritu Santo chicolwa jin̈ yin̈ tzet mach chon̈k'oji cotxumni , yuto yet chon̈txahli mach johtajo yin̈ tzet chu cok'anni haca' chal isc'ul Comam Dios , yaja' xin Comam Esp'iritu chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios . Ha' huntek'an tzoti' chal Comam Esp'iritu tu' , machi tzoti' ti' chihalni jet tzet yoqui .
45008027	Yaj wal Comam Dios yohtan̈e tzet chiec' yin̈ conabal , chistxum Comam tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tu' , yuto ha' tzet choche isc'ul Comam ha' chisk'an Comam Esp'iritu yin̈ istxah jin̈ han̈on̈ yeton̈xa Comam ti' .
45008028	Johtaj tato sunil tzet ye tu' chihul jiban̈ han̈on̈ chijoche Comam Dios , to yu isc'ulal jin̈ yuxin chul jiban̈ han̈on̈ awtebilon̈xa yu Comam yun̈e yijni isba tzet choche Comam jin̈ .
45008029	Yuto yohtaxa Comam macta yet Comam yettaxtic'a payat , hatax tu' con̈issic'lencano Comam joc yuninaloj , yun̈e haca' Isc'ahol Comam chon̈elcanicoj . Hac tu' yute Comam yun̈e ha' Isc'ahol Comam tu' ha' chioc babel C'ahole xol tx'i'al mac yuninal Comam Dios .
45008030	Han̈on̈ con̈issayilo Comam yet payat tu' , han̈on̈ con̈yawtepaxo Comam . Han̈on̈ awtebilon̈ yu Comam tu' con̈cancano c'ulal sata Comam Dios , yak'nipaxo Comam isc'ulch'anil jet .
45008031	¿ Tzet xin chijute jalni yin̈ huntek'an ti' ? Tato ayco Comam Dios jetbihoj , ¿ mactaxca chu isk'oji jin̈ ?
45008032	Mach isman̈c'o Comam yak'ni Isc'ahol yul isk'ab camical jin̈ cosunil , ¿ hatoc'anab xin isc'ulal mach chak' Comam jet yinta Isc'ahol tu' ? Wal xin chak' Comam .
45008033	Han̈on̈ saybilon̈xa yu Comam ti' . ¿ Tom ayto hunu mac chu yoc ak'oc'ule jin̈ tet Comam Dios xin ? Machi hunu maca yuto xacon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios .
45008034	¿ Mactaxca chu iscawxenico hunu comul jiban̈ ? Machi maca , yuto cam Comam Jes'us yu comul , yitzitzbipaxocan̈ Comam . Tinan̈ xin ayco Comam yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios , lan̈an istzotel jin̈ tet Comam .
45008035	Caw xahan ayon̈ yu Comam Cristo , ¿ mac xin chu con̈ispohnilo yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam tu' ? ¿ Chimyu con̈ispohnilo isya'tajil , maca bisc'ulal , maca yu chon̈cajlax yu Istzoti' Comam , maca yu wahil , maca yu man̈xilk'apehal , maca hunu il , maca yu camical ?
45008036	Haca' yalni Istzoti' Comam Dios bay tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj : Hawu yuxin ayon̈n̈etic'acojan̈ yul isk'ab camical hunun tz'ayic . Haca' chiutelax no' me' chiilaxto camoj , hac tu' chon̈utelaxan̈ , ẍiayoj .
45008037	Yaja' waxan̈ca chihul huntek'an isya'tajil tu' jiban̈ , chon̈k'oji yin̈ yu iscolwal Comam xahan chon̈ilni .
45008038	Yuxin caw wohtajan tato machi hunu ti' chu con̈ispohnilo yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios ; mach yuho camical , mach yuho k'inale , mach yuho ebnaj 'angel , mach yuho huntek'an esp'iritu matzwalil ay yip chieq'ui , mach yuho tzet chijilico yin̈ , mach yuho tzet maẍto chihuli .
45008039	Mach yuho tzet ay yul satcan̈ , mach yuho tzet ay sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Machi hunu tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios chu con̈ispohnilo yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam , yuto ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
45009001	Wal haninti'an , chabilxa Comam Jesucristo wuhan yul wanmahan , yuxin ha' huntek'an chiwalan teyet ti' caw yeli , mach lek'ti'aloj , yebpaxo xin ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni intxumu'an tato caw yel tzet chiwalti'an .
45009002	Ay hune' inbisc'ulalan yin̈ wet con̈ob Israelan , hune' bisc'ulal ti' caw ya'n̈etic'a yeco yin̈ wanmahan hunun tz'ayic .
45009003	K'inalo ta chicolcha ebnaj wet con̈obtu'an yu chink'antijan isya'tajil wiban̈an tet Comam Dios cat winilo inbahan yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , ta hune' tu' chicolwa yin̈ wet con̈obtu'an , sunil inc'ulan chink'annihan .
45009004	Yuto wet con̈ob Israeltu'an yaco Comam Dios ebnaj yuninaloj , caw ec' Comam xol ebnaj yeb isk'ak'al yip , iswatx'en Comam istrato yeb ebnaj , yak'nipaxo ischejbanil tet ebnaj , ha' ton isley naj Mois'es . Isyeni Comam tet ebnaj yin̈ tzet chu yinayo isba ebnaj tet Comam , tx'i'al xin tzet yaltecano Comam tet ebnaj .
45009005	Titna anma wet con̈obtu'an yin̈ ebnaj jichmam sic'bililo yu Comam Dios , istitpaxo Comam Cristo yin̈ ebnaj jichmam tu' yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Ha' Comam tu' Yahaw yeco yiban̈ sunil tzettaj ye tu' , yuxin jak'aweco ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Hacojab tu' .
45009006	Mach sunil ebnaj tit yin̈ yuninal ebnaj Israel iscon̈ob Comam Dios yehi , yuto mach sunil ebnaj yijem yute isba yin̈ tzet yal Comam Dios .
45009007	Mach sunilo ebnaj titna yin̈ icham Abraham , yuninal icham Abraham tu' yul sat Comam Dios , yuto yal Comam tet icham Abraham haca' ti' : " Yin̈n̈e naj Isaac chipohcha hawuninal , " ẍi Comam .
45009008	Ha' chal yelapno tu' maẍtaj yu yin̈ icham Abraham titna hunu maca yuxin yuninal Comam Dios yehi , walxinto han̈c'an̈e mac pitzc'ana yalan̈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios , han̈c'an̈e huntek'an mac tu' chal Comam Dios yuninalo icham Abraham .
45009009	Yuto yalte Comam tet icham Abraham haca' ti' : " Yet chinhulan yet hunab haca' hune' tiempohal ti' ayxa nich'an iswinaj unin hawixal Sara ti' , " ẍi Comam .
45009010	Yaja' xin maẍn̈etaj hune' tu' , ha' ebnaj cawan̈ yunin ix Rebeca hune'n̈e ismam ebnaj , ha' ton jichmam Isaac .
45009011	Yaja' yet maẍto chipitzc'a niẍte istioẍ unin ix Rebeca tu' , maẍto isc'ulal maca istx'ojal xaiswatx'e , yalni Comam Dios tet ix Rebeca : " Naj babel , choc naj ischejabo naj iscab , " ẍi Comam . Hune' ti' chielico haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chal haca' ti' : " Naj Jacob sic'bilxa wuhan , wal naj Esa'u man̈c'obil naj wuhan , " ẍiayoj . Hac tu' chu isyenilo isba tato ha' Comam Dios chisic'len mac chioc yuninaloj . Maẍtaj yu tzet chiswatx'e hunu maca yuxin chaco Comam Dios yuninaloj .
45009012	
45009013	
45009014	¿ Tzet chu cotxumni hune' ti' ? ¿ Tom maẍtaj istoholal chiswatx'e Comam chal tu' ? machoj . Wal xin ha' istoholal chiswatx'e Comam .
45009015	Yuto yal Comam Dios tet naj Mois'es : " Chitz'ay inc'ulan yin̈ mac bay chal inc'ulan , cat wak'nipaxojan nimanc'ulal yin̈ mac bay chal inc'ulan , " ẍi Comam .
45009016	Yuxin waxan̈ca caw chijoche maca chicowatx'e hunu tzet ye tu' yu joc yuninalo Comam Dios , mach chuhi . Walxinto ha' Comam chitz'ay isc'ul jin̈ yuxin chon̈yaco yuninaloj .
45009017	Chalpaxo Istzoti' Comam Dios tato yal Comam tet naj isreyal Egipto haca' ti' : " Cachwacojan reyal yun̈e isyenilo isba wipan tawin̈ yin̈ sunil tzet chawatx'e . Hac tu' chu yohtan̈enilo sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' tato caw ay wipan , " ẍi Comam tet naj .
45009018	Yuxin chitz'ay isc'ul Comam yin̈ mac bay choche chitz'ay isc'ul , cat yak'nipaxo cawbo Comam yanma mac chal isc'ul .
45009019	Yaja' ayexmi cheyal wetan ; " Tato hac tu' yehi , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin chon̈yal Comam tx'ojal ? ¿ Mac hunu chipalc'on yiban̈ tzet choche isc'ul Comam iswatx'e ? " quexchimi .
45009020	Yaja' hach wet anmahil , ¿ tzet hawehi yuxin chachoc hak'ambe' tet Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e ? ¿ Tom chal tx'otx' xi tet mac watx'en̈e haca' ti' ? : " ¿ Tzet yuxin hac ti' maquinhawutehan ? " ¿ Tom ẍi tx'otx' ?
45009021	Walxinto ha' naj tz'ajom xi tu' chiswatx'e naj tx'otx' haca' chal isc'ul , ta choche naj chiswatx'e naj tx'otx' aycan̈ istohol , maca tx'otx' comon , yaja' hune'n̈etic'a tx'otx'al bay chiswatx'e naj tx'otx' iscab majanil .
45009022	Hacpax tu' Comam Dios yeb anma , waxan̈ca yoche Comam isyebalo yip yeb ishowal iswi' yin̈ mac chaco ismul , yaja' xin yak' techaho Comam yak'ni nimanc'ulal yin̈ macta yetxatic'a isto yin̈ isya'tajil yeb yin̈ camical .
45009023	Hac tu' xin chu isyenipaxilo Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul jin̈ , han̈on̈ con̈issiq'uilo Comam yet yalan̈tocanoj , yu joccano yin̈ isc'ulal .
45009024	Wal xin ha' Comam Dios con̈awteni , ay mac xol ebnaj Israel , aypaxo mac xol anma mach Israelo yawte Comam yuninaloj .
45009025	Haca' yu istz'ibn̈encano ischejab Comam Dios yet payat chiyij Oseas haca' ti' : " Ha' mac mach incon̈obojan , chiwacojan incon̈obojan . Mac maẍtic'a xahano wilan , xahanxa chiwilan tinan̈ , " ẍi Comam .
45009026	Ha'tic'a bay yal Comam hune' tu' , ha'tic'a tu' bay yalpaxo Comam hune' ti' : " Hex ti' mach quexincon̈obojan , " ẍi Comam . Ha'tic'a bey tu' chihallaxpaxo anma yuninalo Comam , Comam Dios itzitz , ẍiayoj .
45009027	Hacpax tu' naj Isa'ias ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , yalpaxo naj yin̈ ebnaj israelita : " Waxan̈ca caw tzetc'acano isbisil anma chitit yin̈ naj Israel , haca' isbisil arena ayayo isti'la ha' mar , yaja' caw haywan̈n̈e ebnaj chicolchahi ,
45009028	yuto toxa chiyil Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yin̈ ismul , " ẍiayoj .
45009029	Yalpaxo naj Isa'ias : Ha' Comam Dios caw aycano yip , ta mach issic'lecano Comam haywan̈o jic'al , caw lahanmi con̈elico haca' con̈ob Sodoma yeb con̈ob Gomorra , ẍiayoj .
45009030	¿ Tzet xin chu cotxumni hune' ti' ? Walxinto ha' anma mach Israeloj , huntek'an mach ayoco yin̈ isc'ul , iscan c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , ha' tzujcha apno yu yoc c'ulal sata Comam Dios yuto yayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
45009031	Wal anma Israel ayco isyijeno isley naj Mois'es yun̈e iscan c'ulal sata Comam Dios yalni , yaj xin mach tzujcha apno yu anma tu' .
45009032	Yaja' , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxin hac tu' elico ebnaj ? Wal xin yuto ha' yalni ta yu tzet chiswatx'e chican ebnaj c'ulal sata Comam Dios , maẍtaj yu yanico yanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Yuxin haca' hunu ch'en ch'en bay chon̈txak'mohi , hac tu' ye Comam Jesucristo yul sat ebnaj .
45009033	Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam bay chala : Yul con̈ob Si'on chiwacojan hune' mac haca' ch'en ch'en bay chitxak'mo anma Israel . ha' xin ch'en chiak'ni ayc'ayoj . Wal anma chayto yul yanma yin̈ hune' mac tu' , mach chican yin̈ tx'ixwilal , ẍiayoj .
45010001	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , ha' hune' chiwochehan yeb caw ayinicojan ink'annihan tet Comam Dios ta chischah wet con̈ob Israelan iscolbanil .
45010002	Haninti'an chiwaco inbahan yin̈ walnihan tato caw yijem ebnaj tet Comam , cachann̈e xin mach haca'o yalni isyelal cuybanile .
45010003	Wal xin mach yohtajo ebnaj yin̈ tzet chu iscan c'ulal sata Comam Dios , yuto ischuquil ebnaj chisayni yoc c'ulal yul sat Comam , mach chisje ebnaj yabeto yin̈ tzet halbilcano yu Comam yin̈ tzet chu iscan c'ulal .
45010004	Yuto isley naj Mois'es cachnacano ismunil yin̈ Comam Cristo , yuxin macxan̈etic'a chianayto Comam yul yanma chicancano c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios .
45010005	Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu naj Mois'es yul Yum Comam yin̈ tzet chu cocan c'ulal yu ley , chalni : " Macn̈etic'a tz'ajan isyijen ley , chischah isk'inal yu ley tu' , " ẍiayoj .
45010006	Yaja' wal yin̈ cocan c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu janico janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , tz'ibn̈ebilcanayoj : " Machojab ch'ec' yin̈ heyanma haca' ti' : ` ¿ Mactaxca chito yul satcan̈ ? ' tajca quexchi . ( Ha' chal yelapno tu' yun̈e yoc yinayti Comam Cristo . )
45010007	Machojab chiec'paxo yul heyanma haca' ti' : ` ¿ Mactaxca chito yul cambal ? ' tajca quexchi , " ẍihayoj . ( Ha' chal yelapno tu' , chioc yik'a'ti Comam Cristo xol camom yalni . )
45010008	¿ Tzet chute yalni chal tu' ? Wal xin chal Yum Comam Dios : " Hecawilal ayco Istzoti' Comam Dios , chu heyalni yu heti' , yul heyanma aycoj , " ẍi . Huntek'an tzoti' tu' xin ha' ton cuybanile yin̈ janico janma yin̈ Comam Dios , hune' chijalic'ojan̈ .
45010009	Ta chijal yu coti' tato ha' Comam Jes'us ha' Jahawil , cat xin janayto yul janma tato yak' itzitzbocan̈ Comam Dios Comam xol camom , ay cocolbanil chal tu' .
45010010	Wal xin chon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu chijayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Jes'us , yeb yet chijalni yu coti' ta ha' Comam Jes'us Jahawil , cat cocolchacanoj .
45010011	Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios : " Sunil mac chianayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios mach chican yin̈ tx'ixwilal , " ẍiayoj .
45010012	Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios tato mach nano ye ebnaj Israel , mach nano yepaxo ebnaj mach Israeloj , wal xin lahann̈e anma sunil sata Comam Dios . Han̈e xin Comam Yahawil yin̈ sunil anma . Macxan̈etic'a chiawten Comam yin̈ chak' Comam isc'ulal tet yin̈ caw tx'i'al .
45010013	Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios : " Sunil mac chiawten Comam Dios yin̈ , chicolchahi , " ẍiayoj .
45010014	¿ Tzettaxca chu yawten anma Comam yin̈ tato maẍto chayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam ? Yeb xin , ¿ tzettaxca chu yanayto yul yanma tato maẍto bay chabe anma yin̈ Comam ? ¿ Tzettaxca xin chu yaben anma tato machi mac chihalni Istzoti' Comam tu' tet ?
45010015	¿ Tzettaxca xin chu yallaxic'o Istzoti' Comam ta machi mac chichejni hallaxoj ? Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : " Hanta sak'alil yet mac chiec' halnoc'o tzoti' yet ak'anc'ulal yeb Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile , " ẍi .
45010016	Yaja' mach sunilo mac choche yabe hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile , haca' yalni naj Isa'ias : " Mamin , mach chayto anma yul yanma yin̈ Hatzoti' chijalic'ojan̈ , " ẍi naj .
45010017	Wal xin hayet chijabeni chipitzc'ati janico janma yin̈ Comam Dios , ha' xin tzet chijabe tu' ha' ton Istzoti' Comam Cristo .
45010018	Yaja' , ¿ tzet cheyute heyalni ? ¿ Tom mach yabe anma Israel hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile ti' ? ¡ Wal xin caw yabe ! Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : Sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' bay ch'abelaxi masanta bay chicachnacan apno yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ẍiayoj .
45010019	Chink'ambepaxojan : ¿ Tom xin mach yohtan̈elo anma Israel hune' tu' ? Wal xin ha' naj Mois'es halni yin̈ babelal yin̈ tzet chute yalni Comam Dios : Chiwak' chiwahojan hec'ul yin̈ huntek'an con̈ob matzet chal yelapnoj cat wak'nitijan hehowal yu tzet chiwak'an tet hune' con̈ob ayco yin̈ sucal , ẍiayoj .
45010020	Yalnipaxo naj Isa'ias yin̈ caw haban , yin̈ Tzoti' yak' Comam Dios : Ha' mac mach quinsaynihan , quinilchalojan yu . Inyenipaxo inbahan tet mac mach quink'ambenan , ẍi Comam , ẍi naj Isa'ias .
45010021	Yaja' wal yin̈ anma Israel yal naj Isa'ias yin̈ tzet yal Comam Dios : " Caw sunilbal tz'ayic quinawihan tet anma Israel , yaja' maẍtic'a isyije tzet walan , yuto caw man̈c'omn̈etic'a , " ẍi Comam , ẍi naj Isa'ias .
45011001	Tinan̈ xin chink'ambehan : ¿ Tom xayintan̈ecanilto Comam Dios iscon̈ob chal tu' ? ¡ Machoj ! Chisje hetxumni win̈an , haninti'an Israel inpaxojan , icham Abraham wichmaman , yin̈ naj Benjam'in titnajinan .
45011002	Hataxtic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj , yanicanico Comam Dios ebnaj Israel tu' iscon̈oboj , tinan̈ xin mach yahbilo anma Israel tu' yu Comam . Chisje henaniti yin̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam yin̈ naj El'ias yet yalni naj tet Comam Dios yin̈ ej ismul yet con̈ob Israel :
45011003	" Mamin , ebnaj wet con̈obti'an yak' camo ebnaj ebnaj hachejab , yuchc'anpaxto ebnaj bay chiak'lax xahanbal tawet . Haninxan̈ehan ayinic'ojan , yaja' chinispotx'paxojan ebnaj yalni , " ẍi naj .
45011004	Istak'wi Comam Dios tet naj El'ias tu' : " Xainsiq'uilojan hujeb mil ebnaj winaj mach ay jahno sata tioẍ Baal , " ẍi Comam .
45011005	Hacpax tu' tinan̈ , ay haywan̈ ebnaj sic'bililo yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios .
45011006	Yuto yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam yuxin issiq'uilo Comam ebnaj , maẍtaj yu tzet iswatx'e ebnaj . Yaja' ta yu isc'ulal iswatx'e ebnaj yuxin issiq'uilo Comam ebnaj , matxam tzet chal yelapno isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam chal tu' .
45011007	¿ Tzet xin elico anma Israel ? Wal xin issay ebnaj yin̈ tzet yu iscan c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yaja' mach tzujcha apno yu ebnaj . Han̈c'an̈e ebnaj issiq'uilo Comam can c'ulal sata Comam , wal huntek'anxa ebnaj Israel tu' yak' cawbolo Comam yanma ebnaj .
45011008	Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : " Yak' cawbo Comam Dios yanma ebnaj . Waxan̈ca chil ebnaj yip Comam , yaja' mach chitxumcha yu ebnaj . Waxan̈ca chabe ebnaj Istzoti' Comam , yaja' mach chitxumchapaxo yu ebnaj yin̈ tzet chaliloj . Hac tu' ye huntek'an ebnaj tu' tinan̈ , " ẍiayo .
45011009	Yalpaxo naj David : Ha'tic'a isk'in̈ ebnaj chiyec'tze tet Comam Dios , ha' chioc latz'abo yin̈ , yun̈e yayc'ayi cat yalaxayo isya'tajil yiban̈ .
45011010	Haca'tan̈e chitan̈ilo ismujlubal yuxin mach chu yilni . Haca' hunu mac c'on̈anxa ye yalan̈ ijatz , hac tu' chucano ebnaj yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , ẍi naj rey David .
45011011	Tinan̈ xin chink'ambepaxojan : ¿ Tom xin hayet yayc'ay ebnaj Israel tu' yayc'aycano ebnaj yin̈ huneln̈e ? ¡ Machoj ! Yuto hayet isman̈c'on ebnaj yin̈ tzet yal Comam Dios , istzujcha apno isc'ulch'anil yu anma mach Israeloj yun̈e hayet chilni ebnaj Israel tu' cat yochenico ebnaj isc'ulal Comam .
45011012	Yuxin tato hayet yanico ismul ebnaj Israel ischahnicano tzetc'a anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' isc'ulal Comam Dios , yeb tato yet yayc'ay ebnaj Israel tu' ischahnicano anma mach Israelo isc'ulal Comam , hajxam yet chimeltzoco sunil anma Israel yul isk'ab Comam Dios , hantan̈em isc'ulal chischah sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
45011013	Tinan̈ xin , ay hune' tzet chiwalan teyet hex mach Israeloj . Ha' Comam an̈einicojan ischejabo xol anma mach Israeloj , caw xin niman yelapno ye hune' munil ti' yul insatan .
45011014	Chiwochehan tato chil ebnaj wet con̈obti'an hecolchahi , c'uxantaxca ay ebnaj chochecan̈ cat iscolchapaxoj .
45011015	Tato hayet yintan̈encanilo Comam Dios anma Israel , yoc anma mach Israelo yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam ; nanxam yoc isc'ulal yet chichahlax ebnaj Israel tu' yu Comam hunelxa , lahanmi haca' yet chiitzitzbican̈ anma yin̈ camical .
45011016	K'inalo haca' ixim babel pan chiwatx'i yin̈ ixim harina , ta yet Comam ye ixim babel , yetpaxo Comam ye sunil ixim harina tu' , chal tu' . Yebpaxo xin hunu te te' , tato yet Comam ye isxe' te' yettic'apaxo Comam ye isk'ab te' , chal tu' .
45011017	Ay ebnaj Israel ti' haca' isk'ab te' olivo tzoc'bililoj , hac tu' yehi , haxa hex ti' xin lahanex haca' isk'ab te' xol telajil olivo tzac'bilico yin̈ yoj te' caw olivo isselelo ebnaj . Hac tu' yu heyetbin̈encano heba yeb te' isxe' olivo tu' , heyik'nicano hek'inal yin̈ te' .
45011018	Mach cheyala ta ec'bal c'ulex sata te' caw isk'ab olivo tu' , ta cheyala ta ec'bal c'ulex xin , nawetij tato maẍtajex ik'n̈e te' isxe' olivo tu' , to ha' te' xe' tu' ik'n̈ehex .
45011019	Yaja' chimheyal haca' ti' : " Tzoc'laxilto te' isk'ab tu' yun̈e cotzac'balaxico yin̈ te' yoj olivo tu' , " quexchimi .
45011020	Yeli hac tu' yehi , anma Israel tu' ilaxiloj yuto mach yayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam , wal hexpaxo xin yu heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam , yuxin quexalaxico isselelo ebnaj ; yuxin machojab cheyican̈ heba , xiwan̈wej .
45011021	Yuto ta mach yak' nimanc'ulal Comam Dios yin̈ ebnaj Israel haca' isk'ab te' caw olivo yehi , hajxamexpaxo chal tu' , mach chak' nimanc'ulal Comam teyin̈ ta chebej heyanayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam .
45011022	Txumweloj tato caw c'ulch'an isc'ul Comam , yaja' xin caw howpaxoj . Caw yiti Comam ishowal yin̈ ebnaj yetato isba , wal teyin̈ xin caw c'ulch'an yute isc'ul Comam , yaja' tan̈e yin̈n̈e isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam chelahico iscawxi hec'ul , ta mach xin ha' hunex chextzoc'laxiltoj .
45011023	Yaja' xin ta chimeltzo ebnaj Israel cat yanayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam chialaxpaxico ebnaj yin̈ yoj te' olivo hunelxa , yuto ay yip Comam yanico ebnaj isk'abo te' hunelxa .
45011024	Hex mach Israelo hex ti' , lahanex haca' isk'ab te' xol telajil olivo quextzoc'laxiloj heyalaxico yin̈ te' caw olivo , hajxam ebnaj Israel ti' , to haca' caw isk'ab te' olivo ye ebnaj , yuxin chisje yalaxpaxico ebnaj yin̈ te' hunelxa .
45011025	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwochehan cheyohtan̈elo tzet ewan ye yu Comam Dios , yun̈e machijex cheyala tato caw ay hehelanil . Ebnaj wet Israelan etza sunil ebnaj cawbilo yanma , hac tu' xin chucano ebnaj masanta chioccano sunil anma mach Israelo yul isk'ab Comam .
45011026	Hayet chijni isba hune' tu' cat iscolcha ebnaj wet con̈oban , haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : Bey Si'on chitit naj chiak'ni colbanile cat yinilo naj istx'ojal yin̈ ej yuninal naj Jacob .
45011027	Ha' hune' ti' xin intratohan yeb ebnaj yet chintan̈tzencanilojan ismul ebnaj yiban̈ , ẍi Comam .
45011028	Hune' cuybanile yet colbanile ti' caw ayco ishowal ebnaj wet Israelan yin̈ , yun̈e yak'lax hamanil teyet , yaja' mach chisbej Comam yochen ebnaj , yuto ha' Comam sic'lencano yichmam ebnaj .
45011029	Yuto ha' tzet chak' Comam jet mach chilo Comam hunelxa , yeb xin ha' mac awtebil yu Comam mach chisman̈c'oto Comam .
45011030	Yet yalan̈tocanoj caw man̈c'omex hex ti' , yaja' wal tinan̈ xatz'ay isc'ul Comam teyin̈ yu isman̈c'omal ebnaj Israel tu' .
45011031	Yexn̈etotic'a xin isman̈c'omal ebnaj wet con̈ob Israelan tu' tinan̈ , yaja' yun̈e yilni ebnaj isc'ulch'anil Comam chak' teyet , hac tu' xin chitzujchapax apno isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam yu ebnaj .
45011032	Yuto yal Comam Dios tato lahan coman̈c'omal cosunil , hac tu' xin lahann̈e istz'aypaxo isc'ul Comam jin̈ cosunil .
45011033	¡ Caw mach isbi hanta isc'ulal Comam Dios , yeb xin ishelanil , yebpaxo isnabal ! Caw machi hunu mac chik'oji istxumni yin̈ tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal Comam yeb xin yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e Comam .
45011034	Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios : ¿ Mactaxca hunu mac chiohtan̈enilo tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal Comam ? ¿ Mactaxca chu istz'ajban isc'ul Comam ?
45011035	¿ Mac hunu ti' ak'n̈e hunu tzet ye tu' tet Comam babel yun̈e ischahni ispaj selel tet Comam ? ẍiayoj .
45011036	Wal xin sunil tzettaj ye tu' , tet Comam chitita ; yu Comam yuxin aya , ismaypaxo Comam ye sunil . ¡ Yuxin alaxojabico ismay Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo ! ¡ Hacojab tu' !
45012001	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw chink'anan teyet yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios xayak' jet , tato cheyaco heba yul isk'ab Comam haca' hunu xahanbal itzitz chi'ak'lax tet Comam . Ta chijaco coba yul isk'ab Comam haca' tu' , yetxan̈e Comam chiju , caw chitzalapaxo Comam jin̈ . Hac tu' chu jinayo coba tet Comam .
45012002	Machojab chebeybaln̈e haca' isnabal anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , wal xin helwe henabal haxinwal chiac'bilo sunil hebeybal . Hac tu' xin chu heyohtan̈enilo tzet choche Comam ; huntek'an isc'ulal yeb huntek'an chitzala Comam yin̈ , yeb huntek'an tz'ajan lahan yehi .
45012003	Ha' Comam an̈eco hune' munil ti' yul ink'aban yuxin chiwalan teyet tato machojab hunujex chexec'banli hetxumnico teyin̈ yiban̈ tzet chak' Comam hetxumu' . Walxinto ha' heyet , txumwej tzet munilal xayak' Comam teyet hatatic'a yip heyanma chak' Comam .
45012004	Haca'tic'a ye conimanil tinan̈ , caw tx'i'al yik'ni isba , yaja' nananta ismunil hunun .
45012005	Hac tu' xin je han̈on̈ ti' yin̈ Comam , waxan̈ca caw tx'i'alon̈ , yaja' hune'n̈e nimanile je yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , yuxin jetbixa coba yuto hunxan̈e nimanile jehi .
45012006	Nanantan̈e comunil yak' Comam Dios jet hununon̈ , hatatic'a munil el yin̈ isc'ul Comam ha' yak' jet . Yuxin ha' mac bay yak' Comam ismunil yalnic'o Istzoti' , yala'bic'oj hatatic'a yip yanma chak' Comam .
45012007	Yeb ha' mac bay yak' Comam ismunil yin̈ iscolwahi , colwahojab yin̈ caw c'ul . Haxa mac ak'lax ismunil iscuywahi , yak'abico yin̈ isc'ul iscuywahi .
45012008	Haxa mac ak'lax ismunil yin̈ yiptzeli , isyije'ab ismunil tu' yin̈ yiptzeli . Ha' mac chiak'ni hunu tzet ye tu' tet yet anmahil , yak'ab yin̈ sunil yanma . Haxa mac ak'lax ismunil yijbali , yin̈ojab sunil isc'ul chiijbali . Haxa mac chicolwa yin̈ mac matzet aya , yin̈ojab tzalahilal chicolwahi .
45012009	Xahanojab cheyil heba hununex , yaja' yin̈ sunil heyanma . Yahwecano sunilal istx'ojal cat helahnico hewatx'en sunil isc'ulal .
45012010	Xahanojab cheyil heba hununex , yuto yuninalxa Comam Dios heyehi , ec'balojab yelapno ye ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yul hesat .
45012011	Aweco yip heyanma , machojab isa cheyute heba , wal xin yijemojab cheyute heba tet Comam yin̈ sunil heyanma .
45012012	Tzalahan̈we sunilbal tiempo yuto ay tzet ayco yipo heyanma . Ak'we techaho sunil isya'tajil chul teyiban̈ yeb xin mach chebej hetxahli tet Comam Dios .
45012013	Colwahan̈we yin̈ macta yetxa Comam matzet aya . Ta ay mac chiec' tec'atan̈ , c'ulojab chu hechahni .
45012014	K'anwe isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ mac chiak'ni ec'oya' heyanma , mach chetz'acti'n̈e , to ha' isc'ulal chek'an yiban̈ .
45012015	Ak'we tzalaho hec'ul yinta mac tzalahilal yehi , yeb xin ocan̈we yin̈ bisc'ulal yinta mac bisc'ulal yehi .
45012016	Ayojab tzalahilal texol hununex . Mach cheyute heba lolo'al , wal xin utewe heba haca' anma machi yelapnoj , mach cheyute heba haca' mac chalni ta caw ay ishelanil .
45012017	Mach cheyak' istx'ojal ispajo istx'ojal chiswatx'e anma teyin̈ . Aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal sata sunil anma .
45012018	Ak'we heyanma heyehic'o yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb sunil anma .
45012019	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuhan , machojab cheyak' istx'ojal ispaj selel tet mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈ , wal xin awecano yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ha' Comam chiak'ni ispaj selel tet mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal tu' . Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios : " Haninn̈ehan chu wanayojan isya'tajil yiban̈ mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal , haninn̈ehan chu inpajtzenan , " ẍi Comam Dios Jahawil , ẍiayoj .
45012020	Chalnipaxo yul Yum Comam : " Tato chin̈ohcha hunu mac ayco ishowal tawin̈ , ak' tzet chislo . Taca chitaj isti' xin , ak'paxo ha' yuc'u' , haxinwal chitac isc'ul cat istx'ixwican̈ , " ẍiayoj .
45012021	Machojab chik'oji istx'ojal teyin̈ , wal xin ha'ojab isc'ulal chewatx'e , haxinwal chexk'oji yin̈ istx'ojal .
45013001	Yijemojab cheyute heba yin̈ tzet chal ebnaj alcal , yuto machmi ebnaj alcal tato maẍtaj Comam Dios an̈eco ebnaj yin̈ hune' munil tu' , wal xin ha' Comam an̈eco ebnaj yin̈ ismunil .
45013002	Yuxin ha' mac chiman̈c'on yin̈ tzet chal ebnaj , chisman̈c'o yin̈ tzet ak'bilcano yu Comam Dios . Ha' mac man̈c'om tu' xin chialaxayo isya'tajil yiban̈ .
45013003	Ebnaj alcal tu' , mach ayoco ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yu yak'ni xiwo ebnaj anma chiwatx'en isc'ulal , walxinto yu yanayo ebnaj isya'tajil yiban̈ mac tx'oj chiswatx'e . Yuxin ta mach cheyoche chexak'lax xiwoj , watx'ewe istoholal , hac tu' xin chitzala ebnaj teyin̈ .
45013004	Yuto ebnaj alcal ayco ebnaj isyijen hune' munil ak'bil yu Comam tu' yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ , yaja' ta istx'ojal chewatx'e xin yilaltic'a hexiwi , yuto ak'bil ismunil ebnaj yanayo isya'tajil yiban̈ anma tx'oj chiswatx'e . Yu yanayo ebnaj isya'tajil yiban̈ anma man̈c'om , yuxin ayco ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yu Comam .
45013005	Yuxin yilal heyijen yin̈ tzet chal ebnaj , maẍn̈etaj yu chexxiw yay isya'tajil teyiban̈ , walxinto yu hac tu' choche Comam tato chicoyije .
45013006	Yuxin yilal heyak'ni hetohlabal yuto ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' munil tu' tet ebnaj , ha' xin lan̈an isyijen ebnaj .
45013007	Hayet chik'anlax ch'en tohlabal , yilal heyak'ni ch'en , yeb xin chetohlawe heyornato maca hunu licencia haca' yalni ley . Ha' mac ay yet isyijelax tzet chala , yilal heyijen tet ; haxa mac ay yelapnoj , ayojab yelapno yul hesat . Ha' mac yilal yalaxico ismay , yilal heyanico ismay .
45013008	Machojab hec'as tet hunu maca , wal xin ha'ojab hexahann̈en heba han̈e'ojab chioc hec'asoj , yuto ha' mac chixahann̈e yet anmahil lan̈an isyijen ischejbanil Comam .
45013009	Yuto chal ischejbanil Comam Dios : " Mach chaẍixli mach chaẍwinajli , mach chaẍpotx'wahi , mach chaẍelk'awi , mach chahobcan̈ lek'ti'al yin̈ hawet anmahil , " ẍi . Huntek'an chejbanil ti' yeb huntek'anxa , hune'xan̈e chielicoj chalni haca' ti' : " Xahan chawil hawet anmahil haca' haya'iln̈en haba , " ẍi .
45013010	Ha' mac xahan ay yet anmahil yu , mach istx'ojal chiswatx'e yin̈ yet anmahil tu' , yuto hayet chisxahann̈e yet anmahil , tz'ajan lahan chisyije ischejbanil Comam .
45013011	Yuxin caw txumwe yin̈ hune' tiempo bay ayon̈ ti' , istiempohalxa jinilo cowayan̈ , yuto tinan̈ cawilxa yeti cocolbanil sata yet janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam .
45013012	Tinan̈ xin cawilxa yeti tiempo , lahan haca' yet xaec'to ak'bal , lan̈anxa issajbiloj . Yuxin cobeja'wecano sunil istx'ojal yet k'ejholo , cat cowatx'en coba jec' yin̈ issajilk'inal yet Comam , haca' chu iswatx'en isba naj soldado , yet chanic'o naj huntek'an xilk'ape yet howal .
45013013	Cowatx'ewe istoholal haca' tzet chiwatx'elax yet tz'ayical . Machojab chon̈ec' yin̈ uc'u te' , machojab chon̈ec'paxo yin̈ pek'al maca yin̈ ixloj . Machojab chicok'aytzeco istx'ojal jin̈ , machojab chijak'le howal coxol maca ischiwa coc'ul jin̈ hununon̈ .
45013014	Haca'ojab hunu naj soldado chiswatx'e isba chanic'o huntek'an xilk'ape yet howal yin̈ , hacojab tu' cowatx'en coba yin̈ yet Comam Jesucristo , machojab chijak' yub istx'ojal tzet choche conimanil .
45014001	Chahwe mac maẍto yip yanma yin̈ Comam texol . Mach chebuch heba yebi .
45014002	Yuto ay mac yohtaj tato chu coloni sunil tzettaj ye tu' , aypaxo xin ebnaj juẍta chito cabcon yanma isloni sunil tzettaj ye tu' , yuxin itahn̈e chislo .
45014003	Wal xin ha' mac chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu' machojab chisyah mac mach chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu' . Haxa mac mach chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu' , machojab chal isk'umal mac chiloni sunil tzettaj ye tu' , yuto ha' hune' mac tu' chabilxa Comam yu .
45014004	K'inalo tinan̈ ta ay hunu naj chimunla yinta ispatr'on , ¿ tom ay joc jalni isk'umal naj munlawom tu' ? ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin han̈c'an̈e naj ispatr'on naj tu' chalni ta c'ul naj maca machoj . Hac tu' je yul sat Comam Dios , c'ul chon̈elicoj yuto ay yip Comam con̈iswatx'enico yin̈ isc'ulal .
45014005	Aypaxo xin mac ti' chalni tato ay tz'ayic ec'bal yelapno yiban̈ hunuxa tz'ayic , aypaxo mac chalni tato lahann̈e yelapno sunil tz'ayic ; wal xin t'in̈anojab jecoj yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e .
45014006	Yuxin ha' mac chiyijen hunu tz'ayic ha' tet Comam chisyije , hacpax tu' mac mach chiyijen hunu tz'ayic , yu Comam yuxin mach chisyije . Hacpax tu' xin mac chiloni sunil tzet ye tu' , yu yanico ismay Comam yuxin chislo , chak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chislo . Hacpax tu' mac mach chiloni sunil tzet ye tu' , yu yanico ismay Comam yuxin mach chislo , chak'nipaxo yuch'andiosal tet Comam .
45014007	Yulbal yet itzitzon̈ , mach jeto coba cochuquil , hacpax tu' yet chon̈cami mach jeto coba .
45014008	Ta itzitzon̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' to yu coyijen tzet chal Comam ; taca chon̈cam xin yettic'apaxo Comam jehi . Yuxin waxan̈ca itzitzon̈ maca chon̈cami , yet Comam jehi .
45014009	Yuxin cam Comam Jesucristo , yitzitzibican̈ hunelxa yu yoc Comam Yahawil yin̈ anma camom yeb anma itzitz .
45014010	Yuxin mach chu jalni isk'umal maca coyahni hunu juẍtaj maca hunu janab , yuto cosunil chon̈oc sata Comam cat yilni Comam yin̈ tzet chon̈elicoj .
45014011	Chal yul Yum Comam Dios : Hanin yahaw inti'an , chiwak' binaho inbihan yin̈ tzet chiwalti'an tato sunil anma chihul insatajan , yeb sunil mac yilal yalni yu isti' ta haninn̈ech'anan Dios hinan , ẍiayoj .
45014012	Yuxin sunilon̈ chon̈oc sata Comam Dios cat jalni yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e hununon̈ .
45014013	Yuxin mach chu heyalni hek'umal hununex , wal xin aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal , haxinwal machi hunu mac cheyak' ayc'ayoj , cat issomchacanto isnabal heyu .
45014014	Haninti'an caw wohtajan tato machi hunu tzet chilolax ti' ayco istx'ojal yin̈ , caw t'in̈an wehan yin̈ hune' ti' yuto yuninalxa Comam Jesucristo wehan . Yaja' tato ay hunu mac chitxumni tato ayco istx'ojal yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' , tx'oj isloni chal tu' .
45014015	Yuxin ta yu tzet chelo cheyak' taco isc'ul hunu ebnaj juẍtaj , ha' chal yelapno tu' mach xahano cheyil heba . ¡ Machojab taj yu tzet chelo cheyak' ayc'ayo hunu maca , yuto ha' hune' mac tu' bay yak' camo isba Comam Jes'us !
45014016	Machojab cheyak' yub anma istzotel teyin̈ yu tzet chewatx'e .
45014017	Han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios mach chiyoc yin̈ tzet chicolo maca tzet chijuc'u , wal xin ha' jec' yin̈ istoholal , yeb jec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , yeb yin̈ tzalahilal yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
45014018	Ha' mac chiyijen tet Comam Cristo haca' tu' , chitzala Comam Dios yin̈ , caw c'ulpaxo hune' mac tu' yul sat anma .
45014019	Yuxin colahaweco cowatx'en tzet chon̈anico yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , hac tu' chu cocolwa jin̈ hununon̈ yin̈ coch'ib yin̈ yet Comam .
45014020	Machojab cheyak' etaxoto ismunil Comam Dios yu tzet chelo . Yin̈ caw isyelal sunil tzet chilolaxi mach istx'ojal ayco yin̈ . Ha' istx'ojal , ha' coloni hunu tzet ye tu' chiak'ni cabconocan̈ yanma hunu mac yin̈ Comam .
45014021	Ec'balto c'ul ta mach chicoc'ux no' chibe maca juc'ni vino maca hunuxa tzet ye tu' sata jak'ni ayc'ayo hunuxa juẍtaj .
45014022	Ha' tzet cheyayto yul heyanma , t'in̈anojab heye yin̈ yul sat Comam Dios . ¡ Sak'al yet mac mach chicabcon isc'ul yin̈ tzet chiswatxe' !
45014023	Yaja' wal mac chicabcon yanma isloni hunu tzet ye tu' , hayet chisloni chaco ismul , yuto mach yin̈ sunilo yanma chisloni . Yuxin ta mach t'in̈ano jeco yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e , chijaco comul .
45015001	Han̈on̈ ayxa yip janma yin̈ Comam machojabn̈etaj han̈on̈ chijaco coba yin̈ coc'ul , wal xin yilal cocolwa yin̈ mac maẍto caw t'in̈ano yecoj .
45015002	Hununon̈ ti' ha'ojab isc'ulal chicowatx'e yin̈ macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , hac tu' xin chitzala isc'ul yin̈ Comam yeb yun̈e yik'ni yip yanma yin̈ yet Comam .
45015003	Haca' Comam Jesucristo , maẍtaj tzet yoche Comam iswatx'e , walxinto yij isba yin̈ Comam tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj bay chala : " Hayet habuchlaxi , haninan wabenan isya'il , " ẍiayoj .
45015004	Sunil tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios yet payat , cocuybanil yu istz'ibn̈elaxcanoj , chak'ni isnimanil coc'ul yeb yak'lobal janma , yun̈e janico Comam yipo janma .
45015005	Ha'ojab Comam Dios , Comam chiak'ni isnimanil coc'ul yeb yak'lobal janma chicolwa teyin̈ , haxinwal hunxan̈e tzet chiec' yin̈ henabal haca' Comam Jesucristo .
45015006	Hac tu' xin hunxan̈e cheyute heba cat hebitn̈en isbi Comam Dios , Ismam Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
45015007	Yuxin macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios chahwe texol , haca' yu quexischahni Comam Cristo yu heyanico ismay Comam Dios .
45015008	Chiwalan hune' ti' teyet tato hul Comam Jesucristo yak'aco isba ischejabo anma Israel , yun̈e yijni isba tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios tet jichmaman̈ . Hac tu' yu isyenipaxilo Comam Cristo tato caw chij isba tzet chalte Comam Dios .
45015009	Yeb xin hulpaxo Comam Cristo , yun̈e yanipaxico anma mach Israelo ismay Comam Dios yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam , haca' yalni yul Yum Comam bay chala : Yuxin chiwalan c'ulla tzoti' tawin̈ yu yoc hamay yulaj con̈ob yu anma mach Israeloj , cat inbitn̈enan habi , ẍiayoj .
45015010	Ay hune' bay chalpaxo yul Yum Comam Dios : Tzalahan̈we hex mach Israelo hex ti' yinta iscon̈ob Comam Dios , ẍiayoj .
45015011	Ay hune'xa bay chalpaxoj : Sunil nimeta con̈ob yeb niẍte con̈ob bay ay anma mach Israeloj , bitn̈elaxojab Comam Dios yu , ẍi .
45015012	Tz'ibn̈ebilpaxcanayo yu naj Isa'ias : Chipitzc'a hune' naj chitit yin̈ yuninal naj Isa'i , cat yoc yahawo yin̈ anma mach Israeloj . Yin̈ naj xin chicawxi isc'ul anma tu' , ẍi .
45015013	Ha'ojab Comam Dios , Comam ch'ak'ni iscawxobal janma , ha' ch'ak'ni tzalahilal yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet , hex cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam ; cat cam yak'nipaxo Comam Esp'iritu Santo iscawxobal hec'ul .
45015014	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab caw wohtajan sic'lebil ta caw c'ulch'an hec'ul teyin̈ hununex , yeb xin caw aypaxo hehelanil , caw xin heyohtapaxo hecuyni heba hununex .
