45015015	Yaja' yin̈ hune' carta ti' ay huntek'an tzet ye tu' ayayo wuhan chiwaltojan teyet yin̈ sunil wanmahan yun̈e mach chenahuln̈etoj . Chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' teyet yuto ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul .
45015016	Ischejab Comam Jesucristo wecojan xol anma mach Israeloj , ha' inmunilan xin ha' ton walnic'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile chalte Comam Dios , yun̈e yaltelax anma mach Israelo tet Comam haca' hunu xahanbal caw chitzala Comam yin̈ , sajn̈ebilxa yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
45015017	Wal xin yu caw ayinxacojan yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo yuxin caw chintzalahan yin̈ inmunilan ak'bil yu Comam Dios .
45015018	Mach chu walnihan yin̈ tzet chu ismunla hunuxa mac yin̈ ismunil Comam , to han̈c'an̈e yin̈ tzet chu quinisk'annihan Comam Cristo yin̈ inmunilan chiiniti anma mach Israelo yin̈ isyijen tzet chal Comam Dios , han̈e chiwalan . Hune' ti' yij isba yin̈ tzet walan yeb yin̈ tzet inwatx'ehan ,
45015019	yeb yu yip tzettaj inyehan , yeb yu yip c'aybalc'ule , yeb yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo ; hac tu' yu inyijenan yin̈ caw c'ul walnic'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Cristo . Hata bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en quinichicojan walnic'ojan ; caw sunil bay quinec'an wala'c'ojan masanta quinapnihan yul ismajul tx'otx' Iliria .
45015020	Hac tu' yu wanico yin̈ inc'ulan winitojan Tzoti' yet colbanile bay maẍtotic'a chiabelax isbina isbi Comam Jesucristo , yun̈e machi hunu mac chihalni ta toxan̈e quinec'an inlaha'an munil tzabilxacoj .
45015021	Yul Yum Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj : Chiyila' anma hune' mac maẍtotic'a bay chiabelax isk'umal . Mac maẍtotic'a bay chabe istzoti'al chitxumchalo yu , ẍiayoj .
45015022	Yuxin maẍtotic'a chu intohan quexwila'an , waxan̈ca xin tx'i'alxa el chiwochehan intohan .
45015023	Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin xalahwi inmunilan yul huntek'an con̈ob ti' . Caw tx'i'alxa habil yichi wochenan intohan quexwilnojan .
45015024	Yuxin hayet chintohan yin̈ inbelan bey Espa~na cat wec'an quexwilnojan , lahwi istzala wanmahan quexwilnihan yin̈ hayebo tz'ayic xin , chiwochehan tato chexcolwa win̈an inlahnihan inbeltu'an .
45015025	Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin chintohan bey Jerusal'en wak'a'canojan hanic' ch'en melyu chicolwa yin̈ ebnaj juẍta ay bey Jerusal'en tu' .
45015026	Yuto ebnaj juẍta yeb ebix janab ay bey Macedonia yeb ay bey Acaya ti' , el yin̈ isc'ul iscutxbanayo hanic' ch'en melyu , cat yilaxto ch'en tet anma meba' ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey Jerusal'en .
45015027	Caw el yin̈ yanma ebnaj iscutxbanayo ch'en ; hune' ti' caw c'ul yuto haca'tic'a yu yak'ni ebnaj juẍta Israel isc'ulal Comam tet ebnaj mach Israeloj , hac tu' xin chu ispajtzen ebnaj yin̈ tzet ay tet ebnaj juẍta Israel tu' .
45015028	Yuxin chito yijcano isba hune' inchejbanilti'an intohan wak'nocanojan ch'en melyu chicolwa yin̈ ebnaj juẍta tu' , lahwi tu' cat wec'an quexwilnojan yet chintohan bey Espa~na .
45015029	Ayco yin̈ wanmahan ta hayet chinec'an texol , tx'i'al isc'ulal Comam Cristo chiyak'cano jet .
45015030	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw chink'anan teyet yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo yeb yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Esp'iritu Santo tato cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul hecolwa hetxahli win̈an tet Comam Dios .
45015031	K'anwe tet Comam Dios , haxinwal chiniscolan Comam tet ebnaj ah Judea mach chayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam , yebpaxo xin yun̈e c'ul chu ischahni ebnaj juẍta ay bey Jerusal'en hune' colwal chiwitoti'an .
45015032	K'anwepaxo tet Comam haxinwal ta hac tu' chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam chinapnihan quexwila'an cat inxewninojan texol yin̈ tzalahilal .
45015033	Ha'ojab Comam yahaw ak'anc'ulal chioc heyetbihoj . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
45016001	Caw chintak'etojan janab Febe teyet . Ix janab ti' diaconisa ix , caw munla ix xol anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey con̈ob Cencrea .
45016002	Caw c'ulojab chu hechahni ix yuto janab ix yin̈ Comam , chahwe ix haca' chu cochahni hunu mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Colwahan̈we yin̈ tzet chiocnico yu ix yuto caw tx'i'al mac bay colwa ix , colwapaxo ix win̈an .
45016003	Halwe tet janab Priscila yeb tet juẍta Aquila ta chil isba yin̈ iscawil , caw wet munlawomal inbahan yeb ix yebpaxo xin naj juẍta tu' yin̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo .
45016004	Ix janab Priscila yeb juẍta Aquila tu' , caw ishin isba iscam yu quiniscolnihan , maẍn̈etajinan xin chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet naj yeb tet ix , to ha' hunpaxo sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Dios mach Israeloj ay yul hunun con̈ob chiak'nipaxo yuch'andiosal .
45016005	Halwepaxo tet sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam chiscutxba isba yul yatut janab yeb juẍta tu' ta chil isba . Halwepaxo tet juẍta Epeneto tato chil isba , naj juẍta tu' caw xahan ay naj wuhan . Ha' naj babel yaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul ismajul Asia .
45016006	Halwepaxo tet ix janab Mar'ia ta chil isba ix , ix janab tu' caw xamunla ix texol .
45016007	Halwepaxo tet ebnaj wet con̈oban , naj juẍta Andr'onico yeb juẍta Junias ta chil isba ebnaj . Ebnaj cawan̈ tu' hun yu wocan preso yeb ebnaj , caw xin ay yelapno ebnaj yul sat ebnaj ischejab Comam , babel xin yaco isba ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Dios insatajan .
45016008	Halwe tet juẍta Amplias tato chil isba naj , caw xahan ay naj wuhan yin̈ isbi Comam ,
45016009	Halwe tet juẍta Urbano ta chil isba , naj juẍta tu' caw munla naj jintajan̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam , cat heyalnipaxo tet juẍta Estaquis ta chilpaxo isba , caw xahan ay naj wuhan .
45016010	Halwe tet naj juẍta Apeles ta chil isba , naj juẍta tu' caw xaec' ilwebal yiban̈ naj yu ayco yanma naj yin̈ Comam . Halwepaxo tet naj juẍta Arist'obulo yebpaxo tet sunil mac ay bey yatut naj ta chil isba .
45016011	Halwepaxo tet naj wet con̈oban , naj juẍta Herodi'on ta chil isba . Halwepaxo tet juẍta Narciso yebpaxo tet sunil mac ay bey yatut naj ta chil isba yin̈ iscawil , yuto xayayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
45016012	Halwepaxo tet janab Trifena yeb janab Trifosa ta chil isba . Ebix janab tu' caw chimunla ebix yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios , cat heyalnipaxo tet ix janab P'ersida , ix caw xahan ay wuhan , ta chil isba ix . Ix janab tu' caw munlapaxo ix yin̈ ismunil Comam .
45016013	Halwepaxo tet juẍta Rufo ta chil isba , naj juẍta tu' caw sic'bililo naj yu Comam . Halwepaxo tet ismi' juẍta tu' ta chil isba , janab tu' haca' inmi'an yepaxo ix .
45016014	Halwe tet juẍta As'incrito yeb juẍta Flegonte yeb juẍta Hermes yeb juẍta Patrobas yeb juẍta Hermas ta chil isba ebnaj yin̈ iscawil ; yebpaxo ebnaj juẍta ay isc'atan̈ ebnaj .
45016015	Halwe tet juẍta Fil'ologo yeb janab Julia yeb tet juẍta Nereo , yeb tet yanab naj , yeb tet janab Olimpas , ta chil isba yebpaxo tet sunil ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab ay isc'atan̈ ebnaj .
45016016	K'ambele hanic' heye hununex yin̈ sunil heyanma yin̈ caw tzalahilal . Chalnipaxto sunil yuninal Comam Dios ay yul hunun con̈ob ay bey ti' ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil .
45016017	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw cheyil heba tet ebnaj choche yak'aco pohlebahil texol , yeb choche quexyak'a ayc'ayoj . Ha' huntek'an chu ebnaj tu' mach chischah isba yeb cuybanile chabilxa heyu . Huntek'an ebnaj tu' mach chechah ebnaj texol .
45016018	Yuto maẍtaj tet Comam Jesucristo chisyije ebnaj , walxinto ha' tzet choche isc'ul ebnaj ha' chissayic'oj . Caw c'ulch'an chute istzotel ebnaj yun̈e yak'ni subchaho ebnaj anma mach caw yitz'atil iswi' .
45016019	Caw sunil mac ohtan̈e tato caw yijemex , yuxin caw chintzalahan teyin̈ . Chiwochehan ta helan cheyute heba yin̈ isc'ulal , maẍtaj yin̈ istx'ojal .
45016020	Ha' Comam Dios yahaw ak'anc'ulal , chicolwa teyin̈ hek'oji yin̈ naj matzwalil yin̈ an̈e , cat iscan naj yalan̈ heyoj . Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chianayo isc'ulal teyiban̈ .
45016021	Chalto naj juẍta Timoteo ta cheyil heba , naj juẍta ti' caw wet munlawomalan naj yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios . Chalnipaxto juẍta Lucio yeb juẍta Jas'on yeb juẍta Sos'ipater ta cheyil heba ; ebnaj juẍta ti' wet con̈ob inbahan ye ebnaj .
45016022	Haquinpaxtu'an hanin Tercio inti'an , chink'ambepaxtojan hanic' heye yin̈ hecawil , yin̈ yet Comam . Haninan lan̈an intz'ibn̈entojan hune' carta ti' yu naj Pablo .
45016023	Chalnipaxto juẍta Gayo ta cheyil heba , yul yatut juẍta ti' ayon̈an̈ . Ha' bey ti' xin chicocutxbapaxo cobahan̈ yin̈ culto yeb sunil macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo . Chalnipaxto naj juẍta Erasto ta cheyil heba , naj juẍta ti' tesorero naj yul con̈ob ti' . Chalnipaxto juẍta Cuarto ta cheyil heba .
45016024	Yak'abayo Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
45016025	K'anweco ismay Comam Dios , Comam chu quexislin̈ban haca' yalni Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile walic'ojan yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Hune' cuybanile ti' ewantic'a yehi yettaxtic'a maẍto chiwatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu Comam Dios .
45016026	Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin xayak' Comam ohtan̈elaxoj yu tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam yet payat , haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam , Comam ayn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile ewantic'a ye ti' , xaak'lax yohtan̈elo sunil anma yun̈e yanayto yul yanma cat isyijeni .
45016027	Yu tzet iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo yuxin alaxojabico ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , Comam hune'n̈ech'an yeb caw ay ishelanil . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
46001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an , awtebilinan wocan ischejabo Comam Jesucristo , yuto hac tu' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios . Ha' hun juẍta S'ostenes chitz'ibn̈ento hune' carta ti' wintajan teyet , hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul con̈ob Corinto . Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Awtebilexpaxo yu heyoc iscon̈obo Comam , yeb sunil mac bayxan̈etu'wal aya chiawten isbi Comam Jesucristo yin̈ , Comam Jahawil yeb yahawilpaxo ebnaj tu' .
46001002	
46001003	Yak'ab Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyet , yeb ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma .
46001004	Maẍtic'a chinbejan wak'nihan yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios teyin̈ yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul xayayo teyiban̈ yu Comam Jesucristo .
46001005	Yu hune'n̈e heye yeb Comam Jesucristo , yuxin xayaco Comam Dios sunil isc'ulch'anil yin̈ heyanma , hehelanil hetzoteli , yeb yitz'atil hewi' .
46001006	Yuxin sunil tzet halbil teyet yin̈ Comam Jesucristo caw lan̈an isyenilo isba teyin̈ .
46001007	Tinan̈ xin machi hunu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios matzet teyin̈ yulbal ayexic'o heyechman istz'ayical bay chul Comam Jesucristo .
46001008	Ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni heyip helin̈ban heba masanto yet chihul islahobal tz'ayic , haxinwal machi istx'ojal chiilcha teyin̈ yet chul Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
46001009	Sunil tzet chalte Comam Dios masan caw chij isba , ha' xin Comam quexawtenico yul isk'ab Isc'ahol , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
46001010	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo chiwaltojan teyet , hunxan̈ehojab cheyute henabal , mach comono chepohleto heba . Wal xin ayojab ak'anc'ulal texol , hunxan̈ehojab tzet chiec' yin̈ henabal yeb yul heyanma .
46001011	Chiwaltojan hune' ti' teyet , hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , yuto xawabehan hek'umal tato ay howal texol bey tu' , hac tu' yalni yuninal juẍta Clo'e wetan .
46001012	Tolab ayex cheyal haca' ti' : " Han̈on̈ti'an̈ , yinta juẍta Pablo ayon̈icojan̈ , " yeb ayex cheyalpaxoj : " Yinta juẍta Apolos ayon̈icojan̈ . " Ayexpaxo xin cheyala : " Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yinta juẍta Pedro ayon̈icojan̈ , " quexchi . Tolab ayex cheyalpaxoj : " Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yet Comam Jesucristo jehan̈ , " quexchi .
46001013	¿ Tom pohbilayo Comam Cristo heyalni ? ¿ Tom haninan quinalaxcan̈an yin̈ culus yu hecolchahi ? yeb ¿ tom yin̈ inbihan alaxcan̈ ha' hewi' xin ?
46001014	Wal xin chiwak'an yuch'andios tet Comam Dios yuto machi hunujex ti' wacan̈an ha' hewi' , cachann̈e juẍta Crispo yeb juẍta Gayo ,
46001015	yuxin mach chu heyalni ta yin̈ inbihan alaxcan̈ ha' hewi' .
46001016	Wapaxocan̈an ha' iswi' yuninal juẍta Est'efanas , matxa hunuxa mac ahna ha' iswi' wuhan .
46001017	Mach chejbilojinan wanican̈an ha' iswi' anma yu Comam Cristo , walxinto ha' inchejbanilan ha' walnic'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile . Yaja' machi bay quintzotelan yin̈ nimeta tzoti' teyet yun̈e heyanico heyanma yin̈ , wal xin han̈e iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ culus , ha' walic'ojan .
46001018	Hune' cuybanile yin̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus , sucal ye yul sat anma chic'aytoj . Wal yul cosat han̈on̈ xacon̈colcha xin , hune' cuybanile yet colbanile ti' yip Comam Dios yehi .
46001019	Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios : Chintan̈tzelojan ishelanil anma ay ishelanil sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , cat intan̈tzenpaxilojan isnabal anma ay yitz'atil iswi' , ẍiayoj .
46001020	¿ Tzet xin tan̈cano ebnaj ay ishelanil yeb ebnaj cuywawom , yeb ebnaj caw helan istzotel yin̈ hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ? Wal xin xaismeltzoco Comam ishelanil anma tu' yin̈ sucal .
46001021	Yu ishelanil Comam Dios yuxin el yin̈ isc'ul tato maẍtaj yu ishelanil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yuxin chiohtan̈elaxilo Comam , wal xin el yin̈ isc'ul Comam ta yu Istzoti' chijalic'ojan̈ , ha' chicolni anma chianayto yul yanma , waxan̈ca ay mac chalni tato sucalil ye hune' Tzoti' ti' .
46001022	Anma Israel , ha' c'aybalc'ule choche anma yila' , wal ebnaj griego xin , ha' ishelanil anma choche ebnaj yabe' .
46001023	Yaja' wal han̈on̈ti'an̈ ha' Comam Cristo alaxcan̈ yin̈ culus , ha' chijalic'ojan̈ . Yul sat anma Israel caw tx'oj hune' tu' , walpaxo yul sat anma mach Israelo xin sucal yehi .
46001024	Wal han̈on̈ awtebilon̈xa yu Comam Dios ti' xin , waxan̈ca Israel maca mach Israeloj johtaj tato yip yeb ishelanil Comam Dios ayco yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
46001025	Huntek'an sucal ye yin̈ Comam Dios yalni anma , ha' ec'bal yelapno sata ishelanil anma . Haxa huntek'an machi yip yin̈ Comam Dios yalni anma xin , ha' caw ec'bal yip sata yip anma .
46001026	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , chimheyil texol hex awtebilhexxa yu Comam Dios tato caw haywan̈exch'an ay hehelanil haca' ishelanil anma . Haywan̈exch'anpaxo yahaw hex , haca' ebnaj iswi'ehal con̈ob , yeb haywan̈exch'anpaxo hex yic'al anma aycano yelapnoj heyehi .
46001027	Yuxin ha' mac machi nich'ano tzet yohta yul sat anma , ha' issic'can̈ Comam Dios yuninaloj yun̈e yel istx'ixobal mac caw ay ishelanil . Issic'nipaxocan̈ Comam mac machi yelapnoj yun̈e yel istx'ixobal mac caw ay yelapno yehi .
46001028	Issic'can̈ Comam anma yahbil yeb anma machi yelapno yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e matxa yelapno chielcanico mac caw ay yelapno chabe .
46001029	Hac tu' xin machi mac chu yalni isba can̈yehal yul sat Comam Dios .
46001030	Ha' Comam con̈hunbancano yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , yak'nipaxo Comam ishelanil Comam Cristo cohelaniloj . Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yeb yetxa Comam jehi , yupaxo Comam Cristo tu' yuxin colbilon̈xa .
46001031	Hac tu' chu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : " Tato ay hunu mac choche yik'a'can̈ isba , ha'ojab Comam Cristo chican̈ , " ẍiayoj .
46002001	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , yet quinbeyan walnojan Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ Comam Jesucristo texol , maẍtaj ishelanil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb huntek'an nimeta tzoti' caw nanxa yoc walan teyet .
46002002	Yet wec'an texol tu' machi hunuxa tzet ye tu' woche wala'an teyet han̈c'an̈e cuybanile yin̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus .
46002003	Yet wec'an texol tu' quinnanonan , inluylunpaxocan̈an yu xiwquilal .
46002004	Hayet walnihan Istzoti' Comam Dios teyet , mach quexinmontehan yu ishelanil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , walxinto ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo yeb yip Comam Dios , ha' anayto yul heyanma .
46002005	Hac tu' xin maẍtaj yu ishelanil ebnaj winaj yuxin heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , walxinto yu yip Comam .
46002006	Yaja' wal tet ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ebnaj ayxa isnabal yin̈ yet Comam , chon̈tzotelan̈ yin̈ hune' helanilehal tet ebnaj , yaja' maẍtaj helanilehal yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Machcatajpaxo ishelanil ebnaj jahaw sat tx'otx'al ti' , yuto ebnaj tu' chitan̈ilo ebnaj .
46002007	Hune' chiwalti'an , ha' ton hune' ishelanil Comam Dios ewan yehi , yun̈e caw c'ul chon̈elcanico yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam . Hune' ti' nabiltic'a yu Comam yet yalan̈to maẍto chiwatx'i hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
46002008	Hune' ti' maẍtic'a txumcha yu ebnaj yahaw con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yuto ta istxum ebnaj machim yacan̈ ebnaj Comam yin̈ culus , Comam caw aycano yelapno yehi .
46002009	Wal xin tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : Ay huntek'an tzet watx'ebilxa yu Comam Dios tet mac chiochen Comam . Hune' tu' maẍto hunu mac xailni , yeb xaabeni , maẍtopaxo mac xaec' isnabal yin̈ , ẍiayoj .
46002010	Huntek'an tzet ye tu' ti' xayak' Comam johtan̈elo yu Yesp'iritu , ha' Yesp'iritu Comam tu' ohtan̈e sunil , yohtapaxo huntek'an tzet ye tu' yet Comam Dios ya'ta cotxumni .
46002011	Haca' hunu mac tinan̈ , mach yohtajo tzet ayayto yul yanma hunuxa yet anmahil , wal xin cachann̈e yanma hune' mac tu' ohtan̈e . Hac tu' ye Comam Dios , han̈c'an̈e Yesp'iritu Comam ohtan̈e tzet nabil yu .
46002012	Walon̈ ti' xin maẍtaj yesp'iritu yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chabil ju , to ha' hune' Esp'iritu chitit yin̈ Comam Dios . Hac tu' xin chu cotxumni huntek'an isc'ulal chak' Comam jet .
46002013	Maẍtaj tzoti' johtajan̈ yu cohelanilan̈ chijalan̈ , machoj , walxinto ha' Tzoti' chak' Comam Esp'iritu jetan̈ ha' chijalan̈ . Hac tu' xin chu jalnilojan̈ yin̈ haban huntek'an yet Comam Esp'iritu Santo tet anma ayxaco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈ .
46002014	Ha' mac maẍto Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈ , mach chischah yabe' huntek'an tzet ye tu' yet Comam Esp'iritu Santo , yuto sucal ye yul sat , mach chitxumchapaxo yu , yuto huntek'an ti' han̈c'an̈e Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni cotxumuloj .
46002015	Wal mac ayco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈ xin , haban istxumni sunil ej tzet ye tu' , ta c'ul maca machoj . Yaja' wal comon anma xin , mach chik'oji istxumni tzet ye mac ayco Yesp'iritu Comam yin̈ .
46002016	Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : ¿ Mac hunu chu isnanilo yin̈ tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal Comam Dios ? Yeb xin ¿ mac hunu chiak'ni istz'ajanbal isc'ul Comam ? ẍiayoj . Wal han̈on̈ ti' xin , ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni johtan̈elo isnabal Comam Jesucristo .
46003001	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , hayet quinec'an texol , mach quintzotelan teyet haca' tet mac caw yijem tet Comam Esp'iritu Santo . Wal xin quintzotelan teyet haca' tet anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb haca' mac uninto yin̈ yet Comam Dios .
46003002	Yuxin yet incuywahan texol caw comonn̈e yu intzotelan teyet , yuto haca'to ye niẍte unin chito txutxwi , maẍto chu yak'lax itah tet , hac tu' heyehi . Hac to tu' heyepaxo tinan̈ ,
46003003	yuto haca' istxumni anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , hac to tu' hetxumni , yuto chichiwaco hec'ul teyin̈ hununex , ay howal texol yeb pohlebahil . Chal yelapno tu' to ha' tzet chal heyanma ha' cheyije . Chebeybaln̈enpaxo haca' tzet chiswatx'e anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam .
46003004	Yuto texol hex ti' ayex cheyala : " Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yinta juẍta Pablo ayon̈icojan̈ . " Ayex cheyalpaxoj : " Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yinta juẍta Apolos ayon̈icojan̈ , " quexchi . Yet cheyalni haca' tu' to haca'to anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , hac tu' hetxumni .
46003005	¿ Tzet yelapno wehan hanin Pablo inti'an ? yeb ¿ tzet yelapno ye juẍta Apolos tu' ? Wal xin ischejabn̈e Comam Dios jehan̈ , chejbilon̈icojan̈ texol yu Comam yun̈e heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Ha' munil yacanico Comam yul cok'aban̈ hununon̈an̈ ha' chicowatx'ehan̈ .
46003006	Yet wec'an texol haca'tan̈e haninan intz'uncanayojan hunu te te' texol . Haxa yet yec' naj Apolos texol xin haca'tan̈e ha' naj ec' hayenoj . Yaja' yin̈ caw yeli , ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni ch'ibo hune' tz'unub tu' .
46003007	Yuxin ha' naj chitz'unni yeb naj chihayeni machi yelapno ebnaj , cachann̈e Comam Dios caw aycano yelapno yehi yuto ha' Comam chiak'ni ch'ibo hune' tz'unub tu' .
46003008	Yuxin naj chitz'unni hunu tzet ye tu' yeb naj chihayeni lahan ismunil ebnaj , chischah ebnaj ispaj selel ismunil tu' tet Comam Dios hatatic'a hanta munil chiswatx'e hunun ebnaj .
46003009	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ jet munlawomal cobahan̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios , wal hex ti' xin haca' istz'unub Comam Dios heyehi . Lahanexpaxo haca' hunu n̈a lan̈an iswatx'encan̈ Comam Dios .
46003010	Haxa haninti'an xin , lahaninan haca' hunu naj ijbalom yin̈ watx'e n̈a yu isc'ulal Comam Dios . Hacojtam haninan wayojan isxe'al hune' n̈a tu' , nanxa hune' naj xin chianican̈ isloc'al . Yaja' hunun mac chimunla yin̈ hune' n̈a tu' yilal cam chil yin̈ tzet chu ismunlahi .
46003011	Wal xin machi hunuxa mac chu yanayo hunuxa isxe'al n̈a yiban̈ hune' ayxayo tu' , yuto ha' hune' ayxayo tu' ha' ton Comam Jesucristo .
46003012	Yiban̈ hune' xe'al n̈a tu' xin , ay mac chianico ch'en oro , maca ch'en plata , maca ch'en ch'en caw c'ulch'an jilni isxialoj . Aypaxo mac chianico te te' , maca te' ch'im , maca xaj wale' yichoj .
46003013	Yaja' yet islahobal tz'ayic yet chiilax tzet chielico anma , cat yilwelax comunil hununon̈ xol k'a k'a' , yun̈e yillaxi ta c'ul maca mach c'ulo tzet chicowatx'e .
46003014	Yuxin ha' mac caw c'ul ismunil iswatx'e , lahan yeb hunu n̈a machi tz'ato yu k'a k'a' . Ha' mac haca' tu' chischah ispaj selel ismunil .
46003015	Yaja' wal mac mach c'ulo ismunil chiswatx'e , chitz'ato ismunil tu' xol k'a k'a' , chic'aywa hune' mac tu' yin̈ ismunil . Waxan̈ca xin chicolchahi , yaja' haca'xan̈e iscollaxilti hunu anma xol k'a k'a' , hac tu' chu iscolchahi .
46003016	¿ Tom mach heyohtajo xin tato yatut Comam Dios heyehi yeb ayco Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyin̈ ?
46003017	Yuxin mac chitan̈tzenilo hune' yatut Comam tu' , chistan̈tzelo Comam , yuto han̈c'an̈e Comam ay yet hune' n̈a tu' . Hune' yatut Comam Dios chiwalti'an , ha' ton ex hex ti' .
46003018	Mach cheyute heba sucal , tato ay hunu mac texol caw helan yin̈ tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chabe , yuteojab isba haca' hunu mac matzet yohtaj haxinwal caw helan chielcanicoj .
46003019	Yuto ha' ishelanil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , caw matzet chalilo yul sat Comam Dios . Hac tu' yalni Istzoti' Comam bay chal haca' ti' : " Ha' mac caw ay ishelanil yalni , yin̈tic'a ishelanil tu' chitzabchati yu Comam , " ẍiayoj .
46003020	Chalnipaxoj : " Yohta Comam Dios tato matzet chal yelapno yitz'atil iswi' anma caw helan yalni , " ẍiayoj .
46003021	Yuxin mach chub helolo'n̈en heba yu tzujanex yinta hunu maca , yuto sunil ak'bilxa teyet yu Comam Dios .
46003022	Haca' hanin Pablo inti'an yeb juẍta Apolos , yeb juẍta Pedro , ha' Comam Dios con̈anicojan̈ chejabo texol , haca'ojtam heyet jehan̈ . Haca'paxo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb k'inale , yeb camical , yeb tzet ay tinan̈ , yeb tzettaj chitohuli , heyet ye sunil tu' .
46003023	Haxa hex ti' xin , yet Comam Cristo heyehi , Comam Cristo tu' xin yet Comam Dios yehi .
46004001	Caw c'ul tato mach jin̈ojan̈ cheyaco heyanma , yuto ischejabn̈e Comam Jesucristo jehan̈ . Ak'bil cochejbanilan̈ jak'nihan̈ ohtan̈elaxo huntek'an tzet ewan ye yu Comam Dios .
46004002	Yuxin ha' mac bay chiak'lax hunu chejbanile yilal yijem chute isba .
46004003	Wal inti'an xin , machi wocan yin̈ ta chexoc heyila' yin̈ tzet chinwatx'ehan , maca hunuxa mac chioc ilnoj . Haquintu'an mach chinocan wila'an yin̈ tzet chinwatx'ehan .
46004004	Walca xin machi hunu istx'ojal chinwatx'ehan , yaja' maẍtaj yu hune' tu' yuxin chiwalan tato c'ulinxahan , walxinto han̈c'an̈e Comam Dios Yahawil chu yalni yin̈ tzet chinwatx'ehan .
46004005	Yuxin mach chexoc heyala' tinan̈ yin̈ tzet heye hununex . Wal xin echmawe yul Comam Dios Jahawil , cat isyenilo Comam yin̈ caw haban tzet ewan yehi , cat yak'ni Comam ohtan̈elaxolo tzet ayayto yul yanma hunun anma . Chak'ni Comam istzalabal coc'ul hatatic'a hanta tzet chicowatx'e .
46004006	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , chiwalan huntek'an ti' yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ . Ilweto inbeybalan , yeb isbeybal juẍta Apolos , yuto chijaco cobahan̈ yecheloj yun̈e hebeybaln̈en cobeybalan̈ . Ha' huntek'an tzet chicowatx'eti'an̈ , ha' chioc yecheloj yun̈e mach chexpalc'on yiban̈ tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj . Yebpaxo yun̈e mach chelolo'n̈e heba heyanico iswinajil hunuxa maca , cat heyintan̈encanilto hunuxa maca .
46004007	Mach chu cololo'n̈en coba walca c'ulon̈ sata hunuxa maca , yuto sunil tzet chisje cowatx'eni ha' Comam Dios chiak'ni jet . Yuxin mach chu jinican̈ coba yu huntek'an tu' , to ha' Comam chiak'ni jet .
46004008	Walex hex ti' , cochn̈e caw k'alomexxa , yuto sunil tzet cheyoche ay teyet . Caw xin haca'xapaxo rey heye heyalni , matxa tzet chon̈ocan̈ heyu . Yaja' tzettam sak'al ta reyex , wal tu' ayon̈micojan̈ teyintaj .
46004009	Chintxuman haninti'an tato han̈on̈ ischejabon̈ Comam Dios ti'an̈ , con̈yacojan̈ Comam yin̈ sat anma haca' hunu mac caw islahobalxa yehi , haca' hunu mac chipotx'lax yila' anma . Haca' hunu tzet ye tu' ton̈e chimatz'elaxi , hac tu' jehan̈ yul sat anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb yul sat ebnaj 'angel .
46004010	Hanon̈ti'an̈ chon̈hallaxan̈ sucal yu chijalic'ojan̈ Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo . Walex hex ti' xin caw helanex yin̈ Comam Jesucristo heyalni . Han̈on̈ti'an̈ caw machi jipan̈ , walex xin caw aycano heyip . Caw matzet jelapnojan̈ yul hesat , walex xin caw aycano heyelapnoj .
46004011	Tinan̈ xin yexn̈e jijlenan̈ wahil yeb tajinti'al , yeb man̈xilk'apehal . Chon̈mak'laxpaxojan̈ yu anma , yeb machi jatutan̈ .
46004012	Caw xin chon̈siquihan̈ comunlahan̈ , yuto yin̈ cok'aban̈ caw coc'ulan̈ . Hayet chon̈bahlaxan̈ yu anma ha' isc'ulal Comam chijalan̈ tet . Ay bay chiec'ya' janmahan̈ yu anma , yaja' chijak' techahojan̈ .
46004013	Caw tx'oj istzotel anma jetan̈ , wal han̈on̈an̈ xin caw ak'anc'ulal chu cotzotelan̈ tet . Hactic'apax tu' tinan̈ , haca' isk'alemal yeb isyahbenal tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal , hac tu' jehan̈ yul sat anma .
46004014	Maẍtaj yu quexwak'ni tx'ixwojan yuxin chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' teyet . Walxinto yu wak'nihan hecuybanil , haca'ojtam caw wuninalan heyehi yuto caw xahan ayex wuhan .
46004015	Waxan̈ca ay lahon̈ebo mil mac chexcuyni yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo , yaja' haca'tan̈e hune'n̈e hemam . Haninti'an haca' hemam wehan , yuto haninan babel walan Tzoti' yet colbanile teyet , hac tu' xin yu hechahni Comam Jesucristo yul heyanma .
46004016	Yuxin caw chiwalan teyet beybaln̈ewe haca' inbeybalan .
46004017	Tinan̈ xin chinchejtojan juẍta Timoteo texol . Ha' naj ti' , haca' inc'aholan ye naj , caw xahan ay naj wuhan yeb caw yijem naj tet Comam Dios Jahawil . Ha' naj chinaniti inbeybalan teyet yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , haca'tic'a chu incuywahan xol anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul hunun con̈ob bay chinec'an .
46004018	Ay mac texol tu' caw chican̈ isba , ham yalni tato matxa chinapnihan quexwila'an .
46004019	Wal xin ta ẍi Comam ayxatic'aco yin̈ inc'ulan intohan quexwilnojan yin̈ an̈e . Hato tu' chiwilan tato caw yeli helan huntek'an ebnaj lolo' tu' , maca ton̈e chitzotel ebnaj xin .
46004020	Yuto maẍtaj yu tzet chijala chiixtan̈wiloj tato ayon̈xa yul isk'ab Comam Dios , walxinto yu chisyelo yip Comam jin̈ .
46004021	Wal tinan̈ xin , ¿ tzet cheyoche chinto wuban texol ? ¿ Tom cheyoche chintohan quexinhate'an yu hetx'ojal ? mato ¿ cheyoche ta c'ulch'an chiwute inc'ulan teyin̈ ?
46005001	Xahul isk'umal wetan tato ay hune' naj texol tu' yik'can̈ iscab mi' , hune' mule tu' caw nanxa islowi . Xol anma mach ohtan̈e Comam Dios , machi bay chijabe yuni haca' tu' .
46005002	Yaja' wal hex ti' xin , caw can̈heye cheyabe , estam chioc nino bisc'ulal yin̈ hec'ul yu hune' tu' . Naj uten hune' istx'ojal tu' caw yilal heyinilo naj texol .
46005003	Wal haninti'an waxan̈ca machijinan texol , yaj haca'ojtam ayinicojan texol . Yuxin yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo chiwalan yin̈ tzet chielico naj .
46005004	Yet checutxban heba hewatx'en hune' tu' , haca'ojtam ayinicojan texol yu yip Comam Jesucristo .
46005005	Wal hune' naj yaco ismul tu' awecanto naj yul isk'ab naj matzwalil yun̈e isc'aytzelaxilo isnimanil naj , cat iscolchacano yanma naj yet chihul Comam Jesucristo .
46005006	Hex ti' mach c'uloj ta cheyican̈ heba yu hune' istx'ojal iswatx'e naj tu' texol . ¿ Tom mach cheyohtajo xin tato hanic'n̈e yan̈al ixim pan chioc xol ixim harina , caw xin sunil ixim chisipc'a yu ?
46005007	Wal xin bejwecano sunil istx'ojal chexetantoj . Hac tu' xin lahanxa chexelico haca' ixim pan lan̈anto iswatx'i , machi yan̈al aycoj , chiwahlax yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua . Haquexojab tu' yul sat Comam Dios , yuto ha' Comam yaco isba xahanbalil iscam yu comul , haca' chu ispotx'ni ebnaj Israel no' me' isxahanbalo yin̈ k'in̈ Pascua .
46005008	Yuxin conabaweti iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ istoholal yeb isyelal ; wal xin sunil istx'ojal yeb mule lahan haca' yan̈al pan .
46005009	Yin̈ hune' incartahan watojan teyet waltojan tato mach chu hehunban heba yeb mac chito ixli maca chito winajli .
46005010	Yaja' machi waltojan tato matxa chehunba heba yeb anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios , machoj , yuto ha' anma tu' chito ixli maca chiwinajli , maca chito yocheco tzet ay yet anmahil , chielk'awi , chito ay jahno sata tioẍ . K'inalo tato ha' anma tu' chiwalan , caw yilalmi chexel yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , chal tu' .
46005011	Wal xin ha' huntek'an anma chiwaltojan teyet ti' ha' ton mac chihalni ta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , yaja' xin chito ixli maca chito winajli yeb chito yocheco tzet ay yul isk'ab hunu yet anmahil , yeb chito ay jahno sata tioẍ , yeb chito bahwahi yeb chito uq'ui , yeb chito elk'awi . Huntek'an mac haca' tu' mach chu hehunban heba yebi , nitam heyay tz'on̈no wa'o yebi .
46005012	Haninti'an mach chu walnihan yin̈ tzet chielico anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , wal xin cachann̈e Comam chu yalni tzet chielicoj . Yaja' walex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam , chu heyilni yin̈ tzet chielico hunu mac texol . Yuxin hune' naj issay ismul tu' iwelo naj texol .
46005013	
46006001	Hayet ay howal texol , ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxin ha' tet ebnaj alcal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chextohi yu iswatx'enayo ebnaj hune' howal tu' ? ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin maẍtaj tet yuninal Comam Dios chextohi ?
46006002	¿ Tom mach heyohtajo xin tato han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam ti' , han̈on̈ chon̈oc jila' yin̈ tzet chielico anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ? Yuxin tato chon̈oc jila' yin̈ tzet chielico anma yet bak'in , ¿ ha' tom xin niẍte howal ch'ah texol , mach chu hewatx'enayoj ?
46006003	¿ Tom xin maẍto heyohtajopaxoj tato han̈on̈ ti' chon̈oc jila'paxo yin̈ tzet chielico ebnaj 'angel yet bak'in ? Hajxam tzet ye tu' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ¿ tom mach chu cowatx'enayo heyalni ?
46006004	Yuxin yet ay howal ch'ah texol , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin sata ebnaj machi yoc yin̈ yuninal Comam Dios chexto hewatx'eyoj ?
46006005	Chiwaltojan hune' ti' teyet yun̈e hetx'ixwican̈ . ¿ Tom machi hunu mac texol chu iswatx'enayo howal ch'ah xol ebnaj juẍtaj tu' ?
46006006	Wal xin mach ton̈e cheyak'le howal , to chek'anlepaxo teyin̈ sata ebnaj alcal , ebnaj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
46006007	Hayet cheyak'ni howal teyin̈ hununex caw tx'oj hune' tu' yul sat Comam Dios . ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin mach cheyak' techahoj tato ay hunu mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈ ? ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin mach cheyak' nimanc'ulal tato ay hunu mac chielk'anilo hunu tzet ye tu' teyet ?
46006008	Walxinto hextic'a chewatx'e tzet ye tu' mach c'uloj , cat heyelk'awipaxo yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj .
46006009	¿ Tom mach heyohtajo xin tato mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal mach chu yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios ? Wal xin mach cheyak' subchaho heba , yuto mac chiixli yeb mac chiwinajli , yeb mac chisjahba isba sata tioẍ , yeb mac ay yixal cat issayni hunuxa ix , yeb mac ay yichamil cat issayni hunuxa winaj , yeb ebnaj winaj chi-la-uten mule yeb yet winajil , yeb xin mac elk'om , yeb mac pek' melyu , yeb mac uc'um te' , yeb mac hobomcan̈ tzoti' yin̈ yet anmahil , yeb mac chiik'ni ismelyu yin̈ lek'ti'al , mach chu yoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
46006010	
46006011	Ayex ti' hac tu' heyeco yet yalan̈tocanoj , yaja' wal tinan̈ sajxa ye heyanma yeb yetxa Comam Dios heyehi . Xaquexoc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu Comam Jesucristo , yeb yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios .
46006012	Ay mac chihalni , tato chisje cowatx'en sunil tzet chal coc'ul , caw yeli yaja' matxa jeto ye cowatx'en sunil tzet ye tu' . Haninti'an chisje inwatx'enan sunil tzet chal inc'ulal , yaja' mach chiwak'an hamanil tet huntek'an tu' yun̈e mach chioc quinyijba'an yin̈ tzet chala .
46006013	Aypaxo mac chalni haca' ti' : " Ha' tzet chicolo yet coc'ul yehi , ha' coc'ul tu' xin yet tzet chicolo yehi , " ẍi . Yeli hac ton tu' yehi , yaja' tzet chicolo tu' yeb coc'ul tu' chiapni istz'ayical bay chitan̈ilo yu Comam Dios . Wal conimanil xin mach yeto ixloj maca winajlo yehi . Walxinto yetxa Comam Jesucristo Jahawil ye conimanil ti' , yetxapaxo conimanil ye Comam .
46006014	Haca' yu yak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Dios Comam Jesucristo Jahawil xol camom , hac tu' chu con̈yak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam yu yip .
46006015	¿ Tom mach heyohtajoj tato hune' conimanil ti' caw yetbixa isba yeb isnimanil Comam Jesucristo ? ¿ Tom xin chu jinito isnimanil Comam tu' cat cohunban yeb isnimanil hunu ix ix tx'oj ye iswi' ? ¡ Machoj !
46006016	¿ Tom mach heyohtajo xin , tato yet chishunban isnimanil hunu naj yeb hunu ix ix tx'oj ye iswi' , hunxan̈e anmahil chucano naj yeb ix ? Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Hunxan̈e anmahil chucano iscawan̈il , " ẍiayoj .
46006017	Hayet chijanico coba yul isk'ab Comam Dios hunxan̈e chijucano yeb Comam .
46006018	Wal xin nann̈e heyu , machojab cheyak' hamanil tet ixloj maca winajloj . Tzijxan̈e istx'ojal chaco hunu mac maẍtaj isnimanil chetatoj , yaja' wal mac chiixli maca chiwinajli , caw ha' yin̈ isnimanil chaco ismul .
46006019	¿ Tom mach heyohtajo xin , tato yatutxa Comam Esp'iritu Santo ye henimanil , Comam ak'bil teyet yu Comam Dios yun̈e yeh yul heyanma ? Yuxin matxa heyeto heba hechuquil .
46006020	Wal xin lok'bilexxa yu Comam Dios , yuxin watx'ewe isc'ulal yin̈ henimanil , haxinwal chioc ismay Comam Dios heyu .
46007001	Tinan̈ xin chiwatojan ispaj huntek'an hek'ambebal heyati yul hecarta wetan . C'ul tato mach chik' ebnaj winaj yixal .
46007002	Yaja' yun̈e mach chiayc'ay ebnaj maca ebix ix yin̈ mule , yuxin yilal yik'ni ebnaj yixal , yeb yik'nipaxo ebix ix yichamil .
46007003	Naj ichamile yilal yochen naj yixal , hacpax tu' ix ixale yilal yochen ix yichamil .
46007004	Yuto ix ixale matxa yeto isba ix ischuquil , walxinto yetxa yichamil ix yehi . Hacpax tu' naj ichamile , matxa yeto isba naj ischuquil , to yetxa yixal naj yehi .
46007005	Yuxin mach chu heman̈c'on heyochelen heba hununex , cachan tato lahti'xa ye heyu heman̈c'on heba teyet hununex yin̈ hayebo tz'ayic yu hetxahli tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunil heyanma . Yaja' xin yilal hehunbanpaxo heba hunelxa , yuto c'uxantaxca mach chitecha heyu yin̈ tzet choche henimanil , cat yoc naj matzwalil quexyilwenoj cat heyayc'ayi cat heyanico hemul .
46007006	Huntek'an chiwaltoti'an mach caw chejbanile chucanicoj , wal xin ton̈e chiwaltojan teyet yu heyilni tato chu heyijeni .
46007007	Wal inti'an , ay wala'an sunil mac chican haca' weti'an , yaja' nananta conabal hununon̈ yu Comam Dios . Yuto ay mac mach choche chik' yixal , aypaxo mac mach ch'ec' yu tato mach chik' yixal .
46007008	Chiwalan tet mac maẍto chimohyi , yeb tet ebix camnaxa yichamil , c'ul tato mach chik' yetbi haca' weti'an .
46007009	Yaja' ta ay mac mach chitecha yu ye ischuquil chabe , yilal ismohyi sata ton̈e choche chiec' ixloj maca winajloj .
46007010	Yaja' wal tet mac mohyinaxa xin , chiwak'an huntek'an chejbanile tet , huntek'an chejbanile ti' mach wetojan , to yet Comam Dios yehi . Hex ixale mach chepohle heba yeb heyichamil .
46007011	Yaja' tato ay hunu ix ix chispohle isba yeb yichamil , matxa chu yik'ni ix hunuxa winaj , cachann̈e yeb yichamil ix tu' chisje ishunban isba hunelxa . Hacpax tu' naj ichamile , mach chu ispohni isba naj yeb yixal .
46007012	Wal tet hunmajanxa xin chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' , yaja' mach ischejbanilo Comam Dios , to haninan chiwaltojan : Tato ay hunu naj juẍtaj maẍto chaco isba yixal yul isk'ab Comam Dios , yaja' tato chitzala isc'ul ix isc'atan̈ naj , hune' naj juẍta tu' , mach chu ispohni isba naj yeb ix .
46007013	Yeb xin tato ay hunu ix janab , maẍto chaco isba yichamil yul isk'ab Comam yaja' chitzala isc'ul naj yeb ix , mach chu ispohni isba ix yeb naj .
46007014	Yuto waxan̈ca maẍto ayoco yichamil ix yul isk'ab Comam , yaja' hacojtam yetxa Comam Dios ye naj , yuto hun ye naj yeb hune' ix ix ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Hacpax tu' ix maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam , hacojtam yetxa Comam Dios ye ix , yuto hun ye ix yeb hune' naj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam . K'inalo ta maẍto yeto Comam ye iscawan̈il lahanmi chielico yuninal haca' yuninal anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , walxinto haca'xa yuninal Comam Dios yehi .
46007015	Yaja' ta naj ichamile maca ix ixale maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam tu' , choche ispohle isba yeb yetbi , ispohab isba . Yin̈ haca' tu' chicancano naj juẍtaj maca ix janab tu' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , yuto choche Comam Dios tato chexec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal .
46007016	Yuto hach ixale hach ti' maẍto hawohtajoj tato chicolcha hawichamil tu' yu isc'ulal chabeybaln̈e , maca hach ichamile hach ti' maẍto hawohtajoj tato chicolcha hawixal tu' yu isc'ulal chabeybaln̈e , wal xin c'ul ta mach chepohle heba .
46007017	Wal hununon̈ xin , haca'tic'a jehi yet con̈yawten Comam Dios , hac tu' chu coyijen yin̈ tzet xayak' Comam jet . Hac tu' chejbanil wak'an tet macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul hunun con̈ob .
46007018	Tato ay hunujex ayxaco circuncisi'on yin̈ henimanil yet quexyawten Comam , machojab cheyeba hune' circuncisi'on tu' . Maca tato maẍto circuncisi'on teyin̈ yet quexyawten Comam , matxa yilalo cheyak' circuncidar heba .
46007019	Yuto ha' hune' caw yilal yehi ha' heyijen ischejbanil Comam Dios , machi yoc yin̈ ta ayxaco circuncisi'on teyin̈ maca machoj .
46007020	Haca'ojab heye yet quexyawten Comam Dios yuninaloj , hacojab tu' cheyucanoj .
46007021	Tato ay hunu mac ayicto yalan̈ yip hunu maca yet yawtelax yu Comam , machojab chitac isc'ul yin̈ hune' tu' , yaja' tato ay tzet chu yelti yalan̈ yip hune' mac tu' caw c'ultopaxoj .
46007022	Ha' mac ayicto yalan̈ yip hunu maca yet yawtelax yu Comam , tinan̈ xin yetxa isba ischuquil yin̈ isyijen tzet chal Comam Dios . Hacpax tu' xin mac mach chejabo yehi yet yawtelax yu Comam , tinan̈ xin ischejabxa Comam yehi .
46007023	Wal xin caw ay istohol ak'bilex yu Comam , yuxin mach cheyacto heba yalan̈ yip hunuxa maca .
46007024	Tinan̈ xin , hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , ha' yul sat Comam Dios c'ul cocancano haca'tic'a jehi yet con̈yawten Comam Dios yuninaloj .
46007025	Wal mac maẍto mohyinajoj machi chejbanile yak'cano Comam wetan yin̈ , wal huntek'an chiwaltoti'an xin yul wetan chiwitijan , yaja' yilal caw ay yelapno yul hesat , yuto yu isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios win̈an yuxin yak' hune' inmunilti'an yin̈ incuywahan .
46007026	Yul wetan , tato ay hunu naj maẍto yixal , c'ul ta mach chik' naj yixal , yuto huntek'an tiempo bay ayon̈ tinan̈ caw ya'taxa .
46007027	Ha' mac ayxa yixal , machojab chispoh isba yeb yixal . Ha' mac maẍto yixal , c'ul ta mach chisay yixal .
46007028	Tato ayex chexmohyi , mach muleho hune' tu' ; taca hunu ix k'opo chimohyi xin , mach tx'ojopaxo hune' tu' . Yaja' wal mac chimohyi caw ay isya'tajil chila . Ay wala'an mach chak'le huntek'an isya'tajil tu' .
46007029	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , ha' chalilo huntek'an chiwaltoti'an to hanic'xan̈e tiempo ayon̈ic'oj , yuxin hex ay heyixal , machojabn̈etaj yin̈ heyixal cheyaco henabal , wal xin yilal heyak'ni hamanil yin̈ yet Comam .
46007030	Haxa mac bisc'ulal ye xin , haca'ojtam ayco yin̈ tzalahilal , haxa mac ayco yin̈ tzalahilal xin , haca'ojtam ayco yin̈ bisc'ulal . Ha' mac chilok'ni hunu tzet ye tu' haca'ojtam mach yeto tzet chislok' tu' .
46007031	Haxa mac chiocnico tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu , haca'ojtam mach lan̈an yocheni yuto hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chitan̈iloj .
46007032	Ay wala'an matzet cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul . Yet maẍto chik' yixal hunu naj tzeh , yin̈n̈e yet Comam ayco yanma naj , han̈e tzet chal Comam ha' chisyije naj .
46007033	Wal hunu naj ayxa yixal xin , haxa yin̈ tzet ye tu' ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ha' chaco yin̈ isc'ul , yeb yu iswatx'en naj yin̈ tzet choche isc'ul yixal , hac tu' xin cabxa chielico isnabal naj .
46007034	Hacpax tu' ebix k'opo maẍto chimohyi yeb ebix maẍtic'a yichamil , ha' yin̈ yet Comam bay ayco yanma ebix yeb sunil isnabal . Wal ebix ay yichamil xin , ha' tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb tzet choche yichamil , ha' ayco yin̈ isc'ul ebix iswatx'eni .
46007035	Chiwalan huntek'an ti' , yaja' maẍtaj yu quexincachnihan , to yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ , yeb yu hebeybaln̈en haca' choche Comam Dios , cat hemunla yin̈ ismunil Comam yin̈ sunil heyanma .
46007036	Ta ay hunu naj juẍta choche chimohyi yeb hunu ix janab yuto istiempohalxa yik'ni yixal , chisje ismohyi , mach tx'ojo hune' tu' .
46007037	Yaja' xin ta ay hunu mac mach chisje isc'ul chik' yixal , chi-xin-ist'in̈baco yin̈ yanma yec' yu ischuquil , k'ac'ul ta mach chimohyi .
46007038	Yuxin ta chimohyi hune' mac tu' , c'ul , yaja' ta mach chimohyi xin , ec'bal c'ultopaxoj .
46007039	Yet itzitzto yichamil hunu ix ix , aytocto ix yalan̈ ischejbanil yichamil . Yaja' ta chicam naj xin caw yetxa isba ix ischuquil , xaisje ismohyi ix yeb mac bay chal isc'ul , yaja' tan̈e yeb hunu mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam .
46007040	Yaja' wal intxumnihan , ec'balto sak'al yet ix ta mach chik' yichamil ix . Hac tu' chiwute walnihan yuto ha' hun Comam Esp'iritu Santo ayco wetbiojan , ha' chak'ni wala'an .
46008001	Wal tinan̈ xin , chiwaltojan teyet yin̈ huntek'an itah chihaltelax tet ej tioẍ . Caw yel haca' yallaxi . " Caw ay cohelanil cosunil , " ẍi . Yaja' cohelanil tu' ay ismay jinican̈ coba yu . Wal ta xahan chijil coba hununon̈ , chon̈ch'ib yin̈ yet Comam haca' tu' .
46008002	Tato ay hunu mac caw ay isnabal chute istxumni , maẍto isnabal hune' mac tu' yin̈ haca' caw yelapno yehi .
46008003	Wal mac ayco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , caw ohtabil yu Comam .
46008004	Wal yin̈ islolax huntek'an itah chiak'lax yin̈ xahanbalil tet ej tioẍ , caw matzet chaliloj yuto huntek'an tioẍ tu' caw johtaj tato caw matzet chal yelapno yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yuto hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios .
46008005	Yaja' waxan̈ca xin ay mac chihalni ta ay tx'i'al dios satcan̈ , yeb yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ta hac tu' tx'i'al dios , yeb tx'i'al yahaw yul sat ebnaj .
46008006	Yaja' wal han̈on̈ ti' , hune'n̈ech'an coDiosal , ha' ton Comam Dios mame . Ha' Comam tu' yichebanil sunil tzet ye tu' , yetpaxo Comam je han̈on̈ ti' . Hune'n̈ech'anpaxo Jahawil , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo . Yu Comam tu' , yuxin ay sunil tzet ye tu' , yeb yu Comam yuxin ayon̈ .
46008007	Yaja' mach sunilo ebnaj juẍta chinachalo hune' ti' yu . Yuto ay ebnaj chi-tic'a-yiyo isba tet tioẍ yet yalan̈tocanoj , yuxin yet chisc'uxni ebnaj no' chibe haltebilxa yin̈ xahanbalil tet tioẍ tu' , chito cabcon isc'ul , chistxumni ebnaj ta ch'etaxto ebnaj yu .
46008008	Yaja' maẍtaj yu tzet chicolo yuxin chon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , maẍtaj yu chicolo huntek'an itah tu' yuxin chon̈c'ulbiloj , maca yu mach chicolo yuxin chon̈can tx'ojal .
46008009	Caw cheyil heba , tajca yu chisje heloni yuxin cheyak' ayc'ayo hunu mac maẍto yip yin̈ yet Comam .
46008010	Tajca yu heyohtaxa ta mach txahulo heloni huntek'an itah tu' , yuxin chexay tz'on̈no wa'o yul yatut tioẍ , yaja' ta ay ebnaj juẍta chexilni yin̈ haca' tu' , mach ismunil hex cawex cheyijba ebnaj isloni huntek'an itah haltebil tet tioẍ tu' .
46008011	Ta hac tu' cheyute , cheyak' ayc'ayo hunu mac maẍto yip yin̈ yet Comam , wal xin ha' yin̈ hune' mac tu' campaxo Comam Jes'us .
46008012	Yuxin tato heyu yuxin chietaxto isnabal hunu heyuẍta maẍto yip yin̈ Comam , cheyaco hemul yin̈ haca' tu' yul sat Comam Jesucristo .
46008013	Yuxin ta yun̈e inc'uxnihan no' chibe yuxin chiwak' ayc'ayojan hunu wuẍtajan , k'ac'ul tom mach chinc'uxan no' chibe tu' , haxinwal machi hunu mac chaco ismul wuhan .
46009001	Yin̈ caw yeli haninti'an ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan yuto wilpaxojan Comam , yuxin lahan welapnojan haca' ebnaj ischejab Comam . Hex ti' xin ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , yaja' yu inmunilan texol .
46009002	Waxan̈ca ay mac chalni tato mach ischejabo Comam Jesucristo wehan , yaja' wal hex ti' xin caw heyohtaj tato ischejab Comam wehan , yuto yu inmunilan texol yuxin ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Ha' chalniloj tato caw yeli ischejab Comam wehan .
46009003	Hac ti' chu inpajtzenan tet ebnaj chitzotel win̈an .
46009004	Haninti'an ay wocan yin̈ inchahnihan tzet chinlohan yin̈ inmunilan texol .
46009005	K'inalo ta ay hunu ix janab chioc wixalojan tinan̈ , ¿ tom mach chu winic'ojan ix wintajan haca' chu naj Pedro yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj ischejab Comam Jesucristo , yeb ebnaj yuẍta Comam ?
46009006	¿ Tom haninxan̈ehan yeb naj Bernab'e mach chiak'lax tzet chiocnico juhan̈ yet chon̈munlahan̈ yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios ?
46009007	Haca' ebnaj soldado tinan̈ , ¿ tom yin̈ ebnaj ayco tzet chiocnico yu ? Haca'paxo hunu naj chitz'unni te' uva , ¿ tom mach chislo naj hunu sat te' xin ? Haca'paxo hunu naj tan̈em wacax , ¿ tom mach chuc' naj yal yim no' ?
46009008	Tajca chetxumu tato haninn̈ehan chiwalan hune' ti' , wal xin hac tu' yalnipaxo yin̈ isley naj Mois'es .
46009009	Yin̈ ley tu' tz'ibn̈ebilcano haca' ti' : " Mach cheyaco tz'ispa yin̈ isti' no' wacax yet chixan̈wi trigo no' , " ẍiayoj . Yaja' maẍtaj no' wacax ayco yin̈ isc'ul Comam yet yalni hune' tu' .
46009010	Wal xin han̈on̈ ayon̈ico yin̈ isc'ul Comam yet yalni hune' tu' . Yuxin haca' naj t'ocom tx'otx' yeb naj chixan̈nilti ixim trigo , ha' ismunil ebnaj tu' ayco yipo yanma , yuto yin̈ ismunil ebnaj tu' chiel tzet chislo .
46009011	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ cotz'unan̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios texol , yuxin mach tx'ojoj ta cheyak' hanic' tzet chiocnico juhan̈ .
46009012	Ta ha' hunmajanxa ebnaj chiec' texol cheyak' tzet chiocnico yu , hajon̈xaman̈ ay yilal cochahni jetan̈ . Yaja' xin machi hunelo cok'anan̈ teyet , caw ton̈e jijlenan̈ yun̈e mach chioc lin̈no jalnic'ojan̈ Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo .
46009013	Hex ti' heyohtaj tato ebnaj chimunla yul yatut Comam Dios , ha' tzet chihaltelax tet Comam yul yatut tu' , ha' chiak'ni ec'o yu ebnaj . Ha' chal yelapno tu' , to naj sacerdote chianico xahanbal tet Comam Dios , ay yoc naj yin̈ tzet lan̈an yalten tu' .
46009014	Hac ton tu' ye ebnaj chimunla yin̈ yalnic'o Tzoti' yet colbanile , halbilcano yu Comam Dios tato yilal yak'lax tzet chiocnico yu ebnaj yin̈ hune' munil bay chimunlaco tu' .
46009015	Wal haninti'an xin , machi hunelo ink'anan teyet yin̈ tzet ocnico wuhan waxan̈ca xin caw yilal inchahnihan . Yaja' maẍtaj yu heyak'ni yuxin chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet , wal xin ay hune' intzalahilalan yuto machi hunu tzet ye tu' ink'anan teyet . K'ac'ulmi chincaman satapax ink'annihan hunu tzet ye tu' teyet .
46009016	Haninti'an mach chinlolo'n̈e inbahan yu chiwalic'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile tet anma , yuto chejbilinan walnic'ojan . Caw c'anch'aninan ta mach chiwalan Tzoti' yet colbanile .
46009017	K'inalo ta yul wetan chiwitijan wec'an walnoc'ojan , caw yilalmi inchahnipaxojan intoholan . Wal xin chiwalic'ojan yuto ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an .
46009018	Wal xin , ha' hune' ispaj yet chinec'an walnoc'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile ha' ton tzalahilal . Machi intoholan chink'anan , waxan̈ca yet ay ink'annihan intoholan yin̈ inmuniltu'an yu yec' wuhan .
46009019	Mach ayinicojan yalan̈ yip hunu maca , yaja' xawaco inbahan haca' chejab tet sunil anma , yun̈e caw tx'i'al anma chioccano yul isk'ab Comam wuhan .
46009020	Yet chinec'an xol ebnaj wet con̈ob Israelan , haca' isbeybal ebnaj tu' hac tu' chiwute inbeybalan , yun̈e yoc haywan̈o ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam , cat yelcanti ebnaj yalan̈ ley , yuxin haca'tan̈e chiwacto inbahan yalan̈ isley naj Mois'es . Yaja' yin̈ caw isyelal mach ayinoctojan yalan̈ ley tu' .
46009021	Hacpax tu' yet chinec'an xol anma mach Israeloj , anma mach ayocto yalan̈ isley naj Mois'es , haca' isbeybal ebnaj tu' hac tu' chiwutepaxo inbahan , yun̈e yoc haywan̈o ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam . Yaja' yin̈ caw isyelal yalan̈ ischejbanil Comam Dios ayinictojan , yuto yijeminan yin̈ ischejbanil Comam Jesucristo .
46009022	Haxa yet ayinicojan xol ebnaj maẍto bin yip yin̈ yet Comam xin , haca'tan̈e hunu mac machi yip , hac tu' chiwute inbahan , yun̈e caw yik'ni yip yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam . Wal xin wute inbahan haca' anma tu' , yun̈e ischahnicano iscolbanil haywan̈o anma tu' .
46009023	Yu cuybanile yet colbanile , yuxin hac tu' wute inbahan , yun̈e ha' huninan chinchahan isc'ulal yu .
46009024	Haca' yin̈ hunu an̈e tinan̈ , tx'i'al mac chak' an̈e , yaja' hune'n̈e mac chiik'wahi . Tinan̈ xin , haca' chu ebnaj ch'ak'ni an̈e tu' , hacojab tu' cheyute heba yin̈ yet Comam , haxinwal chechah ispaj selel .
46009025	Sunil ebnaj chak' an̈e , yet chiscuyni isba ebnaj caw cam chil ebnaj ta machi hunu tzet ye tu' chietanto isnimanil ebnaj yun̈e yik'ni ebnaj ismatan yet chiyak'ni ebnaj an̈e . Yaja' hune' matan chik' ebnaj tu' pet chietaxtoj , wal hune' matan chijik' han̈on̈ ti' yin̈ ismunil Comam , machi bak'in chietaxtoj .
46009026	Haca' naj chak' an̈e tu' chak' yanma naj yapni bay chiak'lax ismatan , hac tu' wehan haninti'an . Haca'paxo ebnaj chialaxico yak'leno howal haquintu'an , mach nabn̈eho chielto ink'aban . Wal xin yin̈ caw sunil wanmahan chinmunlahan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios .
46009027	Caw chincachan innimanilan , chiwanicojan isyijeno yin̈ tzet chiwochehan , yuto c'uxantaxca lahwi wawtenan anma yul isk'ab Comam Dios , haxa taxca chielicoj matxa chinchahan ispaj selel tzet tzumbebil wuti'an .
46010001	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwochehan mach chenahuln̈eto yin̈ tzet yak'le ebnaj jichmam yet yijbalaxic'o ebnaj yu naj Mois'es yet payat . Sunil ebnaj belwi yalan̈ hune' moyan , yeb xin sunil ebnaj ec'paxto yictabal ha' Mar Rojo .
46010002	Haca'tan̈e ahcano ha' iswi' anma ishunicanico ebnaj yinta naj Mois'es yu hune' moyan tu' , yeb yet yec'to ebnaj yictabal ha' mar tu' , haca'tan̈e ahcano ha' iswi' ebnaj .
46010003	Islonipaxo ebnaj huntek'an tzet chilolax yati Comam Dios yul satcan̈ .
46010004	Yebpaxo xin sunil ebnaj uc'ni ha ha' yak' Comam Dios elti yin̈ isc'ul hune' ch'en ch'en . Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en tu' yechel Comam Jesucristo ye ch'en , ha' hun Comam tzujan yinta ebnaj jichmam yin̈ isbel .
46010005	Waxan̈ca yak' Comam Dios huntek'an tu' tet ebnaj , yaja' ay ebnaj mach isyije yin̈ tzet yal Comam Dios , yuxin caw tx'i'al ebnaj cami , iscancano pac'no isnimanil ebnaj sat tx'otx' desierto yin̈ isbel tu' .
46010006	Sunil huntek'an yu ebnaj tu' cocuybanil yucanoj yun̈e matxa chijocheco istx'ojal haca' yu ebnaj .
46010007	Mach cheyiyo heba tetej tioẍ haca' yu tx'i'al ebnaj tu' , haca' yecano istzoti'al ebnaj yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Ay tz'on̈no ebnaj , yoc ebnaj wa'oj yeb uc'uj . Lahwi tu' xin yah bulna ebnaj , yoc ebnaj can̈alwoj , yak'ni ebnaj tzet chal isc'ul , " ẍiayoj .
46010008	Machojab chexixli haca' yu tx'i'al ebnaj tu' . Yu hune' tu' yuxin tan̈ilo veintitr'es mil ebnaj yin̈ hune' tz'ayic .
46010009	Machojabpaxo xin cheyaco Comam Jesucristo yin̈ ilwebal , haca' yu anma tu' . Yu hune' tu' yuxin caw tx'i'al mac chilax yu no' laba , iscamiloj .
46010010	Machojab chexbuchwa yin̈ Comam Dios haca' yu anma tu' . Yu hune' tu' yuxin tx'i'al mac cam yu naj 'angel ak'om camo anma .
46010011	Sunil huntek'an tzet yu ebnaj jichmam tu' , cuybanile yecano jin̈ tinan̈ , tz'ibn̈ebilpaxcanayoj yun̈e johtan̈eni ta mach chu cowatx'en istx'ojal , han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic ti' .
46010012	Yuxin ha' mac caw c'ul yeco chabe , yilal caw cam chil isba haxinwal mach chiayc'ayi .
46010013	Tzijxan̈e ilwebal chi-la-ay jiban̈ , lahan haca' ilwebal chiay yiban̈ sunil anma . Yaja' chicawxi coc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios tato mach chischayo Comam hunu ilwebal jiban̈ mach chitecha ju . Wal xin , hayet chiapni ilwebal jin̈ , ha' Comam chiyeni jet tzet chu cocolcha tet ilwebal tu' , hac tu' xin chu istecha ju .
46010014	Tinan̈ xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuhan , mach cheyiyo heba tet ej tioẍ .
46010015	Chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' teyet yuto caw helanexxa , chisje heyoc heyilnoj ta c'ul huntek'an chiwaltoti'an .
46010016	Yet chijec'tzen santa cena chijak'ni yuch'andiosal yin̈ tzet ayayto yul ch'en vaso cat juc'ni , ha' chiyeniloj tato hunxan̈e je yeb Comam Jesucristo yu ischiq'uil . Haxa yet chicok'axponayo ixim pan cat cowahni ixim , ha' ch'ak'ni conaba' tato hunxan̈e chon̈elcanico yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
46010017	Waxan̈ca caw tx'i'alon̈ , yaja' hune'n̈e ha' ixim pan chicowah cosunil , ha' chiyeniloj tato hunxan̈e nimanile je cosunil .
46010018	Naweti yin̈ con̈ob Israel , hayet chisc'uxni ebnaj no' chibe chiak'lax yin̈ xahanbalil tet Comam Dios , hunxan̈e chucano ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
46010019	Yaj mach lan̈ano walnihan tato ay yip tioẍ , yeb ta ay tzet chal yelapno no' chibe chihaltelax tet .
46010020	Ha' chalilo hune' chiwalti'an , to hayet chak'ni ebnaj mach Israelo isxahanbal , maẍtaj tet Comam Dios chalte ebnaj isxahanbal tu' , walxinto ha' tet ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil chalte ebnaj isxahanbal . Ha' hune' ti' machojab cheyaco heba yetbiho ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil .
46010021	Mach chu juc'ni tzet ay yul isvaso Comam Dios cat juc'nipaxo tzet ay yul isvaso ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil . Mach chu jocpaxo tz'on̈no wa'o sat ismeẍa Comam Dios , chilahwi tu' cat jocpaxo tz'on̈no wa'o sat ismeẍa ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil .
46010022	Wal xin machojab chicowatx'e huntek'an tu' , haxinwal mach chijak'tij ishowal Comam jin̈ yuto mach ec'balo jip yiban̈ Comam .
46010023	Ay mac chihalni : " Chisje cowatx'en sunil tzet chal janma , " ẍi . Caw yeli , yaja' han̈on̈ ti' matxa jeto ay cowatx'en huntek'an tu' . Chu cowatx'en sunil tzet chal coc'ul , yaja' mach sunilo chicolwa jin̈ con̈yak'ni ch'ibo yin̈ yet Comam Dios .
46010024	Machojabn̈etaj isc'ulal jet chicosayic'oj , wal xin caw yilal janico conabal yin̈ isc'ulalo yin̈ jet anmahil .
46010025	Sunil no' chibe chitxon̈lax yul txon̈bal chibe chu hec'uxni no' , mach yilalo chek'ambe tzet ye no' haxinwal mach chicabcon heyanma hec'uxni no' .
46010026	Yuto hune' yul yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb sunil tzet ayayo sat , yet Comam Dios yehi .
46010027	Tato chexawtelax wa'o yu hunu mac maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam , chu hetohi . Ta chisje hec'ul , chu hec'uxni no' chibe chialaxayo yin̈ hesat . Mach chek'ambe tzet ye no' haxinwal mach chicabconcan̈ heyanma yet chec'uxni no' .
46010028	Yaja' ta ay mac chalni haca' ti' : " No' chibe ti' xaak'lax no' yin̈ xahanbalil tet tioẍ , " ta ẍi , mach chec'ux no' , yu isc'ulalo yin̈ hune' mac chalni tu' .
46010029	Chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' yun̈e mach chietaxto isnabal hune' mac maẍto yip isnabal tu' , maẍtaj yu henabal hex ti' . Yaja' ayexmi chetxum haca' ti' : " ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxin chincach inbahan inc'uxnihan no' chibe chiak'lax yin̈ xahanbalil tu' yu anma chinanon isc'ul isc'uxni no' ?
46010030	Ta chiwak'an yuch'andiosal yin̈ no' chibe chinc'uxtu'an , matxa mac chu yoc buchwal yin̈ hune' tu' , " quexchimi .
46010031	Wal xin chiwalan teyet , ta ay hunu tzet ye tu' chelo yeb cheyuc'u , maca hunuxa tzet ye tu' cheyu , ha'ojab ismay Comam Dios cheyaco yin̈ tzet chewatx'e tu' .
46010032	Wal xin machojab cheyetato isnabal ebnaj Israel maca ebnaj mach Israeloj , maca macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo yu tzet chewatx'e .
46010033	Haca' haninti'an , caw chiwak' wanmahan inwatx'enan isc'ulal sata anma , maẍtaj isc'ulal wetan chinsayic'ojan , to isc'ulal yet anma , yun̈e istzujcha apno iscolbanil anma yu .
46011001	Ocan̈we tzujno yin̈ inbeybalti'an , haca' chiwute inbeybaln̈ehan isbeybal Comam Jesucristo .
46011002	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw chintzalahan teyin̈ , yuto yin̈ sunil tzet chewatx'e chinhenatijan , yebpaxo caw ayexico heyijen huntek'an cuybanile wak'an teyet .
46011003	Chiwochehan cheyohtan̈eloj ta Comam Jesucristo , ha' caw ayco iswi'ehalo ebnaj winaj . Haxa naj ichamile xin , iswi'ehal yeco naj yin̈ yixal , haca'paxo Comam Dios iswi'ehal yeco Comam yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
46011004	Tato chaco ebnaj winaj yen̈el iswi' yet chitxahli ebnaj , maca yet chalni ebnaj tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , yin̈ haca' tu' chiyilo ebnaj ispixan Comam Jesucristo , Comam ayco iswi'ehalo yin̈ ebnaj .
46011005	Haca'paxo ebix ix , ta ay hunu ix mach chahto yen̈el iswi' yet chitxahli , maca yet chalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , yin̈ haca' tu' , ha'tic'a ix chiinilo ispixan yichamil , naj ayco iswi'ehalo yin̈ ix . Lahan chalilo haca'tan̈e xayak' elo ix xil iswi' .
46011006	Yuxin ta ay hunu ebix ix , mach chahto yen̈el iswi' , c'ulmi yak'ni ebix elo xil iswi' , yaja' ta tx'ixobal hune' tu' chabe ebix xin , yak'abahto ebix yen̈el iswi' .
46011007	Wal han̈on̈ winajon̈ ti' xin , mach c'uloj ta chijahto yen̈el cowi' , yuto yechel Comam Dios jehi yeb han̈on̈ chicoyelo yip Comam Dios . Haxa ebix ix xin , ha' ebix chiyenilo yip ebnaj winaj .
46011008	Yuto yet iswatx'en Comam Dios naj winaj , mach yin̈o ix ix el naj yu Comam . Walxinto ha' ix ix tu' yin̈ naj winaj elna ix yu Comam .
46011009	Maẍtaj yu ix ix yuxin iswatx'e Comam Dios naj winaj , walxinto yu naj winaj yuxin iswatx'e Comam ix ix .
46011010	Yu hune' tu' , yuxin yilal yanahto ebix ix yen̈el iswi' yu isyenilo ebix tato ayicto ebix yalan̈ ischejbanil yichamil , yuto t'an̈anico ebnaj 'angel jin̈ .
46011011	Yaja' walxa yin̈ Comam Dios , machim naj winaj ta machi ix ix , machimpaxo ix ix ta machi naj winaj .
46011012	Caw yeli , yin̈ naj babel winaj elna ix babel ix . Walxa tinan̈ xin , yin̈xa ix ix chipitzc'a naj winaj . Yaja' sunil tu' yu Comam Dios yuxin hac tu' yehi .
46011013	Yuxin txumwej ta c'ul istxahli hunu ix ix yet machi yen̈el iswi' ix chahtoj .
46011014	Caw johtaj tato caw tx'ixobal yak'ni ch'ibo ebnaj winaj xil iswi' .
46011015	Yaja' wal ebix ix xin , caw istzan ebix yak'ni ch'ibo xil iswi' , yuto xil iswi' ebix tu' haca' yen̈el iswi' ebix yecoj .
46011016	Tato ay mac chioc tzotelo yiban̈ilo hune' ti' , yohtan̈eojabiloj tato han̈on̈ti'an̈ yeb sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul hunun con̈ob , mach chichahlax txahlo hunu ix ix ta machi yen̈el iswi' ix chahtoj .
46011017	Yin̈ huntek'an chiwaltojan teyet ti' , mach chintzalahan teyin̈ , yuto hayet checutxbanico heba , caw machi nino isc'ulal chechah , wal xin caw ton̈e cheyetato heba .
46011018	Yin̈ babelal chiwaltojan teyet ta xawabehan ta hayet checutxban heba yin̈ culto tolab chepohle heba , yaja' yet chintxumnihan etzan̈em caw yel hune' tu' .
46011019	Yaja' etza caw yilal chepohle heba , yun̈e yixtan̈wiloj mac caw yel chala ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
46011020	Wal xin yet checutxban heba , matxa taj santa cena cheyec'tze ,
46011021	yuto yet chiapni yorahil hewa'i nanantaxan̈e hebabico heloni tzet chelo , yuxin ayex mach chinoh hec'ul , ayexpaxo xin chexuq'uicanocan̈ .
46011022	¿ Tom machi heyatut bay chexwa' xin ? ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin cheyilo ispixan mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , cat heyanicanico yin̈ tx'ixwilal mac matzet aya ? ¿ Chimquintzalahan yin̈ hune' hebeybal tu' heyalni ? Wal xin caw mach chu intzalahan yin̈ .
46011023	Hune' cuybanil chiwapaxtojan teyet ti' , ha' tet Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chabilcano wuhan . Ha' yin̈ hune' ak'bal yet yalaxico Comam yul isk'ab camical , yican̈ Comam ixim pan ,
46011024	lahwi yak'ni Comam yuch'andiosal yin̈ ixim , isk'axponayo ixim , yalni Comam : " Chahwej cat hewahni , hune' ti' yechel innimanilan chiwak'an yin̈ camical yu hecolchahi . Hunta el yet cheyec'tzen hune' ti' chinhenanitijan , " ẍicano Comam .
46011025	Lahwi tu' yinipaxocan̈ Comam ch'en vaso , yalni Comam : " Hune' ayayto yul vaso ti' yechel inchiq'uilan chimaltoj , ha' xin chit'in̈bancano hune' ac' trato chak' Comam Dios . Hunta el yet cheyuc'ni hune' ti' chinhenatijan , " ẍi Comam .
46011026	Yuxin yet chicowahni ixim pan tu' , yeb yet chijuc'ni tzet ayayto yul hune' vaso tu' , ha' iscamical Comam Jesucristo chicoyeloj masanto yet chul Comam hunelxa .
46011027	Yuxin ta ay hunu mac matzet chal yelapno ixim pan tu' yul sat yet chiswahni , yeb yet chuc'ni tzet ayayto yul vaso tu' , chaco ismul yin̈ isnimanil Comam Jesucristo , yeb yin̈ ischiq'uil Comam .
46011028	Yuxin hayet yalan̈to maẍto chewah hune' pan tu' yeb heyuc'ni tzet ayayto yul hune' vaso tu' , caw yilal hetxumni yin̈ tzet heyeco hununex .
46011029	Yuto ta chewah hune' pan tu' yeb ta cheyuc' hune' ayayto yul vaso tu' , machi xin c'ulo heyecoj , yeb xin mach chena ta haca' isnimanil Comam yehi , yin̈ hac tu' chiay isya'tajil teyiban̈ yu Comam Dios .
46011030	Yu hune' tu' , yuxin ay mac ya'ay texol , aypaxo mac tz'ontan̈e , yebpaxo xin ay mac xacami .
46011031	Wal xin ta chicotxum coba yin̈ tzet jeco hununon̈ , machim chiay isya'tajil jiban̈ yu Comam Dios .
46011032	Yaja' ta mach chicotxum yin̈ tzet jeco yul sat Comam , chayo Comam isya'tajil jiban̈ , yaja' yun̈e mach chon̈to yin̈ isya'tajil xol huntek'an anma c'aynatoj .
46011033	Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , yet checutxban heba hechahni santa cena tu' , yilal cheyechmale heba hewahni .
46011034	Yaja' ta ay hunu mac caw xan̈ohchahi chisje iswa'cano bey yatut , haxinwal mach chayo Comam isya'tajil teyiban̈ yin̈ huntek'an tzet mach toholo chewatx'e tu' . Wal yin̈ huntek'anxa xin , yetto chinapnihan texol cat quexinwatx'enicojan yin̈ .
46012001	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwochehan cheyohtan̈elo yin̈ huntek'an comunil chiak'lax jet hununon̈ yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
46012002	Caw heyohtaj ta yet maẍto chexoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , caw tzujanexto yinta huntek'an tioẍ mach chitzoteli .
46012003	Wal tinan̈ xin , chiwak'an heyohtan̈eloj tato ha' mac chalni haca' ti' : " Yak'abti ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈ naj Jes'us , " ta ẍi . Ha' mac chalni haca' tu' , maẍtaj Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni yala' . Yaja' wal mac chalni haca' ti' xin : " Comam Jes'us ha' wahawilan , " ta ẍi . Hune' mac tu' ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni yala' .
46012004	Han̈on̈ ti' nananta comunil hununon̈ yin̈ Comam , yaja' hune' mac chiak'ni jet , ha' ton Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
46012005	Caw nananta comunil hununon̈ , yaja' hune'n̈e mac bay chon̈munla cosunil , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo .
46012006	Nananta tzet chicowatx'e hununon̈ , yaja' hune'n̈e Comam Dios chiak'ni huntek'an tu' jub .
46012007	Chisyelo Comam Esp'iritu Santo tato ayco yul janma hununon̈ chak'ni Comam isc'ulal jet , yu isc'ulalo yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab .
46012008	Yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo yuxin ay ebnaj juẍta caw ay ishelanil istzoteli , aypaxo mac caw ay isnabal iscuywahi , yaja' yutic'apaxo Comam Esp'iritu .
46012009	Yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo tu' , yuxinto ay ebnaj caw chicawxi isc'ul yin̈ Comam Dios , aypaxo ebnaj chiak'lax yip yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo yak'ni cawxo macta ya'ay .
46012010	Ay ebnaj chiak'lax yip isyeni c'aybalc'ule , aypaxo ebnaj chiak'lax ishelanil yalnic'o tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios . Aypaxo ebnaj xin chiak'lax ishelanil yohtan̈eniloj tato ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo ayco yetbiho hunu maca , maca tato yesp'iritu naj matzwalil ayco yetbihoj . Ay ebnaj chak'paxo Comam Esp'iritu Santo ishelanil yalni nan abxubal , aypaxo xin ebnaj chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo ishelanil istxumnilo huntek'an nan abxubale tu' .
46012011	Sunil huntek'an ti' ha'tic'a Comam Esp'iritu Santo chiak'ni cowatx'e' hununon̈ , hatatic'a tzet choche Comam yak'a jet . Caw xin hunch'ann̈e Comam Esp'iritu .
46012012	Haca' conimanil ti' , waxan̈ca caw tx'i'al yik'ni isba , yaja' hune'n̈e nimanilehal yehi . Hac tu' ye Comam Jesucristo .
46012013	Hactic'apax tu' je han̈on̈ ti' , waxan̈ca Israel hon̈ , maca mach Israelo hon̈ , waxan̈ca chejabon̈ , maca jet coba cochuquil , hune'n̈e Comam Esp'iritu Santo con̈hunbani , yuxin hune'xan̈e nimanilehal je yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Ha'tic'a xin Comam Esp'iritu ak'lax yul janma hununon̈ .
46012014	Haca' ye conimanil tinan̈ , caw tx'i'al yik'ni isba , yaja' hune'n̈e nimanilehal .
46012015	K'inalo ta chu istzotel joj cat yalni : " Haninti'an mank'abehojan , yuxin machi wocan yin̈ hune' nimanile ti' , " ta ẍi . Waxan̈ca chal haca' tu' , yaja' yetbin̈etic'a isba yeb conimanil ti' .
46012016	Maca ta chal cotxiquin haca' ti' : " Wal haninti'an manbak'satehojan , yuxin mach chiwocan yin̈ hune' nimanile ti' , " ta ẍi . Waxan̈ca chal haca' tu' , yaj caw yetbin̈etic'a isba yeb hune' conimanil ti' .
46012017	Ta bak'sate sunil conimanil ti' , machim chu jabeni , yeb tato sunil conimanil ti' txiquinn̈e , machim chu coxuk'xen sam hunu tzet ye tu' .
46012018	Wal xin ha' Comam Dios watx'en̈e hunun yetbi conimanil ti' , yanico Comam bay chal isc'ul .
46012019	K'inaloj tato lahanxan̈etic'a hunun yetbi conimanil matxam chu jalni baytet conimanil , chal tu' .
46012020	Yin̈ caw isyelal , waxan̈ca tx'i'al yik'ni isba , yaja' hune'n̈e nimanilehal yehi .
46012021	Isbak' cosat mach chu yalni tet cok'ab haca' ti' : " Matzet chachocnico wuhan , " mach ẍioj . Hacpax tu' cowi' , mach chu yalni tet joj : " Matzet chachocnico wuhan , " mach ẍioj .
46012022	Ay huntek'an yetbi conimanil ti' cochn̈e caw machi ismunil chijabe , yaja' ha' caw ec'na ch'ocnico ju .
46012023	Aypaxo yetbi conimanil ti' , cochan matzet chal yelapnoj , yaja' ha' ec'bal chicoya'iln̈e . Haxa huntek'an yetbi conimanil mach c'ulch'ano jalni , ha' chijebatoj , hac tu' xin chu coyeniloj tato caw ay yelapno yehi .
46012024	Wal huntek'an yetbi conimanil c'ulch'an yillaxi mach yilalo chijaco yen̈el . Hac tu' yu iswatx'encano Comam Dios conimanil ti' , yun̈e ha' huntek'an yetbi conimanil machi yelapno tu' , ha' caw ay yelapnoj .
46012025	Yuxinto mach chu iscajlencan̈ isba ej yetbi conimanil , hayet to lahann̈e chisya'iln̈en isba hunun .
46012026	Ta ay hunu yetbi conimanil ti' chilahwi , sunil conimanil chiaben isya'il . Taca ay hunu yetbi conimanil chitzantelaxi , sunil conimanil chitzalahi .
46012027	Yuxin haca' isnimanil Comam Jesucristo je cosunil , hununon̈ ti' xin yetbixa isnimanil Comam tu' jehi .
46012028	Yuxin coxol han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam , ay comunil chak' Comam : babel ay mac ischejab Comam Dios yehi , iscab ay mac chalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , yin̈ yox ay mac cuywawom , aypaxo mac chak' Comam Dios ishelanil isyeni ej c'aybalc'ule , aypaxo mac chiak'lax ishelanil yak'ni cawxo macta ya'ay , aypaxo mac chiak'lax ishelanil iscolwahi , aypaxo mac chi'ijbali , yeb xin ay mac chu yalni nan abxubal .
46012029	Yuxin mach sunilo mac ischejab Comam , mach sunilopaxo mac chihalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , mach sunilopaxo mac chicuywahi , yeb mach sunilo mac chu isyeni ej c'aybalc'ule .
46012030	Mach sunilopaxo mac chiak'lax ishelanil yak'ni cawxo anma ya'ay , mach sunilo mac chihalni nan abxubal , yeb xin mach sunilo mac chitxumnilo yin̈ tzet chal yelapno nan abxubal tu' .
46012031	Yuxin hex ti' , aweco yin̈ hec'ul hesayni huntek'an munil ec'balcano isc'ulal chak' Comam texol . Yaja' ayto hune'xa tzet caw ec'bal c'ul cowatx'eni , ha' bay chintzotelan yiban̈ilo teyet .
46013001	Waxan̈ca caw helanon̈ jalni yabxubal anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , maca yabxubal ebnaj 'angel , yaja' ta mach xahano chijil jet anmahil , lahanon̈n̈e haca' hunu ch'en campana ton̈e chik'an̈i , yeb ch'en ch'en pak'an yehi ton̈e chitz'in̈xi .
46013002	Waxan̈ca chijal tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , waxan̈ca xin chicotxum huntek'an tzet ye tu' ewan ye yu Comam , waxan̈ca johta sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb waxan̈ca chu cohec'nilo hunu witz yul yehobal yu ayco janma yin̈ Comam , yaja' ta mach xahano chijil jet anmahil , yin̈ haca' tu' machi yelapno jehi .
46013003	Waxan̈ca xin chijitxk'ato tzet ayon̈ yin̈ anma meba' , waxan̈ca xin chijak' tz'ajoto conimanil xol k'a k'a' , yaja' ta mach xahano chijil jet anmahil , nabn̈e hune' tu' .
46013004	Wal xin ta yeli xahan chijil jet anmahil , ay conimanc'ulal yin̈ , chicoyelo isc'ulch'anil coc'ul tet , yeb mach chichiwa coc'ul yin̈ , yeb mach chicololo'n̈e coba , yeb mach chijican̈ coba .
46013005	Machi xin chijilo istx'ixobal hunu jet anmahil , machn̈etaj jet chijaco yin̈ coc'ul , mach chitit cohowal , wal xin chiconahuln̈eto istx'ojal chiswatx'e jin̈ .
46013006	Mach chon̈tzala yin̈ istx'ojal chiswatx'e hunu jet anmahil , walxinto ha' yin̈ isc'ulal chiswatx'e yin̈ chon̈tzalahi .
46013007	Yet xahan chijil jet anmahil tu' chijak' janma istecha sunil tzet chiswatx'e jin̈ , chicawxi coc'ul yin̈ tzet chala , ay conimanc'ulal jechmani , niman chijute coc'ul yin̈ .
46013008	Ha' hune' coxahann̈en coba tu' mach bak'inal chitan̈i , wal jalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios chiapni istiempohal bay matxa chihallaxi . Chiapnipaxo istiempohal bay matxa chihallaxpaxo nan abxubal , yeb matxa yilalo ay cohelanil .
46013009	Yuto cohelanil yeb jalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios maẍto tz'ajanoj ,
46013010	yuxin huntek'an tu' chilahwi ismunil yet chihul huntek'an tz'ajan yehi .
46013011	Yet nich'an intohan haca' istzotel niẍte unin , hac tu' intzotelan . Haca' istxumnipaxo niẍte unin , hac tu' intxumnipaxojan , haca'paxo isnabal niẍte unin , hac tu' innabalan . Wal tinan̈ xin icham anma inxahan , xawacanojan tzet ye tu' yet niẍte unin .
46013012	Tinan̈ maẍto chon̈k'oji cotxumnilo tzet ye tu' haca' caw yehi . Wal xin haca'tan̈e jilni cosat yul hunu ch'en espejo k'ejmutz'mun̈e , hac tu' je tinan̈ . Yaja' chiapni istz'ayical bay chijil yin̈ caw haban , haca' con̈yohtan̈en Comam Dios .
46013013	Ay oxeb tzet ye tu' ti' mach chitan̈iloj , ha' ton janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios , yeb iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ Comam , yebpaxo coxahann̈en jet anmahil . Yaja' hune' caw ec'bal yelapnoj xol oxeb ti' , ha' ton coxahann̈en jet anmahil .
46014001	Machojab chebej hexahann̈en heyet anmahil , cat xin heyak'ni heyanma hesayni huntek'an munil chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyet . Yaja' ha' hune' caw c'ul , ha' heyalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios .
46014002	Ha' mac chitzotel yin̈ nan abxubal , ha' tet Comam Dios chitzoteli , maẍtaj tet anma , yu machi mac chitxumni yin̈ tzet chala . Yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo yuxin chal tzoti' machi mac ohtan̈e .
46014003	Wal mac chalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios xin , chich'ib ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yin̈ yet Comam yu , cat yiptzelax yu , cat yak'nipaxo yak'lobal yanma .
46014004	Ha' mac chitzotel yin̈ nan abxubal , han̈c'an̈e hune' mac tu' chich'ib yin̈ yet Comam , yaja' wal mac chihalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , chak' ch'ibo mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam chiaben tzet chala .
46014005	Wochebalan tato hesunil cheyal nan abxubal , yaja' ha' hune' ec'bal chiwochehan to cheyalic'o tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios . Yuto ec'bal c'ul jalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios sata jalni hunuxa nan abxubal , cachann̈e ta ay mac chalnilo tzet chal yelapno hune' nan abxubale tu' , ta hac tu' xin chich'ib macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yu .
46014006	Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , k'inalo tato chinapnihan quexwila'an cat intzotelan yin̈ nan abxubal teyet , machmi tzet cheyik' yin̈ . Yaja' ta hunu tzet chak' Comam Dios johtan̈e , ha' chiwalan , maca helanile , maca ta chiwalan tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , maca hunuxa cuybanile ; wal tu' chitxumchalo heyu .
46014007	K'inalo hunu te' su' maca hunu te' arpa , machim chicotxum tzet sonal chi'alaxico yin̈ te' ta mach watx'ebilo yul isnuk' te' .
46014008	Yeb xin ta ay hunu howal cat yok'tzelax ch'en trompeta yu iscutxico ebnaj soldado , yaja' ta mach habano yok' ch'en , machim chiscutxbaco isba ebnaj isto yin̈ howal .
46014009	Caw xin hacon̈mi tu' , ta mach habano tzet chijala yet chon̈tzoteli , ¿ tzettaxca chu istxumlaxilo tzet chijal tu' ? Caw nabn̈em chon̈tzotel yin̈ haca' tu' .
46014010	Yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , caw tx'i'al abxubal , yaja' hunun abxubal tu' ay tzet chaliloj .
46014011	Yaja' ta mach wohtajojan yabxubal hunu mac chitzotel wetan , nan con̈obalinan yul sat hune' mac chitzotel tu' , nanpaxo con̈obal naj yul insatan .
46014012	Caw wohtajan tato hex ti' caw cheyoche huntek'an munil chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyet , yaja' ha' huntek'an ch'ak'ni ch'ibo mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ha' bay wal helahnicoj .
46014013	Yuxin tato ay mac chitzotel yin̈ nan abxubal , caw yilal isk'anni ishelanil tet Comam Dios yun̈e chu yalnilo yin̈ tzet chal yelapnoj .
46014014	Ta chintxahlihan yin̈ nan abxubal , yin̈ caw yeli han̈e wanmahan chitxahli , wal innabalan xin , mach chitxumcha yu yin̈ tzet chiwaltu'an .
46014015	Yuxin ¿ tzet wal juten coba ? Wal xin machn̈eojabtaj janma chitxahli , caw yilal cotxahlipaxo yeb conabal . Yebpaxo yet chon̈bitni , machn̈eojabtaj janma chibitni , wal xin caw yilal cobitni yeb conabal .
46014016	Ta ay hunujex cheyak' tzalaho hec'ul yin̈ Comam Dios yin̈ hunu nan abxubal , han̈e heyanma chitzalahi , wal mac chiaben tzet cheyal tu' xin , mach chu yalni : " Hacojab tu' " yuto mach chitxumcha yu tzet cheyala .
46014017	Yin̈ caw yeli lan̈an heyak'ni tzalaho heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yaja' mac chiaben tu' , mach chik' yip yanma heyu .
46014018	Haninti'an chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yuto ec'balto chiwalan nan abxubal tesataj .
46014019	Yaja' yet chicocutxban coba yin̈ culto , wochebalan waxan̈ca howebn̈e tzoti' chiwalan , yaja' tan̈e chik' anma cuybanile yin̈ , sata walnihan lahon̈eb mil tzoti' yin̈ abxubal mach chitxumcha heyu .
46014020	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , machojab haca' istxumni niẍte unin , machojab haco tu' hetxumni . Wal xin haca'ojab istxumni icham anma hacojab tu' hetxumni , yaja' wal yin̈ istx'ojal , haca'ojab istxumni niẍte unin maẍto isnabal yin̈ istx'ojal , hacojab tu' cheyute heba .
46014021	Tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : Chintzotelan tet hune' con̈ob tu' yin̈ nan abxubal , yeb anma nan con̈obal chihalni intzoti'an , yaja' maẍtic'a chabeto anma tzet chiwalan , ẍi Comam , ẍiayoj .
46014022	Yuxin huntek'an nan abxubale tu' yechel ye tet anma maẍto chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios , maẍtaj tet anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Wal tzoti' chihallax chitit tet Comam Dios xin , yechel ye tet anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam .
46014023	K'inalo checutxba heba cat heyichico hesunil tzotelo yin̈ nan abxubal , cat yoc apno hunu comon anma maca hunu mac maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam , maca hunu mac mach ohtan̈e hune' tu' , chimistxum hune' mac tu' ta matxa tz'ajano ye yul hewi' .
46014024	Wal ta hesunil lan̈an heyalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios xin , yet chioc apno hunu mac maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam , maca hunu mac mach yohtajo tzet cheyu tu' , wal tu' chimistxum isba hune' mac mulum tu' , cat isnani isba yu huntek'an tzet cheyal tu' .
46014025	Hac tu' xin chu yelcano yen̈el tzet c'uwan yul yanma hune' mac tu' , cat yay jahnoj , cat yinayo isba tet Comam Dios , hac tu' xin chu yohtan̈en hune' mac tu' ta caw yeli ayco Comam Dios heyetbioj .
46014026	Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hayet checutxban heba yin̈ culto ayex chisje hebitni , ayexpaxo xin chisje hecuywa yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios , maca heyalni tzet chak' Comam Dios heyohtan̈eloj . Ayexpaxo xin chu hetzotel yin̈ nan abxubal , ayex xin chu heyalni yin̈ tzet chal yelapno huntek'an abxubal tu' . Aweco huntek'an tu' yin̈ ismunil , yaja' yun̈e yik'ni yip heyanma yin̈ Comam .
46014027	Yet chextzotel yul nan abxubal , cawan̈ , maca oxwan̈n̈e mac chitzoteli , yaja' yin̈ hununtajil , ayojab mac xin chalnilo yin̈ tzet chal yelapno huntek'an abxubal cheyal tu' .
46014028	Taca machi mac chitxumnilo yin̈ tzet chal yelapno xin , c'ulmi ta mach cheyala , wal xin ischuquilojab heyanma chitzotel tet Comam Dios .
46014029	Hacpax tu' xin yet chihallax tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , cawan̈ maca oxwan̈n̈e mac chitzoteli , wal ebnaj juẍta xin ton̈ehojab ch'oc tucno yaben yin̈ tzet caw yehi .
46014030	Yaja' ta ay hunu tzet chak' Comam Dios yohtan̈elo hunu mac tz'on̈anayo texol tu' , hune' mac lan̈an istzotel tu' xin yilal istucban istzoteli , cat istzotel hune'xa mac tu' .
46014031	Hesunil chu heyalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , yaja' yin̈ hununtajil yun̈e ay cuybanil cheyik' yin̈ , cat yanico yip heyanma .
46014032	Ha' mac chalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , chisje iscachni isba yet ay mac lan̈an istzoteli ,
46014033	yuto mach choche Comam Dios tato toxan̈e chon̈wejchahi yet chicocutxban coba , wal xin hununtajil cotzotel yin̈ ak'anc'ulal . Haca'tic'a ye ischejbanil anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios ay yul hunun con̈ob ,
46014034	ebix janab , mach chu yoc ebix tzotelo texol yet checutxban heba yin̈ culto , yuto mach ak'bil ischejbanil ebix istzoteli . Wal xin caw yijemojab chute isba ebix haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es yu Comam Dios .
46014035	Tato ay hunu tzet ye tu' choche ebix yohtan̈eloj , isk'ambehab ebix tet yichamil bey yatut , yuto mach c'uloj tato chitzotel ebix yet cutxanexicoj .
46014036	Tajca chetxumu tato teyet babel ak'lax Istzoti' Comam Dios , yeb tato hexn̈e chabilxa heyu .
46014037	Tato ay hunu mac ischejab Comam Dios ye chabe , maca ta iptzebil yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo , yilal istxumni tato huntek'an cuybanile chintz'ibn̈etoti'an , ischejbanil Comam Dios yehi .
46014038	Yaja' tato machi yelapno huntek'an cuybanile ti' yul sat , machojabpaxo xin yelapno hune' mac tu' yul hesat .
46014039	Yuxin tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , ochewe heyala' tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , yaja' mach checach yallaxpaxo nan abxubal .
46014040	Yaja' caw haca'ojab yehi , hac tu' chewatx'e yeb xin yin̈ istxolal .
46015001	Tinan̈ xin , hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwochehan chenati Tzoti' yet colbanile halbilcano teyet wuhan , hune' chabilxa heyu bay lin̈anex tinan̈ .
46015002	Yuto yu hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile tu' , yuxin colbilexxa , yaj tato mach lin̈anojex yin̈ , chal yelapnoj tato mach heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ caw isyelal .
46015003	Ha' huntek'an cuybanile caw yilal yehi , ha' wak'an teyet , huntek'an chabilcano wuhan . Quexincuynihan tato cam Comam Jes'us yu comul , haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios .
46015004	Lahwi tu' ismujlax Comam , yaja' yin̈ yox tz'ayic yitzitzbican̈ xol camom , haca'tic'a yalni yul Yum Comam Dios .
46015005	Isyeni isba Comam tet naj Pedro , isyenipaxo isba tet ebnaj ischejab .
46015006	Lahwi tu' xin , isyenipaxo isba Comam tet ec'bal howeb ciento ebnaj juẍtaj . Tx'i'al xin ebnaj aytoc'o tinan̈ , ay xin ebnaj xacami .
46015007	Isyenipaxo isba Comam tet naj Jacobo , lahwi tu' xin isyenipaxo isba Comam tet ebnaj ischejab .
46015008	Haxa yin̈ istzujanilxa xin isyeni isba Comam wetan , yaja' haca' hunu nich'an unin pitzc'ana yalan̈to maẍto istiempohalo ispitzc'ahi , hac tu' wehan .
46015009	Yuxin caw matzet welapnojan xol ebnaj ischejab Comam chiwabehan , yuxin mach intzanojan yallax ischejab Comam Jesucristo win̈an , yuto wak' ec'ojan ya' yanma macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yet yalan̈tocanoj .
46015010	Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios , yuxin ayinicojan yin̈ hune' munil ti' , yaja' mach nabn̈eho hune' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam yak' wettu'an yuto ec'balto chinmunlahan sata ebnaj ischejab Comam . Yaja' maẍtaj yu wipan , walxinto ha' isc'ulch'anil Comam chicolwa win̈an .
46015011	Yaja' mach chiyoc yin̈ mac chihalnic'o cuybanile ti' , ta haninan maca ebnaj ischejab Comam , ha' hune' caw yilal to ha' jalnic'ojan̈ cuybanile tu' , hune' chabilxa yul heyanma .
46015012	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ quexcocuyan̈ yin̈ yet yitzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo , yaja' ¿ tzet yin̈ xin ayex cheyala tato mach chiitzitzbican̈ camom ?
46015013	Ta mach chiitzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa , machim itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo .
46015014	Ta mach itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo machim tzet chal yelapno cuybanile jak'an̈ teyet , naban̈em chijaco janma yin̈ Comam .
46015015	Ta hac tu' lek'ti'on̈mi yin̈ Comam Dios , yuto chijala tato ha' Comam Dios ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jesucristo . Machim yak' itzitzbocan̈ Comam Dios Comam Jesucristo tato yeli mach chiitzitzbican̈ camom .
46015016	Tato yeli mach chiitzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa , machmi itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo .
46015017	Ta mach itzitzbican̈ Comam tu' xol camom , nabn̈em chijaco janma yin̈ Comam Dios , ayon̈tomico yin̈ comul .
46015018	Hacmipax tu' ebnaj chabilxa Comam Jesucristo yu yet iscami , c'aynamicanto ebnaj yin̈ huneln̈e .
46015019	Ta iscawxobal coc'ul yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yuln̈e sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi , maẍtic'am nich'ano isc'ulal jet yin̈ haca' tu' .
46015020	Wal xin , yin̈ caw yeli itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom , haca' babel sat tz'unub chak'a , hac tu' yu isbabi yitzitzbican̈ cosataj .
46015021	Yu hune' naj , yuxin hul camical yiban̈ anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yaja' yu hune'xa naj xin , yuxin chiitzitzbican̈ anma yin̈ camical .
46015022	Haca'tic'a chu iscamto anma yu ismul naj Ad'an , hactic'apax tu' chu yulcan̈ isc'ul anma yu Comam Jesucristo .
46015023	Yuxin yin̈ istxolal aycoj , ha' Comam Jesucristo ha' babel itzitzbican̈ , haxa yet chul Comam yet iscayel cat yitzitzbican̈ macta yetxa Comam .
46015024	Lahwi tu' xin , cat yul islahobal tz'ayic bay chik'oji Comam yin̈ ebnaj can̈yehi yeb ebnaj ayco yahawilo con̈ob , yeb ischejab naj matzwalil chiec' xol jak'ek' yeb yul yiban̈k'inal ti' , catto yanico Comam sunil tzet ay yul isk'ab tet Comam Dios Mame .
46015025	Yaja' yet maẍto chaco Comam Jesucristo sunil ti' yul isk'ab Comam Dios ch'oc Comam Yahawiloj masanto yet chioc sunil mac ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam yalan̈ yoj .
