46015026	Haxa hune' islahobal bay chik'oji Comam xin , ha' ton yin̈ naj camical ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam .
46015027	Tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj tato sunil tzet ye tu' chacto Comam Dios yalan̈ yoj Comam Jesucristo , yaja' wal Comam Dios mach chiocto yalan̈ yoj Comam Jesucristo , yuto ha' Comam Dios chianico sunil yalan̈ yoj Comam Cristo .
46015028	Yet chioccanto sunil yalan̈ yip Comam Jesucristo tu' xin , ha' caw Comam tu' chacto isba yalan̈ ischejbanil Ismam an̈eco sunil tzet ye tu' yul isk'ab , hac tu' xin haxan̈e Comam Dios Yahaw chucanico yin̈ sunil tzet ye tu' .
46015029	Yebpaxo hunxa , haca' anma chiah ha' iswi' selelo anma camnaxa , yaja' ta mach chulcan̈ isc'ul camom , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin chiah ha' iswi' anma selelo anma camnaxa tu' ?
46015030	Ta machi itzitzbican̈ camom , ¿ tzet yin̈ xin chijak' janmahan̈ han̈on̈ ischejab Comam Dios on̈ti'an̈ jijlenan̈ isya'tajil chul jiban̈an̈ hunun tz'ayic ?
46015031	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , haninti'an caw hunun tz'ayic inhinni inbahan incaman . Hune' ti' caw yeli haca' hune' tzalahilal chiwabehan teyin̈ , yuto ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo .
46015032	Haninti'an caw ec'ya' wanmahan bey Efeso haca'tan̈e wak'lenan howal yeb ej no' howla nok' . ¿ Tzet xin chiwik'an yin̈ hune' tu' tato mach chiitzitzbican̈ camom ? Ta hac tu' , ha'mi ye yu anma chihalni haca' ti' : " ¡ Wa'ojon̈we yin̈ caw c'ul , jak'awe tzet choche janma , yuto camomon̈xataxca yet hecal ! " ẍi .
46015033	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , mach cheyak' subchaho heba , cajxam yallaxi : " Ta chijetbin̈e coba yeb anma tx'oj isbeybal , niẍtejaln̈e cocuynito cowatx'en istx'ojal tu' , " ẍi .
46015034	Nachaojabilo heyu yin̈ istx'ojal bay ayexicoj yeb matxa cheyaco hemul , yuto ayex maẍto heyohtajo Comam Dios . Chiwalan hune' ti' yun̈e hetx'ixwican̈ .
46015035	Aymi mac chik'amben haca' ti' : " ¿ Tzettaxca chu yitzitzbican̈ anma camnaxa ? yeb ¿ tzettaxca jilni isnimanil yet chiitzitzbican̈ ? " ẍi .
46015036	Ha' mac chalni haca' tu' caw suc . K'inalo ta chicotz'un hunu ixim hin̈at , caw yilal isk'ato hune' hin̈at tu' , haca'tan̈e chicam chijila , haxa yanma ixim xin chiahiloj .
46015037	Maẍtaj awalxa yehi chicotz'unni , walxinto ha' ixim hin̈at tu' chicotz'unu , maca ixim hin̈at trigo maca hunuxa nan hin̈atil .
46015038	Haxa Comam Dios xin chiak'ni aholo ixim hin̈at tu' haca' choche isc'ul , hatatic'a tzet hin̈atil chicotz'unu ha' xin chiahiloj .
46015039	Yuxin mach sunilo nimanile lahan , wal xin nantic'a isnimanil anma , nanpaxo isnimanil no nok' can̈eb yoj , nanpaxo isnimanil no' ch'ic , nanpaxo isnimanil no' cay .
46015040	Hacpax tu' xin , ay nimanile yet satcan̈ yehi , aypaxo nimanilehal yet sat tx'otx'al ti' . Yaja' xin nananta jilni isc'ulch'anil isnimanil tzettaj ye tu' ay satcan̈ , yeb xin nan jilni isc'ulch'anil isnimanil tzettaj ye tu' ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' .
46015041	Hacpax tu' tz'ayic , mach lahano isk'ak'al yeb ixahaw , mach lahanpaxo yeb tx'umel , hacpax tu' ej tx'umel mach lahano isk'ak'al hunun .
46015042	Hac tu' chu yitzitzbican̈ anma camom . Hune' nimanile chimujlaxi chietaxtoj , yaja' nanxa nimanile chu ispitzc'acan̈ , matxa xin chietaxtoj .
46015043	Chimujlax hune' nimanile ayco istx'ojal yin̈ , wal yet chiitzitzbican̈ xin , c'ulch'anxa jilni . Chimujlax hune' nimanile machi yip , haxa yet chiitzitzbican̈ caw ayxa yip .
46015044	Chimujlax hune' nimanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , haxa yet chiitzitzbican̈ xin , yetxa esp'iritu yehi . Ay nimanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , aypaxo nimanile yet esp'iritu .
46015045	Chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Ha' naj Ad'an , naj babel winaj , anma yu iswatx'elax naj , ak'bil isk'inal naj , " ẍiayoj . Haxa naj iscab Ad'an , yet satcan̈ ye naj , ha' naj chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal .
46015046	Wal xin babel hul tzet ye tu' yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , tzujan tu' xin , yul tzet ye tu' yet esp'iritu .
46015047	Naj babel winaj , yin̈ tx'o tx'otx' watx'elax naj , yuxin yet tx'o tx'otx' ye naj . Wal naj iscab Ad'an yet satcan̈ ye naj .
46015048	Ha' nimanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , lahan haca' isnimanil naj watx'ebil yin̈ tx'o tx'otx' , wal nimanile yet satcan̈ xin , lahan haca' isnimanil naj tit yul satcan̈ .
46015049	Yulbal yet ayon̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , lahan conimanil yeb naj babel winaj watx'ebil yin̈ tx'o tx'otx' , wal yet bak'in xin , lahan chielico conimanil haca' naj yet satcan̈il yehi .
46015050	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwalan teyet tato hune' conimanil ti' , mach chu yapni isc'atan̈ Comam Dios , yuto chibe yeb baj ; huntek'an chietaxto ti' , mach chu yapni bay mach chietaxto tzet ye tu' .
46015051	Chiwochehan cheyohtan̈elo hune' tzet ye tu' ewan yehi : Mach cosunilo chon̈cami , yaja' xin cosunil chihellax conimanil ,
46015052	yuto yin̈ caw lembil , haca'n̈e ismutz'la cosat , yet chiok' ch'en islahobal trompeta cat yitzitzbican̈ macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam xacami , matxa xin bak'inal chicami . Walon̈ itzitzon̈ ti' yet chiyuni hune' tu' chihellax conimanil .
46015053	Yuto hune' conimanil chietaxto ti' , chihellax yin̈ hune' nimanile mach chietaxtoj . Hune' conimanil chicamto ti' chihellaxi , ha' hune' satcan̈il chi'ak'lax seleloj hune' matxa bak'in chitan̈iloj .
46015054	Hune' conimanil chietaxto ti' chiheli cat yoc yin̈ hune' nimanile machi etaxtoj . Chihellax conimanil chicamto ti' yin̈ hune' nimanile mach chicami . Hac tu' chu yijni isba tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : Chic'aytzelaxilo naj camical , ay hune' mac chik'oji yin̈ naj yin̈ huneln̈e .
46015055	Yuxin hach camical ¿ baytu'wal ay hahelanil ? ¿ Baytu'wal ay hawip hapotx'wahi ? ẍiayoj .
46015056	Ha' mule chon̈yak' camoj , wal isley Comam Dios xin ip yanico isya'tajil jiban̈ .
46015057	¡ Yaja' yuch'andios tet Comam Dios , yuto xacon̈k'oji yin̈ naj camical , yaj yu Comam Jesucristo !
46015058	Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuhan , lin̈bawe heba , mach chexpax teyintaj . Hunun tz'ayicojab hex yin̈ yet Comam , munlahan̈we yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios sunilbal tiempo , yuto johtaj tato mach nabn̈eho chon̈munla yin̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
46016001	Wal ch'en heyofrenda chicutxi texol , ch'en chialaxto tet mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , checutxbawe ch'en haca' yu walnihan tet ebnaj juẍta ay yul ismajul Galacia .
46016002	Hunun domingo yin̈ semana , yilal hepohnilo hanic'o ch'en melyu cheyik' yin̈ hemunil hununex , hatatic'a hanta chicolwa Comam teyin̈ , cat hec'ubantoj , haxinwal yet chinapnihan matxa yilalo ch'ah ch'en texol .
46016003	Hato yet chinapnihan texol cat wanitojan mac saybilxa heyu , cat yinito ebnaj hunu carta yeb ch'en hecolwal tu' tet ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey Jerusal'en .
46016004	Yaja' ta han-caw-inan chintohan xin , yilaltic'a chitopaxo ebnaj wintajan .
46016005	Hayet chintohan yin̈ inbeltu'an yilal wec'an bey Macedonia , lahwi tu' xin cat wapnihan quexwilnojan bey Corinto tu' .
46016006	Etzan̈em chincanan hanic'o tiempohal tec'atan̈ , maca xin ha' bey tu' ayinic'ojan chiec' n̈abil ; ta hac tu' hexxa chexcolwa win̈an yin̈ inbelan yet chinelan texol .
46016007	Mach chiwochehan tato yin̈ an̈e chinec'an quexwila'an , wal xin chiwochehan chincanan hanic'o tiempohal texol , ta hac tu' chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios .
46016008	Yaja' xin yilalto incanan bey Efeso ti' masanto yet chiec' k'in̈ pentecost'es .
46016009	Yuto caw chalte isba munil yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios chiwilan , yuxin chincanan waxan̈ca xin caw ay mac ayco ishowal win̈an .
46016010	Ta chiapni naj Timoteo tec'atan̈ xahan cheyil naj , haxinwal chitzala isc'ul naj texol , yuto chimunlapaxo naj yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios haca' inti'an .
46016011	Tajca mach chicam hec'ul yin̈ naj , wal xin colwahan̈we yin̈ naj haxinwal chislah naj isbel yin̈ tzalahilal cat yul naj coc'atan̈an̈ , yuto chijechmahan̈ naj yeb ebnaj juẍtaj .
46016012	Wal naj juẍta Apolos , walan tet naj tato chito naj yinta ebnaj to quexilnoj , yaja' machisjeto naj . Yettojab hunelxa chito naj yet ay ishamanil naj .
46016013	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , caw majwahan̈wej , lin̈bawe heba yin̈ hune' bay ayxaco heyanma , caw mach chexxiwi , ak'we yip heyanma .
46016014	Sunilojab tzet chewatx'e , ayojab isc'ulch'anil hec'ul yin̈ .
46016015	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw heyohtaj tato naj juẍta Est'efanas yeb yuninal ha' babel yaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios bey yul ismajul Acaya tu' . Caw xin huneln̈e yeco yanma naj iscolwa yin̈ mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam .
46016016	Chiwochehan ta cheyije tet naj Est'efanas yeb yuninal tu' , yeb tet sunil macta chicolwahi yeb chimunla yin̈ ismunil Comam .
46016017	Caw chintzalahan yuto hul naj Est'efanas yeb naj Fortunato yebpaxo naj Acaico bey ti' , yuto yet chiwilnihan yin̈ ebnaj haca'ojtam hex chiwilicojan teyin̈ .
46016018	Yin̈ caw yeli ebnaj ti' yak' tzalaho ebnaj inc'ulan , haca' yu yak'ni tzalaho ebnaj hec'ul . Ebnaj juẍta haca' ebnaj ti' , ayojab yelapno ebnaj yul hesat .
46016019	Ebnaj juẍta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul hunu con̈ob yul ismajul Asia ti' , chalto ebnaj ta cheyil heba . Hacpax tu' naj juẍta Aquila yeb ix janab Priscila yeb ebnaj juẍta chiscutxba isba yul yatut naj , chalpaxtoj ta cheyil heba .
46016020	Hacpax tu' ebnaj juẍta ay bey ti' chalpaxto ebnaj ta cheyil heba . Yeb xin k'ambewepaxo teyet yin̈ tzalahilal hanic' heye hununex .
46016021	Hanin Pablo inti'an han-caw-inan chintz'ibn̈ehan yul carta ti' ta cheyil heba .
46016022	Ta ay hunu mac mach chiochen Comam Jesucristo , tijab isya'tajil yiban̈ . Yin̈ sunil wanmahan chiwalnihan tet Comam : ¡ Mam Jesucristo Jahawilan̈ , hulan̈ ! quinchiyan .
46016023	Yak'abayo Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ .
46016024	Caw chitzala wanmahan teyin̈ hesunil , hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
47001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan , yuto hac tu' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios . Haninan yeb naj juẍta Timoteo chicotz'ibn̈etojan̈ hune' carta ti' teyet , hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios yul con̈ob Corinto , yeb tet macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul ismajul Acaya .
47001002	Yak'abayo Comam Dios Mame yeb xin Comam Jesucristo Jahawil isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ , yeb xin ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma .
47001003	Jala'we tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam Dios , Ismam Comam Jesucristo , Comam Dios chitz'ay isc'ul jin̈ yeb chiak'ni yak'lobal janma .
47001004	Haca'ojab yak'ni Comam yak'lobal janma yin̈ ej isya'tajil chul jiban̈ , hacojab tu' chu jak'ni yak'lobal yanma macta chiak'len isya'tajil yu isc'ulch'anil Comam yak' jet .
47001005	Yuto haca'tic'a chu islahnico jak'len nimeta isya'tajil yin̈ Comam Cristo , hactic'apax tu' chu islahnico Comam yak'ni yak'lobal janma .
47001006	Ta chiec'ya' janmahan̈ yaj yu hechahnipaxo yak'lobal heyanma yeb yun̈e hecolchahi . Ta chak' Comam Dios yak'lobal janmahan̈ yun̈e hechahnipaxo yak'lobal heyanma hex ti' , hac tu' xin ay heyip heyak'ni techaho isya'tajil chul teyiban̈ haca' huntek'an isya'tajil chijak'leti'an̈ .
47001007	Chicawxi coc'ulan̈ yin̈ Comam Dios yuto chicolwa teyin̈ heyak'ni techaho isya'tajil ayayo teyiban̈ , yuto johtajan̈ tato lan̈an heyak'len isya'tajil haca' jak'lehan̈ , hac tu' chu hechahnipaxo yak'lobal heyanma chitit tet Comam Dios .
47001008	Wuẍtaj , wanab , chijak'an̈ heyohtan̈eloj hanta isya'tajil jak'lehan̈ yul ismajul Asia . Ha' jalnihan̈ mach chitecha huntek'an isya'tajil tu' juhan̈ , yuxin matxam chon̈colchahan̈ jalnihan̈ .
47001009	Ha' jalnihan̈ to ha' bey tu' caw con̈caman̈ . Ha' huntek'an isya'tajil tu' ha' ak'ni cotxumu'an̈ tato mach chu iscawxi coc'ulan̈ jin̈an̈ , walxinto caw yin̈n̈e Comam Dios bay wal iscawxi coc'ul , Comam chiak'ni itzitzbocan̈ anma camom .
47001010	Wal xin ha' Comam con̈colnihan̈ yul isk'ab camical bay etza con̈caman̈ , chi-xin-cawxi coc'ulan̈ yin̈ Comam ta chicolwapaxo jin̈an̈ yin̈ isya'tajil chul cosatati'an̈ .
47001011	Ta chexcolwa hetxahli jin̈an̈ , yeb xin ta tx'i'al mac chitxahlipaxo jin̈an̈ , tx'i'altic'apaxo mac chiak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam yin̈ isc'ulal chiyak' Comam jet .
47001012	Ay hune' tzet chiak'ni tzalaho coc'ulan̈ yuto janmahan̈ chalni tato c'ul cobeybalan̈ yin̈ sat sunil anma . Hacpax tu' yet jec'an̈ texol c'ul cobeybalan̈ , yaja' maẍtaj yu istz'ajanil coc'ulan̈ yuxinto c'ul chijute cobahan̈ , machoj , walxinto ha' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios chicolwa jin̈an̈ .
47001013	Yet chicotz'ibn̈entojan̈ cocartahan̈ teyet , han̈ech'an huntek'an chisje heyilni yeb huntek'an haban hetxumni , ha' chijayojan̈ .
47001014	Ha' huntek'an lan̈an yichi hetxumni tu' wochebalan ta chetxumilo yin̈ caw c'ul , haxinwal yet chul Comam Jesucristo chextzala jin̈an̈ , cat cotzalapaxojan̈ teyin̈ .
47001015	Ha' huntek'an tu' ayco iscawxobalo inc'ulan , yuxin oc yin̈ innabalan tato babel chinec'an quexwila'an , haxinwal cayel chexwilan yin̈ inbelan yu hechahni isc'ulal Comam Dios .
47001016	Yuto yet chintohan yul ismajul Macedonia walnihan cat xin wec'an quexwilnojan babel , haxa yet chinmeltzohan xin cat wec'paxojan quexwilnojan hunelxa , hexxa xin chexcolwa win̈an yet chintohan bey tx'otx' Judea walnihan .
47001017	Yet intxumnihan hune' ti' , ¿ tom mach sunilo wanmahan walnihan heyalni ? Tajca chetxumu ta chinetlihan teyin̈ haca' chute comon anma , yuto ta chiwalan ta chintohan quexwila'an , tzujan tu' xin mach chintopaxcan̈an , wal xin mach haco tu' intxumnihan .
47001018	Caw chil Comam Dios tato maẍto hunelo chiwalan teyet haca' ti' : " Ho' , c'ultic'a , " quinchiyan , lan̈antotic'a xin cat walnihan " machoj . "
47001019	Comam Jesucristo , Isc'ahol Comam Dios ha' walic'ojan texol , yeb naj juẍta Silvano , yeb naj juẍta Timoteo . Ha' Comam tu' machi bay yal Comam " c'ultic'a , " tzujan tu' yalnipaxo Comam " machoj , " yuto ha' Comam Cristo han̈c'an̈e isyelal ec' Comam yala'c'oj .
47001020	Wal xin ha' yin̈ Comam Jesucristo chijcano isba sunil tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios , yuxin yet chijanico ismay Comam Dios chijalni : " hacojab tu' " con̈chi .
47001021	Ha' xin Comam Dios con̈sic'nicaniloj , con̈yanico yin̈ ist'in̈anil , jetbin̈encano coba yeb Comam Jesucristo .
47001022	Ha' Comam Dios anico Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul janma , ha' xin chiyeniloj tato yeton̈xa Comam . Comam Esp'iritu Santo lahan haca' hunu sello , ha' chiyeniloj ta chicochah sunil huntek'an tzet xayalte Comam jet .
47001023	Caw yohta Comam Dios tato maẍto chintocojan bey Corinto tu' tec'atan̈ haca' nabil wuhan , yun̈e machi wak' tacojan hec'ul .
47001024	Matolo yu yahaw chiwute inbahan yin̈ tzet chu heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , machoj , yuto xaheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam yuxin lin̈anex yin̈ Comam . Walxinto chijochehan̈ chon̈colwahan̈ teyin̈ , cat hechahni yak'bil tzalahilal yul heyanma .
47002001	Yuxin xaintxumilojan tato mach chintohan ilwal teyin̈ hunelxa , yun̈e machi cam chiwacojan bisc'ulal texol hununex .
47002002	Yuto ta chintohan wak'a'cojan bisc'ulal teyin̈ , ¿ mactaxca xin chu yak'ni tzalaho wanmahan ? Wal xin mach chisje inc'ulan wak'acojan bisc'ulal texol , yuto caw hex cheyak' tzalahilal yul wanmahan .
47002003	Yuxin watojan incartahan teyet yun̈e mach cheyak' bisc'ulal wabe'an yet chinapnihan bay ayex tu' . Ha' heyet to tzalahilal cheyak' wabe'an . Wal xin t'in̈anxa wehan ta hesunil chextzalapaxoj , haca' hune' tzalahilal ayco yin̈ wanmati'an .
47002004	Hayet wanitojan hune' incartatu'an teyet , caw wik' bisc'ulalan , caw quinok'an heyu , yaj maẍtaj yu yoc bisc'ulal teyin̈ yuxin intz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta tu' , walxinto yun̈e heyilni tato xahan ayex wuhan .
47002005	Ay hune' mac anico bisc'ulal , yaja' maẍn̈etajinan wabehan hune' bisc'ulal tu' , to hex heyabepaxo nich'an . " Nich'an " quinchiyan yuto mach chisje inc'ulan tato chich'ib isya'tajil naj tu' yiban̈ .
47002006	Ha' texol tu' etza hesunil heyaco isya'tajil yiban̈ naj , yaja' c'uxanxa isya'tajil heyaco yiban̈ naj tu' .
47002007	Haxa tinan̈ xin , ak'we nimanc'ulal yin̈ naj , iptzewe naj haxinwal matxa chislahico bisc'ulal yin̈ naj .
47002008	Yuxin chiwalpaxtojan teyet ta chexahann̈e naj haca'tic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj .
47002009	Yu hune' tu' , yuxin intz'ibn̈etojan hune' incartatu'an teyet yun̈e wilnihan ta yijemex yin̈ tzet chiwalan teyet .
47002010	Ha' mac cheyak' nimanc'ulal yin̈ yu hunu istx'ojal chiswatx'e , chiwak'paxo nimanc'ulalan yin̈ , waxan̈ca mach wetojan yaco ismul , yaja' heyu yuxin chiwak'an nimanc'ulal , yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ sata Comam Jesucristo .
47002011	Hac tu' chijute haxinwal mach chik'oji naj matzwalil jin̈ , yuto johtaxa tzet chu yoc naj etlo jin̈ .
47002012	Hayet wapnihan bey con̈ob Troas yu walnic'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , caw yak' isba munil wetan yin̈ yet Comam .
47002013	Yaj oc hanic' bisc'ulal yin̈ wanmahan , yuto machi ilcha juẍta Tito wuhan bey tu' , yuxin quintak'licanojan tet ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey tu' , intohan yul ismajul Macedonia .
47002014	Jak'a' yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yuto yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin sunilbal tiempo chon̈k'oji . Han̈on̈ xin chon̈isk'an Comam yu jak'ni ohtan̈elaxo Istzoti' tet anma . Ha' hune' Tzoti' tu' caw sunil bay chipujnatoj , haca' yec' isxuk'al sam hunu tzet ye tu' caw xuk' sam .
47002015	Han̈on̈ ti' haca' isxuk'al sam pom chiyeni isc'ulal Comam Cristo yin̈ sat Comam Dios , hac tu' jehi yet chon̈ec' jalno Istzoti' Comam tet anma chicolchahi yeb xin tet anma chic'aytoj .
47002016	Ha' mac chic'aytoj yahbeta sam hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yul sat yuto ayco yin̈ camical , walpaxo mac chicolcha xin , caw xuk' sam chabe yuto chischah isk'inal tet Comam . ¿ Mactaxca xin chik'oji iswatx'en hune' munil ti' ?
47002017	Yuto han̈on̈ti'an̈ maẍtaj yu jik'nihan̈ melyu yuxin chon̈ec'an̈ jala'c'ojan̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios haca' chute huntek'anxa ebnaj soman ye isnabal . Wal xin caw haca'tic'a caw ye yul sat Comam Dios , hac tu' chu jalnic'ojan̈ , yuto ha' Comam ak'n̈e hune' comunilti'an̈ , yeb hunxan̈e jehan̈ yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
47003001	Yet chijalnihan̈ huntek'an ti' teyet , ¿ chimhetxumu tato lan̈an jalni cobahan̈ c'ulal ? Wal xin ¿ tom chicoyehan̈ carta chon̈abenicojan̈ yul hek'ab ? maca ¿ chicok'anan̈ carta chexabenico yul cok'aban̈ haca' chute huntek'anxa ebnaj ? ¡ Machoj !
47003002	Wal xin hexn̈ech'an cocartahan̈ , ha' xin chiocnico juhan̈ . Hune' carta chexabenico tu' tz'ibn̈ebil yin̈ janmahan̈ , hune' carta tu' sunil mac ohtan̈e yeb sunil mac chi'ilni .
47003003	Caw xin ixtan̈ yehi , yuto hex ti' haca' hunu carta tz'ibn̈ebil yu Comam Cristo hac tu' heyehi , han̈on̈ti'an̈ xin chijic'ojan̈ hune' carta tu' . Hune' carta tu' maẍtaj yu tinta tz'ibn̈ebil , to yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios itzitz . Machipaxotaj yin̈o ch'en ch'en tz'ibn̈ebilicoj , wal xin yin̈ heyanma tz'ibn̈ebilxacoj .
47003004	Yu Comam Cristo yuxin chicawxi coc'ul sata Comam Dios tato hac tu' ye huntek'an tu' .
47003005	Hayet chijalnihan̈ hune' ti' mach lan̈ano jalnihan̈ tato chisje cowatx'enan̈ hunu tzet ye tu' yul jetan̈ cochuquilan̈ , wal xin sunil tzet chisje cowatx'enan̈ , yaj yu Comam Dios chicolwa jin̈an̈ .
47003006	Ha' Comam ak'ni jipan̈ jocan̈ chejabo yin̈ hune' ac' trato , maẍtaj yin̈ hune' ley tz'ibn̈ebilcanoj . Hune' iscab trato ti' chij isba yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios . Hune' isley naj Mois'es tz'ibn̈ebilcano tu' chon̈yito yin̈ camical , wal Yesp'iritu Comam Dios chak' cok'inal mach istan̈bal .
47003007	Hune' isley naj Mois'es tz'ibn̈ebilcanico yin̈ ch'en ch'en , caw ay isk'ak'al yip isjepla yet yuli , yuxin matxa yu isk'oji ismujlico ebnaj Israel yin̈ naj Mois'es yu istzejtzoni , yaja' yec'baniln̈e yehi . Yuxin ta ha' hune' ley chon̈ak'ni camoj caw xiwquilta yu yak'lax tet anma ,
47003008	¡ hajxampaxo xin hune' iscab trato chij isba yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo , ec'balto isc'ulch'anil chu yak'lax istzoti'al !
47003009	Ha' chal yelapno hune' chiwalti'an to ta caw ay ismay yu yak'lax istzoti'al hune' ley chon̈anico yin̈ camical , hajxam xin jaben isc'ulch'anil istzoti'al tzet chon̈anico c'ulal sata Comam Dios .
47003010	Yuto waxan̈ca caw ay yelapno hune' isley naj Mois'es yet yalan̈to tu' , yaja' wal tinan̈ matxa yelapno ye yul sat hune'xa ti' , yuto caw ec'bal isc'ulch'anil .
47003011	Ta caw niman yelapno ye hune' ley txann̈e istiempohal tu' , hajxam xin hune' trato maẍtic'a istan̈bal , to caw ec'naxa isc'ulch'anil .
47003012	Ayco hune' ti' yipo janmahan̈ , yuxin yin̈ sunil janmahan̈ chijalnic'ojan̈ .
47003013	Mach chijutehan̈ haca' yute naj Mois'es , yuto yaco naj hune' k'ap k'ap yen̈elo sat yun̈e mach chil ebnaj Israel istan̈ilo ismujli hune' isk'ak'al yip Comam ayico yin̈ sat naj tu' .
47003014	Yaja' mach istxum ebnaj tato chitan̈ilo isk'ak'al hune' tu' , yebpaxo xin tinan̈ yet chilni ebnaj Istzoti' Comam Dios bay ayayo hune' babel trato , haca' totic'a ayco hune' k'ap k'ap tu' yen̈elo isnabal ebnaj . Ha' xin mach chiak'ni istxumulo ebnaj tzet chala , yuto maẍto chiak'lax yohtan̈elo ebnaj tato yet yul Comam Cristo istan̈canilo babel trato tu' .
47003015	Yuxin hayet chiyilni ebnaj isley naj Mois'es tinan̈ haca'tan̈e aytoco k'ap k'ap yen̈elo isnabal ebnaj .
47003016	Yaja' yet chanico isba anma yul isk'ab Comam Cristo Jahawil , chiilaxilo hune' yen̈el isnabal haca' k'ap k'ap tu' .
47003017	Yuto ha' Comam Cristo Jahawil , Esp'iritu ye Comam , yuxin yet ayxaco Yesp'iritu Comam jin̈ habanxa cotxumni tzet chal Yum Comam Dios , matxa ayon̈octo yalan̈ yip hune' babel trato .
47003018	Yuxin matxa hune' haca' ismaj sate tu' yin̈ cosat cosunil . Wal tinan̈ xin lahanon̈xa haca' hunu ch'en espejo bay chi'illax isk'ak'al yip Comam , yuto ha' jin̈ chi'ilchalo isc'ulal Comam Cristo Jahawil . Yuxin lan̈an isch'ib conabal haca' isnabal Comam , yeb xin lan̈an istz'ajnalo isc'ulch'anil Comam jin̈ . Hune' ti' chij isba jin̈ yu yip Comam Esp'iritu .
47004001	Mach chicabcon coc'ulan̈ yuto yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yuxin yaco Comam hune' munil ti' yul cok'aban̈ .
47004002	Wal tinan̈ sunil tzet caw tx'ixobal chiswatx'e anma yin̈ ewantajil yahbilxacano juhan̈ , machi mac chijak' subchahojan̈ , mach chicosoman̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios yeb comon tzoti' . Wal xin han̈e isyelal chijalan̈ sata anma yeb sata Comam Dios , hac tu' chu coyenilojan̈ tato hune' comunilti'an̈ ayco yin̈ istoholal .
47004003	Hayet chon̈ec'an̈ jalnoc'ojan̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile , ay mac ti' mach chitxumchalo yu , ha' ton huntek'an mac tu' chic'aytoj .
47004004	Yaja' yu mach chayto yul yanma yin̈ Istzoti' Comam ; yuxin ha' naj yahawil yin̈ hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ha' naj machi ak'ni yohtan̈elo anma yun̈e mach chu yilni istzejla isk'ak'al hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile , yet Comam Cristo caw aycano yip , Comam yechel Comam Dios .
47004005	Maẍtajon̈an̈ chijalic'o cobahan̈ , walxinto ha' Comam Jesucristo chijalic'ojan̈ ta ha' Comam Jahawil . Wal han̈on̈an̈ xajaco cobahan̈ hechejaboj yuto chitzala janmahan̈ yin̈ Comam .
47004006	Ha'tic'a Comam Dios chejni ta chitzejla sajilk'inal xol k'ejholo , hapaxo Comam ak'ni sajilk'inal yul janma yun̈e johtan̈enilo isk'ak'al yip Comam Dios , hune' chitzejla yin̈ sat Comam Jesucristo .
47004007	Haca' hunu k'alomal ayayto yul hunu tx'otx' xi , hac tu' ye Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ conimanil , yun̈e isyenilo isba ta ha' Istzoti' Comam caw aycano yip ; yin̈ Comam Dios chitita , mach jetojan̈ yehi .
47004008	Yuxin waxan̈ca hoybilon̈an̈ yu isya'tajil , yaja' mach chon̈ayc'ayan̈ yul isk'ab . Ay tzet ye tu' chijaco yin̈ coc'ulan̈ , yaja' mach chicabcon coc'ulan̈ yu .
47004009	Chon̈cajlaxan̈ , yaja' mach bejbilon̈canojan̈ , chon̈mak'laxcan̈an̈ , yaja' mach mak'bilo cotan̈ilojan̈ yin̈ huneln̈e .
47004010	Bajxan̈etu'wal chon̈tohan̈ ayon̈n̈etic'acojan̈ yul isk'ab camical , haca' yak'le Comam Jesucristo , hac tu' chu isyenilo isba jin̈an̈ yin̈ tzettaj yak'le Comam .
47004011	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ waxan̈ca itzitzon̈an̈ , yaja' ayon̈n̈etic'acojan̈ yul isk'ab camical sunilbal tiempo yu chon̈munlahan̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Cristo . Hac tu' chu isyenilo isba tzettaj yak'le Comam yin̈ hune' conimanilan̈ cambehal ye ti' .
47004012	Yuxin han̈on̈ti'an̈ ayon̈n̈etic'acojan̈ yul isk'ab camical yun̈e hechahnicano hek'inal tet Comam .
47004013	Chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Xawaytojan yul wanmahan yuxin quintzotelan , " ẍi . Hac tu' jepaxojan̈ han̈on̈ti'an̈ xajaytojan̈ yul janmahan̈ yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin chon̈tzotelan̈ .
47004014	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ johtajan̈ ta ha' Comam Dios ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , ha'tic'a Comam xin chon̈ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ yuto yeton̈xa Comam Jesucristo , hunxa xin chu con̈yinito Comam isc'atan̈ .
47004015	Caw chijak'lehan̈ huntek'an isya'tajil ti' yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ , yeb yun̈e tx'i'al mac chichahni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios , haxinwal tx'i'al mac chiak'nipaxo yuch'andiosal tet Comam , hac tu' chu yoc ismay Comam .
47004016	Yu hune' tu' , yuxin mach chicabcon coc'ulan̈ waxan̈ca lan̈an ispax yip conimanilan̈ , yaja' wal janmahan̈ xin hunun tz'ayic yoc yin̈ yac'tohal .
47004017	Sunilal isya'tajil chijilan̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yin̈ an̈e chiec'toj yuto chiapni istiempohal bay chilahwi , yaja' wal isc'ulch'anil chak' Comam jet xin ec'bal niman yelapnoj , yeb xin mach istan̈bal .
47004018	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ , maẍtaj yin̈ huntek'an tzet ye tu' chijilico yin̈ bay chijaco conabalan̈ . Wal xin yin̈ huntek'an tzet ye tu' mach chijilico yin̈ ha' bay ayco conabalan̈ , yuto sunil huntek'an chijilico yin̈ , yin̈ an̈e chitan̈iloj . Wal huntek'an mach chijilico yin̈ ayn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
47005001	Hune' conimanil ti' , lahan haca' hune' nich'an leẍpat chietaxtoj . Yaja' johtaj ta ay hune' nimanile caw c'ul watx'ebil yu Comam Dios yul satcan̈ , mach anmaho watx'en̈e , yeb xin machi bak'inal chitan̈iloj .
47005002	Yuxin hayet ayon̈toc'o yin̈ conimanil ti' caw ch'ah coc'ul , jochebal chiak'laxna hune' conimanil yet satcan̈ tu' .
47005003	Ha' hune' tu' chioc xilo cok'ap , yun̈e mach t'ilanojon̈ yet chon̈apni .
47005004	Hayet ayon̈toc'o yin̈ conimanil ti' caw chiah coc'ul chijak'len isya'tajil , ay jala' mach chon̈can t'ilnoj , mach chijoche ta ton̈e chiilaxilo hune' conimanil ti' , walxinto chijoche ta chiak'lax hunxa conimanil ac' , hac tu' xin chitan̈ilo hune' conimanil cambehal ye ti' , cat cochahni hune' cok'inal mach istan̈bal .
47005005	Yu hune' ti' yuxin con̈iswatx'e Comam Dios , yak'nipaxo Comam , Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet yu yak'ni johtan̈elo yin̈ caw ist'in̈anil tato chicochah hune' tu' .
47005006	Yuxin caw sunilbal tiempo chijaco hune' tu' yipo janma , johtaj tato yet ayon̈toco yin̈ hune' conimanil ti' machijon̈ isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yul satcan̈ .
47005007	Tinan̈ maẍto chijil hune' tu' , yaja' yulbal istiempohal ayon̈ yin̈ hune' conimanil ti' chijayto yul janma ta hac tu' yehi .
47005008	Yuxin caw ayco Comam Dios yipo janma , jochebal chicobejcano hune' conimanil ti' cat japni isc'atan̈ Comam .
47005009	Yuxin waxan̈ca ayon̈ic'ojan̈ yeb conimanilti'an̈ , maca haxa isc'atan̈ Comam bey satcan̈ , ha' tzet choche Comam Dios ha' ayco yin̈ coc'ulan̈ cowatx'enan̈ yun̈e istzala Comam jin̈an̈ .
47005010	Caw cosunil chon̈oc sata Comam Jesucristo yul iscapil yun̈e cochahni ispaj yin̈ tzettaj chicowatx'e hununon̈ yet ayon̈ic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ta c'ul maca istx'ojal cowatx'e .
47005011	Walon̈ti'an̈ , ha' tet Comam Dios Jahawil bay chon̈xiwan̈ , yuxin ayco yin̈ coc'ulan̈ jalnihan̈ tet anma ta chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Caw ohtabil cobeybalan̈ yu Comam , haquexpax tu' hantam sak'al ta heyohtapaxo cobeybalan̈ .
47005012	Mach lan̈ano jalnihan̈ tato caw c'ulon̈an̈ yul hesat . Wal xin jochebalan̈ tato chextzala jin̈an̈ yeb yun̈e c'ul hecolni heba hepajtzen tet ebnaj yin̈n̈e anma nime winaj chaco yanma , maẍtaj isc'ulal ayayto yul yanma anma bay chit'an̈xico ebnaj .
47005013	Walon̈ti'an̈ , waxan̈ca chon̈hallaxan̈ locohal , yaja' yu comunlahan̈ yin̈ yet Comam Dios , yaja' ta man̈locohojan̈ cheyila yaj yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ .
47005014	Wal xin sunil tzet chicowatx'ehan̈ , ha' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Jesucristo , ha' chiak'ni juban̈ , yuto johtajan̈ tato ay hune' mac cam coselelo cosunil , yuxin camnajon̈xa yin̈ cobeybal yet yalan̈tocanoj .
47005015	Ju cosunil yuxin cam Comam Jesucristo yuxin han̈on̈ itzitzon̈ ti' , matxahojab chon̈ec' yin̈ haca' tzet chal janma . Wal xin haca'ojab tzet chal isc'ul Comam Dios , hacojab tu' chicobeybaln̈e ; yuto cam Comam , lahwi tu' yitzitzbipaxocan̈ yu yak'ni isc'ulal jet .
47005016	Yuxin han̈on̈ti'an̈ matxa chon̈ocan̈ ak'oc'ule yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj , haca' chute anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Waxan̈ca yet yalan̈to hac tu' jute cobahan̈ , con̈ocan̈ ak'oc'ule yin̈ Comam Cristo , yaja' wal tinan̈ xin , matxa haco tu' conanihan̈ yin̈ Comam .
47005017	Yuxin ha' mac chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , ac' anmaxa ch'elicoj . Ha' tzet iswatx'e yet yalan̈tocanoj chitan̈caniloj , haxa tzet chiswatx'e tinan̈ xin ac'toxa .
47005018	Sunil huntek'an chiwalti'an , ha' Comam Dios chiwatx'eni . Han̈ech'an yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin ayon̈ico yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios . Ha' ak'n̈e comunilan̈ jalnic'ojan̈ tzet chu yoc anma yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios .
47005019	Ha' chal yelapno hune' tu' to yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chioc anma yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios , matxa xin chisnati Comam ismul . Ha' Comam ak'n̈ecano hune' munil ti' yul cok'aban̈ jalnic'ojan̈ yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios .
47005020	Yuxin han̈on̈ti'an̈ ischejab Comam Cristo jehan̈ yuxin hacojtam ha' Comam Dios chiay sat teyet , yuxin yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo chijalan̈ teyet ta chexoc yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios .
47005021	Machi nino istx'ojal Comam Jesucristo , yaja' yiban̈ Comam alaxcanto ismul sunil anma yu Comam Dios . Yuxin hayet chijanico coba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo chon̈oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios .
47006001	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ chon̈colwahan̈ comunlahan̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios , yuxin chi-elto-jawan̈ teyin̈ ta mach cheyintan̈ecanilto isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios .
47006002	Chal Comam Dios yul Yum haca' ti' : Yin̈ istiempohal quinhawawtehan tawin̈ , wabetojan tzet hawala ; yin̈ istz'ayical hawoche hacolbanil quincolwahan tawin̈ , ẍiayoj . Yuxin tinan̈ istiempohalxa heyawten Comam teyin̈ , yeb xin istz'ayicalxa hechahni hecolbanil .
47006003	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ caw c'ul chijute cobeybalan̈ yun̈e machi mac chijak' lectahojan̈ , yuto mach chisje coc'ulan̈ tato ay mac chihalni isk'umal hune' comunilti'an̈ .
47006004	Wal xin caw chicoyehan̈ yin̈ tzet chicowatx'ehan̈ ta caw yeli ischejab Comam Dios jehan̈ , yuxin chijak' janmahan̈ jijlenan̈ isya'tajil chihul jiban̈an̈ , yeb man̈tzetal , yebpaxo yec'ya' janmahan̈ .
47006005	Ay bay caw con̈mak'laxan̈ , ay bay xin con̈alaxicojan̈ preso , yeb xin ay bay ah wejna anma jin̈an̈ , ay bay xin caw con̈ec'ya'an̈ comunlahan̈ , aypaxo bay xin el cowayan̈an̈ , ay bay jijlepaxojan̈ wahil .
47006006	Chicoyenipaxilojan̈ tato ischejab Comam Dios jehan̈ yu isc'ulal chicowatx'ehan̈ , johtaxahan̈ baytet ist'in̈anil , yuxin chijak' nimanc'ulalan̈ yin̈ anma , c'ulch'an chijutepaxo coc'ulan̈ yuto ayco Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul janmahan̈ , cat cotzalapaxojan̈ yin̈ jet anmahil .
47006007	Chicoyepaxilojan̈ tato ischejab Comam Dios jehan̈ yuto ha' cuybanile caw yel chijalan̈ , yeb yu ayco yip Comam Dios jin̈an̈ . Haca' hunu naj soldado chiscol isba yu ismunlabal cat yak'nipaxo naj howal yu ismunlabal tu' ; hacon̈tu'an̈ yuto ha' istoholal chijalic'ojan̈ .
47006008	Ay bay niman jelapnojan̈ yul sat anma , aypaxo bay xin chiilaxilo copixanan̈ . Ay bay c'ul istzotel anma jin̈an̈ , ay bay xin tx'oj istzotel anma jin̈an̈ . Ay bay chon̈hallaxan̈ lek'ti'al , waxan̈ca xin ha' isyelal chijalan̈ .
47006009	Ay bay challaxi tato mach con̈yohtajojan̈ anma , waxan̈ca xin caw ohtabilon̈an̈ yu . Camomon̈xahan̈ yalni anma , yaja' itzitzon̈an̈ , chi'alaxpaxayo isya'tajil jiban̈an̈ , yaja' mach chon̈caman̈ .
47006010	Haca'tan̈e bisc'ulal jehan̈ , yaja' wal xin tzalahilaln̈etic'a jehan̈ yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Waxan̈ca caw meba'on̈an̈ , yaja' tzetc'a mac k'alom yul sat Comam Dios juhan̈ . Waxan̈ca machi nich'ano tzet ayon̈an̈ , yaja' yul sat Comam Dios tz'ajan yeco sunil yul cok'aban̈ .
47006011	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , hex ayex bey Corinto , caw chijaltojan̈ isyelal teyet yeb sunil tzet ay yin̈ janmahan̈ .
47006012	Caw machi hunu tzet ye tu' chijebahan̈ teyet , wal hex ti' xin ay huntek'an tzet ye tu' ewan ye jetan̈ heyu .
47006013	Haca' yay sat hunu naj mame tet isc'ahol , hac tu' yay insatan teyet , chink'annihan tato ha' caw isyelal ha' cheyal wetan , haca' chu walnitojan tzet ay yul wanmahan teyet .
47006014	Mach chu heyetbin̈en heba yeb anma maẍto chichahni Comam yul yanma , yuto ¿ tom chu yetbin̈en isba isc'ulal yeb istx'ojal ? Yeb xin ¿ tom chu yetbin̈en isba sajilk'inal yeb k'ejholo ? ¡ Wal xin mach chuhi !
47006015	Yeb ¿ tom chu islahban isnabal Comam Jesucristo yeb naj matzwalil ? Yeb xin han̈on̈ xacochah Comam Jesucristo yul janma , ¿ tom chu colahban conabal yeb mac maẍto chichahni Comam yul yanma ? ¡ Mach chuhi !
47006016	¿ Tom ay yocbalto tioẍ yul yatut Comam Dios ? ¡ Machoj ! Yuto han̈on̈ ti' yatut Comam Dios itzitz jehi , haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : Haninti'an chinehayojan xol ebnaj cat xin wec'an yeb ebnaj , haninan xin chinocan isdiosaloj , cat yoc ebnaj incon̈obojan , ẍi Comam .
47006017	Yu hune' tu' , yuxin yalpaxo Comam : Elan̈we xol ebnaj , pohilo heba yin̈ ebnaj . Mach chetzab huntek'an tzet ye tu' machiswalil , hac tu' xin chexinchahan inc'atan̈an .
47006018	Chinocan hemamoj , cat heyoc inc'aholojan yeb xin incutz'inojan , ẍi Comam Dios Jahawil , Comam chisje iswatx'en sunil tzet ye tu' , ẍiayoj .
47007001	Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuhan , ha' ton huntek'an xawalan teyet yaltecano Comam jet , yuxin yilal copohnilo coba xol sunil tzet ye tu' chietanto conimanil yeb janma . Xiwojon̈we tet Comam Dios , jak'acanico coba yin̈ huneln̈e yin̈ tzet choche Comam .
47007002	¡ Aweyto yul heyanma yin̈ tzet chijalan̈ ! Caw machi hunujex bay cowatx'ehan̈ huno istx'ojal . Machi hunujex etaxnato henabal juhan̈ . Machipaxo hunujex quexjak' subchahojan̈ .
47007003	Maẍtaj yu istac hec'ul yuxin chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' teyet , wal xin haca'tic'a walnihan teyet yet yalan̈tocanoj , caw ayexic'o yin̈ wanmahan . Yuxin waxan̈ca itzitzinan maca lan̈anxa incaman hune'n̈etic'a ha' yeco wanmahan teyin̈ .
47007004	Caw yin̈ sunil wanmahan chintzotelan teyet yeb xin caw chintzalahan teyin̈ , waxan̈ca lan̈an wilnihan isya'tajil bey ti' , yaj caw chik' yip wanmahan , yeb caw chioccano hune' niman tzalahilal yin̈ wanmahan chiwabehan .
47007005	Yettaxtic'a julan̈ bey ismajul Macedonia ti' , maẍtic'a nino ak'anc'ulal chijilan̈ . Bajxan̈etu'wal chon̈ec'an̈ ha' isya'tajil chichahlo juhan̈ ; ha' yichelax howal jin̈an̈ ha' chu anma ; ha' istacbal coc'ulan̈ ha' ch'ak'laxi .
47007006	Yaj Comam Dios chiiptzen anma bisc'ulal yehi , ha' Comam ak'ni yak'lobal coc'ulan̈ yet yul naj Tito bey ti' .
47007007	Yaja' maẍn̈etaj yu hul naj yuxin chitzala coc'ulan̈ , walxinto yu jabehan̈ ta heyak' yak'lobal isc'ul naj yet isbeyc'o naj texol , yeb yu cheyoche con̈heyila'an̈ . Yalnipaxo naj ta caw bisc'ulal heyehi yin̈ tzet yu texol , yebpaxo ta ayinicojan yin̈ hec'ul . Hayet wabenan huntek'an tu' caw yik'cano yip tzalahilal yul wanmahan .
47007008	Caw tac inc'ulan yet wabenan ta oc bisc'ulal teyin̈ hayeb tz'ayic yet heyaben tzet yal te' carta watojan teyet , yaja' wal tinan̈ xin matxa chiwik' bisc'ulalan yin̈ hune' tu' .
47007009	Waxan̈ca heyik' bisc'ulal yaj chintzalahan yin̈ yuto hebisc'ulal tu' ha' ak'ni hetxumulo henani heba haca' choche Comam Dios . Machi xin nich'ano tzet etanto henabal yin̈ tzet yal te' carta tu' .
47007010	Tato chijik' bisc'ulal haca' choche Comam Dios , hune' bisc'ulal tu' chiak'ni cotxumuloj ta yilal conani coba cat xin cocolchacanoj . Ta hac tu' ye chal tu' machojab chitac coc'ul yu bisc'ulal . Ay hune'xa bisc'ulal yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , hune' bisc'ulal tu' chon̈yito yin̈ camical mach istan̈bal .
47007011	Yaja' hex ti' , xaheyik' bisc'ulal haca' choche Comam Dios , caw xin tx'i'alxa isc'ulal chak' teyet , yuto ha' anico yin̈ heyanma hewatx'enayo hune' isya'tajil yu texol tu' , hac tu' yu hecolni heba . Istit hehowal , ischiwacan̈ hec'ul yu hune' tzet yu texol tu' , yuxin caw tx'i'al el heyoche ta ayinic'ojan texol . Yaja' xin heyayo isya'tajil yiban̈ naj yaco ismul tu' , hac tu' yu heyeniloj ta maẍtaj hunex yin̈ hune' ismul naj iswatx'e tu' .
47007012	Yuxin hune' carta intz'ibn̈etojan tu' maẍn̈etaj yu naj oc ismul yuxin intz'ibn̈etojan , maẍn̈etajpaxo yu naj bay oc ismul naj tu' , walxinto yun̈e isyenilo isba yul sat Comam Dios ta caw ayon̈icojan̈ yipo hec'ul .
47007013	Sunil huntek'an tu' anico yip janmahan̈ , maẍn̈etaj yu huntek'an tu' , wal xin caw con̈tzalacan̈an̈ yet yalni naj Tito jetan̈ ta caw sak'al yu hechahni naj yeb ta caw yak' tzalaho isc'ul naj texol .
47007014	Isyelal walan , yet walnihan tet naj Tito tato caw c'ulex . Heyohtaj tato ist'in̈aniln̈etic'a chiwalan , yebpaxo xin mach lek'ti'alo elico yin̈ tzet walan tet naj teyin̈ .
47007015	Yuxin ha' tinan̈ , caw ec'na xahan chexyil naj , yuto chitit yul isc'ul naj tato caw yijem heyute heba yet isbeyc'o naj texol , yeb xin caw xahan heyil naj yet ay naj tec'atan̈ .
47007016	¡ Caw chintzalahan teyin̈ yuto ayexico yipo wanmahan !
47008001	Tinan̈ xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chijaltojan̈ teyet yin̈ tzet yu isyeni isba isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yin̈ hunun majan ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul ismajul Macedonia ti' .
47008002	Waxan̈ca caw ay ilwebal chihul yiban̈ ebnaj , yaja' caw chitzala yanma ebnaj , yeb xin waxan̈ca caw meba' ebnaj , yaja' caw chipalc'on ebnaj yak'ni yofrenda , haca'tan̈e caw k'alom ebnaj .
47008003	Haninti'an chiwak' inbahan walnihan ta caw yin̈ sunil yanma ebnaj ch'ak' ebnaj yofrenda , hatatic'a hanta ay yul isk'ab ebnaj , ay bay ti' xin chipalc'on yak'ni ebnaj .
47008004	Caw oc ebnaj yala' jetan̈ tato chicochahan̈ yofrenda ebnaj , yuto choche ebnaj chicolwa ebnaj yin̈ ebnaj juẍta ay bey Jerusal'en .
47008005	Caw ec'balcano yak' ebnaj yiban̈ haca' conanihan̈ . Yuto yin̈ babelal ishin isba ebnaj yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios Jahawil , lahwi tu' xin yanipaxico isba ebnaj yijemal jetan̈ haca' choche Comam .
47008006	Yuxin xajalan̈ tet naj Tito ta chito naj ilwal teyin̈ , cat ischahni naj hecolwal cheyak' yu isc'ulch'anil hec'ul , yuto ha' naj ichico ischahni hecolwal yet babelal .
47008007	Haca'ojab ispalc'on iscawxi hec'ul yin̈ Comam Dios yeb hehelanil hetzoteli , yeb yitz'atil hewi' , yeb yin̈ sunil heyanma chewatx'en hunu tzet ye tu' , yeb con̈hexahann̈enpaxojan̈ ; hacojab tu' ispalc'on heyak'ni heyofrenda tet Comam Dios .
47008008	Mach chejbanile hune' chiwalti'an , wal xin ton̈e chiwochehan chiwalan teyet yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍtaj . Haquexpax tu' yet cheyak'ni heyofrenda chohtan̈elo ebnaj bay chiak'lax hune' heyofrenda tu' ta xahan cheyil ebnaj .
47008009	Han̈on̈ ti' johtaj ta Comam Jesucristo caw c'ulch'ancano isc'ul . Caw tzetc'a isk'alomal Comam ay bey satcan̈ , yaja' yute isba Comam meba'il yuto caw xahan ayon̈ yu yun̈e joc k'alomal yul sat Comam Dios .
47008010	Chiwaltojan teyet tzet chiec' yin̈ innabalan yin̈ heyofrenda , yuto yettax hunbi hex babel quexichico heyak'ni heyofrenda , caw xin yin̈ sunil heyanma heyak'a .
47008011	Wal tinan̈ xin mach chebej heyak'ni heyofrenda tu' . Wal xin ak'we yin̈ sunil heyanma haca'ojab yu heyichenicoj , hacojab tu' xin cheyute tinan̈ , hatatic'a tzet ayex .
47008012	Yuto ta yin̈ sunil janma chijak' jofrenda , caw chitzala Comam Dios jin̈ , hatatic'a tzet ay yul cok'ab . Wal xin mach chisk'an Comam hunu tzet ye tu' jet ta machi yul cok'ab .
47008013	Mach chiwochehan ta chexcan yin̈ man̈tzetal yu heyak'ni hecolwal .
47008014	Yaja' chiwochehan tato lahanojab tzet ayon̈ cosunil . Yuxin tinan̈ , hex ay tzet ay yul hek'ab colwahan̈we yin̈ ebnaj matzet aya , haxinwal haxa yet matzet ayex haxa ebnaj chicolwa teyin̈ . Ta hac tu' lahan chicocolle coba .
47008015	Haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios , bay chala : " Ha' mac tzetc'a yet isc'utxbacan̈ , mach palc'oncan̈ yul isk'ab . Haxa mac hanic'n̈e yet iscutxbacan̈ xin , c'uxann̈e ec' yu , " ẍiayoj .
47008016	Chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios , yuto ha' Comam anico yul yanma naj Tito quexyanico yin̈ isc'ul , haca'tic'a heyeco yin̈ inc'ulan .
47008017	Yuxin hayet walnihan tet naj tato chito naj ilwal teyin̈ , caw yin̈ an̈e istak'we naj istohi yuto ayco yin̈ isc'ul naj isto quexyilnoj .
47008018	Ay xin hune' naj juẍta ti' chijatojan̈ yetbiho naj Tito . Ha' hune' naj ti' caw c'ul istzotel ebnaj juẍtaj yul huntek'anxa con̈ob yin̈ naj , yuto caw c'ul ismunil naj yin̈ yalnic'o Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
47008019	Ha' naj xin saybil yu ebnaj juẍtaj yu yoc naj jetbiojan̈ , cat iscolwa naj jin̈an̈ iscutxbancan̈ ch'en yofrenda ebnaj juẍtaj . Hac tu' xin chi'ilchalo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios jin̈ , cat yilchapaxilo isc'ulch'anil hec'ul .
47008020	Hac tu' chijutehan̈ yun̈e machi hunu mac chihobnican̈ lek'ti'al jin̈an̈ yin̈ ch'en colwal caw ay yelapno chicocutxbacan̈tu'an̈ .
47008021	Yuxin chijaco yin̈ coc'ulan̈ ta c'ul chijute cobahan̈ yin̈ hune' munil ti' ; maẍn̈etaj sata Comam Dios , walxinto c'ul chijutepaxo cobahan̈ sata anma .
47008022	Ay xin hune'xa naj juẍta chijatojan̈ yinta ebnaj ti' , hune' naj juẍta ti' tx'i'alxa el chijilan̈ tato caw chitzala naj iscolwahi bajxan̈etic'a yin̈ tzet ye tu' . Yuxin tinan̈ caw ec'balto chitzala naj yuto ayexico yipo yanma naj .
47008023	Ta ay mac chik'amben teyet tzet ye naj Tito ti' , cheyala ta wetbi inbahan yeb naj , yuxin chinchejtojan naj yu iscolwa naj teyin̈ . Yeb xin ta ay mac chik'ambenpaxo yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ , cheyala tato chejbilto ebnaj yu ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul huntek'anxa con̈ob ay bey ti' . Ebnaj ti' caw chisyelo ebnaj isc'ulch'anil Comam Cristo yu tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj .
47008024	Caw chiwochehan tato c'ul chu hechahni ebnaj , haxinwal chil huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍtaj tato yeli c'ulex , haca' yu walnitojan teyin̈ .
47009001	Wal yin̈ ch'en colwal cheyak' tet macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo ay bey Judea , mach yilalo chintz'ibn̈etojan teyet .
47009002	Yuto wohtajan tato caw yin̈ sunil heyanma chexcolwahi , caw chitzala inc'ulan chiwalnihan tet ebnaj juẍta ay bey Macedonia ti' tato caw c'ulch'an hec'ul . Xawalan tato hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey yul ismajul Acaya hunbitax quexichico heyak'ni heyofrenda . Hayet yaben ebnaj ay bey Macedonia hune' tu' , caw tx'i'al ebnaj oc yin̈ isc'ul yak'ni yofrenda .
47009003	Tinan̈ xin chinchejtojan ebnaj juẍtaj ti' bay ayex tu' , haxinwal chexyiptze ebnaj hecutxbancan̈ ch'en colwal tu' . Hac tu' xin mach nabn̈eho walan yin̈ isc'ulch'anil hec'ul .
47009004	Yuto c'uxantaxca ay ebnaj ah Macedonia ti' tzujan wintajan yet chinapnihan quexwilnojan , tx'ixobalmi ta maẍto ch'en heyofrenda tu' cutxan heyu , yuto caw sunil janmahan̈ chijalnihan̈ tato caw c'ulch'an hec'ul .
47009005	Yuxin chinnahan tato caw yilal isbabito ebnaj juẍta ti' tec'atan̈ yun̈e iscolwa ebnaj teyin̈ hecutxbancan̈ heyofrenda , ch'en tak'ebilxa heyu heyak'ni . Ha' xin heyofrenda chicutxi tu' , ha' chalniloj ta caw c'ulch'an hec'ul , machi xin lan̈bilojex heyak'ni .
47009006	¿ Tom mach cheyohtajo hune' ti' xin ? : Ha' mac hanic'n̈e yawal chacoj , hanic'n̈etic'apaxo isn̈al chishatx'paxocan̈ . Walpaxo mac niman yawal chacoj caw niman isn̈al chishatx'can̈ .
47009007	Jak'a'we jofrenda hununon̈ , hatatic'a hanta chicotxum jak'ni , machojab yin̈o bisc'ulal chijak'a , machojabpaxo xin yin̈ lan̈bilal , yuto Comam Dios caw chitzala Comam yin̈ mac caw yin̈ tzalahilal chak' yofrenda .
47009008	Yuto ay yip Comam yak'ni sunil isyaxil teyet , hac tu' xin machi hunu tzet ye tu' ti' matzet teyet ; wal xin chipalc'on yul hek'ab yun̈e hecolwa yin̈ tzet ye tu' c'ul .
47009009	Chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : Sak'al yet mac chiak'ni tzet ye tu' tet anma meba' , yu hune' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tu' , yuxin mach chito nahul hune' mac tu' yu Comam Dios , ẍiayoj .
47009010	Comam Dios chiak'ni ixim hin̈at chitzunlaxi , yebpaxo sunil tzet chilolaxi . Ha' xin Comam chiak'nipaxo teyet tzet cheyak' yin̈ heyofrenda tet Comam . Haca'tic'a hunu tzet ye tu' chetz'uncanoj , chanayo Comam isyaxilal yiban̈ , hac tu' xin ye hune' isc'ulch'anil hec'ul tu' caw tzetc'axa chielcanicoj .
47009011	Hac tu' xin caw tx'i'al tzet chijechab yun̈e caw tx'i'al tzet cheyak'paxoj , hac tu' xin tzetc'a ebnaj juẍta chiak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yet chischahni ebnaj hune' heyofrenda chijitojan̈ bay ay ebnaj tu' .
47009012	Huntek'an colwal cheyak' ti' maẍn̈etaj chicolwa yin̈ tzet ye tu' matzet yul isk'ab ebnaj , wal xin chiiptzelipaxo yin̈ ebnaj yak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios .
47009013	Chahnipaxico ebnaj ismay Comam , yuto cheyeloj tato yijemex yin̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Cristo , yebpaxo chexcolwa yin̈ tx'i'al ebnaj juẍtaj .
47009014	Ebnaj juẍta chichahni hecolwal tu' , chitxahli ebnaj teyin̈ , cat quexisxahann̈en ebnaj yuto hex chexyak'baln̈e Comam Dios yin̈ heyenilo huntek'an isc'ulal isc'ul Comam .
47009015	Jak'a'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yu hune' comatan , ( ha' ton Comam Jesucristo ) ak'bil yu Comam . Caw xin mach chon̈k'oji cotxumni hanta isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam .
47010001	Hanin Pablo inti'an yet chink'annihan hunu tzet ye tu' teyet haca' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Cristo hac tu' chu ink'annihan . Tolab chihallaxic'oj tato yet ayinan texol caw echo inxiwan , wal yet machijinan texol xin , tolab caw can̈ chiwute inbahan yalbanil .
47010002	Yaja' chiwaltojan teyet ta hayet chinapnihan bey tu' machojab cheyak'tij inhowalan yin̈ ebnaj chalni tato lahan chijute cobahan̈ haca' comon anma , yuto haninti'an caw hinaninan intzotelan yin̈ hune' tu' yeb ebnaj .
47010003	Wal xin caw yeli anma on̈an̈ , yaj mach haca'o chu yak'ni anma howal , mach haco tu' jak'ni howalan̈ .
47010004	Maẍtaj tzet ye tu' yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chijak'baln̈e yet chijak'ni howal , walxinto ha' yip Comam Dios ha' chik'oji istan̈tzenilo sunil tzet ye tu' caw ay yip .
47010005	Chik'ojipaxo yip Comam yin̈ sunil lolo'al mach chichahni ohtan̈elaxo Comam Dios . Haxa comon nabale xin chijacanico sunil tu' yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , hac tu' xin yijem chute isba .
47010006	Hayet caw c'ul hexxa heyijeni , chijayojan̈ isya'tajil yiban̈ mac mach chisje isc'ul isyije' .
47010007	Hex ti' , han̈ech'an tzet cheyil yu isbak' hesat ha'n̈e chexoc hetxumu' . Ta t'in̈anxa heyehi tato yet hexxa Comam Cristo , yilal heyohtan̈eniloj tato yetpaxo Comam Cristo jehan̈ .
47010008	Waxan̈ca chiwican̈ hanic' inbahan yin̈ hune' inmunilti'an , yaja' mach chintx'ixwihan , yuto ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an yun̈e helin̈ban heba yin̈ Comam , maẍtaj yu quexwetantojan .
47010009	Yuxin mach chisje inc'ulan ta chetxumu ta yu quexinxibtenan yuxin hac ti' chiwute walnitojan yul incartati'an , wal xin machoj .
47010010	Yuto ay mac chalni haca' ti' : " Ha' iscarta naj caw how istzoteli , yeb xin caw ya' chilowi , yaja' haxa yet ayc'o naj coxol xin machi yip tzet chiyal naj yeb xin matzet chal yelapnoj , " ẍi ebnaj .
47010011	Ha' mac hac tu' yalni , yilal yohtan̈eni tato haca'tic'a intzotelan yul incartati'an , hac tu' chu intzotelpaxojan yet ayinan texol .
47010012	Wal xin mach chu colahban cobahan̈ yeb mac chislolo'n̈e isba . Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' chischahco ebnaj sucal yin̈ yu ch'oc ebnaj yila' hanta ishelanil hunun ebnaj .
47010013	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ mach chon̈palc'onan̈ jinican̈ cobahan̈ bay yebilcano jetan̈ , yuto ha' Comam Dios an̈ecanico yechel bay cachan comunlahan̈ . Hac tu' xin el yin̈ isc'ul Comam yuxin con̈apnihan̈ texol bey con̈ob Corinto tu' .
47010014	K'inalo tato maẍtic'a hunelo con̈apnihan̈ tec'atan̈ , machim chon̈munlahan̈ texol tinan̈ . Wal xin han̈on̈an̈ con̈apnihan̈ babel texol , jalnihan̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Cristo teyet .
47010015	Mach chijal cobahan̈ winajil yu ismunil hunuxa anma , yeb xin mach lan̈an copalc'onan̈ comunlahan̈ yiban̈ bay yebilon̈canojan̈ yu Comam . Wal xin caw chito jochehan̈ chon̈munlahan̈ yun̈e isch'ib comuniltu'an̈ bay cachan comunlahan̈ yu Comam Dios , yun̈e cam heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam .
47010016	Chijochepaxojan̈ chon̈hitztojan̈ jalnojan̈ Tzoti' yet colbanile yul huntek'anxa con̈ob nahat yehilo yin̈ hecon̈ob tu' . Yaja' xin mach chijochehan̈ chon̈munlahan̈ bay xaichico hunmajanxa ebnaj ismunlahi , yuto machi jochehan̈ cololo'n̈e cobahan̈ yin̈ ismunil hunuxa maca .
47010017	Ta ay hunu mac choche yik'a'can̈ isba , yik'abcan̈ isba yaj yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e Comam Dios , machojabtaj yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e .
47010018	Yuto maẍtaj anma chiyal isba c'ulal yul yet ischuquil ha' c'ul , machoj , walxinto ha' mac chal Comam c'ulal , ha' ton c'ul .
47011001	Hantam sak'al tato chitecha huntek'an tzet chiwaltoti'an heyu , hacojtam mach innabalan , yuxin hac tu' intzotelan , yaja' yilal heyak'ni techahoj .
47011002	Caw tz'e' chiwute inbahan teyin̈ yuto xahan ayex wuhan haca' isxahanil chexyil Comam Dios , yuto xawak' tratohan yeb Comam Cristo tato chexwacojan yul isk'ab , haca' hunu ix k'opo maẍto chiyik'le hunu winaj .
47011003	Yaja' chinxiwan yuto haca'taxca yu yak'ni subchaho no' laba ix Eva yu iscan̈il yehi , hactaxca tu' chu heyak'lax subchahoj , cat heyinilo heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , yeb xin matxataxca toholo cheyute heba haca' choche Comam .
47011004	Hex ti' caw niman cheyute hec'ul heyaben tzet chal ebnaj chiec' halnoc'o huntek'anxa nan cuybanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , mach haca'o yu jalnihan̈ teyet . Lan̈an hechahnipaxo hune' nan esp'iritu , maẍtaj haca' hune' chabilxa heyu . Lan̈an hechahnipaxo hune' nan cuybanile , maẍtaj haca' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile hechah yet jec'an̈ jalnoc'ojan̈ teyet .
47011005	Ha' huntek'an ebnaj chal isba ischejabo Comam Jesucristo bay tzujanex tu' , mach ec'balo yelapno ebnaj insatajan .
47011006	Waxan̈ca mach c'ulo intzotelan , yaja' ha' tzet wohtajan caw niman yelapnoj . Sunil tzet quinec'an inwatx'ehan texol ha' chalniloj tato caw ay inhelanilan .
47011007	Hayet wec'an walnoc'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile texol machi nich'ano tzet ink'anilojan teyet . ¿ Tom waco inmulan yin̈ haca' tu' ? Wal xin wiyo inbahan yun̈e heyinican̈ heba .
47011008	Hayet inmunlahan texol yet wec'an walnoc'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile , ha' huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍta nan con̈obal , ha' ebnaj colwa win̈an yun̈e yec' wuhan texol .
47011009	Hayet wec'an texol , ay tiempo ay tzet ye tu' ti' caw ocnico wuhan , yaja' machi hunujex bay ink'anan nich'ano tzet ye tu' . Wal xin ha' ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey Macedonia apni inc'atan̈an , ha' ebnaj ak'ni tzet ocnico wuhan . Caw machi hunujex bay ink'anan hunu tzet ye tu' , hactic'apax tu' chiwute inbahan tinan̈ .
47011010	Ha' isyelal Comam Jesucristo ayco win̈an , yuxin chiwalan tato matzet ink'anan yet wec'an texol hex wuẍta ay yul ismajul Acaya ; ha' hune' tu' ayco istzalabalo inc'ulan . Hune' tzalahilal tu' machi mac chiinilo wetan .
47011011	¿ Tom mach ayoco wanmahan teyin̈ yuxin hac tu' walnihan ? ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin yohta Comam Dios tato caw ayco wanmahan teyin̈ .
47011012	Yaja' hune'n̈etic'a ha' chiwutehan texol haca' yet yalan̈tocanoj . Chiwutehan haca' tu' yun̈e mach chiwak'an yub ebnaj chihalni tato lahan comunilan̈ yebi , cat yinican̈ isba ebnaj .
47011013	Ha' ebnaj tu' ton̈e chisbalico isba ebnaj ischejabo Comam Jesucristo . Chak'ni subchaho ebnaj anma yin̈ tzet chala , chutenico isba ebnaj ischejabo Comam Jesucristo .
47011014	Yaja' hune' chiswatx'e ebnaj tu' mach chic'ay coc'ul jilni yuto hac tu' chute naj matzwalil ; chuteco isba naj c'ulal haca' ebnaj 'angel .
47011015	Yuxin mach chic'ay coc'ul ta chutepaxo isba ebnaj tu' haca' mac chicuyni istoholal , yuto ischejab naj matzwalil ye ebnaj . Yaja' chischah ebnaj tu' isya'tajil haca'tic'a istx'ojal chiswatx'e .
47011016	Wal tinan̈ xin chiwalpaxtojan teyet hunelxa , mach locohojinan , yaja' ta ayex chetxumu tato locohinan xin , chahwe heyabe' tzet chiwalti'an . Haca' hunu mac mach chistxumu yin̈ tzet chala , hac tu' chu winican̈ inbahan nich'anoxa , haca' huntek'an ebnaj chican̈ isba ischuquil .
47011017	Ha' huntek'an chiwaltojan teyet ti' , maẍtaj Comam Dios chiak'ni wala'tojan . Haca'ojtam mach chintxuman yet chiwalnitojan teyet , yuto ton̈e chiwican̈ inbahan chiwalnitojan hune' ti' .
47011018	Tzetc'a ebnaj chican̈ isba yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e , haquintu'an chiwican̈ hanic'o inbahan haca' chute ebnaj tu' .
47011019	Caw helanex heyalni , yaja' cheyak' techaho tzet chal ebnaj mach c'ulo tzet chiswatx'e teyin̈ .
47011020	Ay ebnaj chexlan̈ni yu heyak'ni cheja' heba tet , cat yinicanic'o ebnaj sunil tzet ayex . Caw yahawilxa chute isba ebnaj teyin̈ , chexyak'nipaxo subchaho ebnaj . Chexisyahni ebnaj , chiocpaxo yin̈ isnabal ebnaj ispak'nilto hesat . Wal hex ti' xin cheyak' techaho sunil tzet chexyute ebnaj tu' .
47011021	Wal xin chintx'ixwihan walnitojan teyet yuto han̈on̈ti'an̈ caw tz'on jute cobahan̈ texol , mach haca' yute isba ebnaj tu' teyin̈ . Yaja' ta chican̈ isba ebnaj tu' , haquinpaxtu'an chiwipaxocan̈ inbahan . Hayet chiwalnihan hune' ti' , haca'tan̈e mach tz'ajano yul inwi'an chiwalnihan .
47011022	Ebnaj tu' Hebreo ebnaj , haquinpaxtu'an Hebreo inan ; Israel ebnaj , haquinpaxtu'an , Israel inan ; yin̈ naj Abraham titna ebnaj , haquinpaxtu'an , yin̈ naj Abraham tu' titnajinpaxojan .
47011023	Ischejab Comam Cristo ye ebnaj yalni , walinan xin ec'balto ischejab Comam wehan sata ebnaj . Hayet chiwalnitojan huntek'an ti' teyet haca'ojtam mach chintxuman yin̈ tzet chiwalan . Wal haninti'an caw ec'balxa chinmunlahan sata ebnaj , tx'i'alxa el chinalaxictojan yul preso sata ebnaj . Ec'balxapaxo el chinmak'laxan sata ebnaj , tx'i'alxa el xin chielico incaman .
47011024	Howel quinismak'an ebnaj wet Israelan , treinta y nueve tz'um wijan yu ebnaj hunta el .
47011025	Oxel xin alaxayto te' c'ax win̈an , hunel xin quink'ojlaxcan̈an . Yet wec'an yin̈ inbelan , oxel to te' barco yich hayet ayinicojan yul te' . Ay hunel ti' xin , hune' tz'ayic yeb hune' ak'bal ayinicojan yiban̈ ha ha' yuto tocano te' barco yich ha' .
47011026	Mach isbi hayel quinec'an yin̈ inbelan . Ay bay quinelicojan quinyijnitojan ha ha' , ay bay quinelicojan incaman yu ebnaj elk'om , yeb yul isk'ab wet con̈oban , yebpaxo yul isk'ab anma nan con̈obal . Aypaxo bay quinelicojan incaman yulaj con̈ob yeb yulaj beh , yeb yiban̈ ha' mar , yeb xin caw quinelicojan incaman yul isk'ab ebnaj ton̈e chisbalico isba juẍtajoj .
47011027	Ay bay caw quinsiquihan inmunlahan , wak'lenan isya'tajil . Tx'i'al el mach quinwayan , ay bay wijlehan n̈ohchahilal , yeb tajinti'al . Tx'i'al el mach quinwa'han . Ay bay xin wetapaxo inc'ulan yu chew , yeb tx'i'al el quincancanojan man̈ xilk'apehal .
47011028	Mach han̈c'an̈eho huntek'an isya'tajil tu' wak'lenan , wal xin ayn̈etic'aco yin̈ inc'ulan yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul hunun con̈ob .
47011029	Yuto ta ay hunu mac maẍto chiyik' yip yin̈ yet Comam caw chiwik' bisc'ulalan yin̈ , haca'tan̈e maẍto chiwik'paxo wipan chute innanihan . Ta ay ebnaj chietaxto isnabal yu hunuxa maca , caw chitac inc'ulan .
47011030	Ta caw yilal chiwican̈ inbahan , chimwican̈ inbahan yin̈ huntek'an lan̈an walniti'an , yuto ha' huntek'an ti' chiyeniloj tato machi bin wipan .
47011031	Ha' Comam Dios , Ismam Comam Jesucristo , ha' ay yet yalaxico ismay yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , caw yohta Comam tato caw yel chiwalan .
47011032	Yet hunel , yet ayinic'ojan yul con̈ob Damasco , ischejni naj gobernador chimunla yinta naj rey Aretas tato chioc ismajomal isti' hunun ispultahil ch'en c'ub hoyanico yin̈ con̈ob tu' yun̈e intzablaxayojan .
47011033	Yaja' quinalaxaytojan yul hune' motx yu huntek'an ebnaj juẍtaj , walaxiltijan yul isventanahil ch'en c'ub tu' . Hac tu' yu incolchahan yul isk'ab naj gobernador tu' .
47012001	Matzet chiwik'an yin̈ winican̈ inbahan , yaja' yilaltic'a walnihan huntek'an yak' Comam Dios wila'an , yeb tzet yelax wetan yu Comam .
47012002	Ay hune' naj ohtabil wuhan , caw ayco yanma naj yin̈ Comam Cristo . Can̈lan̈ebxa habil tinan̈ yilaxto naj satcan̈ bay ay Comam Dios . Yaja' mach wohtajojan ta beyc'o naj yeb isnimanil maca han̈c'an̈e yanma naj , han̈ech'an Comam yohtaj .
47012003	Caw wohtajan tato ilaxto hune' naj tu' , yaja' ha' hune' mach wohtajojan ta ilaxto naj yeb isnimanil maca machoj , han̈ech'an Comam Dios yohtaj .
47012004	Ha' hune' wohtajan to ilaxto naj bey para'iso . Bey tu' yabe naj huntek'an tzoti' machi mac ohtan̈e , yeb xin machi mac chisje yalnic'oj .
47012005	Ha' hune' naj tu' chisje winican̈an , wal inti'an xin ha' yin̈ huntek'an isya'tajil chiwilan , ha' bay chiwican̈ inbahan .
47012006	K'inalo tato chiwochehan chiwican̈ inbahan chitic'am isje yuto ha' isyelal chiwalan , mach sucojinan yin̈ haca' tu' . Yaja' mach chiwican̈ inbahan yuto chiwochehan tato machi hunu mac chinani ta caw ec'bal welapnojan yiban̈ tzet chil anma win̈an , yeb xin tzet chiyabe anma walnihan .
47012007	Yaja' yun̈e machi oc lolo'al win̈an yu huntek'an tzet c'ulch'an yelax wila'tu'an , yuxin ak'lax hune' isya'tajil wetan yu naj matzwalil , haca' hunu te' tx'ix alaxico yin̈ innimanilan , hac tu' yu yak'lax hune' isya'tajil ti' win̈an .
47012008	Oxelxa chink'anan tet Comam Dios ta chilo Comam hune' isya'tajil ti' win̈an .
47012009	Yaja' tak'wi Comam wetan haca' ti' : " Ak' tzalaho hac'ul yin̈ isc'ulch'anil inc'ulan xawak'an tawet , yaj yu inhelanilan chitecha hawu . Han̈c'an̈e hune' tu' xin chiocnico hawu yuto caw ec'na caw c'ul isyenilo isba wipan yin̈ isya'tajil , " ẍi Comam . Hac tu' xin caw chintzalahan yin̈ isya'tajil chihul wiban̈an , yuto chisyelo isba yip Comam Cristo win̈an .
47012010	Yuxin caw chintzalahan yin̈ ej isya'tajil chihul wiban̈an , yuxin waxan̈ca chibuchwa anma win̈an , yeb waxan̈ca matzet ayinan , yeb waxan̈ca chincajlaxan , yeb waxan̈ca chihul isya'tajil wiban̈an , yaj yu chinmunlahan yin̈ yet Comam Jesucristo . Yaj caw chitzala wanmahan yuto hayet machi caw wipan chiwabehan , caw chiwik'canocan̈ wipan , yaja' yu Comam .
47012011	Haca' hunu mac mach c'ulo ye yul iswi' , hac tu' wute inbahan wanicojan inwinajilan , yaja' hex ay hemul win̈an yuto hex wal heyanico inwinajilan , yuto mach ec'balo ebnaj chisbalico isba ischejabo Comam Jesucristo tu' insatajan , ha' ebnaj cheyabeto tzet chala . Waxan̈ca mach chiyelapno wehan , yaja' mach chu ispalc'on ebnaj wiban̈an .
47012012	Hayet wec'an texol caw niman wute inc'ulan teyin̈ . Inyehan c'aybalc'ule yeb yechel yip Comam Dios texol ; ha' xin chalniloj tato caw yeli ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan .
47012013	Hune'xan̈e tzet mach lahano quexwutehan haca' huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍtaj ay yul hunun con̈ob , yuto mach ink'anan yin̈ tzet ocnico wuhan , yuxin ak'we nimanc'ulal yin̈ hune' inmultu'an .
47012014	Tinan̈ xin toxa chintohan quexwila'an yin̈ yet yoxel , yaja' matzet chink'anpaxojan teyet yin̈ tzet chu yec' wuhan bey tu' . Yuto maẍtaj yin̈ tzet ayex bay ayco wanmahan , walxinto hex ayexico yin̈ inc'ulan . Yuto haca' hunu naj mame tinan̈ yilal yak'ni naj tzet chiocnico yu yuninal , maẍtaj yuninal naj tu' chiak'ni tzet chiocnico yu .
47012015	Haninti'an , hinaninan inc'aytzenilojan sunil tzet ayinan yeb innimanilti'an yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ . Yaja' chiwilan , hayet ec'balto chiwaco wanmahan teyin̈ , walex xin ip heyinilo heyanma win̈an .
47012016	Yaja' waxan̈ca ay ebnaj yohtaj ta machi hunelo ti' waco inbahan heyijatzo yin̈ tzet chiocnico wuhan , yaja' chal ebnaj tato yu inhelanilan yin̈ istx'ojal yuxin quexwak' subchahojan ink'annihan tzet ye tu' teyet .
47012017	¿ Tom quexwak' subchahojan yu ebnaj juẍtaj watojan yu isto quexyilnoj ?
47012018	Ink'anan tet naj Tito tato chito naj quexyila' yeb hunxa naj juẍta to yinta naj . ¿ Tom quexyak' subchaho naj Tito tu' ? ¡ Machoj ! Wal xin haca' innabalan yeb isc'ulch'anil inc'ulan , hac tu' yute isba naj texol .
47012019	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay juhan̈ , ham hetxumni tato lan̈an cocolni cobahan̈ yin̈ hesat yet chijalnihan̈ huntek'an ti' , ¡ machoj ! Wal xin yet Comam Cristo jehan̈ yuxin chon̈tzotelan̈ yin̈ ist'in̈anil sata Comam yun̈e hech'ib yin̈ yet Comam Dios .
47012020	Chinxiwan c'uxantaxca mach lan̈ano hewatx'en haca' chiwochehan yet chinapnihan ilwal teyin̈ , yebpaxo ta mach chischah hewi' yin̈ tzet chinwatx'ehan . Chinxiwpaxojan wapnihan c'uxantaxca aytoco howal texol , maca ta chi-to-chiwa hec'ul teyin̈ hununex , maca ta ayco chichonc'ulal texol , maca ta ayex lan̈an heyinican̈ heba , maca ayex cheyal tx'oj tzoti' yin̈ hunu ebnaj juẍtaj , maca tato ayex halo k'umal cheyu , maca ta ayex chelolo'n̈e heba , maca ta ayex lan̈an hewatx'en tzet ye tu' mach toholoj .
47012021	Yet chinapnihan quexwila'an hunelxa , c'uxantaxca chintx'ixwican̈an sata Comam Dios , cat wocan ok'o teyin̈ , hex maẍtic'a chebejcano heyanico hemul , heyixli maca hewinajli , yeb huntek'an istx'ojal k'aynajextic'a hewatx'eni .
47013001	Wal xin yin̈xa yoxel chintohan quexwila'an . Hayet chinapnitu'an tzijxan̈e tzet mulehal chioc lahti' yin̈ , yaja' yilal yin̈ sat cawan̈ maca oxwan̈o testigo chicowatx'e .
47013002	Hayet inbeycanic'ojan quexwilnojan yin̈ iscayel ay huntek'an tzet intak'ecanojan teyet , yaja' chiwalpaxtojan hunelxa , waxan̈ca machijinan texol bey tu' yet chiwalnihan hune' ti' tet mac xayaco ismul yet yalan̈to tu' , yeb xin teyet hesunil . Hayet chinapnihan quexwilnotu'an xin mach chiwak' nimanc'ulalan teyin̈ .
47013003	Hac tu' chu heyohtan̈eliloj tato ha' Comam Cristo chiak'ni wipan intzotelan . Comam Cristo mach tz'ono yak'ni Comam texol , walxinto caw chisyelo yip Comam texol .
47013004	Haca' hunu mac machi yip , hac tu' yu yalaxcan̈ Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus , yaja' itzitz Comam tinan̈ yu yip Comam Dios . Hac tu' xin jehan̈ han̈on̈ti'an̈ , tz'on chijute cobahan̈ , yu hunxa jehan̈ yeb Comam , yaja' yu yip Comam yuxin itzitzon̈an̈ yeb yu comunlahan̈ texol .
47013005	Txumwelo hununex tato caw yeli ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Txumwepaxiloj tato lan̈an hech'ib yin̈ yet Comam , mato ton̈e chebalico heba yuninalo Comam Dios .
47013006	Yaja' chijochehan̈ ta cheyohtan̈eloj tato c'ul con̈elicojan̈ yet con̈heyilwenan̈ , hac tu' chu isyenilo isba tato yetxa Comam Jesucristo jehan̈ .
47013007	Caw chintxahlihan teyin̈ tet Comam Dios yun̈e hewatx'en isc'ulal , maẍtaj yu cocanan̈ c'ulal yul hesat , machoj , waxan̈ca xin mach c'ulo con̈elicojan̈ yet con̈heyilwenan̈ haca' yallaxi .
47013008	Yuto mach chisje cowatx'enan̈ istx'ojal yin̈ hune' cuybanile caw yel chal ti' , wal xin ha' jetan̈ caw ayon̈icojan̈ colwal yin̈ .
47013009	Yuxin chon̈tzalahan̈ yet machi jipan̈ , walex xin caw ay heyip , yuxin caw chicolahicojan̈ cotxahlihan̈ teyin̈ , yun̈e caw tz'ajan chexelcanico yin̈ yet Comam .
47013010	Chiwatojan hune' incartati'an teyet yalan̈to maẍto chintohan quexwila'an , haxinwal hayet chinapnitu'an mach yilalo chincachwahan teyin̈ yu wipan ak'bil yu Comam . Mach yuho quexwetanan yuxin ak'bil wiptu'an , walxinto yun̈e hech'ib yin̈ yet Comam .
47013011	Wal tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , ayojabico tzalahilal yul heyanma . Caw watx'eweco henabal yin̈ ist'in̈anil yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Iptzewe heba hununex yin̈ yet Comam . Hunxan̈ehojab henabal . Ayojab ak'anc'ulal texol . Ha'ojab Comam caw xahan ayon̈ yu yeb chiak'ni ak'anc'ulal yul janma chioc heyetbihoj .
47013012	K'ambewej hanic' heye hununex , ha' xin chiyeniloj tato xahan cheyil heba .
47013013	Chi-xin-isk'ambeto ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey ti' hanic' heye bey tu' .
47013014	Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyet , yeb xin chexxahann̈e Comam Dios , yeb ha'ojab Comam Esp'iritu Santo chioc heyetbihoj .
48001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan . Mach anmaho chejn̈einan yeb ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an , to ha' Comam Jesucristo yeb xin Comam Dios Mame , Comam ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom .
48001002	Ha' hun ebnaj juẍta ayc'o inc'atan̈an chitz'ibn̈ento hune' carta ti' wintajan teyet hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul ismajul tx'otx' Galacia .
48001003	Yak'ab Comam Dios Mame yeb Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet .
48001004	Yaco isba Comam Jesucristo yin̈ camical yu comul , yun̈e con̈iscolni tet istx'ojal hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yuto hac tu' yoche isc'ul Comam Dios Mame .
48001005	Jala'we tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
48001006	Caw chic'ay inc'ulan yuto pet heyilo heba yin̈ Comam Dios , Comam quexawten yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Jesucristo , heyoc tzujno yinta hune'xa cuybanile nan chu yalni yin̈ tzet chu cocolchahi .
48001007	Wal xin , matolo ay hunoxa cuybanile bay chon̈colchahi , machoj , walxinto ay mac chiak'ni etanoto henabal , chishelni cuybanile yet colbanile chiyak' Comam Jesucristo .
48001008	Yaja' xin tato ay hunuxa mac chi'ak'ni hunoxa nan cuybanilehal teyet yin̈ tzet chu cocolchahi , mach lahano yeb hune' ak'bilcano teyet juan̈ , caw yak'abayo Comam Dios ishowal yiban̈ , waxan̈ca han̈on̈an̈ , maca hunu naj 'angel ay yul satcan̈ .
48001009	Wal xin xatic'a walan hune' ti' teyet , yaj chiwalpaxojan hunelxa , tato ay hunu mac chiec' halno hunuxa nan cuybanile texol yin̈ tzet chu cocolchahi , mach lahano xin yeb hune' chabilxa heyu , ayojab istz'acti' Comam Dios yiban̈ hune' mac lek'ti' tu' .
48001010	Yet chiwalnitojan hune' ti' , mach chiwocan yin̈ tato chitzala anma win̈an maca mach xin , walxinto ha' istzala Comam Dios win̈an ha' chinsayan , yuto ta ha' istzala anma win̈an ha' chinsayan , mach ischejabo Comam Jesucristo wehan yin̈ haca' tu' .
48001011	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chiwak'canojan heyohtan̈eloj tato hune' cuybanile yet colbanile chiwalic'ojan , mach anmaho ay yet .
48001012	Mach anmaho ak'n̈e wetan , yeb xin mach yin̈o hunu anma cuybililo wuhan , wal xin ha' Comam Jesucristo ak'n̈e wohtan̈elojan .
48001013	Hex ti' , heyabemi yallaxi tato yet yalan̈tocanoj , yet ayintocojan yin̈ isreligi'on ebnaj wet con̈ob Israelan , caw ec'ya' macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios wuhan . Caw xin wak'lenan intan̈tzenilojan .
48001014	Yin̈ isreligi'on ebnaj wet con̈obtu'an , haninan caw ec'na ayincan̈an yiban̈ sunil ebnaj wet ch'iboman , yuto caw ec'na chinyijehan sunil tzet iswatx'e ebnaj jichmam .
48001015	Yaj xin , ha' sak'alil isc'ul Comam Dios quinsic'nilojan yet yalan̈to maẍto chinpitzc'ahan , quinyawtenicojan Comam munlaho yin̈ ismunil . Haxa yet yapni istiempohal haca'tic'a chal isc'ul Comam , yak'ni Comam isc'ahol wohtan̈elojan yun̈e walnic'ojan Tzoti' yet colbanile xol anma mach Israeloj . Yet hunel tu' xin , machi hunu mac tet quinbeyan ink'ambe'an .
48001016	
48001017	Mach quinbeypaxic'ojan bey yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ink'ambe'an tet ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us babel ocna insatajan . Wal xin caw yin̈ an̈e quintohan yul ismajul tx'otx' Arabia , lahwi tu' xin inpaxtijan yul ismajul tx'otx' Damasco .
48001018	Yet lahwi oxeb habil xin , intohan wilnojan naj Pedro yul con̈ob Jerusal'en ; holan̈eb tz'ayic ayinan isc'atan̈ naj bey tu' .
48001019	Yet hunel tu' , machi hunuxa ebnaj ischejab Comam Jes'us wilan yin̈ , cachann̈ech'an naj Jacobo , naj yuẍta Comam Jes'us .
48001020	Yin̈ sat Comam Dios chiwalan teyet tato caw yel tzet chintz'ibn̈etojan teyet ti' .
48001021	Lahwi tu' xin , intohan yulaj ismajul tx'otx' Siria yeb yul ismajul tx'otx' Cilicia .
48001022	Wal ebnaj juẍta ay yul hunun con̈ob yul ismajul Judea tu' , maẍto ohtabilojinan yu ebnaj .
48001023	Isk'umalixto chiyabe ebnaj haca' ti' : " Hune' naj caw chicajwa jin̈ yet yalan̈tocanoj , tinan̈ chiec' naj yala'c'o cuybanile yin̈ tzet chu janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios , hune' yoche isc'ul naj istan̈tzeloj , " ẍi ebnaj .
48001024	Yu hune' tu' yuxinto caw chitzala isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios wuhan .
48002001	Yin̈xa iscan̈lahon̈eb habil intohan bey Jerusal'en yeb juẍta Bernab'e , yebpaxo juẍta Tito .
48002002	Quinbeyc'ojan , yuto Comam Dios halni wetan tato chintohan . Hayet ayinan bey Jerusal'en tu' , cocutxbanayo cobahan̈ yeb ebnaj chiijbali xol ebnaj juẍtaj , walnihan tet ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile yet colbanile chiwalic'ojan xol anma mach Israeloj . Walan hune' ti' tet ebnaj yun̈e isnanilo ebnaj tato t'in̈an wehicojan , yeb xin ta mach nabn̈eho chinmunlahan .
48002003	Ha' hun juẍta Tito tzujan jintajan̈ waxan̈ca griego yic'al naj , yaja' machi hunu mac ischilba yalni tato masan chiyak' circuncidar isba naj .
48002004	Waxan̈ca xin ay huntek'an ebnaj ton̈e chal isba yuninalo Comam Dios , oc ebnaj coxolan̈ yun̈e yoc ebnaj yilno hune' cocolbanil yin̈ Comam Jesucristo ; yuto yoche ebnaj chon̈meltzohan̈ hunelxa yalan̈ isya'tajil isley naj Mois'es .
48002005	Yaj xin , caw maẍtic'a nino jabetojan̈ tzet yal ebnaj yuto caw chijochehan̈ ta ayn̈etic'aco isyelal hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile ti' teyin̈ .
48002006	Yet walnihan sunil cuybanile tu' , caw machi hunuxa ac' ak'laxcano incuyu'an yu ebnaj ijbalom tu' . Ha' tzet ye ebnaj yet yalan̈tocanoj , caw machi wocan yin̈ , yuto yul sat Comam Dios caw lahanon̈n̈e cosunil .
48002007	Machi hunuxa nan cuybanile ahti yul isti' ebnaj , wal xin caw istxum ebnaj tato ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an yin̈ walnic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Dios xol anma mach Israeloj , haca' yu yalaxico naj Pedro munlaho xol wet con̈ob Israelan .
48002008	Ha'tic'a Comam Dios ak'n̈e ishelanil naj Pedro yoc cuywal xol anma Israel , ha'tic'apaxo Comam ak'n̈e inhelanilan wocan cuywal xol anma mach Israeloj .
48002009	Yuxin juẍta Jacobo , yeb juẍta Pedro , yeb xin juẍta Juan , ayco ijbalo yin̈ ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , caw txumchalo yu ebnaj tato Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an yin̈ weltojan walnoc'ojan Istzoti' Comam Dios xol anma mach Israeloj . Ha' hune' ti' yeniloj tato con̈ischahan̈ ebnaj yetbihoj . Yak'ni ebnaj isk'ab wetan yeb xin tet juẍta Bernab'e , caw xin chitzala isc'ul ebnaj ta chon̈munlahan̈ xol anma mach Israeloj , walpaxo ebnaj xin xol anma Israel cancano ebnaj munil .
48002010	Cachan hune' ti' yal ebnaj jetan̈ , tato yilal conanitijan̈ ebnaj meba' , hune' tu' nabiltic'a wuhan inwatx'enan .
48002011	Yet yapni juẍta Pedro yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia , incachan juẍta yin̈ sat sunil ebnaj juẍtaj , yuto maẍtaj istoholal chiswatx'e juẍta tu' .
48002012	Yuto yet yalan̈to maẍto chiapni huntek'an ebnaj chejbil yu juẍta Jacobo , juẍta Pedro tu' chiwa' xol ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios mach Israeloj . Haxa yet yapni ebnaj tu' xin , niẍtejal ishitzilo naj , ispohnilo isba naj xol ebnaj mach Israelo tu' yu xiwcan̈ naj tet ebnaj chalni ta yilal yak'lax circuncidar ebnaj mach Israeloj .
48002013	Aypaxo xin ebnaj juẍta Israel oc tzujno yinta tzet isbeybaln̈e juẍta Pedro tu' , hacpax tu' juẍta Bernab'e isbeybaln̈epaxo naj hune' sucal tu' .
48002014	Yuxin hayet wilnihan tato mach chisyije ebnaj haca' yalni Tzoti' yet colbanile , walnihan tet juẍta Pedro yin̈ sat sunil ebnaj cutxanico tu' : " Wal hach ti' Israel hach , yaja' chachec' haca' anma mach Israeloj , yaja' tinan̈ xin ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxinto chawal tet ebnaj mach Israeloj tato yilal chic'o ebnaj isbeybal anma Israel ? " quinchiyan tet juẍta tu' .
48002015	Wal han̈on̈ Israel jic'al ti' , mach yic'alo huntek'anxa nan con̈obal chihallax mulumal jehi .
48002016	Yaj xin johtaj tato machi hunu mac chican c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isley naj Mois'es , wal xin chican anma c'ulal , yaja' cachann̈e yu yanico yanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Hacon̈ tu' han̈on̈ ti' xajayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yuxin xacon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , maẍtaj yu coyijen tzet chal ley . Wal xin caw machi hunu mac chican c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isyijen tzet chal isley naj Mois'es .
48002017	Tato chicosay joc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu yip Comam Jesucristo , chal yelapnoj ta mulumon̈ haca' anma mach Israeloj . Yaja' ¿ tom ha' Comam Jesucristo chon̈anico mulumal ? ¡ Machoj !
48002018	K'inalo tato chinmeltzohan wintajan , lahwi tu' cat wocan inwatx'enpaxojan sunil tzet bejbilcano wuhan yet payxa , han-caw-inan chiwaco inmulan yin̈ haca' tu' .
48002019	Wal haninti'an camnajinxalojan yin̈ ley . Ha' hune' ley tu' quinak'ni camojan yun̈e caw witzitzbilojan yin̈ Comam Dios .
48002020	Wal tinan̈ , ha' yul sat Comam Dios , t'un̈aninxacan̈an yin̈ te' culus , yuxin matxatajinan itzitzinan tinan̈ , haxa Comam Jesucristo itzitz win̈an . Ha' tzet chinwatx'ehan tinan̈ xin cachann̈e wanico wanmahan yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam Dios , ha' chiwuhan . Caw isyelo Comam ta xahan ayinan yu , yuto yak' camo isba win̈an .
48002021	Mach chicoyah isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios . Wal xin ta yu coyijen ley yuxin chon̈can c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , caw nabn̈em cam Comam Jesucristo chal tu' .
48003001	Hex ah Galacia hex ti' , caw suquex . ¿ Mac ak'ni etanoto henabal yuxin mach cheyije cuybanile caw yeli ? Han̈on̈ti'an̈ xajalan̈ teyet yin̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus haca'ojtam caw heyil iscam Comam .
48003002	Tinan̈ xin , han̈c'an̈e hune' ti' chink'ambehan teyet : ¿ Tom hechah Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yu heyijen isley naj Mois'es , mato yu heyayto hune' cuybanile yet colbanile yul heyanma ?
48003003	¿ Tom caw huneln̈e machi hewi' ? Hayet heyoc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo ha' oc heyetbihoj . Haxa tinan̈ xin ¿ tom cheyoche chetz'ajba hecolbanil yu tzet chewatx'e cheyute heyalni ?
48003004	Caw tzetc'a isya'tajil heyil yu ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , yaja' etza caw nabn̈e . Hantam sak'al ta mach nabn̈eho heyil isya'tajil tu' .
48003005	Yak' Comam Dios Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet , isyenipaxo c'aybalc'ule coxol . Yaja' ¿ tzet yu cheyabeco ti' ? Mach yuho coyijen isley naj Mois'es ; walxinto yu janico janma yin̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile ak'bil jet .
48003006	Haca' icham Abraham , yayto icham yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxinto oc icham c'ulal yul sat Comam .
48003007	Yuxin tinan̈ yilal heyohtan̈encanilo mac yeli titna yin̈ yuninal icham Abraham , to han̈c'an̈e mac chayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios .
48003008	Yet payat tiempo tu' , tz'ibn̈ebilcanayo yul Yum Comam Dios tato ebnaj mach Israeloj chican ebnaj c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yuto chayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam . Yuxinto halbilcano hune' tzoti' ti' tet icham Abraham , bay chala : " Hawu yuxinto caw sunil anma yulajla con̈ob bay chiwak'an isc'ulal inc'ulan , " ẍiayoj .
48003009	Yuxin macn̈etic'a chichahnayto Istzoti' Comam yul yanma , ha' hun chichahni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam yinta icham Abraham , yuto ha' icham babel chahnayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
48003010	Sunil huntek'an anma ayco yanma yin̈ isley naj Mois'es , chitit ishowal Comam Dios yin̈ , haca' yalni yul Yum Comam bay chala : " Chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈ huntek'an anma mach chik'oji isyijen sunil ley tz'ibn̈ebilcanayo yul Yum Comam , " ẍiayoj .
48003011	Yuxinto haban cotxumni tato machi huno anma chicancano c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu isyijen tzet chal ley , yuto chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti' : " Ha' mac xacan c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yin̈n̈e Comam ayco yanma , yuxin ay isk'inal mach istan̈bal , " ẍiayoj .
48003012	Wal isley naj Mois'es tu' , matzet chala tato yilal cochahnayto yul janma yin̈ cat cochahni cok'inal mach istan̈bal . To ha' coyijeni ha' chischilba yalni jet , yuto chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti' : " Macn̈etic'a chiyijen sunil tzet chal ley , ay isk'inal , " ẍiayoj .
48003013	Yaja' xin Comam Jesucristo coln̈ehon̈ilo yalan̈ isya'tajil hune' ley tu' , yanico isba Comam yalan̈ isya'tajil coseleloj . Yuxinto chal yul Yum Comam Dios : " Caw tz'acti'n̈ebil mac chiah locno yin̈ hunu te' culus , " ẍiayoj .
48003014	Hac tu' xin yak'le Comam Jesucristo yun̈e sunil anma mach Israeloj chichahnipaxo isc'ulal isc'ul Comam , hune' haltebil tet icham Abraham . Hac tu' xin cosunil chicochah Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yu chijayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , hune' haltebilcano yu Comam .
48003015	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , chiwacojan hune' yechel ti' teyet . Haca' yet ay hunu mac chiwatx'en huno istrato , chaco isbi yin̈ yumal hune' trato tu' , hac tu' xin caw t'in̈an chucanoj . Caw matxa hunuxa mac chiyu yetantoj , yeb xin machi hunu mac chiyu yanipaxico yak'bil .
48003016	Hac tu' yu iswatx'encano Comam Dios hune' istrato tet jichmam Abraham yeb tet isc'ahol . Mach chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Tet sunil hac'ahol , " mach ẍioj . Wal xin caw mach tx'i'alo yute yalni , ha' yute yallaxcano tet icham Abraham tu' tato hune'n̈e , chalni haca' ti' : " Hac'ahol , " ẍicanoj . Hune' tu' yin̈ Comam Jesucristo chitzoteli .
48003017	Ha' chal yelapno hune' chiwalti'an , to iswatx'e Comam Dios istrato yeb icham Abraham , caw xin t'in̈an yutecano Comam . Cuatro ciento treinta habilxa iswatx'encano Comam hune' istrato tu' yul isley naj Mois'es , yuxin caw mach chu istan̈tzenilo isley naj Mois'es tu' tzet haltebilcano yu Comam , yeb xin mach chu yinilo yip .
48003018	Yaj tato yu coyijen ley , yuxinto yak' Comam Dios hune' haltebil jet , caw machim chiyu jalni tato matanil ye hune' tu' . Wal xin haltebil tet icham Abraham yu Comam yin̈ yak'nicano ismatanoj .
48003019	Yuxin ¿ tzet chiocnico isley naj Mois'es chal tu' ? Wal xin caw tzujanxa ak'lax hune' ley tu' yun̈e isyeniloj tato mach yijemo anma . Ak'lax hune' ley tu' masanto yet ispitzc'a hune' mac titna yin̈ yuninal icham Abraham , hune' mac ay yet ischahni tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios . Hune' ley tu' , 'angel ebnaj ak'n̈e tet naj Mois'es yun̈e yalnilto naj tet con̈ob Israel .
48003020	Yaja' matxa yilalo ay hunuxa mac chioc xolbal , yuto hune'xan̈e mac yak'cano istrato , ha' ton Comam Dios .
48003021	¿ Tom xin caw chicajwa isley naj Mois'es yin̈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios chal tu' ? ¡ Machoj ! K'inalo tato chik'oji ley tu' yak'ni cok'inal , ¿ chimyu joc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu coyijen tzet chal ley ? Wal xin machoj .
48003022	Chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Caw sunil mac ayicto yalan̈ mule , yuxin macta chiyaco yanma yin̈ tzet chal Comam Jesucristo chischah tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios , " ẍiayoj .
48003023	Yet yalan̈to maẍto chihul hune' mac bay wal janico janma , caw yalan̈ yip ley ayon̈ictoj , yet ayon̈ico jechman isyelax mac bay chijaco janma .
48003024	Yuxin ha' hune' ley tu' jilomaln̈e yehi , haca' chu yilni hunu naj chejab hunu nich'an unin , hac tu' con̈isbeytzenti ley tu' isc'atan̈ Comam Jesucristo , yun̈e janico janma yin̈ Comam , cat xin joccano c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios .
48003025	Yaj xin xajaco janma yin̈ Comam tinan̈ , yuxin matxa ayon̈oco yul isk'ab hune' ley chi-tic'a-con̈ijbani .
48003026	Yu xaheyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , yuxinto yuninalxa Comam Dios heye tinan̈ .
48003027	Hayet yahcano ha' hewi' hehunicanico yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , haxa Comam ayco haca' xilk'apehal teyin̈ .
48003028	Caw xin machi yoc yin̈ tato Israel maca mach Israeloj . Caw matxa yoc yin̈ ta winaj maca ix , yuto caw hunxan̈e je yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
48003029	Yuxin tato ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , caw haca' yuninal icham Abraham jehi , ha' hunon̈ chicochah tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios tet icham Abraham tu' .
48004001	Ay hunxa yechel chiwalan teyet . K'inalo hunu nich'an unin chischah ismajul tet ismam , caw yahawil chuco yin̈ tzet ay ismam tu' , yaj xin yet nich'anto caw maẍto yip yin̈ tzet chiak'lax ismajulo tu' , to haca' to chejab yehi .
48004002	Yet nich'anto ay mac chitan̈eni , yeb xin ilbiltopaxo hune' ismajul tu' masanto yet ch'apni istiempohal bay halbilcano yu ismam , cat yoccano yahawo yin̈ ismajul tu' .
48004003	Caw xin hac tu' je han̈on̈ ti' ; yet yalan̈tocanoj ayon̈ayo yalan̈ yip sunil tzet chal anma .
48004004	Haxa yet yijni isba yapni istiempohal xin , yaniti Comam Dios Isc'ahol , pitzc'ana yin̈ hune' ix ix yalan̈ yip isley naj Mois'es .
48004005	Hul Comam yun̈e con̈yinilo yalan̈ ley , yeb yun̈e con̈ischahni Comam Dios yuninaloj .
48004006	Yun̈e isyenilo Comam tato caw yuninalxa Comam jehi , yuxin yati Comam Yesp'iritu Isc'ahol yul janma . Yu Yesp'iritu Comam tu' yuxinto chijal tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunil janma haca' ti' : " Mam , " con̈chi , yin̈ caw sunil coc'ul .
48004007	Wal tinan̈ xin , matxa chejabo jehi , to caw yuninalxa Comam jehi . Yu hune' tu' xin , caw el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios yak'ni hune' comatan , yaj yu Comam Jesucristo , Isc'ahol Comam tu' .
48004008	Yet yalan̈to tu' yet maẍto cheyohtan̈elo Comam Dios , caw chejab heyehico tet huntek'an chal anma diosalil . Wal xin , caw mach dioso huntek'an tu' .
48004009	Tinan̈ xin , heyohtaxa Comam Dios sic'lebil , chiwalpaxojan teyet tato caw ohtabilexxapaxo yu Comam . ¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxinto chexmeltzopaxto yin̈ huntek'anxa nan cuybanilehal caw mach t'in̈ano yehicoj , cat heyocpaxo ischejabo hunelxa ?
48004010	Walex hex ti' , cheyije k'in̈ chiec'tzelax yin̈ isbi tz'ayic , yeb yin̈ isbi ixahaw , yeb yet chishelni isba tiempo , yeb k'in̈ chiec'tzelax yin̈ hunun habil .
48004011	¡ Caw chioc yin̈ inc'ulan yet chinnanitijan , wak'a tato caw nabn̈e quinmunlahan texol !
48004012	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , caw chiwalan teyet , lahanojab cheyute henabal haca' innabalan , yuto yet wec'an texol wute innabalan haca' hex . Wal xin matolo yu ay hunu istx'ojal heyute win̈an yuxin hac tu' walnitojan teyet , machoj .
48004013	Wal xin caw heyohtaxa ta hayet babelal , yet walnic'ojan cuybanile yet colbanile teyet caw ya'ayinan yu hune' yabil .
