48004014	Ha' hune' yabil tu' , caw ilwebal teyin̈ , yaja' mach quinhehinc'uln̈ehan , mach xin quinheman̈c'otojan yu hune' yabil tu' . Wal xin caw haca' hunu ischejab Comam Dios satcan̈ , hac tu' yu quinhechahnihan , yeb haca' caw Comam Jesucristo .
48004015	¿ Tzet yin̈ yuxin matxa hune' tzalahilal tu' yul heyanma tinan̈ ? Chiwalan hune' isc'ulal ti' teyin̈ , hex ti' caw heyoche heyilti isbak' hesat heyak'ni wetan yu isc'ulch'anil hec'ul win̈an .
48004016	Wal tinan̈ xin , ¿ tom ayco inhowalan teyin̈ yet chiwalnitojan isyelal ti' teyet ?
48004017	Ha' huntek'an anma chexmonten tu' , caw ayco yanma ebnaj teyin̈ , yaja' xin caw mach c'ulo nabil teyin̈ yu ebnaj . Ton̈e choche ebnaj quexyik'alo coxolan̈ yun̈e heyanico heyanma yin̈ ebnaj .
48004018	Caw c'ul janico anma yin̈ coc'ul , yaja' tan̈e c'ul chiconaco yin̈ , yeb tato istoholal nabil ju . Aytam sak'al ta hac tu' chinheyutehan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , maẍn̈etaj yet ayinan tec'atan̈ chinheyanicojan yin̈ hec'ul .
48004019	Hex ti' caw haca' wuninalan heyehi , lan̈an yec'ya' wanmahan hunelxa heyu , haca' hunu ix ix chiaben isya'il yet chiwatx'i isc'ul . Yaj mach chisbej wabenan hune' isya'tajil ti' masanto chiwatx'icanico Comam Jesucristo teyin̈ .
48004020	Majal ayinan texol tinan̈ yun̈e insaynihan hunuxa tzet chiyu intzotelan teyet . Wal xin caw c'aynajilo inc'ulan teyin̈ .
48004021	Maquex chexmeltzopaxto heyijen tzet chal isley naj Mois'es heyalni , halwe wetan : ¿ Tom caw maẍto bay cheyabe tzet chal hune' ley tu' ?
48004022	Chal yul Yum Comam Dios tato ay cawan̈ isc'ahol icham Abraham ; hune' naj yeb ix Agar , ix chejab ; hune'xa naj xin yeb ix Sara , ix caw yixal icham Abraham tu' ; ix Sara tu' mach chejabo ix .
48004023	Naj Ismael , yunin ix Agar , mach c'aybalo c'ule yu ispitzc'a naj . Wal naj Isaac , yunin ix Sara , c'aybalc'ule yu ispitzc'a naj yu Comam Dios , yuto caw ixnamxa ix yet ispitzc'a naj , yun̈e yijni isba tzet haltebilcano yu Comam Dios yin̈ naj .
48004024	Ha' cawan̈ ebix tu' , yechel cabeb istrato Comam Dios ye ebix . Ix Agar , ix meba' yehi , yechel hune' trato iswatx'e Comam Dios bey iswi' witz Sina'i , yuxinto sunil macta ayco yin̈ hune' trato tu' , haca' ta pitzc'ana yu yoc chejaboj .
48004025	Ix Agar tu' , yechel istrato Comam Dios yak' tet naj Mois'es bey witz Sina'i yul ismajul Arabia , yechelpaxo con̈ob Jerusal'en ye ix . Anma ay yul con̈ob Jerusal'en tu' , ayco yalan̈ ley ak'bil bey iswi' witz Sina'i .
48004026	Wal hune'xa istrato Comam Dios xin , yechel ix Sara yixal icham Abraham yehi , yuto mach chejabo ye ix yalan̈ ley . Yaja' wal hune' Jerusal'en ay yul satcan̈ , mach ayoco yalan̈ chejbanile , han̈on̈ ti' xin yuninal jehi .
48004027	Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios : Hach ix machi hawunin , yeb maẍtic'a chil yin̈ hunu yunin , tzalahan̈ . Awan̈ yin̈ tzalahilal hach maẍtic'a hawohtajo isya'tajil ispitzc'a niẍte unin , yuto ha' ix ix hinbilcanoj caw tx'i'alto yunin ix sata ix ay yichamil , ẍiayoj .
48004028	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , hex ti' haca' naj Isaac heyehi , uninale halbilcano yu Comam Dios ta chipitzc'ahi .
48004029	Yet payxa tu' naj mach c'aybalc'ule yu ispitzc'ahi , caw caj yil naj naj pitzc'a yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo . Haca' yu iscajlax naj Isaac yu naj Ismael , hac tu' xin yepaxo tinan̈ .
48004030	Yaja' ¿ tzet ẍi yul Yum Comam Dios ? Wal xin chal haca' ti' : " Tzumbeto ix chejab yeb yunin , yuto naj yunin ix tu' , caw mach chu yak'ni cabo isba naj yin̈ tzettaj chischah naj yunin ix mach chejaboj , " ẍiayoj .
48004031	Yuxin , hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , wal han̈on̈ ti' mach yuninalo ix chejab jehi , to yuninal ix mach chejaboj .
48005001	Comam Jesucristo coln̈ehon̈ilo yalan̈ yip isley naj Mois'es , yuxin colbilon̈xa . Yuxin tinan̈ lin̈bawe heba yin̈ hecolbanil tu' , caw matxa chexmeltzo heyak'acto heba yalan̈ ley tu' hunelxa .
48005002	Wal hanin Pablo inti'an , caw chiwalcanojan teyet tato cheyije hechahni hune' circuncisi'on , caw matzet chal yelapno Comam Jesucristo teyin̈ .
48005003	Caw chiwalpaxcanojan teyet , macxan̈etic'a chiyijen ischahni hune' circuncisi'on tu' , caw yilal isyijenpaxo sunil tzet chal isley naj Mois'es .
48005004	Maquex chesayilo heyoc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu heyijen tzet chal ley , xaheheq'uilo heba yin̈ Comam Cristo yeb yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios .
48005005	Wal han̈on̈ ti' , yu Yesp'iritu Comam Dios ayco jin̈ , yuxinto caw chijaco yin̈ janma tato chon̈oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yu chijaco janma yin̈ Comam .
48005006	Yuto han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , caw matxa tzet chaliloj ta ayco maca mach ayco hune' circuncisi'on jin̈ , wal xin ha' hune' caw yilal ha' ton janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam , hac tu' xin caw xahan chijil jet anmahil .
48005007	Hex ti' , caw t'in̈anxatic'a heyehicoj . ¿ Mac oc ak'oc'ule teyet yuxinto matxa cheyije sunil cuybanile caw tohol yehicoj ?
48005008	Ha' hune' montebal oc teyet tu' , mach yeto Comam Dios yehi .
48005009	Naweti hune' chihallax haca' ti' : " Caw hanic'n̈ech'an yan̈al ixim pan chiak'ni sipc'aho sunil ixim harina , " ẍi .
48005010	Haninti'an chicawxi inc'ulan yin̈ Comam Dios tato mach nano chiyu hetxumnilo sunil cuybanile chiwaltoti'an . Wal mac chioc ak'oc'ule teyet yin̈ heyetanto heba tu' xin , caw chiay isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios , mach chiyoc yin̈ macxan̈etic'a anmahil .
48005011	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , ta ha' jak'ni circuncidar coba chinec'an wala'c'ojan , caw machim chitit ishowal ebnaj Israel win̈an . Caw matxam xin yelapno chucano iscamical Comam Jesucristo wuhan , hac tu' xin matxam chioc ebnaj iscaja' isba yin̈ . Wal xin ha' hune' cuybanile yin̈ iscamical Comam ha' chiak'ni chiwaho isc'ul ebnaj win̈an .
48005012	¡ Ha' ebnaj ch'ec' ak'oc'ule ta cheyak' circuncidar heba , k'a'c'ulmi ta wiyom ishosnilo ebnaj yetbi isnimanil tu' yin̈ huneln̈e !
48005013	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , caw awtebilex yu hecollaxcanoj , yaja' maẍtaj yu hewatx'en sunil ismachiswalilal choche isc'ul henimanil . Ha' wal heyuten heba to cheyak'le cheja' heba teyet hununex , yun̈e heyeniloj tato caw xahan cheyil heba .
48005014	Wal xin sunil tzet chal ley hunxan̈ech'an chejbanilehal chucanoj , chalni haca' ti' : " Xahan chawil hawet anmahil , haca' haya'iln̈en haba , " ẍiayoj .
48005015	Caw nann̈e heyu , yuto ta chexoc hechile heba cat hec'utxlenayto heba , hex cawex cheyetato heba yin̈ haca' tu' .
48005016	Chiwalan teyet hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , beybaln̈ewe haca' tzet choche Comam Esp'iritu . Mach cheyak' yub istx'ojal choche henimanil .
48005017	Sunil istx'ojal choche conimanil iswatx'e' , chicajwa yin̈ tzet choche Comam Esp'iritu Santo , hacpax tu' Comam Esp'iritu chicajwa yin̈ istx'ojal choche conimanil iswatx'e' . Yuxin chiscajle isba Comam Esp'iritu Santo yeb sunil istx'ojal choche conimanil iswatx'e' . Chiscajle isba hunun , yuxinto mach chu hewatx'en tzet choche hec'ul .
48005018	Yaj tato ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chexijbani , caw matxa ayexocto yalan̈ yip ley tu' .
48005019	Caw ixtan̈ ye sunil istx'ojal chi-to-iswatx'e anma tzujan yinta tzet choche isnimanil ; chiixli , chiwinajli , chiswatx'en tzettaj tx'ixobal , chisk'aytzenico istx'ojal jin̈ .
48005020	Chiay jahno sata tioẍ , chiscunn̈e yet anmahil , caw chichiwa isc'ul yin̈ yet anmahil , howaln̈etic'a chu , ton̈etic'a chichichon isc'ul , chaco ishowal yin̈ yet anmahil . Tx'ojn̈etic'a chu istxumni , chaco pohlebahil cat isbosnilo isba .
48005021	Mach choche yila' tzet ay yet anmahil , chismak'camo yet anmahil , uc'um te' , istzann̈etic'a yanico isba xol huntek'an k'in̈ machiswalil , yeb pek' chute isba . Caw xin aytopaxo huntek'an lahan yeb huntek'an ti' chito iswatx'e . Caw xa-tic'a-walan teyet yet yalan̈tocanoj , mac chiuten huntek'an ti' , mach chiapni isc'atan̈ Comam Dios .
48005022	Wal sunil tzet chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo cowatx'e' ; ha' coxahann̈en coba , tzalahilal , ak'anc'ulal , nimanc'ulal , huncuentan̈e coc'ul , isc'ulch'anil coc'ul , yeb xin janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam .
48005023	Jinayo coba , cocachni coba yin̈ istx'ojal . Ha' huntek'an ti' machi ley chu iscachwa yin̈ .
48005024	Yuxinto sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , caw xa'isbejcano beybale ik'biltic'a yu , yeb tzet choche yanma , yeb sunil istx'ojal choche isnimanil , huntek'an tu' xaelcano yu iscamical Comam yin̈ culus .
48005025	Wal xin yu ayxaco Comam Esp'iritu Santo jin̈ , yuxin caw ec'ojon̈we haca' choche isc'ul Comam .
48005026	Mach lolo'o chijute coba , mach chon̈buchwa jin̈ hununon̈ , yeb xin machojab chichiwa coc'ul jin̈ .
48006001	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , tato cheyila ta ay huno ebnaj juẍta chiayc'ay yin̈ hunu mule , haxa hex yijomex tet Comam Esp'iritu Santo , colwahan̈we yin̈ heyinican̈ . Yaj chewchotan̈e chu hetzotel tet , caw nann̈e heyu , c'uxantaxca heyalaxpaxico yin̈ hunu ilwebal .
48006002	Wal xin colwahan̈we teyin̈ yin̈ ej isya'tajil chul teyiban̈ , hac tu' xin chu heyijen isley Comam Jesucristo .
48006003	Tato ay mac chihalni ta caw ay yelapno yehi , yaja' xin machi nino yelapnoj , caw ha'tic'a chak' subchaho isba ischuquil .
48006004	Yuxin yilal jilni yin̈ tzet chicobeybaln̈e hununon̈ , ta c'ul tzet chicobeybaln̈e tu' jak'a' tzalaho coc'ul , machojab tzet chalico coc'ul yin̈ hunuxa maca .
48006005	Wal xin caw nananta jalni tet Comam yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e hununon̈ .
48006006	Ha' mac chichahni cuybanile yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios , yak'ab hanic'o tzet ay yul isk'ab tet mac chicuyni tu' .
48006007	Mach cheyak' subchaho heba , yuto machi hunu mac chu yetlico yin̈ Comam Dios . Ha' tzet chicotz'unu , ha' chicohatx'paxoj .
48006008	Tato ha' istx'ojal tzet choche janma chicowatx'e , ha'tic'a camical chicochah ispajoj . Wal tato ha' tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu Santo chicowatx'e , ha' k'inal mach istan̈bal chicochah tet Comam Esp'iritu .
48006009	Yuxin caw machojab chon̈siquilo cowatx'en sunil isc'ulal , yuto ta mach chon̈pax jintaj caw chi-tic'a-cochah ispaj sunil isc'ulal chicowatx'e .
48006010	Yuxin cowatx'ewe isc'ulal yin̈ jet anmahil hatatic'a hanta chon̈k'oji , yaj ec'balto yilal cocolwa yin̈ macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
48006011	¡ Ilwec'anabi , han-caw-inan chintz'ibn̈etojan ichamta tz'ib ti' teyet !
48006012	Ebnaj chischilba yalni teyet tato caw yilal heyak'ni circuncidar heba , to yun̈e yoccano ebnaj c'ulal yul sat anma yuxin chal ebnaj , yeb yun̈e mach chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma ebnaj yinta ebnaj chihalnic'o iscamical Comam Jesucristo .
48006013	Ebnaj chichahni circuncisi'on tu' , caw maẍtic'a chik'oji ebnaj isyijen tzet chal ley , yaja' chischilba ebnaj yalni teyet tato yilal heyak'ni circuncidar heba , yun̈e yoc iswinajil ebnaj yet cheyijen yechel circuncisi'on yin̈ henimanil .
48006014	Walinan xin , caw matxa hunuxa baytet yin̈ wal wanico inwinajilan , cachann̈ech'an yin̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus . Yuxin caw camominxahan yin̈ sunil ismachiswalilal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Haxa hune' sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , camnaxapaxilo win̈an yu iscamical Comam Cristo .
48006015	Caw matxa tzet chal yelapnoj ta chahbilxa circuncisi'on ju maca machoj , ha' hune' caw aycano yip to pitzc'anajon̈xa yin̈ iscayelal yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
48006016	Yak'ab Comam Dios ak'anc'ulal , yeb xin tz'ayojab isc'ul Comam yin̈ sunil mac tzujan yinta hune' cuybanile ti' , ha' ton huntek'an mac tu' caw Israel , iscon̈ob Comam Dios yin̈ caw isyelal .
48006017	Wal yin̈ tiempo chito insatati'an xin , matxa chiwochehan chinetalaxan , yuto ayxaco islut'al innimanilan yu anma . Ha' xin chiyeniloj tato caw ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan .
48006018	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , yak'abayo Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ hesunil . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
49001001	Hanin , Pablo inti'an , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan , yuto hac tu' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios . Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' hum ti' teyet , hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios bey yul con̈ob Efeso , hex xahechah Comam Dios yin̈ heyanma .
49001002	Yak'abayo Comam Dios Mame yeb xin Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal texol .
49001003	Jala'we tzoti' c'ul tet Comam Dios , Ismam Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , yuto caw tx'i'al isc'ulal isc'ul Comam xayak' jet , huntek'an isc'ulal chiyak' tet janma chitit yul satcan̈ yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo .
49001004	Yet yalan̈tocanoj yet maẍto chiwatx'i hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yoc yin̈ isnabal Comam Dios con̈iscolnicano yu Comam Jesucristo , joccano yeto Comam Dios yeb matxa nino comul yul sat .
49001005	Caw chon̈yoche Comam Dios yuxinto caw yettax payat con̈issic'nicanilo yu Comam Jesucristo , yun̈e joccano yuninalo Comam ; haca'tic'a caw el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios .
49001006	Yu hune' tu' yuxinto chijaco ismay Comam Dios yu issak'alil isc'ulch'anil isc'ul . Xayak' Comam isc'ulal isc'ul jet yu Isc'ahol caw xahan ay yu .
49001007	Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yuxin ay cocolbanil , yu ischiq'uil Isc'ahol malto yin̈ te' culus yak'nicano tan̈o sunil comul .
49001008	Caw isyelo Comam isc'ulal isc'ul jet yuto yak'cano Comam cohelanil , yak'nipaxo Comam conabal .
49001009	Caw yak' Comam johtan̈elo yin̈ tzet nabil yu , hune' ewantic'a yehi . Hune' isc'ulal tu' caw nabilxatic'a yu Comam iswatx'en yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
49001010	Hune' nabiltic'a yu Comam Dios tu' , t'in̈an yijni isba yin̈ istz'ayical bay halbilcanoj yu Comam , tato chishunbaco Comam sunil tzet ay yul satcan̈ , yeb sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , cat iscancano yalan̈ yip Comam Jesucristo .
49001011	Yuxinto caw yalan̈to con̈issic'lencano Comam Dios , yun̈e cochahni comajul yinta Comam Jesucristo , haca'tic'a nabil yu Comam Dios . Ha' Comam Dios tu' , ha' caw chiak'ni yija' isba yin̈ej tzet caw chi-tic'a-yal isc'ul .
49001012	Hac tu' xin yute Comam yun̈e han̈on̈ babel cochayto Comam Jesucristo yul janma chicoyelo ishelanil yip Comam Dios .
49001013	Yebpaxo hex ti' , yet heyaben isyelal cuybanile yet colbanile heyanayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Hac tu' yu hehunicanico yin̈ Comam , yak'lax Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ heyanma , Comam haltebilcanoj . Ha' xin caw chiyeniloj tato hex ti' yetxa Comam Dios heyehi .
49001014	Yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo ayxaco jin̈ yuxin johtaj tato caw yeli chak' Comam Dios comatan . Yet chijni isba yak'ni Comam Dios iscolbanil sunil anma yetxatic'a yehi yu yalaxic'o ismay Comam yu ishelanil .
49001015	Abebilxa wuhan tato caw ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , yeb ta caw xahan cheyil sunil macta yetxa Comam Dios yehi .
49001016	Yuxin mach chinsiquilojan wak'nihan yuch'andiosal tet Comam teyin̈ yet chintxahlihan .
49001017	Caw chink'anan tet Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , yeb xin tet Comam Dios Mame , Comam caw ay ismay , tato chak' Comam hehelanil yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo yun̈e hetxumni tzet chak' Comam heyohtan̈eloj , haxinwal cheyohtan̈elo Comam yin̈ caw c'ul .
49001018	Caw chink'anan tet Comam Dios tato chiyak' hajlo Comam henabal , yun̈e heyohtan̈enilo hune' iscawxobal coc'ul bay awtebilon̈ , cat hetxumnilo hune' comatan chak' Comam jet , han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yuninalo Comam .
49001019	Chink'anpaxojan tet Comam tato caw cheyohtan̈eloj ta machi isbi hanta yip Comam chimunlaco jin̈ , han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam , yeb xin machi bay cachancan apno yip tu' . Hune' yip Comam Dios tu' caw isyelo yin̈ sic'lebil .
49001020	Yet yak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Dios Comam Jesucristo xol anma camom , yanipaxcanico Comam Comam Jesucristo tu' yin̈ iswatx'k'ab yul satcan̈ .
49001021	Yocpaxo Comam Jes'us tu' yahawilo yiban̈ sunil mac ay yip , mac yahawil , mac ijbalom , yeb yiban̈ mac yijebil tzet chala . Maẍn̈etaj yiban̈ mac ay yul hune' tiempohal ti' , to yiban̈paxo sunil yahawil yin̈ hune'xa tiempohal chihul cosataj .
49001022	Caw sunil tzettaj ye tu' yacanico Comam Dios yalan̈ yip Comam Jesucristo . Ha' Comam Dios anicanico Comam Jesucristo iswi'ehalo yin̈ sunil anma ayxaco yul isk'ab .
49001023	Ha' yuninal Comam Dios , haca' isnimanil Comam Jesucristo yehi , yuxin cosunil istz'ajanil Comam ayco jin̈ . Ha' Comam xin chiak'ni tz'ajnaho sunil tzettaj ye tu' .
49002001	Wal xin , hex mach Israelo hex ti' , yak'cano Comam Dios hek'inal yu yip Comam Jesucristo , yuto yet yalan̈tocanoj camnajextic'a yu hemul yeb yu istx'ojal chewatx'e .
49002002	Yuto han̈c'an̈e yinta istx'ojal tzet ayayo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' bay tzujanex ; heyijen tzet chal isc'ul yesp'iritu naj chimunla xol jak'ek' , hune' chianico yip anma chiman̈c'on tzet chal Comam Dios .
49002003	Hacon̈paxtu'an̈ , han̈on̈ Israel on̈ti'an̈ , caw hac tu' jute cobahan̈ yet payxa . Tzujanon̈an̈ yinta tzet choche conimanilan̈ , chicoyijenan̈ tzet chal conimanilti'an̈ , coyijenpaxojan̈ tzet chal conabalan̈ . Caw mulum yu cotiticojan̈ , yuxin ha' hunon̈an̈ ayon̈tic'actojan̈ yalan̈ isya'tajil chati Comam Dios , haca' anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam .
49002004	Yaj wal Comam xin , caw hantacano chitz'ay isc'ul Comam jin̈ , yeb caw xahan ayon̈ yu .
49002005	Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam , yuxinto cochahcano hune' cocolbanil , hun xin yu yak'nicano Comam cok'inal yeb Comam Jesucristo yet ayon̈toco yul isk'ab camical yu sunil comul .
49002006	Caw hun yu jitzitzbican̈ yinta Comam Jesucristo yu Comam Dios , hunpaxo yu con̈istz'on̈ban Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo bey yul satcan̈ .
49002007	Yun̈e isyenilo Comam yin̈ hune' tiempohal chul cosataj tato caw xahan ayon̈ yu , yeb ta caw hanta isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam jin̈ yu Comam Jesucristo .
49002008	Yuto yu isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios , yuxin colbilon̈ yu jaco janma yin̈ Comam . Maẍtajon̈ jichecan̈ hune' ti' , to ha' Comam san̈e jet .
49002009	Maẍtaj yu isc'ulal chicowatx'e yuxinto chon̈colchahi , machoj , yuto ta hac tu' chimjal coba c'ulal .
49002010	Wal xin ha' Comam Dios con̈watx'eni , con̈yanico yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yun̈e cowatx'en sunil isc'ulal . Yuto hac tu' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam yet yalan̈tocanoj .
49002011	Wal tinan̈ xin , nawetij ta hayet yalan̈tocanoj hex mach Israelo hex ti' chexhallax man̈circuncisi'onal yu ebnaj Israel . Ebnaj tu' chal isba ebnaj circuncisi'onal , yuto ayxaco hune' yechel circuncisi'on yin̈ isnimanil ebnaj .
49002012	Wal yet payxa tu' caw machijexico yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo ; machi heyoc yin̈ con̈ob Israel , yeb yin̈ hune' trato ak'bilcano yu Comam Dios , yeb yin̈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam . Yuxinto machi baytet yin̈ chicawxi hec'ul , machipaxo hediosal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
49002013	Yet payxa tu' , nahat heyehilo yin̈ Comam Dios , wal tinan̈ xin ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , yuxinto caw hitznajexico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yu iscamical Comam Jesucristo .
49002014	Ha' iscamical Comam ak'nicano ak'anc'ulal coxol han̈on̈ Israel on̈ti'an̈ yeb hex mach Israelo hex ti' ; hunxan̈e con̈obal jucanoj . Istan̈tzencanilo Comam hune' cajlebahil haca' peyab yeco coxol , han̈on̈ Israel on̈ti'an̈ yeb hex mach Israelo hex ti' .
49002015	Yet iscam Comam Jesucristo istan̈tzencanilo hune' isley naj Mois'es ik'n̈e chejbanile yeb yin̈ tzet chu isyijelaxi . Iswatx'encanayo Comam hune' ac' con̈ob yin̈ cabeb con̈ob tu' , hunxan̈e xin yucanayo yin̈ Comam , hac tu' yu yanicanico Comam ak'anc'ulal xol .
49002016	Yu iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus yuxinto yak'cano tan̈o Comam hune' howal ayco coxol , con̈yanico Comam yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios , hunxan̈e nimanilehal con̈yutecanayoj .
49002017	Comam Jesucristo hul ak'no Tzoti' c'ul yet ak'anc'ulal teyet , hex caw nahattic'a heyehilo yin̈ Comam Dios , yeb xin jetan̈ han̈on̈ cawiltic'a jecojan̈ yin̈ Comam .
49002018	Yuton Comam Jesucristo , yuxin han̈on̈ Israel on̈ti'an̈ yeb hex mach Israelo hex ti' , xayu cohitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios Mame , hune'n̈e xin Comam Esp'iritu Santo chon̈hitznicoj .
49002019	Yuxin hex ti' , caw matxa nan con̈obalojex tinan̈ , matxa ton̈e chexec' c'olohi , ayxa heyoc yin̈ iscon̈ob Comam Dios , ayexxapaxico istz'ajo yuninal Comam .
49002020	Hex ti' lahanex haca' hunu te' n̈a watx'ebilcan̈ yiban̈ xe'al . Haxa han̈on̈an̈ ischejab Comam Jesucristo jeti'an̈ xin yeb ebnaj chihalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios , haca' xe' hune' n̈a tu' jehan̈ . Haxa Comam Jesucristo xin haca' ch'en ch'en caw niman yelapno ayayto xe'o istxiquin te' n̈a , hac tu' ye Comam .
49002021	Haca' hunu n̈a lan̈an islatz'laxcan̈ isloc'al , caw xin c'ulch'an ischahlen isba islatz'banil masan chijcano isba iswatx'icanoj , hac tu' je yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , yatutxa Comam jehi . Caw yeton̈xa yu hunxa je yebi .
49002022	Ha' tinan̈ hunxan̈e jehi yu xaquexoc yatuto Comam Dios yun̈e yehic'o Comam Dios yul heyanma yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
49003001	Yuton hune' tu' , yuxin chintxahlihan teyin̈ . Hanin Pablo inti'an , caw preso wehan yu ismunil Comam Jesucristo , yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ , hex mach Israelo hex ti' .
49003002	Wal xin heyohtaxa tato yu isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios , yuxin yak' hune' inmunilti'an yin̈ walnihan Istzoti' Comam texol hex mach Israelo hex ti' , yun̈e hewatx'ico yin̈ isc'ulal .
49003003	Caw isye Comam tzet nabil yu wetan , yak'ni wohtan̈elojan hune' ewantic'a ye yet payat . Ha' xin tz'ibn̈ebilxa nich'an teyet wuhan yul hune' hum ti' .
49003004	Yet cheyilni xin cat istxumchalo heyu tato wohtajan tzet ewantic'a ye yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
49003005	Ha' hune' tzet ewantic'a ye tu' , maẍtic'a ak'lax yohtan̈elo anma yet payat tu' , yaja' tinan̈ xin xayak' Comam Dios johtan̈elojan̈ yu Yesp'iritu , han̈on̈ sic'bilon̈ilojan̈ ischejabo Comam Jes'us , yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj ischejab Comam chihalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios .
49003006	Hune' ewantic'a ye tu' chala tato yu hune' cuybanile yet colbanile hex hunex mach Israelo hex ti' , chechah hune' hematan chicochahan̈ han̈on̈ Israel on̈ti'an̈ . Hac tu' xin hunxa je yin̈ Comam , caw ay heyocpaxo yin̈ hune' haltebilcano jetan̈ yu Comam Dios yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
49003007	Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios , yuxin yak' inmunilan walnic'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile xol anma yu yip Comam caw munlaco win̈an .
49003008	Haninan xin islahobal wecanojan xol anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , yaj xin yak' Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul wetan , yuxinto chinec'an wala'c'ojan teyet , hex mach Israelo hex ti' , tato hantan̈ecano isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Jesucristo chak'cano jet .
49003009	Comam Dios watx'en̈e sunil sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ha' ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an yun̈e wak'nihan heyohtan̈elo yin̈ tzet chiyu yijni isba tzet nabil yu Comam , hune' ewantic'a ye yet yalan̈tocanoj .
49003010	Yuxin tinan̈ , ha' yuninal Comam Dios chiak'ni ohtan̈elo sunilal ishelanil Comam tet ebnaj yahawil yeb ebnaj ijbalom ay yul satcan̈ .
49003011	Yaj yijcano isba hune' ti' yin̈ Comam Jesucristo haca'tic'a nabil yu Comam Dios yettaxtic'a maẍto chiwatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
49003012	Yu hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo , yuxinto xayu cohitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yin̈ sunil coc'ul , yuto xajayto yul janma yin̈ Comam .
49003013	Caw chiwalan teyet machojab chicabconcan̈ hec'ul yin̈ hune' bay lan̈an yec'ya' wanmati'an , to yu isc'ulalo teyin̈ , yuxin hac tu' chiwak'lehan . Wal xin ha' caw chianico heyip .
49003014	Yuton hune' ti' , yuxinto caw chinay jahnojan yin̈ sat Comam Dios , Comam Ismam Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
49003015	Ha' Comam Dios caw Mame , ha' chiyeni isbeybal ebnaj mame yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb yul satcan̈ .
49003016	Chink'anan tet Comam Dios ta yu hanta issak'alil isc'ul , chak' yip heyanma yin̈ Comam yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo ,
49003017	cat yehic'o Comam Jesucristo yul heyanma yu heyanico heyanma yin̈ , yun̈e isch'ib hexahann̈en Comam , haxinwal haca' isnahatil yehayto xe' hunu te te' yul tx'otx' , hac tu' hexahann̈en heba .
49003018	Hac tu' xin chu istxumchalo heyu , yeb xin sunil anma yetxa Comam yehi , tato mach isbi hantacano issak'alil isc'ul Comam Jesucristo .
49003019	Chink'anpaxojan tato cheyohtan̈elo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam tu' . Hune' isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Jesucristo tu' caw ec'bal yiban̈ tzet chijohtan̈eloj . Hac tu' xin caw tz'ajan chucanico isc'ulal Comam Dios teyin̈ .
49003020	Bitn̈elaxojab isbi Comam yuto caw ec'balto chiyu iswatx'en yiban̈ niẍte tzet chicok'an tet , yeb tzet chicotxumu . Hac tu' chute Comam yu ishelanil xayak' jet .
49003021	Bitn̈elaxojab isbi Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo yu sunil anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
49004001	Yuton Comam Jesucristo yuxinto preso wehan . Caw chiwaltojan teyet : c'ul cheyute heba ink'ana'an haca' caw yehi , yuto caw awtebilexxa yu Comam Dios .
49004002	Chewojab cheyute heba , c'ulch'anojab cheyute hec'ul . Xahanojab cheyil heba , niman cheyute hec'ul teyin̈ hununex , ayojab henimanc'ulal .
49004003	Hunxan̈ehojab cheyute heba yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo , yuto ha' Comam quexhunbancanoj , yanicanico ak'anc'ulal texol .
49004004	Hunxan̈e nimanile je tinan̈ , yeb xin hunn̈epaxo Esp'iritu ak'bil jet cosunil . Hune'n̈e tzet ayco yipo janma hune' bay awtebilon̈ yu Comam .
49004005	Hune'n̈e Comam Dios Jahawil , hune'n̈e mac bay ayco janma ; hune'n̈epaxo mac yin̈ bay ah ha' cowi' .
49004006	Caw hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios , ha' Mame yeco jin̈ cosunil . Ha' caw yahawil yeco jin̈ , ha' chimunlaco jin̈ , ha' ayco jin̈ cosunil .
49004007	Wal xin , caw nananta comunil cochah yu Comam Jesucristo , haca'tic'a tzet yoche isc'ul Comam yak' jet .
49004008	Yuxin chal yul Yum Comam Dios : Yet isto Comam yul satcan̈ , tx'i'al ebnaj presowom yito Comam yintaj . Yak'nipaxcano Comam isc'ulal tet anma , ẍiayoj .
49004009	¿ Tzet chalilo hune' yet isto Comam tu' ? Chaliloj tato babel beyayto Comam yul tx'otx' .
49004010	Ha' Comam beyayto yul tx'otx' , ha' Comam topaxo yul satcan̈ bay caw nahat yecanocan̈ yun̈e isnohilo sunil bayejtu'wal yu yip .
49004011	Ha' xin Comam anico ismunil hunun mac yul isk'ab , yuxin ay ebnaj ayco ischejabo Comam Jesucristo , ay ebnaj xin chihalni tzoti' chitit tet Comam Dios . Aypaxo ebnaj chihalnic'o cuybanile yet colbanile , ay ebnaj xin chiijbali yin̈ macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , aypaxo xin ebnaj cuywawom yin̈ tzet choche isc'ul Comam .
49004012	Hac ton ti' xin yu con̈iswatx'encanico yin̈ ismunil yun̈e isch'ib isnimanil Comam Jesucristo . Hune' isnimanil Comam tu' han̈on̈toni .
49004013	Yuxinto hunlahanxan̈e iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ Comam , yeb xin caw johtan̈elo Isc'ahol Comam Dios , hac tu' xin chiyu yik'ni yip conabal , cat istzujcha apno cotxumni haca' isnabal Comam Jesucristo .
49004014	Hac tu' xin matxa lahanojon̈ yeb niẍte unin , caw yin̈ an̈e chishel isnabal . Matxa comono ch'ijato conabal yin̈ hunuxa nan cuybanile , yuto ay anma ti' caw helan yak'ni subchaho anma yin̈ hunuxa nan cuybanile , haca' chiyu yinito jak'ek' hunu tzet ye tu' bayejtu'walil .
49004015	Walxinto ha' isyelal wal jalni , yaja' yin̈ isc'ulch'anil coc'ul . Hac tu' xin chu coch'ib yin̈ yet Comam Jesucristo , haxinwal lahanxan̈e chon̈elico yin̈ Comam , yuto ha' Comam caw iswi'ehal yeco jin̈ , yuto han̈on̈ ti' isnimanil Comam jehi .
49004016	Han̈on̈ con̈ isnimanil Comam ti' xin , caw hunxa je yu Comam . K'inalo haca' conimanil ti' , caw yetbin̈e isba sunil yu cotx'an̈al , caw xin c'ul yecano iswatx'ebanil hunun majan . Hac ton tu' xin je yu Comam Jesucristo , ha' Comam chon̈ak'ni ch'ibo yin̈ sunil , cat colahnico coxahann̈en coba .
49004017	Caw xin chiwalan yeb chink'anan teyet yin̈ isbi Comam Jes'us : caw matxa chexec' haca' anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios . Huntek'an anma tu' , han̈c'an̈e istx'ojal chiec' yin̈ isnabal , ha' chiswatx'e .
49004018	Caw xin k'ejholo yecanilo isnabal huntek'an anma tu' . Caw mach chu ischahni hune' ac' beybale chak' Comam Dios yuto mach yohtajo tzettaj isc'ulal chiswatx'e Comam , yuto cawcano yanma .
49004019	Yuto lut'bicanilo yanma ebnaj , yuxin yacanico isba yul isk'ab istx'ojal , matxatic'a xin yanma ebnaj iswatx'en sunil ismachiswalilal .
49004020	Wal hex ti' xin , mach haco tu' yu hecuywi yin̈ yet Comam Jesucristo .
49004021	Wal xin caw heyabe tzet hallax yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , hechahnicano hecuybanil caw yel yin̈ Comam .
49004022	Caw bejwecano hune' hebeybal ik'biltic'a heyu yet yalan̈tocanoj , hune' k'aytzen̈exico yin̈ istx'ojal cheyoche .
49004023	Yilal hehelnicano heyanma yeb henabal ,
49004024	cat heyoc heyik'no hune' ac' beybale watx'ebil haca' choche Comam Dios , yun̈e heyec' yin̈ istoholal yeb yin̈ isyelal .
49004025	Yuxin tinan̈ , caw matxaojab cheyaco lek'ti'al , han̈eojab isyelal cheyal teyet hununex , yuto caw hune'xan̈ech'an nimanile je cosunil .
49004026	Tato ay bay cheyak' chiwaho hec'ul , machojab cheyaco hemul . Machojab xin cheyaco hehowal tu' yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ sunilbal tz'ayic .
49004027	Machojab cheyak' yub naj matzwalil .
49004028	Mac k'aynatic'a yelk'awi , isbejabcano yelk'awi cat yoc munil . Ha' xin wal ay ismunil bay chicawxi isc'ul , cat iscolwapaxo yin̈ anma meba' caw machi nich'ano tzet aya .
49004029	Machojab cheyal yajla abix , to ha' tzoti' caw c'ul yoqui ha' cheyala haxinwal chiswatx'eco isnabal mac chiabeni , cat xin yak'ni isc'ulal tet mac chi'aben tzet cheyal tu' .
49004030	Caw mach cheyaco bisc'ulal yin̈ Comam Esp'iritu Santo ayxaco teyin̈ yu Comam Dios . Ha' hune' tu' ak'bil teyet yu Comam yun̈e yoc yecheloj ta yetexxa Comam masanta yet chiapni istz'ayical bay chitz'ajna cocolbanil yu Comam .
49004031	Bejwecano ischiwa hec'ul , yeb istit hehowal , yeb hecajtzacan̈ , yeb hepohli yin̈ heyet anmahil . Bejwepaxo hebahwahi yeb sunil tzettaj istx'ojal chewatx'e .
49004032	Wal xin c'ulch'anojab cheyute hec'ul , tz'ayojab hec'ul teyin̈ hununex . Cheyak'nipaxo nimanc'ulal teyin̈ hununex , haca' yu yak'ni nimanc'ulal Comam Dios yin̈ hemul yu Comam Jesucristo .
49005001	Han̈on̈ yuninalxa Comam Dios je ti' , caw xahan ayon̈ yu Comam , yuxin ec'ojon̈we haca' isbeybal Comam .
49005002	Xahann̈ewe heba hunun tz'ayic haca' yu con̈isxahann̈en Comam Jesucristo ; yak'ni camo isba Comam jin̈ , haca' hunu xahanbal caw xuk' chiak'lax tet Comam Dios .
49005003	Caw yeton̈xa Comam Dios , yuxin matxa jeto ay jalni tzoti' yet ixloj , yeb tzettaj chisyah Comam Dios , machojab xin chijocheto k'alomal .
49005004	Mach chu heyalni tzoti' caw tx'ixobal yoqui , yeb suc tzoti' , yeb xin maxil caw machiswalil jabeni ; yuto huntek'an tzoti' tu' , caw matxa jeto ay jalni . Ha' jet to jala' tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam Dios .
49005005	Caw heyohtaxa ta sunil mac chito ixli , maca chiwinajli , yeb anma chiwatx'en tzettaj chisyah Comam Dios , mach chiapni isc'atan̈ Comam Jesucristo yeb isc'atan̈ Comam Dios . Yebpaxo anma chito ochenico k'alomal lahan yeb anma chiay jahno tet tioẍ , ha' anma tu' mach chiapni isc'atan̈ Comam .
49005006	Machojab mac chexak'ni subchaho yu tzoti' caw sucal yehi . Yuton sunil huntek'an machiswalil tu' , yuxinto chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈ anma mach chiyijen tzet chala .
49005007	Yuxin caw chiwalcanojan teyet , mach chexoc xol huntek'an anma tu' .
49005008	Yet yalan̈tocanoj ayextoco xol k'ejholo , yaja' wal tinan̈ xin hunxa heye yin̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , wal xin caw ayexxaco xol issajilk'inal . Yuxin ec'an̈we yin̈ isc'ulal yuto ayexxaco xol issajilk'inal .
49005009	Wal xin , yu ayexxaco xol issajilk'inal ti' , caw c'ulch'anojab cheyute heyanma . Toholojab sunil tzet chewatx'e , yeb sunilojab tzet cheyala yelojabi .
49005010	Caw chelahweco hewatx'en baytet choche isc'ul Comam Dios .
49005011	Mach cheyato heba xol huntek'an tzet chiswatx'e anma xolto k'ejholo ayco yanma , yuto ha' huntek'an tzet chiswatx'e anma tu' , caw machi nich'ano isc'ulal . Wal xin halwe tet cat heyenilo tet ta machi nich'ano c'ulu tzet chiswatx'e tu' .
49005012	Caw tx'ixobal jalni yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e huntek'an anma tu' yin̈ ewantajil .
49005013	Yuxin yet chi'el yen̈el huntek'an tu' yu issajilk'inal , caw haban chucanoj . Ha' issajilk'inal chianico sunil tzet ye tu' yin̈ haban .
49005014	Yuxin chihallax haca' ti' : Ilo hawayan̈ hach wayan̈to chawu . Ahan̈wano xol camom , cat xin yak'ni Comam Jesucristo issajilk'inal tawet , ẍi .
49005015	Yuxin caw nann̈e heyu yin̈ tzet chi-la-hewatx'e . Mach chexec' yin̈ sucal , wal xin tz'ajanojab cheyute hec'ul .
49005016	Caw mach nabn̈eojab chielto tiempo teyiban̈ , yuto yin̈ hune' tiempo ti' caw hantan̈e tzet chon̈inito yin̈ istx'ojal .
49005017	Machojabtaj issucal cheyu , ak'we heyip hetxumnilo baytet caw choche isc'ul Comam Dios Jahawil chewatx'e .
49005018	Mach cheyuc' te' uq'ue yu chexyito te' yin̈ sunil istx'ojal . Ha' wal heyuten heba ha'ojab Comam Esp'iritu Santo nohnayto yul heyanma .
49005019	Halwe Salmo teyet hununex , yebej himno , yeb bit chitit yul heyanma , cat hebitn̈en isbi Comam Dios , cat heyalni c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam yin̈ sunil heyanma .
49005020	Ak'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios Mame yin̈ sunil tzettaj ye tu' , yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo .
49005021	Yijem cheyute heba teyet hununex , hac tu' chu heyeniloj tato chexxiw tet Comam Dios .
49005022	Hex ixale , caw yijewe tzet chal heyichamil teyet , haca'tic'a chiyu heyijen tzet chal Comam Dios Jahawil .
49005023	Yuto naj ichamile iswi'ehal yehico naj yin̈ yixal , haca'tic'a yehico Comam Jesucristo iswi'ehalo yin̈ sunil anma ayxaco yul isk'ab ; ha' Comam xin Iscolomal yuto caw haca' isnimanil Comam yehi .
49005024	Haca'ojab isyijemal anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , hacojab tu' chute isba ebix ixale isyijen yin̈ sunil tzet chal yichamil .
49005025	Hex ichamile , xahan cheyil heyixal , haca' isxahanil chiyil Comam Jesucristo anma ayxaco yul isk'ab , yak'nipaxo camo isba Comam yin̈ .
49005026	Hac tu' yute isba Comam , yak' camo isba yun̈e joc yeto Comam Dios ; con̈issajn̈encano yin̈ comul haca' con̈istx'ah yu ha ha' ,
49005027	yun̈e yapni yuninal tu' sataj yin̈ caw c'ulch'ancanoj , caw matxa nino istz'ilal , machipaxo nino istx'ojal maca hunuxa ismachiswalilal . Wal xin caw yetxa Comam yehi , yeb tz'ajan lahanxa yehi .
49005028	Haca'tic'a isxahanil chil naj ichamile isnimanil , hacojab tu' isxahanil chil naj yixal . Yuxin ha' mac xahan chil yixal , caw xahan chilpaxo isba chal tu' .
49005029	Caw machi hunu mac ti' chiyahni isnimanil , wal xin chislotze isba cat isya'iln̈en isba , haca' chiyu isya'iln̈en Comam Jesucristo macta ayxaco yul isk'ab ,
49005030	yuto isnimanil Comam yehi ; han̈on̈ ti' yetbixa isnimanil Comam jehi .
49005031	Yuto chal Istzoti' Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Yuxin caw yilal chacano naj winaj ismam ismi' , cat xin ishunban isba naj yeb yixal , hac tu' xin caw hunxan̈e anmahil chucano iscawan̈il , " ẍi yul Yum Comam Dios .
49005032	Hune' ti' niman yelapnoj , yaja' ha' hune' chiwalan ha' ton yin̈ tzet ye Comam Jesucristo yeb mac ayxaco yul isk'ab .
49005033	Yaja' hex ichamile hex ti' , xahanojab cheyil heyixal haca' isxahanil ay henimanil heyu . Haquexpax tu' hex ixale hex ti' , yijewe tzet chal heyichamil .
49006001	Hex uninale , caw yijemojab cheyute heba tet hemam hemi' yuto ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , caw c'ul hune' tu' .
49006002	Hune' babel chejbanile ak'bilcano yu Comam Dios ik'bil haltebanil yu , chal haca' ti' : " Ayojab yelapno ye hemam hemi' yul hesat ,
49006003	haxinwal tzalahilaln̈etic'a heyehi , yebpaxo xin chexnahatli yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , " ẍiayoj .
49006004	Walpaxo hex mame mi'e hex ti' , caw mach cheyak'tij ishowal heyuninal , ha' heyet to caw c'ul chu hecuyni yeb hecachni , haxinwal chixiw tet Comam Dios .
49006005	Wal hex c'amte' hex xin , yijemojab cheyute heba tet hepatr'on yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Ayojab yelapno ebnaj yul hesat , xiwan̈we tet ebnaj . Sunilojab heyanma chexmunlahi , haca'ojtam tet Comam Jesucristo cheyije .
49006006	Wal xin machojabn̈etaj yet chexyilni ebnaj hepatr'on tu' cat hemunlahi yun̈e istzalaco ebnaj teyin̈ , machoj , wal xin munlahan̈we yin̈ sunil heyanma haca' choche Comam Dios , haca'ojtam tet Comam Jesucristo lan̈an heyijeni .
49006007	Caw sunilojab heyanma chexmunlahi , haca'ojtam ismunil Comam lan̈an hewatx'eni , maẍtaj ismunil anma .
49006008	Heyohtaxa xin , waxan̈ca c'amte' on̈ , maca jet coba cochuquil , caw haca'tic'a isc'ulal chihulic'o jub yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , hacpax tu' xin ispaj chicochah tet Comam Dios .
49006009	Haxa hex yahaw munil hex xin , hactic'apax tu' cheyutepaxo heba yin̈ ebnaj hec'amte' . Caw mach howo cheyute heba yin̈ ebnaj , yuto caw lahan heyehico yalan̈ yip Comam Dios Jahawil ay satcan̈ . Wal xin caw machi hunu mac ec'bal yelapno ye yiban̈ hunuxa mac yul sat Comam .
49006010	Wal tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , yik'ab yip heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yuto caw aycano ishelanil yip Comam .
49006011	Chahwe tzet chak' Comam Dios teyet , haca' huntek'an chiocnico yu ebnaj soldado ak'om howal , yun̈e chu hepahni sunil islek'ti'al naj matzwalil chak' teyet .
49006012	Maẍtaj yeb anma chijak' howal , wal xin lan̈an jak'ni howal yin̈ yesp'iritu naj matzwalil chiec' satcan̈ xol jak'ek' . Huntek'an esp'iritu tu' caw ay yip yeb chon̈ischej cowatx'en istx'ojal , yeb yahaw yeco yin̈ istx'ojal ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
49006013	Yuxin chahwe huntek'an yip Comam Dios chak' teyet , haxinwal yet chak'ni howal naj matzwalil teyin̈ chexk'oji yin̈ naj . Lahwi hechahni tzet chak' Comam teyet tu' caw lin̈anojabn̈etic'a hex .
49006014	Yuxin lin̈bawe heba , c'awxeweco isyelal yul heyanma , haca' chu iscawxenico naj soldado issincho yin̈ yictaj , yeb xin heyec' yin̈ istoholal , haca' chu yanico naj soldado huntek'an xilk'ape naba ch'en yin̈ istxam isc'ul yu iscolwa yin̈ .
49006015	Haca'ojab yanico naj soldado isxan̈ab yin̈ yoj yu isto yin̈ howal , hacojab tu' chu hecawxen heba heto heyalnoc'o colbanile yet ak'anc'ulal .
49006016	Haca' yanico naj soldado hune' ch'en ch'en petan yehi yin̈ isnuk' isk'ab yun̈e ispahni ch'en lanza yet ayco howal , hacojab tu' heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam , yun̈e chu hepahni huntek'an isya'tajil chati naj matzwalil teyin̈ .
49006017	Haca' yahnato naj soldado hune' ch'en ch'en c'owi'e yin̈ iswi' yun̈e mach chik'axpon bala yin̈ iswi' , hac tu' xin chu hecolni heba yu hune' hecolbanil ak'bilxa yu Comam . Haca'tic'a yik'ni naj soldado yespada yet chito naj yin̈ howal , hacojab tu' heyik'ni Istzoti' Comam Dios chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet .
49006018	Caw machojab chebej hetxahli tet Comam Dios , ayojabexn̈etic'aco hek'anni tet Comam tzettaj isc'ulal choche Comam Esp'iritu Santo . Caw nanojabn̈etic'a heyu , machojab chexpax teyintaj . Txahlan̈we yin̈ sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
49006019	Txahlan̈wepaxo win̈an , haxinwal yet chintzotelan chak' Comam Dios inhelanilan yeb xin wipan yun̈e walnilojan tzet yelapno ye Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile xayak' Comam Dios johtan̈eloj .
49006020	Comam Dios an̈eintijan yun̈e walnic'ojan hune' cuybanile bay chi'ilcha colbanile , yuxin preso wehan . Chiwalan teyet tato caw chextxahli win̈an , haxinwal ay wipan walnihan hune' colbanile ti' xol anma .
49006021	Ha' naj juẍta T'iquico , naj caw yijem iscolwa yin̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo , ha' naj chiinapno tzoti' teyet yin̈ tzet caw wehicojan , yeb xin tzet lan̈an wunihan bey ti' .
49006022	Chiwatojan naj quexyila' , ha' naj chihalni teyet hanic' jehan̈ , haxinwal chak' naj yak'lobal heyanma .
49006023	Yak'ab Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo ak'anc'ulal texol , yeb hexahann̈en heba hununex , yeb xin yak'bil yip heyanma .
49006024	Yak'abayo Comam isc'ulal isc'ul yiban̈ sunil macta chiochen Comam Jesucristo Jahawil yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
50001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an yeb juẍta Timoteo , ischejab Comam Jesucristo jehan̈ . Chicotz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet hex yetexxa Comam Dios yeb ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo ay bey con̈ob Filipos , yeb tet ebnaj anciano yeb tet ebnaj di'acono .
50001002	Yak'ab Comam Dios Mame yeb xin Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb xin ak'anc'ulal teyet .
50001003	Hunta el chextit yul inc'ulan , caw chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios teyin̈ .
50001004	Yet chintxahlihan tet Comam Dios , caw chitzalacano inc'ulan ink'annihan isc'ulal isc'ul Comam teyiban̈ hununex .
50001005	Yuto ha' hunexpaxo chexcolwa hepujbanic'o Tzoti' yet colbanile jintajan̈ , yettaxtic'a heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo masanta tinan̈ .
50001006	Caw t'in̈an wehicojan tato haca' yu yichenico Comam Dios ismunil teyin̈ , hac tu' chu islahnico quexiswatx'enico yin̈ isc'ulal masanto yet chihul Comam Jesucristo hunelxa .
50001007	Caw yilaltic'a innanihan haca' ti' teyin̈ hesunil , yuto caw xahan ayex wuhan , yeb xin ha' hunex chexcolwa win̈an yin̈ hune' munil ak'bil wetti'an yu Comam , hac tu' xin ha' hunex chechah isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam . Chexcolwa win̈an waxan̈ca ayinictojan yul preso maca yet chinocan sata ebnaj yahawil yu incolnihan hune' tzoti' yet colbanile ti' cat walnihan ta caw yeli .
50001008	Caw yohta Comam Dios ta caw xahan ayex wuhan hesunil , hacojtam Comam Jesucristo chexxahann̈eni .
50001009	Caw chink'anpaxojan tet Comam Dios yin̈ intxahan tato caw ec'na xahan cheyil heba hununex yeb ta caw chiyak' Comam hehelanil yeb henabal .
50001010	Yun̈e heyohtan̈en hesaynilo baytet caw c'ul , hac tu' xin caw c'uln̈etic'a tzet chebeybaln̈e , haxinwal machi istx'ojal chiilchalo teyin̈ yet chihul Comam Jesucristo .
50001011	Yeb xin sunil isc'ulal chitit yin̈ Comam Jesucristo ayexico hebeybaln̈eni yun̈e isbina Comam yeb yu yocpaxo ismay Comam .
50001012	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , chiwochehan cheyohtan̈eloj tato huntek'an isya'tajil chiwilti'an chicolwa yin̈ ispujbalaxic'o Tzoti' yet colbanile .
50001013	Caw sunil mac ay yul palacio yeb sunil anma ohtan̈eni ta ayinicojan preso isyayil ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan .
50001014	Hayet yillaxi ta preso wehan , caw tzetc'a ebnaj juẍta yihti yanma ispujbanilto Tzoti' yet colbanile . Caw matxa chixiw ebnaj yalnic'oj yuto caw yaco ebnaj Comam Dios Jahawil yipo yanma .
50001015	Walca xin yin̈ caw yeli , ay mac chihalni Istzoti' Comam yu chichiwa isc'ul win̈an , cat xin ispalc'on wiban̈an chiyute isnani . Aypaxo xin ebnaj juẍta ti' c'ul tzet nabil yu yuxinto chiyalic'oj .
50001016	Ay mac chihalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo yu ay tzet chiyochecoj , mach caw yelo isc'ul chiyalnic'oj , yuto choche yak'aco yak'bil isya'tajil wiban̈an yulbal ayinictijan yul preso ti' . Aypaxo mac xin chalic'o yin̈ sunil yanma , caw xin yohtaj tato ayinicojan preso ti' yu incolnihan Tzoti' yet colbanile yacano Comam Jesucristo coxol .
50001017	
50001018	Yaja' machi wocan yin̈ ta c'ul nabil yu ebnaj maca mach xin , tan̈e chihallaxic'o Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo ; wal xin caw chintzalahan yu chihallaxic'o Istzoti' Comam . Yaj xin caw ec'balto chintzalahan ,
50001019	yuto wohtajan tato sunil ti' chicolwa quiniscolnihan , yuto chextxahli win̈an yeb yu iscolwal Yesp'iritu Comam Jesucristo win̈an .
50001020	Yaja' ha' hune' chiwochehan yeb ayco yin̈ wanmahan , tato mach chincanan yin̈ tx'ixwilal , walxinto ha' intzotelan yin̈ sunil wanmahan haca'tic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj . Waxan̈ca itzitzinan maca chincaman chiwochehan ta chiillax isc'ulal Comam Jesucristo win̈an .
50001021	Yuto yulbal yet itzitzinan , han̈c'an̈e ismunil Comam Cristo ayco yin̈ wanmahan inwatx'enan ; taca chincaman xin ec'bal caw c'ul chinelicojan .
50001022	Yuxin tato yet itzitzinan yin̈ inchibehalti'an , chiyu inmunlahan ninoxa yin̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo , yuxin caw mach wohtajojan baytet wal insaynilojan xol cabeb ti' ; yuto ay wala'an tato chincamnahan , cat intohan isc'atan̈ Comam Jesucristo , yuto ec'na c'ul hune' tu' .
50001023	
50001024	Yaja' xin , caw yilal itzitzinan hanic'oxa yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu inmunlahan texol .
50001025	Caw xin t'in̈an wehan yin̈ ti' , tato chi-to-quinheayojan texol yu incolwahan teyin̈ hech'ibi , yeb yun̈e cam heyaben tzalahilal , yu xaheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam .
50001026	Hayet chinapnihan tec'atan̈ hunelxa , cheyak' tzalaho hec'ul yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
50001027	Hachcachann̈e chiwaltojan teyet tato cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul hebeybaln̈en haca' cuybanile aycano jet yu Comam Jesucristo . Hac tu' xin waxan̈ca chintohan quexintucle'an maca machoj , chiwochehan wabehan hek'umal hesunil tato caw tohol heyehicoj , yeb xin tato caw hun chiyu hemunlahi , yebpaxo xin lahan helahnico hesunil heyanico heyanma yin̈ Tzoti' yet colbanile .
50001028	Yeb xin mach chexxiw tet ebnaj caj chexilni . Hac tu' chiyu isyenilo isba tato chic'aycanto ebnaj tu' yin̈ huneln̈e , yebpaxo xin hac tu' chu heyeniloj tato ayxa hecolbanil yu Comam Dios .
50001029	Yuto isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Jesucristo maẍn̈etaj janico janma yin̈ , ha' wal juni , wal xin yilal jak'ni cabo coba jaben isya'tajil yinta Comam .
50001030	Hex ti' , hun lahan heyak'ni heyip helin̈ban heba xol isya'tajil haca' inti'an . Caw xaheyila tato caw wak' wanmahan inlin̈ban inbahan xol isya'tajil texol , tinan̈ xin lan̈an heyabeni tato hune'n̈e ha' wak'ni wanmahan xol isya'tajil .
50002001	Yuxin ta chexyiptze Comam Jesucristo , ta chak' Comam yak'lobal hec'ul yu xahan ayex yu , yeb ta hunxan̈e heye yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo , yeb ta xahan cheyil heyet anmahil , cat istz'aypaxo hec'ul yin̈ ;
50002002	ta hac tu' , ayojab tzalahilal texol , hunlahann̈eojab cheyute hexahann̈en heba . Hunlahann̈eojab cheyute heyanma yeb hunxan̈ehojab tzet chiec' yin̈ henabal ; hac tu' xin caw chititcano tzalahilal yul wanmahan heyu .
50002003	Mach chisje ta nime winaj cheyute heba cat helolo'n̈en heba yet chewatx'en hunu tzet ye tu' , wal xin chewla winaj cheyute heba . Ec'balojab yelapno ebnaj juẍta teyiban̈ cheyabe .
50002004	Machojabn̈etaj isc'ulal teyin̈ chesayic'oj , wal xin yilal henanipaxti ebnaj juẍtaj .
50002005	Lahanojab cheyute henabal haca' isnabal Comam Jesucristo .
50002006	Waxan̈ca Dios ye Comam Jesucristo , yaj matzet yal isc'ul Comam yin̈ yehobal .
50002007	Wal xin isbejcano Comam sunil tzet yet Comam yehi , yanico isba Comam chejaboj yet ispitzc'a yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
50002008	Anma yu yulic'o Comam coxol , yinayo isba , caw xin yijem yutepaxo isba Comam masanta yin̈ iscamical , waxan̈ca caw tx'ixobal hune' camical yin̈ te' culus tu' .
50002009	Yuxin caw ak'laxcano yip , yilaxcan̈ yu Comam Dios , yanico Comam hune' isbi Comam Jesucristo tu' ec'bal yelapno yiban̈ sunil bihe .
50002010	Yuxin hayet chihallax isbi Comam Jesucristo caw chiay jahno sunil mac ay yul satcan̈ , yeb mac ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yebpaxo mac ayayto yalan̈ tx'otx' .
50002011	Cat xin yalni yu isti' tato ha' Comam Jesucristo , ha' caw Yahawil yecanicoj , hac tu' xin chu yoc ismay Comam Dios Mame .
50002012	Yuxinto hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex caw xahan ay wuti'an , yet ayinan texol caw yijem cheyute heba , hacojab tu' xin yet machijinan texol caw ec'nahojab yijem cheyute heba . Aweco yin̈ heyanma hexiw tet Comam cat helin̈ban heba yin̈ hecolbanil .
50002013	Wal xin , ha' Comam chiak'ni oco yin̈ heyanma tzettaj isc'ulal wal heyuni , cat xin iscolwapaxo teyin̈ yun̈e yijni isba haca' choche isc'ul .
50002014	Watx'ewe sunil yaj mach chexak'wi c'ule , machica xin tzet cheyalpaxoj yet chewatx'eni .
50002015	Hac tu' xin , machi mule yeb istx'ojal chiilchalo teyin̈ yu anma , walxinto caw yuninal Comam Dios cheyute heba . Ec'an̈we yin̈ isc'ulal xol anma machiswalil yeb caw tx'ojcanoj . Wal xin caw chextzejla xol anma haca' istzejla tx'umel xol k'ejholo , yuto hex cheyalic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios chiak'ni k'inale tet anma . Hac tu' xin yet chul Comam Jesucristo caw chiwabehan tzalahilal teyin̈ , yuto caw wohtajan tato mach nabn̈eho quinec'an texol , yeb xin mach nabn̈eho quinmunlahan texol .
50002016	
50002017	Waxan̈ca xin caw chiwaco innimanilti'an xahanbalil , yun̈e istz'ajnacano xahanbal cheyak' tet Comam Dios yu heyanma yin̈ Comam , caw chintzalahan cat inpohniltojan hune' tzalahilal ti' texol .
50002018	Tzalahan̈wepaxo hex ti' , ak'we tzalaho hec'ul yin̈ hune' bay chintzalacoti'an .
50002019	Tato caw chi'el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chito naj Timoteo quexistucle' yet hecal cabe ti' haca' chiwochehan , yun̈e yilni naj hanic' heyehicoj cat yiniti naj tzoti' wetan . Hac tu' chu istzalacan̈ inc'ulan yet chiwabehan hanic' heyehi .
50002020	Yuto han̈c'an̈e naj Timoteo ti' , lahan istxumni haca' inti'an , yeb xin chaco yin̈ isc'ul iswatx'en isc'ulal teyin̈ .
50002021	Yaj wal huntek'anxa ebnaj xin , ha' tzet choche isc'ul ebnaj chissaya , maẍtaj tzet choche Comam Jesucristo .
50002022	Walex hex ti' , heyohtaxa hanta isc'ulal chiyute isba naj Timoteo ti' , yeb xin ta caw chicolwapaxo naj wintajan yin̈ jalnic'ojan̈ Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo . Haca' iscolwa hunu naj c'ahole yin̈ ismam , hac tu' iscolwa naj win̈an .
50002023	Yuxin toxan̈e chiwechmahan tzet chinelicojan yin̈ hune' isya'tajil ayayo wiban̈ti'an , cat wanitojan naj quexistuclenoj .
50002024	Yaj xin chicawxi inc'ulan yin̈ Comam Dios tato chintopaxojan quexwila'an yin̈ lembil .
50002025	Chiec'paxo yin̈ innabalan tato caw yilal wanipaxtojan naj Epafrodito quexyila' . Naj juẍta ti' , caw chicolwa naj wintajan yin̈ ismunil Comam Jesucristo , yeb ha' hun naj chiak'len isya'tajil wintajan . Naj juẍta ti' , hex heyati naj colwal win̈an .
50002026	Wal xin caw choche naj isto quexyila' hesunil , caw xin ayco yin̈ isc'ul naj teyin̈ yuto heyabeloj tato ya'biay naj .
50002027	Wal tu' , caw yeli ay hune' yabil oc yin̈ naj , hanic'xan̈e mach cam naj yu . Yaj xin caw ok' isc'ul Comam Dios yin̈ naj iscawxican̈ naj . Yaj caw maẍn̈etaj yin̈ naj ok' yanma Comam , caw tz'aypaxo isc'ul Comam win̈an , yun̈e matxa cam chislahico bisc'ulal win̈an yu naj .
50002028	Yuxin matxa chiec'ayo yet inchejnitojan naj tec'atan̈ , haxinwal chextzalacan̈ yet cheyilni yapni naj hunelxa . Yu hetzalahilal yin̈ naj chipax hanic' inbisc'ulalan .
50002029	Chahwe naj yin̈ tzalahilal yuto caw heyuẍta naj yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Caw xahanojab cheyil mac haca' naj ti' .
50002030	Yuto yu ismunil Comam Jesucristo , yuxin etza cam naj . Caw ishin isba naj iscam win̈an heseleloj , yuto caw nahat ayexilo win̈an .
50003001	Wal tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , tzalahan̈we yin̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil . Haninti'an , mach tx'ojo chiwabehan intz'ibn̈entojan tzettaj ye tu' xa-tic'a-intz'ibn̈etojan teyet , wal xin caw ch'ocnico heyu .
50003002	Caw nann̈e heyu tet ebnaj caw lahlonn̈etic'a yec' haca' metx tx'i' , han̈c'an̈etic'a ismachiswalilal chiswatx'e , cat yalni ta caw yilal chioc hune' circuncisi'on yin̈ conimanil .
50003003	Han̈on̈ ti' , yin̈ caw yeli circuncidadoxa je yul sat Comam Dios , yuto chijiyo coba tet Comam Dios yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo . Chon̈tzalahi yuto yetxa Comam Jesucristo jehi , maẍtaj yin̈ej yechel choc yin̈ conimanil bay chicawxi coc'ul .
50003004	Haninti'an wal wanico wanmahan yin̈ huntek'an chileyal ebnaj tu' , yuto caw tz'ajan inwatx'ehan sunil tzet chal isley naj Mois'es .
50003005	Yuto waxajebixto tz'ayic inpitzc'ahan wak'lax circuncidaran . Caw Israel wichmaman , yin̈ yuninal naj Benjam'in titnajinan , Hebreo inan , caw Hebreo inmaman yeb inmi'an , fariseo inpaxojan yin̈ walnic'ojan cuybanile yin̈ isley naj Mois'es .
50003006	Caw ayco wanmahan yin̈ cuybanile tu' , yuxin quinocan incaja'an macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , caw xin inyijenan ley tu' , caw machi hunu mac chu yalni ta mach tz'ajano yu inyijenan .
50003007	Yaja' sunil huntek'an aycano yelapno ye yul insatan yet yalan̈tocano tu' , tinan̈ matxa tzet chalilo yul insatan , yaj yu Comam Jesucristo .
50003008	Yin̈ caw isyelal , sunil huntek'an tu' , caw matzet chiocnico wuhan tinan̈ ; ha' hune' caw aycano yelapno yehi , ha' yin̈ caw wohtan̈enilojan Comam Jesucristo Jahawil . Sunil huntek'an bejbilcano wutu'an xin caw haca'xa k'alem ye yul insatan , yu inchahnihan hune' inmajulan yinta Comam Jesucristo ,
50003009	hac tu' xin hunxan̈e chiwucanojan yeb Comam . Tinan̈ xin , c'ulinan yul sat Comam Dios , yuto waco wanmahan yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , mach yuho inyijenan tzet chal isley naj Mois'es . Cachann̈e yu janico janma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo chon̈oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios .
50003010	Hac tu' xin chiwohtan̈ehan Comam Jesucristo , cat wabenan yip Comam Dios yin̈ wanmahan , hune' yip Comam pitzc'ancan̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom . Yeb yu wak'lenan isya'tajil haca' yak'le Comam , yeb incaman haca' yu iscam Comam .
50003011	Chicawxipaxo inc'ulal ta chinitzitzbican̈an xol camom .
50003012	Caw mach lan̈ano walnihan tato caw xatzujcha sunil huntek'an ti' wuhan maca caw tohol inxahan , wal xin caw lahbilico wuhan intohan insatajan . Ayco yin̈ wanmahan intzujnayojan huntek'an nabil win̈an yu Comam Jesucristo yet quinistzujnayojan babel .
50003013	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , mach lan̈ano walnihan tato xatzujcha apno huntek'an tu' wuhan , yaja' ha' hune' chiwutehan tinan̈ caw matxa chinnatijan huntek'an inwatx'ehan yet yalan̈tocanoj ; chiwak'ni wanmahan intzujnayojan huntek'an ayco insatajan .
50003014	Hac tu' xin chu istzujcha apno wuhan , cat yak'lax hune' matan wetan , hune' bay awtebilon̈ yu Comam Dios , yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo .
50003015	Yuxin sunilon̈ ayxa yip janma yin̈ Comam , yilal cotxumni haca' tu' , yaja' ta ay hunujex nan chu hetxumniloj , ha' Comam Dios chiyenopaxilo teyet .
50003016	Yaja' ha' hune' caw yilal , ec'ojon̈we yin̈ huntek'an tzet xatzujcha apno ju .
50003017	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , ilweto hewatx'en haca' inbeybalan yeb isbeybal macta chibelwi haca'tic'a yu coyenicanojan̈ teyet .
50003018	Ay hune' tzet ti' tx'i'al elxa chiwalan teyet . Tinan̈ xin caw chinok'an chiwalnipaxtojan teyet tato caw tzetc'a ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈ cuybanile yin̈ iscamical Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus .
50003019	Huntek'an ebnaj tu' xin yilal yaben isya'tajil , cat istan̈tzelaxcaniloj , yuto han̈c'an̈e istx'ojal choche isc'ul iswatx'e' , ha' ton xin caw aycanico isdiosalo ebnaj . Caw xin chitzala ebnaj iswatx'en tzettaj caw tx'ixobal ; caw xin han̈c'an̈e tzettaj ye tu' ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ayco yin̈ isnabal .
50003020	Wal han̈on̈ ti' xin yetxa satcan̈ jehi . Lan̈an jechman yayilo Cocolomal yul satcan̈ , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
50003021	Ha' Comam chihelni hune' conimanil machi yip ti' , haca' xin isc'ulch'anil isnimanil hac tu' chon̈elicoj . Yu ishelanil Comam yuxin chishel conimanil , ha' ton hune' ishelanil tu' chimunla yiban̈ sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
50004001	Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw xahan ayex wuhan . Caw ay wala'an chiwilicojan teyin̈ tinan̈ , caw istzalabal wanmahan heyehi , yeb xin ispajpaxo inmunilan heyehi . Caw chelahweco xin , toholojab cheyute hebeybal yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
50004002	Chiwaltojan tet janab Evodia yeb xin janab S'intique tato caw yilal yoc ebix yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , yuto caw isnohxa isba ebix yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
50004003	Yebpaxo xin , hach wuẍta wet munlawomal caw yijem , chink'anan tawet chaẍcolwa yin̈ ebix janab ti' , haxinwal chioc ebix yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , yuto caw colwa ebix win̈an yalnic'o Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile xol anma ; yebpaxo juẍta Clemente caw colwa wintajan , yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj juẍtaj . Ebnaj tu' tz'ibn̈ebilxayo isbi ebnaj yul te' hum bay ayayo isbi macta ayxa isk'inal mach istan̈bal yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
50004004	Tzalahan̈we yin̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil sunilbal tiempo . Chiwalnipaxojan hunelxa , ¡ tzalahan̈wej !
50004005	Caw c'ulch'anojab hec'ul yul sat sunil anma . Hanic'xan̈e tiempohal cat yul Comam .
50004006	Machojab tzet caw cheyaco yin̈ hec'ul . Halwe sunil tzet cheyoche tet Comam Dios yin̈ hetxah , k'anwe tet Comam cat xin heyak'nipaxo yuch'andiosal tet Comam .
50004007	Hac tu' xin chiyu yak'ni Comam Dios ak'anc'ulal teyet . Hune' ak'anc'ulal tu' , caw ec'bal sata hanta tzet chiyu istxumchalo yu anma . Hune' ak'anc'ulal tu' , ha' chic'uban heyanma yeb xin tzet chiec' yin̈ henabal , yuto caw hunxa heye yeb Comam Jesucristo .
50004008	Tinan̈ xin , hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , aweco henabal yin̈ sunil tzet caw t'in̈an yehi , yin̈ sunil tzet ay yelapno yul cosat , yin̈ sunil tzet caw tohol , yin̈ tzet mach isquistalil , yeb yin̈ sunil tzet caw yeli , yeb yin̈ sunil tzet chijoche jabe' , yebpaxo yin̈ sunil tzet caw c'ul yul sat Comam Dios , yeb huntek'an caw istzan yallax c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ ; ha' yin̈ huntek'an tu' cheyaco henabal .
50004009	Yijewe huntek'an cuybanile yeb chejbanile wak'an teyet , yeb huntek'an tzet heyabe walnihan , yeb tzet heyil inwatx'enan . Ta chewatx'e haca' tu' , chioc Comam Dios heyetbihoj , chiyak'nipaxo Comam ak'anc'ulal teyet .
50004010	Wal tinan̈ xin , caw chintzalahan yin̈ Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , yuto quinhenatijan heyaniti hecolwal wetan . Mach lan̈ano walnihan ta xaquinhenahuln̈etojan , ¡ machoj ! Wal xin ayinn̈etic'acojan yin̈ henabal , yaj ton̈e ton yumi machi yu hecolwa win̈an .
50004011	Wal xin , maẍtaj yu caw matzet ayinan yuxin chiwaltojan hune' ti' teyet , machoj ; wal xin k'aynajinxahan wak'ni tzalaho wanmahan yin̈ tzet ay yul ink'aban .
50004012	Wohtajan wijlenan isya'tajil , ay tiempo machi nich'ano tzet ayinan . Aypaxo tiempo caw c'ul chiec' wila'an , wohtajan wijlenan wahil , aypaxo tiempo nohnan̈etic'a inc'ulan , aypaxo tiempo ay inmelyuhan yeb ay tiempo machipaxo inmelyuhan , yaja' k'aynajinxatic'ahan yin̈ sunil .
50004013	Sunil chisje wuhan , yuto ha' Comam Jesucristo chicolwa win̈an .
50004014	Yaja' hex ti' , caw c'ul tzet chewatx'e yuto xaheyati hecolwal wetan yet ayinicojan yin̈ hune' isya'tajil ti' .
50004015	Yet welan yul ismajul Macedonia , yet wichenicojan walnic'ojan Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yul huntek'anxa nan con̈obal , han̈c'an̈e hex ay yul isk'ab Comam bey yul con̈ob Filipos quexcolwa win̈an . Ha' ton tu' heyak' ispajo wetan , yuto hechah colbanile yu inmunilan texol . Wal hunmajanxa ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yul huntek'anxa con̈ob bey tu' , matzet yak'a .
50004016	Yebpaxo yet ayinan bey con̈ob Tesal'onica , cayel oxel heyato hecolwabal wetan , yu yoc yin̈ tzet chiocnico wuhan .
50004017	Maẍn̈etaj inchahnihan hecolwabal ayco yin̈ innabalan , wal xin caw chintzalahan yuto ec'balto chiak'lax ispaj selel teyet yu Comam Dios .
50004018	Yuxin caw nimanxa tzet chinchahan teyet , caw xapalc'oni . Sunil tzet heyati wetan yinta naj Epafrodito , c'uxanxa . Caw c'ul hune' tu' yul sat Comam Dios , yuto haca' isxuk'al sam hunu xahanbal chijak' tet Comam , hac tu' issak'alil hune' hecolwabal tu' .
50004019	Ha' Comam Dios xin chiak'ni sunil tzet matzet yul hek'ab , haca'tic'a isc'ulch'anil isk'alomal ay yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
50004020	Ayojab yelapno isbi Comam Dios Mame yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Ha' ton Comam , Mame jin̈ cosunil . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
50004021	Chiwaltojan teyet cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil hesunil yetexxa Comam Dios bey tu' , hex hunxan̈e heye yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Chalpaxto ebnaj juẍtaj ay inc'atan̈an ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil .
50004022	Chalpaxto sunil mac yetxa Comam bey ti' ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil , yebpaxo xin ebnaj juẍta chimunla yinta naj yahaw Roma ti' .
50004023	Yak'abayo Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ hesunil .
51001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan . Ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an , yuto hac tu' el yin̈ isc'ul . Ha' hun juẍta Timoteo chi-wet-tz'ibn̈entojan hune' carta ti' teyet hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex yetexxa Comam Dios yeb caw yijemex tet Comam , hex ay bey yul con̈ob Colosas . Ha'ojab Comam Dios chiak'ni ak'anc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyet hununex .
51001002	
51001003	Hunta el yet chon̈txahlihan̈ teyin̈ caw chijak'an̈ yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios , Ismam Comam Jesucristo ,
51001004	yuto jabehan̈ isk'umal tato caw ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , yeb xin tato caw xahan cheyil sunil macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam .
51001005	Hac tu' cheyute , yuto ayexico heyechman hune' hematan ay bey yul satcan̈ . Yettax heyaben hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile caw yel chala , hatax tu' heyichico heyanico hune' tu' yipo heyanma .
51001006	Hune' cuybanile halbilxa heyabe' , caw lan̈an ispujnacan̈ yabelaxilo yul hunun con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Caw xin ay isc'ulal chacanoj . Haca'tic'a yu texol yet heyabenilo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios , yeb xin heyohtan̈eloj ta caw yeli .
51001007	Ha' juẍta Epafras quexcuynicano yin̈ huntek'an tu' , caw xahancano ay naj juhan̈ yuto caw jet munlawomal cobahan̈ yeb naj . Caw yijem chiyute isba naj ismunla yin̈ tzet chal Comam Jesucristo texol .
51001008	Ha' naj halni jetan̈ tato caw xahan cheyil heba yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
51001009	Yuxin hayet jabenan̈ hek'umal tu' , caw mach chicobejan̈ cotxahlihan̈ teyin̈ . Chicok'annihan̈ tet Comam Dios tato caw chi'ak'lax hehelanil yeb henabal yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo , cat heyohtan̈enilo sunil tzet choche Comam teyin̈ .
51001010	Hac tu' xin chu hebeybaln̈en tzettaj chisbeybaln̈e macta yetxa Comam Dios Jahawil , yeb hewatx'en tzet choche isc'ul , yeb hewatx'en sunilal isc'ulal , yeb xin heyohtan̈enilo Comam yin̈ caw c'ul .
51001011	Caw chon̈txahlihan̈ teyin̈ , haxinwal ha' Comam chak'ni heyip helin̈ban heba yu hune' yip Comam caw aycano yelapnoj , hac tu' xin caw chexk'oji istecha sunil heyu , yeb caw ay henimanc'ulal .
51001012	Yeb xin cheyak' yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ caw tzalahilal , yuto xayak' Comam toholboco conabal yuxin ay joc yin̈ cochahni comajul yinta macta yetxa Comam Dios yehi , ayxaco xol sajilk'inal .
51001013	Ha' Comam coln̈ehon̈ilo yul isk'ab k'ejholo , con̈yanico yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , Isc'ahol caw xahan ay yu .
51001014	Ha' Comam tu' xin , coln̈ehon̈ilo yet iscam yin̈ te' culus , yak'nicano tan̈o cotx'ojal yu iscamical tu' .
51001015	Waxan̈ca mach chijilico yin̈ Comam Dios , yaj Comam Jesucristo Isc'ahol Comam Dios tu' yen̈elo Comam jet , yuto caw Diospaxo Comam Jes'us . Ha' Comam babel yeb caw aycano yip yiban̈ sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios .
51001016	Yu Comam Jesucristo tu' , iswatx'e Comam Dios sunil tzet ay yul satcan̈ yeb sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ; sunil tzettaj chijilico yin̈ , yeb sunil tzettaj ye tu' mach chijilico yin̈ . Yu Comam , Isc'ahol Comam Dios xin , iswatx'e Comam Dios sunil mac ayco yahawiloj , yeb sunil mac caw ay yip , yeb sunil mac ayco iswi'ehaloj . Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin watx'i sunil ti' .
51001017	Ayxatic'a Comam Jesucristo yalan̈to maẍto chiwatx'i sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yin̈ xin Comam tzaban sunil tzettaj ye tu' .
51001018	Iswi'ehal yeco Comam jin̈ cosunil ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab , yuxin isnimanil Comam jehi , ha' Comam yichebanil . Ha' Comam babel itzitzbican̈ xol anma camom , yuxin ec'bal yelapno ye Comam yiban̈ sunil .
51001019	Caw sic'lebil tz'ajan yecanico Comam Dios yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , yuto hac tu' chiyoche isc'ul Comam .
51001020	El yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios tato yu Comam Jesucristo hunxan̈e chiyucano sunil tzettaj ye tu' yin̈ Comam , sunil tzet ay yul satcan̈ yeb tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yuto cam Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus , yel ischiq'uil Comam , hac tu' xin yu yoccano sunil yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam Dios .
51001021	Yet payxa , hex ti' caw nahat heyehilo yin̈ Comam Dios , yu istx'ojal tzet chewatx'e , yuxin chicajtza heyanma yin̈ Comam . Yaj wal tinan̈ xin , ayexxaco yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb Comam yu iscamical Comam Jesucristo , yet yak'lax ec'oya' yanma yin̈ te' culus . Hac tu' yute Comam yun̈e hayet cheyeni heba yin̈ sat caw matxa nino hetx'ojal , yeb matxapaxo nich'ano hemul yuto caw yetxa Comam heyehi .
51001022	
51001023	Yaja' caw yilal helin̈ban heba yin̈ caw istoholal yin̈ hune' chabilxayto yul heyanma . Mach chepohilo heba yin̈ tzet ayxaco yipo heyanma yu istzoti'al yet colbanile xaheyabe . Ha' ton hune' istzoti'al yet colbanile tu' chihallaxic'o sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ha' huninan xin chejbilinan walnic'ojan .
51001024	Wal tinan̈ xin , caw chintzalahan yu hanta ch'ec'ya' wanmahan heyu , haca'ojtam lan̈an intz'ajbanan yin̈ innimanilan hantato isya'tajil mach yak'le Comam Jesucristo yin̈ isnimanil . Yak'le Comam Jesucristo isya'tajil ju han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab ti' , yuxin isnimanilxa Comam je tinan̈ .
51001025	Ha' Comam an̈einicojan munil xol anma ayxaco yul isk'ab , yun̈e hewatx'ico yin̈ isc'ulal , yeb xin yun̈e inpujbanic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ haca' caw yelapno yehi .
51001026	Ha' ton hune' tzet mach ohtabiloj hune' ewan ye yu Comam Dios yettax maẍto yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yaja' wal tinan̈ xin xayak' Comam johtan̈elo han̈on̈ yeton̈xa ti' .
51001027	Caw el yin̈ isc'ul Comam yak'ni ohtan̈elaxo issak'alil isc'ul , hune' ewantic'a ye teyet hex mach Israeloj . Ha' hune' ewan tu' , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo ayxaco yipo heyanma . Ayco xin yipo coc'ul ta yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chiapni coc'ulal haca' isc'ulal Comam Dios .
51001028	Yuxin ha' Comam Jesucristo caw chijalic'ojan̈ tet sunil anma cat cocuynihan̈ , cat jalnihan̈ sunil helanile tet . Yuto caw chijochehan̈ tato chitoholbico isnabal hunun anma yin̈ Comam Cristo .
51001029	Yuton hune' ti' , yuxinto caw chiwak' wanmahan incuynicantojan sunil anma yu yip Comam Jesucristo chicolwa win̈an .
51002001	Caw chiwochehan cheyohtan̈eloj tato caw lahbiloco wuhan inmunlahan heyu , yeb yu ebnaj juẍta ay yul con̈ob Laodicea . Yebpaxo yu macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam maẍto bay chilico win̈an huneloj .
51002002	Caw chinmunlahan yun̈e yik'ni yip heyanma , yeb yun̈e hunlahanxan̈e hexahann̈en heba hesunil . Chiwochehan caw helan chexelcanico yin̈ yet Comam Dios , yun̈e caw heyohtan̈encanilo mac hune' mach ohtabilo yet yalan̈tocanoj , ha' ton xin Comam Jesucristo .
51002003	Ha' yin̈ Comam Cristo chiilchalo sunilal isc'ulal helanilehal yeb nabale .
51002004	Chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' teyet yun̈e machi mac chexak'ni subchaho yu montebal tzoti' , yuto ay mac ti' caw helan chutecano isba .
51002005	Waxan̈ca machijinan texol , yaja' ayexico yin̈ inc'ulan , haca'ojtam ayinicojan texol . Caw chintzalahan yet chiwabenan tato caw c'ul hebeybaln̈en tzet choche isc'ul Comam , caw cheyapaxico heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
51002006	Yuxin haca'tic'a yu hechahni Comam Jesucristo yul heyanma , hac tu' xin cheyutepaxo hebeybaln̈en tzet chal Comam .
51002007	Haca' hunu te te' caw caw yecanayto xe' yul tx'otx' , hac tu' cheyute heba yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , lin̈bawe heba heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam haca' yu yak'laxcano hecuybanil , cat xin heyak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
51002008	Cheyil heba xin , mach cheyak' subchaho heba tet ebnaj choche quexyak'a' subchahoj , chalni ebnaj helanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb cuybanile maẍtaj yecoj , yuto maẍtaj yin̈ Comam Jesucristo chilo ebnaj huntek'an tu' . Wal xin han̈etic'a iscuywabal yichmam ebnaj chi-la-yala , yeb cuybanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
51002009	Wal xin caw tz'ajan yecanico isc'ulal Comam Dios yin̈ Comam Jesucristo ,
51002010	yuxin caw tz'ajan yecanayo isc'ulal Comam Dios jiban̈ tinan̈ , yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo . Ha' Comam ayco yahawilo yiban̈ huntek'an ayco yahawiloj yeb ay yip , huntek'an mach chijilico yin̈ .
51002011	Yuxin caw ayxaco circuncisi'on teyin̈ tinan̈ , yuto caw hunxa heye yeb Comam Jesucristo . Yaj maẍtaj hune' circuncis'ion chioc yin̈ conimanil chiwalan , wal xin hune' circuncisi'on chitit yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yin̈ con̈iscolni yul isk'ab istx'ojal ayco jin̈ .
51002012	Hayet yahcano ha' hewi' , caw hun yu hemujlax yeb Comam Jesucristo yul sat Comam Dios . Yebpaxo xin hun yu heyitzitzbican̈ yinta Comam , yuto caw heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios ak'n̈i itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo .
51002013	Hayet yalan̈tocanoj , camnajexilo yul sat Comam Dios yu hetx'ojal yeb yu mach circuncidado heyehi . Yaja' tinan̈ , caw hun yu yak'nicano Comam Dios hek'inal yeb Comam Jesucristo . Yuxin yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin yak'cano tan̈o Comam Dios sunilal comul .
51002014	Ay hune' coc'as ayco jiban̈ yet yalan̈tocanoj yuto machi coyije huntek'an ley . Yaja' Comam Dios ak'ni tan̈o hune' coc'as tu' ; yilo Comam jiban̈ yuto pahlaxico Comam yin̈ te' culus yu ch'en lawuẍ .
51002015	Hayet iscam Comam Jesucristo yin̈ culus tu' xin , yak'ni ayc'ayo Comam huntek'an yahawil yeco yu naj matzwalil . Isyenicanilo Comam yin̈ sat anma tato elcano ispixan huntek'an tu' yin̈ huneln̈e . Hac tu' yu isyenilo Comam tato k'oji Comam yin̈ naj matzwalil .
51002016	Yuxin , ta choche ebnaj Israel cheyije isnabal ebnaj haca' yin̈ tzet chilolaxi , yeb yin̈ tzet chic'uxlaxi , yeb yin̈ tz'ayic caw txahul yul sat ebnaj , maca yet chipitzc'a ixahaw , maca yin̈ tz'ayic xewilal ; caw mach chechah heyabe .
51002017	Yuto sunil huntek'an tu' yecheln̈e yin̈ tzet xahul coxol , ha' isyelal yechel tu' , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo .
51002018	Mach cheyak' hamanil hecachlax hechahni hematan chak' Comam Dios , yu heyabento tzet chiyal ebnaj teyet . Chal ebnaj tu' ta caw yijem ebnaj , chiyo isba ebnaj tet ebnaj 'angel , caw comon chaco isba yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach chijilico yin̈ . Caw comonn̈etic'a chisnime winajn̈e isba ebnaj yin̈ tzettaj chiec' yin̈ isnabal .
51002019	Ha' ebnaj tu' mach hune'n̈eho ye ebnaj yeb Comam Jesucristo , Comam iswi'ehal yeco jin̈ . Ha' Comam Cristo chiak'ni jip , chon̈ishunbacano cosunil haca' hunu nimanile tzablebil isba isxijil yu istx'an̈al ; chon̈yak'ni ch'ibo Comam , yuto hac tu' chiel yin̈ isc'ul .
51002020	Walex hex ti' , camnajexxa yinta Comam Jesucristo yul sat Comam Dios , yuxin matxa ayexicto yalan̈ chejbanile yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yaja' ¿ tzet yin̈ yuxinto haca' to anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' cheyute heba ? Chebeybaln̈en huntek'an cuybanile chalni haca' ti' :
51002021	" Txahul yocnico hune' ti' heyu , maca xahan heloni huntek'an ti' , maca hetzabni huntek'an ti' , " ẍi .
51002022	Wal xin huntek'an cuybanile tu' yet anman̈e yehi , niẍtejal istan̈iloj yet chiocnico ju .
51002023	Yeli huntek'an cuybanile tu' , cochantan̈e ha' yehi , yuto chala ta chijiyo coba , cat cocachni coba yin̈ej tzet ye tu' , yeb cocachni conimanil yin̈ej tzet ye tu' , yaja' mach chicolwa yin̈ janma yinilo istx'ojal chocheto conimanil .
51003001	Wal tinan̈ , yu xacon̈itzitzbican̈ yeb Comam Jesucristo yul sat Comam Dios , yuxin cosaya'welo cowatx'en tzet ye tu' yet yul satcan̈ yehi , bay tz'on̈an Comam Jesucristo yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios yin̈ sunil yip .
51003002	Caw yilal janico conabal yin̈ tzet ay yul satcan̈ , matxahojab chijaco conabal yin̈ tzettaj ye tu' ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
51003003	Hayet iscam Comam Jesucristo , han̈-hun-on̈ con̈campaxo yintaj , yuxin coac' k'inal yeb Comam Jesucristo caw c'uwan yu Comam Dios .
51003004	Ha' Comam Jesucristo cok'inal yecoj , yuto yet chul Comam cat julpaxo yintaj . Hac tu' chiyu istz'ajnacanilo coc'ulal haca' isc'ulal Comam .
51003005	Wal tinan̈ xin , awecano sunil beybale yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , haca' ixloj , maca winajloj , yeb sunil tzettaj caw machiswalil , yeb tzettaj istx'ojal chi-la-heyochecoj . Mach cheyaco heyanma yin̈ k'alomal , yuto hune' tu' chu yoc hediosalo selelo Comam Dios .
51003006	Mac chito watx'en huntek'an tu' , caw chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈ , yuto mach chisyije yin̈ tzet chal Comam .
51003007	Sunil huntek'an ti' hewatx'e yet yalan̈tocanoj , yet ayextoco xol anma chi-la-watx'en huntek'an tu' .
51003008	Yaj wal tinan̈ xin , bejwepaxcano sunil huntek'an ti' ; ischiwa hec'ul , yeb istit hehowal , yeb henanico istx'ojal yin̈ hunuxa heyet anmahil , yeb hebuchwahi , yeb tzoti' tx'oj chielti' yul heti' .
51003009	Caw mach cheyaco lek'ti'al teyet hununex , wal xin caw matxa ayexocto yalan̈ yip hune' icham beybal ik'biltic'a heyu yeb huntek'an istx'ojal chewatx'e yet yalan̈tocanoj .
51003010	Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin , haxa hune' ac' beybale ik'bil heyu , lan̈an istoholbico henabal , yun̈e lahanxa chexelico yeb Comam Dios , Comam con̈watx'eni , cat heyohtan̈enilo Comam yin̈ caw c'ul .
51003011	Wal xin machi yoc yin̈ mac anmahil , waxan̈ca Israel maca machoj , waxan̈ca chabilxa circuncisi'on yin̈ isnimanil maca machoj . Waxan̈ca nan con̈obal , waxan̈ca xin mach cuywomoj , waxan̈ca yet isba ischuquil , maca c'amte' ; caw mach chiyoc huntek'an tu' yin̈ , ha' hune' caw yilal to yeton̈xa Comam Jesucristo cosunil , Comam ec'bal niman yelapnoj , caw xin ayco Comam yul janma .
51003012	Wal xin , caw ochebilex yu Comam Dios , saybilex yu Comam yu heyoc yuninaloj . Caw tz'ayojab hec'ul yin̈ heyet anmahil , caw c'ulch'anojab cheyute hec'ul , chewchotan̈eojab cheyute heba , machojab chexhowbi , ayojab henimanc'ulal .
51003013	Caw nimanojab cheyute hec'ul teyin̈ hununex , ak'we nimanc'ulal teyin̈ . Tato ayex cheyaco hemul teyet , haca'ojab yu yak'ni nimanc'ulal Comam Jesucristo Jahawil yin̈ sunilal comul , hacojab tu' chu heyak'nipaxo nimanc'ulal teyin̈ hununex .
51003014	Ha' hune' caw yilal yehi , xahan cheyil heyet anmahil , yuto ha' hune' coxahann̈en coba , ha' chon̈hunbanayo yin̈ isc'ulal Comam .
51003015	Ha'ojab hune' ak'anc'ulal chiyak' Comam Cristo chiijban heyanma , yuto yu hune' tu' yuxin awtebilex yu Comam Dios , yun̈e hune'xan̈e nimanile cheyucanoj . Ak'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
51003016	Caw chiwochehan tato caw huneln̈e chucanico Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo yul heyanma . Yin̈ojab caw helanil checuylecanto heba , cat hecachni heba . Bitn̈ewe isbi Comam Dios yu Salmos , himnos yeb bit chipitzc'ati yul heyanma .
51003017	Sunil tzet chewatx'e yeb sunil tzet cheyalpaxoj lahanojab haca' tzet choche Comam Jesucristo . Ak'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yu Comam Jesucristo .
51003018	Hex ixale , yijewe tzet chal heyichamil , yuto caw ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo .
51003019	Yebpaxo hex ichamile , xahan cheyil heyixal , mach howo cheyute heba yin̈ ebix .
51003020	Yebpaxo hex uninale , yijewe yin̈ sunil tzet chal hemam hemi' , yuto caw chitzala Comam Dios yin̈ haca' tu' .
51003021	Hex mame mi'e hex ti' , mach cheyak'tij ishowal heyuninal yin̈ isnabn̈ehal , haxinwal machi cabconcan̈ isc'ul .
51003022	Haxa hex camte' hex , yijewe yin̈ sunil tzet chal heyahawil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Machojabn̈etaj yet t'an̈anico ebnaj teyin̈ sak'al hemunlahi , yun̈e caw c'ul cheyucano yul sat ebnaj . Wal xin sunilojab heyanma chexmunlahi , xiwan̈wej yuto caw chil Comam Jesucristo tzet chewatx'e .
51003023	Sunilojab tzet chewatx'e , yin̈ sunil heyanma chewatx'eni , hacojtam ha' tet Comam bay lan̈an heyijeni , maẍtaj tet anma .
51003024	Caw johtaxa tato chiyak' Comam comatan han̈on̈ yuninalon̈xa ti' , yuto ayon̈ico cowatx'en haca' tzet choche isc'ul Comam Jesucristo , Comam Jahawil .
51003025	Wal mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal xin , chischah ispaj sunil tzet machiswalil chiswatx'e tu' tet Comam Dios . Yuxin tzet chi-la-iswatx'e hunun anma , hac tu' ispaj chiak'lax tet yu Comam Dios .
51004001	Hex yahaw munil caw c'ulojab cheyute heba , yeb watx'ewe istoholal yin̈ hec'amte' . Nawepaxtij tato chextak'wipaxo tet heyahawil ay bey yul satcan̈ .
51004002	Txahlan̈we yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , majwahan̈wej , ak'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios .
51004003	Txahlan̈wepaxo jin̈an̈ haxinwal chisye Comam baytu'wal chijalic'ojan̈ Istzoti' , hune' Tzoti' ewan ye yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Yu Istzoti' Comam tu' yuxin ayinicojan preso .
51004004	Txahlan̈wepaxoj yun̈e walnic'ojan hune' cuybanile ti' xol anma yin̈ caw haca' yelapno yehi .
51004005	Caw c'ulojab cheyute heba xol mac maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam . Mach nabn̈eho chiec' hetiempo .
51004006	Hayet chextzotel tet anma , ha'ojab tzoti' caw c'ul cheyal tet , huntek'an tzoti' caw chiyoche yabe' , yeb xin tz'ajanojab cheyute hec'ul hetxumnilo ispaj isk'ambebal chiyak' teyet .
51004007	Naj juẍta T'iquico , caw xahan ay naj wuhan , caw yijemcano naj yeb caw chicolwa naj wintajan yin̈ jalnic'ojan̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios . Ha' naj chiinipaxto tzoti' teyet yin̈ hanic' wehicojan bey ti' .
51004008	Yuxin chiwatojan naj ilwal teyin̈ yun̈e yalni naj teyet hanic' jecojan̈ , cat xin quexyiptzenpaxo naj .
51004009	Chitopaxo juẍta On'esimo yetbiho naj , naj ti' caw xahan ay naj juhan̈ , caw yijem naj yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios , heyet con̈obpaxo naj . Ha' ebnaj xin chihalni teyet tzettaj chiyu bey ti' .
51004010	Naj juẍta Aristarco ayco preso wintajan bey ti' , chiyalpaxto naj ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil yeb xin juẍta Marcos , naj yuẍtato isba yeb naj Bernab'e . Xaheyabe isk'umal naj Marcos ti' , tato chiapni naj quexistucle' bey tu' , chahwe naj yin̈ caw c'ul .
51004011	Chalpaxto juẍta Jes'us ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil , naj chiyijpaxo Justo . Han̈c'an̈e ebnaj ti' xol ebnaj Israel ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam chicolwa wintajan yin̈ walnic'ojan cuybanile yin̈ tzet chu yoc anma yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo . Caw xin ayco ebnaj ti' yipo wanmahan .
51004012	Chalpaxto juẍta Epafras ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil , naj ischejab Comam Jesucristo , caw heyet con̈obpaxo naj . Ayn̈etic'aco naj istxahli teyin̈ yun̈e caw toholn̈etic'a cheyute heba , yeb xin yun̈e tz'ajan chiyij isba sunil tzet chal isc'ul Comam Dios teyin̈ .
51004013	Testigo inan yin̈ tato ayco yin̈ isc'ul juẍta Epafras teyin̈ yeb yin̈ ebnaj juẍta ay bey yul con̈ob Laodicea , yeb xin ebnaj ay yul con̈ob Hier'apolis .
51004014	Yebpaxo xin juẍta Lucas an̈lom , caw xahan ay juhan̈ , chalpaxtoj ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil ; hacpax tu' juẍta Demas , chalpaxtoj ta cheyil heba .
51004015	Halwe tet ebnaj juẍta yeb ebix janab ay bey con̈ob Laodicea ta chil isba . Halwepaxo tet janab Ninfas ta chil isba , yeb xin sunil macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo chiscutxba isba bey yatut janab bey tu' .
51004016	Hayet chilahwi heyawten hune' hum ti' tet ebnaj juẍta yeb ebix janab , cat xin heyanito te' illaxo bey con̈ob Laodicea . Hactic'apax tu' xin , cheyilpaxo te' chati ebnaj juẍta bey tu' .
51004017	Halwe hune' ti' tet juẍta Arquipo : " Aco hawanma hayijen hamunil ak'bil tawet yu Comam Jes'us , Jahawil , " quexchi tet naj .
51004018	Hanin Pablo inti'an , han-caw-inan chintz'ibn̈etojan ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil . Nawetij tato preso wehan . Yak'abayo Comam Dios issak'alil isc'ul texol bey tu' . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
52001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an , yeb juẍta Silvano yeb juẍta Timoteo , chicotz'ibn̈etojan̈ hune' carta ti' teyet hesunil hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios bey con̈ob Tesal'onica , hex hunxa heye yin̈ Comam Dios Mame , yeb yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Yak'ab Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet .
52001002	Maẍtic'a chicobejan̈ jak'nihan̈ yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios teyin̈ hesunil , cat quexconanitijan̈ yin̈ cotxahan̈ tet Comam Dios .
52001003	Ayon̈n̈etic'acojan̈ quexconanitijan̈ yin̈ cotxahan̈ tet Comam Dios Mame yu hemunil yin̈ Comam , yu xaheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ yet Comam , cheyijenpaxo yin̈ tzet chal Comam yuto caw ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam . Cheyak'nipaxo techaho sunil isya'tajil chiay teyiban̈ , yuto caw ayco Comam Jesucristo yipo hec'ul .
52001004	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw ochebilex yu Comam Jesucristo , yeb xin johtaj tato ha' Comam Dios sic'n̈ehexcanoj .
52001005	Yet jalnihan̈ cuybanile yet colbanile teyet , maẍn̈etaj cotzoti'an̈ munlahi , to ha' hun yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo munla teyin̈ , caw xin johtajan̈ tato hune' cuybanile tu' caw yel chalcanoj . Walex hex ti' , heyohtaj tato c'ul jute cobahan̈ texol , cosaynihan̈ baytet isc'ulalo teyin̈ .
52001006	Haxa hex ti' xin quexoc tzujno yin̈ej isc'ulal coyecanojan̈ , yeb xin beybale isyecano Comam Jesucristo , hechahnicano Istzoti' Comam yin̈ caw tzalahilal chiyak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo , waxan̈ca yet hechahni tu' heyil isya'tajil yu anma .
52001007	Hac tu' yu heyenilo isc'ulal yin̈ sat sunil macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ay bey yul ismajul Macedonia yeb ismajul Acaya .
52001008	Yu hune' hebeybal tu' pujnacan̈ yabelaxilo Istzoti' Comam , yaj maẍn̈etaj yul ismajul Macedonia yeb Acaya , wal xin caw sunil yulajla con̈ob ohtan̈elaxiloj tato heyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin matxa tzet wal jalnihan̈ tet anma yin̈ hune' tu' .
52001009	Ha' caw anma tu' chalni tzet yu cobeyc'ojan̈ texol , yeb xin ta caw c'ul yu con̈hechahnihan̈ , yeb yin̈ tzet yu hebejni hetxahli tet hetioẍ , heyoc heyijen tzet chal Comam Dios itzitz , yeb caw Dios yin̈ caw isyelal .
52001010	Chiyalpaxo anma tu' , tato caw ayco yin̈ heyanma heyechman Isc'ahol Comam Dios chitit yul satcan̈ , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo itzitzbican̈ xol camom yu yip Comam Dios . Ha' xin chon̈colni xol hune' niman isya'tajil chihul yu Comam Dios .
52002001	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw heyohtaj tato mach naban̈eho con̈beyc'ojan̈ texol .
52002002	Waxan̈ca yet yalan̈to maẍto chexcotuclehan̈ con̈bahlaxan̈ , con̈mak'laxpaxojan̈ bey yul con̈ob Filipos haca' yu heyabeni . Yaj maẍtic'a con̈xiwan̈ yuto Comam Dios colwa jin̈an̈ . Hac tu' yu copujbanic'ojan̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile texol , waxan̈ca caw howbi anma jin̈an̈ .
52002003	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ , maẍtaj tzoti' mach yelo jalan̈ yet jec'tu'an̈ , maẍtajpaxo istx'ojal nabil juhan̈ yeb mach etalo nan juhan̈ .
52002004	Wal xin Comam Dios sayn̈eon̈icojan̈ , yak'nicano Comam hune' comunilti'an̈ yin̈ jalnic'ojan̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile . Yuxinto maẍtaj tzet choche isc'ul anma chicosayic'ojan̈ , to ha' tzet choche isc'ul Comam Dios , yuto yohta Comam tzet nabil juhan̈ .
52002005	Hex ti' heyohtaj , yeb xin yohtapaxo Comam Dios tato maẍtic'a hunelo quexcomontehan̈ yu tzoti' c'ulch'an yoqui . Machipaxo tzoti' ak'ni ayo hec'ul jalan̈ yun̈e jinilojan̈ melyu teyin̈ .
52002006	Maẍtaj yu heyanico comayan̈ yuxin chon̈ec'an̈ , maca yu jallaxan̈ nime anmahil yu anma .
52002007	Waxan̈ca xin ay jipan̈ jalnihan̈ teyet tato con̈heyilan̈ yuto ischejab Comam Jesucristo jehan̈ , yaja' xin mach haco tu' jutehan̈ . Ha' jetan̈ to c'ulch'an jute coc'ulan̈ teyin̈ haca' chiyu isya'iln̈en hunu ix mi'e niẍte yunin .
