52002008	Caw chexcoya'iln̈ehan̈ , yuxinto maẍn̈etaj Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile jak'an̈ teyet , wal xin cohin cobahan̈ jak'ni camo cobahan̈ teyin̈ , yuto caw chon̈tzalahan̈ teyin̈ .
52002009	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , tijab yul hec'ul hanta con̈siquihan̈ comunlahan̈ , cosaynihan̈ yin̈ tzet chu yec' juhan̈ . Con̈munlahan̈ tz'ayical yeb ak'balil , yun̈e matzet chicok'anan̈ teyet yet jec'an̈ jalnoc'ojan̈ Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile texol .
52002010	Hex cawex chu heyalni yeb xin testigo Comam Dios yin̈ tato caw c'ul jute cobahan̈ , yeb han̈c'an̈e istoholal cowatx'ehan̈ yet jec'an̈ texol hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Machi xin hunu mac chu yalni ta tx'oj cowatx'ehan̈ texol .
52002011	Heyohtapaxoj tato caw quexjiptzehan̈ , jak'nipaxojan̈ yak'lobal hec'ul haca' chu hunu naj mame yin̈ yuninal .
52002012	Jalnipaxojan̈ teyet hununex tato c'ul cheyute heba , yuto ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Ha' Comam awten̈eon̈ic'o yul isk'ab yeb yu cochahni sunil isc'ulch'anil Comam .
52002013	Yu hune' tu' , chijak'an̈ yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios , yuto yet heyaben Istzoti' Comam jalan̈ teyet , haca' caw Istzoti' Comam yu hechahnicanoj , mach haca'o comon tzoti' chal anma . Yin̈ caw yeli Istzoti' Comam Dios hune' tu' , ha' xin chimunla yul heyanma yettax hechahnicanoj .
52002014	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , yet yak'lax ec'oya' heyanma yu heyet con̈ob , caw lahan heyak'le yeb yuninal Comam Dios ay yul ismajul Judea , huntek'an mac yetxa Comam Jesucristo yehi , caw caj illax yu yet con̈ob Israel .
52002015	Ha' ebnaj israelita tu' potx'ni camo Comam Jesucristo , haca'tic'a yu ispotx'ni camo ebnaj ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yettax payat , con̈iscajnipaxojan̈ ebnaj . Caw machi nich'ano isc'ulal ebnaj tu' yul sat Comam Dios , yuto chiscaj ebnaj sunil anma .
52002016	Mach chisje ebnaj ta chijalan̈ Tzoti' yet colbanile tet anma mach Israeloj , hac tu' chiyu yah sutsun ismul ebnaj yiban̈ . Yaja' wal tinan̈ xin xahul isya'tajil yiban̈ huntek'an anma tu' yu Comam Dios .
52002017	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , yet jelan̈ texol hanic' tiempohal , caw ayexn̈etic'aco yul janmahan̈ , waxan̈ca xin mach chijilan̈ teyin̈ . Caw xin jacojan̈ yin̈ coc'ulan̈ cotohan̈ quexjilnojan̈ hunelxa .
52002018	¡ Caw jak'lehan̈ cotohan̈ quexjilnojan̈ ! Hanin Pablo inti'an tx'i'al el wochehan intohan quexwila'an , yaja' yayo naj matzwalil isya'tajil yuxin maẍtic'a yu cotohan̈ quexjilnojan̈ .
52002019	¿ Mac yin̈ chicawxi coc'ulan̈ ? ¿ Mac yin̈ chitzala janmahan̈ ? Wal xin hex ton ispaj comunilan̈ chiak'ni tzalahilal . Teyin̈ caw chitit cotzalahilalan̈ yul sat Comam Jesucristo yet chihuli .
52002020	Yin̈ caw yeli hex ti' ayexico cotzalahilalojan̈ , yeb ayexico comayojan̈ chiyute jabenan̈ .
52003001	Caw xin matxa chitecha juhan̈ jabenan̈ tzet heyehicoj , yuxin oc yin̈ conabalan̈ cocancanojan̈ cochuquilan̈ bey yul con̈ob Atenas .
52003002	Janitojan̈ naj juẍta Timoteo quexistucle' , naj ayco ischejabo Comam Dios yin̈ yalnic'o Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Jatojan̈ naj quexistucle' yun̈e yanico naj yip heyanma , yeb yun̈e cam hetoholban̈enico heba yin̈ Comam .
52003003	Haxinwal machi hunojex chicabconcan̈ hec'ul yu isya'tajil chihul teyiban̈ . Wal xin heyohtaxa tato yilal yec'ya' janma yu ej isya'tajil chihul jiban̈ .
52003004	Yuxin yet jec'an̈ texol , jalcanojan̈ teyet tato yilal yul isya'tajil jiban̈ , caw xin cheyila tato hac tu' elicoj .
52003005	Caw mach chitecha wuhan wabenan hanic' heyecoj , yuxin inchejtojan naj Timoteo quexistucle' , yun̈e yilni naj hanic' yeco heyanma yin̈ Comam bey tu' . Yuto ayco yin̈ inc'ulan c'uxantaxca quexyak' subchaho naj matzwalil yin̈ej istx'ojal , yuto ta hac tu' nabn̈em con̈munlahan̈ texol chal tu' , yaj machoj .
52003006	Yaja' wal tinan̈ xabeyc'o juẍta Timoteo quexistucle' , ha' naj xin initi tzoti' tato caw hune'n̈etic'a ha' yeco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yebpaxo xin ta caw xahan cheyil heba hununex . Yal naj jetan̈ tato caw chitzala hec'ul jin̈an̈ , chon̈henanitijan̈ yeb xin ta caw cheyoche con̈heyila'an̈ , hac tu' heyepaxico yin̈ coc'ulan̈ , caw chijochehan̈ quexjila'paxojan̈ .
52003007	Wal tinan̈ , hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , walca soman bisc'ulal yeb soman isya'tajil jehan̈ caw ak'lo coc'ulan̈ yet jabenan̈ tato caw hune'n̈e ha' yehico heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
52003008	Hayet jabenan̈ tato tohol hebelwi yin̈ yet Comam caw occano janmahan̈ yin̈ tzalahilal .
52003009	Tinan̈ xin mach chitxumcha juhan̈ tzet chu jak'nihan̈ yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios teyin̈ yu hune' icham tzalahilal chijabehan̈ heyu sata Comam Dios .
52003010	Wal xin , caw hunun tz'ayic yeb hunun ak'bal cok'annihan̈ tet Comam tato chiyak' Comam cohamanilan̈ cotohan̈ quexjilnojan̈ , yun̈e cam hech'ib yin̈ heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios .
52003011	Ha'ojab Comam Dios Mame yeb Comam Jesucristo , chicolwa jin̈an̈ yun̈e chiyu cotohan̈ quexjilnojan̈ .
52003012	Ha'ojab Comam chexak'ni ch'iboj , yeb yun̈e cam xahan cheyil heba hununex , cat hexahann̈en sunil anma , haca'tic'a isxahanil chexjilan̈ han̈on̈ti'an̈ .
52003013	Chijochepaxojan̈ tato chiyak' Comam yip heyanma , haxinwal toholn̈e chiyu hebelwi . Machojab hemul chiilchati yul sat Comam Dios Mame yet chihul Comam Jesucristo hunelxa yeb sunil macta yetxa Comam yehi .
52004001	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw haca'tic'a yu hecuywicano jintajan̈ yin̈ tzet chiyu jak'ni tzalaho isc'ul Comam Dios , caw hac tu' cheyute tinan̈ . Yuxin chijaltojan̈ cat cotak'entojan̈ teyet , hacojtam Comam Jesucristo chihalnito teyet tato chelahico heyak'ni tzalaho isc'ul Comam Dios .
52004002	Heyohtaj baytet hecuybanil ak'bil teyet juhan̈ , yu ischejbanil Comam Jesucristo .
52004003	Wal xin choche Comam Dios tato toholn̈etic'a hebeybal yul sat Comam , machojab hunu mac chiixli maca chiwinajli .
52004004	C'ulojab tzet chi'ec' yin̈ henabal , hune'n̈ehojab heyixal , ayojab yelapno ebix yul hesat .
52004005	Machojabtaj tzet choche henimanil chi'ec' yin̈ henabal , haca' chute isba anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios .
52004006	Mach chu heyixn̈en yixal hunuxa heyuẍtaj , yuto ha' mac chiuten huntek'an istx'ojal tu' chiay isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios , haca'tic'a yu jalnicanojan̈ teyet yeb haca' yu quexcocachnicanojan̈ .
52004007	Yuto maẍtaj yu cowatx'en istx'ojal yuxinto awtebilon̈ yu Comam Dios , walxinto yu copohnilo coba xol istx'ojal yuxin awtebilon̈ .
52004008	Macn̈etic'a chiyahni huntek'an cuybanile chiwalti'an , maẍtaj hunu anma lan̈an isyahni , walxinto ha' Comam Dios chisyaha , Comam ak'n̈e Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet .
52004009	Wal yin̈ hexahann̈en heba hununex mach yilalo chintz'ibn̈etojan teyet , yuto cuybilexxa yu Comam Dios hexahann̈en heba hununex .
52004010	Wohtajan tato caw xahan cheyil sunil macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ay yul ismajul Macedonia , yaja' chijaltojan̈ teyet tato cam chelahico hexahann̈en heba .
52004011	Chiwaltojan teyet , aweco yin̈ heyanma heye yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , haweco hemunil yin̈ hec'ul . Munlahan̈wej , haca'tic'a jute jalnicanojan̈ teyet .
52004012	Ta cheyije haca' tu' , c'ul istzotel anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam teyin̈ , yeb mach ya'tajo chi'ec' heyu .
52004013	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chijochehan̈ tato cheyohtan̈elo tzet chiyak'le anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam xalecamtoj , haxinwal mach cheyik' bisc'ulal , haca' anma machi bay chicawxi isc'ul .
52004014	Haca'tic'a janayto yul janma tato cam Comam Jesucristo , yitzitzbipaxocan̈ xol camom hunelxa , hactic'apax tu' janayto yul janma tato macta ayxaco yul isk'ab yet iscami chati Comam Dios yinta Comam Jesucristo yet chul Comam hunelxa .
52004015	Yuxinto chijalan̈ hune' cuybanile yet Comam Jesucristo ti' teyet , tato han̈on̈ itzitzon̈ yet chul Comam hunelxa , mach chon̈babito sata anma xalecamtoj .
52004016	Yuto hayet ch'awi Comam Jes'us yet chak'ni chejbanile , cat yel yaw naj arc'angel , cat yok' istrompeta Comam Dios , cat istit Comam yul satcan̈ ; ha' macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam yet iscami ha' chiitzitzbican̈ babel .
52004017	Wal han̈on̈ ayon̈toc'o xin , chon̈ilaxcan̈ yeb anma tu' , cat jah xol moyan cochahno Comam xol jak'ek' . Hac tu' chu japni isc'atan̈ Comam yin̈ huneln̈e .
52004018	Yuxinto iptzewe heba hununex yu hune' cuybanile ti' .
52005001	Wal yin̈ tzet tiempohal yeb tzet orahil chiyu hune' tu' , hex wuẍtaj hex wanab mach yilalo walnitojan teyet .
52005002	Hex ti' heyohtaxa yin̈ tzet chu yul Comam , lahan haca' yet chihul lemna hunu naj elk'om yet ak'balil , yet tona nahul ay anma , hac tu' xin chiyu yul Comam .
52005003	Yuxin hayet chiyalni anma haca' ti' : " Wal tinan̈ ak'anc'ulal xaye sunil , " ẍi . Ha' ton tu' yet chihul lemna c'ayilal yiban̈ anma , haca' yet chiichiti isya'il isc'ul hunu ix ix , hac tu' chiyak'le anma , matxa chiyu iscolni isba .
52005004	Yaj wal hex ti' wuẍtaj wanab , matxa ayexoco xol k'ejholo , yuxin mach tona nahul ayex yet chihul lemna Comam , haca' anma tona nahul aya yet chihul lemna naj elk'om yin̈ .
52005005	Walex ti' , yetxa issajilk'inal heyehi , haca' mac chiec' tz'ayical hac tu' heyehi , yuxin matxa yeto ak'bal yeb k'ejholo heyehi .
52005006	Yuxin machojab ayoco cowayan̈ haca' huntek'an anma tu' . Wal xin majwahojon̈we yin̈ yulbal Comam , helanojab chijute coba .
52005007	Johtaj ta yet ak'balil chiway anma , yebpaxo ak'balil chiuq'ui anma .
52005008	Walon̈paxo han̈on̈ ti' yeton̈xa issajilk'inal , yuxin toholojab chijute conabal . Yilal janico janma yin̈ Comam , yebpaxo xahanojab chijil coba cosunil . Ta hac tu' chijute lahanon̈ haca' ebnaj soldado chiscol isba yu ch'en ch'en pichbilico yin̈ istxam isc'ul . Haca'ojab yehato ch'en c'owi'e yin̈ iswi' ebnaj soldado yu iscolni isba , hacojab tu' iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ cocolbanil .
52005009	Maẍtaj yu yaniti Comam Dios ishowal jiban̈ yuxinto con̈issiq'uiloj , walxinto yu cochahni hune' cocolbanil tet Comam Jesucristo .
52005010	Yuto Comam Jesucristo cam coseleloj , yuxin waxan̈ca itzitzon̈ maca camomon̈xa yet chihul Comam , hunxan̈e chijucano yeb Comam cosunil .
52005011	Yuxin iptzewe heba hununex , cat helin̈ban heba , haca'tic'a lan̈an heyuten tu' .
52005012	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chijaltojan̈ teyet tato yilal heyijen tzet chal ebnaj chimunla texol bey tu' , ebnaj chexijban yin̈ yet Comam , yeb chiak'ni hecuybanil .
52005013	Nimanojab yelapno ebnaj yul hesat , xahanojab cheyil ebnaj , yuto yin̈ yet Comam chimunla ebnaj . Ehan̈we yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , machojab howal texol hununex .
52005014	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chijalpaxtojan̈ teyet tato checach mac mach chisje isc'ul chimunlahi . Iptzewe mac etza chipax yintaj , colwahan̈wepaxo yin̈ mac machi yip yanma yin̈ Comam . Ayojab henimanc'ulal teyin̈ hesunil .
52005015	Cam cheyil heba , tajca chepajtze tet macta chiwatx'en istx'ojal teyin̈ , wal xin ha' heyet aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal teyin̈ hununex , yaj maẍn̈etaj teyin̈ , to yin̈paxo sunil anma .
52005016	Tzalahilalojabn̈etic'a heye hunun tz'ayic .
52005017	Txahlan̈we tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
52005018	Ak'we yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunil , yuto hac tu' choche Comam teyin̈ , yuto ayxaco heyanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
52005019	Mach cheyilo yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul heyanma .
52005020	Mach cheyah chejbanile chitit tet Comam Dios chiyal ebnaj ischejab Comam .
52005021	Caw ocan̈we hetxumu' sunil tzet chihallaxi , cat xin hec'ubancano yul heyanma baytet c'ul .
52005022	Pohwelo heba yin̈ sunil istx'ojal .
52005023	Ha'ojab Comam Dios chiak'ni ak'anc'ulal , ha' chexpohnicanilo xol istx'ojal , cat isc'uban heyanma , henabal yeb henimanil , yet chul Comam Jesucristo .
52005024	Comam con̈awteni , caw tohol Comam , masan chiyij isba sunil ti' yu Comam .
52005025	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , txahlan̈wepaxo jin̈an̈ han̈on̈ti'an̈ .
52005026	Halwe tet sunil ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab ta chil isba yin̈ iscawil yin̈ caw tzalahilal , yuto yetxa Comam yehi .
52005027	Ha' Comam ak'n̈e hune' inmunilti'an , yuxin chiwaltojan teyet tato cheyawte hune' te' hum ti' xol sunil ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yetxa Comam Dios .
52005028	Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chianayo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul texol hesunil . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
53001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an yeb juẍta Silvano yebpaxo juẍta Timoteo chijatojan̈ hune' carta ti' teyet hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo bey yul con̈ob Tesal'onica , hex hunxa heye yin̈ Comam Dios yeb yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
53001002	Yak'abayo Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal texol hesunil .
53001003	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw yilal chijak'an̈ yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios teyin̈ , haca' caw yehi yuto hunun tz'ayic isch'ib heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yebpaxo xin caw ec'balto chexahann̈e heba hununex .
53001004	Yuxin caw chitzala janmahan̈ chijalnihan̈ hec'ulal xol hunun majan macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , yuto caw niman hec'ul , cheyanipaxico heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , waxan̈ca xin caw chextzumbelaxic'oj cat heyetalaxi .
53001005	Ha' ton ti' chihalniloj tato chil Comam yin̈ caw istoholal yin̈ tzet chielico anma , cat yalni Comam teyet tato ay heyoc yin̈ bay chioc Comam yahawiloj , yuto lan̈an heyetan heyanma tinan̈ .
53001006	Wal xin caw ha' istoholal chiswatx'e Comam Dios , yuxin yilal yanayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ huntek'an anma chiak'ni ec'oya' heyanma .
53001007	Hex lan̈an heyaben isya'tajil tinan̈ , chexyik'alo Comam Dios xol isya'tajil tu' jintajan̈ yet chitit Comam Jesucristo yul satcan̈ yeb ebnaj 'angel caw aycano yip . Chul Comam xol k'a k'a' yak'a' isya'tajil tet anma mach chisje yohtan̈elo Comam Dios , anma mach chiyoche yabe' istzoti'al colbanile aycano yu Comam Jesucristo .
53001008	
53001009	Chialaxcanto anma tu' yin̈ isya'tajil yin̈ huneln̈e , cat yilaxilo sata Comam Dios , hac tu' xin matxa bak'inal chiyil anma tu' isc'ulal Comam yeb yip Comam .
53001010	Hayet hune' tz'ayical yet chihul Comam tu' , caw niman yelapno ye Comam yul sat macta yetxa Comam yehi , yeb mac xayayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam . Xol mac tu' xin ayexico hex ti' , yuto heyaco heyanma yin̈ hune' tzoti' halbilcano juhan̈ .
53001011	Yuxinto caw chon̈txahlihan̈ teyin̈ , chicok'annihan̈ tet Comam Dios haxinwal caw c'ulex yul sat , ay heyoc yin̈ yawtebal Comam . Chijalnipaxojan̈ ta chak' Comam yip teyet hewatx'en sunil isc'ulal choche hec'ul , yeb yin̈ munil chewatx'e tet Comam , yuto ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam .
53001012	Hac tu' xin chialaxico ismay Comam Jesucristo heyu . Chialaxpaxico hewinajil yu isc'ulal Comam Dios yeb xin Comam Jesucristo .
53002001	Tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chijaltojan̈ heyabe' tzet chu yul Comam Jesucristo , yeb yet chon̈iscutxbanicoj .
53002002	Chiwaltojan teyet machojab subutajo hexiwcan̈ , yeb henani hunuxa tzet ye tu' ta chihallax teyet tato istiempohalxa yulbal Comam Jesucristo . Waxan̈ca chihallax teyet ta ay tzet illax yin̈ haca' wayique , maca hunuxa tzoti' , maca hunu carta chiapni teyet hacojtam han̈on̈an̈ chijatojan̈ chihalni tato ayxayo istz'ayical yulbal Comam Jesucristo .
53002003	Mach cheyak' subchaho heba , yuto yet yalan̈ato maẍto chihul Comam , ay hune' tiempohal bay tzetc'a mac chipaq'uico yin̈ Comam Dios , cat isyenican̈ isba hune' naj yahawil istx'ojal . Ha' hune' naj tu' yilal yalaxto naj yin̈ isya'tajil xol k'a k'a' .
53002004	Ha' ton hune' naj tu' chiyican̈ isba cat yoc naj howal yin̈ huntek'an chihallax diosal , maca huntek'an bay chiyiyo isba anma . Chanic'to isba naj yul yatut Comam Dios cat yalni naj tato ha' naj caw dioscanoj .
53002005	¿ Tom matxa chitit hune' ti' yul hec'ul xin ? Caw walan teyet yet ayinan texol .
53002006	Yaja' heyohta mac chioc majno sata naj yun̈e mach chihul naj yalan̈to istiempohal bay halbilcano yu Comam Dios .
53002007	Wal xin , chimunla naj yahawil istx'ojal yin̈ ewantajil xol anma tinan̈ , cachanxan̈e xin chechma naj yilaxilo hune' mac mach chichahniti naj , cat yul lemna naj .
53002008	Ha' to tu' xin chisyecan̈ isba naj yahawil istx'ojal tu' , yaja' hayet chihul Comam Jesucristo yeb isk'ak'al yip cat isxuno camo Comam naj yahawil istx'ojal tu' .
53002009	Naj Yahawil Istx'ojal tu' , ha' yip naj matzwalil ayco yin̈ naj . Can̈ chute isba naj , caw ay tzet chi-la-iswatx'e naj , chic'ay isc'ul anma yilni . Chisyenipaxo naj huntek'an c'aybalc'ule yun̈e issubcha anma yu naj .
53002010	Sunil yip ej istx'ojal chimunla yu naj yahawil istx'ojal tu' , yun̈e yak'ni subchaho naj anma cat cam yetanto isba , cat istocano yin̈ isya'tajil . Yuto huntek'an anma tu' matxatic'a choche isc'ul ischab isyelal tzet chal Comam Dios , yuxin mach chischah iscolbanil tet Comam .
53002011	Yu mach chischah anma isyelal Comam Dios , yuxin ton̈e chil Comam chiak'lax somchahoto isnabal cat yanito isba xol huntek'an lek'ti'al tu' .
53002012	Hac tu' chub iscawxico ismul anma tu' yiban̈ yu machi yayto Istzoti' Comam Dios yul yanma , yu ec'na chocheto sunil istx'ojal .
53002013	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw xahan ayex yu Comam Jesucristo . Yilal jak'nihan̈ yuch'andiosal teyin̈ , yuto yet yalan̈tocanoj quexissic'nilo Comam yun̈e hecolchacano yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo , Comam quexpohnicanilo yeto Comam Dios , yeb yu heyanayto yul heyanma yin̈ isyelal .
53002014	Yu hune' tu' yuxin quexyawte Comam , yu istzoti'al colbanile con̈ec'an̈ jala'c'ojan̈ teyet yuxin ay heyoc yin̈ issak'alil ayco yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
53002015	Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , toholojab cheyute heba yin̈ Comam , mach chec'ayto cuybanile halbilcano teyet juhan̈ yeb cuybanile jatojan̈ teyet yul carta .
53002016	Caw xahan ayon̈ yu Comam Jesucristo , yeb yu Comam Dios Mame , ha' chiak'ni yak'lobal janma yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Chak'nipaxo hune' isc'ulch'anil jet bay chicawxi coc'ul .
53002017	Ha'ojab Comam Dios chiak'ni yip heyanma cat quexislin̈bani , haxinwal c'ul tzet chewatx'e yul sat Comam yeb tzet cheyala .
53003001	Wal tinan̈ , hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , txahlan̈we jin̈an̈ , haxinwal yin̈ an̈e chiapni Istzoti' Comam Dios sunil baytajtu'wal , yeb yun̈e istzala isc'ul anma ischahnicanoj , haca' yu istzala hec'ul yet heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam .
53003002	Txahlan̈wepaxo yu con̈iscolnilojan̈ Comam Dios yul isk'ab anma machiswalil yeb tx'oj isnabal , yuto mach sunilo anma chichahnayto Istzoti' Comam Dios yul yanma .
53003003	Wal Comam Dios chij isba sunil tzet chala , ha' Comam chexiptzeni , cat quexiscolni yul isk'ab istx'ojal .
53003004	Chicawxi coc'ulan̈ yin̈ Comam Dios tato ayexico heyijen sunil tzet chijalan̈ teyet , yeb ta caw chelahico heyijeni .
53003005	Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chicolwa teyin̈ , haxinwal cheyohtan̈e ta xahan ayex yu Comam Dios , cat xin istecha sunil isya'tajil heyu yu yip Comam Jesucristo .
53003006	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , yin̈ isbi Cocolomal Jesucristo chijaltojan̈ hune' chejbanile ti' teyet tato chepohilo heba yin̈ ebnaj juẍta mach chisje isc'ul munlahoj , yeb mach chisyije cuybanile halbilcano teyet juhan̈ .
53003007	Yuto heyohtaxatic'a tzet wal heyuni , haca' yebil teyet juhan̈ . Han̈on̈ti'an̈ yet ayon̈an̈ texol machi hunu tz'ayical ti' mach con̈munlahan̈ .
53003008	Heyohtaj tato mach ton̈eho con̈wa'an̈ texol , wal xin con̈munlahan̈ tz'ayical yeb ak'balil yun̈e matzet chicok'anan̈ teyet .
53003009	Waxan̈ca xin ay jipan̈ cok'annihan̈ tzet chicolohan̈ teyet , yaj con̈munlahan̈ yun̈e coyenicanojan̈ tato hac tu' cheyutepaxoj .
53003010	Yet ayon̈an̈ texol tu' , chijalnihan̈ hune' cuybanile ti' : " Mac mach chisje isc'ul chimunlahi , machojab chiwa'paxoj , " con̈chiyan̈ .
53003011	Yaj xin xajabepaxojan̈ tato ay mac texol tu' ton̈e chieq'ui , mach chimunlahi ; ton̈e chilo istiempo anma .
53003012	Ha' tet huntek'an anma tu' chijaltojan̈ yu yip Comam Jesucristo tato munlahojab yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , haxinwal ha' caw chiik'ni tzet chislo .
53003013	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , machojab chexsiquilo hewatx'en isc'ulal .
53003014	Tato ay mac mach chiyijen tzet chijaltojan̈ yul hune' hum ti' , ton̈eojab cheyila maca matxa xin chehunba heba yebi haxinwal chitx'ixwican̈ .
53003015	Yaj xin mach cheyaco hehowal yin̈ , wal xin cuywe yin̈ istoholal , yuto juẍtapaxo yehi .
53003016	Ha'ojab Comam yahawil ak'anc'ulal chiak'ni ak'anc'ulal teyet hesunil yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Tzalahojab hec'ul , waxan̈ca ay bisc'ulal chiay texol . Ayojabn̈etic'aco Comam heyetbiho hesunil .
53003017	Wal hanin Pablo inti'an , han-caw-inan chintz'ibn̈etojan tato cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil . Inbihan chioc yin̈ hune' hum ti' haca' chu intz'ibn̈entojan sunilej incartahan .
53003018	Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil teyet hesunil . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
54001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan . Ak'bil inmunilan yu Comam Dios Cocolomal , yeb yu Comam Jesucristo , Comam ayco yipo janma .
54001002	Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' tawet hach Timoteo . Inc'aholan hawe yin̈ Comam , yuto wuhan yuxinto hachayto isyelal yul hawanma . Yak'ab Comam Dios Mame yeb Jahawil Jesucristo isc'ulal yeb issak'alil isc'ul yeb xin ak'anc'ulal tawet .
54001003	Yet inbeyan yul ismajul Macedonia , caw ink'anan tawet tato chaẍcancano yul con̈ob Efeso yun̈e hacachni ebnaj chi'ak'ni huntek'an cuybanile maẍtaj yecoj .
54001004	Machojab chischah ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yabe' ic'ti' mach istan̈bal yiban̈ilo ebnaj jichmam . Huntek'an tu' , caw comon tzoti' yec'baln̈e tiempo yehi , mach chicolwa jin̈ yin̈ coyijen tzet chal Comam Dios , yeb janico janma yin̈ Comam .
54001005	Ha' tzet yelapno chejbanile chiwaltoti'an , ha' coxahann̈en coba . Hune' coxahann̈en coba chitit yul janma caw saj , yeb machi nich'ano istx'ojal nabil yu .
54001006	Wal xin , ay mac texol tu' xayilo isba yin̈ huntek'an isc'ulal tu' , haxa yin̈ huntek'an issucal bay chaco isnabal .
54001007	Choche ebnaj ch'oc ebnaj cuywawomal yin̈ cuybanile aycano yu naj Mois'es , yaj mach chitxumcha yu ebnaj yin̈ tzet chala , yebpaxo yin̈ tzet chak' ebnaj iscuyu' anma , caw xin chischilba ebnaj yalni .
54001008	Johtaj tato c'ul cuybanile aycano yu naj Mois'es , yaja' ta haca' tzet choche Comam Dios yin̈ , ha' chijic'oj .
54001009	Txumweloj tato mach ak'lax chejbanile yu naj Mois'es yu iscachwa yin̈ anma c'ul chute isba ; walxinto yu iscachwa yin̈ anma man̈c'om yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios , yeb mach caw yijemoj , yeb huntek'an machi Dios yul sat , caw mulumpaxoj , huntek'an anma machiswalil yanma , huntek'an chiyahni sunil tzet chitit bay ay Comam Dios , huntek'an chipotx'ni ismam maca ismi' , yeb sunil huntek'an anma mak'om .
54001010	Chicachwapaxo yin̈ macta ixlom yeb macta winajlom , yeb huntek'an ebnaj cheta isba yeb yet winajil , yeb mac chi'elk'anto yet anmahil , yeb xin mac lek'ti' , yeb huntek'an ton̈etic'a chawte isbi Comam Dios xol sucal tzoti' chi-la-yala , hac pax tu' xin sunil huntek'an anma chicajni cuybanile caw yel chala .
54001011	Ha' hune' cuybanile caw yel chala , ha' ton Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile caw sak'alcanoj . Hune' yak'cano Comam Dios wetan yun̈e walnic'ojan xol anma ; caw niman yelapno Comam Dios .
54001012	Chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , yuto yak' Comam wipan , yu yijeminan chil Comam , yuxinto quinyacojan Comam yin̈ ismunil ,
54001013	waxan̈ca xin walan tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam yet yalan̈tocanoj , yeb caw caj wilan Comam , yeb inbahan Comam . Yaj xin caw tz'ay isc'ul Comam Dios win̈an yuto mach wohtajojan tato machiswalil huntek'an inwatx'e'tu'an , yeb xin maẍto chinchahan Comam Jesucristo yul wanmahan .
54001014	Yak'ni Comam sunil isc'ulch'anil isc'ul wetan , yeb wanaytojan yul wanmahan yin̈ Comam , yak'nipaxo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul wetan haca' hune' chak' Comam tet mac hunxa ye yeb Comam Jesucristo .
54001015	Hune' chiwalti'an caw yelcanoj . Sunil anma yilal yanayto yul yanma tato hulic'o Comam Jesucristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e iscolnicanilo sunil anma mulum . Xol sunil huntek'an anma mulum tu' , haninti'an ec'bal mulum inan .
54001016	Yuxin tz'ay isc'ul Comam Dios win̈an . Hac tu' xin , win̈an isyelo Comam Jesucristo sunil isnimanc'ulal chiyak' tet anma mulum . Yuxinto haninan ayinicojan yechelo sunil anma chichahnayto Comam Jesucristo yul yanma yun̈e ischahnicano k'inale mach istan̈bal .
54001017	Yuxin nimanojab yelapno Comam yul cosat , jak'aweco ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Comam tu' machi bak'inal chicamiloj , yahawn̈etic'a yehico sunilbal tiempo mach chijil yin̈ Comam yu cosat , ha'n̈e caw Dios . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
54001018	Hach Timoteo , inc'aholan yin̈ Comam . Chiwaltojan hune' hachejbanil ti' , tato chawihti hawanma tawin̈ , hapahnito istx'ojal haca' hunu naj soldado mach chixiw yak'ni howal . Hac tu' chawute haba , c'ulojabn̈etic'a hanabal haca' yalni huntek'an ebnaj tawin̈ ; Comam Esp'iritu ak'ni yala' ebnaj . Aypaxo huntek'anxa ebnaj yu mach c'ulo chiec' yin̈ isnabal yuxinto yilo yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
54001019	
54001020	Hac tu' yute isba naj Himeneo yeb naj Alejandro ; yuxin wacojan ebnaj yul isk'ab naj matzwalil yun̈e yilni ebnaj tato mach chu jalni tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios .
54002001	Wal tinan̈ , ha' huntek'an ti' chintak'etojan teyet , tato chek'an tet Comam Dios sunil tzet chi-la-ocnico heyu . Yilal hek'anni tet Comam , cat heyanico sunil tzet cheyoche yul isk'ab Comam , cat heyak'ni yuch'andiosal tet Comam yin̈ sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
54002002	Yilal cotxahli tet Comam Dios yin̈ ebnaj yahaw con̈ob yeb huntek'anxa ebnaj ayco jahawil , haxinwal mach isya'tajil chihul coxol cat jec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal ; haxinwal chu janico janma yin̈ Comam Dios cat yec' yin̈ istoholal .
54002003	Huntek'an cotxah tu' caw c'ul , yeb caw sak'al yul sat Comam Dios , Cocolomal .
54002004	Chiyoche Comam Dios tato sunil anma chicolchahi , cat yohtan̈enilo isyelal .
54002005	Yuto hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios aya , yebpaxo hune'n̈ech'an mac chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo , Comam oc anmahil .
54002006	Yaco isba Comam Jesucristo yul isk'ab camical yun̈e istohlan ismul sunil anma . Hune' ti' isyelo isba yet yapni istiempohal .
54002007	Yuxinto ak'lax inmunilan wocan ischejabo Comam Jesucristo yun̈e inpujbanic'ojan hune' tu' , cat incuynicantojan anma mach Israeloj yin̈ isyelal , yeb yin̈ janico janma yin̈ Comam . Hune' chiwalti'an mach lek'ti'aloj , to caw yeli .
54002008	Yuxinto chiwochehan tato chitxahli ebnaj juẍta ay yul hunun con̈ob . Sajojab yanma ebnaj juẍtaj yet chiyahnican̈ isk'ab yet chitxahli . Machojab chichiwa isc'ul , machojabpaxo ishowal yin̈ hunuxa yet anmahil .
54002009	Wal ebix janab , yak'abico ebix xil isk'ap haca' caw yehi yin̈ istoholal , machojab lek'ti'o chute isba ebix yanico xil isk'ap . Machojab lolo'o chutepaxo isba ebix yanico yelawil , haca' ch'en oro maca ch'en perla , maca xilk'ape caw aycan̈ istohol .
54002010	Machojab haco' tu' chute isba ebix , walxinto ha' isc'ulal ha' chissay ebix iswatx'e' , yuto ayxaco ebix yul isk'ab Comam Dios .
54002011	Ton̈eojab tucan ebix yaben cuybanile , yijemojab xin chute isba ebix .
54002012	Mach chisje inc'ulan tato chicuywa ebix ix xol ebnaj winaj , maca xin chipalc'onpaxo ebix yiban̈ ebnaj . Wal xin ton̈ehojab chishajba istxiquin ebix yin̈ tzet chihallaxi yet ch'ak'lax cuybanile .
54002013	Yuto babel iswatx'e Comam Dios naj Ad'an , tzujanxa iswatx'enpaxo Comam ix Eva .
54002014	Maẍtaj naj Ad'an subcha yu naj matzwalil , walxinto ha' ix Eva , yayc'ay ix yin̈ man̈c'omal tet Comam Dios .
54002015	Yaja' ebix tu' , chicolcha ebix yet chilni ebix yin̈ niẍte yunin , yeb ta chaco yanma ebix yin̈ Comam , yeb ta chisxahann̈e ebix yet anmahil , yeb ta toholn̈etic'a yehico ebix yin̈ isyelal Comam Dios , yeb ta chispohilo isba ebix yin̈ istx'ojal .
54003001	Yin̈ caw yeli , ta ay hunu mac chioc ijbalomal xol yuninal Comam Dios , hune' munil tu' caw sak'alcanoj .
54003002	Yaja' ha' mac chioc ijbalomal tu' , machojab nino istx'ojal sata anma , machojab chissay hunuxa ix . Toholojab chiyute isnabal yeb isbeybal , yilal yak'ni ebnaj bay chiway anma chiec' isc'atan̈ . Helanojab ebnaj iscuywahi , yeb xin ayojab yelapno yul sat anma .
54003003	Machojab uc'um te'oj , machojab ak'om howal , yeb machojab ayco yanma yin̈ ch'en melyu . Wal xin c'ulch'anojab isc'ul yeb xin chewla winaj chute isba .
54003004	Yohtajojab yak'ni cuybanile yul yatut haxinwal yijem chielico yuninal , yeb xin chixiw yuninal tet .
54003005	Yaja' ta mach chu iscuyni naj yuninal yul yatut , maẍtic'am chu yocpaxo naj ilwal yin̈ mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam .
54003006	Hune' naj ch'oc ijbalomal xol yuninal Comam Dios tu' , machojabtaj hunu naj tolto chahn̈e Comam Jesucristo yul yanma , yuto ta hac tu' subuta islolo'n̈en isba naj , cat yayc'ay naj yin̈ isya'tajil haca' yu yayc'ay naj matzwalil .
54003007	Wal xin , c'ulojab isbeybal naj ijbalom tu' sata anma maẍto chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam , haxinwal machi mac chi'inilo ispixan naj , yeb mach chiayc'ay naj yul isk'ab naj matzwalil .
54003008	Hacpax tu' ebnaj chioc di'aconohal , ayojab yelapno ebnaj yul sat anma . Machojab nananta tzet chi-la-yala , machojab chiuq'ui ebnaj . Machojab ayoco yanma yin̈ yik'ni ismelyu yu lek'ti'al .
54003009	Yilal yanico yanma ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile ak'bilcano jet yu Comam Dios , hune' cuybanile chabilxayto yul janma , yeb xin sajojabn̈etic'a isnabal ebnaj .
54003010	Babel yilal yillaxi ta mach ismul ebnaj , lahwi tu' xin cat yak'lax ismunil ebnaj yin̈ di'aconohal .
54003011	Hac pax tu' xin ebix janab chioc yin̈ hune' munil ti' , c'ulojab isbeybal ebix yul sat anma . Machojab hobom tzoti' ebix . Nanojabn̈etic'a yu ebix yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e . Yijemojab chiyute isba ebix yin̈ sunil .
54003012	Ebnaj juẍta chioc di'aconohal , machojab hunoxa ix chissay ebnaj , yohtajojab ebnaj iscuywa yul yatut yeb yin̈ sunil yuninal .
54003013	Yin̈ caw yeli ebnaj di'acono c'ul chiyute isba yin̈ ismunil , chioccano iswinajil ebnaj cat yoc yip yanma ebnaj istzotel yin̈ cuybanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , hune' xaheyayto yul heyanma .
54003014	Ayco yin̈ inc'ulan intohan cachwilnojan yin̈ lembil , yaja' xin chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' hum ti' tawet ,
54003015	yun̈e ta chiec' tiempo wapnihan , hawohtaxa tzet chawatx'e xol yuninal Comam Dios . Han̈on̈ ti' yatut Comam Dios itzitz jehi , yuto han̈on̈ caw chijalic'o hune' cuybanile yet isyelal ti' , yeb xin han̈on̈ chijaco yip hune' cuybanile ti' yin̈ sat anma .
54003016	Yin̈ caw yeli chiwalcanojan , caw aycano yelapno ye hune' cocuybanil chi'ak'lax ti' , yuxin chiyal haca' ti' : Yaco isba Comam anmahil , yet yulic'o coxol . Haxa Comam Esp'iritu Santo yeniloj tato tohol isnabal . Ilbil Comam yu ebnaj 'angel . Hallaxic'o Istzoti' Comam xol anma nan con̈obal . Ay anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw yaco yanma yin̈ Comam . Chahlax Comam yin̈ isc'ulch'anil yul satcan̈ , ẍi .
54004001	Yaj haban yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo tato yet chihul islahobal tiempo , tx'i'al anma chilo isba yin̈ cuybanile bay ayco yanma , cat isto yinta huntek'an esp'iritu lek'ti'wom chiak'ni subchaho anma , yeb yin̈ cuybanile chitit yin̈ ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil .
54004002	Chabento anma tzet chal ebnaj lek'ti'wom chal isba c'ulal . Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' camnajilo isnabal , matxa chiyabeto tzet chal yanma .
54004003	Huntek'an ebnaj tu' chiscach ebnaj ismohyi anma . Aypaxo huntek'an tzet chilolax ti' chiscach ebnaj islolaxi ; yaja' xin ha' Comam Dios an̈ecano tzet chilolaxi . Han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam ti' , yu coloni yuxin aycano yu Comam . Hayet chicoloni xin chijak' yuch'andiosal yin̈ tet Comam Dios , yuto johtaxa isyelal .
54004004	Sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios caw c'ul , yuxin mach chu jalni ta ay huno tzet ti' machiswalil . Sunil chu coloni , cachann̈e chijak' yuch'andiosal yin̈ tet Comam yet chicoloni .
54004005	Yuto ha' Istzoti' Comam Dios chihalni ta sunil tzet iswatx'e Comam caw c'ulcanoj , yebpaxo cotxah chihalni c'ulal sunil tzet chicolo .
54004006	Tato chacuycanto ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yin̈ huntek'an ti' , c'ulach ischejabo Comam Jesucristo chal tu' , lan̈an hach'ib yin̈ caw c'ul yin̈ tzet chu janico janma yin̈ Comam , yeb yin̈ cuybanile caw c'ul chi-tic'a-hayije .
54004007	Wal xin , mach chachah huntek'an yic'ti'al ebnaj jichmam machi nino isc'ulal chak' jet , yuto sucal tzoti'n̈e yehi . Ha'ojab yet Comam Dios chak'aytze haba yin̈ .
54004008	Yin̈ caw yeli yet chicok'aytzen coba jak'ni labanbo conimanil yin̈ hunu sajach chicolwa jin̈ , yaja' ta chicok'aytze coba yin̈ yet Comam Dios , ec'balto c'ul , yuto chak' isc'ulal jet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb yet ayon̈xa yul satcan̈ .
54004009	Ha' hune' chiwalti'an caw yeli , sunil anma yilal yanayto yul yanma .
54004010	Yuxin ch'ahilo coc'ul jak'ni jip comunla yin̈ yet Comam Dios , yuto ha' Comam itzitz ayco yipo janma . Ha' Comam tu' Iscolomal sunil anma , yuxin ha' mac chichahni yul yanma , chicolchahi .
54004011	Huntek'an chiwalti'an , ha' chawak' iscuyu' anma , cat hawalni tet tato chisyije .
54004012	Machojab mac chalni tato matzet hawohtaj yuto tzehachto . Wal xin toholojab chawute haba haxinwal chayelo xol ebnaj juẍtaj tato hac tu' chiyutepaxo isba . C'ulojab hatzoteli , toholojab habeybal , yebpaxo xin xahan chawil hawet anmahil , yeb hayenilo yin̈ tzet chu janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios , cat hapohnilo haba yin̈ istx'ojal haca' yuninal Comam Dios .
54004013	Hayet maẍto chinapnihan , aco yin̈ hac'ul hawilni Istzoti' Comam Dios yabe' ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab . Chawiptzenpaxo ebnaj yin̈ Istzoti' Comam , cat hacuyni ebnaj yin̈ .
54004014	Caw mach chahinc'uln̈e hune' hahelanil ak'bil tawet yu Comam Dios , hune' hallaxilto yet yanayo isk'ab ebnaj anciano tawiban̈ .
54004015	Aco hawanma yin̈ sunil huntek'an chiwalti'an , haxinwal sunil mac chi'ilni tato hunun tz'ayic hawik'ni hawip yin̈ yet Comam .
54004016	Chawil haba yin̈ tzet chawu yeb xin yin̈ tzet chiyu hacuywahi . Lahico habelwi yin̈ huntek'an ti' . Tato toholn̈etic'a chawute haba yin̈ chaẍcolcha yu , cat iscolcha sunil mac chi'aben tzet chawal tu' .
54005001	Yet chachcachwa yin̈ ebnaj ichamtaxa , mach howo chu hatzotel tet ebnaj , wal xin hak'anc'ulal chaẍtzotel tet ebnaj , haca' chiyu hatzotel tet hamam .
54005002	Hac pax tu' tet ebix janab ixnamtaj , c'ulch'anojab chiyu hatzotel tet ebix , haca' chawute hatzotel tet hami' . Yebpaxo tet ebix k'opotaj , c'ulojab chiyu hatzotel tet ebix hacojtam tet hunu hawanab chaẍtzoteli . Machojab nino istx'ojal nabil hawu .
54005003	Colwahan̈ yin̈ ebix camnaxa yichamil , ebix machi bay chicawxi isc'ul .
54005004	Ta ay ebix hun ix tu' ay yunin , maca yunin yunin , ha' huntek'an tu' yet ay iscolwa yin̈ tzet chiocnico yu ebix . Yuto ebnaj uninale yilal isyijen ebnaj iscolwahi , yeb ispajtzen tet ismam maca ismi' , yuto caw c'ul hune' tu' yul sat Comam Dios , caw chitzala Comam yin̈ .
54005005	Yaj wal hunu ix hunix caw ischuquilxan̈e matxa mac yin̈ chicawxi isc'ul , cachann̈e yin̈ Comam Dios chicawxi isc'ul , yeb xin mach chisbej ix istxahli tet Comam ch'ec' tz'ayic , ch'ec' ak'bal , chu iscolwa ej yuninal Comam Dios yin̈ ix .
54005006	Yaj tato ay huno ix hunix chiec' yin̈ istx'ojal , mach chu iscolwa yuninal Comam yin̈ ix , yuto waxan̈ca itzitz isnimanil ix , yaj wal yul sat Comam Dios camom ix .
54005007	Halpax huntek'an cuybanile ti' tet ebnaj juẍtaj , yeb tet ebix janab , haxinwal machi huno istx'ojal chihallaxico yin̈ sat .
54005008	Ta ay huno juẍtaj mach chicolwa yin̈ mac ayto yu isba yebi , yeb ta hac tu' chutepaxo yul yatut , hune' mac tu' matxa chu yalni isba yuninalo Comam Dios , yeb ec'na machiswalil sata anma maẍto chichahni Istzoti' Comam yul yanma .
54005009	Ha' ix hunix bay wal iscolwa yuninal Comam Dios , ha' ix tz'ajanxa yin̈ sesenta habil yeb xin ta mach issay ix hunuxa winaj yet aytoc'o yichamil .
54005010	Yeb tato ohtabil isc'ulal iswatx'e ix yet yalan̈tocanoj , ta c'ul yu yak'ni ch'ibo ix yunin , yeb tato yak' ix bay chiway anma ec' isc'atan̈ , yeb tato istx'ah ix yoj yuninal Comam ec' isc'atan̈ , yeb xin ta colwa ix yin̈ anma ya'ta yecoj , yeb xin ta isc'ulaln̈etic'a iswatx'e ix ; ta hac tu' chu iscolwa yuninal Comam Dios yin̈ ix .
54005011	Wal ebix hunix k'opoto mach chu hawanico ebix yin̈ istxolal isbi ebix hunix , yuto ay ebix ha' tzet choche isc'ul ha' chiswatx'e , chisbejnicano ebix hune' munil yet Comam Jesucristo , yuto ha' ismohyi ebix ha' ayco yin̈ isc'ul .
54005012	Hac tu' chu iscancano ebix tx'ojal cat isman̈c'oncan̈ hune' munil chabilxa yu tu' .
54005013	Yeb istila xan̈e n̈a ch'ec' ebix choche , cat isk'ayilo ebix isahil . Maẍn̈etaj hune' tu' , wal xin chik'aypaxilo ebix halo k'umal , chanito isba ebix xol tzettaj ye tu' yeb tzoti' mach chiyoc ebix yin̈ .
54005014	Yuxinto chiwochehan tato chimohyi ebix hunix k'opoto , ayojab yunin ebix cat yoc ebix yilno yatut ; haxinwal machi bay chicawxi anma chon̈cajni yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios .
54005015	Chiwaltojan huntek'an ti' tawet yu ay ebix hunix ti' xameltzoto yintaj . Haxa tzet chal naj matzwalil lan̈an isyijen ebix tinan̈ .
54005016	Tato ay huno naj juẍtaj maca huno ix janab ay huno ix hunix yul yatut , yilal iscolwa yin̈ ix . Machojab chioc ix yijatzo yuninal Comam , haxinwal han̈e yin̈ ebix yin̈ caw yeli machi hunu mac bay chicawxi isc'ul , ha' bay chicolwa yuninal Comam .
54005017	Ha' ebnaj anciano c'ul yijbali yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj , yilal niman yelapno ebnaj yul sat ebnaj juẍtaj sunil . Hactic'apax tu' ebnaj anciano chipujbanic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios , yebpaxo ebnaj chicuywa yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios yilal ischahni ebnaj istohol , yeb nimanojab yelapno ye ebnaj yul sat ebnaj juẍtaj .
54005018	Yuto chal Istzoti' Comam Dios haca' ti' : " Mach chub heyak'aco yet isti' no' wacax yet chixan̈wi trigo no' , " ẍiayoj . Chalnipaxoj : " Ha' ebnaj munlawom , yilal ischahni ebnaj istohol , " ẍiayoj .
54005019	Mach ton̈ehojabn̈etic'a chawabeto yin̈ tzet chal hunu mac chioc ak'oc'ule tawet yin̈ hunu naj anciano , wal xin yilal ay cawan̈ maca oxwan̈ testigo chihalni ta yeli .
54005020	Tato ay hunu naj juẍtaj maca ix janab mach chisbej yanico ismul , yilal hecachni yin̈ sat sunil yuninal Comam Dios , haxinwal chixiw sunil yuninal Comam yanico ismul .
54005021	Yin̈ sat Comam Dios yeb xin yin̈ sat Comam Jesucristo yeb xin yin̈ sat ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios , chintak'etojan huntek'an chejbanile ti' tawet tato caw yilal hayijeni . Lahanojabn̈e chawute haba yin̈ ebnaj juẍta yeb ebix janab ; machojab chawato haba yin̈ hunu maca .
54005022	Mach comono chawaco ismunil huno naj juẍta yul isk'ab yin̈ an̈e yalan̈to maẍto chawil isbeybal naj , haxataxca ch'elicoj hach hunach chawato haba yin̈ istx'ojal hune' mac tu' . Wal xin , machojab chawato haba xol tzet ye tu' machiswalil .
54005023	Chiwaltojan tawet yu hune' ya'c'ul nawn̈e chi'oc tawin̈ , mach chiyu hawuc'ni ha ha' ischuquil , wal xin c'ul ta chawuc'paxo niẍtejo te' vino an̈il .
54005024	Wal yin̈ isbeybal anma , ay mac ti' ixtan̈ jilni ismul yet yalan̈to maẍto chi'illaxi tzet chielicoj . Ay mac xin hato yet chiillaxi tzet chielicoj catto yiẍtan̈wi ismul .
54005025	Hac pax tu' ye anma chiuten isc'ulal , ixtan̈ yillaxi , yaj ay mac ti' mach ixtan̈o isc'ulal lan̈an iswatx'en tinan̈ , masantic'a chiixtan̈wiloj cat xin isyenilo isba , mach chicancano yin̈ ewantajil .
54006001	Chiwaltojan tawet yin̈ ebnaj lok'bil yu ispatr'on yu yoc chejaboj . Ayojab yelapno yahaw ebnaj tu' yul sat , haxinwal mach chibuchlax isbi Comam Dios yebpaxo xin cuybanile chijalan̈ .
54006002	Yaj tato ay huno mac ayxaco ispatr'on tu' yul isk'ab Comam Dios , machojabtaj yu tu' yuxin matxa yelapno naj yul sat , wal xin yilal isyijen naj chejab tu' tzet chal ispatr'on yuto yuẍtaxa isba iscawan̈il yin̈ Comam . Caw c'ulojab chiyu ismunla naj chejab yul isk'ab ispatr'on , yuto naj chichahni hune' munil tu' ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , juẍtaxa yehi , yeb caw xahan ay ju . Ha' huntek'an tu' , yilal hawoc hacuyni cat hawalni tato yilal isyijelaxi .
54006003	Tato ay anma nan cuybanile chiyalic'oj , mach lahano yeb cuybanile yet Comam Jesucristo caw yel chala , yeb mach lahano yeb hune' caw tohol ak'bil cocuyu' ,
54006004	huntek'an anma tu' , caw can̈ye yalni , yaj xin caw matzet yohtaj . Huntek'an anma tu' ton̈e chiyoche isteye'co anma yin̈ tzet yelapno ye tzoti' . Ha' ton yin̈ tu' chi'ichico chichonc'ulal , yeb howal , yeb buchwal , hac tu' xin chu yoc cabc'ulal .
54006005	Maẍtic'a chisbej anma tu' yak'ni howal , caw matxatic'a c'ulu yul iswi' , matxa isyelal Istzoti' Comam Dios ayco yin̈ . Ha' hune' nabil yu anma , ha' ton yik'ni niman melyu yin̈ cuybanile chabilxa ju . Mach chahunba haba yeb huntek'an anma tu' .
54006006	Yaja' yin̈ caw yeli , niman isc'ulal chicochah yin̈ cuybanil chahbilxa ju tu' , yaj xin ta chijak' tzalaho coc'ul yin̈ tzet ay yul cok'ab .
54006007	Wal xin , matzet ik'bil ju yet copitzc'a yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb xin matzet chijipaxto jintaj yet chon̈camtoj .
54006008	Yuxin ta ay tzet chicolo yeb xin ta ay xil cok'ap , jak'a' tzalaho coc'ul .
54006009	Yuto ha' mac choche chioc k'alomal , subuta yayc'ay yul isk'ab istx'ojal , cat yochento tzettaj ye tu' machi nino isc'ulal chiswatx'e yin̈ , cat yochenpaxto ismachiswalilal . Hac tu' chu yetaxcanto isnabal , cat isc'aycantoj .
54006010	Yuto ta chijaco janma yin̈ ch'en melyu , ha' ton xe' sunil istx'ojal . Ay ebnaj juẍta ti' yu yaco yanma yin̈ ch'en melyu yilo yanma yin̈ Comam , istitcano niman bisc'ulal yiban̈ ebnaj .
54006011	Wal hach ti' wuẍta Timoteo , yet Comam Dios hawehi . Elan̈ tet huntek'an istx'ojal tu' , ha' isc'ulal chasayiloj . K'an yip hawanma tet Comam Dios . Tohol chawute habelwi yin̈ Comam yin̈ sat anma . Xahan chawil hawet anmahil , ijle isya'tajil chi'ay tawiban̈ . Chewojab chawute haba .
54006012	Aco yin̈ hac'ul halahnico hawanico hawanma yin̈ Comam Dios , caw yachyon̈e chawuco yin̈ hune' hasabehal , ha' ton hak'inal mach istan̈bal . Yu hune' tu' , yuxin awtebilach yu Comam Dios , yeb xin caw c'ul yu hatak'wen yin̈ sat tx'i'al ebnaj tato ha' Comam Jes'us , ha' Jahawil yehicoj .
54006013	Wal tinan̈ yin̈ sat Comam Dios , chi'ak'ni isk'inal sunil tzettaj ye tu' , yeb xin yin̈ sat Comam Jesucristo , Comam halni isyelal sata naj Poncio Pilato , chiwaltojan hachejbanil .
54006014	Yilal hayijen huntek'an cuybanile ti' . Machojab nino tzet chaman̈c'o , haxinwal machi baytet yin̈ chaẍcachlaxi masanto yet chihul Comam Jesucristo hunelxa .
54006015	Wal xin chihul hune' tiempohal haca' chiyoche Comam Dios , cat yijni isba huntek'an ti' , yuto yul isk'ab Comam Dios ay sunil . Caw sak'al yet Comam , isreyal ebnaj rey ye Comam , yahawilpaxo ebnaj yahawil ye Comam .
54006016	Han̈ech'an Comam Dios machi bak'inal chicami . Ay Comam xol hune' issajilk'inal bay machi hunu mac chiyu ishitzico isc'atan̈ . Maẍto hunu mac xa'ilni yin̈ Comam , machipaxo mac chu isk'oji yilni Comam . ¡ Bitn̈elaxojab isbi Comam yu ishelanil yeb yu yip ay yin̈ sunilbal tiempo ! ¡ Hacojab tu' !
54006017	Ebnaj juẍta ay isk'alomal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , hal tet ebnaj tato mach chislolo'n̈e isba ebnaj . Machojab xin chaco yanma ebnaj yin̈ isk'alomal , yuto hune' k'alomal tu' chitan̈iloj . Wal xin yak'abico yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios . Comam ch'ak'ni sunil tzettaj ye tu' jet yin̈ caw niman yu isc'ulalo jin̈ .
54006018	Hal tet ebnaj tato caw c'ul chute isc'ul ebnaj . Yak'abico ebnaj yin̈ isc'ul iswatx'en isc'ulal , colwahojab ebnaj yin̈ anma matzet aya , machojab ch'ok' ebnaj yak'ni .
54006019	Ta chisbeybaln̈e ebnaj isc'ulal , ay isk'alomal ebnaj lan̈an iscutxban satcan̈ , cat xin ischahni hune' k'inale mach istan̈bal .
54006020	Hach Timoteo , caw chawil haba yin̈ tzet abebilico yul hak'ab . Mach chawabeto huntek'an tx'oj tzoti' machi nino isc'ulal chak'a . Mach chawabepaxto huntek'an helanile maẍtaj yecoj chal ebnaj chon̈cajni yu chijalic'o isyelal .
54006021	Ebnaj oc tzujno yinta huntek'an cuybanile tu' , xaisheq'uilo isba ebnaj yin̈ isyelal . Ha'ojab Comam Dios chiak'ni ak'anc'ulal tawet . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
55001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan , yuto hac tu' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios , yu walnic'ojan hune' k'inale mach istan̈bal chiilcha yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , haca' yu yaltencano Comam Dios .
55001002	Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' incartati'an tawet wuẍta Timoteo , caw xahan ayach wuhan , yuto inc'aholan hawe yin̈ Comam . Ha'ojab Comam Dios Mame yeb xin Comam Jesucristo chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal tawet , cat istz'ay isc'ul tawin̈ .
55001003	Hayet chaẍinnanitijan yet chintxahlihan hunun tz'ayic yeb hunun ak'bal chiwak'an yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios tawin̈ . Yin̈ istoholal innabalan chinmunlahan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios , haca' yu ismunla ebnaj wichmaman yet payat .
55001004	Chinnatijan yet hawok'i yet hacancano wuhan . Chiwochehan chachwilan hunelxa yun̈e cam yahcanocan̈ tzalahilal yul wanmahan .
55001005	Chinnatijan tato yin̈ caw yeli ayco hawanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Haca' hami' ixnam Loida yeb hami' Eunice , ha' babel yaco yanma yin̈ Comam , caw xin wohtajan tato hac tu' hawanipaxico hawanma yin̈ Comam .
55001006	Yuxin chiwaltojan tawet tato ayachojabn̈etic'aco hawanico yip hahelanil yak'cano Comam Dios tawet yet wanayo ink'aban yiban̈ hawi' .
55001007	Wal xin , hune' Esp'iritu xayak' Comam Dios jet , mach chiyak' xiwquilal yul janma , walxinto chak' yip janma , yeb coxahann̈en coba , yebpaxo cocachni coba yin̈ej istx'ojal .
55001008	Yuxin mach chaẍtx'ixwi hawalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo , yeb xin mach chaẍtx'ixwipaxoj yuto ayinicojan yul preso ti' yu Istzoti' Comam . Wal xin yu hawip chak' Comam Dios yilal hachahni ej isya'tajil chihul tawiban̈ yu chawalic'o Istzoti' Comam chiak'ni colbanile .
55001009	Wal tinan̈ colbilon̈xa yu Comam , yeb awtebilon̈xa yu joccano yeto Comam . Yaj maẍtaj yu tzet chicowatx'e yuxin colbilon̈xa , machoj ; walxinto yu nabilxatic'a yu Comam yet yalan̈ato maẍto chiswatx'e Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yak'nipaxo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul jet yu Comam Jesucristo .
55001010	Isyelo Comam Dios isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tu' yin̈ Comam Jes'us yet yulic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yak'nicano tan̈o yip hune' camical jiban̈ , yak'ni ohtan̈elaxo hune' k'inale mach istan̈bal yu cuybanile yet colbanile .
55001011	Ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e inmunilan walnic'ojan hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile ti' , quinyanicojan ischejabo Comam Jesucristo , yeb cuywawomal xol anma mach Israeloj .
55001012	Yuxin chiwilan huntek'an isya'tajil chiay wiban̈ti'an , yaja' machi nich'ano chintx'ixwihan , yuto wohtajan mac yin̈ ayco wanmahan . Wohtapaxojan ta tzet chiwak'an isc'uba' Comam Dios , ay yip Comam isc'ubani masanto yet ch'ayilo islahobal tz'ayic .
55001013	Huntek'an cuybanile ak'bil tawet wuhan , yin̈ caw yeli yet Comam Dios yehi . Ha' huntek'an cuybanile ti' chawilto habeybaln̈eni . Tinan̈ hunxan̈e je yeb Comam Jesucristo , yuxin aco hawanma yin̈ Comam , yeb xin xahan chawil hawet anmahil .
55001014	Wal xin , yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo ayco jin̈ hununon̈ , yuxin caw chaya'iln̈e huntek'an cuybanile ak'bil tawet yu Comam Dios .
55001015	Hawohtaj tato sunil ebnaj ay bey yul ismajul Asia bejn̈e incanojan , xol ebnaj tu' ayco naj Figelo yeb naj Herm'ogenes .
55001016	Ha'ojab Comam Dios chianayo isc'ulal yiban̈ macta ay bey yatut juẍta Ones'iforo , yuto tx'i'al el hulic'o naj yak'a' isnimanbal inc'ulan . Waxan̈ca ayinictijan yul preso ti' yaj xin mach chitx'ixwilo naj win̈an .
55001017	Wal xin huln̈e naj yul con̈ob Roma ti' , yoc naj quinissaynihan , maẍtic'a xin isbej naj quinissaynihan masan quinilchahan yu naj .
55001018	Ha'ojab Comam Dios chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tet juẍta Ones'iforo tu' yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic . Hach ti' caw hawohtaj ta colwa naj jin̈ yet ayon̈ yul con̈ob Efeso .
55002001	Hach caw inc'aholti'an , caw ak' hawip hawatx'enico haba yin̈ isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios chiyak' jet , yuto caw hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo .
55002002	Huntek'an cuybanile hawabe walnic'ojan xol anma , ha' chatak'e tet ebnaj juẍtaj yijem chute isba , yeb tz'ajan chute isc'ul ebnaj iscuyni hunuxa yet anmahil .
55002003	Hach ti' xin techahojab isya'tajil hawu haca' hunu naj soldado , yuto ischejab Comam Jesucristo hawehi .
55002004	Machi hunu naj soldado ti' ayco soldadohal cat istopaxo iswatx'eno hunuxa nan munilal , yuto yilal isyijen naj tzet chal yahawil .
55002005	Hacpax tu' hunu naj chiak'ni an̈e , mach chischah naj ismatan ta mach chisyije naj yin̈ tzet chu istzujcha apno hune' matan tu' .
55002006	Haca' hunu naj tz'unum awal , yilal ismunla naj babel cat ischahni naj sat istz'unub tu' .
55002007	Aco hawanma yin̈ huntek'an cuybanile chiwalan tawet ti' , ha' xin Comam ch'ak'ni cam hatxumu' yin̈ tzet yehi .
55002008	Nati Comam Jesucristo , Comam pitzc'acan̈ xol camom , Comam tit yin̈ yuninal naj jichmam David , haca' yalni Tzoti' yet colbanile chiwalic'ojan xol anma .
55002009	Yu chiwalic'ojan hune' cuybanile ti' , yuxin chiwabehan isya'tajil . Caw xin ayinicojan preso haca' hunu mac caw xiwquilta ismul , yaj wal Ttzoti' yet colbanile xin mach ayoco preso .
55002010	Yuxin , sunil chiwak' techahojan yu ayco wanmahan yin̈ macta sic'bilxacan̈ yu Comam , yun̈e ischahni iscolbanil caw c'ulch'ancanoj , mach istan̈bal , hune' chiak'lax jet yu hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo .
55002011	Hune' cuybanile ti' caw yel chala : Tato xacon̈cam yeb Comam , chon̈itzitzbipaxocan̈ yeb Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
55002012	Tato chijabe isya'tajil , chon̈ocpaxo yahawilo yeb Comam . Ta chijala ta mach johtajo Comam , chiyalpaxo Comam ta mach con̈yohtajoj .
55002013	Ta mach c'ulo chijute coba , wal Comam Dios c'ul Comam , yuto mach chisman̈c'o Comam yin̈ tzet chala .
55002014	Nati huntek'an tzet chiwalti'an tet ebnaj juẍta ink'ana'an . Cam tak'ecano tet ebnaj sata Comam Dios ta mach ch'oc ebnaj isteye'le isba yin̈ej tzoti' matzet chal yelapnoj , yuto matzet c'ul chiswatx'e , ton̈e chetato isnabal macta chiabeni .
55002015	Caw hantatic'a chu hawu lahico hawec' yin̈ isc'ulal , haxinwal chitzala Comam Dios tawin̈ , haca' hunu munlawom matzet yin̈ wal istx'ixwican̈ , hune' mac ha' cuybanile caw yel chalic'oj .
55002016	Caw mach chachah hawabe huntek'an tx'ojla tzoti' chal anma , yeb tzoti' matzet c'ul chak'a , yuto ha' mac chihalni huntek'an tzoti' tu' niẍtejal isto sutsun xol istx'ojal .
55002017	Haca' hunu tx'ac chik'atoj cat yec' lebohi , hac tu' chiyu yec' lebo huntek'an tzoti' chiyal ebnaj tu' . Hac tu' yute isba naj Himeneo yeb naj Fileto .
55002018	Xaisbejcano ebnaj hune' cuybanile caw yel chala , chalni ebnaj tato xapitzc'acan̈ ej camom . Ay xin huntek'an mac ayxaco yanma yin̈ Comam chicabconcan̈ isc'ul yu tzet chal ebnaj .
55002019	Yaja' wal Istzoti' Comam Dios yak'cano jet , caw ay yip , lahan haca' hunu xe' n̈a machi nino chibili . Ayco hune' sello yin̈ chalni haca' ti' : " Yohta Comam Dios macta yetxa Comam yehi , " ẍi . Chalnipaxoj : " Macxan̈etic'a anmahil chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , yilal chisbejcano sunil istx'ojal , " ẍi .
55002020	K'inalo hunu niman n̈a tinan̈ , caw tzetc'a k'uybe ayicto yul ; ay munlabal naba oro yeb naba plata ayicto yul . Aypaxo munlabal naba te'n̈e , aypaxo naba tx'otx'n̈e . Huntek'an munlabal tu' ay ec'bal yelapno ismunil , aypaxo xin comontan̈e ismunil .
55002021	Lahanon̈ haca' huntek'an munlabal tu' . Tato sunil machiswalilal chicobejcanoj , niman jelapno yul sat Comam Dios . Haxa Comam ayon̈ yet , xacon̈ocnico yu Comam yin̈ ismunil , helanon̈xa cowatx'en sunil isc'ulal .
55002022	Elan̈ tet sunil istx'ojal choche ebnaj hawet tzehal iswatx'e ; wal xin ocan̈ tzujno yinta istoholal . Cam lahico hawanico hawanma yin̈ Comam , xahan chawil hawet anmahil . Caw ayojab ak'anc'ulal yul hawanma haca' sunil macta chiawten Comam yin̈ .
55002023	Yaj mach chawabeto tzoti' machiswalil matzet chaliloj , yuto hawohtaj tato howal ch'iti huntek'an tu' .
55002024	Yuto hune' ischejab Comam Dios , mach chiyu yanito isba xol howal . Wal xin c'ul chute isba yin̈ sunil anma , helanpaxo iscuywahi , yeb xin niman chute isc'ul .
55002025	Ak'anc'ulal xin chiyu iscuywa yin̈ mac mach chischah cuybanile , yuto chalo yanico huntek'an mac tu' Comam Dios yin̈ isc'ul cat ishelni isbeybal , cat yohtan̈enilo hune' cuybanile caw yeli ,
55002026	yun̈e iscolchalo yul isk'ab naj matzwalil bay preso yeco yu naj ; chiswatx'en baytet choche isc'ul naj .
55003001	Yilal hawohtan̈eni tato yet islahobal tz'ayic caw ayej isya'tajil chihuli .
55003002	Ay anma ti' ha'n̈ech'an chisxahann̈e isba . Chanico yanma yin̈ ch'en melyu , chislolo'n̈en isba cat yinipaxocan̈ isba , cat yoc yalno tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios . Matxa chisyije tzet chal ismam ismi' . Matxa chiyak' yuch'andiosal yin̈ tzet chiak'lax tet , matxa tzet chalilo cuybanile yet Comam Dios yul sat .
55003003	Mach choche yet anmahil , yeb machi tz'ay isc'ul yin̈ hunuxa yet anmahil . Chisbalcan̈ tzoti' machiswalil yin̈ yet anmahil . Caw mach chu istoholban̈enico isba yin̈ isc'ulal , haca' hunu no nok' caw how hac tu' chute isba , chiscajpaxo isc'ulal .
55003004	Chipaq'uico yin̈ yet anmahil , caw mach chixiw iswatx'en istx'ojal , nohna yu tzet ye tu' matzet chaliloj . Ha' tzet ye tu' choche isnimanil ha' chiswatx'e selelo tzet choche Comam Dios .
55003005	Chiyalni ebnaj tato ayco isnabal ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios , yaja' isbeybal ebnaj chiyeniloj ta mach ayoco Comam Dios yin̈ isnabal ebnaj . Mach chawaco haba xol huntek'an ebnaj tu' .
55003006	Yuto xol ebnaj chiwalti'an , ay ebnaj chiocto yul n̈a , cat yoc ebnaj ismonten ebix ix yun̈e issomchato iswi' , yuto machi yip isnabal ebix yu nohna yanma ebix yu istx'ojal , chisyijento ebix tzet choche isc'ul .
55003007	Huntek'an ebix tu' xin , ayn̈etic'aco ebix iscuywi , yaja' maẍtic'a chik'oji ebix istxumnilo hune' cuybanile caw c'ul .
55003008	Haca' yu iscajwa naj Janes yeb naj Jambres yin̈ naj Mois'es , hac tu' chu iscajwa huntek'an anma ti' yin̈ cuybanile yel chala . Caw etaxnalo isnabal ebnaj tu' , mach yeloj caw c'ul yeco yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios .
55003009	Wal xin machi nahatli istx'ojal ebnaj tu' , yuto chiixtan̈woti issucal ebnaj yu anma , haca' yu yixtan̈wilo ebnaj cajni naj Mois'es .
55003010	Yaja' wal hach ti' , caw tzujanach yin̈ cuybanile walcanojan , yeb sunil inbeybalan yeb innabalan . Ilbil hawu tzet wute wanico wanmahan yin̈ Comam Dios , yeb innimanc'ulalan , yebpaxo yin̈ inxahann̈enan wet anmahilal . Wak'nipaxo techahojan sunil isya'tajil .
55003011	Hawilpaxo yet yak'lax ec'oya' wanmahan , yeb yet yul isya'tajil wiban̈an . Huntek'an wak'lenan yet wec'an yul con̈ob Antioqu'ia , yeb bey con̈ob Iconio , yebpaxo bey con̈ob Listra . Yin̈ huntek'an isya'tajil wabetu'an , Comam Dios quincolnilojan xol sunil .
55003012	Yin̈ caw yeli , macn̈etic'a choche c'ul chute isbeybal yu ayco yanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , caw masan chabe isya'tajil yu yet anmahil .
55003013	Wal ebnaj matzwalil chute isba yeb ebnaj subcham anma tu' , ip islahnico yanito isba ebnaj xol istx'ojal , chetato ebnaj isnabal yet anmahil cat xin yetanpaxto isba ebnaj .
55003014	Yaj wal hach ti' , lahico halin̈ban haba yin̈ cuybanil cuybilxa hawu , hune' hawayto yul hawanma . Hawohtaj mac cuyn̈ehach yin̈ .
55003015	Hach ti' nich'anachto hacuyni cuybanile yet Comam Dios . Hune' cuybanile chiak'ni ishelanil hanabal , caẍyanito yin̈ colbanile yu hawayto yul hawanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
55003016	Sunilal tzet ayayo yul Yum Comam Dios yalan̈ ischejbanil Comam watx'ina yu ebnaj ischejab . Caw xin ch'ocnico con̈iscuyni yin̈ isyelal cat isyenilo bay mach t'in̈ano jecoj , cat iscachwa jin̈ yin̈ cotx'ojal , yeb con̈iscuyni yin̈ sunil istoholal .
55003017	Yun̈e tz'ajan lahan chucano mac yetxa Comam Dios yehi , caw helanxa chielcanico iswatx'en sunil isc'ulal .
55004001	Yin̈ sat Comam Dios yeb yin̈ sat Comam Jesucristo , Comam chul Jahawiloj , yeb chul ilno ismul macta itzitz yeb macta camomxa , chintak'etojan
55004002	ta chawalic'o cuybanile yet Comam xol anma . Ta choche anma yabe' , maca mach choche anma yabe' , yaja' masan chawalic'oj . Ak' yohtan̈elo yin̈ istx'ojal chiswatx'e , cat xin hacachwa yin̈ . Chawiptzenpaxoj , yeb niman chawute hac'ul hacuynipaxo yin̈ cuybanile .
55004003	Yuto ay hune' tiempohal chuli bay matxa chischah yabe' anma cuybanile caw yel chala . Haxan̈e comon tzoti' choche yabe' . Yuxin hantan̈e ebnaj cuywawom chiscutxbaco anma , cat yoc cuywal yin̈ anma tu' , yaja' cachann̈e tzoti' caw choche isc'ul anma tu' chal ebnaj .
55004004	Anma tu' chismajche istxiquin yin̈ cuybanile yel chala , yin̈xan̈e xin comon ic'ti' bay chaco yanma anma tu' .
55004005	Yaja' wal hach ti' , toholojabn̈etic'a chawute hanabal , techahojab isya'tajil hawu , ec'an̈ hawala'c'o Tzoti' yet colbanile , yije hamunil tzabiloco hawu .
55004006	Yaj wal haninti'an toxa chinpotx'laxan haca' huno no nok' chioc yin̈ xahanbalil , caw cawilxa yeti istz'ayical bay chincaman .
55004007	Haca' hunu mac chioc yin̈ hunu an̈e , hac tu' yu wak'ni wanmahan inmunlahan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios . Tinan̈ xin xaquink'ojihan inlahnihan inmunilan yin̈ caw c'ul , caw inya'iln̈ehan cuybanile bay ayco janma .
55004008	Wal tinan̈ c'uwanxa hune' sabehal chiak'lax wetan ispaj selel inmunilan . Hune' chak' Comam wetan yet chiapni istz'ayical bay chul Comam istoholaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e , cat yilni yin̈ tzet chielico anma . Maẍn̈etajinan xin chinchahan inmatanan tet Comam , to chischahpaxo sunil anma yin̈ sunil isc'ul chiechmali yin̈ yulbal Comam yet iscayelal .
55004009	Chiwochehan ta chawaco yin̈ hac'ul hawul quinhawilnojan yin̈ an̈e ,
55004010	yuto naj Demas xaquinisbejcanojan naj , xato naj bey Tesal'onica , yuto ec'bal ayco yanma naj yin̈ tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Wal juẍta Crescente xin , hata bey Galacia to naj . Walpaxo juẍta Tito xin , hata bey Dalmacia topaxo naj .
55004011	Cachanxan̈e naj Lucas ayc'o inc'atan̈an . Wal xin ec'an̈ hawik'a naj Marcos cat hawiniti naj tawintaj , yuto chiwochehan chicolwa naj wintajan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios .
55004012	Wal naj juẍta T'iquico , xainchejtojan naj bey Efeso .
55004013	Yet chaẍtita , chawiti hune' incapahan wacanojan bey yatut juẍta Carpo , bey con̈ob Troas , yeb huntek'an inlibrohan , yeb huntek'an wuman caw yilal yehi .
55004014	Naj Alejandro , naj chac'om ch'en , tzetc'axa ismachiswalilal xaiswatx'e naj win̈an . Ha' Comam Dios chipajtzeno tet naj , haca'tic'a ismachiswalilal naj tu' .
55004015	Chawil haba tet naj , yuto caw chiscaj naj cuybanile chijalic'o ti' .
55004016	Yet wocan babel sata ebnaj yahaw yu yillaxi ta ay inmulan , caw machi hunu mac quincolnihan . Sunil ebnaj quinbejnicanojan ; machojab xin chitit ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈ ebnaj yu hune' tu' .
55004017	Yaja' wal Comam Dios colwa win̈an , yak'nipaxo wipan yun̈e yijni isba walnic'ojan cuybanile yet colbanile xol sunil anma mach Israeloj , hac tu' yu yabencantoj . Caw colwa Comam win̈an haca'tan̈e quiniscolan Comam yul isk'ab no' balam .
55004018	Ha' Comam Dios chincolnihan tet sunil ismachiswalilal , cat xin quinisc'ubanan Comam yun̈e quinyinitojan isc'atan̈ yul satcan̈ . ¡ Alaxojabico ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo ! Hacojab tu' .
55004019	Chawal tet ix janab Prisca yeb tet juẍta Aquila ta chil isba . Chawalpaxo tet yuninal juẍta Ones'iforo ta chilpaxo isba .
55004020	Wal naj juẍta Erasto wacanojan naj yul con̈ob Corinto , walpaxo juẍta Tr'ofimo yabi ay naj , yuxin wacanojan naj yul con̈ob Mileto .
55004021	Chawaco yin̈ hac'ul hatit yin̈ an̈e yalan̈to maẍto chioc ha' n̈ab . Chalto juẍta Eubulo yeb juẍta Pudente yeb juẍta Lino yeb ix janab Claudia ta chawil haba yin̈ hacawil . Yeb sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey ti' chalpaxtoj ta chawil haba .
55004022	Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo chioc hawetbihoj , cat xin yak'ni Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyet hesunil bey tu' . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
56001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an , ismunlawom Comam Dios wehan , yebpaxo ischejab Comam Jesucristo yu winitijan anma sic'bilxalo yu Comam Dios , cat yanico yanma yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , yun̈e yohtan̈enilo isyelal cuybanile chon̈inito cowatx'en tzet choche Comam Dios .
56001002	Hac ton tu' inmunilan yun̈e yanico anma tu' yin̈ isc'ul ischahni k'inale mach istan̈bal haltebilcano yu Comam Dios yettax maẍto chiwatx'icano sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ; wal xin caw mach chaco Comam lek'ti'al .
56001003	Tinan̈ xin , xa'ayilo istiempohal bay isyelo Comam Istzoti' jet . Ha' Comam Dios Cocolomal haln̈e wetan ta yilal inyijenan walnic'ojan Istzoti' .
56001004	Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' incartati'an tawet wuẍta Tito . Yin̈ caw isyelal haca' inc'aholan hawehi , yuto haninan walan Istzoti' Comam hawabe' . Yak'ab Comam Dios yeb xin Cocolomal Jesucristo isc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tawet yebpaxo xin ak'anc'ulal .
56001005	Caẍwacanojan bey tx'otx' Creta tu' yun̈e hawatx'en sunil huntek'an ayto iswatx'i , cat hasaynicano mac chi'oc ancianohal xol ebnaj juẍtaj yul hunun con̈ob bey tu' , haca' wute walnicanojan tawet .
56001006	Ha' ebnaj chioc ancianohal tu' , c'ulojab isbeybal ebnaj haxinwal machi mac chalni tzet ye tu' yin̈ ebnaj . Machojab chissay ebnaj hunuxa ix , yeb xin ayojabico yuninal ebnaj yul isk'ab Comam Dios , machojab xin man̈comoj ; hac tu' xin machi mac chibuchwa yin̈ yuninal ebnaj tu' .
56001007	Yuto ebnaj chioc ijbalomal yin̈ yuninal Comam Dios c'ulojab isbeybal ebnaj , yuto yilomal ismunil Comam Dios ye ebnaj . Mach c'uluj ta han̈e ebnaj ay yoc yin̈ sunil tzet ye tu' , yeb machojab ishowal iswi' ebnaj . Machojab chuc'paxo ebnaj te' uq'ue , yebpaxo istzan yin̈ yak'len howal , yebpaxo yik'ni ismelyu yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach c'uloj .
56001008	Wal xin ebnaj chioc ancianohal , yilal yak'ni ebnaj bay chiway macta chiec' isc'atan̈ . Ha'n̈ehojab isc'ulal choche ebnaj iswatx'e' , toholojab isnabal ebnaj , yeb han̈ehojab istoholal chiswatx'e ebnaj . Han̈c'an̈ehojab yin̈ yet Comam Dios chaco isnabal ebnaj , yeb iscachni isnimanil ebnaj yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach c'uloj .
56001009	Yilalojab yanico isnabal ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile caw yel chala , hune' ak'bil iscuyu' . Hac tu' xin chu yiptzen ebnaj anma yu cuybanile caw yeli , cat yay isc'ul macta ayco ishowal yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios yu ebnaj .
56001010	Wal xin ay ebnaj mach chischah yabe' istoholal cuybanile , han̈e huntek'an tzoti' matzet chal yelapno chal ebnaj , cat yak'ni subchaho ebnaj anma , ha' ton ebnaj xin chalni ta yilal yak'lax circuncidar macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam .
56001011	Yilal chicachlax ebnaj tu' , yuto bajxan̈etu'wal ch'ec' ebnaj , cat yak'ni somchahoto ebnaj isnabal anma yu cuybanile maẍtaj ye chal ebnaj . Chute ebnaj haca' tu' yun̈e yik'ni ebnaj ismelyu .
56001012	Ay hune' naj ay bey Creta tu' , ay isnabal ayco xol yet con̈ob , yal naj haca' ti' : " Ha' ebnaj wet con̈obti'an , lek'ti' ebnaj , lahan ebnaj haca' hunu no nok' caw how . Isa ebnaj yebpaxo xin caw pek' iswa'i , " ẍi naj .
56001013	Yel chal naj yuxin yilal hacachni ebnaj tu' sic'lebil , haxinwal chiyaco ebnaj yin̈ yanma hune' cuybanile yel chala ,
56001014	yeb yun̈e mach chishajba istxiquin ebnaj yin̈ huntek'an ic'ti' chisnacan̈ ebnaj ah Israel , yeb xin yun̈e mach chisyijeto ebnaj tzet chal anma caw machi yelapno ye sunil isyelal yul sat .
56001015	Wal han̈on̈ sajxa ye conabal ti' , sunil tzet ye tu' c'ul yul cosat . Walpaxo mac maẍto chiyaco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios maẍto sajo ye isnabal , caw mach c'ulo sunil tzet ye tu' yul sat , yuto machiswalil tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal ebnaj yeb yin̈ yanma ebnaj .
56001016	Chal ebnaj tato yohta ebnaj Comam Dios , yaja' tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj chiyeniloj tato mach yohtajo ebnaj Comam . Ton̈etic'a chichiwa isc'ul ebnaj , mach chisyijepaxo ebnaj tzet chal Comam . Machi hunu tzet ye tu' c'ul chiswatx'e ebnaj .
56002001	Walach hach ti' , ha' baytet lahan yalni yeb cuybanile caw tohol , ha' chawak' iscuyu' anma .
56002002	Chawal tet ebnaj juẍta ichamejxa , helanojab chute isnabal . Ayojab yelapno ebnaj yul sat anma , machojab chato isba ebnaj xol istx'ojal . Caw toholojab yeco yanma ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile caw yeli , yeb xin xahanojab chil yet anmahil . Yak'ab yip yanma ebnaj istecha ilwebal yu .
56002003	Hactic'apax tu' ebix janab ixnamejxa , c'ulojab chute isba yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e haca' chiyoche Comam Dios . Machojab halom k'umalo ebix , machojab chiuc'wipaxo te' . C'ulojab isbeybal ebix chisye tet anma .
56002004	Isyebabilo ebix janab ixnamtaxa tu' tet ebix k'opotaj yin̈ tzet chute isxahann̈en yichamil yeb isya'iln̈en yunin .
56002005	Yeb xin c'ulojab tzet chiec' yin̈ isnabal ebix . Toholojab chute isba ebix , cat xin isya'iln̈en ebix yatut . C'ulch'anojab chute isc'ul ebix yin̈ yet anmahil . Yijemojab chute isba ebix tet yichamil , hac tu' xin machi mac tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios .
56002006	Iptze ebnaj juẍta tzehtaj haxinwal toholn̈etic'a isnabal ebnaj .
56002007	C'ulojab tzet chawatx'e sata ebnaj juẍtaj , cuywahan̈ yin̈ sunil hawanma , yebpaxo yin̈ ak'anc'ulal .
56002008	Ha' tzoti' c'ul ha' chawala , haxinwal mach hunu mac chu yalni tato machiswalil cuybanile chawal tu' . Hac tu' xin chitx'ixwican̈ ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈ cuybanile tu' , yuto machi hunu tzet tz'aj yala' ebnaj tawin̈ tu' .
56002009	Halpaxo tet ebnaj munlawom , yijemojab chute isba ebnaj tet ispatr'on , c'ulch'anojab chute isc'ul ebnaj . Machojab chistak'we ebnaj isti' ebnaj ispatr'on .
56002010	Machojab ch'elk'an ebnaj yin̈ ispatr'on . Toholojab chiyute isba ebnaj , hac tu' chu isyenilo ebnaj tet anma tato caw c'ul cuybanile yet Comam Dios Cocolomal .
56002011	Yuto Comam Dios xaisyelo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul jet , ha' ton ik'n̈e iscolbanil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
56002012	Ha' isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios tu' , ak'ni conabaloj tato caw yilal cobejnicano sunil tzet machiswalil , yeb sunil tzet mach c'ulo chijocheco yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Haxa yin̈ istoholal conabal chon̈eq'ui , yeb cowatx'en istoholal , yeb yanico janma yin̈ Comam Dios .
56002013	Jechmawe hune' tzet caw nanxa yoc isc'ulal ayco yipo coc'ul , hune' tz'ayic caw c'ulch'an bay chisyecan̈ isba Cocolomal , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo , coDiosal caw helan .
56002014	Ha' Comam tu' yak' camo isba coseleloj con̈iscolnilo yin̈ istx'ojal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Con̈issajn̈e Comam yin̈ comul yun̈e joc iscon̈oboj , yun̈e haxan̈e isc'ulal chijoche cowatx'e' .
56002015	Ha' hune' ti' , yilal hawak'ni iscuyu' macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam , chawanico yip yanma . Tato ay ebnaj machiswalil chute isba , sunil hawanma chacachni . Ha'ojab isc'ulal chawatx'e haxinwal machi mac chiinilo hapixan .
56003001	Chanati tet ebnaj juẍtaj , isyije'ab ebnaj yin̈ tzet chal naj jahaw , yebpaxo tet ebnaj yahawil con̈ob . Yijemojab chute isba ebnaj , hinanojab ebnaj iswatx'en isc'ulal .
56003002	Yeb xin machojab tx'ojo istzotel ebnaj yin̈ hunu maca , machojab ak'om howal ebnaj , c'ulch'anojab chiyute isc'ul ebnaj , chewchotan̈eojab chute yanma ebnaj yin̈ yet anmahil .
56003003	Yuto hayet yalan̈tocanoj ha' hunon̈ ayon̈ico yin̈ issucal , man̈c'omon̈ yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios , yeb c'aynajon̈toj , ayon̈ico yalan̈ yec'najil janma yebpaxo tzet choche conimanil . Han̈etic'a istx'ojal cowatx'e yeb ischiwa coc'ul jin̈ hununon̈ . Con̈yahlaxi , coyahnipaxo jet anmahil .
56003004	Haxa yet isyeni Comam Dios Cocolomal isc'ulch'anil isc'ul , yeb hanta isxahanil ay sunil anma ,
56003005	hac tu' yu con̈iscolni Comam . Maẍtaj yu isc'ulal cowatx'e yuxin con̈iscol Comam , machoj , to yu tz'ay isc'ul Comam jin̈ . Con̈istx'ah Comam yin̈ comachiswalilal , ha' chaliloj tato con̈itzitzbican̈ yin̈ iscayelal yet yak'ni Comam Esp'iritu Santo k'inale ac'to jet .
56003006	Yu Cocolomal Jesucristo xin , yak' Comam Dios Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet yin̈ isyaxilal .
56003007	C'ulon̈xa yul sat Comam , yaj yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul , yuxin yak' Comam cok'inal ayn̈etic'a yin̈ huneln̈e , hune' ayco yipo janma .
56003008	Huntek'an cuybanile ti' caw yeli , yuxin chiwochehan tato maẍtic'a chabej hawalni , haxinwal ha' mac chiyaco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , chiyaco yin̈ isc'ul iswatx'en tzet caw c'ul . Huntek'an cuybanile ti' caw c'ul , caw chicolwa jin̈ cosunil .
56003009	Yaja' mach chawaco haba xol ebnaj chi-la-isteyele isba yin̈ sucal tzoti' , yeb ebnaj chiichenti istzoti'al tzet yelapno ye ebnaj ichmame . Mach chawapaxico haba xol ebnaj comon chi-la-yak'le howal , yeb chi-la-isteyele isba yin̈ isley naj Mois'es . Matzet chal yelapno huntek'an tu' , matzet chik' ebnaj yin̈ .
56003010	Ta ay mac chal pohnoto yuninal Comam Dios yu cuybanile mach yeloj , chachcachwa yin̈ hunel maca cayel , yaj ta mach chabe tzet chawala , chawilo texol .
56003011	Ha' mac chiwatx'en haca' tu' , hawohtaj tato xayetato isba , ha'tic'a ismul chiswatx'e tu' , ha' chianico yin̈ isya'tajil .
56003012	Hayet chinchejnitojan juẍta Artemas maca yuẍta T'iquico tac'atan̈ , chawaco yin̈ hac'ul hato bey con̈ob Nic'opolis quinhawila'an , yuto chiwochehan ta ha' bey tu' ayinan yet chiec' n̈abil .
56003013	Hantatic'a chu hawu chaẍcolwa yin̈ juẍta licenciado Zenas yeb juẍta Apolos islahni isbel , yun̈e mach chitan̈ayo tzet chiocnico yu ebnaj .
56003014	Hac tu' xin chik'ayilo ebnaj juẍta tu' iswatx'en isc'ulal , haxinwal yet ay tzet ch'ocnicoj yohtaxa ebnaj iscolwahi , hac tu' xin ay ismunil ebnaj yul sat Comam Dios .
56003015	Sunil ebnaj juẍta ayc'o inc'atan̈an bey ti' , chalto ebnaj ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil . Chawal tet sunil ebnaj ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam bey tu' ta chil isba ebnaj . Yak'abayo Comam Dios isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ bey tu' . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
57001001	Hanin Pablo inti'an , ayinicojan preso yu walnic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo . Haninan yeb juẍta Timoteo chicotz'ibn̈etojan̈ hune' carta ti' tawet wuẍta Filem'on ; xahan ayach juhan̈ , jetbipaxo coba yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios .
57001002	Chicotz'ibn̈epaxtojan̈ tet ix janab Apia , yebpaxo tet naj juẍta Arquipo , naj caw colwa jin̈an̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios , yeb tet sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios chiscutxba isba bey hawatut .
57001003	Ha'ojab Comam Dios Mame , yeb Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chiak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul , yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet .
57001004	Yet chintxahlihan tet Comam Dios hunta el , chaẍinnatijan , chiwak'nihan yuch'andiosal tawin̈ tet Comam .
57001005	Yuto xawabehan tato caw xahan chawil macta yetxa Comam yehi , yeb ta caw ayco hawanma yin̈ Comam Jes'us .
57001006	Caw chink'anan tet Comam Dios ta ha' anma xayaco isba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , yu chila ta ayco hawanma yin̈ Comam Dios , caw chistxumiloj tato han̈c'an̈e Comam Jesucristo chiak'ni isc'ulal jet .
57001007	Wuẍtaj , caw chintzalahan yeb xin caw chiyik' yip wanmahan yu isc'ulch'anil hac'ul , yuto hawu yuxin xaischah macta yetxa Comam Dios yak'lobal yanma .
57001008	Haninti'an ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan , yuxin chu walnihan tawet baytet caw yilal hawatx'eni .
57001009	Yaja' haca' chu yay cosat cok'anni hunu tzet ye tu' , hac tu' chu walnitojan tawet , yuto caw xahan ayach wuhan . Hanin Pablo inti'an icham inxahan , caw xin ayinicojan preso yu chiwalic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo .
57001010	Caw chinocan ink'ana'an tawet yin̈ naj On'esimo , naj ti' haca'tan̈e inc'aholan ye naj , yuto ischah naj Comam Jesucristo yul yanma yet ayinicojan preso ti' .
57001011	Naj On'esimo ti' , haca' hunu chejab caw matzet chiocnicoj , hac tu' ye naj hawu yet yalan̈tocanoj , yaja' wal tinan̈ xin caw chiocnoco naj hawu , haca' yu yocnico naj wuhan bey ti' .
57001012	Wal tinan̈ chiwatojan naj tac'atan̈ hunelxa , c'ul chu hachahni naj , haca'ojtam haninan chinhachahan .
57001013	Wochebalan chicancano naj inc'atan̈an yu inchejnihan naj , ha'ojtam xin hach chachinchejan selelo naj yulbal ayinictijan yul preso ti' yu Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile .
57001014	Yaja' mach chisje inc'ulan inwatx'ehan hunu tzet ye tu' yalan̈to maẍto chiwabehan tzet chawute hawalni , haxinwal hune' chink'anan tawet ti' machojab lan̈biloj , wal xin yin̈ojab hawanma chitita .
57001015	Naj On'esimo ti' , el naj hanic' tiempohal tac'atan̈ , yaja' yun̈e ismeltzo naj tac'atan̈ yin̈ huneln̈e .
57001016	Yaja' matxa haca'o hunu chejab chuco naj , wal xin caw nimanojab yelapno naj yul hasat , haca' hunu juẍta caw ochebil ju . Walinan caw xahan ay naj wuhan bey ti' , walachpaxo xin , ec'nahojab xahan chawil naj . Machn̈eojabtaj yu jet anmahil naj yuxin xahan chawil naj , walxinto yu juẍtaxa naj yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
57001017	Yuxin ta caw juẍtaxa coba yin̈ Comam chawabe , chah naj hacojtam haninan chinapnihan tac'atan̈ .
57001018	Tato ay hunu istx'ojal iswatx'e naj tawin̈ , maca ta ay isc'as naj tawet , teye wetan .
57001019	Hanin Pablo inti'an han-caw-inan chintz'ibn̈etojan , tato ay isc'as naj tawet haninan chintohlahan , waxan̈ca xin chinnatijan tawet tato aypaxo hac'as wetan , yuto haninan walan Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo tawet yet hachahni Comam yul hawanma .
57001020	Hach wuẍtaj yije tzet chink'anan tawet ti' , yuto yuninalxa Comam Dios hawehi . Ak' yak'lobal wanmahan , yuto juẍtaxa coba yin̈ Comam Jesucristo .
57001021	Chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' tawet yuto wohtajan tato caw yijemach , caw wohtapaxojan tato ec'balto tzet chayije yiban̈ tzet chiwaltoti'an .
57001022	Chiwalnipaxtojan tawet , chasay nino bay chinehan yet chinapnihan texol . Caw xin chiwacojan yipo wanmahan ta yu chextxahli win̈an tet Comam Dios , chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam intohan quexwilnojan .
57001023	Chalto naj juẍta Epafras ta chawil haba bey tu' , ayco naj preso wintajan bey ti' yu yalnipaxic'o naj Istzoti' Comam Jesucristo .
57001024	Chalpaxto juẍta Marcos , juẍta Aristarco , juẍta Demas yeb juẍta Lucas ta cheyil heba bey tu' ; ebnaj ti' wet munlawomalan yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios .
57001025	Ha'ojab Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chianayo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ bey tu' .
58001001	Yet yalan̈tocanoj tx'i'al el yeb nanantan̈e yu istzotel Comam Dios tet ebnaj jichmam yu ebnaj ischejab Comam .
58001002	Yaja' wal yin̈ islahobal tiempo ti' tzotel Comam Dios jet yu Isc'ahol , ha' xin yul isk'ab Isc'ahol tu' yacanico sunil tzettaj ye tu' ; yuto yu Isc'ahol tu' yuxin iswatx'e Comam sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
58001003	Ha' Isc'ahol Comam tu' chiyenilo isk'ak'al yip Comam Dios yeb yechel Comam yehi . Ha' xin yip Istzoti' Isc'ahol tu' ik'n̈e sunil tzettaj ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Lahwi con̈issajn̈encano Comam C'ahole yin̈ comul , yoc tz'on̈no yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios yul satcan̈ .
58001004	Isc'ahol Comam Dios , caw ec'bal yelapno ye yiban̈ ebnaj 'angel ; yuto ha' ismunil Comam ec'bal yelapno ye yiban̈ ismunil ebnaj .
58001005	Wal xin machi hunu ebnaj 'angel bay yal Comam Dios haca' yu yalni Comam tet Comam Cristo : Hach ti' , hach Inc'aholan , chiwak'canojan hacawil yin̈ hune' tz'ayic ti' , ẍi Comam . Maẍtaj yin̈ hunu ebnaj 'angel bay yalpaxo Comam haca' ti' : Haninan Ismam naj . Inc'aholan ye naj , ẍi .
58001006	Chalnipaxo yin̈ yet yaniti Comam Dios hunpilan Isc'ahol yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' : Yik'abayo isba sunil ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios tet naj , ẍiayoj .
58001007	Walpaxo yin̈ ebnaj 'angel chal haca' ti' : Chuteco Comam Dios ebnaj 'angel haca' jak'ek' cat yutenpaxico Comam ischejab haca' xaj k'a k'a' , ẍi .
58001008	Walpaxo yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam tu' chala : Hach Dios , yahaw hach yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Ha' istoholal xin chawatx'e yet ayachico Yahawiloj .
58001009	Caw chachtzala yin̈ isc'ulal , wal istx'ojal xin chayaha . Yuxin sic'bilachilo yu Comam Dios haDiosal . Caw ec'bal tzalahilal yak' tawet sata ebnaj hawetbi , ẍi .
58001010	Chalnipaxoj : Hach ti' Mam Wahawil yet yichebanil hawatx'e tx'o tx'otx' , hawatx'enpaxo satcan̈ .
58001011	Sunil tzet watx'ebil hawu tu' chitan̈caniloj . Walach ti' xin ayachn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Sunil tzet watx'ebil tu' chiichambiloj haca' chu isxilbilo hunu xilk'ape .
58001012	Chapajtzoyo haca' chu ispajtzolaxayo hunu k'ap k'ap , cat hahelni haca' chu ishelni hunu mac xil isk'ap , yaja' walach xin hune'n̈etic'a ha' hach yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , machi bak'inal chachtan̈iloj , ẍiayoj .
58001013	Machi hunelo ti' yal Comam Dios tet ebnaj y'angel haca' yu yalni tet Isc'ahol : Ayan̈ tz'on̈no yin̈ inwatx'k'aban masanta chiwak'acojan macta ayco ishowal tawin̈ yalan̈ hawoj , ẍi Comam .
58001014	Sunil ebnaj 'angel esp'iritu ebnaj , ayco ebnaj ischejabo Comam Dios yu iscolwa ebnaj yin̈ macta chischah iscolbanil .
58002001	Yuxin caw yilal janico conabal yin̈ huntek'an cuybanile abebilxatic'a ju , haxinwal mach chicoheq'uilo coba yin̈ .
58002002	Yuto ta huntek'an chejbanile yal ebnaj 'angel yet payxa caw ay ismay yucanoj , yuxin ha' mac man̈c'oni ay isya'tajil yiban̈ haca' caw yehi .
58002003	Hajxamon̈ chal tu' , ¿ tzettaxca chu cocolcha tet isya'tajil ta mach chicam coc'ul yin̈ hune' cocolbanil caw niman yelapnoj ? Yuto ha' caw Comam Jahawil halni hune' Tzoti' yet colbanile ti' yin̈ babelal , haxa ebnaj abeni , ha' ebnaj ak'ni johtan̈elo yin̈ caw isyelal .
58002004	Yeb xin ha'tic'a Comam Dios yaco isba testigohal yin̈ hune' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile ti' yu ej yechel yip Comam yeb yu ej c'aybalc'ule , yeb yu tzettaj ak'lax yub ebnaj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo haca' el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios .
58002005	Maẍtaj yalan̈o yip ebnaj 'angel yacto Comam Dios hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal bay lan̈an cotzotel ti' , hune' chito huli .
58002006	Yuto ay hune' bay chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : ¿ Tzet yelapno ye anma yuxin chanatij ? ¿ Tzet yelapno ye anma yuxin chawaco yin̈ hac'ul ?
58002007	Txann̈e hanic' ishelanil anma hawak' hanic' tiempohal sata ebnaj 'angel . Lahwi tu' hayenilo ismay yeb xin caw ay yelapno elicoj .
58002008	Hawanico sunil tzet watx'ebil hawu yalan̈ yip anma , ẍiayoj . Yet chalni tato sunil tzettaj ye tu' can yalan̈ yip anma , chaliloj tato machi hunu tzet ye tu' ti' mach can yalan̈ yip , yaja' maẍto ixtan̈o jilni ta ayco sunil yalan̈ yip anma .
58002009	Yaja' wal Comam Jes'us , Comam txann̈e hanic' yip yak' Comam Dios sata ebnaj 'angel hanic' tiempohal ak'lax ismay yeb caw ay yelapno elicoj yu isya'tajil camical , yuto yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yuxin yak' isba yin̈ camical yu isc'ulalo jin̈ .
58002010	Comam Dios watx'en̈e sunil tzettaj ye tu' , yeb yu Comam yuxin iswatx'e , choche tato sunil yuninal chischah ismajul satcan̈ cat yec' yin̈ isc'ulch'anil Comam , yu yak'le Comam Jesucristo isya'tajil , hac tu' yu istz'ajna isc'ulal Comam Dios yin̈ Comam Jes'us Iscolomal anma .
58002011	Sunilon̈ ayon̈xaco yuninalo Comam Dios ti' hune'n̈e Comam yeb hune' mac con̈anico yuninalo Comam tu' , ha' ton xin Comam Jesucristo . Yu hune' tu' yuxin ha' Comam Isc'ahol Comam Dios , mach chitx'ixwi con̈yalni yuẍtajoj , yeb ebix janab , mach chitx'ixwi Comam yalni ebix yanaboj .
58002012	Haca' yu yalni Comam Jes'us tet Comam Dios bay chala : Chachwalic'ojan tet ebnaj wuẍtajan yeb tet ebix wanaban . Chachinbitn̈epaxojan xol yet chiscutxban isba , ẍi .
58002013	Ay hune'xa bay chala : Yin̈ Comam Dios chicawxi inc'ulan , ẍi . Ay hune'xa bay chalpaxoj : Ayinic'ojan bey ti' yeb wuninalan xayak' Comam Dios wetan , ẍi .
58002014	Yuxin ha' nimanile ik'bil yu Comam Jesucristo lahan haca' isnimanil ebnaj ayco yul isk'ab Comam . Hayet iscam Comam xin isk'oji yin̈ yahaw camical , ha' ton naj matzwalil .
58002015	Hac tu' xin yu iscolni Comam sunil mac ayicto yalan̈ yip xiwquilal camical yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
58002016	Yuto maẍtaj yin̈ ebnaj 'angel hul Comam colwal , walxinto ha' ebnaj titna yin̈ naj Abraham hul Comam iscolo' .
58002017	Yuxin caw yilal yuteco isba Comam haca' han̈on̈ yuẍtajon̈ ti' , yu istz'ay isc'ul jin̈ yeb yu yoc tzotelo jin̈ tet Comam Dios , haca' hunu naj yahawil sacerdote caw yijem , yanico isba Comam xahanbalil jin̈ yu yelcano comul jiban̈ .
58002018	Yuto ec'lena Comam Jesucristo yin̈ isya'tajil yeb yin̈ ilwebal yuxin ha' Comam chicolwa jin̈ yin̈ej ilwebal chul jiban̈ .
58003001	Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex yet hexxa Comam Dios , awtebilex yu Comam yu heyoc yuninaloj . Caw cam cheyaco henabal yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , Comam chejbilti yu Comam Dios yeb chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam haca' hunu naj yahawil sacerdote , ha' yin̈ Comam tu' xin ayco janma .
58003002	Comam Jesucristo tu' caw yijem yute isba tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' ismunil ak'lax tet ; hacpax tu' naj Mois'es , caw yijem yute isba naj yin̈ ismunil ak'lax xol iscon̈ob Comam Dios .
58003003	Yaja' Comam Jes'us , ec'bal yelapno Comam sata naj Mois'es tu' . Haca' hunu naj chianican̈ hunu te' n̈a , ec'bal yelapno naj yiban̈ te' n̈a chiswatx'e tu' .
58003004	Haca' hunu te' n̈a tinan̈ , yilaltic'a ay hunu mac chianican̈ te' , hac tu' xin ye sunil tzettaj ye tu' , ha' Comam Dios watx'en̈e .
58003005	Hac tu' xin naj Mois'es caw yijem yute isba naj ismunla xol iscon̈ob Comam Dios yuto ischejab Comam Dios ye naj . Ha' xin ismunil naj ha' yalni tet con̈ob yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios .
58003006	Wal Comam Jesucristo Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi , caw yijem yin̈ ismunil yul yatut Comam Dios . Hune' yatut Comam tu' xin ha' ton han̈on̈ ti' , yaja' ta t'in̈an iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ tzet ayco yipo janma yin̈ caw tzalahilal .
58003007	Yuxin yal Comam Esp'iritu yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : Tato cheyabe tzet chiwalti'an hanin Dios inti'an ,
58003008	mach cheyak' cawxo heyanma haca' yu yoc anma man̈c'omal wetan bey tx'otx' desierto , quinyanicojan yin̈ ilwebal .
58003009	Ha' bey tu' quinyacojan heyichmam yin̈ ilwebal , waxan̈ca yil ebnaj huntek'an isc'ulal inwatx'ehan yulbal cawina habil .
58003010	Yuxin tit inhowalan yin̈ huntek'an anma tu' , walnihan : " Nanantan̈etic'a bay chato huntek'an anma tu' isnabal , maẍtic'a chohtan̈elo inbehan , " quinchiyan .
