58003011	Walnihan yu inhowalan haca' ti' : " Huntek'an anma ti' maẍtic'a chischah hune' xewilal chiwak'an , " quinchiyan , ẍi Comam yul Yum .
58003012	Yuxin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , caw cheyil heba , machojab hunujex cheyak' cawxolo heyanma , machojab hunujex chebej heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam , cat heyinilo heba yin̈ Comam Dios itzitz .
58003013	Wal xin hununojab tz'ayic heyiptzen heba hununex , yak' isba lan̈an istzotel Comam jet haca' yalni yul Yum , yun̈e machi hunujex chexsubcha yu mule cat iscawbilo heyanma .
58003014	Yuxin ta lin̈anon̈ yin̈ sunilbal tiempo yin̈ tzet jaco yipo janma yet yalan̈tocanoj , ay comajul isc'atan̈ Comam Jesucristo .
58003015	Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios : Tato cheyabe tzet chiwalan tinan̈ hanin heDiosal inti'an , mach cheyak' cawbolo heyanma haca' yute anma man̈c'on yin̈ tzet walan , ẍiayoj .
58003016	¿ Mac xin anmahil huntek'an ebnaj lahwi yaben Istzoti' Comam Dios isman̈c'on yin̈ tzet yal Comam tu' ? Ha' ton ebnaj jet con̈ob Israel yilti naj Mois'es yul con̈ob Egipto .
58003017	¿ Mac yin̈ xin tit ishowal Comam Dios yulbal cawina habil ? Ha' ton huntek'an mac yaco ismul tet Comam bey tx'otx' desierto , iscamcano bey tu' .
58003018	Yeb xin , ¿ mac tet yak' binaho Comam isbi yet yalni tato mach chiocto yul hune' xewbal chak' Comam ? Ha' ton tet macta man̈c'on yin̈ tzet yal Comam .
58003019	Hac tu' chu cotxumni ta mach octo anma yin̈ hune' xewbal chak' Comam tu' , yuto mach yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
58004001	Yuxin yak' isba chito haltelax joc yin̈ hune' xewilal chak' Comam Dios , hune' haltebilcano yu Comam , yuxin caw yilal cheyil heba , tajca ayex mach chexoc yin̈ hune' xewilal tu' .
58004002	Yuto hallaxpaxo Tzoti' yet colbanile jet haca' yu yallax tet ebnaj tu' , yaja' xin matzet iswatx'e yin̈ ebnaj yet yaben ebnaj , yuto mach yaco yanma ebnaj yin̈ .
58004003	Wal han̈on̈ xajayto yul janma yin̈ Comam chon̈oc yin̈ hune' xewilal chal Comam tu' . Yu chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti' : Walan yin̈ inbihan yu inhowalan tato maẍtic'a chiocto huntek'an anma ti' yul hune' xewbal chiwak'an , ẍi Comam , ẍiayoj . Yin̈ caw yeli hataxtic'a yet iswatx'encano Comam Dios sat yiban̈k'inal ti' isxew Comam yin̈ ismunil ,
58004004	yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios yin̈ ishuj tz'ayic haca' ti' : Xew Comam yin̈ ishuj tz'ayic yin̈ sunil tzet iswatx'e , ẍiayoj .
58004005	Chalnipaxo yul Yum Comam : Huntek'an anma ti' mach chiocto yin̈ hune' xewbal chiwak'an , ẍiayoj .
58004006	Yaja' yilal ayto mac chiocto yin̈ hune' xewilal tu' tinan̈ , yuto tet ebnaj Israel bay babel hallax Tzoti' yet colbanile , yaja' mach octo ebnaj yin̈ hune' xewbal tu' yu isman̈c'omal .
58004007	Yuxin ay hune' tiempohal yebilcano yu Comam Dios , ha' ton hune' tiempohal bay ayon̈ ti' tinan̈ . Payxatax halbilcano yin̈ hune' xewbal ti' , yak'nipaxo Comam yala' naj David yul Yum Comam , bay chala : Tato cheyabe tzet chiwalan tinan̈ hanin heDiosal inti'an , mach hipo cheyute heba , ẍiayoj .
58004008	K'inalo ta oc ebnaj Israel yin̈ hune' xewbal tu' yu naj Josu'e machim tzotel Comam Dios yin̈ hune' tiempohal bay ayon̈ ti' .
58004009	Yuxin ay hune' xewbal chak' Comam tet macta yetxa Comam yehi .
58004010	Yuxin macta chiocto yul hune' xewbal chak' Comam ti' chixewcano yin̈ sunil ismunil , haca' yu isxew Comam yet lahwi iswatx'encano hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
58004011	Yuxin jak'aweco yin̈ coc'ul jocto yin̈ hune' xewbal chak' Comam , yun̈e machi hunujon̈ chicobeybaln̈e isbeybal ebnaj man̈c'om tu' .
58004012	Yuto Istzoti' Comam Dios caw itzitz sunil chisje yu , chik'axpon yul janma haca' hunu ch'en espada cabeb yeh . Istzoti' Comam tu' chiapni yin̈ janma yeb yin̈ conabal yeb yin̈ tzet jehi . Chisyenilo tzet chiec' yin̈ conabal yeb yin̈ janma , ta c'ul maca mach c'uloj .
58004013	Sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios , machi hunu chu yeban isba sata Comam . Sunil tzet ye tu' haban ye yul sat Comam , Comam bay chijal tzettaj chicowatx'e .
58004014	Comam Jes'us Isc'ahol Comam Dios , xameltzo satcan̈ , ha' chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios , yuto yahawil sacerdote ye Comam . Yuxin yilal colin̈ban coba yin̈ cuybanil bay ayco janma .
58004015	Wal Comam yahawil sacerdote tu' chu istz'ay isc'ul jin̈ yin̈ coya'tajil , yuto hayet yec' Comam yin̈ isnimanil coxol caw tx'i'al ilwebal hul yiban̈ haca' ej ilwebal chul jiban̈ , yaja' machi bay yaco ismul Comam .
58004016	Yuxin yin̈ sunilojab janma chon̈hitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios Jahawil , Comam caw xahan ayon̈ yu , haxinwal chitz'aypaxo isc'ul jin̈ cat con̈iscolnilo yin̈ej isya'tajil chihul jin̈ .
58005001	Yuto sunil ebnaj yahawil sacerdote saybililo ebnaj xol anma , yak'lax ismunil ebnaj istzotel yin̈ anma tet Comam Dios , yeb yu yalten ebnaj ofrenda yeb xahanbal tet Comam yin̈ ismul anma .
58005002	Ebnaj yahawil sacerdote tu' lahan ebnaj yeb yet anmahil chihoyxipaxico ilwebal yin̈ ebnaj , yuxin chu istz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ macta machi isnabal yeb yin̈ macta c'aynatoj .
58005003	Yuxin yilal yalten ebnaj xahanbal yin̈ ismul babel cat yak'ni ebnaj xahanbal yin̈ ismul anma .
58005004	Machi hunu ebnaj ton̈e oc yin̈ hune' munil caw ay yelapno tu' , walxinto ha' Comam Dios sayn̈eco ebnaj , haca' yu issaylaxico naj Aar'on .
58005005	Hacpax tu' Comam Cristo mach ton̈e yaco isba yahawilo sacerdote ischuquil , wal xin ha' Comam Dios ak'n̈e hune' ismunil caw ay yelapno tu' , yuto ha' Comam Dios halnicano haca' ti' : Hach ti' Inc'aholan , haninan chiwak'an hacawil yin̈ hune' tz'ayic ti' , ẍiayoj .
58005006	Yeb xin ay hune'xa bay halbilcano yu Comam haca' ti' : Hach ti' sacerdote yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , haca' naj Melquisedec , ẍiayoj .
58005007	Yet yehic'o Comam Jesucristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw ok'i yeb caw ip txahli tet Comam Dios , isk'anni tet Comam Dios , Comam ay yip iscolni tet camical ; yaben Comam istxah yuto caw yijem yute isba Comam .
58005008	Waxan̈ca Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jes'us , yaja' hul isya'tajil yiban̈ caw xin yijem yute isba tet Comam Dios yu ej ilwebal hul yiban̈ .
58005009	Yu isyijemal Comam tu' yuxin ak'lax ismunil yak'ni colbanil mach istan̈bal tet macta chiyijen tzet chal Comam .
58005010	Ha' xin Comam Dios an̈eco Comam Jes'us yahawilo sacerdotehal yu istzotel jin̈ tet Comam , haca' naj Melquisedec yet payat tiempo .
58005011	Caw tzetc'ato tzet chiwochehan chiwalan teyet yin̈ huntek'an ti' , yaja' ya'ta quexcowatx'enico yin̈ yuto caw lan̈o chitxumcha heyu .
58005012	Yuto haca'xa istiempohal yichi heyaben cuybanile ti' , cuywawom hexxam tinan̈ , yaja' wal xin ayto yilal hecuylax yin̈ yac'tohal yin̈ huntek'an babel cuybanile yet Comam . Caw haca' ye niẍte nene' , maẍto chu yak'lax hunu tzet ye tu' islob , to imeto chiak'lax tet , hac tu' heyehi .
58005013	Huntek'an babel cuybanile tu' yet mac maẍto chik'oji istxumni yin̈ istoholal , yuto haca' to niẍte unin imeto chiak'lax tet , hac tu' yehi .
58005014	Wal huntek'an cuybanile ayxacan̈ xin yet mac ayxa isnabal yin̈ istoholal , xak'oji istxumni baytet c'ul yeb baytet mach c'uloj ; ha' mac haca' tu' lahan haca' icham anma , chu isloni cawla tzet ye tu' .
58006001	Wal tinan̈ xin , belwojon̈we cosataj , haxinwal caw helan chon̈elicoj . Canojabcano huntek'an babel cuybanile yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , machojab chon̈oc cocayen̈e huntek'an babel cuybanile jabe tu' ; haca' cuybanile chihalni yin̈ cobejnicano cowatx'en huntek'an tzet chiiniti camical jiban̈ , yeb yin̈ tzet chu janico janma yin̈ Comam Dios .
58006002	Yeb cuybanile yin̈ yah ha' cowi' , yeb cuybanil janayo cok'ab yiban̈ iswi' mac chichahni ismunil tet Comam Dios , yeb yin̈ tzet chu yitzitzibican̈ camom , yeb yin̈ isya'tajil mach istan̈bal chak' Comam Dios tet anma .
58006003	Wal tinan̈ xin ha' cuybanile ayxacan̈ ha' chiwalan teyet ta hac tu' chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios .
58006004	Ha' mac xachahni sajilk'inal yul yanma yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios , yeb xaischah isc'ulal Comam Esp'iritu Santo ,
58006005	yeb xin xayabe ischi'al Istzoti' Comam Dios , yeb yin̈ yip Comam chisye yin̈ huntek'an chihuli .
58006006	Huntek'an mac tu' ta chilo isnabal yin̈ Comam Dios , ¿ tzettaxca chu ismeltzo yul isk'ab Comam hunelxa ? Yuto lahan haca' lan̈an yanican̈ Isc'ahol Comam Dios yin̈ culus hunelxa , cat yanico yin̈ tx'ixwilal sata sunil anma .
58006007	K'inalo tx'o tx'otx' tinan̈ , yet chi-la-yak'ni ha' n̈ab cat yuc'nito tx'otx' ha' ; ta c'ul tz'unub chak' tx'otx' tet naj chimunla sat tx'otx' , ha' chaliloj ta ayayo isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ .
58006008	Yaja' ta tx'ixn̈e te' chak' tx'otx' yeb te' comon telaj , machi nino xin isc'ulal chak' tx'otx' , chielto tz'acti' yiban̈ tx'otx' yu Comam , haxa yin̈ islahobal xin cat isn̈uslaxcanto tx'otx' .
58006009	Waxan̈ca hac tu' cotzotelan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay juan̈ , yaja' caw johtajan̈ tato hex ti' ayxaco isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios teyin̈ , ha' xin chalniloj tato ayxa hecolbanil .
58006010	Yuto Comam Dios istoholaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e , machi xin chisnahuln̈eto Comam isc'ulal hewatx'e yeb isc'ulch'anil hec'ul heye tet Comam yet hecolwa yin̈ mac yetxa Comam Dios yehi , hune'n̈e ha' xin lan̈an hewatx'enpaxo tinan̈ .
58006011	Caw xin chijochehan̈ tato hac tu' chewatx'e yin̈ sunil heyanma yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , haxinwal tz'ajan chechah tzet ayco yipo heyanma .
58006012	Mach chijochehan̈ ta chexisabilo yin̈ ismunil Comam ; walxinto beybaln̈ewe isbeybal ebnaj ayco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yeb ay isnimanc'ulal . Ebnaj chibeybaln̈en huntek'an tu' chischah ebnaj tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios .
58006013	Yet yaltencano Comam Dios isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tet naj Abraham yeb ta caw hantan̈e yuninal naj , ha' isbi Comam yak' binahoj yet yaltencanoj , yuto machi hunuxa mac ec'bal yiban̈ Comam , yuxin ha' isbi Comam yak' binahoj .
58006014	Yalni Comam haca' ti' : " Yin̈ caw isyelal , caw tx'i'al isc'ulal chiwak'an tawet , cat wak'ni pohchahocan̈an hawuninal , " ẍi Comam .
58006015	Caw xin niman yute isc'ul naj Abraham tu' yechman yin̈ niman tiempo , lahwi tu' ischahni naj tzet halbilcano yu Comam tu' .
58006016	Hayet chak'ni binaho anma isbi hunu mac yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' , ha' isbi hunu mac ec'bal yiban̈ ha' chak' binahoj ; yuxin hayet chak'ni binaho anma isbi hunu mac yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' t'in̈an chucanoj , matxa hunu mac chu yoc tzotelo yiban̈iloj .
58006017	Hac tu' yute Comam Dios , yak' binaho Comam isbi yin̈ tzet yaltecanoj , yun̈e isyenilo Comam tet mac bay yalte tu' tato t'in̈an yucano yu Comam , mach chiec'to yet yijni isba yin̈ tzet yalte tu' .
58006018	Hac tu' xin ay cabeb mach chu ishec'ni isba yuto mach chu yanico Comam lek'ti'al ; ha' ton istak'wecanico Comam yin̈ yaltenpaxcano Comam yet yak'ni binaho isbi yin̈ tzet yalte . Hac tu' chu con̈yiptzen Comam yun̈e iscawxi coc'ul yin̈ tzet haltebil jet yu , han̈on̈ saybilon̈ yu Comam yu con̈iscolni .
58006019	Ha' tzet ayco yipo janma tu' , ha' chon̈lin̈bani cat yak'ni ist'in̈anil janma , haca' chu islin̈ban ch'en ancla te' barco yiban̈ ha' mar . Hune' iscawxobal coc'ul xaapni sata Comam Dios haca' ta xak'axponic'to yinta k'ap k'ap aycan̈ yictabal yatut Comam Dios bey satcan̈ .
58006020	Hac tu' yu isbabicto Comam Jesucristo cosataj , ishajnicano cobeh . Hac tu' xin yu yoccano Comam tzotelo jin̈ tet Comam Dios ; yahawil sacerdote yeco Comam jin̈ yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , haca' naj Melquisedec yet payat tiempo .
58007001	Naj Melquisedec tu' , ha' naj isreyal con̈ob Salem yet payat tiempo , yeb xin issacerdote Comam caw aycano yip ye naj . Yet hunel xin yet isbeyc'o naj Abraham yin̈ hune' howal , isk'oji naj yin̈ huntek'an ebnaj rey . Haxa yet ismeltzo naj Abraham , yul chalaxo naj yul beh yu naj Melquisedec ; isk'anni naj isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ naj Abraham tu' .
58007002	Yak'ni naj Abraham isdiezmohal sunil tzet yik' naj yin̈ howal tu' tet naj . Hune' bihe Melquisedec chal yelapnoj : Yahawil yin̈ caw istoholal , yeb xin Yahawil yin̈ ak'anc'ulal , yuto naj Melquisedec tu' yahaw con̈ob Salem ye naj , Salem chal yelapnoj : ak'anc'ulal .
58007003	Naj Melquisedec tu' mach ohtabilo mac ismam naj yeb mac ismi' naj , yebpaxo mac yichmam naj . Machipaxo mac chalni yin̈ yet ispitzc'a naj yebpaxo yin̈ iscamical naj yuxin yechel yeco naj yin̈ Comam Jesucristo Isc'ahol Comam Dios , yuto machi isbi bak'in lahwi ismunil naj .
58007004	Tinan̈ xin txumweloj ta caw niman yelapno ye naj Melquisedec tu' , yuto ha' caw naj jichmam Abraham ak'ni isdiezmo tet naj yin̈ sunil tzet yik' naj yet isbey naj yin̈ howal .
58007005	Haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es , ebnaj sacerdote titna yin̈ naj Lev'i , ay yip ebnaj isk'anni tet yet con̈ob isdiezmohal yin̈ sunil tzet aya , waxan̈ca xin yuẍta isba ebnaj , yeb yichmam ebnaj ye naj Abraham .
58007006	Yaja' wal naj Melquisedec tu' , mach titnajo naj yin̈ naj Lev'i , yaja' yak' naj Abraham isdiezmo tet naj . Isk'annicano naj isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ naj Abraham tu' , naj bay yalte Comam Dios isc'ulal isc'ul .
58007007	Caw johtaj tato naj chik'anni isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ hunu maca , ec'bal yelapno naj yiban̈ hune' mac tu' .
58007008	Ebnaj yuninal yuninal naj Lev'i k'anni isdiezmohal sunil tzet ye tu' tet yet con̈ob , ebnaj tu' le-camto ebnaj , yaja' wal naj Melquisedec xin chal Yum Comam Dios tato itzitzto naj , yuto machi bay chal yin̈ iscamical naj .
58007009	Chu jalni tato ebnaj titna yin̈ naj Lev'i , ebnaj k'anni ch'en diezmo , ha' hun ebnaj ak'ni isdiezmo tet naj Melquisedec yet yak'ni naj Abraham isdiezmo .
58007010	Yuto waxan̈ca maẍto naj Lev'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yet yul chahlaxo naj Abraham yu naj Melquisedec , yaja' ayxatic'a naj Lev'i yin̈ naj Abraham , yuto ichmame ye naj Abraham yin̈ naj Lev'i tu' .
58007011	K'inalo tato yu ebnaj sacerdote levita watx'ico anma Israel yul sat Comam Dios yuto ha' ebnaj ak'ni ley tet con̈ob Israel , matxam yilalo oc hune'xa mac tzotelo yin̈ anma , hune' mac haca' naj Melquisedec mach haca'o naj Aar'on , naj titna yin̈ naj Lev'i .
58007012	Yuxin hayet chihellax hun majan ebnaj sacerdote , yilal ishellaxpaxo ley .
58007013	Comam Jesucristo , Comam bay chitzotel hune' ti' , mach yic'alo naj Lev'i ye Comam , walxinto yin̈ hunmajanxa ebnaj Israel bay tit Comam , yin̈ yic'al Comam tu' xin machi hunu mac oclena sacerdotehal .
58007014	Caw johtaj tato Comam Jesucristo yin̈ naj Jud'a titna Comam , yaja' xin matzet yalcano naj Mois'es tato ebnaj chitit yin̈ yuninal naj Jud'a tu' ay ebnaj chioc sacerdotehal xol anma Israel .
58007015	Yin̈ hune' ti' caw habanto cotxumni ta hune' mac alaxico sacerdotehal jin̈ , lahan yeb naj Melquisedec .
58007016	Oc sacerdotehal yaja' maẍtaj yu hune' ley chalni tato yilal istit yin̈ hune' majan ic'ale , machoj , to yu yip isk'inal Comam mach istan̈bal .
58007017	Yuto yal Comam Dios tet Comam Jes'us : Hach ti' sacerdote , chachoc tzotelo yin̈ anma wetan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo haca' naj Melquisedec , ẍi Comam .
58007018	Huntek'an chejbanile ak'lax yu naj Mois'es yet yalan̈tocano tu' xalahwi ismunil yuto machi yip yeb xin matzet iswatx'e .
58007019	Huntek'an chejbanile tu' machi hunu mac oc c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu , yaja' ay hune'xa caw c'ul occano seleloj , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo hune' ayco yipo janma , yu hune' tu' yuxin chon̈hitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios .
58007020	Hune' ayco yipo janma ti' , yak' binaho Comam Dios isbi yin̈ yet yaltencano Comam . Ebnaj sacerdote Israel mach yak' binaho Comam Dios isbi yet yak'laxcano ismunil ebnaj yu Comam .
58007021	Wal Comam Jesucristo Jahawil yak' binaho Comam Dios isbi yet yak'nicano Comam ismunil Comam , haca' yalni yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : Yak' binaho Comam Dios isbi , machi xin chishel isba tzet chala yet yalni haca' ti' : " Hach ti' sacerdote hach , chachoc tzotelo yin̈ anma wetan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , haca' naj Melquisedec , " ẍiayoj .
58007022	Yuxin ha' Comam Jes'us t'in̈bancano hune' iscab trato caw ec'bal c'ul sata hune' babel .
58007023	Ebnaj sacerdote yet yalan̈tocano tu' machi yu iscancano ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yin̈ huneln̈e yuto chi-la-camto ebnaj , yuxin caw tx'i'al ebnaj ec'lena yin̈ hune' munil tu' .
58007024	Walpaxo Comam Jesucristo machi bak'inal chicami , yuxin mach chiec'to ismunil tu' tet hunuxa maca , wal xin sacerdote Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
58007025	Yuxin ch'ak' Comam colbanile mach istan̈bal tet macta chihitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yu Comam Jes'us . Ha' Comam xin chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo yu mach chicam Comam .
58007026	Ha' Comam Jesucristo tu' ha'n̈ech'an Comam chu yoc tzotelo jin̈ tet Comam Dios ; yahawil sacerdote Comam , caw c'ulcano Comam , machi nino istx'ojal ayco yin̈ , machi nich'ano ismul , pohbililo isba xol anma mulum . Ilaxto Comam isc'atan̈ Comam Dios satato satcan̈ .
58007027	Mach lahano Comam haca' ebnaj yahawil yin̈ ebnaj sacerdote , titna yin̈ yuninal naj Lev'i yuto ebnaj tu' hunun tz'ayic yalten ebnaj no nok' yin̈ xahanbalil . Yin̈ babelal chak' ebnaj isxahanbal yin̈ ismul , lahwi tu' cat yalten ebnaj xahanbal yin̈ ismul anma . Wal Comam Jes'us hunelch'an yaco isba Comam xahanbalil yu comul .
58007028	Ebnaj ak'lax ismunil yoc yahawil sacerdote yu isley naj Mois'es masantic'a ay istx'ojal ebnaj , yaja' wal Isc'ahol Comam Dios , hune' mac bay yak' binaho Comam isbi yet yak'ni ismunil yoc yahawil sacerdote yet tzujanilxa , hune' mac tu' maẍtic'a nich'ano istx'ojal yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
58008001	Ha' hune' caw yilal yin̈ huntek'an chijal ti' to ay hune' mac yahawil sacerdote jin̈ , tz'on̈an yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios yul satcan̈ .
58008002	Tinan̈ xin lan̈an istzotel Comam jin̈ yul yatut Comam Dios ay satcan̈ , hune' n̈a tu' ha' caw Comam Dios watx'en̈e , mach anmahoj .
58008003	Sunil ebnaj yahawil sacerdote ak'bil ismunil ebnaj yalten sabehal yeb xahanbal tet Comam Dios , hacpax tu' Comam Jes'us yilaltic'a ay tzet chalte Comam tet Comam Dios .
58008004	Ta aytoc'o Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' matxam yilalo chioc Comam sacerdotehal , yuto ay ebnaj sacerdote ak'bil ismunil yak'ni xahanbal haca' yalni isley naj Mois'es .
58008005	Ismunil ebnaj sacerdote yul yatut Comam Dios tu' yecheln̈e ye yin̈ tzettaj ay yul satcan̈ . Caw johtaj tato yecheln̈e yehi yuto hayet yalan̈to maẍto chiswatx'e naj Mois'es yatut Comam Dios , yalni Comam tet naj haca' ti' : " Abe tzet chiwalti'an , caw haca' yechel inyehan tawet bey iswi' witz , hac tu' chawute , " ẍi Comam .
58008006	Yaja' wal tinan̈ ayxaco Comam Jes'us yin̈ hune' munil ec'bal isc'ulal sata ismunil ebnaj sacerdote , yuto ha' Comam chitzotel yin̈ anma tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' iscab trato ec'bal isc'ulal sata hune' yet babelal . Hune' iscab trato tu' caw ec'bal isc'ulal chalte Comam Dios jet ik'bil yu .
58008007	K'inalo ta can anma c'ulal yu hune' babel trato matxam yilalo yak' Comam hune' iscab trato ti' .
58008008	Yaja' yil Comam Dios ta mach c'ulu elico huntek'an anma tu' yul sat , yuxin yalcano Comam yul Yum : Ha' Comam Dios Jahawil , chalni haca' ti' : Chul hune' tiempohal bay chiwak'an hune' iscab trato tet anma Israel yeb tet anma Jud'a .
58008009	Ha' hune' iscab trato ti' mach lahano yeb haca' hune' wak'an tet yichmam ebnaj yet winilojan yul tx'otx' Egipto , haca'tan̈e xin inxequiltijan ebnaj . Yaja' yu mach isyije ebnaj intratotu'an , yuxin inbejcanojan ebnaj .
58008010	Ha' xin hune' trato chiwak'an tet anma Israel yin̈ tzujanilxa tu' , ha' ton hune' ti' : Chiwacojan inchejbanilan yin̈ isnabal ebnaj cat intz'ibn̈enicojan yin̈ yanma ebnaj . Haninan xin chinocan isDiosalo ebnaj cat yoc ebnaj incon̈obojan .
58008011	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' , matxa yilalo chiscuy hunu mac yet con̈obal , maca hunu mac ayto yu isba yebi yu quinyohtan̈enan . Wal xin sunil mac chinohtan̈enan , sunil niẍte unin yeb ichamta anma .
58008012	Chiwak'nicanojan nimanc'ulal yin̈ istx'ojal , matxa xin chinnatijan ismul , ẍi Comam .
58008013	Hayet chalni Comam ac' yin̈ hune' iscab trato lan̈an yalni tato ichamxa hune' babel trato , yuto sunil tzet xaichambiloj chilahwi ismunil , hanic'xan̈e xin cat istan̈iloj .
58009001	Hune' babel trato tu' ay chejbanile chihalni yin̈ tzet chu isyijen ebnaj sacerdote ismunil tet Comam Dios , yaja' yul hune' yatut Comam sat tx'otx'al ti' .
58009002	Hune' yatut Comam tu' , hac ti' yehi : Cabeb cuarto yul , pohbilayo yu hune' k'ap k'ap litx'ancan̈ yictabal . Hune' babel cuarto chihallax Txahulal , ha' tu' ayicto ch'en l'ampara yeb te' meẍa , yeb ixim pan chihaltelax tet Comam Dios .
58009003	Haxa hune' cuarto yintac'to k'ap litx'ancan̈ tu' caw Ec'na txahul chihallax yin̈ .
58009004	Ha' bey tu' ay hune' altar naba oro bay chin̈uslax pom , yulicto cuarto tu' aypaxicto te' caẍa yet istrato Comam Dios , sunil yin̈ te' ayco ch'en oro . Yul te' caẍa tu' ayayto hune' ẍalu naba oro bay ayayto man'a , aypaxayto isk'ojoch naj Aar'on , hune' te' k'ojoch elilo iswol ; aypaxayto ch'en ch'en pak'an yehi bay tz'ibn̈ebiloco ley .
58009005	Yiban̈ te' caẍa tu' ayahto yechel cawan̈ ebnaj 'angel chiyij querub'in , ha' chaliloj ta ayayo Comam Dios bey tu' , leyanilto xic' ebnaj yiban̈ ismajil te' caẍa tu' . Yaja' wal tinan̈ , mach caw yilalo chon̈oc jala' yin̈ tzet caw ye huntek'an tu' .
58009006	Hac ton tu' ye iswatx'ebanil yatut Comam Dios tu' . Yul hune' babel cuarto hunun tz'ayic yocto ebnaj sacerdote isyijeno ismunil tet Comam .
58009007	Wal yul hune' cuarto caw ec'na txahul xin , han̈c'an̈e naj yahawil sacerdote chiocto yul , yaja' xin huneln̈ech'an chiocto naj yulbal habil . Hayet chiocto naj , ik'bil ischiq'uil no nok' yu naj yu yalten naj yin̈ ismul , yeb yin̈ ismul sunil anma mach nano yu chanic'o ismul .
58009008	Hac tu' chu yak'ni Comam Esp'iritu johtan̈eloj ta hayet yocnico hune' babel cuarto tu' maẍto chihajlax beh japni yin̈ sat Comam Dios .
58009009	Hune' babel cuarto tu' yecheln̈e yin̈ hune' tiempo bay ayon̈ ti' , yuto huntek'an sabehal yeb xahanbal chihaltelaxi , mach chiswatx'eco isnabal anma chiyiyo isba bey tu' yin̈ istoholal .
58009010	Huntek'an chejbanile tu' yin̈n̈e tzet chilolaxi yeb tzet chiuc'lax bay chitzoteli , yin̈ issajn̈elax tzettaj ye tu' ; huntek'an tu' yetn̈e conimanil yehi . Ocnico huntek'an chejbanil tu' yin̈ ismunil masanto yet yapni istiempohal ishelni Comam tzettaj ye tu' .
58009011	Yaja' xahulic'o Comam Cristo , ha' Comam Yahawil sacerdote xayak' isc'ulal jet , huntek'an yilaltic'a yuli . Haxa hune' yatut Comam Dios bay ayco Comam Jes'us sacerdotehal caw ec'bal isc'ulal yeb tz'ajan yehi , maẍtaj ebnaj winaj watx'en̈e , mach yeto yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi .
58009012	Xaapni Comam Jes'us sata Comam Dios satcan̈ , yaja' maẍtaj ischiq'uil no' chiw maca ischiq'uil no' niẍte wacax yalte Comam , walxinto ha' caw ischiq'uil Comam yalte . Xaapni Comam sata Comam Dios yin̈ huneln̈e yeb yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , hac tu' yu isk'oji Comam yak'nicano colbanil mach istan̈bal .
58009013	Yin̈ caw yeli ischiq'uil no' winaj wacax yeb ischiq'uil no' chiw yeb istan̈il no' k'opo wacax chitxihlaxico yiban̈ anma mulum , ay yip issajn̈encano isnimanil anma yet payxa tu' .
58009014	Hajxam ischiq'uil Comam Jesucristo to caw ec'balto ay yip issajn̈en janma yin̈ istx'ojal , yun̈e coyijen yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios , Comam itzitzn̈etic'a , yuto yu Comam Esp'iritu mach istan̈bal , yuxin yaco isba Comam Cristo xahanbalil tet Comam Dios , caw xin machi nino istx'ojal Comam .
58009015	Ha' iscamical Comam Jesucristo ak'ni tan̈o sunil mule alaxico yalan̈ hune' babel istrato Comam Dios , yuxin tinan̈ ha' Comam Jes'us chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' iscab trato ti' , yun̈e han̈on̈ awtebilon̈ yu Comam chicochah comajul mach istan̈bal haltebilcano yu Comam .
58009016	Haca' hunu testamento watx'ebilcanoj , machi yip te' tato maẍto chicam naj an̈ecano te' .
58009017	Machi yip hune' testamento tu' tato itzitzto naj an̈ecanoj , wal ta xacam naj wal tu' ay yip .
58009018	Yuxin ha' hune' babel istrato Comam Dios yilal malto ischiq'uil no nok' yijnicano isba .
58009019	Yuto hayet lahwi yawten naj Mois'es chejbanil chal ley tet anma Israel , issomni naj ischiq'ul no' tzehla wacax yeb ischiq'uil no' chiw xol ha ha' , yanico naj no' lana caj yin̈ iswi' isk'ab te' hisopo islahbanayto naj xol chic' tu' , istxihnico naj yin̈ yumal ley yeb yiban̈ sunil anma Israel .
58009020	Yalni naj Mois'es tu' xin : " Ha' chic' ti' chit'in̈bancano istrato Comam Dios chak' teyet . Yilal xin heyijen tzet chala , " ẍi naj .
58009021	Istxihnipaxico naj Mois'es chic' yin̈ yatut Comam tu' , yeb yin̈ sunil munlabal chiocnico yu ebnaj sacerdote yul yatut Comam tu' .
58009022	Haca' yalni ley ta sunil tzettaj ye tu' masanto chic' chisajn̈eni , machi xin nimanc'ulal yin̈ ismul anma ta machi chic' chimaltoj .
58009023	Huntek'an yecheln̈e yeco yin̈ tzet ay yul satcan̈ yilal issajn̈elax yu xahanbal , yaja' wal tzet ay satcan̈ choche xahanbal ec'na c'ul sata huntek'an tu' .
58009024	Yuto Comam Cristo maẍtaj yul hune' yatut Comam Dios watx'ebil yu ebnaj winaj bay octoj , hune' yecheln̈e yeco yin̈ yatut Comam ay yul satcan̈ , walxinto caw apni Comam sata Comam Dios yul satcan̈ , ha' xin Comam chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios tinan̈ .
58009025	Comam Jesucristo mach hayelta yaco isba xahanbalil haca' yute ebnaj yahawil sacerdote , yet yanico ebnaj ischiq'uil no nok' xahanbalil . Ebnaj tu' hunun habil yocto ebnaj yul yatut Comam Dios yalteno ischiq'uil no nok' yin̈ xahanbalil , maẍtaj ischiq'uil ebnaj chalte .
58009026	Ta hac tu' , tx'i'alxam el chicam Comam yichitax iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Wal xin ha' caw yehi to ha' yin̈ islahobal tiempo ti' ha' caw Comam hul yak'aco isba xahanbalil yin̈ huneln̈e yu yinilo Comam comul .
58009027	Yuto sunil anma yilal hunelch'an chicami , lahwi tu' cat yillaxi yin̈ tzet chielico yul sat Comam Dios .
58009028	Hac tu' xin Comam Jesucristo huneln̈ech'an yak' isba xahanbalil yu yinilo Comam ismul tzetc'a anma . Wal xin chul Comam yin̈ iscayelal , yaja' matxataj yu yinilo ismul anma , to yu iscolni Comam macta chiechmani .
58010001	Yuto ha' huntek'an xahanbal chal isley naj Mois'es maẍtaj ha' tzet caw ay yul satcan̈ , wal xin yecheln̈e yeco yin̈ huntek'an isc'ulal yilal yuli . Huntek'an xahanbal chalte ebnaj hunun habil mach chu istz'ajban isc'ul anma choche ishitzaco isba isc'atan̈ Comam Dios .
58010002	Yuto ta huntek'an xahanbal chal isley naj Mois'es tu' chu issajn̈encano anma yin̈ ismul , chimisbej yalten xahanbal , yuto matxa ismul chabe .
58010003	Wal xin ha' isxahanbal anma chi-la-yak' hunun habil tu' , ha' chak'ni isnab anma isnaniti ismul .
58010004	Yuto ischiq'uil no' winaj wacax yeb no' chiw , mach chik'oji yinilo ismul anma .
58010005	Yuxin yet yul Comam Jesucristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yalni tet Comam Dios haca' ti' : Matxa chisje hac'ul ch'ak'lax xahanbal yeb sabehal tawet , yuxin ak'bil innimanilan hawu , ha' chiwak'an yin̈ xahanbalil tawet .
58010006	Mach chitzala hac'ul yin̈ xahanbal chin̈uslaxi yeb sabehal chiak'lax tawet yu yinilo mule .
58010007	Yuxinto chiwalan tawet : Mamin , hach inDiosalan , ayinan lah yu inyijenan tzet chawala , haca' yu istz'ibn̈elaxcano win̈an yul Hawum . ẍi Comam .
58010008	Yin̈ babelal , yal Comam Cristo ta mach isje isc'ul yeb mach chitzala Comam Dios tato chiak'lax xahanbal yeb sabehal tet , yeb no nok' chin̈uslaxi yu yel ismul anma , waxan̈ca xin hac tu' yalni ley .
58010009	Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo Comam : " Mamin , hach inDiosalan , ayinan lah yu inyijenan tzet chawala , " ẍi Comam . Chal yelapno tu' ta chilo huntek'an babel xahanbal tu' cat yanico hune' ac' .
58010010	Xacon̈yaco Comam Dios yetoj yuto isyije Comam Jesucristo tzet yal isc'ul Comam Dios yet yalten isba yin̈ xahanbalil yin̈ huneln̈e .
58010011	Sunil ebnaj sacerdote Israel hununn̈etic'a tz'ayic ayco ebnaj yin̈ ismunil yalten xahanbal yeb xin hune'n̈etic'a ha' xahanbal chalte ebnaj , waxan̈ca xin mach chu yinilo mule .
58010012	Yaja' wal Comam Cristo huneln̈ech'an yaco isba xahanbalil yin̈ comul yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , lahwi tu' yoc tz'on̈no Comam yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios .
58010013	Ha' tu' ay Comam yechman yalaxico sunil mac ayco ishowal yin̈ yalan̈ yoj .
58010014	Yuto hune'n̈e xahanbal yak' Comam con̈yanico yin̈ istoholal yin̈ huneln̈e han̈on̈ yeton̈xa Comam ti' .
58010015	Chak'paxo isba Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ huntek'an ti' yet chalni :
58010016	Hune' intratohan chiwak'an tet anma Israel yet tzujanilxa , ha' ton hune' ti' : Chiwacojan inchejbanilan yul yanma yeb yin̈ isnabal , ẍi .
58010017	Lahwi tu' yalnipaxoj : Matxa bak'inal xin chinnatijan ismul yeb istx'ojal , ẍi Comam .
58010018	Yuxinto ayxa nimanc'ulal yin̈ mule , matxa yilalo chiak'lax xahanbal hunelxa .
58010019	Yuxin tinan̈ hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , yin̈xa sunil janma chon̈apni yin̈ sat Comam Dios bay ay yehobal caw ay yelapnoj , yaj yu ischiq'uil Comam Jesucristo .
58010020	Chu japni yu hune' ac' beh chiak'ni k'inale iswatx'e Comam yet istzilmoyo k'ap k'ap aycan̈ yul yatut Comam Dios yet iscam Comam Jes'us .
58010021	Ha' Comam Jes'us ha' yahawil sacerdote , chitzotel jin̈ tet Comam Dios , ha' caw ay yelapnoj , chimunla yul yatut Comam Dios yul satcan̈ .
58010022	Yuxin hitzojon̈weco yin̈ sunil janma sata Comam Dios , jak'aweyto yul janma yin̈ caw isyelal yuto sajxa ye janma yu ischiq'uil Comam , matxa istx'ojal chietanto conabal ; yeb xin sajxa ye conimanil yu ha ha' caw saj .
58010023	Colin̈bawe coba yin̈ cuybanile xajabe ti' , machojab chicabcon coc'ul yin̈ tzet ayco yipo janma , hune' bay tzujanon̈icoj , yuto chij isba tzet haltebil jet yu Comam Dios .
58010024	Cosaya'we yin̈ tzet chu cocolwa jin̈ hununon̈ , haxinwal chicolahico coxahann̈en coba cat cowatx'en isc'ulal jin̈ hununon̈ .
58010025	Machojab chicobej cocutxban coba yin̈ culto , haca' chute huntek'an ebnaj , wal xin jiptzewe coba hununon̈ , yuto lan̈an isyenilo isba tato lan̈an ishitzti tiempo bay chihul Comam Jesucristo .
58010026	Yuto ta lahwi johtan̈enilo isyelal hune'n̈etic'a ha' xin janico comul , matxa hunuxa xahanbal chu yak'ni tan̈o comul chijaco tu' .
58010027	Ta hac tu' toxan̈e chijechma yul hune' niman isya'tajil jiban̈ yeb k'a k'a' chitan̈tzenilo sunil macta ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam Dios .
58010028	Yet chisman̈c'on hunu mac isley naj Mois'es , ta ay xin cawan̈ maca oxwan̈ mac chalni tato yeli man̈c'om hune' mac tu' , mak'bil ismak'lax camoj , matxa nimanc'ulal yin̈ .
58010029	Hajxam mac chiyahni Isc'ahol Comam Dios yeb matzet chalilo ischiq'uil Comam yul sat , chinilo ispixan Comam Esp'iritu Santo , Comam chon̈ocheni . Huntek'an mac tu' caw ec'balto isya'tajil chiay yiban̈ , yuto ha' ischiq'uil Comam Jesucristo t'in̈bancano istrato Comam Dios , con̈yanipaxico yeto Comam .
58010030	Caw johtaj tato halbilcano yu Comam Dios , haca' ti' : " Haninn̈ehan chiwilan yin̈ tzet chielico anma , haninan chiwak'an ispaj selel tet , " ẍi Comam . Chalnipaxo yul Yum Comam : " Ha' Comam Dios Jahawil chiilni yin̈ tzet chielico iscon̈ob , " ẍiayoj .
58010031	¡ Caw ay ismay yet chanayo Comam Dios itzitz isya'tajil jiban̈ !
58010032	Naweti yet yalan̈tocanoj yet hechahni issajilk'inal yul heyanma caw heyak' techaho isya'tajil hul teyiban̈ .
58010033	Hex ti' quexbahlaxi , heyetalax sata anma , ayex xin hul isya'tajil teyiban̈ yu quexcolwa yin̈ mac ak'lax ec'oya' yanma tu' .
58010034	Caw tz'aypaxo hec'ul yin̈ ebnaj alaxicto yul preso , machi xin oc bisc'ulal yin̈ hec'ul yet yilaxilo tzet ayex yuto heyohtaj ta ec'balto isc'ulal chiak'lax teyet yul satcan̈ , huntek'an machi bak'inal chilahwi .
58010035	Yuxin machojab chebej iscawxi hec'ul , yuto niman ispaj selel chak'lax teyet .
58010036	Niman cheyute hec'ul heyak'ni techaho isya'tajil , haxinwal chu hewatx'en tzet choche isc'ul Comam Dios cat hechahnipaxo tzet haltebilcano yul Yum Comam ,
58010037	yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios : Caw hanic'xan̈e bay chul Comam , Comam yilal yuli , caw mach chiec'to yet yuli .
58010038	Ha' mac xacan c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios ha' ton mac maẍtic'a chisbej iscawxi isc'ul yin̈ Comam , yaja' wal mac chimeltzo yintaj mach chitzala isc'ul Comam yin̈ , ẍi yul Yum Comam .
58010039	Yaja' wal han̈on̈ ti' mach chon̈meltzo jintaj haca' ebnaj chimeltzo yintaj cat istocano yin̈ isya'tajil . Wal han̈on̈ ti' chicochah cocolbanil yuto xajayto yul janma yin̈ Comam .
58011001	Hayet chijanayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios , ha' chal yelapnoj ta ayco yin̈ janma cochahni tzet echmabil ju , yeb xin t'in̈an jecoj ta chijil yin̈ huntek'an tzet maẍto chijilico yin̈ .
58011002	Ebnaj ischejab Comam ec'lena yet payxa can ebnaj c'ulal yu yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
58011003	Yu chijayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin t'in̈an jecoj ta yu Istzoti' Comam xin iswatx'e sunil tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb satcan̈ . Yuxin sunil tzet watx'ebil chijil tinan̈ , mach yin̈o tzet watx'ebilxa titnaj .
58011004	Yu yayto naj Abel yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yuxin yalte naj hune' xahanbal ec'bal c'ul sata yet naj Ca'in . Hac tu' yu iscancano naj c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , ischahni Comam isxahanbal naj . Waxan̈ca camnaxa naj Abel tu' , yaja' yexn̈e istzotel naj jet yu yayto naj yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios .
58011005	Yu yayto naj Enoc yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yuxin ilaxto naj satcan̈ yu Comam , mach yil naj camical , matxa xin hunu mac ilni naj . Chal yul Yum Comam Dios tato yet yalan̈to maẍto chiilaxto naj satcan̈ tu' caw tzala Comam Dios yin̈ tzet iswatx'e naj .
58011006	Yuto ta machi jayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios mach chitzala Comam yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e , yuto ha' mac choche chihitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios yilal yanayto yul yanma tato ay Comam Dios yeb ta chak' Comam ispaj tet macta yin̈ sunil yanma chisayni Comam .
58011007	Yu yayto naj No'e yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin hayet yalni Comam ta chak' hune' niman yaxn̈ab isyijen naj tzet yal Comam , yoc naj iswatx'eno hune' barco bay chicolcha naj yeb yixal yeb oxwan̈ isc'ahol yeb ebix alibe , waxan̈ca xin maẍto ixtan̈o hune' n̈ab tu' . Yu yayto naj No'e yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yuxin colcha naj , wal anma xin tan̈ilo sunil . Iscancano naj c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios , yu yayto naj yul yanma yin̈ Comam .
58011008	Yu yayto naj Abraham yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin hayet yawtenilo Comam naj , caw yijem yute isba naj , isto naj sat hune' tx'o tx'otx' halbilcano yu Comam Dios ta chak'lax ismajulo naj . Waxan̈ca xin mach yohtajo naj bay ay tx'otx' , yaja' isbejcano naj iscon̈ob , isto naj .
58011009	Caw yayto naj yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , isto naj ehoyo sat tx'o tx'otx' yalte Comam Dios ; yaja' haca' wayan̈bal yu yec' naj sat tx'otx' , iswatx'en naj k'ap mantiado yatutoj . Hacpax tu' xin ebnaj c'ahole , naj Isaac yeb naj Jacob , ha' hun ebnaj yin̈ tzet yalte Comam tu' tet naj Abraham .
58011010	Yuto naj Abraham tu' ha' hune' con̈ob caw c'ul yehayto isxe' , ha' echmabil yu naj . Hune' con̈ob tu' , ha' caw Comam Dios anayo ismalil , ha'tic'a xin Comam watx'eni .
58011011	Hacpax tu' ix Sara yayto ix yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin waxan̈ca caw ixnamxa ix yeb xin maẍtic'a hunu yunin ix , yaja' ak'lax yip ix yuninwi . Ispitzc'a nich'an yunin ix yeb yichamil yuto yayto ix yul yanma ta ha' tzet chalte Comam Dios masan chiyij isba .
58011012	Waxan̈ca caw ichamxa naj Abraham , yaj caw hantan̈e anma pohchacan̈ yin̈ . Caw haca' isbisil tx'umel yeb arena ay isti' ha' mar , machi hunu mac chu isbisni .
58011013	Sunil huntek'an ebnaj tu' mach ischah ebnaj tzet haltebil yu Comam yet iscamto ebnaj ; yaja' yu yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam yuxinto haca'tan̈e yilto ebnaj yin̈ tzet haltebilcano yu Comam tu' yin̈ nahat , caw xin tzala ebnaj yin̈ . Istxumnilo ebnaj tato ton̈e chiec' ebnaj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
58011014	Yuxin ha' mac chitxumni haca' tu' , chisyeloj ta lan̈an issayni hune' yehobal bay chiehi .
58011015	Yaja' ta ha' bay titna ebnaj ha' bay ayco isnabal ebnaj , meltzomi ebnaj yintaj .
58011016	Yaja' wal xin , ha' hune' ehobal ec'na c'ul ay yul satcan̈ , ha' ayco yin̈ isnabal ebnaj . Yuxin mach chitx'ixwi Comam Dios yet chalni ebnaj Comam isDiosaloj , yuto ay hune' iscon̈ob ebnaj watx'ebil yu Comam .
58011017	Yu yayto naj Abraham yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin isyije naj yak'ni hunpilan isc'ahol yin̈ xahanbalil yet yilwelax naj yu Comam Dios ; waxan̈ca xin halbil tet naj yu Comam haca' ti' :
58011018	" Yin̈ naj Isaac chipohcha hawuninal , " ẍi Comam .
58011019	Yuto yohta naj Abraham tu' ta chu ispitzc'ancan̈ Comam Dios camom , yuxin haca'tic'a ak'bil itzitzbocan̈ naj Isaac , yak'lax naj tet ismam .
58011020	Yu yayto naj Isaac yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin yalan̈to yalni naj yin̈ huntek'an isc'ulal chischah naj Jacob yeb naj Esa'u yu Comam Dios .
58011021	Yu yayto icham Jacob yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin hayet toxa chicam icham , yalnicano icham yin̈ huntek'an isc'ulal chischah isc'ahol , ha' ton naj Jos'e , yay xulno icham yiban̈ iswi' isk'ojoch , yak'ni tzalaho isc'ul icham yin̈ Comam Dios .
58011022	Yu yayto naj Jos'e yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin yet yalan̈to maẍto chicam naj , yalnicano naj tato ay hune' tz'ayical ti' bay chiel ebnaj Israel sat tx'otx' Egipto . Yalnipaxo naj tato chito ebnaj Israel tu' isbajil isnimanil naj yet chiel ebnaj sat tx'otx' Egipto tu' .
58011023	Yu yayto ismam yeb ismi' naj Mois'es yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios yuxin hayet ispitzc'a naj yebalaxilo naj oxeb ixahaw , yuto caw c'ulch'an jilni naj . Mach xin xiw ismam naj yeb ismi' naj tet chejbanile yak' naj isreyal Egipto tato chipotx'lax niẍte winaj unin .
58011024	Yu yayto naj Mois'es yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin hayet icham tzeh naj matxa yoche naj oco yunino ix iscutz'in naj rey Egipto tu' .
58011025	Walxinto ha' yec'ya' yanma naj yinta iscon̈ob Comam Dios , ha' issayilo naj sata yak'ni tzalaho yanma naj yin̈ huntek'an tzalahilal yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , huntek'an pet chitan̈iloj .
58011026	Istxumnilo naj tato ec'balto c'ul yec'ya' yanma naj yu Comam Cristo sata yochen naj isk'alomal tx'otx' Egipto tu' , yuto ha' yin̈ tzet chak' Comam ispajo tet naj , ha' bay ayco yanma naj .
58011027	Yu yayto naj Mois'es yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin el naj yeb ebnaj Israel sat tx'otx' Egipto , machi xin xiw naj ta chitit ishowal naj rey tu' yin̈ naj . Caw yin̈n̈e Comam Dios yaco isnabal naj , haca'tan̈e caw yilico naj yin̈ Comam , Comam machi jilico yin̈ .
58011028	Yu yayto naj Mois'es yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin yec'tze naj k'in̈ Pascua , ischejni naj txihlaxoco ischiq'uil no' me' yin̈ iswi' yeb yin̈ isc'ul ispultahil yatut ebnaj Israel , yun̈e mach ispotx' naj 'angel ak'om camo anma isbabel c'ahol ebnaj Israel tu' .
58011029	Yu yayto ebnaj Israel yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin ispoh isba ha' mar Rojo , yec'to ebnaj yictabal ha' , caw xin tajin bay ec'to ebnaj . Haxa yet yec'to ebnaj Egipto yalni , ishunban isba ha' , ishik'nito ebnaj ha' , iscamilo ebnaj .
58011030	Yu yayto ebnaj Israel yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin hayet lahwi hujeb tz'ayic yec' hoyon ebnaj yin̈ con̈ob Jeric'o yay buyna isc'ubal hune' con̈ob tu' .
58011031	Yu yayto ix Rahab , ix tx'oj ye iswi' , yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin mach cam ix yinta macta man̈c'om , yuto c'ul yu ischahni ix ebnaj Israel beyc'o ilwal yin̈ con̈ob tu' .
58011032	¿ Mactaxca hunuxa chiwalan tinan̈ ? Caw matxam tiempo ta chinocan tzotelo yin̈ naj Gede'on , naj Barac , naj Sans'on , naj Jeft'e , naj David yeb naj Samuel yebpaxo ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat .
58011033	Yu yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin ay ebnaj k'oji yin̈ nimeta con̈ob , aypaxo ebnaj watx'en istoholal yet yoc yahawil , ay ebnaj ischah tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios , ay ebnaj majchen isti' no' balam .
58011034	Ay ebnaj k'oji isbutni nimeta k'a' , ay ebnaj colcha tet ch'en espada , ay ebnaj machi yip yaj hul yip ebnaj , caw xin c'ul elcanico ebnaj yin̈ howal , isk'oji ebnaj yin̈ ebnaj ak'om howal tit yul hune'xa nan con̈obal .
58011035	Aypaxo ebix ix itzitzbican̈ yunin yu yayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios . Ay ebnaj caw ya'ta yu iscami , yu mach chisje ebnaj isman̈c'o' tzet chal Comam Dios yuto choche ebnaj chiak'lax itzitzbocan̈ yin̈ hune' k'inale mach istan̈bal .
58011036	Ay ebnaj ec'ya' isbahlaxi ishatelaxpaxoj , ay ebnaj c'albalax yu ch'en cadena , ay ebnaj alaxicto yul preso .
58011037	Aypaxo ebnaj k'ojlax camoj , ay ebnaj c'uplaxayo yicta yu ch'en serrucho , ay ebnaj alaxico yin̈ ilwebal , aypaxo ebnaj ak'lax camo yu ch'en espada . Ay ebnaj nananta bay ec'le , xil no' me' yeb xil no' chiw ayco xilo isk'ap ebnaj , yak'len ebnaj meba'il yeb isya'tajil , isbahlaxpaxo ebnaj .
58011038	Anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' mach yeto ay ebnaj yec' xol , machi hunu bay caw ehayo ebnaj , walxinto ha' sat tx'otx' desierto ec' ebnaj yeb iswi'la witz yeb yulaj ch'en n̈ach'en , yeb yulaj tx'o tx'otx' holan ec' ebnaj .
58011039	Sunil ebnaj ti' , waxan̈ca caw c'ul isbeybal ebnaj yu yayto ebnaj yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yaja' machi hunu ebnaj chahni tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios .
58011040	Yuto ayon̈ico yin̈ isnabal Comam Dios yin̈ hune' tzet ec'bal c'ul tu' , yuxin mach yij isba tzet nabil yu Comam yin̈ ebnaj ischuquil , walxinto chihunico ebnaj jinta yin̈ istoholal .
58012001	Yuxin cotxumuloj ta haca' hoybilon̈ yu sunil macta yayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin cobeja'wecano sunil tzet chon̈etantoj yeb mule chon̈ak'ni ayc'ayoj ; cat jak'ni janma colahnico yin̈ hune' an̈e bay ayon̈icoj .
58012002	Jak'aweco conabal yin̈ Comam Jes'us , yuto ha' Comam ak'ni pitzc'aho janayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios , ha' Comam xin chitz'ajbancanoj . Yaco isba Comam yul isk'ab camical yin̈ te' culus , machi xin yoc yin̈ waxan̈ca caw tx'ixobal hune' camical tu' , yuto yohta Comam ta lahwi yec'ya' yanma tu' cat ischahni tzalahilal . Tinan̈ xin tz'on̈an Comam yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios .
58012003	Yuxin txumwe yin̈ tzet yu yak'ni techaho Comam Jes'us isya'tajil yu anma mulum , haxinwal mach chitibayo heyu yeb xin mach chexpax teyintaj .
58012004	Waxan̈ca ayco ip heyu hek'oji yin̈ istx'ojal , yaja' maẍto hunujex ti' cheyabe isya'il camical .
58012005	Yaja' xin xato nahul heyu yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios jet yul Yum han̈on̈ con̈yuninal , bay chala : C'ahol , machojab chiscaj hawi' yet chachiscuyni Comam Dios Jahawil . Machojab xin chaẍmeltzo tawintaj yet chaẍiscachni Comam .
58012006	Yuto ha' mac xahan ay yu Comam chaco Comam yin̈ istoholal . Haxa mac chischah Comam yuninaloj chayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ yu iscuychahi , ẍi yul Yum Comam .
58012007	Chahwe isya'tajil chati Comam Dios teyiban̈ yu hecuychahi , yuto quexyuninalxa Comam yuxin hac tu' chexyute . ¿ Tom ay hunu naj c'ahole ti' mach chicuylax yu ismam ?
58012008	Yaja' ta mach chayo Comam isya'tajil yu hecuychahi haca' chu Comam yin̈ macta yuninalxa , chal yelapno chal tu' ta mach quexyuninaloj , lahanex haca' niẍte unin machi ismam .
58012009	Conabawetij haca' yet niẍte uninon̈ ak'lax cocachbanil yu comam yeb yu comi' caw xin jabe yin̈ tzet yala , ¿ hatom xin tzet chal Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ , mach chicoyije yun̈e cochahni cok'inal ?
58012010	Comam comi' tu' con̈iscach hanic' tiempohal haca' yoche isc'ul , hajxam Comam Dios chon̈iscach Comam yu isc'ulalo jin̈ , yun̈e jelcanico haca' Comam , Comam machi nino istx'ojal yin̈ .
58012011	Yin̈ caw yeli yet chihul isya'tajil jiban̈ yu cocuychahi , mach chitzala coc'ul yet chihul jiban̈ , walxinto bisc'ulal chulo coc'ul , yaja' lahwi tu' chak'ni istoholal jet yeb ak'anc'ulal macon̈ bay chialaxayo isya'tajil tu' .
58012012	Walex haca'tan̈e paxna yip hek'ab yeb heyoj , ak'we heyanma yoc yip hek'ab yeb heyoj tu' .
58012013	Saywelo hune' beybale caw tohol haxinwal chian̈cha heyoj , hac tu' xin matxa caw chiahcan̈ iscotxk'ahi .
58012014	Aweco yin̈ hec'ul heyec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal yeb sunil anma , machojab chebeybaln̈e istx'ojal , yuto ha' mac chibeybaln̈en istx'ojal mach chiyil yin̈ Comam Dios .
58012015	Caw cheyil heba , tajca ayex chebej hechahni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios chak' jet , yuto ta hac tu' tx'i'al mac chietaxto heyu , lahan haca' te' howla telaj chicam anma yu .
58012016	Machojab hunujex ti' chexec' yin̈ ixloj , yeb xin machojab hunujex cheyah isc'ulal chak' Comam Dios teyet haca' yute naj Esa'u ; ishelto naj issabehal yet babel c'ahole yin̈ hune' sec' itah .
58012017	Caw heyohtaj ta haxa yet tzujanilxa yet yochen naj ischab ismajul yeb isc'ulal Comam Dios , haca' chiak'lax tet ebnaj babel c'ahole , matxa ak'lax tet naj , waxan̈ca caw ok' naj sic'lebil , yaja' matxa tzet tz'aj yute' isba naj .
58012018	Hex ti' mach hitzanojexico yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' chisje cotzabni , haca' yu ishitzico ebnaj jichmam Israel yin̈ witz Sina'i , hune' witz bay caw ah xaj k'a k'a' yin̈ , bay caw k'ejholiloj yeb bay caw n̈irla c'uh .
58012019	Machi xin heyabe yok' ch'en trompeta yeb istzotelpaxo Comam Dios . Hayet yaben ebnaj istzotel Comam tu' , yalni ebnaj ta matxa chitzotel Comam ,
58012020	yuto machi techa hune' chejbanile yu ebnaj , hune' chalni haca' ti' : " Tato ay hunu mac chayo yoj yiban̈ witz ti' maca hunu no nok' , yilal isk'ojlaxcamoj maca chitejlaxcamo yu ch'en lanza , " ẍi .
58012021	Caw xiwquilta tzet yil ebnaj tu' , yuxin ha' hun naj Mois'es halni haca' ti' : " Caw chinluyluncan̈an yu xiwquilal , " ẍi naj .
58012022	Walex ti' xaquexhitzico yin̈ witz Si'on , ha' iscon̈ob Comam Dios itzitz , ha' ton hune' Jerusal'en ay satcan̈ . Xaquexhitzico isc'atan̈ ismilal ebnaj 'angel cutxanico yanico ismay Comam Dios ,
58012023	yeb isc'atan̈ macta babel yuninal Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebil isbi yul satcan̈ . Xaquexhitzico isc'atan̈ Comam Dios , Comam juez yeco yin̈ sunil anma , yeb bay ay yanma anma c'ulxa yeb tz'ajanxa ye yu Comam Dios .
58012024	Xaquexhitzico yin̈ Comam Jes'us , Comam watx'en̈eyo iscab trato Comam Dios . Ha' ischiq'uil Comam Jes'us tu' con̈sajn̈en yin̈ comul , ha' chik'anni nimanc'ulal jin̈ tet Comam Dios . Mach haca'ho ischiq'uil naj Abel , to ha' yanayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ mac potx'ni naj , ha' isk'ana .
58012025	Yuxin nann̈e heyu tajca cheman̈c'oto Comam Dios chitzotel jet , yuto ta huntek'an mac man̈c'onto Comam Dios yet istzotel tet sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' mach colchahi , ¿ ha' tom xin han̈on̈ chon̈colchahi ta chicoman̈c'oto Comam Dios chitzotel jet yul satcan̈ ? Machoj .
58012026	Yet istzotel Comam Dios yet payxa tu' caw bili tx'o tx'otx' , yaja' tinan̈ xin chal Comam haca' ti' : " Hunelxan̈ech'an chintzotelan maẍn̈etaj xin tx'o tx'otx' ti' chiwak'bilojan , wal xin ha' hun satcan̈ chibilipaxoj , " ẍi Comam .
58012027	Hayet chalni Comam , hunelxan̈ech'an , chal yelapnoj tato huntek'an tzet chu ishec'lax yul yehobal watx'ebil yu Comam Dios , chihec'laxiloj cat istan̈tzelaxiloj , yun̈e iscancano huntek'an tzet mach chu ishec'laxi .
58012028	Hac tu' tzet ak'bil jet yu Comam Dios , hune' yet joc yul isk'ab , mach chu ishec'laxi . Yuxin jak'awe yuch'andiosal tet Comam Dios yin̈ hune' tu' , cat jinayo coba tet Comam yin̈ sunil janma , haca' caw choche Comam . Xiwojon̈wepaxo tet Comam .
58012029	Yuto Comam Dios lahan haca' k'a k'a' chisje istan̈ilo sunil tzet ye tu' yu .
58013001	Machojab chebej hexahann̈en heba hununex , yuto heyuẍtaxa heba yin̈ Comam , hacpax tu' ebix ix xachahni Comam heyanabxapaxo ebix .
58013002	Machojab chenahuln̈eto heyak'ni bay chiway mac chiec' tec'atan̈ , yuto ay mac ti' ak'ni bay chiway yet anmahil , machi xin yohtajoj tato 'angel ebnaj ec' isc'atan̈ .
58013003	Machojab chenahuln̈epaxto ebnaj ayicto yul preso , hacojtam ha' hunex ayexico preso yinta ebnaj . Nawepaxti macta chiak'len isya'tajil , yuto hexxataxcapaxo cheyak'le isya'tajil .
58013004	Hayet cheyik'ni heyetbi , ayojab yelapno mohyilal yul hesat ; yin̈n̈eojab heyetbi cheyaco heyanma , yuto ha' mac chiixli yeb chiwinajli , chiay isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios . Yebpaxo ha' mac maẍto chimohyi cat issayni ismul , chiaypaxo isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios .
58013005	Machojab cheyaco heyanma yin̈ ch'en melyu . Ak'we tzalaho hec'ul yin̈ tzet ay yul hek'ab , yuto chal Comam Dios yul Yum : " Machi bak'inal chexinnahuln̈etojan yeb chexinbejcanojan , " ẍi Comam .
58013006	Yuxin sunil janma chijalni haca' ti' : Ha' Comam Dios Jahawil chicolwa win̈an , yuxin mach chinxiwan yin̈ istx'ojal choche anma iswatx'e win̈an , con̈chi .
58013007	Machojab chenahuln̈eto ebnaj chiijbali teyin̈ yeb ebnaj halni Istzoti' Comam Dios teyet . Txumwec'anab yin̈ isbeybal ebnaj masanto yet iscamto ebnaj . Haca'ojab yanico yanma ebnaj yin̈ Comam Dios hacojab tu' heyanico heyanma yin̈ Comam .
58013008	Comam Jesucristo hune'n̈etic'a ha' Comam , ha' Comam yet payxa , ha' Comam tinan̈ , ha'paxo Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
58013009	Yuxin mach cheyak' subchaho heba tet huntek'an nan cuybanile mach ohtabilo ju . Ha'ojab yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios chiyik' yip janma , maẍtaj yin̈ huntek'an chejbanile yin̈ tzet chilolaxi , yuto huntek'an tu' matzet chijik' yin̈ .
58013010	Han̈on̈ ti' nanxa hune' coxahanbal ; ebnaj sacerdote ayco yalan̈ isley naj Mois'es , machi yoc ebnaj yin̈ isc'uxni hune' xahanbal ti' .
58013011	Ebnaj yahawil sacerdote tu' chicto ebnaj ischiq'uil no nok' yul cuarto ec'bal txahul isbi , ha' chak'baln̈e ebnaj yin̈ ismul anma ; yaja' wal isnimanil no nok' tu' istxam con̈ob chin̈uslaxi .
58013012	Hacpax tu' yu Comam Jes'us , cam Comam istxam con̈ob Jerusal'en yun̈e issajn̈encano Comam yanma anma yu ischiq'uil .
58013013	Yuxin elojon̈weto haca' bay ilaxilto Comam istxam con̈ob tu' , ha' chal yelapnoj ha' hunon̈ chiak'lax elo cotxixobal yinta Comam .
58013014	Yuto maẍtaj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ay hune' cocon̈ob ay yin̈ huneln̈e , wal xin ha' hune' cocon̈ob ay yin̈ sunilbal tiempo ha' bay ayto janma .
58013015	Yuxin jala'we c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios sunilbal tiempo yu Comam Jesucristo . Ha' hune' coxahanbal chijak' tet Comam , ha' ton cobitn̈en Comam yu coti' .
58013016	Machojab chenahuln̈eto hewatx'en isc'ulal yeb hecolwa yin̈ tzet ayex yin̈ heyet anmahil , yuto hapaxo huntek'an tu' coxahanbal tet Comam Dios , caw xin chitzala Comam yin̈ .
58013017	Yijewe yin̈ tzet chal ebnaj chiijbali texol , watx'ewe tzet chal ebnaj yuto ha' ebnaj chexiptzeni , yeb xin ha' ebnaj chihalni tet Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chewatx'e . Yuxin aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal , haxinwal yin̈ tzalahilal chitak'wi ebnaj teyin̈ tet Comam , mach yin̈o bisc'ulal , ta mach xin mach chechah isc'ulal .
58013018	Han̈on̈ti'an̈ c'ul cobeybalan̈ , machi istx'ojal nabil juhan̈ . Txahlan̈we jin̈an̈ yuto chijochehan̈ chon̈ec'an̈ yin̈ sunil isc'ulal .
58013019	Ha' hune' caw yilal chink'anpaxojan teyet ta chextxahli win̈an tet Comam Dios , haxinwal ta hac tu' chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam , chinapnihan quexwila'an yin̈ an̈e .
58013020	Ha'ojab Comam Dios yahawil ak'anc'ulal yeb ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jes'us xol camom , Comam cotan̈emal yeb xin t'in̈bancano istrato Comam Dios mach istan̈bal yu ischiq'uil .
58013021	Ha'ojab Comam Dios tu' chiak'ni hehelanil hewatx'en sunil isc'ulal , haxinwal chewatx'e tzet chal isc'ul Comam cat iswatx'en Comam tzet choche isc'ul jin̈ yu Comam Jesucristo . ¡ Jak'aweco ismay Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo ! Hacojab tu' .
58013022	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , chink'anan teyet niman cheyute hec'ul yuto hanic'n̈e hecuybanil chiwatojan teyet yul hune' incartati'an .
58013023	Chiwaltojan teyet ta xabejtzolax juẍta Timoteo . Ta pet chul naj inc'atan̈an chito naj wintajan yet chintohan quexwilnojan .
58013024	Halwe tet ebnaj chiijbali teyin̈ ta chil isba ebnaj yeb sunil mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab ay yul ismajul Italia ti' chalto ebnaj ta cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil .
58013025	Yak'abayo Comam Dios isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ hesunil . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
59001001	Hanin Santiago inti'an , ischejab Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo wehan . Chiwaltojan teyet cheyil heba yin̈ hecawil , hex cablahon̈eb majan wet con̈ob Israel , hex pujanexto yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
59001002	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , hayet chihul sunil ilwebal teyiban̈ , caw ak'we tzalaho hec'ul sic'lebil .
59001003	Heyohtaj ta hayet chul ilwebal teyiban̈ yu yillaxi ta ayco Comam Dios yipo heyanma , hac tu' chu hecuyni istecha ilwebal heyu .
59001004	Yilal helahnico heyak'ni heyanma istecha heyu , hac tu' chu hech'ib yin̈ yet Comam Dios , yeb xin tz'ajan chexelcanico yin̈ isc'ulal Comam , hac tu' xin matxa nich'ano tzet mach tz'ajanojex yin̈ yet Comam .
59001005	Tato ay hunujex maẍto tz'ajano hehelanil , k'anwe tet Comam Dios , cat yak'ni Comam teyet , yuto mach chismale Comam yak'ni tet macta chik'anni . Chak' Comam tet , yaj mach chalico Comam yin̈ sat mac bay chak' Comam hune' tu' .
59001006	Hayet chicok'anni cohelanil tet Comam , cok'anawe yin̈ sunil janma . Machojab chicabcon janma , yuto ha' mac chicabcon yanma , lahan haca' ha' mar ch'ec' jobla yu jak'ek' ; nanantaxan̈e bay chitocanicoj .
59001007	Ha' mac hac tu' yecoj , tajca ch'ec' yin̈ isnabal ta ay tzet chischah tet Comam Dios Jahawil .
59001008	Yuto nan ch'ec' yin̈ isnabal tinan̈ , nanxapaxo ch'ec' yin̈ isnabal hecal , hac tu' xin mach t'in̈ano yeco yin̈ isbeybal .
59001009	Tato ay hunu juẍtaj maca hunu janab ya'ta yehi , yilal yak'ni tzalaho yanma yin̈ Comam , yuto ay yelapno ye yul sat Comam Dios .
59001010	Hacpax tu' ebnaj juẍta yeb ebix janab k'alom , tzalahojabi yet chiilaxayo yu Comam Dios , yuto ha' mac k'alom lahan haca' isxumaquil te' telaj machi nahatli .
59001011	Yuto hayet chi'ahilo tz'ayic cat ispohcan̈ yip k'a' , chitajilo te' telaj , cat yay hona isxumaquil te' , hac tu' xin matxa c'ulch'ano jilni te' . Haca' ishowayo isxumaquil te' telaj tu' , hac tu' isc'ayayo ebnaj k'alom yet chiscutxban ebnaj isk'alomal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
59001012	Sak'al yet mac chitecha ilwebal yu , yuto hayet chilahwi istecha ilwebal yu hune' mac tu' , chak' Comam hune' ispaj selel tet , ha' ton hune' isk'inal mach istan̈bal , ha' ton hune' corona haltebil yu Comam tet mac chitzala yin̈ Comam .
59001013	Hayet chon̈montelax cowatx'en hunu istx'ojal , machojab chijala ta ha' Comam Dios chon̈monten cowatx'en hune' tu' , yuto Comam mach chu con̈ismonten cowatx'en hunu istx'ojal , machipaxo tzet chimonten Comam yu yanico ismul .
59001014	Wal xin , ha' istx'ojal ayco jin̈ ha' chon̈monteni , cat con̈yinito yin̈ istx'ojal .
59001015	Ta chijaco janma yin̈ istx'ojal aytic'aco jin̈ , yin̈ chipitzc'ati comul . Haxa yet chich'ib hune' istx'ojal yul janma tu' , cat yul hune' camical jin̈ .
59001016	Wuẍtaj wanab , hex caw xahan ay wuhan , mach cheyak' subchaho heba .
59001017	Sunil tzet c'ul yeb sunil tzet tz'ajan yehi tet Comam Dios chicochah . Ha' Comam watx'en̈e sunil tzet chimujli yul satcan̈ . Ha' huntek'an tu' xin chishel isba , wal Comam Dios , hune'n̈etic'a ha' Comam .
59001018	Yuto el yin̈ isc'ul Comam yak'ni cok'inal mach istan̈bal yu Istzoti' caw yeli , hune' yak' jet yet cochahni yul janma . Yu hune' tu' xin , han̈on̈ caw babelon̈ sata sunil tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios .
59001019	Wuẍtaj wanab , hex xahan ay wuhan , naweti huntek'an chiwalti'an . Hajbawe hetxiquin heyabeni ; mach comono cheyal hunu tzet ye tu' yin̈ an̈e , mach comono chitit hehowal .
59001020	Yuto yet chitit cohowal , maẍtaj tzet choche Comam chicowatx'e .
59001021	Yuxin bejwecano sunil istx'ojal yeb sunil ismachiswalilal caw chipoh yul yiban̈k'inal ti' . C'ulch'anojab chu hechahni Istzoti' Comam Dios challax teyet , hune' tz'unbilxa yul heyanma yu Comam , yuto ha' chexcolni tet sunil istx'ojal .
59001022	Machojab ton̈e chijabe Istzoti' Comam , wal xin yilal coyijeni . Yaj tato ton̈e chijabe tzet chala , mach chicoyijepaxoj , han̈-caw-on̈ chijak' subchaho coba .
59001023	Ha' mac chi'aben Istzoti' Comam Dios , mach chiswatx'epaxo tzet chala , lahan haca' hunu mac chiyil sat yul ch'en espejo ,
59001024	yaja' lahwi yilni sat tu' , caw yin̈ an̈e chito nahul yu tzet yillax sat .
59001025	Wal mac mach chito nahul Istzoti' Comam Dios yu , to caw chaco yin̈ isc'ul yin̈ hune' tzet chabe tu' cat isyijeni , caw sak'al yet ; ha' Istzoti' Comam tu' chon̈bejtzonilo yul isk'ab ismachiswalilal .
59001026	Ta ay hunu mac yijem yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios yalni , yaj ta mach chak' cacha' isti' yin̈ istx'ojal , ha' hune' anma tu' chiyak' subchaho isba ischuquil . Hac tu' xin naban̈e chala tato yijem yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios .
59001027	Yaj ta chon̈colwa yin̈ niẍte unin mach ismam , mach ismi' , yeb yin̈ ebix camnaxa yichamil , cat xin copohnilo coba yin̈ istx'ojal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , wal tu' caw lan̈an coyijen tzet chal Comam Dios Mame .
59002001	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , hex xahechah Comam Jesucristo yul heyanma , Comam caw ay yelapno yehi , lahann̈ehojab hexahann̈en heba hesunil .
59002002	K'inalo ta cutxanexicoj cat yapni hunu naj k'alom , caw c'ul yehico xil isk'ap yeb xin ayco hunu isjolk'ab naba oro . Caw xin c'ul chu hechahni naj , cat heyalni tet naj : " Tz'on̈yan̈ yiban̈ hune' ẍila caw c'ul ti' , " ta quexchi . Lahwi tu' xin cat yocpaxapno hunu naj caw meba' , caw xilxa xil isk'ap aycoj , cat xin heyalni tet naj :
59002003	" Wal halin̈i bey tu' , " maca " Ayan̈ tz'on̈no sat tx'otx' , " ta quexchi .
59002004	Ta hac tu' cheyute , mach lahano chexahann̈e ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab . Ha' xin chalniloj ta tx'oj chenaco yin̈ heyet anmahil .
59002005	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , txumweloj tato ha' Comam Dios sic'nican̈ anma meba' ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu yak'ni Comam isk'alomal tet yin̈ yanayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam , cat ischahnipaxo yehobal bay ch'oc Comam Yahawil , hune' yalte Comam tet mac ch'ocheni .
59002006	Walexpaxo xin cheyah ebnaj meba' , machi yelapno ebnaj yul hesat . ¿ Mac anmahil chexetani , cat quexyinito sata naj alcal ? Ha' ton ebnaj k'alom .
59002007	¿ Tom mach heyohtajoj tato ha' ebnaj tu' tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Jesucristo ayxaco yul janma ?
59002008	Ta caw yeli cheyije isley Comam Dios haca' yalni Yum Comam bay chala : " Xahan cheyil heyet anmahil haca' heya'iln̈en heba , " ẍicanoj . Ta hac tu' cheyute caw c'ul heyecoj .
59002009	Yaj ta mach lahano chexahann̈e heba , cheyaco hemul , cat hecanpaxcano tx'ojal tet isley Comam Dios .
59002010	Ta chijala ta sunil ley chicoyije , yaja' ta ay hunuxa chejbanile mach chicoyije , chijaco comul yin̈ sunil ley haca' tu' .
59002011	Yuto ha'tic'a Comam Dios halni : " Mach chexixli , mach chexpotx'wipaxo camo anma , " ẍi Comam . Yuxin ta ay mac mach chiec' ixloj , yaja' ta chispotx' camo yet anmahil , chiyaco ismul tet ley haca' tu' .
59002012	Yuxin nann̈e heyu yin̈ tzet cheyala' , yeb yin̈ tzet chewatx'e , yuto yilal yixtan̈witi yu hune' ley yet Comam Jesucristo . Hune' ley xacon̈bejtzonico yin̈ cowatx'en tzet choche Comam Dios .
59002013	Ta mach chitz'ay coc'ul yin̈ jet anmahil , mach chitz'aypaxo isc'ul Comam jin̈ yin̈ hune' tz'ayic yet chiyilni Comam Dios yin̈ tzet chielico anma . Yaj tato chitz'ay coc'ul yin̈ jet anmahil , chitz'aypaxo isc'ul Comam jin̈ .
59002014	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , tzet chaliloj ta ay mac ayco yanma yin̈ Comam yalni , yaj ta machi nich'ano isc'ulal tzet chiswatx'e , ¿ tom xin chicolchahi yu ayxa yanma yin̈ Comam yalni ? ¡ Machoj !
59002015	K'inalo ta ay hunu juẍtaj maca hunu janab machi xil isk'ap , maca matzet chislo ,
59002016	cat heyalni tet : " Chawil haba , c'ul chawute hak'uxni haba , wa'an yin̈ caw c'ul , " ta quexchi . Matzet xin cheyak'paxo tet , ¿ tzettaxca chalilo hune' tu' ?
59002017	Yuxin ta ayex cheyala ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam , machi xin chewatx'e isc'ulal , nabn̈e cheyala ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios . Ha' xin chalniloj ta camomex yul sat Comam .
59002018	K'inalo ta ay hunu mac chihalni : " Ayco wanmahan yin̈ Comam . " Haxa hunxa mac xin chalpaxoj : " Isc'ulaln̈e chinwatx'e'an . " Chiwalan teyet , mach ayoco Comam Dios yipo heyanma ta mach chewatx'e isc'ulal . Wal xin chinyehan teyet ta ayco Comam Dios yipo wanmahan yu chinwatx'ehan isc'ulal .
59002019	Hex ti' , cheyayto yul heyanma tato hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios . Caw c'ul hune' tu' , yaj maẍn̈etaj hune' tu' yilal yehi . Hacpax tu' ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil , yohta ebnaj tato hune'n̈ech'an Comam Dios . Caw xin chiluyluncan̈ ebnaj xiwquilal yet chisnaniti ebnaj Comam .
59002020	¡ Tzet hesucal ! Cheyala ta ayco heyanma yin̈ Comam , machi xin chebeybaln̈e tzet choche Comam . Ha' xin chalniloj ta machi heyanma yin̈ Comam .
59002021	Naweti yin̈ jichmam Abraham ; isyije icham yinito isc'ahol yin̈ xahanbalil . Yu tzet iswatx'e icham tu' , yuxin occano icham c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios .
59002022	Hac tu' xin chu johtan̈eniloj ta yaco yanma icham Abraham yin̈ Comam Dios , yuto isyije icham tzet ak'lax iswatx'e , hac tu' xin yu isyenicanilo isba ta ayco yanma icham yin̈ Comam Dios .
59002023	Hac tu' yu yijni isba yin̈ tzet halbilcano yul Yum Comam Dios bay chala : " Caw yaco yanma icham Abraham yin̈ tzet yal Comam Dios , yu hune' tu' xin cancano icham c'ulal yul sat Comam , " ẍicanoj . Yuxin yacanico Comam icham Abraham tu' yamigohoj .
59002024	Yuxin nachaojabilo heyu tato chon̈cancano c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu tzet chicowatx'e , maẍn̈etaj yu janico janma yin̈ .
59002025	Hac tu' yupaxo hune' ix ix tx'oj ye iswi' , Rahab isbi . Cancano ix c'ulal yul sat Comam Dios yu yak' ix bay way ebnaj ischejab Comam , yeb xin nanxa behal bay ischejto ix ebnaj yun̈e mach chitzabcha ebnaj .
59002026	Haca' hunu nimanile matxa yanma ayictoj , camomxa , hac tu' ye hunu mac chihalni ta ayco yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , mach chisyijepaxo tzet chal Comam , naban̈e hune' tu' .
59003001	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , mach comono cheyocheco heyoc cuywawomal , yuto heyohtaj ta han̈on̈ chon̈cuywahi caw ec'balto chiilax yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e .
59003002	Cosunil ayto niẍtexa cotx'ojal yin̈ tzet chicowatx'e , yaja' ta ay mac mach ch'aycay yin̈ istzoteli , ha' hune' mac tu' caw c'ul , yuto chupaxo isk'oji iscachni sunil isnimanil yin̈ej istx'ojal .
59003003	Chijacto ch'en freno yul isti' no' cheh yun̈e isyijen no' tzet chijoche . Hac tu' xin sunil isnimanil no' chito bay chal coc'ul .
59003004	Hactic'apax tu' te' barco caw nimej te' yaj waxan̈ca chul tin̈na jak'ek' yin̈ te' yaj han̈ech'an nich'an tim'on chisbak'o naj piloto ha' bay chisyije te' , cat isto te' bay chal isc'ul naj .
59003005	Hac tu' ye nich'an jak' ti' , caw nich'anch'an yaj caw can̈ye sic'lebil , haca' hunu nich'an tz'it k'a' chu isn̈usnilo huno niman k'eptalaj .
59003006	Hac tu' ye jak' ti' , lahan yeb k'a k'a' , mach isbi hanta istx'ojal ayco yin̈ ; yetbi conimanil yehi yuxin sunil conimanil chu yetaxto yu . Hune' k'a k'a' tu' , haca'tic'a yul hune' niman k'a' mach istan̈bal chitit isk'ak'al , hac tu' xin chu yetaxcanto sunil cobeybal .
59003007	Han̈on̈ anma hon̈ ti' chon̈k'oji cocuyni sunilej no' xol telajil nok' ; no' ch'ic , no' laba yebej no nok' ay xol ha' mar .
59003008	Yaja' wal jak' ti' xin , mach chon̈k'oji cocuyni . Lahan yeb huno istx'ojal mach chak' cacha' isba , lahan haca' veneno chon̈ak'ni camoj .
59003009	Ha'tic'a jak' ti' xin , chalni c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios Mame , ha'tic'a xin chihalni tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ jet anmahil watx'ebil yu Comam Dios . Ha' anma tu' xin , yechel Comam yehi .
59003010	Yul coti' ch'elti tzoti' c'ul , yultic'apaxo coti' , ch'elpaxti tzoti' tx'oj . Wal xin wuẍtaj , wanab , mach cheyute heba haca' tu' .
59003011	Haca' hunu isnuk' ha ha' tinan̈ , mach chiahilo ha ha' chi' yeb xin ha ha' c'ah .
59003012	Hacpax tu' hunu yoj te' higo , mach chu yak'ni te' sat te' aceituna , yeb hunu yoj te' uva mach chu yak'ni te' sat te' higo . Hac tu' ye isnuk' hunu ha ha' , mach chu yahilo ha ha' chi' yeb xin ha' c'achi' .
59003013	Ta ay hunu mac texol caw ay isnabal yeb xin caw ay ishelanil , isyebabilo yin̈ isc'ulal chiswatx'e , yik'abayo isba yu hune' ishelanil tu' .
59003014	Yaj ta ayn̈etic'aco chichonc'ulal caw c'ah yul heyanma , yeb xin chewatx'e istx'ojal yin̈ heyet anmahil , cat xin heyalnipaxo heba c'ulal , wal xin caw lek'ti' hex .
59003015	Matxa taj tet Comam Dios chitit hune' yitz'atil wi'e tu' , to yetxa sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi , yetxa anma ye hune' yitz'atil hewi' tu' , yin̈ naj matzwalil chitita .
59003016	Ta aytoco chichonc'ulal jin̈ , yeb xin ta han̈on̈n̈e chijoche ch'oc cowinajil , ta hac tu' mach lan̈ano cobelwi yin̈ istxolal , caw xin ayto sunil istx'ojal jin̈ .
59003017	Ta tet Comam Dios chitit cohelanil , matxa chon̈ec' yin̈ istx'ojal , wal xin chon̈ec' yin̈ ak'anc'ulal . C'ulch'an chijute coc'ul , cat istz'ay coc'ul yin̈ jet anmahil , lahanpaxo jet anmahil yul cosat , yeb xin ist'in̈aniln̈etic'a chijala .
59003018	Ta ak'anc'ulal chicowatx'e , chicochah ispaj , ha' ton istoholal .
59004001	¿ Bay chititico nimeta howal yeb xin niẍte howal texol ? Wal xin yu huntek'an istx'ojal chimunla yul heyanma yuxin cheyak'le howal .
59004002	Hex ti' tzijxan̈e tzet ye tu' cheyochecoj , yaj mach chexk'oji yin̈ , yu hune' tu' xin chiec' yul hewi' hepotx'wahi , yeb xin chichiwaco hec'ul yin̈ mac ay tzet aya . Yu mach chu yoc heyetoj , yuxin ch'ah howal texol . Wal xin mach ch'ak'lax teyet tzet cheyoche tu' yu mach chek'an tet Comam Dios .
59004003	Waxan̈ca chek'ana , yaj mach ch'ak'lax teyet yuto mach c'ulo chu hek'anni , yuto yu heyetanto yin̈ istx'ojal cheyoche .
59004004	Hex ti' , caw mach yijemojex , yuto caw cheyocheto heyoc hewatx'en tzet ye tu' tx'oj ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yu hune' tu' xin , chexoccano howal yin̈ Comam Dios .
59004005	Tajca ch'ec' yin̈ henabal tato machi nich'ano tzet yelapno ye Istzoti' Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Hum , bay chala : " Ha' Comam Dios an̈ecanico Comam Esp'iritu Santo jin̈ , Comam Esp'iritu tu' xahan ayon̈ yu , yuxin choche Comam ta han̈e Comam chicoxahann̈e , " ẍiayoj .
59004006	Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam , yuxin chicolwa Comam jin̈ . Chalnipaxo yul Yum Comam haca' ti' : " Chitit ishowal Comam yin̈ anma caw lek'ti' chute isba . Walpaxo mac chiyo isba xin , caw chitzala Comam Dios yin̈ , " ẍiayoj .
59004007	Yuxin yijemojab chijute coba tet Comam Dios , cat copahnito naj matzwalil , hac tu' xin ch'elcan̈ naj jet .
59004008	Hitzojon̈weco isc'atan̈ Comam Dios , haxinwal chihitzico Comam coc'atan̈ . Hex mulum , tacojab hec'ul teyin̈ yu istx'ojal chewatx'e , yuto caw yilal hesajn̈en heyanma yul sat Comam Dios . Haca' hex chito heyocheto yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , cat hexahann̈enpaxo Comam heyalni .
59004009	Ocojab bisc'ulal yin̈ heyanma , tacojab hec'ul yet chenanitij . Ok'an̈we sic'lebil yu hemul hex caw xaquextzebi yu heyochen istx'ojal . Ocan̈we yin̈ ok'il hex caw chextzala sic'lebil yin̈ tzet chak' hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , meltzan̈weco yin̈ bisc'ulal .
59004010	Iweyo heba tet Comam Dios , hac tu' xin chexilaxcan̈ yu Comam .
59004011	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , mach cheyalle hek'umal hunujex , yuto ta ay mac chihalni isk'umal yuẍtaj maca yanab , lan̈an yalni isk'umal chejbanile yet Comam Dios . Maca ta cheyala ta mach c'ulo yeco hunu heyuẍtaj maca heyanab , lan̈an heyalni tato chejbanile yet Comam mach c'uloj . Hac tu' xin lan̈an heyanico heba juezal yin̈ chejbanile yet Comam tu' , mach xin lan̈ano heyijeni .
59004012	Ha' hune' mac ak'n̈e chejbanile tu' , ha'tic'a xin ayco juezal . Ha' xin chu yak'ni colbanile yeb xin chu con̈yanico yin̈ isya'tajil . Wal hunujon̈ xin machi yu joc jilno tzet chielico hunu juẍtaj maca janab , yuto han̈c'an̈e Comam Dios chu yilni tzet chielicoj .
59004013	Abewecanojex cheyal haca' ti' : " Yet hecal maca yet cabe chon̈to munil yul hune' niman con̈ob yin̈ hunu habil . Ha' bey tu' xin chijaco hunu niman cotxon̈ , hac tu' xin caw niman comelyu chicocutxba , " quexchi .
59004014	Yaja' mach heyohta tzet heyeco yet hecal maca cabe . Sak'al heyalni , yaja' cocawil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , lahan yeb niẍte moyan , ton̈e chisye isba hunep cat isc'aycan̈ .
59004015	Ha' hune' wal heyalni : " Ta chiel yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios Jahawil , ayn̈etic'a cocawil , chicowatx'e hune' ti' maca hune'xa tu' , " ha' hune' tu' wal heyalni .
59004016	Yaja' hex ti' , mach haco tu' heyalni , to ha' hune' cheyala : " Chicowatx'e hune' ti' , cat cowatx'en hune'xa tu' , " quexchi yul heyet hechuquil . Ha' xin chalniloj ta mach cheyiyo heba tet Comam Dios . Caw xin tx'oj hune' tu' yul sat Comam .
59004017	Ta johtaj ta c'ul cowatx'en hunu tzet ye tu' , tzujan tu' xin mach chicowatx'epaxoj , chijaco comul yul sat Comam Dios .
59005001	Hex k'alom hex ti' , abewecanoj . ¡ Ok'an̈we yin̈ caw ip teyin̈ yuto lan̈an yul istiempohal bay ch'ec'oya' heyanma !
59005002	Sunil hek'alomal lan̈an isk'atoj yeb xin xil hek'ap holquiẍtaxan̈e yu no' ih .
59005003	Sunil hemelyu tenbabilxato tu' xin , ayxa isk'uxewal ch'en , ha' chin̈uswaho teyin̈ yul sat Comam Dios cat quexistan̈tzeniloj , haca' istz'ato hunu tzet ye tu' yul k'a' . Ha' hek'alomal tenbabil heyu tu' , ha' ch'oco ak'oc'ule teyin̈ yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic .
59005004	Hanta istohol ebnaj hemunlawom mach heyak' yin̈ hemunil . Ha' hune' tu' xin chitit istz'acti'al teyiban̈ , yuto xayabe Comam Dios yel yaw ebnaj munlawom tu' , Comam yahawil yin̈ ebnaj 'angel ay satcan̈ .
59005005	Hex k'alomex ti' , caw xaheyak' yoche heyanma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yin̈ sunil tzet cheyoche , yuxin caw bak'ichexxa . Haca' no' wacax caw bak'ich , lan̈anxa yapni istiempohal ispotx'laxi .
59005006	Hex k'alomex ti' checawxeco ismul anma yiban̈ , huntek'an isc'ulaln̈e chiswatx'e . Cheyak'nipaxo camo ebnaj yu mach chu iscolni isba ebnaj teyet .
59005007	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , niman cheyute hec'ul masanto yet chul Comam Jesucristo , haca' chu hunu naj munlawom niman isc'ul naj yechman yoc ha' n̈ab . Nimanpaxo chute isc'ul naj yechman yelilo sat istz'unub .
59005008	Hacojab tu' cheyute , nimanojab cheyute hec'ul . Lin̈bawe heba yin̈ Comam , yuto toxa chul Comam .
59005009	Wuẍtaj , wanab , mach chexoc ak'oc'ule teyin̈ hununex , haxinwal yet ch'apni istz'ayical yillaxi tzet chexelicoj , mach hemul ch'ilcha yu Comam . Yuto ha' Comam alcal yecoj , cawilxa yeti Comam .
59005010	Wuẍtaj , wanab ha' ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios halni Istzoti' Comam yet payat techa yu ebnaj yijlen isya'tajil , caw aypaxo isnimanil isc'ul ebnaj ; yuxin techahojab heyu haca' yak'le ebnaj tu' .
59005011	Ha' mac ay isnimanil isc'ul istecha isya'tajil yu , caw sak'al yet yul cosatan̈ . Hex ti' xaheyabe yin̈ tzet yu istecha isya'tajil yu naj Job , heyabenpaxoj tzet yu iscolwa Comam Dios yin̈ naj yet tzujanxa , yuto caw c'ul Comam Dios yeb xin chitz'ay isc'ul Comam yin̈ anma .
59005012	Wal xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , ay hune' caw yilal yehi , ta ay tzet choche hec'ul cheyala mach cheyak' binaho satcan̈ maca tx'o tx'otx' maca hunuxa tzet ye tu' yak'ni isba yin̈ tzet cheyala . Hayet cheyalni ho' yelojab cheyala . Hayet cheyalni machoj , machojabi ; haxinwal mach chexyato Comam yin̈ isya'tajil .
59005013	Ta ay hunujex bisc'ulal heyehi , ocan̈we txahloj . Taca tzalahilal heye xin , bitn̈ewe Comam Dios .
59005014	Ta ay mac ya'ay , yawtehab ebnaj anciano yet iglesia . Haxa ebnaj anciano tu' xin , chitxahli yin̈ , cat ismasnico ebnaj aceite yin̈ mac ya'ay tu' yin̈ isbi Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
59005015	Hayet chextxahli yin̈ sunil heyanma xin , chicawxican̈ hune' mac ya'ay tu' . Ta ay ismul hune' mac ya'ay tu' xin , chak'cano nimanc'ulal Comam yin̈ .
59005016	Yuxin yilal heyallenati hemul teyet hununex , cat hetxahli yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab tet Comam , cat heyan̈chacanoj . Yuto ebnaj c'ul yul sat Comam Dios , hayet chitxahli ebnaj yin̈ sunil yanma , caw niman isyaxil ch'aycano yiban̈ yu Comam .
59005017	Haca' naj El'ias ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , anma naj haca' han̈on̈ ti' , yaja' yin̈ sunil yanma naj txahli naj tet Comam Dios yun̈e mach chak' ha' n̈ab . Yuxin mach yak' ha' n̈ab yicta iscan̈ habil .
59005018	Hato yet istxahlipaxo naj hunelxa yichipaxico yak'ni n̈ab . Hac tu' xin yak'ni sat tz'unub hunelxa .
59005019	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , ta ay hunu mac texol chisheq'uilo isba yin̈ Istzoti' Comam , aypaxo xin hunujex chexoc tzotelo tet yin̈ yet Comam , cat ismeltzoco yul isk'ab Comam hunelxa .
59005020	Ohtan̈ewecaniloj tato ha' hune' mac chinilo hunu naj mulum yin̈ istx'ojal bay aycoj , lan̈an iscolchalo hune' mac mulum tu' yul isk'ab camical . Hac tu' xin tx'i'alpaxo ismul hune' mac tu' chitan̈cano yul sat Comam Dios .
60001001	Hanin Pedro inti'an , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan . Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam pujanilto yul ismajul Ponto , yeb Galacia , yeb Capadocia , yeb Asia , yeb yul ismajul Bitinia .
60001002	Hex ti' sic'bilexxa yu Comam Dios Mame haca'tic'a yu istxumni Comam yet caw payat . Yu Yesp'iritu Comam , yuxin quexyacanico yetoj , yun̈e heyijen tzet chal Comam Jesucristo , cat hesajbicano yu isch'iquil Comam . Yak'ab Comam tx'i'al isc'ulch'anil isc'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal teyet .
60001003	Jalawe c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios , ismam Comam Jesucristo . Yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios jin̈ , yuxin yak' Comam hune' cok'inal caw ac'to ; ha' hune' tu' ayco yipo janma . Hune' ti' xatzujcha ju yuto itzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo xol camom yu yip Comam Dios .
60001004	Xayak' Comam Dios cok'inal yu cochahni tzet c'ubabil jet yu Comam yul satcan̈ . Hune' tu' , mach chi'etaxtoj , machi tz'il chihitzico yin̈ , yebpaxo xin maẍtic'a chitan̈iloj .
60001005	Yuto xajayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin chon̈isc'uba Comam yu yip yun̈e istzujcha apno cocolbanil t'in̈anxa ye yu Comam , hune' chiyelax yet ch'apni islahobal tz'ayic .
60001006	Yu hune' ti' , yuxin caw chon̈tzalahi , waxan̈ca yilal jec' yin̈ej isya'tajil hanic'oxa tiempohal .
60001007	Haca' ch'en oro , caw yilal chi'ilwelax ch'en xol k'a k'a' yun̈e yilchaloj ta caw c'ul ch'en maca ta mach c'ulo ch'en . Hacon̈pax tu' , caw yilal chon̈ilwelaxi , cat yilchaloj tato caw yeli ayco janma yin̈ Comam Dios maca mach xin . Hayet chitecha ilwebal ju xin yu ayco janma yin̈ Comam , ec'bal yelapno hune' tu' yul sat Comam Dios sata ch'en oro chiilwelax tu' , waxan̈ca xin chitan̈ilo ch'en . Yaj ta chitecha ilwebal ju , caw chitzala Comam Jesucristo jin̈ yet chihul Comam , cat yak'ni Comam issak'alil isc'ul jet , yeb caw ay yelapno chon̈elcanico yul sat .
60001008	Waxan̈ca matxa heyil Comam Jesucristo , yaja' xahan ay Comam heyu . Waxan̈ca mach lan̈ano heyilni , yaja' cheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam , yuxin caw chextzalacanoj . Ha' hune' hetzalahilal tu' , caw c'ulch'ancanoj , machi tzoti' chik'oji yalnilo isc'ulch'anil teyet .
60001009	Yuto xatzujcha apno hecolbanil heyu yu heyaco heyanma yin̈ Comam .
60001010	Ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios ec'lena yet payxa , tzotel ebnaj yin̈ hanta isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios chak' jet . Issayni ebnaj yin̈ nanc'ulal yin̈ caw tzet yelapno ye colbanile ti' .
60001011	Ha' Yesp'iritu Comam Cristo ayco yin̈ ebnaj , ha' ak'ni yohtan̈elo ebnaj yin̈ tzet chu yec'ya' yanma Comam Cristo , yeb xin isc'ulch'anil chihul yet chiyijni isba tu' . Ha' ebnaj tu' issay ebnaj yila' mac hune' chal Yesp'iritu tu' yeb yin̈ tzet tiempohal chu huntek'an tu' .
60001012	Yaja' yak' Comam Dios yohtan̈elo ebnaj tato ha' huntek'an cuybanil yal ebnaj tu' , mach yeto ebnaj yehi ; to jet ye han̈on̈ ti' . Tinan̈ xin , xaak'lax heyohtan̈elo yu ebnaj pujbanic'o Tzoti' yet colbanile yu ishelanil Comam Esp'iritu Santo alaxti yul satcan̈ . ¡ Ha' huntek'an tu' xin , caw yoche ebnaj 'angel yila' !
60001013	Yuxin helanojab cheyute heba , txumwe yin̈ tzet chewatx'e , cawxojab hec'ul yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios chak' jet yet chul Comam Jesucristo hunelxa .
60001014	Hex ti' , yuninalxa Comam Dios heyehi caw yijemex tet Comam yuxin matxa chexec' yin̈ heyochento tzettaj tx'oj hewatx'e yet yalan̈tocanoj , yet maẍto cheyohtan̈elo Comam Dios .
60001015	Wal xin ec'an̈we yin̈ isc'ulal , machojab nino istx'ojal chewatx'e , yuto Comam Dios quexawten̈eni , caw machi nich'ano istx'ojal yin̈ Comam .
60001016	Yuto chal Comam yul Yum haca' ti' : " Ec'an̈we yin̈ isc'ulal , machojab nino istx'ojal teyin̈ yuto haninti'an machi nich'ano intx'ojal win̈an , " ẍi Comam .
60001017	Ha' Comam Dios tu' , chi'ilni tzet chielico hunun anma hatatic'a tzet chiswatx'e . Caw lahan chi'ilchati anma yu Comam , machi hunu ti' cheba'to Comam ismul . Yuxin tato chijal Comam Dios Comamoj , ayojab yelapno Comam yul cosat yulbal ayon̈toc'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
60001018	Comam Dios xacon̈iscolilo yin̈ hune' cobeybal matzet chaliloj , hune' cochah tet comam comi' . Johtaj ta cocolbanil mach lok'bilo yu tzet chitan̈iloj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' haca' ch'en oro yeb ch'en plata .
60001019	Wal xin ha' ischiq'uil Comam Jesucristo caw niman yelapnoj , ha' k'oji islok'ni cocolbanil . Ak'lax camo Comam yu yoc xahanbalil , haca' hunu no' me' machi nich'ano isya'bil , machipaxo istzaca'il .
60001020	Nabilxatic'a hune' ti' yin̈ Comam yet maẍto chiwatx'i hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu Comam Dios . Yaj wal tinan̈ xin xaisyecan̈ isba Comam Jesucristo yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic ti' yu yak'lax isc'ulal jet .
60001021	Yu Comam Jesucristo , yuxin xajaco janma yin̈ Comam Dios . Ha' Comam Dios ak'ni itzitzbocan̈ Comam Jesucristo xol anma camom , yak'ni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tet . Yu Comam Jes'us tu' , yuxin chijaco janma yin̈ Comam Dios , cat xin iscawxipaxo coc'ul yin̈ Comam .
60001022	Wal tinan̈ xin yu xacoyije hune' cuybanil caw yel chala , yuxin sajxa ye janma yu Comam Dios . Hac tu' xin xahan chijil ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab , yuxin caw yilal coxahann̈en coba yin̈ sunil janma yeb xin yin̈ sunil jip .
60001023	Yuto pitzc'anajon̈xa yet iscayel yaj mach yin̈o comam comi' cambehal yehi , wal xin yu Istzoti' Comam Dios pitzc'anajon̈xa . Yuto ha' Istzoti' Comam caw itzitz , ayn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
60001024	Yuto chiyal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : Sunil anma lahan haca' te' telaj , haxa iscan̈il ye xin , lahan haca' isxumaquil te' telaj tu' , chitajilo te' cat ishowayo isxumaquil te' .
60001025	Yaj wal Istzoti' Comam Dios Jahawil , ayn̈etic'ac'o yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , ẍiayoj . Ha' ton xin hune' ti' Tzoti' c'ul yet colbanile halbilxa jabe' .
60002001	Yuxin awecano sunil istx'ojal ; sunil etal , yeb xin lek'ti'al , yeb ischiwa hec'ul , yeb hehobnican̈ tzoti' .
60002002	Ta caw yeli xaheyohtan̈elo sic'lebil ta c'ul Comam Dios jin̈ , haca'ojab yochen huno nich'an nene' yim ismi' , hacojab tu' heyochen hune' cuybanile yet Comam Dios mach sombiloj , hac tu' xin cheyik' heyip yin̈ hecolbanil .
60002003	
60002004	Hitzojon̈weco isc'atan̈ Comam Jesucristo , caw itzitz Comam . Comam Cristo tu' lahan haca' hunu ch'en ch'en caw niman yelapnoj ayayto xe'o n̈a . Yaja' xin k'ojbilcanilo ch'en yu ebnaj watx'emcan̈ n̈a , yaj wal xin Comam Dios sic'nicanicoj yeb caw niman yelapno ye yul sat .
60002005	Wal xin itzitz Comam Cristo , yuxin itzitzon̈paxoj yin̈ Comam , xin jak'a'we hamanil tet Comam Dios cohunico yin̈ Comam Cristo yatutoj , yeb xin con̈yapaxico Comam sacerdotehal , yetxa Comam jehi . Yu Comam Jesucristo yuxin chu jak'ni coba xahanbalil tet Comam yet chicoyijen tzet chala . Ha' hune' tu' , caw c'ul yul sat Comam Dios .
60002006	Yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : Yul con̈ob Si'on wacojan hune' mac haca' ch'en ch'en ch'ayto xe'o yipo n̈a . Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en tu' sic'bililo ch'en wuhan , caw niman yelapno ye ch'en . Ha' mac chaco yanma yin̈ hune' mac tu' , mach chican yin̈ tx'ixwilal , ẍiayoj .
60002007	Han̈on̈ chijayto yul janma yin̈ Comam Cristo , caw niman yelapno ye Comam yul cosat , yaj wal mac mach chiyaco yanma yin̈ Comam , ha' yin̈ huntek'an tu' tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam bay chal haca' ti' : Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en k'ojbilcanilo yin̈ ismunil yu ebnaj watx'em n̈a , ha' ch'en caw c'ul yoc xe'o n̈a , ẍiayoj .
60002008	Chalpaxo yul Yum Comam haca' ti' : Ha' hune' ch'en ch'en ti' , ha' bay chitxak'mo anma cat yayc'ayi , ẍiayoj . Chitxak'mo anma yuto machi isyije tzet chal Istzoti' Comam Dios ; halbilcanoj xin tato hac tu' chiyu anma tu' .
60002009	Walon̈ ti' iscon̈obxa Comam jehi sic'bilon̈xalo yu Comam , sacerdoteon̈ yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios Jahawil , hune' niman con̈ob nanxa yehiloj yu Comam . Sic'bilon̈xa yu Comam yu joc yeto Comam yun̈e joc copujbanic'o isc'ulch'anil Comam . Xacon̈yilo Comam Dios xol k'ejholo , con̈yanico xol hune' issajilk'inal caw c'ulcanoj .
60002010	Yet payat mach iscon̈obo Comam Dios heyehi , yaj wal tinan̈ iscon̈obxa Comam heyehi . Yet payat tu' , machi mac chitz'ay isc'ul teyin̈ , yaja' tinan̈ chitz'ay isc'ul Comam Dios teyin̈ .
60002011	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuti'an , han̈on̈ ti' mach cocon̈obo hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ton̈e chon̈eq'ui ; yuxin chintak'ecantojan teyet , mach chebeybaln̈e huntek'an tzet chiyoche henimanil , yuto ha' huntek'an istx'ojal tu' chiyak'le howal yeb janma .
60002012	C'ulojab cheyute hebeybal xol anma maẍto ohtan̈eo Comam Dios , waxan̈ca xin chexhallax tx'ojal tinan̈ haca'tan̈e caw ay hemul , yaja' yu isc'ulal cheye , yuxin chal ebnaj c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios yet chi'ilchati sunil anma yin̈ hune' tz'ayic yet chul Comam .
60002013	Yun̈e mach chiel ispixan Comam Dios heyu yijemojab cheyute heba tet ebnaj ayicto yul capil , hactic'apax tu' tet naj jahaw , yuto ec'na aycan̈ yip ismunil naj .
60002014	Cat heyijenpaxo tzet chal ebnaj yahaw ak'bil ismunil yu naj yanico anma yin̈ isya'tajil yet chiyanico ismul , cat yalni ebnaj c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ mac c'ul tzet chiswatx'e .
60002015	Choche Comam Dios ta caw c'ul cheyute hebeybal , ha' xin wal matzet tz'aj yala' anma tx'oj isnabal teyin̈ yeb anma ayco yin̈ issucal .
