60002016	Ec'an̈we yin̈ isc'ulal yuto colbilexxa . Yaja' matolo yu xahechah hecolbanil tu' yuxin chexoc hewatx'e' istx'ojal , ¡ machoj ! To ischejabxa Comam Dios heyehi .
60002017	Xiwan̈we tet Comam Dios , cat xin hexahann̈enpaxo anma ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam . Ayojab yelapno ye heyet anmahil yul hesat , yebpaxo naj jahaw , ayojab yelapno ye naj yul hesat .
60002018	Hex chejab heyehi , ayojab yelapno heyahaw yul hesat , yijewe tzet chiyal ebnaj . Yaj maẍn̈etaj tet ebnaj c'ul isnabal , yeb ebnaj caw c'ul isc'ul , wal xin yijewepaxo tet ebnaj ton̈e chichichon yanma .
60002019	Yuxin ta yu ayco conabal yin̈ Comam Dios , yuxin ton̈e chon̈etalaxi , machi xin comul , yaj ta chitecha ju , caw chitzala Comam Dios jin̈ .
60002020	Yaja' ta yu hunu istx'ojal chiju yuxin chon̈oc yin̈ isya'tajil cat xin jak'ni techahoj , caw matzet chaliloj yuto comultic'a yehi . Yaj ta yu hunu isc'ulal chicowatx'e , cat yak'lax isya'tajil jila' , cat jak'ni techahoj , wal hune' tu' caw niman tzet chalilo yul sat Comam Dios .
60002021	Yu hune' tu' yuxin con̈yawte Comam . Hayet yec'ya' yanma Comam Cristo ju , isyenicano Comam yin̈ tzet chu cobeybaln̈eni .
60002022	Machi nino ismul Comam yacoj , machipaxo lek'ti'al yala .
60002023	Hayet isbuchlax Comam , machi ispajtze . Hayet yalaxico Comam yin̈ isya'tajil yu ebnaj , machi yalpaxo Comam howalil . Ha' hune' yute Comam , ton̈e yaben̈eto isba yul isk'ab Comam Dios , yuto yohta Comam tato ha' Comam Dios ch'ilni tzet ch'elico yin̈ istoholal .
60002024	Ha' Comam Jesucristo ijnicanocan̈ comul yin̈ isnimanil yet iscam yin̈ te' culus . Hac tu' xin matxa chu yak'ni cabo isba istx'ojal jin̈ , yuto camnajon̈xalo yin̈ mule , hac tu' utebilon̈cano yu Comam , yuxin chu cowatx'enico cobeybal yin̈ istoholal . Caw yabe Comam isya'tajil yin̈ isnimanil ju yun̈e cocolcha yul isk'ab hune' yabil ayco yin̈ janma , ha' ton comul .
60002025	Hayet yalan̈to tu' , lahanex haca' no' me' c'aynatoj , wal tinan̈ xin xaquexmeltzoco yul isk'ab Comam Cristo , yuxin haxa Comam chextan̈eni yeb xin ha' ch'ilni heyanma .
60003001	Hacpax tu' ex ixale hex ti' , yijem cheyute heba tet heyichamil , haxinwal ta ayex ti' maẍto chaco yanma heyichamil yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios , chistxum isba ebnaj heyu , mach yechto tx'i'al tzet cheyal tet ebnaj .
60003002	Yuto chiyil ebnaj tato caw tohol hebeybal , yeb ta caw yijemex .
60003003	C'ulojab cheyute heba , maẍtaj hetzanten heba yin̈ lolo'al haca' hemamen xil hewi' yin̈ caw nanxa islowi , maca heyanico heyanma yin̈ ch'en ome maca ch'en uwe caw aycan̈ istohol haca' ch'en oro , yebpaxo yin̈ xilk'ape caw aycan̈ istohol , yuto maẍtaj huntek'an tu' cheẍwatx'enico yul sat Comam Dios .
60003004	Wal xin ha'ojab isc'ulch'anil heyanma ha' cheyil hewatx'e' , haxinwal caw c'ulch'anex yul sat Comam Dios . Ha' hune' hec'ulch'anil tu' , ha' ton isc'ulal hec'ul yeb ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma , ha' hune' tu' machi bak'inal chietaxtoj , caw ay yelapno ye yul sat Comam Dios .
60003005	Hacpax tu' huntek'an ebix ix yet Comam Dios yet payat , caw c'ulch'an yanma ebix yul sat Comam Dios yuto han̈ech'an Comam yaco ebix yipo yanma , yeb xin caw yijem yute isba ebix tet yichamil .
60003006	Haca' ix Sara , caw yijem yute isba ix tet naj Abraham . Yalni ix yin̈ naj haca' ti' : " Mam , " ẍi ix yin̈ naj . Yuxin c'ul cheyute henabal hex ixale hex ti' . Machojab hunu tzet ye tu' bay chexxiwi . Ta chewatx'e haca' tu' lahan henabal haca' ix Sara .
60003007	Haquexpax tu' hex ichamile hex ti' , c'ul cheyute heyanma yin̈ heyixal . Ohtan̈eweloj ta lahan ebix haca' hunu vaso nab ispohi . Ayojab yelapno ye ebix yul hesat yuto lahan cok'inal chicochah tet Comam yeb ebix . Yuxin c'ul cheyute heba yin̈ ebix yun̈e matzet ch'oc hexolbal yet chexoc txahlo tet Comam .
60003008	Yebpaxo xin chiwaltojan hunxa ti' teyet , hunxan̈ehojab cheyute henabal hesunil . C'ulch'anojab cheyute hec'ul , xahanojab cheyil heba hununex yuto heyuẍtaxa heba , heyanabxapaxo ebix ix yin̈ Comam . Tz'ayojab hec'ul teyin̈ hununex , chewchotan̈e cheyute heba .
60003009	Mach chepajtze tx'oj tet mac tx'oj chiswatx'e teyin̈ . Machica chexpohli yin̈ mac chipohli teyin̈ , ha' heyet c'ulch'an cheyute heyak'ni ispaj tet anma , yuto awtebilexxa yu Comam yu hechahni isc'ulch'anil isc'ul .
60003010	Yuto chal yul Yum Comam haca' ti' : Tato ay mac choche isxahann̈e hune' iscawil , yeb ta choche tzalahilaln̈etic'a ch'ec' hunun tz'ayic yila' , caw yilal iscachni isti' , machojab chal tzoti' tx'oj yeb xin lek'ti'al .
60003011	Caw yilal ispohnilo isba xol istx'ojal , c'ulojab tzet chiswatx'e , issaya'bilo ak'anc'ulal ha'ojabn̈etic'a xin chiswatx'e .
60003012	Yuto Comam Dios Jahawil , chitan̈en mac caw c'ul isbeybal , cat xin yabenpaxo Comam istxah . Walpaxo anma machiswalil chiyute isba xin , chiscaj Comam , ẍiayoj .
60003013	Ta han̈e isc'ulal chesaya , cat hebelwi yin̈ caw c'ul , ¿ mactic'a chiutenico istx'ojal teyin̈ ? Machi maca .
60003014	Yaj tato cheyabe isya'tajil yu isc'ulal chebeybaln̈e ¡ caw sak'al heyet ! yuxin mach chexxiw tet hunuxa mac anmahil . Mach cheyak' cabconocan̈ heyanma .
60003015	Wal xin ak'awe tzalaho heyanma yin̈ Comam Cristo Jahawil . Ayojab yelapno Comam yul hesat . Helan cheyute heba hetak'wi tet mac chik'amben teyet yin̈ cuybanile bay ayco heyanma . Chewchotan̈eojab chu heyalni tet anma tu' yeb yin̈ ak'anc'ulal .
60003016	Yuxin c'ul cheyute heba , hac tu' xin ak'anc'ulaln̈etic'a ye henabal , haxinwal macta tx'oj istzotel teyin̈ yu isc'ulal chewatx'e yu ayexxaco yin̈ Comam Cristo , chitx'ixwican̈ yin̈ lek'ti'al chal teyin̈ .
60003017	Caw c'ul ta yu cowatx'en isc'ulal yuxin chiec'ya' janma yaj ta hac tu' ch'el yin̈ yanma Comam Dios , sata ta chec'ya' janma yu cowatx'en istx'ojal , nabn̈e hune' tu' .
60003018	Yuto hac tu' yu iscam Comam Cristo istohlan comul yin̈ huneln̈e . Caw c'ul Comam yaj ec'ya' yanma ju han̈on̈ mulumon̈ ti' yu con̈yinito Comam tet Comam Dios . Ha' isnimanil Comam cami , yaja' yanma Comam machi cami .
60003019	Hayet camom Comam tu' , beyc'o yanma Comam yala' Istzoti' Comam Dios tet anma camom majan xol isya'tajil .
60003020	Ha' huntek'an anma tu' , man̈c'on tzet yal Comam Dios yet payxa yulbal istiempohal yet iswatx'en naj No'e te' barco . Yet hune' tiempohal tu' caw niman yute isc'ul Comam yin̈ anma yet yechman iswatx'i te' barco tu' , yaj xin waxajwan̈n̈e anma colchalo xol ha ha' yul te' barco .
60003021	Ha' hune' ha ha' tu' yecheln̈e ik'bil yu ha' tato chon̈colchahi . Ha' yelapno ye hun tu' , chon̈colchahi , maẍtaj yu yel istz'ilal conimanil yu ha' , to hayet chiahcano ha' cowi' chicoyeniloj tato c'ulxa conabal sata Comam yuto xaitzitzbican̈ Comam Jesucristo .
60003022	To Comam yul satcan̈ , tinan̈ ayco Comam yin̈ iswatx'k'ab Comam Dios . Ha' Comam xin ch'ijban ebnaj 'angel yeb xin huntek'anxa ay ismunil caw ay yelapno ye bey satcan̈ tu' .
60004001	Yuxin haca' yu yaben Comam Cristo isya'tajil yin̈ isnimanil yet iscami , hac tu' xin chu jaben isya'tajil , yuto xacon̈cam yinta Comam han̈on̈ ti' ; ha' ebnaj camnaxa , matxa chaco ismul ebnaj .
60004002	Hacojab tu' chijute coba , coyijewe tzet choche Comam Dios yulbal yet ayon̈ yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Matxaojab chicowatx'e haca' tzet chiyoche conimanil .
60004003	Hayet yalan̈to , niman tiempo quexec' hewatx'e' tzet chiswatx'e anma mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios . Wal xin canojab huntek'an tu' tinan̈ yuto yet yalan̈to tu' , han̈ech'an istx'ojal chewatx'e , cheyak'ni yub tzet yoche heyanma , chexec'paxo yin̈ uc'u te' , cheyec'tzen nimeta k'in̈ nanxa islowi , caw niman uq'ue cheyuc'canoj . Cheyinipaxayo heba tetej tioẍ yahbil yu Comam Dios .
60004004	Ha' ebnaj mach ohtan̈eho Comam Dios tu' , chic'ay isc'ul ebnaj yuto matxa chebeybaln̈e huntek'an istx'ojal chiswatx'e ebnaj , yuxin chibuchwa ebnaj teyin̈ .
60004005	Yaj wal huntek'an anma tu' , yilal istak'wican̈ yin̈ ismul yet chiilchati yu Comam ak'bilxa ismunil yilni tzet ch'elico mac itzitz yeb mac camnaxa .
60004006	Wal xin hallax istzoti'al colbanile tet anma camnaxa tu' . Waxan̈ca xacam anma tu' haca' iscam anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yet yilchati yu Comam Dios , yaja' yet yaben anma tu' hune' colbanile , ischahnicano anma tu' isk'inal haca'tic'a isk'inal Comam Dios .
60004007	Lan̈anxa yul istiempohal bay chitan̈ilo sunil tzet ye tu' , yuxin helanojab cheyute heba , itz'atn̈eojab henani hetxahli .
60004008	Yeb xin ay hunxa caw yilal yehi , ha' hexahann̈en heba yin̈ sunil heyanma , yuto yet xahan chijil coba chiconahuln̈eto tx'i'al ismul jet anmahil .
60004009	Hayet ch'apni hunu juẍtaj maca hunu janab isk'ana' bay chiwayi , sunilojab heyanma chechahni , yaja' machojab chexoctzotelo yin̈ .
60004010	Ak'we cheja' heba teyet hununex hatatic'a tzet munilal ak'bilxa teyet yu Comam Dios . C'ul cheyute heba yin̈ hemunil ak'bilxa teyet yuto nananta hemunil ak'lax yu Comam .
60004011	Ha' mac chalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios xol anma , yilalojab ha' caw ist'in̈anil Istzoti' Comam chiyala , yeb xin ha' mac chak' cheja' isba texol , iswatx'eojab yin̈ sunil yip ak'bil yu Comam . Hac tu' xin chihallax c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios heyu yu tzet iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo . ¡ Hallaxojabi ta caw niman yelapno ye Comam Jesucristo ! Han̈e Comam yet ay yalaxico ismay yeb yip yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Acojab tu' !
60004012	Wuẍtaj wanab hex xahan ay wuhan , mach chic'ay hec'ul yu huntek'an isya'tajil xahul teyiban̈ , tajcato chena tato machi bay wal istitico huntek'an tu' .
60004013	Wal xin , caw tzalahan̈wej , yuto ha' hunex cheyabe isya'tajil haca' yak'le Comam Cristo . Yuxin hayet chul Comam xol isk'ak'al yip , caw chiyik'canocan̈ yip tzalahilal yul heyanma .
60004014	Ta chibuchwa anma teyin̈ yuto ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Cristo , caw c'ul heyet , yuto Yesp'iritu Comam Dios caw niman yelapno ayxaco teyin̈ . Ha' anma tu' , chal tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam , wal hexpaxo xin cheyal c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam .
60004015	Ta ayex ch'ec'ya' heyanma , yaja' tan̈e mach yuho huno potx'wal , maca xin yu elek' , macato yu hunu mule caw tx'oj , maca yu heyanico heba xol huno tzet ye tu' mach cheyoc yin̈ ;
60004016	wal ta cheyil isya'tajil yu ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Cristo , mach chextx'ixwi . Halwe c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios yuto yetxa Cristo heyehi .
60004017	Yuto xaichico istiempohal bay chiillax tzet chielico sunil anma , yaja' to jin̈ han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios chiichico babel , yuxin ta jin̈ chiichicoj , ¿ tzettaxca xin ch'elpaxico anma mach chiyijen Istzoti' Comam yet colbanile ?
60004018	Han̈on̈ c'ulon̈xa yul sat Comam Dios ti' tx'i'al isya'tajil chul jiban̈ cat cocolchahi , hajxam anma caw machi yelapno Comam yul sat , yeb anma caw tx'oj isbeybal .
60004019	Yuxin hayet chihul isya'tajil jiban̈ , yaj ta hac tu' ch'el yin̈ isc'ul Comam Dios , caw yilal janico janma yin̈ Comam , machojab chicobej cowatx'en isc'ulal , yuto ha' Comam tu' watx'en̈ehon̈ , caw xin chiyij isba yin̈ tzet chiyala .
60005001	Tinan̈ xin chiwaltojan huntek'an chejbanile ti' teyet hex anciano hex xol ebnaj uẍtaje yul hunun con̈ob , yuto haninti'an anciano inpaxojan haca' hex tu' . Caw wilan yak'len Comam Cristo isya'tajil , yuxin ay wak'ni cabo inbahan inchahnihan isc'ulch'anil teyintaj , hune' chito isyebalo isba .
60005002	Haca' hunu naj tan̈em me' , hacojab tu' cheyute hetan̈en macta ak'bilxa yul hek'ab yuto haca' isme' Comam Dios yehi . Munlahan̈we yin̈ sunil heyanma , haca' choche isc'ul Comam Dios , machojab yin̈ lan̈bilal , yeb mach yun̈e ch'en melyu yuxin chexmunlahi . Munlahan̈we yin̈ tzalahilal , elojab yin̈ heyanma hewatx'eni .
60005003	Mach yahawo cheyute heba yin̈ macta chi'ak'lax hetan̈e . Wal xin yewe c'ulla beybale tet , haxinwal caw c'ul chutepaxo isbeybal .
60005004	Hac tu' xin hayet chihul Comam iswi'ehal jin̈ han̈on̈ tan̈em anma hon̈ ti' , cat cochahni ispaj hune' caw nanxa yoc isc'ulch'anil , hune' tu' machi bak'inal chilahwi .
60005005	Haquex pax tu' hex tzehtaj , yijem cheyute heba tet ebnaj anciano . Chewchotan̈eojab cheyute heba yet chexcolwa teyin̈ hununex , yuto chal yul Yum Comam Dios haca' ti' : Chispahto Comam macta nime winaj chute isba , walpaxo mac chiyo isba xin , chak' Comam isc'ulch'anil isc'ul tet , ẍiayoj .
60005006	Wal xin iweyo heba yalan̈ yip Comam Dios , hac tu' xin chexyican̈ Comam yet ch'apni istiempohal .
60005007	Sunil hebisc'ulal ch'oc yachno yin̈ heyanma , aweco yul isk'ab Comam yuto Comam ayn̈etic'aco yin̈ isc'ul con̈yilni .
60005008	Caw helan cheyute heba , majwahan̈wej yuto ha' naj matzwalil , naj ayco ishowal jin̈ , lahan naj haca' hunu no' balam caw ch'el yaw yet ch'ec' saywal yin̈ no' me' yu chisc'uxaytoj .
60005009	Pahweto naj , lin̈bawe heba yin̈ Comam . Heyohtaj tato ha' ebnaj heyuẍta yin̈ Comam pujanto sunil yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , lahan yilni ebnaj isya'tajil haca' hex tu' .
60005010	Yaja' hayet chilahwi jaben isya'tajil hanic' tiempohal ti' , caw tz'ajan chon̈elcanico yu Comam Dios , cat xin yak'ni Comam jip yeb colin̈ban coba , yeb caw t'in̈an chon̈yute Comam awten̈eon̈ yetbihoj ; yak'nicano isc'ulal isc'ul jet yin̈ huneln̈e , yuto hunxa je yeb Comam Jesucristo .
60005011	Hallaxojabi ta caw niman yelapno isbi Comam Dios yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
60005012	Hune' incartahan chiwatojan teyet ti' , ha' juẍta Silvano chiinitoj . Naj juẍta ti' caw yijem naj sic'lebil yul insatan . Hayeb tzoti' chiwaltoti'an ha' chexibtzeni , yeb xin chiwaltojan teyet tato xahechah isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios . Lin̈bawe heba yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam .
60005013	Yeb ebnaj juẍta ay yul ismajul Babilonia sic'bilxalo yu Comam Dios , haca' yu quexissic'niloj , chisk'ambepaxo ebnaj hanic' heye yin̈ hecawil . Yebpaxo naj Marcos , naj inc'aholan yin̈ isbi Comam , chisk'ambepaxo naj hanic' heye yin̈ hecawil .
60005014	K'ambewe hanic' heye hununex yuto heyuẍtaxa heba . Ayojab ak'anc'ulal yul heyanma hex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo . ¡ Acojab tu' !
61001001	Hanin Sim'on Pedro inti'an , ismunlawom Comam Jesucristo yeb xin ischejabpaxo Comam wehan . Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet , hex xaheyayto yul heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios haca' han̈on̈ti'an̈ . Ha' heyanma yin̈ Comam tu' caw c'ulch'ancanoj haca' janmahan̈ yin̈ Comam , yuto caw han̈c'an̈e istoholal chiswatx'e Comam Dios yeb Cocolomal Jesucristo .
61001002	Ak'laxojab tx'i'al isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios yeb ak'anc'ulal texol yuto heyohtaxa Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
61001003	Yu ishelanil yip Comam Dios , yuxin xayak' Comam sunil tzet chi'ocnico ju yun̈e ay cok'inal mach istan̈bal , yeb xin yu coyijen tzet chal Comam . Yak' Comam hune' tu' jet yet johtan̈en̈ Comam Jesucristo , Comam con̈awten yu ishelanil yeb yu isc'ulch'anil isye Comam jet .
61001004	Hac tu' xin yu yak'ni Comam hune' yalte jet , huntek'an tzet caw c'ulch'ancanoj yeb caw ay yelapno yehi . Yun̈e huntek'an tzet yalte Comam tu' , yuxin chicochah cok'inal yin̈ isk'inal Comam , hac tu' xin yu cocolchalo yul isk'ab isyahbetajil ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu istx'ojal yanma anma .
61001005	Yuxin maẍn̈eojabtaj janico janma yin̈ Comam , wal xin caw yilal janico yin̈ coc'ul cowatx'en cobeybal . Caw yilalpaxo coch'ib yin̈ ishelanil conabal yin̈ Comam Dios ,
61001006	yeb cocachni coba yin̈ tzet mach c'uloj , yeb niman chijute coc'ul jak'ni techaho isya'tajil , yeb coyijen tet Comam Dios .
61001007	Chicoye isc'ulch'anil coc'ul yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yeb ebix janab yeb xin coxahann̈en anma sunil .
61001008	Ta chiilchalo huntek'an ti' jin̈ , yeb ta lan̈an coch'ib yin̈ , ay chon̈ocnico yul sat Comam Dios chal tu' , mach nabn̈eho johtan̈elo Comam Jesucristo Jahawil .
61001009	Yaj wal mac mach chi'ilchalo huntek'an ti' yin̈ xin , lahan haca'tic'a mach chu ismujlito nahat , maca xin mach chu yilni . Xaisnahuln̈etoj tato tx'ahbilxalo hanta ismul ayco yin̈ yet yalan̈to tu' .
61001010	Yuxin wal tinan̈ wuẍtaj , wanab , xaquexyawte Comam Dios , yeb xaquexsiq'uilo Comam yetoj , yuxin lahweco helin̈ban heba yin̈ huntek'an ti' . Ta hac tu' chewatx'e , maẍtic'a chexayc'ayi .
61001011	Hac tu' xin ch'ak'lax sunil isc'ulch'anil Comam jet , cat joccano yin̈ huneln̈e yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , Cocolomalpaxoj .
61001012	Yuxin ayinn̈etic'acojan walnihan teyet yun̈e henaniti huntek'an cuybanile ti' , waxan̈ca caw yeli heyohtaj yeb xin lin̈anex yin̈ ist'in̈anil .
61001013	Yak' isba itzitz intohan , ha' hune' chintxuman tinan̈ , caw yilal quexwiptzencanojan yin̈ huntek'an cuybanile ti' , yun̈e mach chic'ayto heyu .
61001014	Yuto xayak' Comam Jesucristo Jahawil intxumulojan tato matxa nimano tiempo ayinic'ojan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
61001015	Yuxin chiwaco yin̈ inc'ulan intz'ibn̈encantojan huntek'an cuybanile ti' teyet , hac tu' xin chenati yin̈ sunilbal tiempo yetxa quinelan yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
61001016	Hune' cuybanile ak'bilxa teyet juhan̈ yin̈ tzet yelapno ye yip Comam Jesucristo , yeb xin yin̈ tzet chu yul Comam hunelxa , caw mach ic'ti'oj , mach ton̈e nabilcan̈ juhan̈ . Wal xin ha' caw han̈on̈an̈ jilan̈ yu isbak' cosatan̈ isk'ak'al yip Comam .
61001017	Jilan̈ yet yanico Comam Dios Mame ismay Comam Jesucristo , ishelni isba , yillax yin̈ Comam yet yelayti yaw xol moyan , yalni haca' ti' : " Ha' naj ti' Inc'aholan , caw xahan ay wuhan , caw chintzalahan yin̈ naj , " ẍi Comam .
61001018	Han̈-caw-on̈an̈ jabehan̈ huntek'an tzoti' ayilo yul satcan̈ tu' yet ayon̈an̈ yeb Comam Jes'us iswi' hune' witz caw txahul .
61001019	Ha' hune' tu' xin , caw cam ch'ak'ni ist'in̈anil Istzoti' Comam tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam yet payxa . Yuxin caw c'ul yuto cheyaco heyanma hecuyni huntek'an tzoti' tu' , yuto haca' hunu lampara sak'al ismujli xol k'ejholo masanto yet lan̈anxa issajbiloj yet ch'ahilo sajbes , hac tu' xin yehi . Ha' hune' tu' chimujli yin̈ heyanma masanto chisajbilo yet ch'ahilo tz'ayic . Ha' chal yelapno hune' tz'ayic tu' , ha' ton yet chul Comam Cristo .
61001020	Ha' ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yalan̈tocanoj istz'ibn̈encano ebnaj yul Yum Comam yin̈ huntek'an tzet caw yilal yuli . Yaj caw yilal johtan̈eniloj tato machi hunu mac chisje istxumni yul yet ischuquil yin̈ tzet chiyal yelapno huntek'an tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano tu' .
61001021	Yuto ha' ebnaj ischejab Comam tu' caw machi hunu tzet ye tu' isnati ebnaj yul yet ischuquil yet istz'ibn̈encanoj , wal xin ha' Comam Dios ak'ni yohtan̈elo ebnaj yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
61002001	Xol anma Israel ec'le ebnaj lek'ti'wom isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios , hactic'apax tu' texol hex ti' , ay ebnaj lek'ti' cuywawom . Ha' ebnaj tu' , niẍtejal quexiscuyni ebnaj yin̈ cuybanile maẍtaj ha' yecoj yun̈e yetaxto henabal yu cuybanil chak' ebnaj . Hac tu' chu ispaq'uico ebnaj isman̈c'on yin̈ tzet chal Comam , Comam coln̈ehon̈ yin̈ isya'tajil . Caw hac tu' xin yu yiniti ebnaj c'ayilal yiban̈ yin̈ an̈e .
61002002	Tzetc'a anma ch'oc tzujno yinta istx'ojal ebnaj tu' , hac tu' xin caw tx'oj tzoti' challax yin̈ cuybanile yet Comam , hune' caw isyelal .
61002003	Yu ayco yanma ebnaj yin̈ ch'en melyu , yuxin chexyak' subchaho ebnaj yu cuybanile maẍtaj ha' yehi . Wal xin payxa ichi yechmalax ebnaj yalaxcanto yin̈ isya'tajil , mach ch'ec'to yet istan̈tzelaxilo ebnaj .
61002004	Conabaweti yin̈ tzet elico ebnaj 'angel yaco ismul sata Comam Dios . Wal xin mach yak' nimanc'ulal Comam yin̈ ebnaj . Ha' hune' utelax ebnaj , k'ojlaxto ebnaj bey hune' yehobal xol k'ejholo bay alaxico cadena yin̈ masanto yet chi'apni istz'ayical yet chilni Comam tzet chielico ebnaj .
61002005	Mach chiyak'paxo Comam Dios nimanc'ulal yin̈ anma yet payxa yet yanayo Comam hune' niman yaxn̈ab yiban̈ sunil anma caw tx'oj yute isba . Han̈ech'an naj No'e colchahi yebpaxo hujwan̈ yetbi . Naj No'e tu' , yalic'o naj tet anma yet yalan̈to tato c'ul chute isba , cat iswatx'enpaxico isnabal .
61002006	Yebpaxo xin , yati Comam Dios isya'tajil yiban̈ anma ay bey Sodoma yeb anma ay bey Gomorra , isn̈usilo Comam cabeb con̈ob tu' yin̈ huneln̈e , caw tan̈xan̈e elcanico anma sunil . Cancano hune' tu' cuybanilehal tet anma machiswalil chute isba yin̈ tz'ujaniloxa .
61002007	Wal xin han̈ech'an naj Lot colchalo xol anma tu' , yuto ha' istoholal iswatx'e naj . Naj Lot tu' caw oc isya'il yin̈ yanma naj yilni istx'ojal huntek'an anma tu' .
61002008	Wal naj Lot tu' xin , caw c'ul isbeybal naj , yaja' hunun tz'ayic hac'n̈etic'a tu' yilni naj yeb xin yaben naj istx'ojal chiswatx'e anma tu' . Yuxin bisc'ulaln̈etic'a ye naj yu anma .
61002009	Hactic'apax tu' tinan̈ , yohta Comam Dios iscolni yin̈ ilwebal macta ayco yanma yin̈ Comam , wal mac mach c'ulo isnabal chialaxayo isya'tajil yiban̈ yet chihul istz'ayical yet chilni Comam tzet ch'elico anma .
61002010	Chayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ macta chisyijeto iswatx'en istx'ojal chiyoche isnimanil , yeb caw machi nich'ano yelapno Comam Dios Jahawil yul sat . Huntek'an ebnaj tu' caw lut'cano ebnaj , yeb caw can̈ye chute isba ebnaj . Machi nino chixiw ebnaj isbahwa yin̈ huntek'an caw ay yelapno ye ay satcan̈ .
61002011	Wal ebnaj 'angel waxan̈ca caw ec'na ay ishelanil , yeb xin caw ak'bil yip ebnaj yul isk'ab , yaja' yet ayco huntek'an mac ay ismul yin̈ sat Comam Dios Jahawil , mach mak'bilo yoc ebnaj isk'anni isya'tajil yiban̈ .
61002012	Huntek'an ebnaj lek'ti' tu' lahan ebnaj haca' no nok' , caw machi nino isnabal ebnaj , han̈ech'an tzet chiyoche isc'ul ebnaj , ha' chiswatx'e . Haca' no nok' haxan̈c'an̈e istzablaxayoj , cat yalaxico ch'en yin̈ cat iscami , hac tu' ye ebnaj . Ton̈etic'a chibuchwa ebnaj yin̈ huntek'an tzet ye tu' mach yohtajoj . Chitan̈tzelaxilo ebnaj haca' no nok' tu' yuto machiswalil chiyute isba ebnaj .
61002013	Ch'ec'oya' yanma ebnaj haca' chu yak'ni ec'o ebnaj ya' yanma hunuxa maca . Caw xin chitzala ebnaj chak'ni ebnaj tzet choche yanma . Hac tu' xin chu yinilo ebnaj hepixan , chiniti ebnaj tx'ixwilal texol yet chak'ni tzalaho yanma ebnaj yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e yet chehunban heba hewa'i .
61002014	Ya'xan̈e yilnito ebnaj ebix ix , cat yochenico ebnaj ebix . Caw maẍtic'a chitibayo yu ebnaj yanico ismul . Chak' subchaho ebnaj macta maẍto caw yip yin̈ yet Comam ; k'ayna ebnaj yochenico tzet ye tu' mach c'uloj . Caw xin tz'acti'n̈ebilxa ebnaj tu' .
61002015	C'aynato ebnaj yuto xaisheq'uilo isba ebnaj yul hune' beh caw tohol . Ha' isbeybal naj Balaam ik'bil yu ebnaj , hune' ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , isc'ahol icham Beor . Naj Balaam tu' yaco naj ismul yuto caw yocheco naj ch'en melyu haltelax tet , yaj yu iswatx'en naj istx'ojal .
61002016	Yaja' maylax naj yu hune' no' burro yu hune' istx'ojal iswatx'e naj tu' . Wal xin maẍtic'a bay chijabe istzotel hunu no nok' , yaj tzotelcan̈ no' tu' haca' anma . Ha' no' xin cachwahi yun̈e mach chiswatx'e naj hune' istx'ojal tu' .
61002017	Ha' huntek'an ebnaj cuywawom machiswalil chute isba tu' , lahan ebnaj haca' hunu c'uh machi ha' ayayto yul , yeb xin haca' moyan nanann̈e bay chi-caw-yilaxto yu jak'ek' , hac tu' ye ebnaj . Wal xin caw t'in̈anxa yeco yiban̈ ebnaj isto xol k'ejholo , ha' tu' xin chiec' ebnaj yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
61002018	Ch'oc ebnaj yala' tzoti' machi yelapno yehi . Chismontento ebnaj anma iswatx'en istx'ojal haca' yin̈ ixloj ; anma lan̈anto iscolchalo xol macta aytoco yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach t'in̈ano yehi .
61002019	Chal ebnaj tato chicolcha macta chioc tzujno yinta ebnaj , yaja' ha' hun ebnaj maẍto chicolchalo yul isk'ab istx'ojal , yuto aytoco ebnaj yak'ni cheja' isba yin̈ tzet ye tu' mach c'uluj . Yuto ha' mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal chejab yeco yin̈ istx'ojal tu' .
61002020	Yuto ha' mac xatic'a colcha tet istx'ojal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ohtabilxa Comam Jesucristo Jahawil yu , Comam Cocolomal , yaj ta tzujanxa ch'ayc'ayi , chicancano yul isk'ab istx'ojal tu' hunelxa ; hac tu' xin yelaxa , caw machiswalil chielico sata yet yalan̈tocanoj .
61002021	Ha' mac hac tu' , ec'balto c'ul mach yohtan̈elo hune' beh caw tohol , sata lahwi yohtan̈eniloj cat isbejnicano chejbanile yet Comam Dios ak'bilxa tet .
61002022	Ha' yin̈ ebnaj chij isba hune' tzoti' chal anma haca' ti' : " Metx tx'i' chilahwi isxabi metx , cat isto metx islonocan̈ isxaw hunelxa , " yeb hunxa ti' : " No' txitam , lahwi yaẍn̈elax no' , cat istopaxo no' yin̈ an̈e issomnoto isba xol tz'otz'ew hunelxa , " ẍi .
61003001	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuhan , ch'apni iscayel intz'ibn̈entojan incartahan teyet . Chinnatijan teyet , cat quexwiptzenan heyanico henabal yin̈ istoholal , haca' walnitojan yin̈ babel incartahan .
61003002	Naweti tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios yet payat , yeb chejbanile yal Comam Jesucristo Jahawil , Cocolomal , huntek'an ak'bilxacano teyet juhan̈ han̈on̈ ischejab Comam jeti'an̈ .
61003003	Caw yilal heyohtan̈enilo hune' ti' ; yin̈ islahobal tz'ayic caw ay anma ch'oc tzebo yin̈ baytet yet Comam Dios yehi . Ha' huntek'an anma tu' ch'ec'o yin̈ istx'ojal choche yanma ,
61003004	cat xin yoc anma tu' isk'ambeni : " ¿ Tzet tan̈cano hune' halbilcanoj tato chihul Comam Cristo hunelxa ? Wal xin xalecamto ebnaj jichmam , yaj hune'n̈etic'a ha' xin ye haca' yet iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , " ẍi ebnaj .
61003005	Yaj mach isje isc'ul ebnaj tu' istxumulo yin̈ tzet yu iswatx'en Comam Dios satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx' yu Istzoti' yet payat . Yu Istzoti' Comam tu' isyecan̈ isba tx'o tx'otx' xol ha ha' , yoccano hoyno ha' yin̈ tx'otx' .
61003006	Ha'tic'a ha ha' tu' xin , tan̈tzenilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yet yaniti Comam hune' niman yaxn̈ab yet payxa yin̈ istiempohal naj No'e .
61003007	Yaj wal satcan̈ yeb xin tx'o tx'otx' ay tinan̈ , yu Istzoti' Comam Dios lan̈an yechman isn̈uslaxto yu k'a k'a' . Yet chul tz'ayic yet chiillax tzet ch'elico anma , cat xin istan̈tzenilo Comam Dios anma machi yelapno Comam Dios yul sat , yin̈ huneln̈e .
61003008	Yuxin hex xahan ay wuti'an , tajca chito nahul hune' ti' heyu , yuto hune' tz'ayic lahan haca' hune' mil habil yul sat Comam Dios Jahawil , hune' mil habil tu' xin haca'n̈e hune' tz'ayic ye yul sat Comam .
61003009	Matolo ch'ec'to yet yijni isba yin̈ tzet haltebil yu Comam Dios haca' isnani hun majan anma tu' , ¡ machoj ! Wal xin niman isc'ul Comam yechmali yuto mach chisje isc'ul Comam ta ay mac chic'aycantoj ; yuxin chechma Comam ta ayto mac chisbejcano istx'ojal cat iscolchahi .
61003010	Yaj wal yet chul Comam Jesucristo Jahawil hunelxa xin , haca' chu yul hunu naj elk'om yet tona nahul ayon̈ , hac tu' chu yul lemna Comam yet hune' tz'ayic tu' . Caw ay yip isn̈irla yet chitan̈ilo satcan̈ yeb tzet ik'bil yu sat yiban̈k'inal chitan̈ilo yu k'a k'a' , yeb xin chitan̈paxilo tx'o tx'otx' yeb sunil tzet ay sat tx'otx' .
61003011	Yuxin tato hac tu' chu istan̈ilo sunil , ayxic'a jec' yin̈ isc'ulal tzet chal Comam , cat cam janico conabal yin̈ Comam .
61003012	Jechmawe yul hune' tz'ayic bay chul Comam tu' . Jak'aweco jip comunla yin̈ yet Comam , hac tu' xin chu yul Comam yin̈ an̈e . Ha' yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' chitan̈ilo satcan̈ yu k'a k'a' , yeb xin sunil tzet ay satcan̈ tu' chi'ulican̈ , cat istz'acantoj .
61003013	Yaja' han̈on̈ ti' , lan̈an jechman hune' ac' satcan̈ yeb hune'xa tx'o tx'otx' caw ac' haltebilcano yu Comam Dios . Ha' bey tu' xin , sunil xan̈e caw tohol yeb caw c'ul .
61003014	Yuxin hex xahan ay wuhan , yulbal ayexico heyechman huntek'an tzet ye tu' chihuli , aweco yin̈ hec'ul hewatx'en isc'ulal , haxinwal hayet chul Comam ayexico yin̈ ak'anc'ulal machi nino hemul yeb istx'ojal chilchalo teyin̈ .
61003015	Nachaojabilo heyu tato ayto isnimanc'ulal Comam Dios , yuxin maẍto chul Comam , hac tu' xin ay hamanil tet anma chaco isba yul isk'ab Comam . Chisje conaniti yin̈ juẍta Pablo , naj caw xahan ay ju , yuto hactic'apax tu' yu istz'ibn̈ento naj teyet yu ishelanil naj ak'lax yu Comam Dios .
61003016	Yul hunun iscarta naj hactic'a tu' yu istz'ibn̈ento naj teyet . Caw yeli , ay tzet ya'ta cotxumnilo yul iscarta naj , yuxin ha' anma mach isnabal yeb maẍto caw yip yanma yin̈ Comam , ha' ton xin chihec'ni tzet chal te' . Chishec'nipaxo ebnaj huntek'an tzet chal Yum Comam Dios . Yu hune' istx'ojal chiswatx'e ebnaj tu' , yuxin chic'ayc'anto ebnaj .
61003017	Yuxin hex xahan ay wuhan , yalan̈tocanoj cheyabencano huntek'an ti' , caw cheyil heba tajca chexhatxlaxto yu islek'ti'al ebnaj istx'ojaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e , cat heyinilo heba yin̈ ist'in̈anil bay ayexicoj .
61003018	Wal xin cam ohtan̈ewelo Comam Jesucristo , Cocolomal . Ipojab xin hech'ib yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam hunun tz'ayic . Yuxin caw nimanojab yelapno ye Comam Cocolomal yul hesat tinan̈ , yeb yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
62001001	Chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet yun̈e heyohtan̈en tzet caw yelapno ye Comam Tzoti' chiak'ni cok'inal . Comam ayxatic'a yet maẍto hunu tzet ye tu' chiwatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Wal xin han̈-caw-on̈an̈ jabehan̈ tzet caw yal Comam tu' , jilnipaxicojan̈ yin̈ Comam . Nahatil jil cobahan̈ yeb Comam , cotzabnipaxojan̈ Comam . Comam chiak'ni k'inale ti' isye isba jetan̈ , yuxin chijaco cobahan̈ jalnilojan̈ . Tinan̈ xin chijalan̈ teyet ta ha' Comam chiak'ni cok'inal mach istan̈bal . Isc'atan̈ Comam Dios ay Comam , yaj xin hulic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' isyeni isba jet .
62001002	
62001003	Yuxin Comam jiltu'an̈ yeb jabehan̈ tzet yala , ha' chijaltojan̈ teyet yun̈e heyoc jetbihojan̈ , hac tu' xin hunxan̈e chijucano yin̈ Comam Dios Mame .
62001004	Yuxin chicotz'ibn̈etojan̈ huntek'an tzoti' ti' teyet yun̈e caw tz'ajan chiyucanico tzalahilal yin̈ janma .
62001005	Wal tinan̈ xin , chijaltojan̈ teyet yin̈ cuybanile yalcano Comam Jesucristo jetan̈ . Yal Comam Jes'us tato Comam Dios caw issajilk'inal yehi , machi nich'ano k'ejholo yin̈ .
62001006	Tato chijala ta hunxa je yeb Comam Dios , yaj tato chito cowatx'e istx'ojal , chaliloj tato ayon̈toco xol k'ejholo , yuxin yin̈ haca' tu' caw lek'ti'on̈ , mach c'ulo cobeybal .
62001007	Comam Dios issajilk'inal yehi , yuxinto yin̈ issajilk'inal Comam Dios tu' chon̈belwi , caw jetbixa coba hununon̈ . Ha' xin ischiq'uil Comam Jes'us , Isc'ahol Comam Dios , ha' chon̈sajn̈en yin̈ sunil comul .
62001008	Tato chijala tato machi comul , han̈-caw-on̈ chijak' subchaho coba cochuquil , mach xin ayon̈ico yin̈ isyelal .
62001009	Tato chijalati comul tet Comam Dios , chiyak'cano tan̈o Comam comul jiban̈ . Sunil comachiswalilal chiyicanilo Comam jin̈ , yuto istoholal chiswatx'e Comam , yeb xin sunil tzet chal Comam masan chij isba .
62001010	Tato chijala ta machi comul chijacoj , lan̈an jalni ta lek'ti' Comam Dios , caw machi Istzoti' Comam yin̈ janma haca' tu' .
62002001	Walex caw xahan ay wuti'an , chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' teyet , yun̈e mach cheyaco hemul . Yaja' tato ay hunujon̈ chijaco comul , ay hune' mac chak' isba jin̈ tet Comam Dios . Hune' mac tu' , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo . Wal Comam tu' , caw istoholaln̈etic'a chiswatx'e Comam .
62002002	Ha' iscamical , ha' tohlancano sunilal comul . Maẍn̈etaj xin comul han̈on̈ ti' istohlacanto Comam , to ha' hun ismul sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
62002003	Ta chicoyije cuybanile ak'bilcano yu Comam Dios , chal yelapnoj hune' tu' ta xajohtan̈elo Comam .
62002004	Yaj tato chijala ta caw johtaxa Comam Dios , yaj ta mach chicoyije cuybanile ak'bilcano jet yu Comam , caw lek'ti'on̈ chal tu' , hac tu' xin caw mach c'ulo jehicoj .
62002005	Wal tato caw chicoyije tzet chal Comam tu' xin , caw yeli chijoche Comam Dios . Hac tu' xin chiyu johtan̈eniloj tato caw hunxa je yeb Comam .
62002006	Ta chijala tato caw hunxa je yeb Comam Dios , caw yilal cobeybaln̈en haca' tzet iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo yet yec' Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
62002007	Wuẍtaj , wanab , hune' chejbanile chiwaltojan teyet ti' , caw mach ac'to heyabeni . Caw xatic'a hallax heyabe' yettaxtic'a heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Caw xin heyohtaxa hune' chejbanile ti' , hune' chihalni tato caw yilal coxahann̈en coba hununon̈ .
62002008	Walca xin payxa ak'bilcano hune' chejbanile ti' , yaj haca' hunu caw ac'to chiwute walnitojan teyet , yuto ha' Comam Jesucristo hul watx'enocano yin̈ caw ist'in̈anil . Lan̈anpaxo xin isyenilo isba hune' cuybanile ti' texol , yuxin haxa hune' issajilk'inal , ha'xa chimujli yin̈ heyanma , hac tu' xin chu yelcano k'ejholo teyin̈ .
62002009	Tato chijala ta caw ayxaco issajilk'inal Comam Dios yin̈ janma , yaj ta chito chiwa coc'ul yin̈ hunu juẍtaj maca janab , caw aytoco k'ejholo yin̈ janma .
62002010	Wal tato caw xahan chijil juẍtaj yeb janab , caw ayxaco issajilk'inal yul janma , matxa tzet chon̈ak'ni ayc'ayoj .
62002011	Yaja' ta chichiwa coc'ul jin̈ hununon̈ , chaliloj ta ayon̈toco xol k'ejholo , yeb ta lan̈an cobelwi xol k'ejholo tu' , mach johtajo bay caw cotocoj yuto k'ejholo tu' chiak'ni tan̈o comujlubal .
62002012	Hex xahan ay wuti'an , caw chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' teyet , yuto xa'el hemul teyiban̈ yu Comam Jesucristo .
62002013	Hex mame mi'e , caw chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' ti' teyet , yuto caw heyohtaxa hune' Comam ayxatic'a yet yalan̈tocano maẍto chiwatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Hac pax tu' xin hex tzehtaj , caw chintz'ibn̈epaxtojan hune' ti' teyet , yuto caw xaquexk'oji yin̈ naj matzwalil .
62002014	Walex ac'to hex yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios , caw chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' ti' teyet , yuto heyohtaxa Comam ay bey yul satcan̈ . Hex mame mi'e , chintz'ibn̈epaxtojan hune' ti' teyet , yuto caw heyohtaxatic'a Comam ayxatic'a yet yalan̈to maẍto chiwatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Hex tzehtaj , caw chintz'ibn̈epaxtojan hune' ti' teyet yuto caw ay heyip heyanico Istzoti' Comam Dios yin̈ heyanma . Yu hune' tu' xin , quexk'oji yin̈ naj matzwalil .
62002015	Wal xin mach cheyaco heyanma yin̈ hune' sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb sunil tzet ay sat . Tato cheyaco heyanma yin̈ tzet ay sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , mach ayoco heyanma yin̈ Comam Dios , chal tu' .
62002016	Yuto istx'ojal chiyak' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yettic'a yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi , maẍtaj yin̈ Comam Dios chitita . Ha' huntek'an ti' xin chiyalte yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' : istx'ojal tzet choche conimanil , ha' tzet chijila chijochecoj yaj mach chitzala Comam yin̈ , yebpaxo cololo'n̈en coba yin̈ tzettaj ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ; sunil ti' yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yehi .
62002017	Hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb sunil istx'ojal chak'a , chiapni istiempohal bay chitan̈iloj , yaj tato ha' tzet choche isc'ul Comam Dios chicowatx'e , wal tu' ay cok'inal mach istan̈bal .
62002018	Hex caw xahan ay wuti'an chiwalan teyet , caw ayon̈xaco yin̈ islahobal tiempo . Hex ti' xaheyabe ta chihul naj Anticristo , naj ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam Jesucristo . Yaja' tinan̈ xin tx'i'alxa ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam xaisyelo isba , yuxin chiconaloj tato caw yin̈ xaislahobal tiempo ayon̈ .
62002019	Caw coxol elna huntek'an ebnaj tu' , yaj yin̈ caw yeli mach jetbiho coba yeb ebnaj . K'inalo tato jetbi coba yeb ebnaj , caw machim ispohilo isba ebnaj coxol , caw jetbimi coba yeb ebnaj tinan̈ . Yaj caw ispohilo isba ebnaj coxol yun̈e isyenilo isba tato caw mach jetbiho coba yeb ebnaj .
62002020	Wal xin xayak' Comam Jesucristo Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet , yuxin caw cosunil johtaxa isyelal Comam Dios .
62002021	Caw chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' incartati'an teyet , maẍtaj yu mach heyohtajoj baytet caw isyelal Comam Dios , to caw heyohtaxa ; caw heyohtaxapaxoj tato machi hunu lek'ti'al chiilcha xol cuybanile caw t'in̈an yecoj .
62002022	Chiwalan teyet macta caw lek'ti'wom tu' , ha' ton mac chihalni tato Comam Jes'us mach Cristohoj . Ha' ton mac tu' ayco ishowal yin̈ Comam , yuto mach chiyayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , yeb yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam .
62002023	Ha' mac chihalni tato mach Isc'aholo Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo , caw mach ayayto Comam yul yanma . Walpaxo mac chihalni tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo , ha' hune' mac tu' yet Comam yehi .
62002024	Ha' hune' cuybanile ti' jabe yettax janico coba yul isk'ab Comam Dios , caw xin yilal wal yeco yul janma . Tato caw wal yeco hune' cuybanile tu' yul janma , wal tu' huneln̈e jeco yin̈ Comam Dios , yebpaxo yul isk'ab Isc'ahol .
62002025	Ha' hune' k'inal mach istan̈bal , ha' haltebilcano yu Comam Jesucristo tato chiyak' jet .
62002026	Caw chintz'ibn̈etojan huntek'an ti' teyet , yuto ay mac choche quexyak'a subchahoj .
62002027	Walex hex ti' , ak'bilxa Comam Esp'iritu Santo teyet yu Comam Jesucristo , yuxinto mach yechelto ay mac chexcuyni ; yuto ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo chexcuyni yin̈ sunil tzettaj ye tu' . Ha' xin cuybanile chak' Comam Esp'iritu Santo caw yeli , machi nino lek'ti'al ayco yin̈ . Yuxin caw huneln̈ehojab cheyutecanico heba yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , haca' chute yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo jet .
62002028	Tinan̈ xin hex caw xahan ay wuti'an , caw huneln̈ehojab jeco yin̈ Comam Jesucristo yun̈e mach chon̈xiw tet Comam yet chihul hunelxa yeb mach chon̈tx'ixwican̈ .
62002029	Wal xin johtaxa tato istoholaln̈etic'a tzet chiswatx'e Comam , yuxin tato caw yin̈ istoholal chon̈belwi , ha' chiyeniloj ta yuninal Comam jehi .
62003001	Wal xin txumweloj yin̈ ta mach isbi hanta caw isxahanil ayon̈ yu Comam Dios , yuxin chon̈yal Comam Dios yuninaloj , caw xin yeli con̈ yuninalon̈xa Comam . Wal anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , caw mach chik'oji istxumniloj tato yuninalxa Comam Dios jehi . Hacpax tu' yak'le Comam Jesucristo , maẍtic'a txumchalo yu anma tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam .
62003002	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , hex caw xahan ay wuti'an , caw yuninalxa Comam Dios jehi , yaj maẍto chisyelo isba sunil isc'ulal Comam chiyak' jet . Caw johtaj tato yet chihul Comam Jesucristo tu' , caw lahanxa chon̈elico yebi , yuto chijila' yin̈ Comam haca' caw yehi .
62003003	Sunilon̈ ayco hune' ti' yipo coc'ul chicosajn̈e janma yin̈ istx'ojal , haca' Comam Jesucristo caw machi nino istx'ojal yin̈ .
62003004	Ha' mac chaco ismul chisman̈c'o cuybanile yet Comam Dios , yuto yet chijanico comul , chicoman̈c'o cuybanile aycano jet yu Comam .
62003005	Johtaxa ta yu yinilo Comam Jesucristo mule , yuxin hulic'o Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , machi xin nino ismul Comam .
62003006	Yuxin han̈on̈ ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam matxa chicowatx'e istx'ojal . Wal mac chito watx'en istx'ojal , maẍto yohtajo Comam , maẍto chitxumchapaxo Comam yu .
62003007	Hex xahan ay wuti'an , mach cheyak' subchaho heba tet hunuxa maca . Tato ha' istoholal chicowatx'e , caw c'ulon̈paxo haca' Comam Jesucristo , yuto han̈c'an̈e caw istoholal iswatx'e Comam .
62003008	Wal mac chito watx'en istx'ojal , caw yet naj matzwalil yehi , yuto caw mulumtic'a naj matzwalil tu' yettax iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Wal Comam Jesucristo Isc'ahol Comam Dios , hulic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal yun̈e yetanto ismunil naj matzwalil tu' .
62003009	Han̈on̈ pitzc'anajon̈xa yin̈ Comam Dios , matxa chicowatx'e istx'ojal , yuto ayxa isk'inal Comam yul janma , matxa xin chicowatx'epaxo istx'ojal yuto yuninalxa Comam jehi .
62003010	Hac tu' xin , chiyu isyenilo isba mac yuninal Comam Dios , yeb xin mac yuninal naj matzwalil , yuto ha' mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal yeb xin mach xahano chil yet anmahil , caw mach yeto Comam Dios yehi .
62003011	Hune' cuybanile ti' heyabe yettax heyanico heba yul isk'ab Comam Dios tato yilal coxahann̈en coba hununon̈ .
62003012	Mach chijutewe coba haca' yute isba naj Ca'in , naj tu' yet naj matzwalil ye naj , yuto ismak' camo naj yuẍtaj . ¿ Tzet yin̈ ismak' camo naj yuẍta tu' ? Yuto caw isc'ulal iswatx'e yuẍta naj , wal naj Ca'in tu' machiswalil tzet iswatx'e naj .
62003013	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , mach cheyak' c'ayo hec'ul ta chichiwaco isc'ul anma yet sat yiban̈k'inal ti' teyin̈ .
62003014	Yet yalan̈to , ayon̈ico yul isk'ab camical mach istan̈bal . Wal tinan̈ xin , caw xa'ak'lax hune' cok'inal mach istan̈bal . Caw johta hune' tu' yuto caw xahan chijil coba hununon̈ . Tato mach xahano chijil coba hununon̈ , caw ayon̈toco yul isk'ab camical .
62003015	Tato chichiwa coc'ul jin̈ hununon̈ , caw lahan yeb mak'omon̈ . Walex hex ti' xin , caw heyohtaj ta mach hunu naj mak'om camo anma chischah isk'inal tet Comam Dios .
62003016	Johtaxa tzet chalilo coxahann̈en coba , yuto yak' camo isba Comam Jesucristo jin̈ ; hacon̈pax tu' hinanojabon̈ jak'ni camo coba yin̈ hunu juẍtaj .
62003017	Yaja' k'inalo ta ay hunu mac ay tzet aya , ton̈e xin chil yec' yuẍta yin̈ man̈tzetal , machi xin chicolwa yin̈ , chal yelapnoj tato caw machi isc'ulch'anil Comam Dios yul yanma .
62003018	Hex caw xahan ayex wuti'an , caw machn̈eojabtaj coti' chalni ta xahan chijil juẍtaj , caw yilal cocolwa yin̈ , hac tu' xin chiyu coyeniloj tato caw xahan chijil coba hununon̈ yin̈ caw isyelal .
62003019	Hac ton tu' xin , chiyu johtan̈eniloj tato caw yin̈ ist'in̈anil ayon̈icoj , yuxin matxa con̈xiw yin̈ sat Comam Dios . Wal xin ta chitzotel janma tato ay hunu istx'ojal ayco jin̈ , mach chon̈xiwi yuto ec'bal Comam cosataj , yohta Comam sunil tzet chiec' yul janma .
62003020	
62003021	Yaja' xin hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuti'an , tato caw ak'anc'ulal ye janma , ta caw machi cotx'ojal chijabe , caw mach chon̈xiw yul sat Comam Dios .
62003022	Hac tu' xin chak' Comam sunil tzet chicok'an tet , yuto chicoyije sunil ischejbanil Comam , yeb chicowatx'e tzet choche isc'ul .
62003023	Ha' chejbanile halbilcano jet yu Comam Dios , ha' janayto yul janma tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo , yeb xin coxahann̈en coba hununon̈ , haca' yute yalnicano Comam jet .
62003024	Tato chicoyije tzet chal Comam , caw ayxaco Comam jetbiho chal tu' , yeb ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam . Caw xin johtaj tato ayco Comam Dios jin̈ , yu Comam Esp'iritu Santo xayak' Comam jet .
62004001	Wuẍtaj wanab , tato ay ebnaj chiec' halnoj tato caw ischejab Comam Dios yehi , caw mach ton̈eo cheyayto tzet chal ebnaj tu' yul heyanma . Caw babel cheyabe istzotel ebnaj tato Istzoti' Comam Dios chal ebnaj , yuto caw tx'i'al ebnaj lek'ti'wom chalni tato ischejab Comam Dios yehi .
62004002	Hac ti' chu hetxumniloj tato ayco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈ ebnaj , ta chal ebnaj haca' ti' : " Caw anma yute isba Comam Jesucristo yet yulic'o Comam yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , " ta ẍi ebnaj , wal tu' ayco Yesp'iritu Comam yin̈ ebnaj .
62004003	Wal mac mach chihalni yin̈ Comam Jes'us haca' tu' xin , caw mach ayoco Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈ , ha' yesp'iritu naj chicajni Comam Jesucristo ayco yin̈ . Hune' esp'iritu tu' xaheyabe tato chihuli , mach yetto bak'in chihul hun tu' , wal xin ayxac'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' tinan̈ .
62004004	Hex xahan ay wuhan , caw yetxa Comam Dios je tinan̈ . Wal xin xacon̈k'oji yin̈ ebnaj lek'ti'wom tu' , yuto ec'na caw ay yip Comam ayayto yul janma satapaxo naj ayco yul yanma anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
62004005	Caw yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ye ebnaj , yuxinto han̈c'an̈e tzet ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw chiyalobtan̈e ebnaj . Wal anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , caw sak'al yabento tzet chal ebnaj .
62004006	Yaj walon̈ ti' xin , yetxa Comam Dios jehi , yuxin ha' mac ohtan̈enxa Comam Dios , ha' chiyabeto tzet chijala , wal anma mach yeto Comam Dios xin , caw mach chiyoche yabe' tzet chijala . Hac tu' xin , chiyu johtan̈enilo macta ayco isyelal Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈ , yeb xin mac ayco yesp'iritu naj yahawil lek'ti'al yin̈ .
62004007	Hex xahan ay wuti'an , xahanojab chijil coba hununon̈ yuto yin̈ Comam Dios chitit hune' coxahann̈en coba ti' . Tato caw xahan chijil coba hununon̈ , chal yelapnoj tato ayon̈xaco yuninalo Comam Dios , johtaxa Comam .
62004008	Yaja' tato mach xahano chijil coba , caw maẍto johtajo Comam Dios chal tu' , yuto wal Comam Dios caw xahan ay anma yu .
62004009	Isyelo Comam tato caw xahan ayon̈ yu , yuto yati hunpilan Isc'ahol yul say yiban̈k'inal ti' yun̈e yak'ni cok'inal mach istan̈bal .
62004010	Ha' xin chiyenilo tzet caw yu con̈yochen Comam Dios . Wal xin , caw maẍtajon̈ babel coyelo jochen Comam Dios , to ha' Comam con̈ochen babel , yuxin yati Comam Isc'ahol yak'ni isba yin̈ xahanbalil , yak'nicano tan̈o comul .
62004011	Hex wuẍtaj hex wanab , hex xahan ay wuti'an , yilal coxahann̈en coba hununon̈ , yuto hac tu' yu con̈isxahann̈en Comam .
62004012	Waxan̈ca maẍto hunu mac chi'ilni Comam tu' huneloj , yaja' tato xahan chijil coba hununon̈ , caw ayco Comam yul yanma . Hac tu' chu isyenilo isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios jin̈ yin̈ istoholal .
62004013	Hac tu' chu johtan̈eniloj ta ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios , yeb ta aypaxico Comam yul janma , yuto xayak' Comam Yesp'iritu jet .
62004014	Yuto han̈-caw-on̈an̈ jilan̈ yin̈ Isc'ahol Comam Dios , yuxinto chijalan̈ tato ha' Comam Dios an̈eti Isc'ahol iscolno anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
62004015	Macn̈etic'a chalni tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios ye Comam Jesucristo , ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios chal tu' , yeb ayxapaxico Comam yul yanma .
62004016	Hac tu' xin chu johtan̈eniloj cat janipaxayto yul janma ta caw chon̈yoche Comam Dios . Wal Comam Dios , caw chiyoche Comam anma , yuxinto ha' mac chixahann̈e yet anmahil , caw ayco Comam Dios yul yanma .
62004017	Hac tu' chu isch'ib coxahann̈en coba hununon̈ , yun̈e yet chiapni istz'ayical hune' isya'tajil chihuli , mach chon̈xiwcan̈ , yuto caw haca' ye Comam Jesucristo , hac tu' jehic'o yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
62004018	Hayet chijochen Comam Dios yin̈ caw ist'in̈anil , wal tu' machi bay chalti isba xiwquilal , yuto yet chon̈xiwi chon̈nanon tet isya'tajil . Yuxin ta ay mac chixiwi , mach xahano ay Comam Dios yu .
62004019	Walon̈ han̈on̈ ti' chijoche Comam Dios , yuto ha' Comam babel con̈ocheni .
62004020	Yaja' tato ay hunujon̈ chijal haca' ti' : " Wal haninti'an caw chiwochehan Comam Dios , " ta con̈chi , yaj caw caj chijilpaxo juẍtaj , yin̈ haca' tu' lek'ti'on̈ . Yuxin tato mach chicoxahann̈e hunu juẍta chijilico yin̈ , ¿ tzet xin chiyu jochen Comam Dios mach chijilico yin̈ ?
62004021	Comam Jesucristo ak'n̈ecano hune' cuybanile ti' jet : " Ha' mac chiochen Comam Dios , caw yilal isxahann̈enpaxo yuẍtaj , " ẍi Comam .
62005001	Mac chianayto yul yanma tato ha' Comam Jes'us , ha' Cristo Cocolomal , caw yuninal Comam Dios yehi . Tato chijoche Comam Dios chijochepaxo Isc'ahol Comam .
62005002	Hayet chijochen Comam Dios , cat xin coyijen tzet chala , caw johtaj tato caw chicoxahann̈e sunil yuninal Comam .
62005003	Tato chicoyije cuybanile aycano jet yu Comam , ha' chalniloj ta chijoche Comam . Sunil cuybanile yet Comam tu' mach ya'tajo coyijeni .
62005004	Yuxin sunil yuninal Comam Dios , chik'oji yin̈ sunil istx'ojal ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yuto yet chijanico janma yin̈ Comam Dios chon̈k'oji yin̈ istx'ojal ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
62005005	Ha' mac chianayto yul yanma tato ha' Comam Jesucristo caw Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi , chik'oji yin̈ sunil istx'ojal ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
62005006	Yet yulic'o Comam Jesucristo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ah ha' iswi' , yelpaxo ischiq'uil , ha' ton xin chiyeniloj tato Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi . Mach ton̈eho hulic'o yak'a' aho ha' iswi' , to elpaxo ischiq'uil yet iscami .
62005007	Ay ox majan chak' isba yin̈ ta ha' Comam Jesucristo caw Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi ; ha' Comam Esp'iritu Santo ay yiban̈ yet yah ha' iswi' Comam , istzotelayti Comam Dios yiban̈ , istzotelpaxo Comam Dios yet lan̈an iscam Comam yin̈ culus .
62005008	Haca'tic'a yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ Comam Jesucristo , hac tu' xin yu isyenipaxo ha ha' , yeb chic' .
62005009	Chijabeto yin̈ tzet chal comon anma , hajxam xin yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios , to caw ec'balto ay yelapno ye tzet chal Comam , wal xin ha' caw Comam Dios chitzotel yin̈ Isc'ahol .
62005010	Mac chianayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios , lan̈an yalni Comam Esp'iritu Santo yul yanma tato yel chal Comam yin̈ Isc'ahol . Wal mac mach chianayto yul yanma yin̈ Comam Dios xin , caw lek'ti' Comam yul sat , yuto mach chiyayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet chiyal Comam Dios yin̈ Isc'ahol .
62005011	Hune' tzet chal Comam Dios , ha' ton cok'inal mach istan̈bal chak' Comam ; caw xin yin̈n̈e Isc'ahol Comam ay hune' k'inale tu' .
62005012	Yuxin ha' mac xaischah Isc'ahol Comam Dios yul yanma , caw ay hune' isk'inal mach chitan̈i . Yaj wal mac machi Isc'ahol Comam yul yanma xin , machi hune' isk'inal tu' .
62005013	Hex chahbilxa Isc'ahol Comam heyu , chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet yun̈e heyohtan̈eniloj tato ay hek'inal mach istan̈bal .
62005014	Yuxin chicawxi inc'ulan yin̈ Comam Dios , yuto johtaj ta chicok'an hunu tzet ye tu' tet Comam haca' tzet choche isc'ul Comam , caw chabe Comam tzet chicok'ana .
62005015	Yuxin ta caw johtaj tato caw chabe Comam Dios tzet chijala yet chon̈txahli tet Comam , caw johtapaxoj tato chiyak' Comam tzet chicok'ana .
62005016	Tato chijila ta ay hunu juẍta ayco yin̈ mule , yaj mule mach chon̈yito yin̈ camical mach istan̈bal , cok'anawe isc'ulal isc'ul Comam Dios yin̈ naj , cat xin yak'ni Comam iscawil naj . Wal xin ay hune'xa mule chon̈inito yul isk'ab hune' camical mach istan̈bal . Tato yin̈ hune' mule tu' bay ayco juẍtaj maca janab , caw chiwalan teyet mach chek'an isc'ulal Comam Dios yiban̈ , mach chiwalan teyet ta chextxahli yin̈ .
62005017	Sunil ismachiswalilal ha' ton mule , yaj ay mule mach chon̈inito yin̈ camical .
62005018	Caw johtaj ta macta yuninalxa Comam Dios yehi , matxa chaco ismul , yuto haxa Isc'ahol Comam Dios chitan̈eni . Yuxin caw matxa chu yoc naj matzwalil yetanoj .
62005019	Caw johtaj ta yeton̈xa Comam Dios . Wal anma yet yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , caw ayayo yalan̈ yip naj matzwalil .
62005020	Caw johtapaxoj tato xahulic'o Isc'ahol Comam Dios , ha' Comam ak'n̈e conabal johtan̈enilo Comam Dios yin̈ caw isyelal . Yuxinto hunxa je yin̈ Comam caw yel chala , ha' ton Comam Jesucristo , Isc'ahol Comam Dios yehi , ha' Comam Dios yin̈ caw isyelal , ha' Comam chiak'ni cok'inal mach istan̈bal .
62005021	Hex xahan ay wuti'an , caw nann̈e heyu , mach chexoc tzujno yinta tioẍ yeb sunil huntek'an bay chiay jahno anma . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
63001001	Hanin icham winaj inti'an , chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' tawet wanab , hach saybilxa yu Comam Dios , yeb tetej hawuninal . Yin̈ caw yeli caw xahan ayex wuhan , yaj maẍn̈etajinan to ha' hunpaxo ebnaj juẍtaj , yeb ebix janab caw xaohtan̈en cuybanile caw yeli .
63001002	Caw xahan ayex wuhan , yu hune' caw isyelal ayco yin̈ janma . Ayc'o coc'atan̈ hune' isyelal ti' sunilbal tiempo .
63001003	Ha'ojab Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo , Isc'ahol Comam Dios chianayo isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ , cat istz'ay isc'ul teyin̈ , cat yak'nipaxo ak'anc'ulal teyet yin̈ isyelal , cat quexisxahann̈en Comam .
63001004	Caw tzalacan̈ inc'ulan yet wilnihan haywan̈ hawunin caw yijem yin̈ cuybanile caw yel chala , haca' yute yak'nicano Comam Dios jet .
63001005	Wal tinan̈ xin , caw chiwalan teyet tato caw yilal xahan chijil coba hununon̈ . Hune' chejbanile chiwak'an teyet ti' , caw mach babelto heyabeni , caw hataxtic'a yet joc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , hatax tu' yichi jabeni .
63001006	Tato chicoyije chejbanile chal Comam Dios , chaliloj ta caw chijoche tzet chal Comam . Hune' chejbanile xajabe yettax joc yul isk'ab Comam Dios , ha' ton coxahann̈en coba hununon̈ .
63001007	Wal tinan̈ xin , caw tx'i'alxa ebnaj lek'ti'wom chiec' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Chilan xin yalni ebnaj ta mach hulic'o Comam Jesucristo yin̈ anmahil yin̈ caw isyelal . Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' chiak'ni subchaho anma . Caw xin ayco ishowal ebnaj yin̈ Comam .
63001008	Caw nann̈e heyu xin , tajca caw nabn̈e cheyu yin̈ hemunil yin̈ yet Comam . Wal xin caw tz'ajanojab chu hechahni ispaj selel hemunil tet Comam Dios .
63001009	Macn̈etic'a chipalc'oncan̈ yiban̈ cuybanile aycano jet yu Comam Jesucristo cat isbejnicanoj , chalilo chal tu' ta machi Comam Dios yul yanma . Wal taca tzujan yinta cuybanile ak'bilcano yu Comam xin , wal tu' caw ayayto Comam Dios yeb Isc'ahol Comam yul yanma .
63001010	Tato ay hunu mac chiapni tec'atan̈ , nan xin cuybanile ik'bil yu , mach chechah yul heyatut , yeb xin mach chek'ambe hanic' ye isc'ul .
63001011	Tato chexoc hek'ambe' hanic' ye isc'ul , chalilo chal tu' ta ha' hunex yin̈ hune' istx'ojal chiswatx'e tu' .
63001012	Caw hantan̈e tzet chiwochehan chiwaltojan teyet , yaj mach chiwochehan chintz'ibn̈etojan yin̈ hum ti' , yuto toxan̈e chiwechmahan intohan quexintuclenojan cat xin cotzoteli , hac tu' caw chitz'ajna tzalahilal yul janma .
63001013	Ha' ej yuninal hanoh ay bey ti' , sic'bililo yu Comam Dios , chik'ambeni hanic' hawe bey tu' . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
64001001	Hanin icham winaj inti'an , chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' tawet , wuẍta Gayo , yin̈ caw yeli xahan ayach wuhan .
64001002	Wuẍtaj , caw chink'anan tet Comam Dios tato caw haca' isc'ulal hawehico yin̈ tzettaj ye tu' yet Comam Dios , hac tu' xin isc'ulal chi'ec'paxo hawu . Chink'annipaxojan ta caw hachn̈etic'apaxoj .
64001003	Caw quintzalahan yet wabenan yalni huntek'an ebnaj juẍta hulic'oj tato caw yijem ach yin̈ isc'ulal Comam , yebpaxo xin tzujan ach yin̈ isyelal .
64001004	Caw ec'na chitzalacano wanmahan yet chiwabenan tato caw yijem wuninalan .
64001005	Wuẍtaj , caw c'uln̈e hayijen munil yin̈ hacolwa yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj , hacpax tu' xin yin̈ ebnaj juẍta nan con̈obal chi'ec' tac'atan̈ .
64001006	Yet cutxanon̈icojan̈ bey ti' yin̈ culto , yalni ebnaj hulico tu' tzet isxahanil ay ebnaj hawu . Wal tinan̈ xin , caw chiwalan tawet ta chalahico hacolwa yin̈ ebnaj yet chito ebnaj yin̈ isbel , haca' choche isc'ul Comam Dios ha' chawatx'e .
64001007	Ebnaj juẍta tu' , ha' Istzoti' Comam Jes'us chi'ec' ebnaj yala'c'oj yuxin mach chu isk'anni ebnaj colwal tet anma maẍto ayoco yul isk'ab Comam .
64001008	Walxinto caw yilal cocolwa yin̈ ebnaj . Tato chon̈colwa yin̈ ebnaj , hacojtam caw ha' hunon̈ lan̈an comunla yinta ebnaj yet chi'ec' ebnaj cuywal tu' .
64001009	Wuẍtaj , xatic'a watojan hune' wuman teyet maquex ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios bey tu' . Yaj wal naj Di'otrefes xin , caw chaco isba naj iswi'ehalo yalni . Waxan̈ca hanta tzet chiwaltojan yul hum , yaj caw machi yelapno ye yul sat naj yin̈ tzet chiwaltojan .
64001010	Yuxin hayet chinapnihan bey tu' , caw chiwalicojan istx'ojal naj yin̈ sat , yuto caw chi'ec' naj yalac'o cok'umalan̈ teyet bey tu' , yeb lek'ti'al chal naj jin̈an̈ . Maẍn̈etaj tu' , to caw mach chischahpaxo naj ebnaj jetbihan̈ chi'apni bey tu' , yaj tato ay ebnaj juẍta bey tu' chichahni ebnaj xin , caw chicachwa naj yin̈ , cat xin yinilo naj ebnaj texol .
64001011	Hach wuẍtaj caw xahan ayach wuhan , mach chawute haba haca' chute isba anma caw machiswalil chiswatx'e . Hachcachan haca' chute isba ebnaj juẍta caw c'ul isbeybal , hac tu' chawute haba . Yuto ta han̈c'an̈e isc'ulal chiswatx'e hunu mac , ha' chalniloj tato yetxa Comam Dios yehi . Wal mac machiswalil chiswatx'e xin , ha' chalniloj ta maẍto ohtabilo Comam Dios yu .
64001012	Wal naj juẍta Demetrio , caw c'ul chiyute isba naj xol anma , yuto caw haban cotxumni . Caw xin sunil ebnaj juẍta chihalnipaxoj tato caw yijem chiyute isba naj yin̈ cuybanile caw yel chala , hac tu' xin walnipaxojan . Caw heyohtaj tato yet chiwalnihan huno tzet ye tu' caw yel chiwalan .
64001013	Caw hantan̈eto tzet caw chiwoche wala'tojan tawet , yaj caw mach chiwochehan chintz'ibn̈etojan yul hum ti' .
64001014	Yuto caw ayxaco yin̈ inc'ulan intohan cachintuclenojan , cat cotzotel ninoj .
64001015	Caw chawil haba bey tu' . Chisk'amben ebnaj juẍtaj ay bey ti' hanic' hawe bey tu' yin̈ hacawil , cat xin hawalnipaxo tet ebnaj juẍta bey tu' ta chil isba ebnaj . Hal tet ebnaj yin̈ hununtajil ink'ana'an .
65001001	Hanin Judas inti'an , ischejab Comam Jesucristo wehan , yeb xin wuẍta inbahan yeb naj Jacobo , chiwatojan hune' carta ti' teyet hex wuẍtaj yeb hex wanab . Caw awtebilexxa yu Comam , yeb caw xahan ayex yu Comam Dios Mame , yeb xin caw tan̈ebilex yu Comam Jesucristo .
65001002	Tz'ayojab isc'ul Comam teyin̈ , yak'ab Comam ak'anc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyet yin̈ caw niman .
65001003	Hex wuẍtaj , hex wanab , caw xahan ayex wuhan . Caw tx'i'alxa el chiwochehan chiwa'tojan hune' incartati'an teyet yin̈ tzet ye cocolbanil xacochah tet Comam Dios . Yaj wal tinan̈ xin , chitit yin̈ wanmahan ta yilal wanitojan hune' carta ti' teyet , yu quexyiptzen yin̈ heyinahti heyanma heya'iln̈en hune' cuybanil bay ayco janma han̈on̈ yeton̈xa Comam .
65001004	Caw yilal wanitojan hune' carta ti' yuto ay huntek'an mac lek'ti'aln̈e yu yoc texol . Huntek'an ebnaj tu' istx'ojaln̈e chiswatx'e ebnaj ; chal ebnaj ta yu ayon̈xaco yin̈ isc'ulch'anil Comam xaisje cowatx'en sunil istx'ojal . Chiyintan̈ecanilto ebnaj tu' Comam Jesucristo Jahawil chon̈ijbani . Ha' ton yin̈ huntek'an ebnaj ti' tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul Yum Comam Dios yet payat ta yilal istocano ebnaj yin̈ isya'tajil .
65001005	Waxan̈ca heyohtaxa hune' chiwalti'an yaja' chinnapaxtijan teyet yin̈ ebnaj Israel , iscon̈ob Comam Dios . Lahwi iscolnilo Comam ebnaj yul con̈ob Egipto , istan̈tzenilo Comam macta mach yayto yul yanma yin̈ tzet yal Comam .
65001006	Yebpaxo xin , naweti tzet elico huntek'an ebnaj 'angel nime winaj yute isba , isbejnicano ebnaj hune' yehobal ak'bil tet yu Comam Dios . Wal tinan̈ xin , c'alan ebnaj sic'lebil yu ch'en cadena , majan ebnaj xol k'ejholo yu Comam Dios yechman istz'ayical bay chul isya'tajil yiban̈ ebnaj yu Comam yin̈ huneln̈e .
65001007	Hactic'apax tu' xin anma ay bey Sodoma yeb anma ay bey Gomorra yeb huntek'anxa con̈ob ayco yin̈la ishoyanil cabeb con̈ob tu' , oc ebnaj winaj ixloj , yocpaxo ebix ix winajloj ; chiswatx'en tzet mach yeto ay isnimanil . Huntek'an anma tu' ischah isya'tajil xol k'a k'a' yin̈ huneln̈e . Sunil tu' , cancano yechelo tet sunil anma yun̈e istxumnilo tzet elico anma watx'en istx'ojal .
65001008	Waxan̈ca hac tu' yute Comam Dios , yak'ni isya'tajil tet huntek'an anma yet payat tu' , yaja' huntek'an ebnaj ayco texol tinan̈ , chisman̈c'o ebnaj cuybanile aycano yu Comam Dios . Yu isyijen ebnaj tzet chal iswayic , chetan ebnaj isnimanil . Chalnipaxo ebnaj tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ ebnaj 'angel .
65001009	Yaj conabati yin̈ naj arc'angel Miguel , yet yak'len howal naj yeb naj matzwalil yin̈ isnimanil naj Mois'es , waxan̈ca caw aycan̈ yip naj Miguel tu' , yaj machi yal naj tzoti' tx'oj chitz'acti'n̈en naj matzwalil tu' , cachann̈e yal naj haca' ti' : -- Ha'ojab Comam Dios chaẍmaynoj , ẍi naj tet naj .
65001010	Wal ebnaj chiwalti'an , ton̈etic'a chibuchwa ebnaj yin̈ hunu tzet ye tu' mach yohtajoj . Lahan isnabal ebnaj haca' no nok' , ha' tzet yohta ebnaj mach chitxumcha yu ebnaj , ton̈etic'a chiswatx'e ebnaj tzet choche isc'ul . Ha' huntek'an tu' chi'etanto yanma ebnaj sata Comam Dios , cat ischahni ebnaj isya'tajil .
65001011	Caw c'anch'ancano huntek'an ebnaj tu' , yuto lahan tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj haca' tzet iswatx'e naj Ca'in . Chiswatx'epaxo ebnaj haca' tzet yute naj Balaam , yu ch'en melyu iswatx'e naj istx'ojal . Chiswatx'epaxo ebnaj haca' iswatx'e naj Cor'e , cam naj yu mach isyije naj tzet yal Comam Dios ; hac tu' xin chu istan̈tzelaxilo ebnaj ti' yu isman̈c'omal .
65001012	Tx'ixobal chuco ebnaj texol yet checutxban heba wa'o yin̈ yet Comam . Maẍtic'a nino tzet chal isc'ul ebnaj yet ch'oc ebnaj wa'o texol yeb machi nino chixiw ebnaj . Lahan ebnaj haca' hunu naj tan̈em me' , ha'n̈e ayco yin̈ isc'ul istan̈en isba . Lahanpaxo ebnaj haca' hunu moyan machi n̈ab ik'bil yu , ton̈e chi'ec' ijon yu jak'ek' . Lahanpaxo ebnaj haca' hunu te te' machi satni ; ton̈e chitajayoj yeb sunil xe' yin̈ huneln̈e .
65001013	Lahan ebnaj haca' yet ch'ah pok'la ha' mar cat yanilo ha' ishujuyal , hac tu' chu jilni k'alem ayco xol ha' , hac tu' xin chu isyenilo ebnaj tzettaj tx'ixobal chiswatx'e . Lahanpaxo ebnaj yeb tx'umel xaisheq'uilo isba yul yehobal , ha' istx'ojal ebnaj tu' chicawxento isto yin̈ huneln̈e xol k'ejholo ; hune' k'ejholo tu' caw xapalc'oncano isk'ejholohal .
65001014	Naj Enoc , naj ishuj mame yinta naj Ad'an , yet payat tiempo , tzotel naj yu yip Comam Dios yin̈ huntek'an ebnaj ti' : -- ¡ Abewej ! Chihul Comam Dios Jahawil yeb ismilalxa y'angel yintaj .
65001015	Chul Comam yila' yin̈ tzet iswatx'e sunil anma , cat yanocanico isya'tajil yiban̈ mac caw tx'oj chiswatx'e yin̈ Comam ; macta machi Comam yul sat yeb hanta istx'ojal tzoti' chalico yin̈ Comam , ẍi naj Enoc tu' .
65001016	Ha' ebnaj ayco texol tu' , ak'omc'ule ebnaj , buchwawompaxo ebnaj . Han̈ech'an yin̈ tzet choche isnimanil ebnaj chaco isnabal . Nime winaj chute isba istzoteli . Caw c'ulch'an chutepaxo istzotel ebnaj tet anma , yaja' cabeb isnabal ebnaj . Hac tu' chute ebnaj yun̈e c'ul ch'ec' yila' ebnaj .
65001017	Hex xahan ay wuti'an , tijab yin̈ hec'ul yin̈ tzet halbil yu ebnaj ischejab Comam Jesucristo ,
65001018	yet yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- Hayet toxa chul islahobal tz'ayic , ay anma chitzebi yin̈ tzet chal Comam Dios , cat iswatx'en istx'ojal choche isc'ul , ẍicano ebnaj .
65001019	Ha' huntek'an ebnaj tu' chi'anico pohlebahil texol . Han̈ech'an yin̈ tzet choche isnimanil ebnaj ayco isnabal ; machipaxo Comam Esp'iritu Santo yin̈ yanma ebnaj .
65001020	Yaja' hex caw xahan ay wuti'an , lin̈bawe heba yin̈ cuybanile xaheyayto yul heyanma titna tet Comam Dios . Txahlan̈we yu yip Comam Esp'iritu Santo .
65001021	Huneln̈ehojabn̈etic'a heyeco yin̈ isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios . Hac tu' chu heyechman istz'ayical bay chak' Comam Jesucristo Jahawil hune' cok'inal mach istan̈bal yu isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam .
65001022	Tz'ayojab hec'ul yin̈ anma chicapcon yanma yin̈ Comam , ak'we meltzoho isnabal yin̈ Comam .
65001023	Yebpaxo anma haca'tan̈e ayxato xol k'a k'a' , tzacweltij , hac tu' chu hecolni xol k'a' . Caw yilal istz'ay hec'ul yin̈ anma , yaja' nann̈eojab heyu yin̈ tzet chiswatx'e yuto ay ismay heyetaxto yu . Yahwe huntek'an istx'ojal chiswatx'e tu' , haca' chiyu coyahni hunu xilk'ape bacbilico yal tx'ac yin̈ .
65001024	Ha' Comam Dios chu con̈isc'ubani yun̈e machi bay chon̈lectahi . Aypaxo yip Comam con̈yanico yin̈ isc'ulch'anil bay aya yin̈ tzalahilal , yuto matxa comul yul sat , yu sajxa je yu Comam .
65001025	¡ Hallaxojab c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam Dios , hune'n̈ech'an Comam Cocolomal ! Jalawej ta caw ay yelapno ye Comam , caw ay yip Comam , yeb xin sunil tzet aya , ayco yul isk'ab Comam yet payat , yeb tinan̈ , yeb yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
66001001	Ha' hune' ti' yak' Comam Dios , isyeb Comam Jesucristo tet ebnaj ischejab yin̈ huntek'an tzet yilal yuni yeb toxa chiyuhi . Ischejniti Comam Jesucristo y'angel yak'ni wohtan̈elojan , hanin Juan inti'an , ischejab Comam Jesucristo .
66001002	Haninti'an chiwalan isyelal yin̈ tzet wilan , testigo inpaxojan yin̈ Istzoti' Comam Dios yij isba yu Comam Jesucristo .
66001003	Sak'al yet mac chiilni yeb mac chiaben huntek'an tzet halbilcano yu Comam yul hune' Hum ti' , cat isyijen huntek'an tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano ti' , yuto toxa chij isba .
66001004	Hanin Juan inti'an , chintz'ibn̈etojan hune' carta ti' teyet hex huj majan ayexxaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo . Chawe ak'anc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Dios ; Comam ay tinan̈ , Comam ayxatic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj , Comam chihuli . Chahwepaxo ak'anc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil tet hujeb esp'iritu ayco sata bay tz'on̈an Comam .
66001005	Chawepaxo ak'anc'ulal yeb isc'ulch'anil isc'ul Comam Jesucristo , Comam testigo caw yijem . Comam Jesucristo ti' babel itzitzbican̈ xol camom , aypaxo yip Comam yiban̈ ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Caw xahan ayon̈ yu Comam , caw yicanilo Comam comul yu ischiq'uil malto yin̈ te' culus .
66001006	Con̈yanico Comam yahawil yeb sacerdotehal yu jocnico yu Comam Dios , ismam Comam Jesucristo . Hallaxojab tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam , yeb xin ta caw ay yip Comam yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Hacojab tu' !
66001007	Chul Comam Jesucristo tu' xol moyan . Sunil mac chiilni yul Comam , ha' hunpaxo ebnaj potx'ni camo Comam chiilni yuli . Hayet chilni anma ay yul hunun con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yul Comam chioc yin̈ bisc'ulal , cat yoc ok'o yu bisc'ulal . Ho' , hac tu' chuhi .
66001008	Yalni Comam : -- Haninan babelinan yeb islahobal , haca' tz'ib A yeb Z , ẍi Comam ; Comam chisje iswatx'en sunil tzet ye tu' , Comam ay tinan̈ , yeb ayxatic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj , yeb chihuli .
66001009	Hanin Juan inti'an , heyuẍta wehan , han-hun-inan chiwabehan isya'tajil yeb hex , yeb xin han-hun-inan chinchahan isnimanbal inc'ulal teyintaj . Hune'n̈e xin chon̈eh yeb Comam Dios yu ayon̈xaco yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo . Yet hunel , yet ayinan yul hune' con̈ob chiyij Patmos , hune' con̈ob ay xol ha' mar , quinalaxicojan preso yu chiwalic'ojan Istzoti' Comam Dios yeb tzet iswatx'e Comam Jesucristo .
66001010	Yet hunel tu' , yin̈ tz'ayic yet Comam , quinocan yalan̈ ischejbanil Comam Esp'iritu Santo , wabenan hune' yul nuk'e wintajan awi yin̈ caw ip haca' yok' ch'en trompeta .
66001011	Yalni wetan haca' ti' : -- Tz'ibn̈eyo huntek'an chawil ti' yul hum , cat hawanito tet hujeb majan anma ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul ismajul Asia : tet Efeso , Esmirna , P'ergamo , Tiatira , Sardis , Filadelfia yeb tet Laodicea , ẍi wetan .
66001012	Inmeltzon inbahan , int'an̈xitojan yun̈e wilnihan mac chitzotel wetan . Wilnihan hujeb candelero naba oro bay chialaxato cantil .
66001013	Xolbal hujeb candelero tu' wilan hune' mac haca' anma jilni . Caw nimajal ishojayo istel xil isk'ap ayicoj , masanta chiayilo yin̈ yoj . Aypaxico hune' iscincho naba oro , nimajal ispak'i sat chiah apno istxam isc'ul .
66001014	Wal xil iswi' caw saj jilni haca' no' saj lana yeb haca' jilni ch'en chew . Haxa isbak'sat lahan jilni haca' xaj k'a k'a' .
66001015	Wal yoj xin chitzejtzoni , haca' jilni ch'en bronce n̈ijbilxalo istz'ilal , n̈usbilxa yul horno . Wal yul isnuk' xin caw ay yip haca' jaben isbili ha' nimeta ha' .
66001016	Yin̈ iswatx'k'ab ayco hujeb tx'umel . Chi-xin-elti hune' ch'en espada caw xixi' iswi' yul isti' . Hune' ch'en espada tu' aypaxati' yeh yichin̈ ch'en . Wal issat lahan jilni haca' yet chitzejla tz'ayic yet caw hajan .
66001017	Yet wilnihan huntek'an tu' , wayc'ayan yich yoj , haca' camom wucanilojan . Yanayo iswatx'k'ab wiban̈an , yalni wetan : -- Mach chachxiwi , haninti'an yichebanil yeb islahobal .
66001018	Haninti'an itzitzinan , quincaman yaja' tinan̈ xin itzitzinan yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Haninti'an yahaw inan yin̈ camical yebpaxo yin̈ bay chiapni yanma anma chicami .
66001019	Tz'ibn̈ecano huntek'an maxawil ti' , yeb huntek'an chawil tinan̈ , yeb huntek'an chawila' yet tzujaniloxa .
66001020	Ha' hujeb tx'umel hawil yin̈ inwatx'k'aban yeb hujeb candelero naba oro , hac ti' chal yelapnoj : Ha' hujeb tx'umel tu' , yechel hujwan̈ inchejaban chiilni hujeb majan anma ayxaco yul ink'aban , walpaxo hujeb candelero naba oro yechel hujeb majan anma ayxaco yul ink'ab tu'an , ẍi Comam .
66002001	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban yul con̈ob Efeso : " Comam ik'n̈e hujeb tx'umel yin̈ iswatx'k'ab , Comam chiec' xol hujeb ch'en candelero naba oro bay chiahto cantil , ha' chalni haca' ti' :
66002002	Caw wohtajan sunil tzet chewatx'e , caw wohtajan hanta isya'tajil cheyak'le yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios , niman cheyutepaxo hec'ul heyak'ni techaho isya'tajil , mach xin chextzala yin̈ anma chiwatx'en istx'ojal . Wohtapaxojan tato xaheyilwe ebnaj chisbalico isba inchejabojan , yayc'ay ebnaj yin̈ lek'ti'al , hac tu' yu heyohtan̈eniloj tato lek'ti' ebnaj .
66002003	Wohtajan ta caw chexec'ya' yu ayexico yul ink'aban , yaj xin caw ay henimanc'ulal , mach chitibayo heyu .
66002004	Yaja' ay hanic' mach chischah inwi'an , yuto matxa ayoco heyanma win̈an haca' yet heyichicoj .
66002005	Yuxin nawetij baytet yin̈ quexayc'ayi , meltzoweco henabal yin̈ Comam Dios , cat hewatx'en baytettic'a chewatx'e yet yichebanil . Ta mach xin chintohan quexwila'an yin̈ an̈e cat winilojan hecandelero yul yehobal .
66002006	Yaja' xin ay hune'xa hec'ulal yul insatan , yuto cheyah tzettaj chiswatx'e ebnaj nicola'ita , haquinpaxtu'an chinyahan tzet chiswatx'e ebnaj .
66002007	Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' , caw ak'we heyanma hetxumnilo tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tet ej macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam Dios . Ha' mac chik'oji , chiwak'an sat te' lobehal chiak'ni k'inale islob , te' ay yul yictabal ispara'iso Comam Dios , " ẍi Comam .
66002008	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul con̈ob Esmirna : " Comam yichebanil yeb Comam islahobal , Comam cami yaja' itzitzbican̈ , ha' chalni haca' ti' :
66002009	Haninti'an caw wohtajan tzet chewatx'e . Wohtajan hanta ch'ec'ya' heyanma yeb hemeba'il , yaja' yin̈ caw yeli yul sat Comam Dios caw k'alomex . Caw wohtajan tato tx'oj istzotel ebnaj chal isba Israelal teyin̈ , yaja' huntek'an ebnaj tu' yet naj matzwalil ye ebnaj .
66002010	Mach chexxiw yin̈ huntek'an isya'tajil chul teyiban̈ . Ayex ti' chexalaxoco preso yu naj matzwalil yun̈e heyilwelaxi . Yulbal lahon̈eb tz'ayic cheyil isya'tajil , wal xin caw lin̈bawe heba waxan̈ca chexak'lax camoj , hac tu' xin chiwak'an k'inale mach istan̈bal ispaj selelo teyet haca' hunu corona .
66002011	¡ Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumnilo yin̈ tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej macta ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ! Ha' mac chik'oji mach chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma yin̈ hune' iscab camical , " ẍi Comam .
66002012	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul con̈ob P'ergamo : " Comam ik'n̈e ch'en espada cabeb yeh yeb caw xixi' iswi' , ha' chalni haca' ti' :
66002013	Haninti'an caw wohtajan tzet chewatx'e . Caw wohtajan tato ayexayo bay caw ay yip naj matzwalil , yaja' hune'n̈etic'a ha' heyijen wetan . Machi xin chebej heyanayto yul heyanma win̈an waxan̈ca heyil isya'tajil yet iscam naj Antipas , naj caw yijem yute isba yalnic'o intzoti'an bay caw ay yip naj matzwalil .
66002014	Yaja' xin ay hanic' mach chischah inwi'an , yuto ayex ti' cheyaco henabal yin̈ iscuybanil naj Balaam , naj oc ak'oc'ule tet naj rey Balac , yoc naj yak'no ayc'ayo ebnaj Israel . Isc'uxni ebnaj no' chibe chiak'lax xahanbalil tetej tioẍ , yocpaxo ebnaj ixloj .
66002015	Yeb xin ayex cheyaco henabal yin̈ iscuybanil ebnaj nicola'ita , huntek'an yahbil wuhan .
66002016	Yuxin nawe heba , bejwecano huntek'an tu' , ta mach xin chinapnihan yin̈ an̈e , cat wocan howal teyin̈ yu ch'en espada chielti' yul inti'an .
66002017	¡ Maquex cheyabe huntek'an ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumni yin̈ tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej mac ayxaco yul isk'ab Comam ! Ha' mac chik'oji , chiwak'an man'a islob , hune' ewan yehi , cat wak'nihan hune' ch'en ch'en caw sajhopon̈e tet bay tz'ibn̈ebilico hune' bihe caw ac'to ; machi mac ohtan̈e , cachann̈e hune' mac chichahni tu' chiohtan̈eniloj , " ẍi Comam .
66002018	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay bey con̈ob Tiatira : " Comam Isc'ahol Comam Dios , Comam lahan isbak'sat haca' xaj k'a k'a' , yeb yoj haca' ch'en bronce chitzejlahi , ha' chalni haca' ti' :
66002019	Haninti'an caw wohtajan tzettaj chewatx'e , wohtajan tato ayco heyanma win̈an . Wohtapaxojan hanta chexmunlahi , yeb caw ay isnimanil hec'ul istecha isya'tajil heyu . Wohtapaxojan tato ec'balto hemunil tinan̈ sata yet heyichicoj .
66002020	Yaja' xin ay huntek'an tzet mach chischah inwi'an , yuto hex ti' maẍtic'a nino tzet cheyal yin̈ ix Jezabel , ix isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios . Chak'ni subcha ix ebnaj inchejaban yu iscuybanil , chistubtento ix ebnaj ixloj , yeb isc'uxni no' chibe chiak'lax yin̈ xahanbalil .
66002021	Caw wak'an tiempo tet ix yun̈e isnani isba ix cat isbejnicano istx'ojal , yaja' mach isbej ix iswinajli .
66002022	Yaja' xin chiwak' ec'ojan ya' yanma ix , haca' hunu mac chito hilno sat tx'at yu yabil ; cat wanipaxayojan isya'tajil yiban̈ ebnaj chiuten mule yeb ix , ta mach chisna isba ebnaj isbejnicano istx'ojal , haca' istx'ojal chiswatx'e ix ,
66002023	cat wak'ni camojan yunin ix . Hac tu' xin chu yohtan̈enilo sunil mac ayxaco yul ink'aban tato haninti'an wohtajan tzet chiec' yul heyanma yeb yin̈ henabal . Chiwak'an ispaj selel teyet hatatic'a tzet chewatx'e hununex .
66002024	Yaja' wal hun majanexxa ay bey Tiatira tu' , hex mach heyaco henabal yin̈ iscuywabal ix tu' , yeb xin mach heyabeto hune' chihallax cuybanile yet naj matzwalil ewan yehi , chiwalan tato machi hunuxa chejbanile chiwaltojan teyet ,
66002025	cachann̈e hune' ti' , lin̈bawe heba yin̈ tzet xatzujcha apno heyu masanto yet chinhulan .
66002026	Ha' mac chik'oji yeb xin maẍtic'a chisbej iswatx'en tzet chiwalan , chiwak'an yip yoc yahawo yiban̈ ej con̈ob ,
66002027	haca' yu yak'ni Inmaman wipan , caw ay yip chu yak'ni yahawil . Haca' ismak'lax poho hunu tx'otx' xi yu ch'en vara naba hierro , hac tu' chu yak'lax isya'tajil tet anma man̈c'om ,
66002028	cat wak'nipaxojan tx'umel sajbes tet .
66002029	¡ Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' , ak'we heyanma hetxumnilo tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej mac ayxaco yul ink'aban ! " ẍi Comam .
66003001	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul con̈ob Sardis : " Comam ayco hujeb Yesp'iritu Comam Dios yin̈ , yeb ik'bilcan̈ hujeb tx'umel yu , ha' chalni haca' ti' : Haninti'an caw wohtajan tzet chewatx'e . Caw itzitzex yalbanil , yaja' wal yul insatan camomex .
66003002	Tinan̈ xin , iwelo hewayan̈ cat heyocpaxo hewatx'en huntek'an tzet etza lan̈an istan̈iloj . Yuto chiwilan ta ha' tzet chewatx'e mach c'ulo sata Comam Dios .
66003003	Naweti huntek'an cuybanile chabil heyu , lahweco heyijeni . Nawe heba , bejwecano hetx'ojal yuto ta mach helano cheyute heba , chinapni lemnahan quexwila'an yet tona nahul ayex , haca' chu yapni hunu naj elk'om yin̈ hunu mac tona nahul aya .
66003004	Yaja' ay haywan̈ mac texol bey Sardis tu' mach yetato isba , haca' hunu mac mach istz'iln̈eto xil isk'ap , yuxin huntek'an mac tu' yet ay yec' wintajan , sajhopon̈e xil isk'ap .
66003005	Ha' mac chik'oji , chialaxico xil isk'ap caw sajhopon̈e yeb xin mach chinhocan̈an isbi yul hum yet k'inale ; cat walnihan sata Inmaman yeb sata ebnaj 'angel ta wetan yehi .
66003006	¡ Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we heyanma hetxumni tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej mac ayxaco yul ink'aban ! " ẍi Comam .
66003007	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ay yul con̈ob Filadelfia : " Comam machi nino istx'ojal yin̈ , yeb isyelaln̈etic'a chala , Comam ik'n̈e islawe naj rey David . Comam hayet chishajni pulta machi hunu mac chu ispebani , hayet chispeban pulta , mach mac chu ishajni , chihalni haca' ti' :
66003008	Haninti'an wohtajan tzettaj chewatx'e . Ay hune' pulta hajan teyet wuhan , machi hunu mac chu ispebani . Waxan̈ca machi heyip yaja' caw yijem cheyute heba yin̈ intzoti'an . Machi xin chextx'ixwilo win̈an .
66003009	Ha' huntek'an ebnaj chiyijen yin̈ tzet chal naj matzwalil , ebnaj chisbalico isba Israelal chinchejtojan ebnaj tec'atan̈ cat yay jahno ebnaj tesataj , cat yohtan̈enilo ebnaj ta xahan ayex wuhan .
66003010	Caw heyije inchejbanilan , nimanpaxo hec'ul heyak'ni techaho ilwebal , yu hune' tu' yuxin chexincolan yul isk'ab hune' isya'tajil chihul sat yiban̈k'inal yun̈e yilwelax anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' .
66003011	Toxa chinhullemnahan , machojab chebej hewatx'en tzet chi-tic'a-hewatx'e , haxinwal machi hunu mac chiinilo ispaj selel chiak'lax teyet .
66003012	Ha' mac chik'oji , chiwacojan haca' yoyal yatut Inmaman , machi xin bak'in chiilaxiloj ; chintz'ibn̈enicojan isbi Inmaman yin̈ yeb isbi iscon̈ob Inmaman , hune' ac' Jerusal'en chitit yul satcan̈ bay ay inDiosalan , cat intz'ibn̈enicojan inbihan ac' yin̈ .
66003013	¡ Mac chiaben huntek'an ti' yak'ab yanma istxumnilo tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tet macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ! " ẍi Comam .
66003014	Yalnipaxo Comam : -- Hac ti' chu hatz'ibn̈ento tet inchejaban chitan̈en macta ayxaco yul ink'aban bey con̈ob Laodicea : " Comam ist'in̈anil chala , Comam testigo caw yijem yeb chalni isyelal , Comam watx'en̈e sunil tzettaj ye tu' yeb Comam Dios , ha' chalni haca' ti' :
66003015	Wohtajan tzet chewatx'e , wohtajan ta lahanex haca' hunu tzet chiuc'laxi mach chewoj , mach xin cajopaxoj , ayxic'a chew hex maca caj hex .
66003016	Yaja' yu namanex , mach chewojex mach cajohexpaxoj , yuxin chexinpuch'iltijan yul inti'an .
66003017	Hex ti' cheyala ta caw k'alomex , caw c'ul heyin̈bal yeb caw sunil ay yul hek'ab heyalni . Mach xin heyohtajoj tato caw c'anch'anex yeb caw ya'ta heyehi . Caw meba' hex , mach chu heyilni , t'ilanexpaxoj .
66003018	Wal xin chiwalan teyet lok'we heoro wetan , ch'en caw c'ul watx'ebilxalo xol k'a k'a' . Hac tu' xin chexoc k'alomal yin̈ caw isyelal , cat xin helok'ni xil hek'ap caw sajhopon̈e wetan , cat heyanico teyin̈ yun̈e mach chiel hetx'ixobal yuto t'ilanex . Chelok'nipaxo yan̈al isbak' hesat wetan yun̈e chu heyilni .
66003019	Haninti'an chincachan yeb chiwak'an isya'tajil yiban̈ mac xahan ay wuhan . Wal xin aweco heyanma yin̈ Comam , nawe heba , bejwecano istx'ojal .
66003020	Haninti'an lin̈an inicojan sat pulta cat wawictojan , ha' mac chiaben yul innuk'an cat ishajni yatut wetan , chinoctojan isc'atan̈ cat inwa'an yebi .
66003021	Ha' mac chik'oji isyijeni chiwak'an hune' yehobal bay tz'on̈aninan , haca' yu ink'ojihan , woc tz'on̈nojan isc'atan̈ Inmaman bay ay istz'on̈obal .
66003022	¡ Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' , ak'we heyanma hetxumniloj tzet chal Comam Esp'iritu tetej macta ayxaco yul ink'aban ! " ẍi Comam .
66004001	Lahwi tu' , wilnihan hune' pulta hajan yul satcan̈ , ha' xin hune' yul nuk'e wabehan yet babelal , hune' haca' yok' ch'en trompeta halni wetan : -- Ahan̈ti bey ti' cat inyenihan huntek'an chiyub yintajilo ti' , ẍi wetan .
66004002	Yin̈n̈ena tu' wocan yalan̈ yip Comam Esp'iritu , wilnihan hune' tz'on̈obal yul satcan̈ , yul hune' tz'on̈obal tu' tz'on̈an hune' mac .
66004003	Comam tz'on̈an tu' , lahan yilni istzejla haca' ch'en jaspe yeb haca' jilni ch'en cornalina . Yin̈ ishoyanil istz'on̈obal Comam tu' aycan̈ hune' no' ch'er chitzejla haca' ch'en esmeralda .
66004004	Wilnipaxojan veinticuatro tz'on̈obal yin̈la ishoyanil istz'on̈obal Comam , yul huntek'an tz'on̈obal tu' tz'on̈anayo veinticuatro ebnaj anciano , saj xil isk'ap ayco yeb ayahto corona naba oro yin̈ iswi' ebnaj .
66004005	Yul istz'on̈obal Comam tu' chielti jepla yoj c'uh , caw ay yip isn̈irlahi . Haxa sata tz'on̈obal tu' caw chiah xaj k'a' yin̈ hujeb antorcha , ha' ton hujeb Yesp'iritu Comam Dios .
66004006	Sata tz'on̈obal tu' aypaxo hune' haca' ha' mar jilni , chik'axpon comujlubal yul haca' ch'en vidrio . Haxa yictabal bay ay tz'on̈obal tu' yeb yin̈ ishoyanil ay can̈wan̈ ebnaj querub'in . Caw tx'i'alcano isbak'sat ebnaj , ay isbak'sat ayco sataj , aypaxo isbak'sat ebnaj yintaj .
66004007	Naj babel querub'in lahan jilni naj haca' no' balam , naj iscab haca' no' toro , naj yox haca' sat anma , hac tu' jilni sat naj , haxa naj iscan̈ haca' no' aguila leyanilto xic' chiec' satcan̈ , hac tu' jilni naj .
66004008	Ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in tu' wajata xic' hunun ebnaj , nohnaco bak'sate yalan̈ yeb yiban̈ isxic' ebnaj . Tz'ayical yeb ak'balil maẍtic'a chisbej ebnaj yalni haca' ti' : Mach istx'ojal Comam Dios Jahawil , mach istx'ojal , mach istx'ojal Comam ; Comam caw ayco yip , Comam ayxatic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj , yeb ay tinan̈ , yeb chihuli , ẍi ebnaj .
66004009	Chalni ebnaj querub'in tu' ta caw ay ismay , yeb ta caw ay yelapno Comam , Comam tz'on̈an yul yehobal , yeb xin chak'ni ebnaj yuch'andiosal tet Comam ayn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
66004010	Hunta el yet chalni ebnaj haca' tu' chiay jahno ebnaj veinticuatro anciano sata Comam , chanayo ebnaj iscorona sata Comam , chalni ebnaj :
66004011	Mam Dios Jahawil , hatzan yallaxi ta caw ay hamay , yeb ta caw ay yelapno hawehi , yeb ta caw ay hawip , yuto hach watx'en̈e sunil tzet ye tu' , yuto hac tu' el yin̈ hac'ul yuxin aya ; hach xin watx'en̈ecanoj , ẍi ebnaj .
66005001	Wilnihan Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal tu' , ayco hune' te' hum yul isk'ab , ayayo tz'ib yul te' yeb yinta te' . Caw chulbilayo te' , ayico hujeb sello yin̈ te' .
66005002	Wilnihan hune' naj 'angel caw aycano yip , isk'amben naj yin̈ caw ip : -- ¿ Mactaxca ay yelapno yoc yinilo issellohal te' hum ti' , cat isholnito te' ? ẍi naj .
66005003	Yaja' nitam satcan̈ yeb yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb yalan̈ tx'o tx'otx' ilcha hunu mac chu isholnito te' , nitam yilni tzet ayayo yul te' .
66005004	Caw xin chinok'an yuto mach ilcha mac ay yelapno yoc ishajni te' , nitam yilni tzet chal te' .
66005005	Yalni hune' naj anciano wetan : -- Mach chach'ok'i , ay hune' mac xak'oji , Balam isbi , titna yin̈ naj Jud'a , titnapaxo yin̈ naj rey David . Ha' naj chu istzilnilo hujeb sello tu' , cat isholnito te' , ẍi naj wetan .
66005006	Wilnihan hune' mac haca' me' lin̈ancan̈ yictabal tz'on̈obal , yeb yictabal ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in , yeb xolbal ebnaj anciano . Hune' mac tu' haca'tan̈e xaalaxico yin̈ xahanbalil , hujeb yuc'a' yeb hujeb isbak'sat , ha' ton hujwan̈ Yesp'iritu Comam Dios alaxti yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
66005007	Comam Me' isbi , ha' inilo te' hum ayco yul iswatx'k'ab Comam tz'on̈anayo yul istz'on̈obal .
66005008	Hayet yinilo Comam te' , yay jahno ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in yeb ebnaj veinticuatro anciano sata Comam Me' isbi tu' . Sunil ebnaj ik'bil yarpa , yeb isvaso naba oro nohna yu pom . Ha' pom tu' yechel istxah anma yetxa Comam yehi .
