66005009	Yanico ebnaj hune' ac' bit , chalni haca' ti' : Mamin , hachn̈ech'an chu hachahni hune' te' hum ti' , cat hatzilnilo issellohal te' , yuto hach ti' cachoc xahanbalil , ismalto hachiq'uil , yu halok'ni anma yeto Comam Dios , tzijxan̈e anmahil , nananta yabxubal , niẍte con̈ob yeb nimeta con̈ob .
66005010	Hawanico anma tu' reyalil yeb sacerdotehal yu isyijen tzet chal Comam Dios , cat yoc yahawilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ẍi ebnaj .
66005011	Lahwi tu' , wilnihan hayebtam mill'on ebnaj 'angel hoyanico yin̈ istz'on̈obal Comam yeb yin̈ ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in yeb ebnaj anciano . Wabenan yul isnuk' ebnaj 'angel tu' ,
66005012	chalni ebnaj yin̈ caw ip haca' ti' : Comam Me' isbi , Comam oc xahanbalil , yet ay yallax yin̈ ta Yahawil , ta ay isk'alomal , ta ay ishelanil , ta ay yip , ta ay yelapnoj , ta ay ismay yeb yallax tzoti' c'ul yin̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
66005013	Wabenpaxojan yalni tzet watx'ebil yu Comam Dios yul satcan̈ yeb tzet ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yeb yalan̈ tx'o tx'otx' , yeb tzet ay xol ha' mar , chalni haca' ti' : Hallaxojab tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam tz'on̈anayo yul istz'on̈obal , yeb yin̈ Comam Me' isbi . Hallaxojabi ta caw ay yelapnoj , ta caw ay ismay , ta caw ay yip yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , ẍi .
66005014	Yalnipaxo ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in : -- Hacojab tu' , ẍi ebnaj . Haxa ebnaj veinticuatro anciano ay jahno ebnaj , yalni ebnaj tzoti' c'ul yin̈ Comam .
66006001	Lahwi tu' , wilnihan istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil hune' babel sello , wabenan yalni naj babel querub'in yin̈ caw ip haca' isbili c'uh , yalni naj : -- ¡ Cata ! ẍi naj .
66006002	Hayet inhacxitojan wilnihan hune' no' cheh sajin̈ ayato hune' naj yiban̈ no' , ik'bil xin hune' te' lit' yu naj , yak'lax hune' corona tet naj . Isto naj yin̈ howal , chilann̈etic'a xin isk'oji naj .
66006003	Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil iscab sello , wabenan yalni naj iscab querub'in : -- ¡ Cata ! ẍi naj .
66006004	Wilnipaxojan hune' no' cheh cajin̈ , yak'lax yip naj ayahto yiban̈ no' yinilo ak'anc'ulal yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yun̈e yoc anma ispotx'leno isba ; yak'lax hune' niman espada tet naj .
66006005	Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil isyox sello , wabenan yalni naj yox querub'in haca' ti' : -- ¡ Cata ! ẍi naj . Wilnihan hune' no' cheh k'ejin̈ , ha' naj ayahto yiban̈ no' ik'bil hune' ch'en libra malbal yu naj .
66006006	Xol ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in tu' wabenan hune' yul nuk'e halni : -- Cabn̈e libra trigo maca wajeb libra cebada chik' naj munlawom yin̈ tz'ayic . Mach xin cheyetato te' aceite yeb te' vino , ẍi .
66006007	Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil iscan̈ sello , wabenan yalni naj iscan̈ querub'in : -- ¡ Cata ! ẍi naj .
66006008	Wilnipaxojan hune' no' cheh k'anin̈ , ha' xin naj ayahto yiban̈ no' , camical isbi naj , yinta naj xin tzujan naj yahawil bay ay camom . Yak'lax yip ebnaj istan̈tzenilo hune' iscan̈ majan anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu ej howal , wahil , yebej yabil yebpaxo yu ej no' howla nok' ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' .
66006009	Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil isho' sello , wilnihan hune' meẍa bay chak'lax xahanbal , yalan̈ hune' meẍa tu' wilan yanma ebnaj potx'bil camo yu yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios , yeb yu yak' isba ebnaj testigohal yin̈ .
66006010	Chalni ebnaj yin̈ caw ip : -- Mam Jahawil , Mam mach istx'ojal ayco tawin̈ , wal xin isyelaln̈etic'a chawala . ¿ Bak'in chawil yin̈ tzet ch'elico anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal cat hawak'ni ispaj tet mac con̈potx'nicamojan̈ ? ẍi .
66006011	Yak'lax huntek'an xil isk'ap ebnaj caw saj jilni , yallax tet ebnaj ta chi-to-xew ebnaj hanic'oxa tiempo masanto chitz'ajna isbisil ebnaj juẍta yilal yak'lax camoj , yu chak' cheja' isba tet Comam Cristo .
66006012	Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil iswaj sello , yec' hune' nimam chixcab , isk'ejholilo tz'ayic haca' hunu k'ap k'ap k'ej , iscajpon̈ilo ixahaw haca' chic' .
66006013	Yayc'ayejti tx'umel satcan̈ haca' yay hona sat te' higuera yu hunu niman jak'ek' yet yaxto te' .
66006014	Isc'aycan̈ satcan̈ , haca' chu ischullaxayo hunu xaj hum . Sunil witz yebej tx'o tx'otx' ay xol ha' mar isheq'uilo isba yul yehobal .
66006015	Sunil ebnaj rey yul yiban̈k'inal ti' yeb ebnaj winaj caw ay yelapnoj , yeb ebnaj k'alom , yeb ebnaj yahawil soldado , yeb ebnaj caw aycano yip , yeb ebnaj chejab , yeb ebnaj yet isba ischuquil , yebato isba ebnaj yulaj n̈ach'en yeb yichla ch'en ch'en ay iswi'la witz .
66006016	Chalni ebnaj tet ej witz yeb tet ch'en nimeta ch'en haca' ti' : -- ¡ Titan̈we wuyna jiban̈an̈ , cat con̈heyebantojan̈ yin̈ sat Comam tz'on̈an yul yehobal , yeb tet ishowal Comam oc xahanbalil ,
66006017	yuto mahul istz'ayical bay chihul isya'tajil yu Comam Dios , mach xin mac chik'oji istecha hune' isya'tajil ti' yu ! ẍi ebnaj .
66007001	Lahwi tu' xin , wilnihan can̈wan̈ ebnaj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ yin̈la iscan̈ebal istxiquin tx'o tx'otx' . Chispahnito ebnaj jak'ek' yun̈e mach ch'ec' yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' yeb yiban̈ ha' mar , yeb yiban̈ ej te' k'ebtaj .
66007002	Wilnihan yahilo hune'xa naj 'angel bay chiahilo tz'ayic , ik'bil xin issello Comam Dios yu naj , Comam itzitzn̈etic'a . Yawi naj yin̈ caw ip tet ebnaj can̈wan̈ ak'lax yip yetanto tzet ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yeb tzet ay xol ha' mar , yebej te' k'ebtaj , yalni naj haca' ti' :
66007003	¡ Maẍton̈e cheyetato tzet ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yeb tzet ay xol ha' mar , yebej te' k'ebtaj masanto chioc yechel Comam Dios yin̈ ispalan̈ ebnaj ischejab coDiosal ! ẍi naj .
66007004	Wabenan ta xol ebnaj cablahon̈eb majan Israel ciento cuarenta y cuatro mil ebnaj alaxico yechel .
66007005	Yin̈ ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Jud'a cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj alaxico yechel , yeb cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Rub'en , yeb cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Gad .
66007006	Cablahon̈eb milpaxo ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Aser , cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Neftal'i , cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Manas'es .
66007007	Cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Sime'on , cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Lev'i , cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Isacar .
66007008	Cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Zabul'on , cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Jos'e , yeb xin cablahon̈eb mil ebnaj titna yin̈ yuninal naj Benjam'in .
66007009	Lahwi tu' , wilnihan caw hantan̈e anma ayco sata istz'on̈obal Comam Dios , yeb sata Comam oc xahanbalil . Xol anma tu' ay anma nananta con̈obal , nananta yichmam , nananta yabxubal , caw xin hantan̈ecano anma tu' , machi mac chik'oji isbisni , caw saj xil isk'ap anma aycoj , ik'bil xin xaj te' ch'ib yu .
66007010	Chalni anma tu' yin̈ caw yip : ¡ Comam Dios tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal yeb Comam oc xahanbalil , ha' ak'ni cocolbanil ! ẍi anma .
66007011	Sunil ebnaj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ yin̈ ishoyanil bay tz'on̈an Comam Dios , yeb yin̈ ebnaj anciano yeb yin̈ ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in , ay jahno ebnaj , yay xulno sat tx'otx' sata Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal ; yalni ebnaj c'ulla tzoti' yin̈ Comam .
66007012	Yalni ebnaj haca' ti' : -- ¡ Hacojab tu' ! Ha'n̈ehojab yin̈ Comam Dios challax tzoti' c'ul , yeb ta caw ay ismay , yeb ta caw ay yitz'atil iswi' . Ha'n̈e'ojab tet Comam Dios chiak'lax yuch'andiosal , han̈e Comam caw ay yelapnoj yeb caw ay yip , yeb caw ay ishelanil yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . ¡ Hacojab tu' ! ẍi anma .
66007013	Isk'amben hune' naj anciano wetan : -- ¿ Mac anmahil huntek'an saj xil isk'ap ti' yeb bay titnacoj ? ẍi naj wetan .
66007014	Intak'wihan tet naj : -- Mamin , hach hawohtaj , walinan mach wohtajojan , quinchiyan . Yalni naj wetan : -- Ha' anma chawil ti' ispeto xol hune' niman isya'tajil , xatx'ahlaxilo ismul yu ischiq'uil Comam oc xahanbalil , haca' ta xaistx'ah anma xil isk'ap , caw xin saj elcanicoj .
66007015	Yuxin ayco anma tu' sata Comam ayco yul istz'on̈obal , chi-xin-munla yul yatut Comam tz'ayical ak'balil . Ha' xin Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal chitan̈en anma tu' yuto ayco Comam Dios yetbiho anma .
66007016	Matxa xin chak'le anma wahil yeb tajinti'al , yeb matxa chak'le anma k'a' nitam chitz'ato yu yoj tz'ayic .
66007017	Yuto Comam oc xahanbalil ayco yictabal bay tz'on̈an Comam Dios , ha' Comam chitan̈eni , haca' chu istan̈elax no' me' cat yilaxto no' uc'u' ha' , hac tu' xin chu yinito Comam anma tu' yin̈ hune' ha ha' chiak'ni k'inale . Haxa Comam tu' chisunilo yal sat anma , ẍi naj .
66008001	Haxa yet istzilnilo Comam oc xahanbalil ishuj sello ayco yin̈ te' hum tu' , aymi yictajo hora matxa tzet bili yul satcan̈ .
66008002	Lahwi tu' wilnihan hujwan̈ ebnaj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ sata Comam Dios , yak'lax hujeb ch'en trompeta tet ebnaj .
66008003	Lahwi tu' yul hune'xa naj 'angel ik'bil hune' ch'en lesen naba oro yu naj , yoc lin̈no naj sata meẍa ayco sata istz'on̈obal Comam Dios , caw xin tx'i'al pom ak'lax tet naj . Yoc naj isn̈usno yiban̈ meẍa naba oro , yalten naj tet Comam Dios yeb istxah anma yetxa Comam yehi .
66008004	Chi-xin-ah topton isn̈ubal pom yul isk'ab naj , yapni isxuk'al sam sata Comam Dios yeb istxah anma yetxa Comam .
66008005	Lahwi tu' , isnotzen naj 'angel ch'en lesen yu tzak'ak' ayato yiban̈ meẍa , isk'ojnayti naj yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ; yin̈n̈ena tu' xin isbili c'uh , isn̈irlahi isjepla c'uh yec'paxo chixcab .
66008006	Iswatx'en isba ebnaj hujwan̈ 'angel yun̈e yok'tzen ebnaj istrompeta .
66008007	Hayet yok'tzen naj babel 'angel istrompeta , yalaxti ch'en sajbat yeb k'a k'a' soman ye yeb chic' yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' , istz'ato hune' isyox majan tx'o tx'otx' yeb hune' isyox majan te te' , istz'apaxcanto sunilej te' telaj caw yax .
66008008	Haxa yet yok'tzen naj iscab 'angel istrompeta , isk'ojlaxayto hune' haca' witz ayco k'a' yin̈ xol ha' mar ; hac tu' xin hune' yox majan ha' mar tu' meltzoco chic'al .
66008009	Hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo no nok' ay xol ha' mar tu' camiloj . Hanic'xan̈epaxo mach yictajo te' barco etaxtoj .
66008010	Haxa yet yok'tzen naj yox 'angel istrompeta , yayc'ayti hune' niman tx'umel yul satcan̈ , ayco k'a' yin̈ haca' hunu antorcha . Hune' tx'umel tu' , hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo ha ha' bay ayc'ayi yebpaxo yiban̈ isnuk' ha ha' .
66008011	Hune' tx'umel tu' C'ah isbi , hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo ha' c'ahbilo yu , caw xin hantan̈e anma camilo yu ha' yuto c'ahbilo ha' .
66008012	Haxa yet yok'tzen naj iscan̈ 'angel istrompeta , caw etza hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo ismujlubal tz'ayic tan̈iloj yebpaxo xin ixahaw yebej tx'umel . Hac tu' xin hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo tz'ayical mujli tz'ayic , yebpaxo xin etza yictaxan̈e ak'balil mujli ixahaw yebej tx'umel .
66008013	Lahwi tu' wilnihan yec' hune' naj 'angel haca' no' t'iw satcan̈ , wabenan yel yaw yin̈ caw ip : -- ¡ C'anch'an anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal yuto oxebto isya'tajil chihuli yet chiyok'tzen ebnaj oxwan̈ 'angel istrompeta ! ẍi .
66009001	Haxa yet yok'tzen naj isho' 'angel istrompeta , wilnihan yayc'ayti hune' tx'umel satcan̈ , yak'lax islahwehal hune' niman xab tet tx'umel tu' .
66009002	Ishajni hune' tx'umel tu' isti' hune' niman xab tu' , yichico yahti topton n̈ub yeb jak'ek' yul , haca' yelti n̈ub yul hunu horno , isk'ejholilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
66009003	Xol n̈ub tu' xin ahilo huntek'an no nok' haca' no' k'ul , ispujnato no' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yak'lax yip no' ischiwa yin̈ anma ; haca' istzawal no' c'olotx , hac tu' istzawal no' .
66009004	Yallax tet no' ta mach chetato no' te' telaj ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yebej yaxla tz'unub , yebej te te' . Cachann̈e anma machi yechel Comam Dios yin̈ ispalan̈ , ha' cheta no' .
66009005	Yaja' hallax tet no' ta mach mak'bil ispotx'ni no' anma , to ton̈e ch'ak'lax ec'oya' yanma anma yulbal howeb ixahaw ; ha' xin isya'il chichiwa no' lahan isya'il haca' bay chitzahwa no' c'olotx .
66009006	Yin̈ hune' tiempohal tu' chissay anma yin̈ tzet chu iscami , yaja' matxa naj camical , yeb waxan̈ca caw choche anma chicami yaja' matxatic'a chicami .
66009007	Huntek'an no' k'ul tu' , lahan jilni no' haca' no' cheh istoxa yin̈ howal , ayahto hunun corona naba oro yin̈ iswi' no' , lahan xin jilni sat no' yeb anma .
66009008	Haxa xil iswi' no' lahan jilni haca' xil iswi' ebix ix , haxa yeh no' lahan haca' yeh no' balam .
66009009	Ayco huntek'an ch'en ch'en naba hierro yet howal yin̈ istxam isc'ul no' . Haca' xin isn̈irn̈on tx'i'al te' caret ik'bil yu no' cheh yet chito no' yin̈ howal , hac tu' isbili isxic' no' .
66009010	Wal isn̈e no' lahan jilni haca' isn̈e no' c'olotx , nohnaco istzahwal no' yin̈ . Ha' xin isn̈e no' tu' ay yip yak'ni ec'oya' yanma anma yulbal howeb ixahaw .
66009011	Ha' naj ayco yahawilo yin̈ hune' niman xab tu' , ha' naj yahawilpaxo yin̈ huntek'an no nok' tu' . Abad'on isbi naj yin̈ abxubal hebreo , haxa yin̈ abxubal griego Apoli'on isbi naj .
66009012	Ec'to hune' babel isya'tajil , yaja' ayto cabebxa .
66009013	Hayet yok'tzen naj iswaj 'angel istrompeta , wabenan yahwi xolbal can̈eb yuc'a' hune' meẍa naba oro ayco sata Comam Dios .
66009014	Yalni hune' yul nuk'e tet naj iswaj 'angel yok'tze istrompeta tu' : -- As puhilo ebnaj can̈wan̈ 'angel c'alan bey isti' ha' Eufrates , ẍi .
66009015	Ispuhlaxilo ebnaj can̈wan̈ 'angel tu' yun̈e istan̈tzenilo ebnaj hanic'xan̈e mach yictajo anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . T'in̈anxatic'a ye ebnaj iswatx'en hune' tu' yin̈ hune' hora tu' , yin̈ hune' tz'ayic tu' , yin̈ hune' ixahaw tu' , yeb yin̈ hune' habilal tu' .
66009016	Wabenan yallaxi tato cab cien mill'on isbisil ebnaj ak'om howal ayahto yiban̈ cheh .
66009017	Wilnihan no' cheh tu' . Ha' xin ebnaj ayahto yiban̈ no' ayco huntek'an ch'en xilk'ape yet howal yin̈ istxam isc'ul ebnaj . Ha' ch'en tu' caj jilni ch'en haca' k'a k'a' , yaxmutz'mun̈e jilnipaxo ch'en haca' ch'en azufre , k'an jilnipaxo ch'en haca' ch'en bronce . Wal no' cheh tu' , lahan jilni iswi' no' haca' iswi' no' balam , chi-xin-elti k'a k'a' yeb n̈ub yeb azufre yul isti' no' .
66009018	Caw xin hune' yox majan anma camilo yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu oxeb isya'tajil ti' , ha' ton k'a k'a' , yeb n̈ub , yeb azufre chielti yul isti' no' cheh .
66009019	Yuto yin̈ isti' no' yeb yin̈ isn̈e no' ak'bil yip , yuto isn̈e no' ay iswi' haca' iswi' laba , ha' xin isn̈e no' chiak'ni ec'oya' yanma anma .
66009020	Yaja' huntek'an anma mach cam yu huntek'an isya'tajil tu' , maẍtic'a isbejcano istx'ojal , yeb maẍtic'a xin isbej yinayo isba tet ischejab naj matzwalil , yeb tetej tioẍ watx'ebil yin̈ ch'en oro , ch'en plata , ch'en bronce , yeb yin̈ej ch'en ch'en yeb yin̈ te te' . Huntek'an tioẍ tu' mach chu yilni , mach chabe , yeb mach chu yeq'ui .
66009021	Maẍtic'a xin isbejpaxcano anma ispotx'wahi , iscunli , yixli yeb iswinajli , yeb xin yelk'awi .
66010001	Lahwi tu' , wilnihan hune' naj 'angel caw ay yip , tit yul satcan̈ xol moyan , aycan̈ xin hune' no' ch'er yiban̈ iswi' naj . Caw xin chitzejla sat naj haca' istzejla tz'ayic , haxa yoj naj xin haca' xaj k'a k'a' chiah joplahi , hac tu' jilni .
66010002	Ay xin hune' te' nich'an hum ik'bil yu naj , leyanto te' ; yanayo naj hune' yoj yin̈ iswatx'k'ab yiban̈ ha' mar , haxa hunxa yoj naj yin̈ ismeck'ab yayo yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' .
66010003	Yawi naj yin̈ caw ip haca' yel yaw no' balam . Hayet yawi naj isn̈irla hujeb c'uh , yalni tzoti' .
66010004	Hayet lahwi istzotel hujeb c'uh tu' , wocan intz'ibn̈enojan walnihan . Yaja' wabenan hune' yul nuk'e satcan̈ halni haca' ti' : -- Ton̈e chac'ubacano huntek'an maxawabe ti' , mach chatz'ibn̈ecanoj , ẍi wetan .
66010005	Naj 'angel ayayo yoj yiban̈ ha' mar yeb yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' wiltu'an , yican̈ naj iswatx'k'ab satcan̈ ,
66010006	yanico naj Comam testigohal , Comam itzitzn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tz'ayic , Comam watx'en̈e satcan̈ yeb sunil tzet ay satcan̈ , Comam watx'en̈e tx'o tx'otx' yeb sunil tzet ay sat tx'otx' , Comam watx'en̈e ha' mar yeb sunil tzet ay xol ha' , yalni naj haca' ti' : -- Tinan̈ matxa chiec' tiempo ,
66010007	yuto hayet ch'ok'tzeno naj ishuj 'angel istrompeta cat yijnocano isba tzet ewan yehi , huntek'an nabiltic'a yu Comam Dios , haca'tic'a yu yalni Comam tet ebnaj ischejab yet payat , ẍi naj .
66010008	Hune' yul nuk'e wabetic'ahan yul satcan̈ , tzotelpaxayti wetan , yalni haca' ti' : -- As ilo hune' nich'an hum leyanayo yul isk'ab naj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ yiban̈ ha' mar yeb yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' , ẍi wetan .
66010009	Intohan ink'annolojan hune' nich'an hum tu' tet naj , istak'wi naj wetan : -- Ay te' lah , loto te' , hayet chalono te' caw chi' chieloco yul hati' yu te' , haca' ischi'al no' cab , wal yul hac'ul xin caw c'ah chielicoj , ẍi naj wetan .
66010010	Inchahnilojan te' tet naj 'angel tu' , inlonitojan te' , caw xin chi' elico yul inti'an yu te' , wal yul inc'ulan xin caw c'ah elicoj yet lahwi inlonihan te' .
66010011	Lahwi tu' yallaxpaxo wetan : -- Caw yilal hawalni hunelxa yin̈ tzet chute yalni Comam Dios yin̈ tx'i'alej niẍte con̈ob yeb nimeta con̈ob , yeb tx'i'al abxubal yeb yin̈ ebnaj rey , ẍi wetan .
66011001	Lahwi tu' yak'lax hune' malbal wetan , haca' te' ah . Yallax wetan haca' ti' : -- Ahan̈wanoj cat hawoc hamalen yatut Comam Dios yebpaxo meẍa yet xahanbal , cat habisni hanta mac ayicto yinoyo isba tet Comam .
66011002	Yaja' wal yamak'il yeb yin̈la ishoyanil mach chamale yuto chiak'lax tet ebnaj nan con̈obal , cat isxan̈nayo ebnaj iscon̈ob Comam Dios yulbal cuarenta y dos ixahaw .
66011003	Chiwatijan cawan̈ inchejaban chak' isba yalnilo intzoti'an yulbal mil doscientos sesenta tz'ayic . Ayco huntek'an xilk'ape yet bisc'ulal yin̈ ebnaj , ẍi wetan .
66011004	Yechel ebnaj cawan̈ ti' ye te' cabeb yoj olivo yeb ch'en cabeb candelero bay chiahto cantil ayco sata Comam Dios , Comam yahaw tx'o tx'otx' .
66011005	Ta ay mac choche chioc etloco yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ ti' chielti k'a' yul isti' ebnaj , cat isn̈usnicanto ebnaj mac chichiwa isc'ul yin̈ ebnaj . Hac tu' chu iscamcanilo macta chiwatx'en istx'ojal yin̈ ebnaj .
66011006	Aypaxo yip ebnaj ismajchen satcan̈ yun̈e matxa chak' ha' n̈ab yulbal tz'ayic bay chal ebnaj Istzoti' Comam . Aypaxo yip ebnaj yanico ha ha' chic'al , yebpaxo xin ay yip ebnaj yak'ni ec'oya' yanma anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' yu ej isya'tajil , hantatic'a el choche isc'ul ebnaj .
66011007	Hayet chilahwi yalnic'o ebnaj cawan̈ tu' Istzoti' Comam Dios , ay hune' naj Nok' isbi chiahilo yul hune' niman xab ; chaco naj howal yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu' cat isk'oji naj yin̈ ebnaj , cat ispotx'lax ebnaj yu naj Nok' isbi tu' . Yanico naj Nok' isbi howal yin̈ ebnaj , chiahilo yul hune' niman xab . Chik'oji naj yin̈ ebnaj cawan̈ tu'
66011008	Chicancano pac'no isnimanil ebnaj yul iscallehal hune' niman con̈ob bay alaxcan̈ Comam Jesucristo yin̈ te' culus , Comam Yahawil ebnaj . Hune' con̈ob tu' challax Sodoma yeb Egipto yin̈ , ha' chalniloj ta tx'oj tzet chiswatx'e .
66011009	Sunil anma nananta con̈obal , nananta anmahil , nananta yabxubal , nananta nime con̈obal chiilni isnimanil ebnaj yulbal yicta iscan̈ tz'ayic ; mach chisje anma ta chimujlax ebnaj .
66011010	Yuxin sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' caw oc yin̈ tzalahilal yu iscamical ebnaj . Yak'ni anma sabehal tet hunun yu tzalahilal , yuto ebnaj cawan̈ ischejab Comam tu' caw yak' ebnaj ec'oya' yanma anma .
66011011	Lahwin̈e yicta iscan̈ tz'ayic tu' , yulcan̈ isc'ul ebnaj cawan̈ tu' yu Comam Dios , yahwano ebnaj . Ha' xin sunil anma ilni hune' tu' caw occano xiwquilal yin̈ .
66011012	Yaben ebnaj cawan̈ tu' hune' yul nuk'e awi yin̈ caw ip yul satcan̈ , yalni haca' ti' : -- Ahan̈weti bey ti' , ẍi tet ebnaj . Isto ebnaj satcan̈ xol hune' moyan , sunil ebnaj ayco ishowal yin̈ ebnaj ilni hune' tu' .
66011013	Yin̈ena tu' yec' hune' niman chixcab istan̈ilo hune' islahon̈eb majan te' n̈a yul hune' niman con̈ob tu' , hujeb mil anma cam yu hune' chixcab tu' . Wal anma mach cami caw xiwi , yanico ismay Comam Dios ay yul satcan̈ .
66011014	Hac tu' yu yec'to iscab isya'tajil , tinan̈ xin yichixapaxico hune' isyox isya'tajil .
66011015	Hayet yok'tzen naj ishuj 'angel istrompeta yabelax hune' yul nuk'e awi yin̈ caw ip yul satcan̈ , yalni : Sunil tzet ay yip yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chioccano yul isk'ab Comam Dios Jahawil yeb yul isk'ab Comam Jesucristo , cat yoccano yahawil yin̈ sunilbal tiempo , ẍi .
66011016	Wal ebnaj veinticuatro anciano tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal sata Comam Dios ay jahno ebnaj , yay xulno ebnaj , yanico ebnaj ismay Comam .
66011017	Yalni ebnaj : Mam Jahawil , hach ti' coDiosalan̈ , caw aycano hawip . Ayach tinan̈ , ayach yet yalan̈tocanoj yeb yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Chijak'an̈ yuch'andiosal tawet yuto chachoc hay'ebaloj ta caw aycano hawip , yeb xin cachichico hawoc yahawil .
66011018	Caw tit ishowal ej con̈ob tawin̈ , yaja' maapni istiempohal hawanayo isya'tajil yiban̈ anma . Maapnipaxo istiempohal hawilni yin̈ tzet chielico ej camom , cat hawak'ni ispaj selel tet ebnaj hachejab yet payat , ebnaj chihalnic'o Hatzoti' . Chawak'nipaxo ispaj selel tet sunil mac hawetxa yehi yeb macta chixiw tawet , macta ay yelapnoj , yeb macta mach yelapnoj , cat hatan̈tzencanilo macta chietanto anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' , ẍi ebnaj .
66011019	Lahwi tu' , ishajni isba yatut Comam Dios yul satcan̈ , chi-xin-jilicto hune' caẍa yet istrato Comam ayicto yul yatut tu' . Yichico isjepla c'uh , isk'an̈i satcan̈ , isn̈irlapaxoj , yec' hune' chixcab , yak'nipaxo hune' niman sajbat .
66012001	Lahwi tu' xin , isyeni isba hune' niman yechel yul satcan̈ . Wilnihan hune' ix ix hoyanico isk'ak'al tz'ayic yin̈ haca' xilk'ape , ayayo ixahaw yalan̈ yoj ix , ayco xin cablahon̈eb tx'umel iscoronaho ix yin̈ iswi' .
66012002	Hune' ix tu' ayxa tzet ye ix , caw xin chiawi ix yu isya'il yuto iswatx'ixa isc'ul ix .
66012003	Isyenipaxocan̈ isba hune'xa yechel yul satcan̈ , wilnihan hune' mac haca' no' nimeta drag'on cajin̈ , hujeb iswi' yeb xin lahon̈eb yuc'a' , ayahto xin corona yin̈ hunun iswi' no' .
66012004	Hune' xin isyox majan tx'umel isn̈ic'ti no' yu isn̈e , isk'ojnayti no' sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' . Islin̈bacan̈ isba no' sata ix iswatx'ixa isc'ul tu' yun̈e isc'uxnayto no' nich'an unin tu' yet chipitzc'ahi .
66012005	Lahwi tu' ispitzc'a nich'an iswinaj unin ix . Ha' naj tu' xin chioc yahawilo sunilej con̈ob , ayco xin hune' isvara naj naba hierro yul isk'ab , yaj ilaxilo nich'an yunin ix tu' , yilaxto tet Comam Dios bay ay istz'on̈obal .
66012006	Wal ix tu' elcan̈ ix , isto ix bey tx'otx' desierto . Ha' bey tu' c'ulxa ye hune' yehobal ix yu Comam , yak'lax tzet chislo ix yulbal mil doscientos sesenta tz'ayic .
66012007	Lahwi tu' yoc hune' niman howal yul satcan̈ . Naj 'angel Miguel yeb ebnaj y'angel tzujan yintaj , yak'le ebnaj howal yeb no' drag'on yeb y'angel no' .
66012008	Yaja' xin mach k'oji no' drag'on tu' yeb y'angel , matxa xin hamanil tet no' yeb y'angel yul satcan̈ .
66012009	Hac tu' xin yu yilaxilti no' drag'on tu' yul satcan̈ . Ha' ton hune' mac tu' yuteco isba labahil yet payat , chihallax diablohal yeb Satan'as , ha' xin ch'ak'ni subchaho anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . K'ojlaxayti no' drag'on tu' yeb y'angel sat tx'o tx'otx' .
66012010	Lahwi tu' , wabenan hune' yul nuk'e yul satcan̈ yin̈ caw ip , yalni haca' ti' : Wal tinan̈ mahul colbanile , chisyelo Comam Dios yip cat yoc yahawil , cat isyelaxpaxilo yip Comam Cristo , yuto xak'ojlaxayto naj ak'omc'ule yin̈ ebnaj juẍtaj yeb yin̈ ebix janab , naj aytic'aco ak'oc'ule hunun tz'ayic yeb hunun ak'bal tet Comam Dios .
66012011	Xak'oji ebnaj juẍta yin̈ naj yu ischiq'uil Comam oc xahanbalil , yeb yu yak' isba ebnaj yalnic'o Istzoti' Comam . Mach xiw ebnaj yanico isba yul isk'ab camical , to caw ishin isba ebnaj iscami .
66012012	¡ Yuxin tzalahojab satcan̈ yeb mac ay yul satcan̈ ! Yaja' c'anch'anex hex ayex sat tx'o tx'otx' yeb tzet ay xol ha' mar , yuto sunil ishowal naj matzwalil maayapno texol , yuto yohta naj ta hanic'xan̈e tiempo ayc'o naj , ẍiaytij .
66012013	Hayet yilni no' drag'on tu' ta k'ojlaxayti no' sat tx'otx' , yoc no' istzumbenoc'o ix pitzc'a nich'an iswinaj unin tu' .
66012014	Yaja' xin ak'lax cabeb isxic' ix caw nimej haca' xic' no' t'iw , yah ix satcan̈ , isto ix bey tx'otx' desierto bay ay hune' yehobal ix yu Comam , yun̈e nahat chielcano ix tet no' drag'on tu' . Ha' tu' xin ak'lax tzet chislo ix yulbal yicta iscan̈ habil .
66012015	Wal no' drag'on tu' yalti no' hune' niman ha' yul isti' yun̈e yijlaxto ix yu ha' niman ha' tu' .
66012016	Yaja' xin colwa tx'o tx'otx' yin̈ ix , yuto yuc'to tx'otx' ha' yalti no' yul isti' .
66012017	Caw tit ishowal no' drag'on tu' yin̈ ix , isto no' yanoco howal yin̈ huntek'an yunin ix , ha' ton mac chiyijen ischejbanil Comam Dios yeb ebnaj chibeybaln̈e iscuybanil Comam Jesucristo .
66013001	Lahwi tu' isto no' drag'on islin̈banocan̈ isba xol arena isti' ha' mar . Wilnihan yahilo hune' mac Nok' isbi xol ha' mar tu' , hujeb iswi' , lahon̈eb xin yuc'a' . Ayahto hunun iscorona hunun yuc'a' yin̈ hunun iswi' mac Nok' isbi tu' . Yin̈ hunun iswi' tu' tz'ibn̈ebilico hune' bihe , tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Dios .
66013002	Hune' mac Nok' isbi wiltu'an , lahan jilni yeb no' nime tz'ibin̈ balam , wal yoj xin lahan jilni yeb yoj no' oso , haxa isti' lahan jilni haca' isti' no' balam . Yak'ni no' drag'on tu' sunil yip yeb istz'on̈obal , yeb iscan̈il ye tet hune' mac Nok' isbi tu' .
66013003	Ay xin hune' iswi' mac Nok' isbi tu' , ayco hune' islahwilal chiak'ni camoj , yaja' xin an̈cha islahwilal . Caw xin c'ayilo isc'ul sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu hune' tu' . Yoc tzujno anma yinta hune' mac Nok' isbi tu' .
66013004	Yoc anma yinoyo isba tet no' drag'on yuto ha' ak'n̈e yip naj Nok' isbi . Yocpaxo anma yinoyo isba tet naj Nok' isbi tu' , chalni anma haca' ti' : -- ¿ Mac hunu chu islahban isba yeb hune' mac Nok' isbi ti' , yeb mactaxca chu yak'len howal yebi ? ẍi anma .
66013005	Hune' mac Nok' isbi tu' chahlax tzoteloj , islolo'n̈en isba yalni nimeta tzoti' , yalnipaxo tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios . Yak'laxpaxo yip yoc yahawilo yulbal cuarenta y dos ixahaw .
66013006	Yoc yalno tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios , isbahwapaxo yin̈ isbi Comam , yeb yin̈ yatut Comam , yeb yin̈ mac ay yul satcan̈ .
66013007	Ischahlaxpaxo yanico naj howal yin̈ sunil macta yetxa Comam Dios , isk'oji naj yin̈ . Yak'laxpaxo yip naj yiban̈ sunil anma , yiban̈ ej con̈ob , yiban̈ ej anma nananta yabxubal , yeb yiban̈ ej nime con̈ob .
66013008	Yinayo isba sunil anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' tet naj Nok' isbi tu' , ha' ton mac yettaxtic'a iswatx'i yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' mach ayoyo isbi yul te' hum yet k'inale yet Comam oc xahanbalil .
66013009	Maquex cheyabe hune' ti' ak'we hayanma hetxumniloj :
66013010	Mac yetxatic'a isto preso , chiilaxto preso , mac yetxatic'a ispotxlax yu ch'en espada , chipotx'lax yu ch'en espada . Yuxin han̈on̈ yuninal Comam Dios hon̈ ti' , caw yilal janico janma yin̈ Comam , yeb niman chijute coc'ul jak'ni techaho isya'tajil .
66013011	Lahwi tu' xin wilnihan yahilo hune'xa mac haca' hunu no' niman nok' yul tx'otx' . Hune' no nok' tu' ay cabeb yuc'a' no' lahan jilni yeb yuc'a' no' Me' . Haca' xin istzotel no' drag'on hac tu' istzotel no' .
66013012	Caw xin lahan yip no' yeb no' babel , chisyenilo no' yip yun̈e isyijelax tet no' babel tu' . Hac tu' xin sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chiyo isba tet no' babel tu' , no' an̈cha hune' islahwilal .
66013013	Chisyeni no' iscab tu' huntek'an nimeta c'aybalc'ule yeb chu yinayti no' k'a k'a' satcan̈ yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' yin̈ sat sunil anma .
66013014	Hac tu' xin chu yak'ni subchaho no' anma yu huntek'an c'aybalc'ule chiak'lax iswatx'e' no' yin̈ sat no' babel tu' . Ischejni no' iscab tu' sunil anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' iswatx'eno hune' yechel no' lahwina yu ch'en espada , yaj itzitztopaxoj .
66013015	Yak'lax yip no' iscab tu' yak'ni isk'inal yechel no' babel tu' yun̈e istzoteli yeb yu yak'ni camo macta mach chiyo isba tet yechel no' babel tu' .
66013016	Ischejni no' yalaxoco yechel anma yin̈ iswatx'k'ab maca yin̈ ispalan̈ . Caw sunil anma occano yechel , niẍte unin yeb ichamta anma , anma k'alom yeb anma meba' , anma chejab yeb anma yet isba ischuquil .
66013017	Machi xin hunu mac chu islok'wi yeb istxon̈wi ta mach ayoco yechel no' yin̈ , hune' yechel tu' ha' ton isbi no' , maca isnumerohal isbi no' .
66013018	Hune' ti' choche yitz'atil wi'e . Ha' mac ay yitz'atil iswi' , istxumabilo yin̈ tzet yelapno isnumerohal mac Nok' isbi . Hune' numero tu' isnumero anma yehi , ha' ton numero seis cientos sesenta y seis .
66014001	Lahwi tu' wilnihan Comam oc xahanbalil lin̈ancan̈ yiban̈ iswi' witz Si'on ; ayco ciento cuarenta y cuatro mil anma isc'atan̈ . Tz'ibn̈ebilico isbi Comam oc xahanbalil yeb isbi Ismam Comam oc xahanbalil tu' yin̈ ispalan̈ huntek'an anma tu' .
66014002	Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e yul satcan̈ haca' isbili ha' nime ha' , yeb haca' isn̈irla c'uh , yeb haca' yet caw tx'i'al mac chianico te' arpa .
66014003	Chanic'o hune' ac' bit sata istz'on̈obal Comam Dios , yeb sata ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in , yeb sata ebnaj anciano . Caw xin machi hunu mac chu iscuyni hune' bit tu' , cachann̈e ebnaj ciento cuarenta y cuatro mil colchalo xol anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
66014004	Huntek'an ebnaj tu' , maẍtic'a hunu ix yik' ebnaj , machi hunu mule iswatx'e ebnaj yeb hunu ix . Caw tzujann̈etic'a ebnaj yinta Comam oc xahanbalil bayxan̈etu'wal ch'ec' Comam . Ebnaj tu' colchalo ebnaj xol anma , yuxin lahan ebnaj haca' babel sat tz'unub chiak'lax tet Comam Dios yeb tet Comam oc xahanbalil .
66014005	Caw machi nich'ano lek'ti'al ilchalo yin̈ ebnaj , caw machi nich'ano ismul ebnaj sata Comam Dios .
66014006	Lahwi tu' wilnihan hune'xa naj 'angel chiec' yictabal satcan̈ , ik'bil Tzoti' yet colbanile mach istan̈bal yu naj yu yalnic'o naj tet anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ; tzijxan̈e nime con̈obal , tzijxan̈e anmahil , tzijxan̈e abxubal chala , yeb tzijxan̈e niẍte con̈obal .
66014007	Chalni naj 'angel tu' yin̈ caw ip : -- Xiwan̈we tet Comam Dios cat heyanico ismay , yuto maapni yorahil yilni Comam yin̈ tzet chielico anma . Iweyo heba tet Comam watx'en̈e satcan̈ yeb tx'o tx'otx' yeb ha' mar yebej isnuk' ha ha' , ẍi naj .
66014008	Tzujan hune'xa naj 'angel yinta naj babel tu' , yalni naj iscab tu' : Wal tinan̈ maayc'ay niman con̈ob Babilonia , yuto ha' oc uc'tzenocan̈ sunilej con̈ob yu istx'ojal iswi' yin̈ ixloj yeb yin̈ winajloj , ẍi naj .
66014009	Tzujanxa xin yalni naj yox 'angel yin̈ caw ip : -- Ta ay mac chiyiyo isba tet naj Nok' isbi yeb tet yechel naj , cat ischahnico yechel isbi naj yin̈ ispalan̈ maca yin̈ isk'ab ,
66014010	chitit hune' niman isya'tajil yiban̈ yu Comam Dios . Haca' vino caw how chiuc'laxi caw machi nino issomil ayayto xol , hac tu' ishowal Comam Dios chiay yiban̈ huntek'an anma tu' . Chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma xol k'a k'a' yeb azufre yin̈ sat sunil ebnaj y'angel Comam Dios , yeb yin̈ sat Comam oc xahanbalil .
66014011	Hune' bay chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma ebnaj tu' ayn̈etic'aco yah isn̈ubal yin̈ sunilbal tiempo . Tz'ayic , ak'bal machi nino xewilal chiak'lax tet macta chiyo isba tet naj Nok' isbi tu' yeb chiyo isba tet yechel naj , yeb chichahni yechel isbi naj yin̈ ispalan̈ maca yin̈ isk'ab , ẍi naj .
66014012	Yuxin sunil macta yetxa Comam Dios yehi , macta chiyijen ischejbanil Comam yeb chaco yanma yin̈ Comam Jes'us , yilal niman chute isc'ul yak'ni techahoj .
66014013	Lahwi tu' wabenan hune' yul nuk'e awi yul satcan̈ , yalni wetan haca' ti' : -- Tz'ibn̈ecano hune' ti' : " Sak'al yet mac chicam yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios yin̈ tz'ayic chihul cosata ti' , " ẍi . Yalnipaxo Comam Esp'iritu haca' ti' : " Ho' caw yeli , huntek'an anma chicam tu' chixew yin̈ sunil ismunil . Sunil isc'ulal iswatx'e yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chiak'lax ispaj selel tet yu Comam , " ẍi Comam Esp'iritu , ẍi yul satcan̈ .
66014014	Lahwi tu' wilnihan hune' moyan caw saj , tz'on̈anayo hune' mac haca' anma jilni yiban̈ hune' moyan tu' . Ayahto hune' corona naba oro yin̈ iswi' , ik'bil hune' ch'en c'upbal trigo yu , caw ayahti yeh .
66014015	Lahwi tu' yelti hune'xa naj 'angel yul yatut Comam Dios , yawi naj yin̈ caw ip tet mac tz'on̈anayo yiban̈ hune' moyan tu' haca' ti' : -- Ocan̈ hac'upucan̈ ixim trigo , yuto k'anxa ixim , istiempohalxa isc'uplaxcan̈ ixim sat tx'o tx'otx' , ẍi naj .
66014016	Yin̈n̈ena tu' yanicto hune' mac tz'on̈anayo yiban̈ moyan tu' isc'upom trigo xol ixim , isc'upnican̈ naj ixim trigo sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' .
66014017	Lahwi tu' yelilo hune'xa naj 'angel yul yatut Comam Dios yul satcan̈ , yetbipaxo naj hune' ch'en c'upbal uva caw ay yeh .
66014018	Yelpaxilo hune'xa naj 'angel bay ay meẍa yet xahanbal , hune' naj 'angel tu' ay yip naj yiban̈ k'a k'a' . Yawi naj yin̈ caw ip tet naj ik'n̈e ch'en c'upom uva : -- Acto ha' c'upom uva xol te' uva ay sat tx'o tx'otx' cat hac'upnilo te' , yuto k'anxa te' , ẍi naj .
66014019	Yoc naj 'angel tu' isc'upno sunil te' uva ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' , yanayto naj te' yul hune' niman bay chixan̈laxilti yal te' . Hune' ti' chal yelapno yin̈ hune' niman isya'tajil chitit yu Comam Dios .
66014020	Ha' xin istxam con̈ob xan̈laxilti yal te' uva tu' , yelilo chic' bay yatz'lax yal te' , isto lehno chic' tu' , caw nahat ah ispimal , ah apno yin̈ isti' no' cheh bay cachan yec' isfreno no' , wal bay to lehno chic' tu' aymi hunu ochenta legua yucoj .
66015001	Wilnihan hune'xa yechel yul satcan̈ , caw ay yelapnoj yeb caw c'aybalc'ule jilni . Wilan hujwan̈ ebnaj 'angel ik'n̈e hujeb majan islahobal isya'tajil , ha' yin̈ huntek'an isya'tajil tu' bay chiyijcano isba ishowal Comam Dios .
66015002	Wilnipaxojan hune' haca' ha' mar leyantoj , haca' ch'en vidrio jilni , soman ye yeb k'a k'a' . Ay xin huntek'an anma lin̈ancan̈ yiban̈ hune' haca' ha' mar tu' , ik'bil yarpa ak'bil yu Comam Dios . Huntek'an anma tu' ha' ton sunil mac k'oji yin̈ naj Nok' isbi yeb yin̈ yechel naj , yeb yin̈ isnumerohal isbi naj .
66015003	Chanic'o anma tu' isbit naj Mois'es ischejab Comam Dios , yeb isbit Comam oc xahanbalil , chalni anma tu' : Hach Jahawil , yeb hach coDiosalan̈ caw sunil tzettaj ye tu' chu hawatx'eni . Caw aycano yelapno sunil tzet ye tu' watx'ebil hawu yeb chic'ay coc'ul jilni . Istoholal yeb isyelal chawala . Hach ti' yahawilach yin̈ sunilej con̈ob .
66015004	Mam Jahawil , caw sunil anma chixiw tawet cat yanico hamay , yuto hachn̈ech'an caw c'ulach , machi nich'ano istx'ojal tawin̈ . Chitit anma yul hunun con̈ob cat yinayo isba tasataj , yuto maxawil yin̈ istoholal yin̈ tzet chielico anma , ẍi anma tu' .
66015005	Lahwi tu' wilnihan ishajni isba yatut Comam Dios yul satcan̈ , hune' bay c'uwan istrato Comam Dios .
66015006	Yul yatut Comam tu' elilo hujwan̈ ebnaj 'angel yeb hujeb majan isya'tajil . Ayco huntek'an k'ap lino caw saj xilo isk'ap ebnaj , caw xin chitzejtzoni , yeb xin naba oro issincho ebnaj aycoj , nime ispak'o sat chiah apno yalan̈ istxam isc'ul ebnaj .
66015007	Hune' naj xol ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in ak'ni hunun vaso naba oro tet hunun ebnaj hujwan̈ 'angel tu' . Huntek'an vaso tu' nohna yu ishowal Comam Dios , Comam itzitzn̈etic'a yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
66015008	Caw nohilo yul yatut Comam Dios tu' yu n̈ub yu isk'ak'al yip Comam . Machi xin hunu mac chu yocto bey tu' masanta chijcano isba hujeb majan isya'tajil ik'bil yu ebnaj hujwan̈ 'angel tu' .
66016001	Lahwi tu' wabenan yelilti yaw hune' yul nuk'e yin̈ caw ip yul yatut Comam Dios , yalni tet ebnaj hujwan̈ 'angel : -- As jobweyo ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul hunun vaso ti' yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' , ẍi naj .
66016002	Isto naj babel 'angel isjobnoyo ishowal Comam ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ tx'o tx'otx' . Yelilo huntek'an yabil caw how yeb caw tx'oj yin̈ isnimanil anma ayco yechel naj Nok' isbi yin̈ , yeb macta yiyo isba tet yechel naj .
66016003	Lahwi tu' isjobnayo naj iscab 'angel ishowal Comam ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ ha' mar yin̈n̈ena tu' xin , iscajpon̈ilo ha' haca' ischiq'uil hunu mac chipotx'lax camoj . Iscamilo sunil no nok' itzitz ay xol ha' .
66016004	Lahwi tu' isjobnayo naj yox 'angel ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ ej ha' nimeta ha' , yeb yiban̈ isnuk' ha ha' , ismeltzoco ha' chic'al .
66016005	Wabenan yalni naj yahawil ha ha' : Mamin , hach ti' Dios ach , machi nino istx'ojal ayco tawin̈ . Ayach tinan̈ yeb xin ayachxatic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj . Hach ti' caw istoholal chawatx'e , yuto maxawil yin̈ tzet chielico anma ti' .
66016006	Yuto ha' huntek'an anma ti' malnito ischiq'uil huntek'an mac hawetxa yehi yeb ebnaj hachejab yet payat . Tinan̈ xin yet ay anma ti' hawak'ni chic' yuc'u' , ẍi naj .
66016007	Wabenpaxojan yallax bay ay ismeẍahil xahanbal haca' ti' : -- Ho' Mamin , sunil chu hawu . Hach ti' xin chawil yin̈ istoholal yeb isyelal yin̈ tzet chielico anma , ẍi .
66016008	Isjobnayo naj iscan̈ 'angel ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ tz'ayic , yak'lax yip yoj tz'ayic tu' isn̈usnito anma .
66016009	Caw tz'ato anma yu isk'ak'al tz'ayic tu' , yaja' maẍtic'a isna isba , yeb maẍtic'a yiyo isba tet Comam Dios . Wal xin oc anma buchwal yin̈ Comam , Comam ay yip yiban̈ huntek'an isya'tajil ti' .
66016010	Isjobnayo naj isho' 'angel ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul isvaso yiban̈ bay tz'on̈an naj Nok' isbi , iscan sunil tzet ayco yalan̈ yip naj yin̈ k'ejholo . Caw xin chiscach' yak' anma yu isya'tajil ;
66016011	yaja' maẍtic'a isbejcano anma iswatx'en istx'ojal . Wal xin oc anma yala' tzoti' tx'oj yin̈ Comam Dios yu isya'il isya'tajil , yeb yu huntek'an howla yabil elilo yin̈ .
66016012	Isjobnayo naj iswaj 'angel ishowal Comam Dios yayto yul isvaso yiban̈ ha' niman Eufrates . Istajcan̈ ha' yun̈e iscancano isbeh ha' isbeho ebnaj rey chitit bay chiahilo tz'ayic .
66016013	Wilnihan oxwan̈ esp'iritu caw machiswalil haca' jilni no' pahtza' . Hune' elti yul isti' naj chiyij drag'on , hune'xa elti yul isti' naj Nok' isbi , hune'xa xin elti yul isti' naj chisbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios .
66016014	Huntek'an esp'iritu tu' yet naj matzwalil yehi , chisye huntek'an c'aybalc'ule . Isto huntek'an esp'iritu tu' yul sat yiban̈k'inal , yoc iscutxbanico sunil ebnaj rey yin̈ howal yin̈ hune' tz'ayic caw ay yelapno yet Comam Dios , Comam caw aycano yip .
66016015	Yalni Comam oc xahanbalil haca' ti' : -- Abewe tzet chiwalan , chinapni lemnahan haca' chiyu yapni hunu elk'om . Sak'al yet mac chimajwahi yeb chisya'iln̈e xil isk'ap yun̈e mach chiec' t'ilt'oni cat yel istx'ixobal sata anma , ẍi Comam .
66016016	Huntek'an esp'iritu machiswalil tu' ha' cutxbanico ebnaj rey sat hune' tx'o tx'otx' chiyij Armaged'on yin̈ abxubal hebreo .
66016017	Isjobnayo naj ishuj 'angel ishowal Comam Dios ayayto yul isvaso xol jak'ek' . Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e yin̈ caw ip elti yul yatut Comam Dios bay ay istz'on̈obal , yalni haca' ti' : -- Wal tinan̈ mayijcano isba sunil , ẍi .
66016018	Lahwi tu' isjeplahi , isn̈irlapaxoj , isk'an̈ipaxoj , isbili tx'o tx'otx' yu hune' niman chixcab . Maẍtotic'a xin hunu chixcab chiec' haca' hune' tu' yichitax ispitzc'a anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' .
66016019	Wal hune' niman con̈ob caw oxeb ayicoj , yayc'ay sunilej con̈ob ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Isnaniti Comam Dios niman con̈ob Babilonia istit ishowal Comam yin̈ , yaniti Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ haca'tan̈e ak'lax vino caw how yuc'u' .
66016020	Sunil con̈ob ayayo xol ha' mar yeb xin ej witz c'aycanocan̈ .
66016021	Istit nimeta sajbat yul satcan̈ yiban̈ anma , aymi hunu quintal yalil hunun ch'en . Yoc anma istz'acti'n̈en Comam Dios yu ch'en sajbat tu' , yuto caw ak'lax ec'oya' yanma anma .
66017001	Lahwi tu' yul hune' naj 'angel inc'atan̈an , hune' naj yetbi ebnaj hujwan̈ ik'bil isvaso , yalni naj wetan : -- Cata chinyehan isya'tajil chialaxayo yiban̈ ix ix tx'oj ye iswi' tawet , ix tz'on̈anayo yiban̈ ej ha ha' .
66017002	Sunil ebnaj yahawil con̈ob yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , xaayc'ay yin̈ mule yeb ix , haxa anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xin , haca'tan̈e xayuc'tzecan̈ ix yin̈ mule yu istx'ojal iswi' , ẍi naj .
66017003	Yin̈ hune' isye Comam Esp'iritu wettu'an , wilan quinyinitojan naj 'angel tu' bey tx'otx' desierto . Wilnihan hune' ix ix ayahto yiban̈ hune' no' niman nok' . Hune' no nok' tu' cajin̈ yin̈ no' , hantan̈e xin huntek'an bihe tx'oj istzotel yin̈ Comam Dios ayco yin̈ no' , hujeb xin iswi' no' , yeb lahon̈eb yuc'a' no' .
66017004	Hune' ix ix tu' cajwuk'wun̈e yeb cajyolyon̈e jilni xil isk'ap ix , hantan̈e xin yelawil aycoj ; ayco ch'en oro yeb ch'en perla yelawiloj , yeb huntek'an ch'en ch'en c'ulch'an jilni . Ik'bil xin hune' ch'en vaso naba oro yu ix , nohna yu sunil ismachiswalilal yeb mule chiswatx'e ix .
66017005	Tz'ibn̈ebilico hune' bihe yin̈ ispalan̈ ix , machi mac ohtan̈e , chalni haca' ti' : " Hune' niman con̈ob Babilonia , mi'e yin̈ sunil ebix tx'oj ye iswi' yeb sunil tzet machiswalil ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , " ẍicoj .
66017006	Haxa wilnihan xin caw uc'um ix yu ischiq'uil ebnaj yetxa Comam Dios potx'bil camoj , yeb yu ischiq'uil ebnaj yak' isba testigohal yin̈ Comam Jes'us . Caw xin c'ayilo inc'ulan yet wilnihan ix .
66017007	Yalni naj 'angel wetan : -- ¿ Tzet yin̈ xin caw chic'ayilo hac'ul hawilni ix ? Wal xin chiwalan tawet yin̈ tzet yelapno ye hune' ix ti' yeb no nok' hujeb iswi' yeb lahon̈eb yuc'a' ayicto yalan̈ ix .
66017008	No nok' maxawil tu' , ha' ton hune' naj aytic'a yet payxa , yaja' matxa naj ayc'o tinan̈ , yaj chiahilo naj yul hune' niman xab yet yalan̈to maẍto chitocano naj yin̈ isya'tajil . Haxa anma ay sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' , huntek'an mach ayayo isbi yul te' hum yet k'inale mach istan̈bal yettaxtic'a iswatx'i hune' yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , caw chic'ay isc'ul yilni naj Nok' isbi tu' , naj aytic'a payxa , yaja' machi naj tinan̈ , yaja' xin chihulupaxoj .
66017009	Mac ay yitz'atil iswi' , istxumabilo hune' ti' : Ha' hujeb iswi' no' tu' , yechel hujeb witz bay tz'on̈an ix ix tu' , yechelpaxo hujwan̈ ebnaj yahawil con̈ob yehi .
66017010	Howan̈ ebnaj yahawil tu' xatan̈iloj , hune' naj xin ayco yahawil tinan̈ , hunxa naj xin chioc naj yahawilo tzujanilxa , yaja' xin hanic'xan̈e tiempohal .
66017011	Haxa hune' naj Nok' isbi , naj aytic'a payxa , yaja' machi tinan̈ , yet chihul naj tu' ha' naj chioc yahawilo yin̈xa iswaxan̈wan̈ , yuto yetbi isba naj yeb ebnaj hujwan̈ . Hayet chioc naj yahawilo tu' behxa isto naj yin̈ isya'tajil yin̈ huneln̈e .
66017012	Haxa lahon̈eb yuc'a' no' hawil tu' , yechel yin̈ lahon̈wan̈ ebnaj rey maẍto chioc yahawiloj , yaj xin hun chu yak'lax yip ebnaj yeb naj Nok' isbi yoc yahawil yin̈ hanic' tiempohal .
66017013	Ebnaj lahon̈wan̈ tu' , hunlahanxan̈e chute ebnaj isnabal cat yak'ni ebnaj yip yeb yahawilal tet naj Nok' isbi ,
66017014	cat yanico ebnaj howal yin̈ Comam oc xahanbalil . Yaja' chik'oji Comam yin̈ ebnaj , yuto ha' Comam tu' yahawil yin̈ ebnaj rey yeb yahaw Comam yin̈ ebnaj yahawil . Wal macta awtebil yu Comam yeb mac sic'bililoj , yeb macta yijem tet Comam , ayco isc'atan̈ yet chik'oji Comam yin̈ ebnaj tu' , ẍi naj 'angel .
66017015	Yalnipaxo naj 'angel tu' wetan : -- Wal huntek'an ha ha' hawil bay tz'on̈anayo ix ix tx'oj ye iswi' tu' , yechelej anma , yebej nime con̈ob yeb niẍte con̈ob , yebej anma nananta yabxubal .
66017016	Ha' lahon̈eb yuc'a' naj Nok' isbi hawil tu' yechel ebnaj rey , ha' ebnaj chiyahnican̈ ix tx'oj ye iswi' tu' cat ist'ilbalax ix cat isbejlaxcano ix . Chic'uxlaxto isnimanil ix cat isn̈uslaxto xol k'a k'a' .
66017017	Comam Dios anico yin̈ isc'ul ebnaj rey tu' iswatx'en haca' tzet choche Comam yuxin hunlahan yute ebnaj isnabal , yak'ni ebnaj sunil yip tet naj Nok' isbi masanta chij isba tzet halbilxatic'a yu Comam Dios .
66017018	Wal hune' ix ix hawil tu' , yechel hune' niman con̈ob ay yip yiban̈ sunil ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' ye ix , ẍi naj 'angel .
66018001	Lahwi tu' xin wilnihan yayilo hune' naj 'angel yul satcan̈ caw ay yip . Caw xin sajbilo sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' yu isk'ak'al naj .
66018002	Yalni naj yin̈ caw ip : ¡ Maayc'ay niman con̈ob Babilonia , wal tinan̈ maayc'aycanoj ! Maoc yatuto ebnaj ischejab naj matzwalil yeb yehobalo esp'iritu tx'oj , yeb yatuto no' ch'ic caw yahbeta jilni , yeb caw machiswalil .
66018003	Yuto sunilej con̈ob xaayc'ay yin̈ mule yu istx'ojal hune' con̈ob tu' , haca'tan̈e caw xaiscamtzecanilo iswi' huntek'an con̈ob tu' yu istx'ojal . Haxa ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' xaayc'ay ebnaj yin̈ ixlo yu hune' con̈ob tu' . Sunil ebnaj txon̈wom ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , xaoc ebnaj k'alomal yu istxon̈ni tzettaj ye tu' caw ay istohol , yuto hune' con̈ob tu' caw lolo' isk'aptzen isba yeb yec'tzen k'in̈ , ẍi naj 'angel tu' .
66018004	Lahwi tu' wabenpaxojan hune'xa yul nuk'e satcan̈ , halni haca' ti' : Hex wetxahan , elan̈we yul hune' con̈ob ti' yun̈e mach cheyilto hewatx'en istx'ojal chiswatx'e , yeb yun̈e maẍtaj hunex chechah isya'tajil chul yiban̈ .
66018005	Hune' con̈ob ti' caw xaah tenno ismul , caw xaahilo satcan̈ , yaja' wal tinan̈ xin manalaxti ismul yu Comam Dios .
66018006	Haca'tic'a yute yak'ni tet anma , hac tu' chu heyak'ni tet , cayelto ec'bal ispaj selel cheyak' tet . Huntek'an howla tzet ye tu' ayayto yul isvaso yak' yuc'u' anma , pajtzewe tet , yaj cayelto ec'na caw how cheyute .
66018007	Haca'tic'a yu islolo'n̈en isba yeb yak'ni tzet choche yanma , hac tu' chu heyak'ni ec'oya' yanma cat heyak'ni isya'tajil tet , yuto chal hune' con̈ob Babilonia tu' haca' ti' : " Haninti'an caw reinainan , tz'on̈aninan yul intz'on̈obalan , man hunixojan , mach bak'inal chiec'ya' wanmahan , " ẍi ix .
66018008	Yuxinto hune'n̈e tz'ayical chihul sunil isya'tajil yiban̈ , chihul camical , ok'il , wahil , cat isn̈uslaxto xol k'a k'a' , yuto ay yip Comam Dios Jahawil yanayo isya'tajil yiban̈ hune' con̈ob tu' , ẍiayoj .
66018009	Wal sunil ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yaco ebnaj ismul yeb yak' yoche tzet chal isnimanil yeb hune' con̈ob tu' , caw ch'ok' ebnaj yeb caw chitz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yilni yah isn̈ubal yet chitz'atoj .
66018010	Nahat xin chicancano lin̈no ebnaj yu xiwquilal yilni isya'tajil chiay yiban̈ con̈ob tu' , chalni ebnaj : ¡ Ay , caw c'anch'an niman con̈ob Babilonia , hune' con̈ob caw aycano yip ! Yuto caw yin̈ an̈e mahul isya'tajil yiban̈ , ẍi ebnaj .
66018011	Hacpax tu' ebnaj txon̈wom ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , caw chitz'ay isc'ul ebnaj , yeb caw chiok' ebnaj yuto matxa mac chilok'ni tzet chistxon̈ ebnaj .
66018012	Yuto caw yijatzilxa chistxon̈ ebnaj ch'en oro , ch'en plata , yebej ch'en ch'en c'ulejch'an jilni , yeb ch'en perla . Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj k'ap lino caw ay istohol , k'ap k'ap morado jilni , yeb k'ap seda , yeb k'ap k'ap caj jilni . Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj sunilej te te' xuk' sam , yeb tzettaj ye tu' watx'ebil yin̈ istx'i'eh no' elefante , yeb yin̈ej te te' caw ay istohol , yeb yin̈ ch'en bronce , yin̈ ch'en hierro yeb yin̈ ch'en m'armol .
66018013	Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj te' canela yeb yan̈al itah caw xuk' sam , yeb te' pom , yeb mirra , yeb an̈ caw xuk' sam , yeb te' vino , yeb te' aceite , yeb ixim harina caw ay istohol , yeb ixim trigo . Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj no' wacax , no' me' yeb no' cheh , yeb te' caret chistaric'o no' cheh . Chistxon̈nipaxo ebnaj anma chejabo tet hune' con̈ob tu' .
66018014	Chalni ebnaj txon̈wom tet hune' con̈ob tu' : ¡ Matxa chiapni te' lobehal tawet tinan̈ , huntek'an te' caw chawoche halob . Caw mac'aycanilo halolo'al yeb hak'alomal , matxa bak'inal chawil yin̈ ! ẍi ebnaj .
66018015	Ebnaj txon̈wom caw occano k'alomal yu hune' con̈ob tu' , nahat can lin̈no ebnaj yu xiwquilal yilni isya'tajil chiay yiban̈ con̈ob tu' , caw xin chiok' ebnaj yeb chitz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ con̈ob tu' .
66018016	Chalni ebnaj : ¡ Ay , caw c'anch'an hune' niman con̈ob ti' ! Hune' con̈ob ti' lahantic'a haca' hunu ix ix chianico k'ap lino caw ay istohol xilo isk'ap , yeb huntek'an xilk'ape morado yeb caj jilni , aypaxico ch'en oro yeb ch'en perla yeb ch'en ch'en caw ay istohol yelawiloj ,
66018017	yaja' xin yin̈ caw hunepn̈e matan̈canilo isk'alomal , ẍi ebnaj . Sunil ebnaj yahaw barco yeb anma ayicto yul barco tu' , yeb ebnaj chibak'on te' , yeb huntek'anxa mac chimunla yiban̈ ha' mar nahat cancano lin̈noj .
66018018	Yet yilni ebnaj yah isn̈ubal hune' con̈ob tu' yah yaw ebnaj , yalni ebnaj : Caw machi hunuxa con̈ob haca' hune' niman con̈ob ti' , ẍi ebnaj .
66018019	Yanahto ebnaj pojoj xol xil iswi' yu bisc'ulal , caw xin ch'ok' ebnaj , yeb caw chitz'ay isc'ul ebnaj yin̈ con̈ob tu' , chalni ebnaj : ¡ Ay , caw c'anch'an hune' niman con̈ob ! Yu isk'alomal yuxin k'alombican̈ ebnaj ay isbarco xol ha' mar . ¡ Yaja' xin yin̈ caw hunepn̈ech'an matan̈iloj ! ẍi ebnaj .
66018020	Yuxin tzalahan̈we hex ayex yul satcan̈ yu maayc'ay hune' con̈ob tu' . Tzalahan̈wepaxo hex yetexxa Comam Dios , hex ischejab Comam yet payat yeb hex ischejab Comam Jes'us , yuto haca' yu yak'ni hune' con̈ob tu' ec'oya' heyanma , hac tu' yu yak'lax ec'oya' yanma yu Comam Dios .
66018021	Lahwi tu' wilnihan yinican̈ hune' naj 'angel caw ay yip , hune' ch'en niman ch'en haca' ch'en molino yet trigo , isk'ojnayto naj ch'en xol ha' mar , yalni naj : Hac ti' chu isk'ojlaxayto hune' niman con̈ob Babilonia , matxa bak'inal xin chiillaxi .
66018022	Matxa bak'inal chiabelax yoc te' arpa , yeb te' su' yeb ch'en trompeta yulaj iscallehal con̈ob tu' . Matxa xin hunu naj munlawom chiillax ismunla yin̈ tzettaj munilal , yeb matxa chiabelax yoc ch'en molino yul con̈ob tu' .
66018023	Matxa xin chiillax isk'ak'al hunu cantil , matxa xin chiabelax iswejcha anma yin̈ mohyilal . Matxa xin chiillax ebnaj txon̈wom yul con̈ob tu' waxan̈ca xin caw ay yelapno ye ebnaj sata anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' . Yak'nipaxo subchaho hune' con̈ob tu' sunil anma yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu isnawalil .
66018024	Alaxpaxayo hune' niman isya'tajil yiban̈ con̈ob Babilonia tu' yuto ha' bey tu' ilcha ischiq'uil ebnaj ischejab Comam Dios potx'bilcamoj , yeb ischiq'uil macta yetxa Comam yehi , yeb ischiq'uil ebnaj potx'lax yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , ẍi naj .
66019001	Lahwi tu' wabenan yel yaw tx'i'al yul nuk'e yul satcan̈ yalni yin̈ caw ip : ¡ Caw niman yelapno Comam Dios Jahawil , Comam bay chitit colbanile ! Han̈c'an̈e Comam Dios ay ismay yeb caw ay yip .
66019002	Yuto yin̈ caw isyelal yeb yin̈ caw istoholal chil Comam yin̈ tzet chielico anma . Mayayo Comam isya'tajil yiban̈ ix tx'oj ye iswi' , ix ayco yechelo con̈ob Babilonia , ix etanto anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yu istx'ojal chiswatx'e , yeb yak' Comam Dios ispaj selel tet ix yu ebnaj ischejab Comam potx'bil yu ix , ẍi .
66019003	Yalnipaxo huntek'an yul nuk'e tu' haca' ti' : Caw niman yelapno Comam Dios Jahawil . Hune' ix ix tu' maẍtic'a chisbej yah isn̈ubal , ẍi .
66019004	Wal ebnaj veinticuatro anciano yeb ebnaj can̈wan̈ querub'in ay jahno ebnaj , yay xulno ebnaj , yanico ebnaj ismay Comam Dios , Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal . Yalni ebnaj : -- Hacojab tu' , caw niman yelapno Comam Dios Jahawil , ẍi ebnaj .
66019005	Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e elti bay tz'on̈an Comam Dios , yalni haca' ti' : Aweco ismay Comam Dios sunilex yijemex tet Comam yeb hex chexxiw tet Comam , walca ay heyelapnoj maca machi heyelapnoj , ẍi .
66019006	Wabenpaxojan hantan̈e yul nuk'e haca' ishaxon tx'i'al ej ha ha' yeb haca' isn̈irla c'uh , chalni haca' ti' : Caw niman yelapno isbi Comam Dios Jahawil , yuto Comam caw aycano yip maschahco yoc yahawil .
66019007	Tzalajon̈wej , caw jak'awe tzala coc'ul , cat janico ismay Comam Dios yuto maapni istz'ayical ismohyi Comam oc xahanbalil . Ha' mac chioc yixalo Comam tu' caw watx'ebilxa isba .
66019008	Yuto xahallaxi ta chaco ix xil isk'ap , k'ap lino caw aycan̈ istohol yeb caw saj yehi , yeb caw chitzejtzoni . Hune' xilk'ape tu' yechel istoholal chisbeybaln̈e macta yetxa Comam Dios yehi .
66019009	Yalni hune' naj 'angel wetan : -- Tz'ibn̈e hune' ti' : " Sak'al yet macta awtebil yin̈ ismohyilal Comam oc xahanbalil , " ẍi naj . Yalnipaxo naj : -- Huntek'an tzoti' ti' yet Comam Dios yehi , isyelal chala , ẍi naj .
66019010	Lahwi tu' way jahnojan sata naj 'angel tu' yu winayo inbahan sata naj walnihan , yaja' xin yal naj wetan : -- Mach chachay jahno yin̈ insatan yuto ischejab Comam Dios wehan haca' hach ti' , yeb haca' ebnaj hawuẍta chak' isba yalnilo Istzoti' Comam Jes'us . Wal xin cachann̈e tet Comam Dios bay chawiyo haba , ẍi naj . Ha' xin Istzoti' Comam Jes'us , ha' chiiptzen ebnaj ischejab Comam .
66019011	Lahwi tu' ishajni isba satcan̈ , wilnihan hune' no' cheh sajin̈ , ayahto hune' mac yiban̈ no' . Hune' mac tu' xin Yijem yeb Isyelal isbi , yuto yin̈ caw istoholal chil yin̈ tzet chielico anma , chak'nipaxo howal yin̈ istoholal .
66019012	Wal isbak'sat lahan haca' xaj k'a k'a' , hantan̈e xin corona ayahto yin̈ iswi' . Tz'ibn̈ebilico xin hune' bihe yin̈ , hune' bihe tu' han̈c'an̈e hune' mac tu' ohtan̈e .
66019013	Wal xil isk'ap xin bacbilico chic' yin̈ . Hune' mac tu' Istzoti' Comam Dios isbi .
66019014	Tzujan xin ebnaj 'angel ak'om howal yintaj , ayco k'ap lino caw ay istohol xilo isk'ap ebnaj , yeb caw saj jilni , machi nich'ano tz'il ayco yin̈ . Ayahto ebnaj yiban̈ hunun no' cheh sajin̈ .
66019015	Chi-xin-elti hune' ch'en espada caw ay yeh yul isti' , ha' ch'en xin chak'baln̈e yin̈ej con̈ob . Ch'oc naj Yahawiloj yeb sunil yip , yeb hune' isvara naba hierro . Haca' chu isxan̈laxilti yal te' uva yun̈e yoc te' vinohal , hac tu' chu yanayo naj isya'tajil yiban̈ ej con̈ob yu ishowal Comam Dios , Comam caw aycano yip .
66019016	Wal yin̈ xil isk'ap yeb yin̈ isbul tz'ibn̈ebilico hune' bihe haca' ti' : Yahawil yin̈ ebnaj yahaw , Iswi'ehal yin̈ ebnaj ayco iswi'ehaloj , ẍicoj .
66019017	Lahwi tu' wilnihan hune' naj 'angel lin̈ancan̈ yiban̈ tz'ayic , yalni naj tetej no' ch'ic chiec' yictabal satcan̈ haca' ti' : -- Catawej , cutxbaweti heba , cat hec'uxni chibe chak' Comam Dios teyet .
66019018	C'uxwe ischibehal ebnaj rey , yeb ebnaj yahawil soldado , yeb ischibehal ebnaj caw can̈ yehi , yeb ischibehal ej no' cheh yeb ebnaj chiahto yiban̈ no' . C'uxwe ischibehal tzijxan̈e anmahil , anma yet isba ischuquil , anma chejab , anma machi yelapnoj , yeb anma ay yelapnoj , ẍi naj .
66019019	Wilnihan naj Nok' isbi yeb sunil ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' , yeb sunil issoldado , cutxanxaco ebnaj yu yanico howal yin̈ hune' mac ayahto yiban̈ no' cheh yeb yin̈ ebnaj ak'om howal tzujan yintaj .
66019020	Istzablaxayo naj Nok' isbi yeb naj isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios , naj yeni nimeta c'aybalc'ule sata naj Nok' isbi . Yu huntek'an nimeta c'aybalc'ule isye naj yak' subchaho naj anma yun̈e yalaxico yechel naj Nok' isbi tu' yin̈ , yinipaxayo isba anma tet yechel naj . Caw xin itzitz naj Nok' isbi , yeb naj isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios isk'ojlaxto ebnaj xol hune' niman k'a' chiah xaj yu azufre .
66019021	Wal sunilxa ebnaj xin potx'lax ebnaj yu ch'en espada chielti yul isti' naj ayahto yiban̈ no' cheh tu' , caw xin sunil no' ch'ic tu' caw nohcano isc'ul isc'uxnito ischibehal sunil anma tu' .
66020001	Lahwi tu' , wilnihan yayilo hune' naj 'angel yul satcan̈ , ik'bil islawehal hune' niman xab yu naj , ik'bilpaxo hune' niman cadena yu naj .
66020002	Istzabnayo naj hune' mac chiyij drag'on , ha' ton no' payat laba chihallax diablohal yeb Satan'as , isc'albanayo naj 'angel tu' naj yulbal mil habil .
66020003	Isk'ojlaxto naj yul hune' niman xab , ismajchencano naj 'angel tu' isti' . Yanico naj issellohal yun̈e mach ch'ahti naj drag'on tu' yak'a subchaho ej con̈ob . Haxa yet chiec'to mil habil tu' cat isbejtzolax naj hanic'xa tiempohal .
66020004	Lahwi tu' wilnihan huntek'an tz'on̈obal bay tz'on̈an ebnaj ak'lax yip yu yilni yin̈ tzet chielico anma . Wilnipaxojan yanma ebnaj ilaxilo iswi' yu yak' isba testigohal yin̈ Comam Jes'us , yeb yu yalic'o Istzoti' Comam Dios . Ha' ton ebnaj tu' mach yiyo isba tet mac Nok' isbi , mach xin aypaxo jahno tet yechel . Mach xin ischahpaxico ebnaj yechel mac Nok' isbi tu' yin̈ ispalan̈ maca yin̈ isk'ab . Wilnihan yitzitzbican̈ ebnaj tu' , yoc ebnaj yahawilo yinta Comam yulbal mil habil .
66020005	Ha' ton huntek'an ebnaj tu' babel pitzc'acan̈ , wal huntek'anxa camom xin mach pitzc'acan̈ masanto chielto mil habil tu' , cat ispitzc'acan̈ .
66020006	¡ Sak'al yet mac babel chipitzc'acan̈ tu' yuto yetxa Comam Dios yehi ! Matxa xin chik'oji iscab camical yin̈ , wal xin chioc sacerdotehal yin̈ ismunil Comam Dios yeb Comam Jesucristo , chiocpaxo yahawilo yinta Comam yulbal mil habil .
66020007	Lahwi yec'to mil habil xin cat isbejtzolax naj matzwalil bay majan ,
66020008	cat xin yahti naj yak'no subchaho anma ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' yebpaxo xin Gog yeb Magog cat iscutxbanico naj yin̈ howal . Ha' xin isbisil ebnaj ak'om howal chicutxico tu' lahan haca' yarenahil isti' ha' mar .
66020009	Yet chito ebnaj yin̈ howal tu' chismajto ebnaj sunil sat tx'o tx'otx' ti' cat ishoynoyo ebnaj iscampamento ebnaj yetxa Comam Dios yehi yeb hune' niman con̈ob xahan ay yu Comam ; yaja' chati Comam k'a k'a' yiban̈ ebnaj cat istz'ahcanto ebnaj sunil .
66020010	Wal naj matzwalil ak'ni subchaho huntek'an anma tu' k'ojlaxayto naj xol hune' niman k'a' chiah xaj yu azufre , hune' bay k'ojlaxayto mac Nok' isbi yeb naj isbalico isba ischejabo Comam Dios . Ha' bey tu' xin chiak'lax ec'oya' yanma ebnaj tz'ayic ak'bal yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
66020011	Lahwi tu' , wilnihan hune' niman tz'on̈obal saj jilni yeb hune' mac tz'on̈anayo yul hune' tz'on̈obal tu' . Yin̈n̈ena tu' isc'aycan̈ tx'o tx'otx' yeb satcan̈ sata mac tz'on̈an tu' , wiyom xin isc'aycaniloj .
66020012	Wilnihan anma camnaj lin̈ancan̈ sata Comam , anma niman yelapnoj yeb anma mach yelapnoj . Ishajlax huntek'an te' hum , yillax yin̈ tzet chielico anma camom tu' hatatic'a tzet iswatx'e hunun , haca' yehayo yul huntek'an te' hum tu' . Ishajlaxpaxo te' hum bay ayayo isbi anma ayxa isk'inal yin̈ huneln̈e .
66020013	Yanico ha' mar sunil mac camna yul ha' tet Comam , hacpax tu' naj camical yeb cambal yapaxico sunil camom tet Comam . Yilni Comam yin̈ tzet elicoj hatatic'a tzet iswatx'e hunun .
66020014	Lahwi tu' isk'ojlaxayto naj camical yeb cambal xol hune' niman k'a' . Hune' k'a k'a' tu' , ha' ton iscab camical .
66020015	Haxa mac mach ayayo isbi yul te' hum yet k'inale k'ojlaxayto xol hune' niman k'a' tu' .
66021001	Lahwi tu' xin , wilnihan hune' ac' satcan̈ yeb hune' tx'o tx'otx' ac' , yuto ha' babel satcan̈ yeb tx'otx' babel tx'otx' caycan̈ , hacpax tu' xin ha' mar caycan̈ ha' .
66021002	Hanin Juan inti'an wilan iscon̈ob Comam Dios , ha' ton ac' Jerusal'en , wilan istit yul satcan̈ bay ay Comam Dios . Caw c'ul yehi , haca' hunu ix ix watx'ebilxa isba yuto yocxa yin̈ mohyilal yeb naj chiik'ni .
66021003	Wabenan hune' yul nuk'e elti bay tz'on̈an Comam , yalni yin̈ caw ip : -- Wal tinan̈ ayxaco Comam Dios xol anma , chi-xin-cancano Comam xol , iscon̈obxa Comam chucanicoj . Chiehayo Comam xol anma , cat yoccano Comam isDiosaloj .
66021004	Ha' Comam xin chisunilo yal sat anma , matxa camical , matxa ok'il , matxa mac chiah isc'ul , matxa isya'tajil , yuto sunil tzet aytic'a yet yalan̈tocanoj , xatan̈iloj , ẍi .
66021005	Yalni Comam tz'on̈an yul istz'on̈obal wetan : -- Haninti'an chiwak' ac'bojan sunil tzettaj ye tu' , ẍi Comam . Yalnipaxo Comam wetan : -- Tz'ibn̈ecano huntek'an tzoti' ti' yuto isyelal yehi , yeb chu iscawxi isc'ul anma yin̈ , ẍi .
66021006	Lahwi tu' yalnipaxo Comam wetan : -- Sunil watx'ebilxa . Haninti'an yichebanil yeb islahobal , haca' tz'ib A yeb Z . Macta chitaj isti' , chiwak'an ha ha' matanil yuc'u' , hune' ha ha' chiak'ni k'inale .
66021007	Ha' mac chik'oji , chiwak'an sunil huntek'an tu' ismajuloj . Haninan xin chinocan isDiosaloj , cat yoc wuninalojan .
66021008	Yaja' wal mac chixiw yanico isba yul ink'aban , yeb mac mach chayto yul yanma win̈an , yeb mac chiwatx'en isyahbetajil , yeb macta potx'om anma , yeb macta chiixli yeb chiwinajli , yeb macta chicunn̈en yet anmahil , yeb macta chiay jahno sata tioẍ , yeb sunil macta lek'ti'wom , ha' huntek'an mac tu' chialaxto xol hune' niman k'a' chiah xaj yu azufre , ha' ton iscab camical .
66021009	Lahwi tu' yul naj ishuj 'angel inc'atan̈an , naj ik'n̈e ch'en ishuj vaso bay ayayto islahobal isya'tajil , yalni naj wetan : -- Cata , chinyehan tawet mac chioc yixalo Comam oc xahanbalil , ẍi naj .
66021010	Yin̈ hune' isye Comam Esp'iritu wettu'an wilan quinyinitojan naj 'angel tu' yin̈ iswi' hune' niman witz caw nahat yecan̈ . Isyeni naj niman con̈ob Jerusal'en wetan , iscon̈ob Comam Dios . Hune' con̈ob tu' wilan istit yul satcan̈ bay ay Comam Dios .
66021011	Caw xin chitzejlaco isk'ak'al Comam yin̈ con̈ob tu' , lahan haca' istzejla ch'en ch'en c'ulch'an jilni yeb haca' istzejla ch'en jaspe , chik'axpon cosat yul haca' ch'en cristal .
66021012	Hune' con̈ob tu' hoyanico hune' niman c'ub yin̈ caw xin nahat yecan̈ , cablahon̈eb ispultahil aycoj , cablahon̈wan̈ ebnaj 'angel ayco istan̈enoj , hunun ebnaj yin̈ isti' hunun pulta tu' . Yin̈ hunun pulta tu' tz'ibn̈ebilico hunun isbi ebnaj cablahon̈eb majan Israel .
66021013	Oxeb ispultahil ayco yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chiahilo tz'ayic , oxebpaxo xin ayco yin̈ yetc'ulal bay chito tz'ayic , oxeb xin ayco yin̈ norte , oxebpaxo xin ayco yin̈ sur .
66021014	Hune' niman c'ub tu' ayco cablahon̈eb ch'en ch'en isxe'oj , ayco xin isbi hunun ebnaj cablahon̈wan̈ ischejab Comam oc xahanbalil yin̈ hunun ch'en .
66021015	Naj 'angel tzotel wettu'an ik'bil hune' vara naba oro yu naj yun̈e ismalen naj hune' con̈ob tu' yeb ispultahil yebpaxo isc'ubal .
66021016	Hune' niman con̈ob tu' can̈eb istxiquin , lahan xin yeco ismalil hunun istxiquin tu' . Hayet ismalen naj 'angel hune' con̈ob tu' wajeb ciento legua yecoj . Hune' con̈ob tu' haca' yeco ismalil ispac'ul hac tu' yeco ismalil istxiquin , hac tu' yepaxocan̈ istel .
66021017	Haxa yet ismalen naj isc'ubal con̈ob tu' sesenta y cinco metro elicoj . Hune' malbal yaco naj tu' lahan haca' ismalbal anma .
66021018	Hune' c'ub tu' , ch'en jaspe ayco isch'enaloj . Wal hune' con̈ob tu' caw naba oro , haca' istzejla ch'en vidrio hac tu' istzejlahi .
66021019	Ch'en ch'en ayco isxe'alo isc'ubal con̈ob tu' sunilej ch'en ch'en caw c'ulch'an jilni ayco yelawiloj . Ch'en babel jaspe ch'en , ch'en iscab zafiro , ch'en isyox 'agata , ch'en iscan̈ esmeralda .
66021020	Ch'en isho' 'onice , ch'en iswaj cornalina , ch'en ishuj cris'olito , ch'en iswaxaj berilo , ch'en isbalon̈eb topacio , ch'en islahon̈eb crisoprasa , ch'en ishunlahon̈eb jacinto , haxa ch'en iscan̈lahon̈eb xin amatista ; ha' sunil ch'en ti' ayco yelawiloj .
66021021	Cablahon̈eb ispultahil isc'ubal con̈ob tu' , ha' ton cablahon̈eb ch'en perla , hunun pulta tu' hunun ch'en perla ayco yin̈ . Wal hune' niman calle chiec'to yictabal con̈ob tu' naba oron̈e , chik'axpon cosat yul haca' vidrio .
66021022	Machi xin yatut Comam Dios wilan yul hune' con̈ob tu' , yuto ha' Comam Dios caw aycano yip , yeb Comam oc xahanbalil , ayco xol anma tu' .
66021023	Hune' con̈ob tu' matxa chiocnico yoj tz'ayic yeb yoj ixahaw yu , walxinto ha' isk'ak'al yip Comam Dios ha' ayayo xol anma , yeb xin Comam oc xahanbalil sajilk'inal Comam .
66021024	Yin̈xa issajilk'inal hune' con̈ob tu' chibelwi ej con̈ob colbilxa . Sunil ebnaj rey ay yul sat yiban̈k'inal ti' chato isk'alomal tet hune' con̈ob tu' .
66021025	Maẍtic'a chipebalax ispultahil hunun tz'ayic yuto matxa ak'bal bey tu' .
66021026	Ha' tet hune' con̈ob tu' chialaxto sunil isk'alomal yeb yip sunilej con̈ob .
66021027	Maẍtic'a nino istx'ojal chiocto bey tu' , mach hunu mac chiwatx'en tzettaj chisyah Comam Dios chiapni yul hune' con̈ob tu' , yeb matxa lek'ti'al . Wal xin han̈c'an̈e mac tz'unbilayo isbi yul hum yet k'inale yet Comam oc xahanbalil , ha' chiocto yul hune' con̈ob tu' .
66022001	Lahwi tu' isyeni naj 'angel hune' ha ha' caw saj wetan , ha' chiak'ni k'inale . Caw xin chik'axpon cosat yul ha' haca' vidrio . Hune' ha ha' tu' , ha' bay ay istz'on̈obal Comam Dios yeb Comam oc xahanbalil , ha' tu' chitit ha' .
66022002	Yictabal hune' niman calle yul hune' niman con̈ob tu' chiec' ha' . Ha' xin isk'axk'epal isti'la ha' aycan̈ te te' chiak'ni k'inale , hunun ixahaw xin yak'ni sat te' , cablahon̈el chisatni te' yulbal habil . Wal xaj te' xin ha' chiocnico an̈il yu anma ay yulej tx'otx' con̈ob .
66022003	Sunil tzettaj ay bey tu' matxa chiay ishowal Comam Dios yiban̈ . Yul hune' con̈ob tu' ay istz'on̈obal Comam Dios yeb Comam oc xahanbalil . Sunil ischejab Comam xin chiyiyo isba tet ,
66022004	cat yilnico yin̈ Comam , cat yinic'o isbi Comam yin̈ ispalan̈ .
66022005	Bey tu' matxa ak'bal , matxa yilalo chiocnico cantil yeb yoj tz'ayic , yuto haxa isk'ak'al Comam chitzejn̈eni , cat yoc yahawilo yin̈ sunilbal tiempo .
66022006	Yalnipaxo naj 'angel wetan : -- Huntek'an tzoti' ti' caw yeli , iscawxobal isc'ul anma yehi . Comam Dios Jahawil , Comam chiiptzen ischejab yalnic'o Istzoti' , ha' chejniti y'angel yalno tet ischejab yin̈ huntek'an tzet toxa chiyuhi , ẍi naj .
66022007	Chal Comam Jes'us haca' ti' : -- ¡ Caw toxa chinhulan ! ¡ Sak'al yet mac chiyijen Istzoti' Comam Dios halbilcano yul hune' hum ti' ! ẍi Comam .
66022008	Hanin Juan inti'an , haninan caw wilan yeb wabenan huntek'an ti' . Hayet wilnihan yeb yet wabenan way jahnojan sata naj 'angel yeni huntek'an tu' wetan .
66022009	Yaja' yal naj 'angel tu' wetan : -- Mach chachay jahno insatajan yuto ischejab Comam Dios wehan haca' hach ti' , yeb haca' ebnaj hawuẍta chihalnic'o Istzoti' Comam , yebpaxo sunil macta chiyijen tzet tz'ibn̈ebil yul hune' hum ti' . Wal xin ha'ojabn̈e tet Comam Dios chawiyo haba , ẍi naj .
66022010	Yalnipaxo naj wetan : -- Mach chawebato tzettaj tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul hune' hum ti' , yuto toxa chiyij isba yin̈ tzettaj tz'ibn̈ebilcano ti' .
66022011	Ha' mac chiwatx'en istx'ojal islahabico iswatx'en istx'ojal , haxa mac chiwatx'en isyahbetajil xin , islahabico iswatx'en isyahbetajil tu' . Ha' mac chiwatx'en istoholal islahabico iswatx'en istoholal . Ha' mac yetxa Comam Dios yehi islahabico isyijen tzet chal Comam , ẍi naj 'angel .
66022012	Chalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Yin̈ caw yeli toxa chinhulan , ik'bil ispaj selel tzettaj iswatx'e hunun mac wuhan , hatatic'a tzet iswatx'e .
66022013	Haninti'an yichebanil yeb islahobal , haca' tz'ib A yeb Z , ẍi Comam .
66022014	Sak'al yet mac tx'ahbilxa ismul , haca'tan̈e xaistx'ah xil isk'ap yuto ay yoc yin̈ te te' chiak'ni k'inale , yeb xin chu yocto yul ispultahil hune' con̈ob tu' .
66022015	Yaja' wal mac chiwatx'en isyahbetajil chicancano yintalto hune' con̈ob tu' , yeb macta cunlum , yeb macta ixlom yeb winajlom , yeb macta potx'wawom , yeb macta chisjahba isba sata tioẍ , yebpaxo sunil mac choche yala' lek'ti'al .
66022016	Chalnipaxo Comam Jes'us : -- Haninti'an inchejtijan w'angelan yalno sunil huntek'an ti' tet sunil mac ayxaco yul ink'aban . Haninti'an titnajinan yin̈ yuninal naj rey David , haca' hunu te' xe' te' xawolni , hac tu' wehan . Lahaninpaxojan haca' tx'umel sajbes chiahilo yin̈ sac'ayalil , ẍi Comam .
66022017	Chal Comam Esp'iritu Santo yeb yixal Comam oc xahanbalil haca' ti' : -- ¡ Hulan̈ ! ẍi . Ha' mac chiaben hune' ti' yalabpaxoj : -- ¡ Hulan̈ ! Ha' mac chitaj isti' , tijabi cat yuc'ni ha ha' yin̈ matanil , ha' chiak'ni k'inale mach istan̈bal .
66022018	Sunil mac chiaben Istzoti' Comam Dios tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul hune' hum ti' , caw chintak'ecanojan huntek'an ti' tet : Ta ay mac chianico yak'bil huntek'an tzet tz'ibn̈ebilcano ti' , chati Comam Dios huntek'an isya'tajil tz'ibn̈ebilcano yul hune' hum ti' yiban̈ .
66022019	Yeb ta ay mac chiinilo yak'bil tzet halbilcano yul hune' hum ti' , chilo Comam Dios ismajul yin̈ te te' chiak'ni k'inale , yeb ismajul yul hune' con̈ob yet Comam Dios yehi , haca' yalni yul hune' hum ti' .
66022020	Comam chalni tzettaj ayayo yul hune' Hum ti' , ha' chalni haca' ti' : -- Ho' toxa chinhulan , ẍi Comam . Hacojab tu' . ¡ Hulan̈ Mam Jes'us Jahawil !
66022021	Yak'abayo Comam Jes'us isc'ulch'anil isc'ul teyiban̈ hesunil .
